Haba kaan bi potroi rwanna Jisu kim bi hungluga ngaiye, “Tambaan krwang talei la tuna lian kataknubo?”
Habei ga Jisu na kasinnu naosen khat ting Bakhou kou hungluga bani lak pi bating pi badung thangluga
rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nanina sung leluga kasinnu naosen rwan dan make dabe, nani impha ni beida tambaan krwang talei la khutlaye.
Atibriakpina tudannu heiba kasinnu naosen danga sung bangiamnu maan gana tambaan krwang talei la lian kataknuwe.
Tudannuna heiba kasinnu naosen dannu pakhat ting Ameng bina lou thang nu maan ga Ating lou thang nuwe.
Atiyeda tudannuna Ating balumsanu heipai kasinnu pakhat ting noh pi tonu bating ga baring bi saang tak lung khit thangluga kathuknu tuipui bi bazwan thang damme dabe hana balaang sa inku dingnuwe.
“Ket basuinu riak tamga amnu talei ram ma aih sia yeda! Balangbe ket basuinuwa hunglune atiyeda ket pi basuinu manpa ga aih sianuweda!

Nakutna mak tabe naketna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga tanchatluga nakhouna asat tammo. Kut kani mak tabe ket kani amga khatchale mit lat maknu meikhun bi bazwan thangnu ma, ket thokka ati mak tabe kut ket bachang makka ringnu kum lousunu gana nalaang sa inkuwe.
Namikna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga ran swakluga nakhouna asat tammo. Mik kani amga chok ongnu meikhun bi khutnu ma, mik khatcha phunluga ringnu kum lousunu gana nalaang sa inkuwe.

Heiba kasinnu naosen rwan pakhat ting thou to maknu to mak lang nani cheksinno, balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, tambaan la bani om tambaan chonglang rwanna tambaan bi ongnu Apa mai kum ding chat makka mu ongme.
Balangbe Misa Sa Kapaisa ga braan damnu ding kan thang langna hungnuwe.
“Nani pa-aam baningbo? Manpa khat om zao raza amnu lak pina khat poi braan damme dabe, maanna zao somkaqwaga kaqwa ding rammwan bi thangsialuga poi braan damnu khat ting ga zong lang selabo?
Maanna ha ding ga zongsuwe dabe, Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, poi braan maknu zao somkaqwaga kaqwa lang ma haba zao lang gana maan karo inkulune.
Hadanga heiba kasinnu naosen rwan lak pina pakhat braan dingnu ga tambaan la ongnu nani Pa om baningnu make.

“Nau nanao pakhatna namaitwang bi noh towe dabe, seluga narwei chamza kadouluga baom koi maan ga bakhou inthim toga rin thang biyo. Maanna nachong ga lou thang nge dabe, nangna nau nanao ding ga lousunu rwe.
Atiyeda maanna nachong ga lou thang make dabe, ‘Sake pat ni mak tabe pat thum om paanna chongkaang bing ga pi tip thang lang’ mi pakhat mak tabe pat ni ding kalwangluga seyo.
Maanna bani chong ga le lou thang make dabe, haga rupkathan khou rin thang ngo. Maanna rupkathanna rinnu tangga lou thang make dabe, bating ga Gentile le ramkhai khomnu khat tanga chak thang ngo.
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, talei ram bi nanina bangnu ga tambaan la le banglune khatle talei ram bi nanina sut thangnu ga tambaan la le sut thanglune.
Eina nani khou rin late, talei ram bi nani lak pi pat nina sung kazonga pa-aam ngaakle niye dabe, haga tambaan la ongnu Apa na bani lang to thanglune.
Balangbe Ameng bi pat ni mak tabe pat thumna kadoinu riak pi, Ei bani lak pi sui ongme.”
Haba nung bi Peter na Bakim bi hungluga ngaiye, “Pukraangba, au anaona amaitwang bi katupka noh towe dabe ei bating kok thang leng inza langbo? Leng siari langbo?”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina nakhou leng siariyo dinu make atiyeda somsiari ga leng siariyo dinuwe.
Atibriakpina tambaan krwang talei ga baswak rwan le diga sian paak pa bacham nwamnu krwang khatle bachamme.
Maanna sian paak ka chak thounu kaan bi baom talent raching som chaaknu manpa pakhat ting bakim bi phun hung rwe.
Atiyeda maanna baom lei ga thun ngam mak briakpina bapuba na haga thunnu ngam lang bamei le basa rwan khatle baom ka am bing zwan satluga lei ga thun lang zathang pi rwe.
Atibriakpina swak kana bameithaan bi in bakhup taluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, ating bakaan kasem ngaak thang kammo, eina nalaang bapum brum ga thunne.’
Habei ga swak om bapuba gana bating kriang thangga bating bathan thang rwe khatle baom lei bing ga kok thang rwe.
Atiyeda haba swak kana se swaknu kaan bi baom denari raza chaaknu swak to bachamnu pakhat ting kadou rwe; maanna bating bweiluga baring hung somluga rinne, ‘Nangna chaaknu ga akhou thunro!’
Swak to bachamnu maan gana baket pi in bakhup taluga bakhou hweiga rinne, ‘Ating bakaan kasem ngaak thang kammo, eina nalaang bapum brum ga thunne.’
Atiyeda maanna za makka bating namluga lei ga thun mak basaan qwan in bi thang rwe.
Maanna to damnu bing ga swak to bachamnu rwanna munu kaan bi bani sung sok rwe khatle hungluga swak tamnu bing ga bani om bapuba khou pu thang rwe.
Habei ga bapuba gana bating kou hungluga rinne, ‘Sa ka maknu swak! Nangna akhou hwei briakpina eina naom lei bapum brum ga kok thang rwe.
Eina nating kriang thangnu danga nangna le swak to bachamnu bating ga kriang thang za makkabo?’
Bapuba ga balung pwanga bating balei chaak bapum brum ga maanna thun mak basaan bating rainu mi nun khou pi thang rwe.
Atiga nani mi bingna le bani unao ding sung kalan lana kok thang make dabe, tambaan la ongnu Apa na le nani khou hadanga to thanglune.”
Jisu na hei bing nga kabia taangnu nung Maan Galilee bina swakluga Jordan raan la amnu Judea taram bi hung rwe.
Atiga mi khang puina Banung sui se ngaake khatle Maanna haba riak pi ga bani om kasa kanaa ding pi sa thang ngaake.
Pharisee rwan le Bakim bi hungluga Bating tamga Bakhou ngaiye, “Manpa khatna titcha lang bina bamei ding kanoinuwa zabo?”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Nani heiya pa makchungbo? Hagazo bani ding dam thangnu Maanna thoutan bi ‘kapaisa le kamaisa ding dam thang ngaake,’
Maanna rinne, ‘Atibriakpina kapaisana banu bapa ding asat thangsialuga bamei le diga karung ding gaye khatle barwei pat ni ga pum khatcha tolang nge.’
Atiga barwei ga pat ni latlan rwe atiyeda pum khatcha to rwe. Atibriakpina Rikrwang na kai karung thang damnu ga mi khatchanale to kapaang lat mak ting ngo.”
Banina Bakhou rinne, “Ati dabe mei kanoi chonghiak pi luga mei kapaang lang nge diga Moses na zathang pi thangnu ga pa-aam langbo?”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani sung nat briakpina Moses na nani ding mei kanoi lang za thangnuwe atiyeda thoutan binaba haga ati make.

Eina nani khou rinnuwe, tudannu bameina lungmaannuna makka bamei ding kanoi satluga kamaisa katei ding lounu maan ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe khatle tudannu kanoi satnu kamaisa ding lou latnu maan ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe.”
Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Kapaisa le bamei om gong nga atinu amme dabe mei katha maknuna sa inkuwe.”
Atiyeda Maanna bani khou rinne, “Hei rin ongnuwa mi bing zana lou thangnu ngam make atiyeda heiya pi thang damnu mi nun zana lou thangnu ngamme:

Balangbe bani nu bonpui lana basa semnu toga ponnu le amme, mina sem nu basa semnu nun le amme khatle tambaan krwang talei lang chungna bani raanto zana semnu basa semnu nun le suiye. Lou thang ngamnu maan gana lou thang ding ngo.”
Haba nung bi kasinnu naosen rwan ding Jisu na bani lu chung bi Bakut kaising thangluga kalum thang langna Bakhou kalwang hung ngaake atiyeda potroi rwanna bani ding twei ngaake.
Atiyeda Jisu na rinne, “Kasinnu naosen rwan ga Akhou hung ding ngo, bani ding khaam mako; balangbe tambaan krwang talei ga hei rwan dannu nun lang nge.”
Maanna bani lu chung bi Bakut kaising thangnu nung habei gana se swak trwe.
Phaang ngo, tudannu pakhatna hungluga Bakhou rinne, “Kasanu Bachuthangnupa, ringzoknu kum lousu lang eina pa-aam kasanu chwan to langbo?”

Maanna bakhou rinne, “Nangna pa-aam lang Ating kasanu diga kounubo? Pakhat tak pakhatcha amnu Rikrwang ga makka kasanu pakhatchale maake. Atiyeda nangna ringnu bi ga khut nwamme dabe zathang bing ga zeiyo.”

Maanna Jisu khou rinne, “Hazo tatonu zathangbo?” Jisu na rinne, “ ‘Nang mi athat mak ting gaye,’ ‘Nang lungkoi lungmaan mak ting gaye,’ ‘Nang barusa mak ting gaye,’ ‘Nang kakoinu sake pi mak ting gaye,’
‘Nanu napa ding takung tazeiyo’ khatle ‘Na innai lounai rwan ding nazan bahak ting danga kriang ding gaye.’ ”
Katangpa gana Jisu khou rinne, “Hei bing nga ei naosen badona zei hung rwe. Ei pa-aam baat maangbo?”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna khopsanu to nwamme dabe, sero, naom ka am bing ga zwan satluga lungsianu nun lang piyo ati dabe tambaan la nalaang lan amlune khatle hung ngo, Anung suiyo.”
Atiyeda rin ongnu chong ga katangpa gana ngaisunu kaan bi maan sung riangrega thou drwe, balangbe maan lan tam takka am ngaake.
Habei ga Jisu na Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, lungsanu pakhatna tambaan krwang talei la khut lang kung nge.
Eina nani khou rin late, lungsanu mi khatna Rikrwang om krwang talei khutnu ma ut khatna kaphin kana bi lon brwannuna bai inkuwe.”
Baom potroi rwanna haga ngaisunu kaan bi bani taswang khak lang loh loga rinne, “Ati dabe tuna kanthangnu lousu ngam dingbo?”
Jisu na bani ding phaangluga rinne, “Misa lang heiya hung tanglanuwe atiyeda Rikrwang khou pum brumza hung tang nge.”
Habei ga Peter na Jisu khou rinne, “Phaang thang ngo, anina pum brumza bathan satluga Nanung sui se ongme. Atibriakpina ani pa-aam amlu dingbo?”

Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, hung dingnu bakaan bi Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Baom lwat liannu krwang takung riak pi ongnu kaan bi Anung suinu nani nun le krwang takung riak som ga kani bi ongluga Israel om phum som ga kani ding chong kasemlune.

Atiga Ameng lang chungna in mak tabe unao rwan mak tabe nu mak tabe pa mak tabe mei mak tabe basa rwan mak tabe taram bathan satnu mi bingna, badam raza inkuga lousulune khatle khwa sei ringnu lousulune.
Atiyeda kamanu inzana kakhamnu tolune khatle kakhamnuna kamanu tolune.
“Balangbe tambaan krwang talei ga mi pakhatna baom drakha anqwat pi chwan to lang chwantok mi lan lang louthwan khwan se swaknu loupuba ga dannuwe.
Maanna chwantok mi nun le diga lumik pi denari khat lang zakaleluga bani ding baom drakha anqwat la bathan thang rwe.
Chakrin inthum khak tanu dat pi maanna se swaknu kaan bi katei rwan ga chwan maakka keithian bi han kadoi ongnu muluga
bani khou rinne, ‘Nani le drakha anqwat la sero khatle pi lang swaknu dam ga ei nani lang pine.’ Habei ga bani nun thou drwe.
Maanna chakrin karuk khatle chakrin kaqwa tanu dat pi le se swak latluga meithaan to damnu ga danga to rwe.
Atiga chakrin somga khat khak tanu dat pi maanna se swaknu kaan bi katei rwan le chwan to makka han ongnu muluga bani khou rinne, ‘Nani pa-aam toga heiba riak pi chwan to makka tarin han ongnubo?’
Banina bakhou rinne, ‘Ani ding mi pakhatchanale lan thang mak briakpinaye.’ Maanna bani khou rinne, ‘Nani le drakha anqwat la sero khatle phang lang swaknu dam ga nanina lousulune.’
Khwazinren tanu dat pi anqwat om bapuba na chwan thou phaangsinnu mi khou rinne, ‘Chwantok mi nun ding kouluga lan kham kataknu bina thouga lan kamanu lang tangga bani lo man ga pi thangbiro.’
Atiga khwazin chakrin somga khat khak tanu kaan bi lan thangnu rwan ga hungluga bani mi pakhat khatna denari khat khat phang rwe.
Atiyeda kamanu rwan gana hungnu kaan bi banina phang inkulune diga baning ngaake; atiyeda bani pakhat khatna denari khat khat phang rwe.
Banina haga phangnu kaan bi loupuba maitwang bi tu tu tam tamga
rin rwe, ‘Heiba hung khamnu nun ba chakrin khatcha chwan towe atiyeda nangna bani ding potrit phunnu le nisat pi riangrenu khaangnu ani le pi bacham thang nge.’
Atiyeda maanna bani pakhat khou katake, ‘Baanno, ei nakhou koinu to make. Nang ei le diga denari khat pi zakalenu makpo?
Naom lo man ga louluga sero. Eina heiba kakhamnu manpa lang le nalaang pinu chaang ga le bachamga pi lang baning nge.
Ei aom lan ding eina baningnu to lang zanu makpo? Mak tabe ei sa briakpina namikna antiamnubo?’
Atibriakpina kakhamnuna kamalune khatle kamanuna kham lune, balangbe mi taswang khak ting kouwe atiyeda titcha ding kathang nge.”
Jisu na Jerusalem la se ongnu kaan bi potroi pat somga kani ding tei kou swakluga bani khou rinne,
“Phaang ngo, ani Jerusalem la se ongme, atiga Misa Sa Kapaisa ding takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khou pi swaklune; banina Bating koi impu thangluga athat satlune.
Bating Gentile rwan khou choi banui lang, bwei lang khatle cross pi athat lang pi swaklu rwe. Atiga Maan ni thum ni ring thou latlune.”
Haba nung bi Zebedee sa rwan nuna basa kapaisa kani le diga Bakim bi hungluga kuntaluga Bakhouna pa-aambo khat ni ngaake.

Jisu na bakhou ngaiye, “Nang pa-aam bathaigabo?” Maanna Jisu khou rinne, “Nakrwang talei la asa kapaisa pat ni ding nga pakhat ting Nakut inchang pek la khatle pakhat ting imbei pek la ong lang za thang ngo.”

Atiyeda Jisu na katake, “Nanina ni ongnu ga paaambo dinu nani thei make. Eina in dingnu ngai ga nanina innu ngambo khatle Ating baptize to ongnu danga nani ding baptize pi tonu ngam dingbo?” Banina Bakhou katake, “Ani ngam khope.”

Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nanina Aom ngai ga batakka inlune khatle Ating baptize to thangnu bi ga nani dingle baptize to thanglune; atiyeda Akut inchang pek la khatle imbei pek la ong dingnu ga Eina pi dingnu make atiyeda haga Apa na pi lang daan thang ongnu bani lang nge.”
Potroi pat som gana haga ngaisunu kaan bi unao pat ni ding pem mak tak rwe.

Atiyeda Jisu na bani ding Bakhou kou hungluga rinne, “Gentile om bapuba rwanna bani lu chung bi nam danga bapuba to rwe khatle kaliannu nunna bani lu chung bi ngam chwan ga nam ga towe dinu nanina theiye.
Nani lak pi ba ati mak ting gaye; atiyeda nani lak pi tudannu kaliannu to nwamnu maan ga nani swak to ding ngo
khatle nani lak pi tudannu kamanu to nwamnu maan ga nani swak to ding ngo.

Hadanga Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Bating chwanlaang pi to thang langna hungnu make atiyeda chwanlaang to langna khatle mi taswang khak ting ran swak thang lang Bakum ding bathan swak thangnu man toga pi swak thang langna hungnuwe.”
Banina Jericho bina se swaknu kaan bi mi khang puina Banung sui se ngaake.
Atiga phaang ngo, mik chonu pat ni lampui kom bi badung ong ngaake, barweina Jisu hung naye dinu ngaisunu kaan bi paoga rinne, “He Pukraangba, David Sa Kapaisa! Arwei ding phaangkriang thang ngo.”
Habei ga mi khangna barwei ding thiap thiap ong ngo diga twei rwe; atiyeda barweina pao rakan ranga rinne, “He Pukraangba, David Sa Kapaisa! Arwei ding phaangkriang thang ngo.”
Atiga Jisu na han ngaakluga barwei ding kouluga ngaiye, “Eina narwei lang paaam to thangnu bathaigabo?”
Barweina Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, arwei mik pi mu thang ngo.”
Habei ga Jisu na kriangga barwei mik pi banaan thang rwe. Atiga haba kahan bi ga barwei mik mu lat rwe khatle barweina Banung sui se rwe.
Banina Jerusalem nai hungnu kaan bi Olive Rammwan bi amnu Bethphage bi hung rwe, habei ga Jisu na potroi pat ni ding lang thangluga
barwei khou rinne, “Narwei meithaan la amnu nam la ga sero khatle lola khat bang thangluga baswan le ongnu ding hung kadou khap ti lune. Haba lola kani ding sutluga Akhou lou hung ngo.
Tudannuna narwei khou pa-aam aam ngaiye dabe narweina rinno, ‘Pukraangba na heiba lola kani ding bathaang amme,’ atiga haba kahan bi maanna barwei ding bathan hung dam zung nge.”
Hei bing nga thiamtingna rin thang damnu bing ga hung tang lang nge:
“Zion sa kamaisa khou nanina rinno, ‘Phaang ngo, naom Krwang ga nakhou hung rwe, Maan sung bazaang nge, lola chung bi twang nge, Lola swan, lola chan swan chung bi twang nge.’ ”
Atiga potroi patni gana seluga Jisu na bani khou zathang pi thangnu ga danga to rwe.
Barweina lola le baswan ga lou hungluga barwei chung bi bani pwan sap thang rwe khatle Jisu na haba chung bi twang rwe.
Atiga mi khang puina lampui bi bani pwan phaa thang rwe; katei rwanna thingkung bina thing bom ramluga lampui bi phaa thang rwe.
Bameithaan la khatle nung la suisenu mi khang gana paoga rinne, “David Sa Kapaisa khou Hosanna! ‘Pukraangba meng bi hungnu Maan ga aih saye!’ Basaang kataknu bi Hosanna!”
Maanna Jerusalem bi khutnu kaan bi nampui bingna loh loga ngaiye, “Heiya Tubo?”
Habei ga mi khangna rinne, “Heiya Galilee om Nazareth lana hungnu thiamting Jisu ga rwe.”

Jisu na Rikrwang om kalum in bi khutluga kalum in bi kaleinu le zwan ongnu mi bing ding kazun sat rwe khatle sian kachoi kainu nun om table khatle banphi zwannu nun om kaong riak bing tun kalat sat rwe.
Atiga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Heiya hiak thangluga amme, ‘Ain ding kalum in diga koulune,’ atiyeda haga nanina ‘Baruksaak mi nun kabu’ pi to rwe.”
Habei ga mik chonu manpa le ket lwamnu manpa kalum in bi Bakhou hung ngaake khatle Maanna barwei ding pi sa thang rwe.
Atiyeda takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Maanna to damnu tasiatnu chwan bing khatle kalum in bi naosen rwanna, “David Sa Kapaisa khou Hosanna!” diga paonu ga muluga bani balung pwanga

Bakhou rinne, “Naosen rwanna rin ongnuwa Nang ngaisubo?” Jisu na bani khou rinne, “O. ‘Kasinnu khatle chup ongnu naosen rwan mun bina swan lang Nangna daan thang rwe’ dinu nani imphani beida pa mak aangbo?”
Atiga Jisu na bani ding thangsialuga nampui bi gana Bethany la thou drwe khatle Maan habei ga nei rwe.
Louthwan Maanna nampui la han hungnu kaan bi Maan chaam ngaak rwe.

Atiga lampui kim bi tacham kung ga muluga Maan habei ga hung rwe atiyeda habei ga banaa makka katei khatchale dou mak ngaake, habei ga tacham kung ding rinne, “Nakhou bakraa khatchale kraa lat mak tam dingro.” Haba kahan bi gana tacham kung ga baowei ta drwe.
Potroi rwanna haga munu kaan bi banina loh loga rinne, “Tatoga tacham kung nga heitia barapka baowei ta ongnubo?”

Jisu na bani khou katake, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nani khou balumsanu am ngaake dabe khatle balumsia make dabe tacham kung bi to damnu gaza make atiyeda nanina heiba rammwan ding nga, ‘Abeina swakluga tuipui la ga naraanto bazwan thang dammo’ diga rinne dabe haga ati dam zung nge.
Nanina balumsaye dabe paaam ngaakle hweini bi nanina ninu bing ga lousulune.”

Jisu na kalum in bi khutluga bachu thang ongnu kaan bi takopuba rwan le mi nun om patso rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Nangna pa-aam ngamna hei bing nga to ongnubo? Khatle heiba ngam ma Nakhou tuna pi thangnubo?”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Eina le nani khou chong khat ngaide, haga nanina Akhou katake dabe, Eina le paaam om ngamna hei bing nga tonubo dinu Eina nani khou rin thangne:

John na baptize to thangnu ga inlammangnabo? Haga tambaan lanamo mak tabe mi nun khounabo?” Bani cham kathuiluga rinne, “Anina, ‘Tambaan la naye’ diga rinne dabe Maanna ani khou rinlune, ‘Ati dabe nanina pa-aam toga bating balumsa maknubo?’
“Atiyeda ‘Mi nun khou naye’ diga anina rinne dabe ani mi khang ding kachiye, balangbe mi bingna John ding thiamting khate diga chak thang nge.”
Atibriakpina banina Jisu khou rin rwe, “Ani thei make.” Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina pa-aam ngamna hei bing nga tonubo dinu Ei le nani khou rinlaye.
“Atiyeda nani pa-aam baningbo? Manpa khat om sa kapaisa pat ni am ngaake khatle maanna patsonu kim bi hungluga rinne, ‘Sa kapaisa, aniya aom drakha anqwat la chwan to seyo.’
Maanna katake, ‘Ei selaye,’ atiyeda bataang la maanna baning ngam makka se drwe.
Haba nung bi maanna kaninu sa kapaisa kim bi hungluga hadanga rin rwe. Atiga maanna katake, ‘O, bapuba ei sene,’ atiyeda maan se lan rwe.

Pat ni lak pi ga ingaana bapa om baningnu tobo?” Banina Bakhou rinne, “Patsonu gaye” Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, ramkhai khomnu rwan le taloi rwanna Rikrwang om krwang talei la nani meithaan se kamalune.

Balangbe John na nani khou ririak senu lampui rin thang lang hung rwe khatle nanina bating balumsa make; atiyeda ramkhai khomnu rwan le taloi rwanna bating balumsa ngaake khatle nanina haga munu kaan bi bataang la nani sung lega bating balumsa make.

“Chongchak katei khatle ngaiyo: Drakha kung lingnu taram puba khat am ngaake. Maanna anqwat qwatluga drakha ling thang rwe khatle raang qwat thangluga haba riak pi batui sumnu riak chou rwe khatle thaamkang le ra thang rwe. Atiga maanna anqwat ka loumi nun khou saan thangsialuga namlaanu taram la thou dam ngaake.
Drakha tui sumnu dat nai hungnu kaan bi maanna baswak rwan ding bakraa lou lang loumi nun khou lang hung rwe.
Loumi nun gana baswak rwan ding namluga pakhat ting bwei rwe, pakhat ting athat sat rwe khatle pakhat tingna lungna sat rwe.
Maanna kamanu ga ma tamga baswak rwan ding lang thang lat rwe khatle banina hadanga bani ding to rwe.
Kham katak pi maanna ‘Asa kapaisa ding ngabe banina takhwang tolu zung nge’ diga baningga basa Kapaisa ding bani khou lang hung rwe.
Atiyeda loumi nun gana basa kapaisa ding munu kaan bi banina bani cham lak pi atiga rin rwe, ‘Heiya barakhum lwak tingnu mi rwe. Hungro, ani bating athatluga barakhum lwakrizo.’
Atiga banina bating namluga anqwat paan la bazwan swak rwe khatle bating athat sat rwe.
Atibriakpina drakha anqwat om bapubana hungnu kaan bi loumi nun khouga maanna pa-aam tolu dingbo?”
Banina Bakhou rinne, “Sa maknu mi nun ding ga maanna railuga to braan satlune khatle baom anqwat ka bakaan chaga bakraa pi dingnu loumi nun katei khou saan thanglune.”

Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani Bathiangnu chongdip heiya khatchale pa makchungbo, ‘Intok mi nunna bazwan sat thangnu lung gana intaki om bakung tonu lung imbei rwe. Heiya Pukraangba na to thangnuwe, Khatle haga ani mikphaang bi tasiatnuwe.’
“Atibriakpina Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nani khouna lou sat tamlune khatle haom bakraa kraa dingnu chaat khou pi damlune.
Atiga tudannu heiba lung chung bi bazwantanu ga baklune; atiyeda tudannu heiba lungna balu chung bi ta thangnu maan ga, tambut imbeilune.”
Takopuba rwan le Pharisee rwanna Baom chongchak ka ngaisunu kaan bi Maanna bani lang bi rin ongnuwe dinu thei rwe.
Atiyeda banina Bating nam lang zongnu kaan bi bani mi khang ding kachi ngaake, balangbe banina Bating thiamting khate diga lou ngaake.
Jisu na bani khou chongchak toga rin late:
“Tambaan krwang talei ga basa kapaisa lang tazwan bahwan lang daannu krwang khat ka dannuwe.
Maanna tazwan bahwan riak pi talot thang damnu mi nun ding kou lang baswak rwan ding lang thang rwe; atiyeda bani hung nwam mak ngaake.

Maanna swak katei rwan ding lang thang latluga rinne, ‘Talot mi nun khou rinno, “Phaang ngo, Eina aom thaisaak laang thang rwe; aom sen chan nun khatle bami pi sa thangnu khouring athatluga pum brumza laang thang rwe. Tazwan bahwan om balou bi hungro.”’
Atiyeda bani thou to makka thou dam ngaake, pakhatna balou la khatle katei khatna baom langgon lampui la se thou dam ngaake.
Katei rwan gana baswak rwan ding ga namluga siaga to rwe khatle bani ding athat sat rwe.
Krwangna haga ngaisunu kaan bi maan balung pwan tak rwe. Atiga maanna baom kraanmi nun ding bathan thangluga mi athatnu nun ding ga to braan sat rwe khatle bani namlian le mei thaang sat rwe.
Haba nung bi maanna baswak rwan khou rinne, ‘Tazwan bahwan om balou lang daan thang loi rwe atiyeda talot thangnu rwan ga khopsa lan rwe.
Atibriakpina lampui pui bing la ga seluga nanina kadounu bing ding tazwan bahwan om balou riak pi kou hungro.’
Habei ga swak rwan gana lampui pui bing la seluga banina kadounu kasanu khatle kasianu bing ding khom hung rwe. Atiga tazwan bahwan riak ka talot mina ongsip rwe.
“Atiyeda krwangna hungluga talot nun ding phaangnu kaan bi tazwan bahwan pon thang maknu manpa khat ting maanna mu rwe.
Maanna bakhou rinne, ‘Abaanpa, nang abeiya tazwan bahwan pon thang makka tatoga khutnubo?’ Atiga maan chong kabia swaklan rwe.

Haba nung bi krwangna swak rwan khou rinne, ‘Bating bakut baket krako khatle bating kai swakluga langkaang om kazingnu riak la bazwan sat tammo; habei ga chapnu khatle ngaatang ei karit ritka onglune.’
Balangbe mi taswang khak ting kouwe atiyeda titcha ding ka thang nge.”
Haba nung bi Pharisee rwanna seluga Bating Bachong kabiak pi tatoga namza dingbo diga chong katu ong ngaake.

Atiga banina bani om potroi rwan le Herod om mi nun ding Bakhou lang hungluga rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Nang bazenuwe, Rikrwang om lampui ding bazega bachu thang nge khatle Nang pakhatcha ding hakna kachi make, balangbe Nang pakhatcha mai le phaang make dinu anina theiye.
Atibriakpina ani khou rin thang ngo, Nang pa-aam baningbo? Caesar lang ramkhai pinu zamo za makpo?”
Atiyeda Jisu na bani sung sa maknu ga theiluga rinne, “Sathot tonu nun, nanina pa-aam lang Ating tam ongnubo?
Ramkhai om sian ga Akhou pimuwo.” Banina denari khat Bakhou lou hung rwe.
Maanna bani khou ngaiye, “Heiya tu maangbo khatle pa-aam hiak thangbo?”
Banina Bakhou rinne, “Caesar omme.” Atiga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atibriakpina Caesar om pot ka Caesar khou piyo khatle Rikrwang om pot ka Rikrwang khou piyo.”
Heiba chong bing nga banina ngaisunu kaan bi bani loh lo rwe khatle banina Bating thang sialuga thou drwe.
Ring thou latnu maake diga rinnu Sadducee rwan Bakhou ha ni ga hungluga
ngaiye, “Bachuthangnupa, mi khatna basa pon makka thi damme dabe, banaona batang mei ding ga louluga batang lang chungna sa nao cha lang nge diga Moses na rin thang nge.
Ani lak pi unao pat siari am ngaake. Patsonu ga maan mei kounu nung thi drwe khatle sa nao pon mak briakpina bamei ga banao khou thangsia rwe.
Hadanga kaninu ga le, inthumnu ga le khatle siarinu ga tangga ati ngaak rwe.
Kham katak pi kamaisa ga le thi drwe.
Atibriakpina ring thou latnu kaan bi kamaisa ga pat siari lak pi tu mei tolu dingbo? Balangbe bani khangsungna bating lou ngaake.”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Nani Bathiangnu Chongdip khatle Rikrwang ngam ding thei mak priakpina koi rwe.
Balangbe ring thou latnu kaan bi bani tazwan bahwan laye khatle tazwan bahwan lang le pi swak laye atiyeda tambaan bi Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang rwan danlune.
Atiyeda thi bina ring thou latnu lang bi Rikrwang na nani khou rin thang ngaaknu ga nani pa makchungbo?
‘Ei Abraham Rikrwang, Isaac Rikrwang khatle Jacob Rikrwang nge.’ Rikrwang nga thinu nun om Rikrwang make atiyeda ringnu nun om Rikrwang nge.”
Mi khang gana heiya ngaisunu kaan bi Maanna bachu thangnu bi ga bani loh lo rwe.
Maanna Sadducee rwan ding chong pi katak ngamlan rwe dinu Pharisee rwanna ngaisunu kaan bi bani hung kadoi rwe.
Habei ga bani lak pi chongtan theinu pakhatna Bating tamga ngaiye,
“Bachuthangnupa, chongtan lak pi tatonu zathangna lian kataknubo?”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “ ‘Nangna Pukraangba Narikrwang ding nasung bing, nakatha bing khatle nalungning bingna kriang ding gaye.’
Heiya kama kataknu khatle lian kataknu zathang nge.
Kaninu gana hei dannuwe, ‘Nangna nainnai lounai ding nazan bahak ting danga kriang ding gaye.’
Heiba zathang kani biya Chongtan bing khatle Thiamting rwan om chong bing amnu rwe.”
Pharisee rwanna hung kadoi ongnu kaan bi Jisu na bani khou
ngaiye, “Christa om lang bi nani tato baningbo? Maan tu Sa Kapaisabo?” Banina Bakhou katake, “David Sa Kapaisa ye.”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ati dabe David na tatoga Katha bi Bating ‘Pukraangba’ diga kounubo? Maanna rinne:
‘Pukraangba na Apukraangba khou rinne, “Eina Nating munanu nun ding Naket kadim riak pi to mak basaan, Akut inchang pek la badung ong ngo.” ’
“David na Bating ‘Pukraangba’ diga kouwe dabe, Maan tatoga basa Kapaisa to dingbo?”
Habei ga pakhatcha hakna Bakhou chongkaang khatcha hakna kataknu ngam mak ngaake khatle ha ni gana thouga Bakhou pakhatchanale raangga tangai ngainu ngamlan rwe.
Jisu na mi khang khatle potroi rwan khou
rinne, “Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwanna Moses om kaong riak pi ong nge.
Atibriakpina banina nani khou towo diga rinnu bing ga nani zeiluga towo atiyeda bani om chwan nung suiga nani to mako; balangbe banina rinnu ga banina to make.
Banina phun thoulanu karitnu potrit bachaluga haga mi nun daankong bi bason thang nge; atiyeda bani bazan bahaknaba haga bani kutzung khatchana hakna banaan thang make.
Atiyeda banina tonu chwan bing ga mi nunna mu dam lang towe. Bani om Phylactery rwan ga balaak pi lianne khatle bani om pwan hum ga pi baswanne.
Banina balou riak bing bi sa kataknu riak khatle synagogue bing bi sa kataknu kaong riak pi ong nwamme.
Keithian riak bing bi kadou chong kabianu khatle mi nunna bani ding, ‘Rabbi, Rabbi’ diga kou thangnu bathaiye.
Atiyeda nani dingba, ‘Rabbi’ diga pi kou mako, balangbe nani lang Bachuthangnupa, Christa Khatcha amme khatle nani mi bingza unao rwanne.
Talei ram bi pakhatcha ding hakna ‘Apa’ diga kou mako; balangbe nani Pa tambaan la amnu Khatcha ga zung nge.
Nani ding ‘Bachuthangnupa,’ diga pi kou mako; balangbe nani om Bachuthangnupa, Christa Khatcha zung nge.
Nani lak pi lian kataknu maan ga nani swak tolune.
Tudannu baraanto bating pi basaangnu bating ga pi bangiam talune khatle bating pi bangiam tanu batingna pi basaang ka thanglune.

“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina mi nun maitwang bi tambaan krwang talei ga khaan nam rwe; balangbe nani bahak le khut make khatle khut tingnu mi nun ding le pi khut make.

Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina tameinu rwan in kapumsaye khatle to thiamga kalum bakhwa seiye. Atibriakpina nani lu chung bi inkuga laak thangnu ga doulune.

“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina mi khat ting Jihudi rwan pi gon langna tuipui khatle taram la seye atiga ririak ka le hungnu kaan bi nanina bating nani khouna badam kani inkuga nani danga meikhun sa kapaisa pi to rwe.

“Mik chonu lampui kai thangnu, nani ga aih sia yeda! Nanina rinne, ‘Tudannu kalum in ding kaisingga karennu ga khatchale make; atiyeda tudannu kalum in bi amnu kachaak ting kaisingga karennuwe dabe haga soi makka to ding gaye.’
Kapangnu khatle mik chonu nun! Kachaak mak tabe kachaak ting to bathiang thangnu kalum in ga ingaana bakung tonubo?
Nanina rinne, ‘Rikhaang riak ting kaisingga karennu ga khatchale make; atiyeda tudannu rikhaang riak lu chung bi amnu pot ting kaisingga karenne dabe haga soi makka to ding gaye.’
Kapangnu khatle mik chonu nun! Kat thangnu pot le kat thangnu pot ting to bathiangnu rikhaang riak ka ingaana bakung tonubo?
Atibriakpina rikhaang riak ting kaisingga karennu maan ga ha ding khatle haba chung bi amnu bing ding kaisingga karennuwe.
Kalum in ding kaisingga karennu maan ga ha ding khatle habei amnu Bating kaisingga karennuwe.
Tambaan ding kaisingga karennu maan ga Rikrwang om takung riak khatle habei ga ong ongnu Bating kaisingga karennuwe.

“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina nungsit lou, padikhom khatle zira om som om badam khat katluga chongtan om barit rwan ding: bazenu ding, phaangkriang le balumsa zanu ding intaamme. Katei bing ding thou to maknu to makka, hei bing nga nanina to ngaak tingnu we.
Mik chonu lampui kainu nun ga, kakhut ting sing sat tingnu pot pi sing satluga ut ting kadwanne.

“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina ngai le butheng ga bapaanza thaam bathiang nge atiyeda basung laba bani ga kasut sanu khatle bapum ding raak thei maknuna sipe.
Mik chonu Pharisee, langkaang ga le bathiang lang ngai le butheng ga basung thaam bathiang kamawo.

“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nani langkaang la phaangsaga munu atiyeda basung la mang thinu mi nun om ru khatle bathiang maknuna sipnu sunu tei thangnu thaan dannuwe.
Hadanga nani le langkaang la mi nun meithaan bi bazenu thot toga pi muwe atiyeda basung laba sathot tonu khatle chongtan thouto maknuna sipe.
“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu, nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina thiamting rwan om thaan bachaye khatle ririak senu mi nun om thaan ding tapon to thangluga
rinne, ‘Ani nun ani pu pa rwan kaan bi lung ngaake dabe thiamting rwan om thi pi tanu bi ga ani bani le badam suilou mak ngaak tingnuwe.’
Atibriakpina nani nun nani bahak maitwang bi thiamting rwan ding athat tamnu mi nun om sa kapaisa rwanne dinu sake rwe.
Atiga nani pu pa rwanna to ngaaknu kasianu chaang ga pi tang ngo.
Brun nun, dintu kik taat rwan! Nani meikhun om chongtan bina tatoga pak dwak langbo?

Atibriakpina batak takka Eina nani khou thiamting rwan, ningtingnu rwan khatle chongtan bachuthangnu rwan ding lang hung nge atiyeda nanina kasem ding athatluga cross pi bakhai lune, katei rwan dingna nani om synagogue bing bi bweilune khatle nampui khat pina nampui khat pi railune,

haga ririak senu Abel thi bina thouga nanina kalum in le rikhaang riak lak pi athat ngaaknu Berechiah sa kapaisa Zechariah om thi tangnu bi talei ram bi ta thang damnu ririak senu mi bing thi ga nani lu chung bi ta thanglune.
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, hei bing nga atun mikin lu chung bi hunglune.

“He Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Thiamting rwan ding athatnu khatle bakhou lang hungnu nun ding lungna khumnu nang! Aan puina baswan rwan ding babatha thwei bi ka aw thangnu ga danga Eina nani sa rwan ding katupka ka aw thang nwam ngaake atiyeda haga nanina bathai make!
Phaang ngo, nani in bing nga lung taakluga nani khou thangsia rwe.
Balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, ‘Pukraangba meng bi hungnu Maan ga aih sanuwe!’ diga nanina rin mak basaan nani Ating mula rwe.”
Jisu na swakluga kalum in bina thou dam ngaak rwe khatle Baom potroi rwanna hungluga Bakhou kalum in om in bing ga pi mu thang ngaake.
Habei ga Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani hei bing nga mu makpo? Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, abeiya to bakla dingnu lung khat chung bi lung khatchale am thang siala rwe.”

Maanna Olive Rammwan bi ong ongnu kaan bi potroi rwanna Bakhou inthim toga hungluga rinne, “Hei bing nga impei dat pi swak tingnubo, Nangna hung dingnu khatle talei ram loi dingnu om badan ga pa-aam lu dingbo ani khou rin thang ngo.”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Pakhatchanale nani ding minam mak lang cheksinno.
Balangbe Ameng bi mi tamga hungluga rinlune, ‘Ei Christa rwe’ khatle banina mi inza ding minamlune.
Nanina kraan khatle kraan cham ngaisulune. Hagana nani ding sung pi katop mak lang barak theiyo; balangbe hei bing nga hung dingnu zung rwe atiyeda kakhamnu ga mak aang nge.
Balangbe chaat khatna chaat khat luchung bi krwang talei khatna krwang talei khat maitwang bi katwak thoulu rwe. Atiga bariak inza bi bu taangnu, ripian khatle talei kalingnu hei bing nga swaklu rwe.
Hei bing nga nao lung lang nainu kaan bi riangrenu om hou thounu rwe.
Banina nani ding rai lang khatle athat lang pi swaklune, Ameng lang chungna chaat bingna nani ding batanlune.
Haba kaan bi mi inzana ket basui lune, khatna khat ting pi swak kalega khat le khat batan kalelune.
Kakoinu thiamting inza hungluga mi inza ding baze maknu lampui bi kai thanglune.
Chongtan thouto maknu inku thou ding briakpina mi nun om kriangnu daitalune.
Atiyeda kakhamnu tangga khaangnu bating ga kan thanglune.
Krwang talei om sacham ga talei ram bariak thin chaat bing khou sake to lang kasamlune khatle haba nung bi kakhamnu ga hunglu rwe.
“Atibriakpina thiamting Daniel na rin thang damnu, ‘To braan to mutnu om batannu tonu,’ bathiangnu riak pi hannu nanina phaangmunu kaan bi (tudannu panu maanna bakaba thei ding ngo),
Judea bi ongnu nunna rammwan la pak thou dam ding ngo.
In chung bi ongnu maan gana pot lou lang bain bi ta mak ting ngo.
Lou la ongnu maan gana bapwan lou lang han hung mak ting ngo.
Atiyeda haba kaan bi pum rit ongnu khatle naosen kainu kamaisa rwan ga aih sia yeda!
Atiyeda nani kraan pak ka sikpha mak tabe Sabbath lumik pi mak lang kalummo.
“Balangbe talei ram am thou tan bina atun tangnu sung bi hung mak aangnu, hung le hung latla dingnu tasiatnu riangre kanang hunglu rwe.
Haba kaan ga pi toi thang mak ngaake dabe pakhatchale ring ngamlaye; atiyeda kathang swaknu nun lang chungna haba kaan ga pi toi thanglune.
Tudannuna nani khou, ‘Phaang ngo abeiya Christa amme!’ mak tabe ‘Habei ga amme’ diga rinne dabe haga balumsa mako.
Balangbe kakoinu christa le kakoinu thiamting rwan hunglu rwe, zaye dabe kathang swaknu mi nun ding hakna minam lang tasiatnu badan le tasiatnu chwan tolu rwe.
Phaang ngo, Eina nani khou rin chaak thangnuwe.
Atibriakpina banina nani khou, ‘Phaang ngo, Maan ramhaang la amme!’ diga rinne dabe nani swak mako; mak tabe, ‘Phaang ngo, Maan in kaa la amme!’ diga rinne dabe nani haga balumsa mako.
Balangbe khwa bathaaknuna lumik swak lana lumik taak la tangga bathaak hung nu ga danga Misa Sa Kapaisana hungnu ga le hadanlune.
Balangbe kathi pum amnu riak pi ga langkiya rwan le hung kadoilune.
“Haba riangre kanang om lumik bing nung bi lumik na zing damlune, tha na babaan pi bila rwe; saangbaan lana insi bing le bazwantalune khatle saangbaan la ngam bing le kanuklune.
Haba nung bi Misa Sa Kapaisa om badan ga tambaan la pi mulune, talei ram bi chaat bingna nu hweilune, atiga Misa Sa Kapaisana tambaan om tambu bi ngam khatle lwat lian ga tanu banina phaangmulune.

Maanna Baom tambaan chonglang rwan ding trumpet baraam rakannu le bachamga bathou thanglune, atiga banina talei taki bali lana khatle tambaan kalan khat lana kalan khat la tangga amnu Baom kathang swaknu nun ding khom kadoilune.
“Nani tacham kung bina heiba chongchak heiya bachuwo: Bakachangna bazik kasat swaknu khatle banaa phun swaknu kaan bi khwalumpha nai rwe dinu nanina theiye.
Hadanga nani le hei bing nga nanina phaangmunu kaan bi, Maan nai rwe inkhaan bi hung tang rwe dinu theiyo!
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, hei bing nga swak mak basaan heiba mi chaat heiya khatchale braanlaye.
Tambaan le talei ya braanlune atiyeda Achongkaang bing nga khatchale braanlaye.
“Pakhatchanale haba lumik khatle chakrin ga thei make, tambaan chonglang rwan tangga thei make atiyeda Apa zana theiye.
Atiyeda Noah kaan bi danga Misa Sa Kapaisana hungnu ga le hadanlune.
Balangbe tui lian hungnu meithaan lumik inzalana, Noah na lipui bi khutnu lumik tangga banina saluga inluga, tazwan bahwan ga khatle tazwan bahwan lang pi swak kalega ong ngaake.
Tui lian hungluga bani ding phun thou dam mak basaan banina thei maknu ga danga Misa Sa Kapaisana hungnu ga le hadanlune.
Haba kaan bi manpa pat ni lou bi onglune: pakhat ting lou thou damlune, khat ting thangsialune.
Kamaisa pat ni saang tak onglune: pakhat ting lou thou damlune, khat ting thangsialune.
“Atibriakpina barak theiyo, balangbe nani Pukraangba ga impei chakrin bi hunglu dingbo dinu nani thei make.
Atiyeda heiya theiyo, inpu gana impei chakrin bi in baruk mi hung dingbo dinu thei ngaake dabe maan barakka ong ngaak tingnuwe khatle bain ga pi torai mak ngaak tingnuwe.
Atibriakpina nani le daanga ong ngo, balangbe nanina baning maknu chakrin bi Misa Sa Kapaisa ga hunglune.
“Ati dabe bainpuba na bain inkhun lu chung bi kasa kasia phaangsinnu mi pi to dingnu bakaan badat chaga bani lang thaisaak pi thang dingnu balumsa lang khopnu khatle ningtingnu swak ka tubo?
Bainpubana hungnu kaan bi atiga to ongnu dounu swak ka aih sanuwe.
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, maanna bating baom lan bing om phaangsinnu mi pi to thanglune.
Atiyeda haba sa maknu swak kana basung bi, ‘Ainpuba bakhwa seiga hunglaye’ diga baning nge dabe
khatle swak to bachamnu rwan ding bwei thouwe dabe, zu innu rwan le diga zu in kaloga ong nge dabe,
maanna baning maknu lumik, thei maknu chakrin bi, haba swak om bapuba ga hunglune.
Bapuba gana bating batut kani toga tanchat lune khatle bating sathot tonu nun le diga bariak khatcha bi thang bachamlune. Habei ga chapka khatle ngaatang ei karit ritka onglune.
“Tambaan krwang talei ga bani thaomei choiluga tazwanpa ding kadou lang se swaknu reizuni pat som ga dannuwe.
Bani pat impaang ga ningtingnu nunne khatle pat impaangna kapangnu nunne.
Kapangnu nun ga bani thaomei choiluga banina thao tui ba phun mak ngaake,
atiyeda ningtingnu nun ba bani om thaomei le thaobun bi thao tui le phun ngaake.
Tazwanpa ga hungrei briakpina bani in nwamruga inthi thou dam ngaak rwe.
Atiyeda inmik kasia bi khwan khat paonu ngaisu ngaake, ‘Phaang ngo, tazwanpa hungna rwe, bating kadou lang se swakro!’
Habei ga reizuni bing ga lon thouluga bani thaomei taan thou rwe.
Kapangnu nun gana ningtingnu nun khou rinne, ‘Nani om thao tui ga ani lang kasem pi thang ngo, balangbe ani thaomei mit tam ding rwe.’
Atiyeda ningtingnu nun gana katake, ‘Pi laye, balangbe ani lang le nani lang le khop maknu zaye; atibriakpina nanina zwannu nun khou seluga nani lang kaleiro.’
Atiga banina kalei lang se damnu kaan bi tazwanpa ga hung rwe khatle daanga ongnu rwan ga tazwan bahwan riak la maan le diga khutluga inkhaan khaan drwe.
Haba nung bi reizuni katei nun gana hungluga rinne, ‘Pukraangba, Pukraangba, ani lang inkhaan lat thang ngo!’
Atiyeda maanna katake, ‘Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Ei nani ding thei make.’
Atibriakpina barak theiyo, balangbe Misa sa Kapaisana hung dingnu lumik khatle chakrin ga nanina thei make.
“Tambaan krwang talei ga baswak rwan ding kou hungluga baom lan bing bani khou sin thangsialuga namlaanu talei khat la bazin thou damnu manpa khat ka dannuwe.
Maanna pakhat khou talent impaang, pakhat khou kani, katei pakhat khou khat ti ga maan maanna ngamnu nung suiga pi thang ngaake khatle haba kahan bi maan bazin thou drwe.
Talent impaang lousunu maan gana seluga haga langgonluga talent katei impaang phang rwe.
Hadanga talent kani lousunu maanna le katei kani phang rwe.
Atiyeda talent khat lousunu maan gana seluga khun chouluga bapuba sian ga inkam thang rwe.
Bakaan kasei khak nung bi haba swak rwan om bapuba ga hungluga bani le diga sian paak pa bacham rwe.
“Atiga talent impaang lousunu maan gana talent katei impaang lou hungluga rinne, ‘Pukraangba, nangna alaang talent impaang pi thang nge; phaang ngo, habei gana inkuga eina talent impaang tong rwe.’

Bapuba na bakhou rinne, ‘To chui rwe, kasanu khatle balumsa zanu swak; nang pot titcha chung bi balumsaza briakpina, eina nating pot taswang khak chung bi phaangsinnu mi pi to thangne. Napukraangba om karonu bi khutro.’
Talent kani lousunu maanna le hungluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, nangna akhou talent kani pi thang nge; phaang ngo, habei gana inkuga eina talent kani tong rwe.’

Bapuba na bakhou rinne, ‘To chui rwe, kasanu khatle balumsa zanu swak; nang pot titcha chung bi balumsaza briakpina, Eina nating pot taswang khak chung bi phaangsinnu mi pi to thangne. Napukraangba om karonu bi khutro.’
“Talent khat lousunu maan gana le hungluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, nang karin sianu manpaye, nangna bwan thang maknu riak pi lwaknu khatle bamu bwan thang maknu riak pi khom thounu miye dinu eina theiye.
Atiga ei kachi ngaake khatle eina seluga naom talent ga talei thwei bi inkam thangnu rwe. Phaang ngo, naom ga abei am rwe.’
“Habei ga bapuba gana bakhou rinne, ‘Sa maknu khatle takaatnu swak, eina bwan thang maknu riak pi lwake khatle bamu bwan thang maknu riak pi khom thouwe dinu nang theiye.
‘Atibriakpina nangna aom sian ga sian rik in bi thang ngaak tingnuwe khatle ei hung latnu kaan bi aom ga bathoi le bachamga lousu dingnuwe.
‘Atibriakpina talent ga bakhouna louluga talent som amnu bakhou haga piyo.
“Balangbe ka amnu mi bing khou inkuga pi thanglune khatle maan sipsaga amlune; atiyeda ka maaknu bakhouna bakhou amnu ga tangga lou swak tamlune.
Bathaang maaknu swak ting ga langkaang kazingnu riak la bazwan sat tammo. Habei ga chapka khatle ngaatang ei karit ritka onglune.’
“Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Baom ngam liannu bi khatle Maan le bathiangnu tambaan chonglang rwan le diga hungnu kaan bi Maan Baom lwat liannu takung riak pi onglune.
Chaat bing ding Bameithaan bi khom hunglune khatle zao siannuna baom zao nun ding ken nun lak pina khok lang swaknu danga, Maanna bani ding khok lang swaklune.
Maanna zao nun dingna Bakut inchang pek la atiyeda ken nun dingna imbei pek la thanglune.
Habei ga Krwangna Bakut inchang pek la ongnu nun khou rinlune, ‘Hungro, Apa om rithoi phangnu nani ga, talei dam bina thouga nani lang daan thangnu krwang talei rakhum ga hung lwakro:
balangbe Ei chaamnu kaan bi nanina Alaang thaisaak pi thang nge; Ei taraannu kaan bi nanina Ating pi in thang nge; Ei man mi to ong ngaak pi nanina Ating loukhut thang nge;
Ei pum tangang ongnu kaan bi nanina Alaang pwan sin thang nge; Ei naanu kaan bi nanina Akhou taleng thang nge; Ei qwan in bi ongnu kaan bi nanina Akhou hung thang nge.’
“Habei ga ririak senu nun gana Bakhou kataklune, ‘Pukraangba, anina Nang chaamnu munu kaan bi impha Nating pi sa thanggabo mak tabe taraannu kaan bi Nating impha pi in thanggabo?
‘Nang man mi to ong ngaak pi anina Nating impha loukhut thanggabo mak tabe pum tangang ongnu kaan bi anina Nalaang impha pwan sin thanggabo?
Nang naanu munu kaan bi mak tabe qwan in bi ongnu kaan bi ani Nakhou impha hung thanggabo?’
Habei ga Krwangna bani khou rinlune, ‘Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, heiba sin kataknu Au Anao rwan lak pi pakhat lang nanina to thang damnu ga nanina Alaang to thangnuwe.’
“Haba nung bi Maanna kut imbei pek la ongnu nun khou le rinlune, ‘Taseng phangnu nani, Akhouna swakluga Diabol le baom chonglang rwan lang daan thangnu khwa seinu mei la ga sedro:
Balangbe Ei chaam ngaake atiyeda nanina Alaang thaisaak pi make; Ei taraan ngaake atiyeda nanina Ating pi in thang make;
Ei man mi to ong ngaake atiyeda nanina Ating loukhut thang make, pum tangang ongnu kaan bi nanina Alaang pwan sin thang make, naanu khatle qwan in bi ong ongnu kaan bi nanina Akhou hung thang make.’

“Habei ga banina le Bakhou rinlune, ‘Pukraangba, anina Nang impha chaamnu mak tabe taraannu mak tabe man mi to ongnu mak tabe pum tangang ongnu mak tabe naaga ongnu mak tabe qwan in bi ongnu muluga, Nating chwanlaang to thang maknu amgabo?’
Haba kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinlune, ‘Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, sin kataknu pakhat khou nanina haga to thang mak tamnu ga nanina Akhou to thang maknuwe.’
Atiga hei bing nga khwa seiga laak thangnu bi selune atiyeda ririak senu nun gabe ringzoknu kum la selune.”
Jisu na heiba chong bing nga rin taangnu kaan bi Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou rinne,
“Ni ni nung bi Takan swaknu Balou rwe dinu nani theiye atiga Misa sa Kapaisa ding cross pi athat lang pi swaklu rwe.”
Habei ga takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle mi nun om patso rwanna takolu Caiaphas tiga kounu in inkhu bi hung kadoi ngaake,
banina Jisu ding rin thiyamluga nam lang khatle Bating athat lang zong rwe.
Atiyeda banina rinne, “Bangei sung bi to makcho, balangbe mi nun lak pi kasao kabao thounu zaye.”
Jisu na Bethany bi imphaan ngaaknu Simon in bi ong ongnu kaan bi,
mannu pakhatna baman kung taknu banamsanu thao alabaster tong khat phunluga Bakim bi hung ngaake khatle Jisu na sa lang ongtanu kaan bi mannu gana Balu bi thao ga sung thang rwe.
Atiyeda haga Baom potroi rwanna munu kaan bi banina balung pwanga rinne, “Heiya pa-aam lang to braannubo?
Balangbe banamsanu thao heiya baman taswang khak lang zwanluga lungsianu nun lang pi thang zanuwe.”
Atiyeda Jisu na haga theinu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nanina pa-aam lang mannu ding ga to katop ongnubo? Balangbe maanna Alaang kasanu chwan to thang rwe.
Balangbe lungsianu nun ga nani le bakaan bathin ong bacham ongme atiyeda Eiba nani le bakaan bathin ong bachamlaye.
Balangbe maanna Apum bi heiba banamsanu thao sung thangnuwa Ating imphumnu om lang maanna to thangnuwe.
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, heiba sacham ma talei ram bing bi kasam senu kaan bi bating baningsunu toga heiba mannuna to damnu chwan ga le rinlune.”
Haba nung bi potroi pat somga kani lak pi Judas Iscariot diga kounu pakhatna takopuba rwan khou seluga
rinne, “Eina Bating nani khou pi swake dabe nani alaang pa-aam pinebo?” Habei ga banina balaang chandi somthum sem thang rwe.
Haba kaan bina thouga maanna Jisu ding pi swak lang badou chanu zong ngaake.
Khai Sui maknu Uilu Balou om kamanu lumik pi potroi rwanna Jisu kim bi hungluga Bakhou ngaiye, “Takan Swaknu Balou Thaisaak sa lang anina ingaipai laang thangnu Nang bathaigabo?”

Maanna rinne, “Nampui laga tudannu pakhat khou seluga bakhou rinno, ‘Bachuthangnupa na rinne, “Alaang bakaan ga nai hung rwe; nain bi Ei Aom potroi rwan le diga Takan Swaknu Balou Thaisaak ngaak lune.” ’ ”
Atiga Jisu na rin thangnu nung suiga potroi rwanna to rwe khatle banina Takan Swaknu Balou lang daan rwe.
Khwazinren tanu kaan bi Maanna potroi pat somga kani le diga sa lang ongta bacham rwe.
Banina sa in ongnu kaan bi Maanna rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nani lak pi pakhatna Ating pi swaklu rwe.”
Atiga bani nun sung riangre tak ngaak rwe khatle bani pakhat khatna Bakhou ngai thou rwe, “Pukraangba, haga eibo?”
Maanna katake, “Theng bi Ei le diga kut kapunta bacham ongnu maan gana Ating pi swaklu rwe.
Misa Sa Kapaisa om lang bi hiak thang ngaaknu danga Maanna seta ongnuwe atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisa ding pi swaknu manpa ga aih sianu weda! Bating pon thang mak ngaake dabe balaang sa inku dingnuwe.”
Haba kaan bi Bating pi swak tingnu Judas na ngaiye, “Rabbi, haga eibo?” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Haga nangna rin swak rwe.”
Banina sa ong bi Jisu na uilu ga louluga rithoi thangluga thiak bak rwe khatle haga potroi rwan khou pi luga rinne, “Louluga saro; heiya Apum rwe.”
Haba nungbi Maanna ngai ga louluga swanka thang rwe khatle haga bani khou pi luga rinne, “Nani khangsung habei gana inro.
Balangbe heiya mi taswang khak om noh kok thang lang ta thangnu chonghen kathan om Athi ga rwe.
Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Apa om krwang talei la haga Eina nani nun le kathan toga in lat tingnu lumik tang mak basaan Ei heiba drakha tui ya atunna thouga in latla rwe.”
Banina laa khat to taangnu nung Olive Rammwan la se thou drwe.

Haba nung bi Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Aniya zingpha nani mi bing Alang bina ket basuinu doulu rwe, Balangbe heiya atiga hiak thang nge, ‘Eina Zao siannu ding bwei balum talune, Khatle zao nun lak pina zao nun ga pak imphaang damlune.’
Atiyeda Eina ring thou latnu nung Ei nani meithaan Galilee la selune.”
Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Nalang bi mi bingna ket basui ngaak peida Eiba impha ni beida ket basuilaye.”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina nakhou batak sekka rinnuwe, aniya zingpha aankhongna khwang maknu meithaan nang Ating za mak leng thumlune.”
Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Ei Nang le diga thi bacham dingnu am ngaaklena ei Nating khatchale za maknu tolaye!” Atiga potroi rwan bingna le hadanga rin rwe.
Haba nung bi Jisu na Gethsemane diga kounu riak pi bani le hung rwe khatle potroi rwan khou rinne, “Ei ula ga seluga kalum ong bi nani abeiya ong ngaako.”
Maanna Peter le Zebedee sa kapaisa pat ni ding kalwang rwe, atiga Maan sung riangre thou rwe khatle rin lang maakka sung sok thou rwe.
Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Akatha heiya thi dingnu danga tasiatnu riangre riangre rwe. Nani abeiya Ei le diga barak theiga ong bachamzo”
Maanna kasem se swakluga Bamai kun bakhuptaluga kalum rwe, “He Apa, heiya zaye dabe, heiba ngai ya Akhouna lou sat thang ngo; atiyeda haga Eina baningnu to makka Nangna baningnu to ding ngo.”
Habei ga Maan potroi rwan khou hungnu kaan bi bani inthi ongnu dou rwe. Maanna Peter khou rinne, “Pa-aambo? Nani chakrin khatcha hakna Ei le diga khaang bachamnu ngamlanrubo?
Nani bathemnu bi ta mak lang khaang ngo khatle kalummo. Batak takka katha nabe bathaiye atiyeda pum naba sonne.”
Leng ninu toga Maan se latluga kalum rwe, “He Apa, Eina heiba ngai ya in maknu za maknuwe dabe, Nangna baningnu to ding ngo.”
Maan hung latnu kaan bi bani inthi ong ngaaknu dou lat rwe, balangbe bani in nwamnuna mik meng brak swaknu ngam mak ngaake.
Atiga Maan bani ding thangsialuga se lat rwe khatle leng thumnu toga bachamnu chongkaang ga ringa kalum rwe.
Haba nung bi Maanna Baom potroi rwan kim bi hungluga bani khou rinne, “Nani atun tangga in basak ong maangbo? Phaang ngo, chakrin ga nai rwe khatle Misa Sa Kapaisa ding noh mi nun kut pi pi swak rwe.
Thouro, ani serizo. Phaang ngo, Ating pi swak tingnu mi ga nai rwe.”
Maanna chong kabia ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, potroi pat somga kani lak pi Judas na takopuba khatle mi nun om patso rwan khouna kachaak chem le thing kalok choinu mi khang pui le diga hung rwe.
Bating pi swaknu gana bani khou badannu khat piga rinne, “Eina kaput tingnu Maan ga rwe; Bating namro.”
Haba kahan bi maanna Jisu kim bi hungluga rinne, “Kalumme, Rabbi!” Atiga Bating kaput rwe.
Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Baanno, nang pa-aam lang hungnubo?” Haba nung bi banina hungluga Jisu lu chung bi kut taluga Bating nam thou drwe.
Atiga phaang ngo, Jisu nung suinu nun lak pi pakhatna bakut balaan swakluga baom kachaak chem kaswa swak rwe khatle takolu om swak ting bakanaa kapakchat thang rwe.
Habei ga Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Naom kachaak chem ga chemthaang bi thang dammo, balangbe kachaak chem choinu bingna kachaak chem bi braanlune.
Apana Alaang tambaan chonglang legion somga kani ma inkuga pi thang lang atun Eina Apa khou hweini ngamlaye diga nani baningbo?
Ati dabe Bathiangnu chongdip pi atiga swak ting ngo diga rin thang ngaaknu ga tatoga hung tang langbo?”

Haba chakrin bi ga Jisu na mi khang khou rinne, “Nanina kasut sanu maitwang bi danga kachaak chem le thing kalok choiluga Ating nam lang hungnubo? Ei kani bathin nani le diga ong bachamme, kalum in bi bachu thang nge atiyeda nanina Ating nam make.
Atiyeda hei bing nga thiamting rwan om Bathiangnu chongdip pi hiak thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang swak rwe.” Habei ga potroi rwan bingna Bating bathan satluga pak thou drwe.
Jisu ding namnu mi nun gana Bating chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le patso rwan karung ongnu riak takolu Caiaphas in bi kalwang hung rwe.
Atiyeda Peter na impaan saam saamga takolu in inkhu tangga Banung suizon hung ngaake. Atiga maanna sekhutluga pa-aam swaklu dingbo dinuga phaang lang kalum in ngaak nun le ong bacham ngaake.
Takopuba rwan, patso rwan khatle thampei rwanna Jisu ding athat langna Bamaitwang bi kakoinu sake zong ngaake,
atiyeda khatchale dou mak ngaake. Kakoinu sake katei taswang khak hung beida banina koi khatchale dou make. Atiyeda bataang la kakoinu sake pinu pat ni hungluga
rinne, “Heiba manpana rinne, ‘Eina Rikrwang om kalum in ding ga raitaluga ni thum ni haga to thou lat ngamme.’ ”
Habei ga takoluna han thouluga Bakhou rinne, “Nang khatchale kataklabo? Heiba mi nunna Namaitwang bi sake pi ongnuwa pa-aambo?”
Atiyeda Jisu na thiap thiapka ong ngaake. Takoluna Bakhou rinne, “Eina ring ongnu Rikrwang ding kaisingga Nakhou kanatnu zathang pinuwe: Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa Christa gabo ani khou rinno.”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna rin ongnu ga rwe. Atiyeda Eina nakhou rinnuwe, heiba nung Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Ngam om kut inchang pek la badungluga tambaan om tambu bi hungnu nanina phaangmulune.”

Habei ga takolu gana bapwan kachang reluga rinne, “Maanna Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiatka rin drwe! Anina sake katei lou lat lang pa-aam bathaang am maang gabo? Phaang ngo, atun Maanna Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiatnu ga nani ngaisuru dabo!
Nani pa-aam baningbo?” Banina katake, “Maan thi lang khop rwe.”
Haba nung bi banina Bamai kum bi bachin thangluga Bating bwei rwe khatle katei rwanna Bating bani kut bazaana kabengga
rinne, “Christa! Nating kabengnu ga tubo, ani khou rinno.”
Haba kaan bi Peter langkaang la inkhu bi badung ong ngaake. Atiga swak rangaaknu khatna Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “Nang le Galilee rwan Jisu le se bacham ngaaknuwe.”
Atiyeda maanna bani mi bing meithaan bi za makka rinne, “Nangna rin ongnu ga pa-aambo ei thei make.”
Maanna inmai inkhaan lampui la swaknu kaan bi swak rangaaknu katei khatna bating muluga habei ga ong ongnu mi nun khou rinne, “Heiba manpa le Nazareth Jisu le diga se bacham ngaaknuwe.”
Atiyeda maanna habei ga le karenga “Ei haba Manpa ding ga thei make” diga za mak lat rwe.
Bakhwa sei maknu nung habei ga han ongnu mi nunna hungluga Peter khou rinne, “Soi makka nang bani lak pi pakhate, balangbe nachong kabiakna nating pi thei rwe.”
Habei ga maanna sengga khatle karenga rinne, “Ei haba Manpa ding ga thei make!” Haba kahan bi aankhongna khwang rwe.

Jisu na Peter khou “Aankhongna khwang maknu meithaan nang Ating za mak leng thumlune” diga rin thang ngaaknu chong ga maan baningsu rwe. Atiga maan langkaang la swakluga sung sokka chap barung hingga chap rwe.
Louthwan thou bi takopuba rwan le mi nun om patso rwan bing Jisu maitwang bi Bating athat lang chong katu rwe.
Banina Bating krakluga kalwang rwe khatle taleipuba Pontius Pilate khou Bating pi swak rwe.
Haba nung bi Bating pi swak ngaaknu Judas na Bating koi pi ta thang rwe dinu munu kaan bi maan baning ngamlan rwe khatle maanna chandi somthum ga takopuba rwan le patso rwan khou phun hung latluga
rinne, “Koi maaknu thi ding pi swaknu om langna ei noh to rwe.” Habei ga banina rinne, “Haga ani thou paaam ambo? Narang toro!”
Atiga maanna chandi ga kalum in bi bazwan thangsialuga thou drwe khatle maanna seluga baraanto ring khaak thi rwe.
Atiyeda takopuba rwanna chandi ga louluga rinne, “Heiya kalum in sian thangnu riak pi thang lang za make, balangbe heiya thi manne.”
Atiga banina chong kathuiluga haba sian gana man mi ding rinu riak lang ben bachaanu mi om lou khat kalei rwe.
Atibriakpina haba lou ding ga aniya tangga Thi Loukhun diga kou ongme.
Atiga thiamting Jeremiah na rin thang ngaaknu ga hung tang ngaak rwe, “Banina chandi somthum ga lou rwe, Haga Israel sa rwanna han thangnu Bapum manne
khatle Pukraangba na akhou rin thangnu danga, Ben bachaanu mi loukhun man lang haga bani khou pi rwe.”
Atiga Jisu taleipuba meithaan bi hung han rwe. Habei ga taleipuba na Bakhou ngaiye, “Nang Jihudi rwan Krwang bo?” Jisu na bakhou katake, “Nangna rin damnu ga rwe.”
Atiga Bating takopuba rwan le patso rwanna koi impu thangnu kaan bi Maan khatchale katak mak ngaake.
Habei ga Pilate na Bakhou rinne, “Namaitwang bi banina sake heiza pi ongnuwa Nang thei makpo?”
Atiyeda Maanna bakhou chongkaang khatcha hakna katak mak ngaake atibriakpina taleipuba ga taswan khak lang loh lo ngaak rwe.
Atiga Takan Swaknu Balou dat pi taleipuba na baom chaang toga banina bathainu qwan in mi pakhat ting mi nun lang bathan thang ngaake.
Ha kaan bi ga khei sianu Barabbas tiga kounu bani om qwan in mi pakhat am ngaake.
Atibriakpina bani khangsung hung kadoinu kaan bi Pilate na bani khou ngaiye, “Eina nani khou tu ding bathan thangnu bathaigabo? Barabbas tingmo mak tabe Christa diga kounu Jisu dingbo?”
Balangbe banina antiam briakpina Jisu ding pi swak thangnuwe dinu maanna thei ngaake.

Maanna chongsem riak pi ong ongnu kaan bi bameina heiba cham ma bakhou bathan hungga rinne, “Haba ririak senu Manpa ding ga khatcha hakna tonu za make, balangbe aniya amang la Bariak pina ei taswang khak riangrenu dou ngaake.”
Atiyeda Barabbas ting bathanluga Jisu ding to braan lang banina ni dam lang takopuba rwan le patso rwanna mi khang ding kachui thang ngaake.
Taleipuba na bani khou rinne, “Pat ni lak pi nani khou tu ding eina bathan thangnu nanina bathaigabo?” Banina rinne, “Barabbas ting nge!”
Pilate na bani khou ngaiye, “Ati dabe Christa diga kounu Jisu ding ei pa-aam to langbo?” Bani khangsungna bakhou rinne, “Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!”
Taleipuba na rinne, “Pa-aam langbo, Maanna paaam kasianu chwan torugabo?” Atiyeda banina pao rakan ranga rinne, “Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!”

Pilate na maan khatchale thing ngamlan rwe atiyeda haba hut lang kasao kabaonu swaklu zung rwe dinu munu kaan bi maanna tui louluga mi khang meithaan bi bakut kasinga rinne, “Ei heiba bazenu Manpa thi om lang bi koi maake. Nani rang toro.”
Habei ga mi khangna katake, “Bathi ga ani khatle ani sa rwan lu chung bi ta ding ngo.”
Haba nung bi maanna bani lang Barabbas ting bathan thang rwe khatle maanna Jisu ding bwei basiatka pi bweiluga cross pi athat lang Bating pi swak rwe.
Haba nung bi taleipuba om kraanmi nunna Jisu ding Praetorium sung bi kalwang khutluga habei ga kraan mi doina Bating hung ong qwat rwe.
Banina Bapwan lwak satluga Bakhou sendumnu pwan sin thang rwe.

Banina kaling luthop khat bachaluga Balu bi run thang rwe khatle Bakut inchang pek la tou sungrwan khat pi choi thang rwe. Atiga banina Bameithaan bi kuntaluga Bating kiamga rinne, “Kalumme, Jihudi rwan Krwang!”
Habei ga banina Bakhou bachin thangluga tou sungrwan louluga Balu bi bwei rwe.
Banina Bating kiam taangnu nung Bakhouna pwan ga lou sat rwe khatle Bapwan ga sin thangluga Bating cross pi athat lang kalwang thou drwe.
Banina se swaknu kaan bi Cyrene rwan Simon diga kounu manpa pakhat ting kadou ngaake. Banina bating Jisu om cross ka namga pi pon rwe.
Atiga banina Golgotha bakabana, Luru riak diga kounu riak hung tangnu kaan bi,
Balaang kathunnu zu bi kakhaanu tui thang karungluga in lang pi rwe. Atiyeda Maanna haga batemnu kaan bi Maan inlan rwe.

Banina Bating cross pi bakhai thangluga Bapwan ga tasaan phaangluga kasem rwe, haga thiamtingna rin thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang nge, “Banina Apwan bani lak pi kasem rwe, Khatle Apwan lang chungna banina tasaan rwe.”
Banina habei ga badungtaluga Bating ong ngaak ong ngaake.
Banina Bamaitwang bi impu thangnu chongkaang hiak thangluga Balu chung la taan thang rwe, “HEIYA JIHUDI RWAN KRWANG JISU WE.”
Habei ga Maan le diga inbruk pat ni, pakhat ting inchang pek la, pakhat ting imbei pek la cross pi bakhai thang ngaake.
Atiga habei ga se hungnu mi nunna Bating rin basiatka bani lu kazinga
rinne, “Kalum in ding raitaluga ni thum ni ha ding to thou latnu Nang, Naraanto Nating kanro! Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dabe cross pina taro.”
Hadanga takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle patso rwanna le balaa ga rinne,
“Maanna katei rwan ding kan thang nge; atiyeda Baraanto Batingba kannu ngam make. Maan Israel rwan Krwang nge dabe, atun Maan cross pina ta ding ngo ati dabe anina Bating balumsane.
Maanna Rikrwang ding balumsaye; Maanna Bating pemnuwe dabe, atun Maanna Bating kan thang ding ngo, balangbe Maanna rinne, ‘Ei Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye.’ ”
Maan le diga cross pi bakhai bacham ongnu inbruk mi pat ni na le haga le bachamga Bating rin basiat rwe.
Chakrin karuk pina chakrin kaqwa tanu tangga haba taram bing ga zing rwe.
Chakrin kaqwa tanu dat pi Jisu na baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani?” Bakabana, “Arikrwang, Arikrwang, Nangna Ating pa-aam lang bathan thangnubo?” dinuwe.
Habei ga han ongnu mi kasemna haga ngaisunu kaan bi atiga rinne, “Heiba Manpana Elijah ding kou ongme!”
Haba kahan bi bani lak pi pakhatna pak seluga sponge louluga kathunnu tui bi imphomluga tou sungrwan lan bi thang rwe khatle haga in dam lang Bakhou balaanka rwe.
Atiga mi katei rwanna rinne, “Baraanto ong dam ding ngo; Elijah na Bating kan thang lang hunglu dingmo ani phaangzo.”
Atiga Jisu na baraam basaangga pao latluga Bakatha bathan drwe.
Phaang ngo, kalum in bi khamthing pwan ga balu lana bakalan tangga kani toga reta rwe; talei le kaling rwe, lung pui bing le pwak bak rwe,
thaan bing le lat swak rwe khatle bathiangnu mi nun om thi damnu pum bing ga le ring thou rwe.
Maan ring thou latnu nung thaan bina swakluga banina bathiangnu nampui la seluga mi inza khou pi mu thang ngaake.
Kraanmi razapuba le maan le diga Jisu ding ngaak ongnu mi nun gana talei kalingnu khatle swak tamnu bing ga muluga banina kachi takka rinne, “Batak takka heiya Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa zung nge!”
Atiga Galilee lana Jisu nung sui hungnu khatle Bating chwanlaang tonu mannu rwan gana impaan saam saamga han phaang ong ngaake.
Bani nun lak pi Mary Magdalene, James le Joses nu Mary khatle Zebedee sa kapaisa rwan nu sui ngaake.
Khwazinren tanu dat pi maan bahak le Jisu om potroi tonu Arimathea lana Joseph tiga kounu lungsanu manpa khat hung ngaake.
Heiba manpana Pilate khou seluga Jisu pum ding ni rwe. Atiga Pilate na Bapum ga balaang pi lang zathang pi thang rwe.
Joseph na Bapum ga louluga bathiangnu linen pwanna kazwan rwe,
atiga maanna haga lung pui bi ran thangnu thaan kathan bi ri thang rwe khatle maanna lung kaliannu khatna thaan inkhaanmun bi lengnam thangsialuga thou drwe.
Atiga Mary Magdalene le katei Mary na thaan maitwang la badung ong ngaake.
Inswan lampai Chamdaannu Lumik om bathang lumik pi takopuba rwan le Pharisee rwan Pilate in bi hung kadoiluga
rinne, “Bapuba, chong karwak mi heiyana Maan ring ngaaknu kaan bi ‘Ni thum nung Ei ring thou latlune’ diga rinnu ga anina baningsuwe.

Hei langna atunna thouga ni thum ni tangga thaan ga ngaak chuiga ngaak lang zathang pi thang ngo ati make dabe Baom potroi rwanna zingpha na hungluga Bating baru thou damluga, ‘Maan thi bina ring thou drwe’ diga mi nun khou rinlune. Atiga kakhamnu om chong karwak kana kamanu ma sia inkulune.”
Habei ga Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Nani lang rangkaan mi louro; nanina seluga ngamnu bing ngaakro.”
Atiga banina seluga thaan ga ngaak chuiga ngaak rwe khatle lung ga seal nam thangluga rangkaan thang rwe.
Sabbath nung, maap lak om kamanu ni louthwan khwan Mary Magdalene le katei Mary na thaan phaang lang hung ngaake.
Atiga phaang ngo, talei kaling rakan takka kaling rwe; balangbe Pukraangba om tambaan chonglang khatna tambaan lana taluga thaankham lung ga lat swakluga ha chung bi ong rwe.
Baman ga khwa bathaaknu dan ngaake khatle bapwan ga kabun danga ngou ngaake.
Rangkaan mi nun ga bating kachiga kathok rwe khatle bani thinu dan rwe.
Tambaan chonglang gana kamaisa rwan khou rinne, “Kachi mako, balangbe cross pi athat thang damnu Jisu ding nanina zong ongnuwe dinu ei theiye.
Maan abeiya ong lan rwe; balangbe Maanna rinnu danga Maan ring thou drwe. Hung ngo, Pukraangba ding ri thangnu riak ka hung phaangro.

Atiga barapka seluga Baom potroi rwan khou Maan thi bina ring thou drwe diga bapuro, batak takka Maan nani meithaan Galilee la selune; habei ga nanina Bating mulune. Phaang ngo, eina nani khou rin thangnu rwe.”
Atibriakpina bani karo takka kachinu le bachamga thaan bina barapka swakluga Baom potroi rwan khou cham ga pu lang pak thou drwe.
Atiga banina Baom potroi rwan khou cham ga pu lang thou damnu kaan bi phaang ngo, Jisu na bani ding kadouluga rinne, “Karowo” atiga banina hungluga Baket hung banaanluga Bating kalum rwe.
Habei ga Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Kachi mako. Seluga au anao rwan khou Galilee la se lang barinno, ha la ga banina Ating mulune.”
Banina lampui bi se ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, rangkaan mi kasem nampui la hungluga takopuba rwan khou swak tamnu om lang bing ga pu thang rwe.
Banina patso rwan le kadoiluga chong katunu nung banina kraanmi nun khou sian taswang khak piluga
rinne, “ ‘Zingpha anina inthi thou damnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwanna hungluga Bating baru thou drwe,’ diga mi nun khou rinno.
Heiba chong nga taleipuba om kanaa bi ngaisu ngaaklena, anina bating bathem ratne khatle nani ding riangrenu bi pi talaye.”
Atiga banina sian ga louluga bachu thang damnu danga banina to rwe khatle heiba chong nga aniya tangga Jihudi rwan lak pi kabia ongme.
Haba nung bi potroi rwan pat somga khat kana Galilee la Jisu na bani ding kadou lang rin thang ngaaknu rammwan la ga thou drwe.
Banina Bating munu kaan bi banina Bating kalum rwe; atiyeda kasemna balumsia ngaake.
Jisu na hungluga bani khou rinne, “Tambaan le talei bi ngam bing Akhou pi thang rwe.
Atibriakpina seluga chaat bing ding potroi bacharo, bani ding Pa, Sa Kapaisa khatle Katha Bathiangnu meng bi baptize to thang ngo.
Eina nani khou zathang pi thang damnu bapum brum ga zei lang bani ding bachu thang ngo; atiga phaang ngo, talei ram loinu tangga Eina nani le diga ong bacham thang ongme.” Amen.
Heiya Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa, Jisu Christa om sacham thou kamanu gaye.
Thiamting rwan om chongdip pi hiak thang ngaaknu danga, “Phaang ngo, Nameithaan seluga Nalampui daan thang dingnu, Acham phunnu mi ding Eina basom ga lang thang nge.
Khwan khatna ramhaang bi atiga pao ongme, ‘Pukraangba lampui ga daanno; Balampui bing ga to bazeyo.’ ”
John na ramhaang bi baptize to thangga khatle noh kok thang lang sung lenu om baptize tonu ga kasamga hung ngaake.
Habei ga Judea taram mi bing le Jerusalem bina mi bing Bakim bi hung rwe khatle bani om noh rin indaoluga Jordan tuiqwa bi bani mi bing ding maanna baptize to thang rwe.
John ut munna bachanu pwan sin basoi ngaake, bakong bi zan mun kongkhaak khaake khatle maan takhao le nilai lak khwei tui sa ngaake.
Maanna kasamga rinne, “Ama ngam liannu Baom sandal rui ga hakna eina kuntaluga sut lang khop maknu Pakhat anung la hung naye.
Batak takka Eina nani ding tui bi baptize to thang nge atiyeda Maanna nani ding Katha Bathiangnu bi baptize to thanglune.”
Haba kaan bi Jisu Galilee om Nazareth lana hung ngaake khatle John na Bating Jordan tuiqwa bi baptize to thang ngaake.
Atiga Jisu tui bina kakhap tinu kahan bi tambaan inkhaan lat swaknu khatle Katha na banphi danga Balu chung bi tatwangnu Maanna mu rwe.
Haba nung bi tambaan lana tanu khwan khatna rinne, “Nang Eina kriangnu Asa Kapaisa ye, Ei Nalu chung bi pem tak rwe.”
Haba kahan bi Katha na Bating ramhaang la phun swak rwe.
Maan ramhaang bi ni sombali Seitaan na bathemga nilai lak khouring nun le ong bacham ngaake khatle tambaan chonglang rwanna Bating chwanlaang to thang ngaake.
John ding qwan in bi thang damnu nung, Jisu na Galilee taram la seluga Rikrwang om krwang talei sacham kasamga
rinne, “Bakaan ga hung tang rwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nai rwe. Sung lero khatle sacham ding balumsaro!”
Jisu na Galilee tuipui paan bi se hungnu kaan bi Maanna Simon le banao Andrew ding tuipui bi kalang sat ong ngaaknu mu rwe; balangbe barwei ga ngaa namnu mi ngaake.
Habei ga Jisu na barwei khou rinne, “Anung suiyo, Eina narwei ding mi namnu mi pi to thangne.”
Haba kahan bi ga barweina barwei kalang bing ga asat thangsialuga Banung sui drwe.
Maan habei gana kasem se swaknu kaan bi Zebedee sa kapaisa James khatle banao John le li sung bi kalang photka ongnu Maanna mu ngaake.
Haba kahan bi Jisu na barwei ding kou rwe, atiga barweina barwei pa Zebedee le lan thangnu swak rwan ding li sung bi thangsialuga Banung sui se drwe.
Haba nung bi bani nun Capernaum la se rwe khatle Maanna Sabbath ni synagogue pi khutluga bachu thang ngaake.
Atiga Maanna bachu thangnu bi ga bani loh lo ngaake, balangbe Maanna bani ding bachu thangnu ga chongtan bachuthangnu rwan dan makka, ngam amnu pakhat tanga bachu thang ngaake.
Bani om synagogue pi bathiang maknu katha khutnu manpa pakhat am ngaake. Maanna paoga
rinne, “Nazareth rwan Jisu! Ani ding rai thang mako. Nang le ani paaam barui bazem ambo? Nang ani ding to braan lang hungnubo? Nang tubo dinu ei theiye, Nang Rikrwang om Bathiangnu Maan gaye!”
Habei ga Jisu na bating tweiga rinne, “Thiap thiap ong ngo, bakhouna swak tro!”
Bathiang maknu katha gana manpa ding ga rai basiat thangluga baraam basaangga paonu nung maan bakhouna swak trwe.

Habei ga bani khangsung loh lo rwe, atiga bani cham ngai kalega rinne, “Heiya pa-aambo? Tatonu kathan bachu thangnubo? Balangbe Maanna ngam suiga bathiang maknu katha ding tangga zathang pi thang bi banina Bachong zeiye.”
Haba kahan bi gana thouga Galilee taram bing bi Bameng ga thei chang thou dam ngaak rwe.
Bani nun synagogue pina se swak khap tinu le James le John bani nun Simon le Andrew in bi khut rwe.
Atiga Simon mei nu bakhunga naaga in ong ngaake, haba kahan bi banina balang bi Jisu khou pu thang rwe.
Habei ga Jisu na hungluga bakut choiga bating kai thou rwe, haba kahan bi gana bakhunnu ga sa drwe. Atiga maanna bani ding chwanlaang to rwe.
Khwazin lumik tanu nung, banina naanu bing ding le ri kasia khutnu bing ding Bakhou phun hung ngaake.
Atiga nampui la mi bing inkhaanmun bi hung kadoi rwe.

Habei ga bachaat tei teina naanu tanat taswang khak ting Maanna pi sa thang rwe khatle ri kasia taswang khak ting le kazun sat thang rwe; Maanna ri kasia nun ding chong kabia lang za thang mak ngaake, balangbe banina Bating thei ngaake.
Louthwan khwan, khwa baan swak mak balei meithaan insaang thouluga Maan rim rimnu riak la seluga habei ga kalum ngaake.
Simon khatle Maan le diga ong bachamnu mi nunna Bating zong ngaake.
Banina Bating kadounu kaan bi banina Bakhou rinne, “Mi khangsungna Nating zong ongme.”
Atiyeda Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ani nun bathang nampui bing la semaangzo, Ei habei ga le sacham kasam lang maang nge, balangbe Ei hei langna hungnuwe.”
Maanna Galilee taram bing bi bani om synagogue bing bi sacham kasam se ngaake khatle ri kasia nun ding kazun sat thang ngaake.
Imphaannu manpa pakhat Bakim bi hungluga hweini rwe khatle kekhok deluga Bakhou rinne, “Nangna zaye dabe, Nangna ating to bathiang thangnu ngamme.”
Habei ga Jisu na bating phaangkriang thangga, Bakut balaan swakluga bating banaan thang rwe khatle bakhou rinne, “Ei za rwe; bathiangro.”
Atiga kabianu kahan bina imphaannu ga bakhouna sa drwe khatle maan bathiang rwe.
Maanna bating rin basi thangluga haba kahan bi ga bating bathan thangga

bakhou rinne, “Nang heiya pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako; atiyeda nangna seluga napum bahak tako khou pi muwo khatle nating to bathiang thangnu langna bani khou sake toga Moses na zathang pi thangnu pot bing ga katro.”

Atiyeda maanna se swakluga bating pi sa thang damnu sacham ga rang toga kasam se ngaak rwe atibriakpina Jisu na namlian sung bi indaoga khut latnu ngam mak ngaake atiyeda namlian paan la rim rimnu riak la ong ngaak rwe; atiga bariak bing la mi nunna Jisu kim bi hung ngaake.
Lumik kasem nung bi Jisu Capernaum namlian bi khut lat rwe khatle Maan insung la amme dinu mi nunna ngaisu ngaake.
Haba kahan bi mi nun hung kadoi ngaak rwe khatle mi tam briakpina inkhaanmun tangga han lang bariak maak ngaake. Atiga Maanna bani khou sacham kasam ngaake.
Habei ga manpa pat balina pum baang thinu manpa pakhat ting phunluga bani nun Jisu kim bi hung ngaake.
Mi tam briakpina bani Jisu kim bi khuttang ngamlanruga Maan ongnu tun bi in chung ga rai sat rwe. Banina haga rai satluga pum baang thinu manpana in ongnu ria ga banina basaam ta rwe.
Jisu na bani balumsat ka munu kaan bi pum baang thinu manpa khou Maanna rinne, “Sa kapaisa, nanoh bing ga kok thang rwe.”
Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan kasem habei ga ong ngaake khatle bani sung bi atiga kakhan ngaake,
“Heiba manpana Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat ongnuwa pa-aam langbo? Rikrwang zana makka tuna noh bing ding kok thang ngamgabo?”
Bani raantoza bani sung bi atiga kakhan ongnu ga Jisu na Balungning bi theinu kahan bi, Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani sung bi ha bing ga pa-aam lang kakhan ongnubo?
Pum baang thinu ding nga, ‘Nanoh bing ga kok thang rwe’ diga rinnu le ‘Lon thouluga sero’ dinu le ingaana bai inkubo?
Atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisana talei ram bi noh bing kok thang lang ngam amme dinu nanina thei lang nge.” Maanna pum baang thinu khou rinne,
“Eina nakhou rinnuwe, lon thouro, nakain riak ka lou thouluga nain la sero.”

Haba kahan bi maan thou rwe, khatle bakain riak ka kai thouluga bani khangsung meithaan bi se swak rwe, habei ga mi bingza loh lo ga Rikrwang lwat indaoga rinne, “Impha ni beida hei dannu ani khatchale mu make!”
Jisu na tuipui paan la se hung lat rwe; habei ga mi khangna Bakim bi hung rwe khatle Maanna bani ding bachu thang lat rwe.
Maanna atiga se hungnu kaan bi ramkhai khomnu in bi Alpheus sa kapaisa Levi badung ongnu mu rwe. Jisu na ba khou rinne, “Anung suiro.” Habei ga maan lon thouluga Banung sui drwe.
Maan Levi in bi sa in ongnu kaan bi ramkhai khomnu nun le noh mi nun ga Jisu le Baom potroi rwan le diga ong karung ong ngaake; balangbe mi tam tak ngaake khatle banina Banung sui se ngaake.

Jisu na ramkhai khomnu rwan le noh mi nun le diga sa in karung ongnu ga chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwanna munu kaan bi banina Baom potroi rwan khou rin rwe, “Maanna ramkhai khomnu rwan le noh mi nun le diga sa in bacham ongnuwa paaam langbo?”

Jisu na haga ngaisunu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Pum sanu mi nun lang kathiam bathaang maake atiyeda naanu nun lang be bathaang amme. Ei ririak senu mi nun ding kou lang hungnu make atiyeda noh mi nun ding sung pi le langna kou lang hungnuwe.”

John om potroi rwan le Pharisee rwan om potroi rwan kalumsan ong ngaake. Banina hungluga Bakhou rinne, “John om potroi rwan le Pharisee rwan om potroi rwanna kalumsanda, Naom potroi rwanna pa-aam lang kalumsan maknubo?”
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Tazwanpa baan rwan gana tazwanpa le diga ong bacham basaan bani kalumsan ong ding gabo? Tazwanpana bani le ong bacham basaan banina kalumsan make.
Atiyeda tazwanpa ding ga bani khouna lou thou dam dingnu kaan ga hunglune; haba kaan bi bani kalumsanlune.
“Pakhatchanale charut maknu pwan kathan tutna pwan raan bi phot thang make; atiye dabe baraan ding ga kai charutluga re basiatlune.

Pakhatchanale drakha tui kathan ding zan mun khao raan bi thang make; atiye dabe drakha tui kathan gana zan mun khao raan ding ga pi pwak baklune atiga drakha tui ga lwang sate khatle zan mun khao ga le braanne. Atiyeda drakha tui kathan ga zan mun khao kathan bi thang lang nge.”
Sabbath ni Maan louzam lak pi serwan hung ngaake; banina se ong bi Baom potroi rwanna tapaan bazui thou rwe.
Habei ga Pharisee rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Phaang ngo, toza maknu chwan banina pa-aam toga Sabbath ni tonubo?”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “David na maan khatle maan le bachamnu nunna, bani bathaang amnu kaan bi khatle bon chaamnu kaan bi pa-aam to dambo dinu nanina pa makchungbo:

Takolu Abiathar kaan bi David na tatoga Rikrwang in bi khutluga, tako rwanna makka pakhatchanale sanu za maknu kat thangnu uilu ga sanu za makka, maan le chwanlaang bachamnu nun lang le kasem pi damme.”
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Sabbath heiya mi lang chungna bacha thangnuwe khatle mi ya Sabbath lang make.
Atibriakpina Misa Sa Kapaisa heiya Sabbath ni om Pukraangba le rwe.”
Jisu synagogue pi khut lat ngaake, habei ga kut lwamnu manpa pakhat am ngaake.
Banina Jisu ding koi impu thang langna Sabbath ni bating pi sa thanglu dingmo diga banina Bating aan ong ngaake.
Jisu na kut lwamnu manpa khou rinne, “Lon thouluga meithaan se swakro.”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Sabbath ni kasanu chwan tonu zamo mak tabe kasianu chwan tonu, mi pakhat om kum ding kan thangnu mak tabe athatnu zabo?” Habei ga bani thiap thiap ong ngaake.

Jisu na bani ding balung pwanga phaang koinu nung, bani sung natnuna Basung sokka Maanna manpa khou ga rinne, “Nakut ka balaan swako.” Maanna balaan swaknu kaan bi bakut ka babaang khat ka danga sa bathiang rwe.
Pharisee rwan ga se swakluga haba kahan bi banina Herod om mi nun le diga Bating to braan lang Bamaitwang bi chong katu rwe.
Atiyeda Jisu Baom potroi rwan le diga tuipui la thou dam ngaake. Atiga Galilee la mi khang puina Banung sui ngaake khatle Judea le
Jerusalem namlian, Idumea taram Jordan raan la amnu khatle Tyre le Sidon la mi khang puina Maanna to ongnu chwan inza ga ngaisuluga Bakim bi hung rwe.
Mi khang tamlai briakpina Bating hwam lem mak lang Jisu na Baom potroi rwan khou Balaang liswan khat daan thang lang rin rwe.
Balangbe Maanna mi taswang khak ting pi sa thang briakpina tanat kasia naanu mi nunna Bating banaan su lang Bakim bi hwam lem ngaake.
Bathiang maknu katha nunna Bating phaangmu bathin, Bameithaan bi balumtaluga paoga rinne, “Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye.”
Atiyeda banina Bating Tubo dinu rin indao swak mak lang Maanna bani khou rakanga rin thang ngaake.
Maan rammwan la kaluga Maan bahakna bathainu mi nun ding kou rwe. Atiga bani nun Bakim bi hung rwe.
Maanna potroi pat somga kani ding ka thang rwe, bani ga Maan le ong bacham lang, Maanna bani ding sacham kasam lang bathan swak thang lang,
kasa kanaa bing ding pi sa thang lang khatle ri kasia nun ding bathou satnu ngam am lang nge:
Maanna Peter dinu meng basak thangnu Simon;
atiluga Maanna Boanerges bakabana, “Bachek Sa Kapaisa rwan” diga meng basak thang ngaaknu Zebedee sa kapaisa James le banao John,
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus sa kapaisa James, Thaddaeus, Canaan rwan Simon
khatle Bating pi swaknu Judas Iscariot bani ding ka thang rwe. Atiga bani in khat la se rwe.
Mi khangna hung kadoi lat rwe atibriakpina bani nun uilu hakna sanu ngam mak ngaake.
Hei lang bi Bami nunna ngaisunu kaan bi banina Bating nam thang lang se swak rwe, balangbe banina rinne, “Maan kalo rwe.”
Jerusalem lana hungnu chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna rinne, “Bakhou Beelzebub am rwe” khatle “Ri kasia nun om bapuba paanna Maanna katha kasia nun ding kazun sate.”
Jisu na bani ding Bakhou kou hungluga bani khou chongchak toga rinne, “Tatoga Seitaan na Seitaan ding bathou satnu ngam ding gabo?
Krwang talei khatna baraanto babaang kai khak kai lang swake dabe, haba krwang talei ga hannu ngamlaye.
Inkhun khatna baraanto kai khak kai lang nge dabe, haba inkhun ga hannu ngamlaye.
Seitaan na bamaitwang bi katwake dabe khatle kai khak kai lang swake dabe maan hannu ngamlaye atiga maan braannu zung rwe.
Kanatnu manpa ding ga karak kama make dabe, pakhatchanale kanatnu pa in bi khutluga baom pot bing kapumnu ngamlaye. Bating karaknu nung bina bain ga kapumlune.
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, misa sa kapaisa rwan om noh bing khatle banina Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiatnu bing kok thanglune;
