atiyeda tudannu Katha Bathiangnu maitwang bi rin basiatnu bating ga impha ni beida kok thanglaye atiyeda loinu nai maknu noh om laak thangnu ga phanglune.”
Heiba chongchak bing nga banina, “Bakhou bathiang maknu katha am rwe” diga rin briakpina kabianuwe.
Haba nung bi Banao kapaisa rwan le Banuna hungluga langkaang la hanluga Bating kou lang Bakhou mi langkhut rwe.
Mi khangna Bating ong qwatluga banina Bakhou rinne, “Phaang ngo, Nanu le Nanao kapaisa rwanna langkaang la Nating zong ongme.”
Atiyeda Maanna bani khou katake, “Anu le Anao kapaisa rwanzo tubo?”
Atiga Jisu na Bating ong qwat ongnu mi nun ding phaang koiluga rinne, “Phaang ngo, abeiya Anu le Anao kapaisa rwan amme.
Balangbe tudannu Rikrwang na baningnu to ongnu maan ga Anao kapaisa rwan le Anao kamaisa rwan khatle Anu rwe.”

Jisu na tuipui paan bi bachu thang thou lat rwe. Mi khang puina Bakim bi hung briakpina Maan tuipui chung bi amnu li sung bi khutluga habei ga ongta rwe; atiga mi khangna tuipui pek la kanei ong ngaake.
Habei ga Maanna bani ding chongchak inzana tamga bachu thang ngaake khatle Maanna bachu thangga bani khou rinne,
“Phaang ngo, tachi bwannu mi khatna tachi bwan lang se swak rwe.
Maanna tachi bwannu kaan bi tachi kasemna lampui paan bi ta thang nge khatle haga basaang la zwangnu basaa nunna hungluga kachung sa drwe.
Kasemna talei tomnu lung lak pi ta thang nge; talei ti thuk mak briakpina haga barapka mong thou rwe.
Atiyeda nisat nat kanu kaan bi haga phouchaan ta damme khatle bakamong ta mak briakpina baowei ta damme.
Tachi kasemna kaling lak pi ta thang nge; kaling gana thou kaluga ha ding ga zin lemme khatle haga bakraa kraalan rwe.
Atiyeda talei kasanu riak pi ta thangnu tachi gana mong thou rwe khatle sing thouluga bakraa kraa rwe: kasemna somthum, kasemna somruk khatle kasemna raza kraa rwe.”
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo!”
Maan baraanto ongnu kaan bi Bakim bi ong qwat ongnu rwan le potroi pat somga kani gana chongchak lang bi Bakhou ngai rwe.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Rikrwang om krwang talei om inthim chong ga thei dam lang haga nani khou pi thangnuwe; atiyeda langkaang la ongnu mi nun khou balang bing bi chongchak toga rin thang nge,
‘Bani mu bi mulune atiyeda theilaye, Ngai bi ngaisulune atiyeda bakaba theilaye; Ati make dabe bani han hungluga bani om noh bing kok thang dingnuwe.’ ”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Heiba chongchak heiya nani thei makpo? Ati dabe nanina chongchak bing nga tatoga theinu ngam dingbo?
Tachi bwannu manpa gana chongkaang bwannuwe.
Lampui paan bi chongkaang bwan thang damnu riak ka hei rwanne. Banina ngaisunu kaan bi Seitaan na barapka hungluga bani sung bi bwan thang damnu chongkaang ga lou sat tamme.
Hadanga lung lak pi bwan thangnu gana hei rwanne, banina chongkaang ga ngaisunu kaan bi barapka karoga lou thang nge;
haga bani khou bakamong ta make, bakaan taoiza khaang thang nge. Haba nung bi sacham lang chungna riangre kanang mak tabe rainu hungnu kaan bi bani barapka balumtaye.
Kaling lak pi bwan thangnu rwan gana hei rwanne; bani ga chongkaang ngaisunu nunne,
atiga talei ram om katop, lan om minamnu le pot katei ding bathainu ha bing gana chongkaang ding ga namdan damme khatle haga bakraa kraa maknu to rwe.

Atiyeda talei kasa bi ta thangnu gana hei rwanne, banina chongkaang ga ngaisuluga haga lou thang rwe khatle bakraa kraa rwe: kasemna saruk somthum, kasemna saruk somruk khatle kasemna saruk raza kraa rwe.”
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina thaomei ga luklei thwei bi thang lang mak tabe ria thwei bi dung thang lang lou hungnu zunggabo? Haga badung riak pi thang lang makpo?
Balangbe indao swak makka inthim thang dingnu khatchale maake khatle baannu bi indao swakla dingnu inkam thang dingnu khatchale maake.
Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo.”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nanina ngaisunu ga cheksinno. Nanina mi khat lang badat thangnu dat kana nani khou le badat thanglune; ngai ongnu nani khou inkuga pi thanglune.
Balangbe tudannu ka amnu bakhou ga inkuga pi thanglune; atiyeda ka maaknu bakhouna baom ka amnu ga tangga lou sat tamlune.”
Maanna rinne, “Rikrwang om krwang talei ga manpa pakhatna talei bi tachi bwan thangnu ga dannuwe.
Maan zingpha in rwe khatle thamlai thou lat rwe; atiga bamu ga nge swakluga mong thou rwe, atiyeda haga tatoga sing thounubo dinu maan bahakna thei make.
Balangbe taleina baraanto bakraa pi kraaye: kama bi bana pi kasat swake atiga saangui pi swak thang nge; haba nung bi bamu pi nat thang nge.
Atiyeda tapaan ga minnu kaan bi aatnu kaan ga hung briakpina maanna sangkhwei chwei thouluga haba kahan bi ga aat rwe.”
Jisu na rinne, “Rikrwang om krwang talei ga anina pa-aam le diga rin kaba dingbo? Anina paaam chongchak sizinluga bachu thang langbo?
Haga talei bi bwan thangnu bamu khon bina sin kataknu ancham mu khat tannuwe;
atiyeda haga bwan thangnu kaan bi mongkaluga lou kung bing lak pina lian kataknu to rwe khatle babaak kaliannu su swakluga basaang la zwangnu basaa nunna haba om nilim bi bakabu hungkai rwe.”
Jisu na bani khou atinu chongchak inza, banina ngai ngam basaan chong kabia thang ngaake.
Atiyeda Maanna chongchak sui makka bani khou rin mak ngaake. Bani raantoza ongnu kaan bi Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou ha bing bathiangga rin thang ngaake.
Habani bahak khwazinren tanu kaan bi Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Ani tuipui raan la takan swakcho.”
Banina mi khang ding bathan satnu nung, Jisu na ong ngaaknu li bi potroi rwan ga khutluga banina Bating kalwang rwe. Bakim bi liswan tamga am ngaake.
Habei ga thirwei kanatnu hung rwe khatle tui kabaapnu gana li bi hung bwei briakpina li ga tuina sipka rwe.
Atiyeda Jisu ba li kamei la lukham khamluga inthi ong ngaake. Banina Bating bathou thouluga rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, ani braan ding rwe, Nang rakhi thanglabo?”
Maanna thouluga thirwei ding tweiluga tuipui ding rin rwe, “Bazaang taro, rim rimmo!” Habei ga thiraang ga lan drwe khatle tuipui ga rim rim ta drwe.
Maanna potroi rwan khou rinne, “Nani pa-aam lang heitia kachinubo? Nani khou balumsat maaknuwa tatonu ombo?”
Atiga bani nun kachi tak ngaak rwe khatle bani cham khatna khat khou rinne, “Thiraang le tuipuina tangga Bachong zei ongnu Maan heiya tatonu Mi ngaak tingbo!”
Bani tuipui raan khat la takan swakluga Gadara taram la hung rwe.
Jisu na li bina swak khap tinu le, thaanmwan lana hungnu bathiang maknu katha khutnu manpa khatna Bating kadou ngaake,
maan thaanmwan lak pi ong ngaake; pakhatchanale bating parei ruina hakna bangnu ngam make,
balangbe bating thin rui le parei ruina bang thang batwan ngaake. Maanna parei rui ga kaichat sate khatle thin rui ga to katup sat ngaake; tupai khatchanale bating pi tehnu ngam mak ngaake.
Bakaan bathin, zingpha thamlai rammwan la khatle thaanmwan la paoga baraanto bating lungna ret bazam ga ong ngaake.
Maanna Jisu ding namlaa lamangna phaangmunu kaan bi pak hungluga Bating kalum rwe.
Maanna pao rakanga rinne, “Basaang kataknu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa, Jisu, Nang le ei paaam barui bazem ambo? Nangna ating rai thang mak lang eina Rikrwang ding kaisingga Nating kalumme.”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Bathiang maknu katha, heiba manpa khouna swak tro!”
Habei ga Jisu na bakhou ngai rwe, “Nameng tatobo?” Maanna katake, “Ameng Legion diga kouwe; balangbe ani tamme.”
Maanna Jisu khou bani ding haba taram bina kazun sat thang mak lang rakanga kalum rwe.
Haba kaan bi ga rammwan kim la bok nun khatna basaak timsa ong ngaake.
Ri kasia bing gana Jisu khou hweiga rinne, “Ani ding bok nun khou khut za lang ani ding bani khou bathan thang ngo.”

Haba kahan bi Jisu na bani ding za thang rwe. Habei ga bathiang maknu katha nun gana swakluga bok nun khou khut rwe, bok nun ga raching ni khak ngaake khatle bok nun ga batok bariak thei makka rakanga pak tasuk taluga tuipui la ta imphum loi drwe.
Bok sian ngaaknu nun gana pak seluga banina swak tamnu ga nampui le taram la bapu rwe. Atiga swak tamnu bing ga phaang lang bani se swak rwe.
Banina Jisu kim la hungnu kaan bi ri kasia khutnu legion am ngaaknu manpa ga pwan sinluga badung ongnu khatle mi tak imbeiga ongnu ga mu rwe. Atiga bani kachi ngaake.
Haga mu damnu mi nunna ri kasia khutnu manpa khou tatoga swak tamnubo dinu lang bi khatle bok nun lang bi bani khou rin thang ngaake.
Haba nung bi bani om taram bina Bating se swak tam lang bathem thou rwe.
Jisu na li sung bi khut tamnu kaan bi ri kasia khutnu manpa gana Banung sui se lang Bakhou kalumga rin ngaake.

Atiyeda Jisu na bating za thang make atiyeda bakhou rinne, “Nain la khatle nabaan rwan khou sero, Pukraangba na nalaang tasiatnu chwan to thang damnu khatle Maanna nating heitia lang kriang thang damnu lang bi bani khou bapuro.”
Maanna se swakluga Jisu na bakhou to thang damnu bing ga Decapolis la kasam thou rwe khatle mi bingza loh lo ngaake.
Jisu li bina tuipui raan khat la takan swak latnu kaan bi mi khang pui Bakim bi hung rwe khatle Maan tuipui paan la ong ngaake.
Phaang ngo, Jairus tiga kounu synagogue om kai thangnu lak pi pakhatna hungluga Jisu ding munu kaan bi Baket kim bi in balumtaluga
Bating rakanga kalumga rin rwe, “Asa kamaisa swan thi ding ga in ong amme. Maan sa latluga ring lang hungluga balu chung bi Nakutna banaan thang ngo.”
Habei ga Jisu maan le se ngaake khatle mi khang puina le Banung suisega Bating sui bwat ong ngaake.
Habei ga sangwan somga kani thi se ongnu mannu pakhat am ngaake,
maan kathiam taswang khak khou phaangluga riangrenu dou ngaak rwe. Baom ka am bing maanna ting beida maan sa mak ngaake atiyeda sia khit khit ngaake.
Maanna Jisu cham ga ngaisunu kaan bi mi nun lak pi Banung la hungluga Bapwan banaan ngaake.
Balangbe maanna baning ngaake, “Eina Bapwan za beida banaan suwe dabe ei salune.”
Haba kahan bi thi se ongnu ga lan drwe khatle bapum bi naa ongnu sa maknu tanat ka sa drwe dinu bapum bi thei rwe.
Jisu na haba kahan bi ga Bakhouna nat swak trwe dinu Maan theiluga mi nun ding phaang koiluga rinne, “Tuna Apwan banaannubo?”
Atiyeda Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Nating mi khangna sui bwat ongnuwa Nang mu beida Nangna rinne, ‘Ating tuna banaannubo?’ ”
Jisu na Bating banaan damnu mannu ding ga mu lang phaang koi ong ngaake.
Mannu gana bakhou pa-aam swak tambo dinu ga theiluga kachi kathokka hungluga Bameithaan bi in bakhuptaluga bazenu bing ga Bakhou rin thang rwe.
Habei ga Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Asa kamaisa, nabalumsat paanbina nating pi sa thang rwe, dai bazaangga sero khatle naom tanat ka sa dam dingro.”
Jisu na atiga kabia ongnu kaan bi synagogue om kai thangnu in lana mi kasemna hungluga rin rwe, “Nasa kamaisa ga thi drwe. Bachuthangnupa ding pa-aam lang to katop lat ongnubo?”
Kabia swak tamnu chong ga Jisu na thei khap tinu kaan bi Maanna synagogue om kai thangnu khou rinne, “Kachi mako; balumba balumsawo.”
Jisu na Peter, James le banao John ding makka mi katei ding Banung sui lang za thang mak ngaake.
Maan synagogue om kaithangnupa in bi hungnu kaan bi kasao kabao ga ongnu khatle chap barung hingga chap ongnu ga mu rwe.
Jisu na khutnu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rin rwe, “Pa-aam toga nani kasao kabaoga chap ongnubo? Naosen ga thi make atiyeda in ongnu zung nge.”

Habei ga banina bating balaa ga banui rwe. Atiyeda Maanna bani khangsung ding langkaang la pi swakluga, haba naosen nu pa le maan le ong bachamnu nun ding kalwangluga naosen in ongnu riak la khut rwe.
Maanna naosen kut ka choiluga bakhou rinne, “Talitha Cumi,” bakabana “Kamaisa swan, Eina nakhou rinne, lon thouro” dinuwe.
Haba kahan bi kamaisa swan ga lon thouluga se rwe, balangbe maan sangwan somga kani ngaak rwe. Habei ga bani mi nun ga loh lonuna sip rwe.
Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou haga pakhatchanale thei mak ting ngo diga katip thang ngaake khatle kamaisa swan lang sa lang thaisaak kasem pi thangbiyo diga zathang pi thang ngaake.
Maan habei gana se swakluga Banampui la hung rwe khatle Baom potroi rwan le Banung sui hung ngaake.

Sabbath ni hungnu kaan bi Maanna synagogue pi bachu thang thou rwe. Maanna kabianu ngaisunu mi bingna loh lo ga rinne, “Hei bing nga heiba manpana inlampaina lousunubo? Heitia tasiatnu chwan bing nga Bakutna tonu ngam lang tuna Bakhou ningting pi thangnubo!
Heiya thing chwan tonu, Mary Sa Kapaisa, James, Joses, Judas le Simon tang ga makpo? Banao kamaisa rwan le ani kim bi ongnu makpo?” Atiga bani Balang bi ket basui rwe.
Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Thiamting pakhat ting bataleina, bain thirui nun lak pi khatle bain inkhun bahakna makka bariak thin takhwang to maknu make.”
Maanna habei ga kasa kanaa mi kasem lu chung bi Bakut kai thouluga bani ding pi sa thangnu ga makka katei tasiatnu chwan tonu ngam mak ngaake.
Habei ga banina Bating balumsa mak briakpina Maan loh lo rwe. Haba nung bi Maanna nam nam la se koiluga bachu thang ngaake.
Maanna potroi rwan pat somga kani ding Bakim bi kou hungluga bani ding pat ni pat ni toga lang thang rwe khatle bathiang maknu katha nun ding ngam lang bani khou ngam pi thang rwe.
Bani lamsek lang sungrwan makka katei khao, uilu, bani kongkhaak pi sian phun mak lang
atiyeda sandal twang lang khatle talathu kani bathu mak lang Jisu na bani khou zathang pi thang rwe.
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina in bi khutnu kaan bi nanina haba riak pina se swak lat mak basaan habei ga ong ngo.

Tudannuna nani ding lou thang make dabe khatle nani chong ngai thang make dabe, nanina habei gana se swaknu kaan bi bani maitwang bi sake toga nani ket pi kaphut ka kathing ta basiawo. Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, chongsem lumik pi ga Sodom le Gomorrah na haba namlian ma inkuga laak thangnu ga khaangsalune!”
Atiga bani se swakluga mi nun sung le langna sacham kasam rwe.
Banina ri kasia inza ding kazun sat thang rwe khatle naanu mi inza ding thao kanun thangluga bani ding pi sa thang rwe.

Krwang Herod na Jisu lang bi thei ngaak rwe, balangbe Bameng ga se thou ngaak rwe. Herod na rinne, “Baptize to thangnu John thi bina ring thou lat rwe atibriakpina heiba ngam bing nga bakhou am ongnuwe.”
Kateina rinne, “Haga Elijah zung nge.” Atiga kateina rinne, “Haga Thiamting khat chung nge mak tabe haga thiamting rwan lak pi pakhat tannuwe.”
Herod na haga theisunu kaan bi maanna rinne, “Heiya eina baring tan damnu John zung nge; maan thi bina ring thou lat rwe!”
Balangbe Herod maan bahakna lang thangluga banao Philip mei Herodias lang chungna John ding namluga bating qwan in bi bang thang ngaake; balangbe Herod na Herodias ting lou ngaake.
Atibriakpina John na Herod khou rin ngaake, “Nanao mei ding nangna lou lang za make.”
Haba om langna Herodias na John maitwang bi tu tu tam tam ngaake khatle bating athat nwam ngaake atiyeda maan ngam mak ngaake;

balangbe John ga bazenu khatle bathiangnu miye dinu theiga Herod na bating kachi ngaake khatle bating athat mak lang ngaak thang ong ngaake. John na to damnu chwan bing ga Herod na ngaisunu kaan bi basung bi loh lo ong ngaake atiyeda maan karoga ngai ngaake.
Haba nung bi Herod na bating ponnu bangei lumik hung tangnu kaan bi baom kasei kalian nun, kraan milu nun khatle Galilee taram om milu nun ding bu ke ongnu kaan bi badou chanu lumik ka hung rwe.

Herodias sa rangaaknuna khutluga laam rwe, atiga Herod khatle maan le ong bachamnu mi nun ding pi pem thang rwe, krwangna rangaaknu khou rinne, “Nangna bathainu ga akhou niyo, eina haga nalaang pi thangne.”
Maanna atiga le karen thang ngaake, “Pa-aam ngaak le nangna akhou ninu ga akrwang talei baang khat tangga eina nalaang pi thangne.”
Rangaaknu gana seluga banu khou rin rwe, “Ei pa-aam ni langbo?” Banuna rinne, “Baptize to thangnu John lu ga niyo!”
Haba kahan bi rangaaknu gana krwang khou barapka hungluga ni rwe, “Nangna butheng bi baptize to thangnu John lu thangluga alaang heiba kahan bi pinu ei bathaiye.”
Habei ga krwang basung riangre tak ngaak rwe; atiyeda bachongren khatle maan le ong bachamnu mi nun lang chungna krwangna bating za maknu bathai lan rwe.
Haba kahan bi ga krwangna mi athatnu mi ding lang thangluga John lu lou hung lang zathang pi rwe. Atiga maan qwan in la seluga John ring tan rwe,
balu ga butheng bi thangluga pon hung rwe khatle rangaaknu khou hung pi rwe; atiga rangaaknu gana haga banu khou pi rwe.
John om potroi rwanna haga theinu kaan bi banina bapum ga hung louluga thaan bi ri thang rwe.
Chonglang rwan Jisu kim bi hung kadoiluga banina to damnu khatle bachu thang damnu bing ga Bakhou hung pu rwe.
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Hungro ani mi chiknu riak la seluga bakaan kasem basakrizo.” Balangbe se swak sekhutnu mi tamlaiga bani sa in lang hakna bakaan maak ngaake.
Atiga bani nun li hwanluga mi chuk chik maknu riak la bani raantoza thou dam ngaake.

Atiyeda bani thou damnu ga mi khangna mu ngaake khatle banina Jisu ding bapu thei briakpina namlian bing lana bani nung ketna suizon hung rwe. Mi khang gana bani meithaan hung tang kamaluga Jisu kim bi hung kadoi rwe.

Jisu li bina swaknu kaan bi mi khang pui ding mu rwe khatle bani sian thang lang maaknu zao nun dan briakpina bani ding phaangluga kriang rwe. Habei ga Maanna bani ding balang tamga bachu thang thou ngaake.
Khwazinren tanu kaan bi Baom potroi rwanna Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “Heiya mi chiknu riak chung nge khatle bakaan le rei rwe.
Amqwat ongnu taram le nam nam la banina seluga uilu kalei lang bani ding pi sedro; balangbe bani sa lang khatchale maak rwe.”
Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou katake, “Nanina bani lang sa lang kasem pi thangbiyo.” Banina Bakhou rinne, “Anina seluga denari raza ni om uilu kaleiluga bani lang sa lang pi thangbiyo dinubo?”
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani khou uilu inza ambo? Seluga phaang ngo.” Banina phaang seluga rin rwe, “Uilu impaang le ngaa kani amme.”
Habei ga Jisu na bani nun ding ga ba annu lousam daam chung bi badoi badoi toga pi badung ta lang bani khou zathang pi rwe.
Atiga bani nun mi raza raza, somnga somnga om baren baren toga pi badung ta rwe.

Maanna uilu impaang le ngaa kani ga lou luga tambaan la batoukaluga rithoi thang rwe khatle uilu ga thiak bak luga bani khou kasem thang lang Baom potroi rwan khou pi rwe; Maanna ngaa kani ga le bani khangsung lang kasem thang rwe.
Bani khangsung saluga imba rwe.
Habei ga banina uilu katup le ngaa katup ka luklei somga kani sipka khom thou ngaake.
Uilu hungsa ngaaknu mi sing ga kapaisa mi raching impaang khak ngaake.
Maanna mi khang ding bathan sat ongnu kahan bi Baom potroi rwan ding li bi pi khutluga Bameithaan se dam lang tuipui raan khat la amnu Bethsaida taram la pi takan swak ngaake.
Maanna bani ding bathan sat thangnu nung rammwan la kalum lang se rwe.
Khwazinren tanu dat pi li ga tuipui zai la am ngaake; atiyeda Maan tui paan la Baraantoza am ngaake.

Bani nun riangre takka li hwan ongnu ga Jisu na mu rwe, balangbe thiraangna bani maitwang bi raang hung ngaake. Atiga balinu rangkaan dat pi Jisu na potroi rwan kim bi tuipui chung bi ketna se hung rwe khatle Maan bani ding sekhan lang to ngaake.
Maan tuipui chung bi ketna se hungnanu banina muluga haga to bathaanu ri ngaakchung rwe diga baningga pao rwe;
balangbe bani khangsungna Bating muluga bani kachi tak ngaak rwe. Haba kahan bi Jisu na bani le chong kabiaga bani khou rinne, “Sung raang ngo! Ei zung nge; kachi mako.”
Habei ga Maan bani kim bi li bi ka rwe khatle thiraang ga raang lan drwe. Habei ga bani taswang khak loh lo rwe.
Balangbe bani sung nat briakpina banina uilu impaang om lang bi khatchale bakaba thei mak ngaake.
Banina tuipui ga takan swakluga Gennesaret taram la hungluga li ga tui paan bi bang thang rwe.
Bani nun li bina tanu kaan bi mi nunna haba kahan bi Jisu ding bapu thei rwe,
habei ga mi nunna amqwatnu taram bing bi pakkoi seluga kasa kanaa bing ding bani ria bi thangluga Jisu ongme dinu theinu riak pi pon hung thou rwe.

Nam bing bi, namlian bing bi mak tabe inmwan bing bi Jisu na khut thangnu riak om keithian bi banina naanu bing ding hung thang ngaake khatle banina Bapwan hum za beida banaan su lang Bakhou hweini ngaake. Atiga Bating banaan sunu bing ding pi sa thang rwe.
Atiga Jerusalem lana hungnu Pharisee rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwan mi kasem Jisu kim bi hung ong kadoi ngaake.
Baom potroi rwan kasemna tanaat ka, dinuba kut kasin makka uilu sanu banina munu kaan bi banina koi ga dou rwe.
Balangbe Pharisee rwan le Jihudi rwan bingna bani patso rwan chaang nung suiga banina cheksinga kut kasin makka sa make.
Banina keithian lana hungnu kaan bi bani kasin bathiang make dabe sa in make. Katei banina to ongnu chaang bing lak pi ngai, ben, thinzin ben khatle ria kasin bathiangnu hei bing nge.
Habei ga Pharisee rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Bakhou ngai ngaake, “Pa-aam toga Naom potroi rwanna patso rwan chaang bazei makka kut kasin makka uilu sa ongnubo?”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Isaiah na sathot tonu nani lang bi rin basaam thang nge, ‘Heiba mi nunna bani mun zana Ating takhwang towe, Atiyeda bani sung ba Akhouna namlaaga amme.
Mi nun om zathang ding zekrin danga bachu thangga, Banina Ating baha bi kalumme.’
Balangbe nanina Rikrwang om zathang ding bathan satluga, mi nun om chaang ding choitipe. Hagazo ben le ngai kasinne khatle hadannu katei tamgale nanina kasinne.”
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina nani om chaang ding ngaak langna Rikrwang om zathang ding pen sate.
Balangbe Moses na rinne, ‘Nanu napa ding takung tazeiyo’ khatle ‘Tudannu banu bapa ding rin basiatnu bating ga to that ting gaye.’
Atiyeda nanina rinne, ‘Mi khatna banu mak tabe bapa khou, “Nang akhouna phang dingnu dam ga Corban ne” dinuba Rikrwang khou rikhaang pot toga khaang drwe diga rinne dabe,
bani banu bapa ding khatchale to thang lat lang maak rwe diga rinluga
nani om seta ongnu chaang om langna Rikrwang chong ding bathaang maaknu pi to rwe. Atiga hadannu chwan tamga nanina towe.”
Maanna mi khang ding Bakim bi kou hungluga bani khou rinne, “Eina rin ongnuwa nani khangsung ngaiyo khatle bakaba theiyo:
Mi khat khou langkaang bina khutluga bating to tanaatnu ngamnu pot khatchale maake; atiyeda bakhouna swaknu bing gana mi khat ting to tanaatnuwe.
Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo!”
Jisu na mi khang ding thangsialuga in khat pi khutnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwanna haba chongchak om lang bi Bakhou ngai rwe.
Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani le haba kaba ga thei makpo? Langkaanglana mi khat khou khut tamnu gana bating to tanaatnu make dinu nani thei makpo,
balangbe sakhut tamnu gana balungning bi ta thang make atiyeda bon bi ta thangluga langkaang la swak lat tamme atibriakpina thaisaak bing bathiang nge.”
Jisu na rinne, “Misa khat sung lana swaknu gana mi pakhat ting to tanaatnuwe.
Balangbe basung lana, dinuba misa sung lana sa maknu lungning, rwan mei rwan basan laannu, lungmaannu, mi athatnu,
barusanu, ra-aamnu, sa maknu, rou sianu, imbet boulaanu, sa maknu mik, rin basiatnu, lian tonu khatle kapangnu swake.
Kasianu hei bing nga sung lana swakluga mi khat ting to tanaatnuwe.”
Jisu na habei gana swakluga Tyre le Sidon taram la thou drwe. Atiga Maan in khat pi khut rwe, Maan habei ong nge dinu mi khatcha khou hakna pi thei nwam mak ngaake atiyeda Maan inkamnu ngamlan rwe.
Balangbe basa kamaisa swan khou bathiang maknu katha khutnu mannu gana Jisu lang bi ngaisuluga hung rwe khatle Baket pi hung in bakhupta rwe.
Haba mannu ga banu pok pina Syro-Phoenicia om Greek rwan mannuwe, maanna ri kasia ding ga basa kamaisa khouna kazun sat thang lang Jisu khou hweini lat latka ong ngaake.
Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Naosen rwan ga sa imba kama dingriyo, balangbe naosen rwan om uilu ga louluga ui swan nun lang bazwan thangnu sa make.”
Mannu gana Jisu khou katake, “Bazeye, Pukraangba, atiyeda naosen rwan om sa kadaak tanu ga table thwei bi ui swan nunna le kachungsa dabo.”
Habei ga Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Sero, nangna heiba chong nga rin briakpina ri kasia ga nasa kamaisa khouna swak trwe.”
Maanna bain la hungnu kaan bi ri kasia ga basa kamaisa khouna swak tamnu khatle basa kamaisa ga ria bi in ongnu hung dou rwe.
Jisu na Tyre le Sidon taram bina se swak latluga Decapolis taram zai Galilee tuipui paan la hung rwe.
Habei ga kana setnu le chong thei chui maknu pakhat ting Bakhou kalwang hungluga balu chung bi Bakut banaan thang lang mi nunna Bakhou hweini ngaake.
Jisu na haba manpa ding mi khang lak pina kalwang swakluga bakanaa kani bi bakutzung sun thang rwe khatle Maanna bachin thangluga babalei bi banaan thang rwe.
Maanna tambaan la phaangkaluga kaphuk kasei kaiga bakhou rinne, “Ephphatha,” bakabana “Lat swakro” dinuwe.
Haba kahan bi bakanaa lat swak rwe, lwam ongnu babalei ga le lat swak rwe khatle Maan chong bathiangga kabia rwe.
Maanna bani khou pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako diga zathang pi thang rwe; atiyeda Maanna bani khou zathang pi thang beida banina haga inkuga rin indao thou dam ngaake.
Banina rin lang thei makka loh lo ga rinne, “Maanna pum brumza to chuiga to rwe. Kana setnu ding pi sa thang rwe khatle chong thei maknu ding le chong pi kabia thang rwe.”
Haba kaan bi mi khang ga tam tak ngaake khatle sa in lang khatchale maak briakpina Jisu na Baom potroi rwan ding Bakim bi kou hungluga bani khou rinne,
“Ei heiba mi khang ding nga kriang nge, balangbe bani Ei le ong bachamnu ni thum rwe khatle bani sa lang khatchale maak rwe.
Eina bani ding bani in la bon chaamga bathan thang nge dabe bani lampui bi tathiat ponnu le zaye; balangbe bani mi kasemba namlaa lamangna hungnuwe.”
Habei ga Jisu om potroi rwanna Bakhou katake, “Heipai ramhaang biya mi nun ding tatoga uilu pi sa imbanu ngam ding gabo?”
Jisu na bani khou ngaiye, “Nani khou uilu inza ambo?” Banina “Siari amme” diga katak rwe.

Maanna mi khang ding ga talei bi ongta lang zathang pi rwe. Maanna uilu siari ga lou luga swanka thang rwe khatle haga thiak bakluga bani khou kasem thang lang Baom potroi rwan khou pi rwe; atiga banina haga mi khang khou kasem thang rwe.
Bani khou ngaa swan kasem le am ngaake; Maanna ha ga le rithoi thangluga bani khou kasem thang lang rin rwe.
Atiga bani saluga imba rwe khatle balei thangnu bakatup ka luklei pui siari khom thou ngaake.
Uilu sa damnu mi sing ga raching bali khak ngaake. Atiga Maanna bani ding bathan thang rwe.
Haba kahan bi Maan Baom potroi rwan le diga li hwanluga Dalmanutha taram la hung rwe.
Pharisee rwanna swakluga Bakhou chong kae thou rwe khatle Bating tamga tambaan lana badannu khat bani khou pi mu thang lang Bakhou rin ngaake.

Atiyeda Maan sung katopka Bakatha kaphuk kasei kaiga rinne, “Heiba mikinna pa-aam lang badannu ding rakanga zongnubo? Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, heiba mikin khou badannu khatchale pi thangla rwe.”
Maanna bani ding thangsialuga li hwanluga tui raan khat la takan swak tam ngaake.
Potroi rwanna uilu phun banim ngaake atiga li sung bi banina phun ongnu uilu khat makka katei bani khou maak ngaak rwe.
Jisu na bani khou chongtan piga rinne, “Nani Pharisee rwan le Herod om khai bina barak theiyo khatle cheksinno.”
Atiga banina bani cham lak pi kathuiga rinne, “Heiya ani khou uilu maak briakpina Maanna rinnuwe.”

Atiyeda Jisu na ha ding theiluga bani khou rinne, “Nanina uilu maak briakpina rwe diga pa-aam lang kakhan ongnubo? Nani atun tangga mu mak aangbo mak tabe thei mak aangbo? Nani sung atun tangga nat ong maangbo?
Mik phun beida nani mu makpo? Kana phun beida nani ngaisu makpo? Nani baningsu makpo?
Eina kapaisa mi raching impaang lang uilu impaang thiak baknu kaan bi balei thangnu bakatup ka luklei sipnu inza nanina khom thoubo?” Banina, “Somga kaniye” diga Bakhou rin rwe.
“Eina mi raching bali lang uilu siari thiak baknu kaan bi balei thangnu bakatup ka luklei pui sipnu inza nanina khom thoubo?” Banina, “Siariye” diga rin rwe.
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Tatoga nanina bakaba thei maknubo?”
Haba nung Jisu Bethsaida la hung rwe khatle banina mik chonu pakhat ting Bakhou phun hungluga bating banaan thang lang Jisu khou hweini ngaake.
Maanna mik chonu ding ga kut kailuga inmwan paan la kalwang swak rwe. Atiga Maanna bamik pi bachin thangluga bakhou Bakut banaan thangluga paaam phaangmubo diga ngai rwe.
Maanna batou thouluga rinne, “Eina mi nun ding thingkung danga se ongnu ding muwe.”
Jisu na bamik pi Bakut banaan thang latluga bating pi batou thou rwe. Atiga maan sa latluga pum brum ding mu bathiang rwe.
Jisu na bating bain la bathan thangluga rinne, “Nang inmwan sung bi khutlanro khatle inmwan bi pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako.”
Jisu na Baom potroi rwan le diga Caesarea Philippi bi amnu inmwan bing bi seluga Maanna lampui bi Baom potroi rwan khou ngai rwe, “Mi nunna Ating Tu we diga rinbo?”
Banina katake, “Mi kasemna baptize to thangnu John ne diye, atiyeda mi kasemna Elijah ye diye khatle mi katei rwanna thiamting rwan lak pi pakhate diga rinne.”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atiyeda nanina Eiya Tu we dibo?” Peter na Bakhou katake, “Nang Christa gaye.”
Haba nung bi Jisu na bani khou Balang bi pakhatcha khou hakna banina rin swak mak lang rakanga chongtan pi thang rwe.

Jisu na bani khou Misa Sa Kapaisa ga riangrenu taswang khak khaanglu rwe, atiga patso rwan, takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna za maklune khatle Bating athatlune atiyeda ni thum nung ring thou latlune diga bachu thang thou rwe.
Heiba chong nga Maanna bathiangga rin rwe. Habei ga Peter na Bating kalwang swakluga Bating twei thou rwe.
Jisu na kanei swakluga potroi rwan ding phaangluga Maanna Peter ding twei ga rinne, “Seitaan, Anung la thou dammo! Balangbe nangna Rikrwang om lang bi kakhan make atiyeda mi nun om lang biye.”

Maanna mi nun khatle Baom potroi rwan ding le Bakhou kou hungnu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Tudannu Anung sui nwamnu maan ga, baraanto bating za mak ting ngo khatle baom cross ka lou thouluga Anung sui ding ngo.
Balangbe tudannuna bakatha ding kan nwamnu maan ga baraanlune atiyeda Alaang chungna khatle sacham lang chungna bakatha braannu mi gana bakatha kanthangnu lousulune.
Balangbe mi khatna talei ram bing balaang lousuluga bakatha braanne dabe balaang pa-aam tongnu ambo?
Mak tabe mi khatna bakatha lang chungna paaam le takhenebo?

Balangbe rwan mei rwan basan laannu khatle noh tonu mikin biya Alaangna khatle Achongkaang langna kazaknu maan ga Misa Sa Kapaisana Bapa om lwat liannu bi bathiangnu tambaan chonglang rwan le diga hungnu kaan bi balang bi kazaklune.”
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei ga ngam lianga hungnu banina mu mak basaan thinu batemla dingnu mi kasem abeiya han ongme.”
Ni karuk nung bi Jisu na Peter, James khatle John ding kalwangluga basaangnu rammwan la ka ngaake; atiga Maan bani meithaan bi Baman gon swak rwe.
Bapwan ga kabun danga ngou takka baan swak rwe, talei ram bi pwan kasinnu pakhatchanale pwan ga hadanga pi ngounu ngam make.
Habei ga bani khou Elijah le Moses ting pi mu thang rwe, atiga barwei Jisu le diga chong kabia ong ngaake.
Haba nung bi Peter na Jisu khou rinne, “Rabbi, ani abeiya ongnu sa rwe, anina pwan in inthum: Nalaang khat, Moses lang khat atiluga Elijah lang khat bacharizo.”
Balangbe bani kachi lai briakpina Peter na pa-aam kabia dingbo dinu thei mak ngaake.
Habei ga tambu khat hungluga bani ding hwam lem rwe khatle tambu lak pina khwan khatna rinne, “Heiya Eina kriangnu Asa Kapaisa ye, Maanna rinnu zeiyo.”
Thei mak daakka banina phaang koi swaknu kaan bi Jisu bani le ong bachamnu makka mi katei pakhatcha ding le mulan rwe.
Banina rammwan lana tanu kaan bi Misa Sa Kapaisana thi bina ring thou lat mak basaan banina mu damnu ga pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako diga Maanna bani khou zathang pi thang ngaake.
Atiga thinu nun lak pina ring thou latnu om bakabazo pa-aambo diga heiba chong nga banina bani raantoza bani sung bi katip thang ngaake.
Banina Bakhou ngaiye, “Chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna tatoga Elijah hung kama lang nge diga rinnubo?”

Maanna bani khou katake, “Batak takka Elijah na hung kamaluga pot bing nga pi hanchin thanglune. Atiga paaam toga Misa Sa Kapaisa om lang bi Maanna riangre kanang inza khaanglune khatle Bating phaang batanga tolune diga tatoga hiak thangnubo?
Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Elijah ba hung drwe khatle balang bi hiak thangnu ga danga banina to nwamnu bing ga bakhou to thang drwe.”
Maanna potroi rwan khou hungnu kaan bi mi khang puina bani ding ong qwat ongnu Maanna mu rwe khatle chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna bani le kae ong ngaake.
Haba kahan bi ga banina Bating munu kaan bi mi nun ga taswang khak loh lo ngaak rwe khatle Bakhou pak hungluga Bating karoga kadou thang rwe.
Habei ga Maanna chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khou ngai rwe, “Nani nun bani le diga paaam kakhan kale ongnubo?”
Mi khang lak pi pakhatna katake, “Bachuthangnupa, eina chong swak maknu ri kasia khutnu asa kapaisa ding Nakhou phun hung nge.

Bathiang maknu katha na bating namnu kaan bi banina bating talei bi pi balumtaye, maan bachinphon swake, bangaa le ei karit thouwe khatle bapum ga inrin thouwe. Atiga Eina Naom potroi rwan khou bathiang maknu katha ding ga kazun sat thang lang rin ngaake atiyeda banina ngam make.”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “He balumsat maaknu mikin, Ei nani le diga inchan tangga ong bacham lang maangbo? Ei nani le diga inchan tangga khaang ong lang maangbo? Bating Akhou kalwang hung ngo.”

Haba nung bi banina kapaisa swan ding Bakhou phun hung rwe. Bathiang maknu katha gana Jisu ding munu kaan bi katha na haba kahan bi kapaisa swan ding nam katat rwe khatle bamun bina bachinphon swak ka maan talei bi in kalwei ngaake.
Jisu na bapa khou ngaiye, “Bakhou ati ongnuwa inchan bakhwa seirubo?” Maanna katake, “Naosen badona zung rwe.
Katha gana bating to braan langna bating mei bi khatle tui bi bazwan thang katupe. Atiyeda Nangna pa-aam ngaakle to thangnu ngamme dabe, ani lu chung bi kriang thang ngo khatle paang thang ngo.”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna balumsanu ngamme dabe, balumsanu bakhou ga pot bingza hung tangnu ngamme.”
Haba kahan bi naosen om bapa gana mikthi taga chapka rinne, “Pukraangba, Ei balumsa rwe; aom balumsianu langna paang thang ngo!”

Mi nunna pak kadoi hungnu ga Jisu na munu kaan bi Maanna bathiang maknu katha ding ga tweiga rinne, “Kana setnu khatle chong thei maknu katha, Eina nakhou zathang pinuwe, bakhouna swak tro khatle nang bakhou hung lat lanro!”
Habei ga bathiang maknu katha gana paoga bating nam katat thang sialuga bakhouna swak trwe. Atiga maan thinu dan thou drwe khatle mi taswang khakna rinne, “Maan thi drwe!”
Atiyeda Jisu na bakut choiluga kai thou rwe khatle maan han thou rwe.
Maan insung la khutnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwanna inthimthwei toga Bakhou ngai rwe, “Anina pa-aam to briakpina ha ding ga bathou satnu ngam mak tamnubo?”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Heipai katha kasia ding ga hweininu khatle kalumsannuna makka khatchale bathou satnu ngam make.”
Bani habei gana swakluga Galilee la serwan hung rwe khatle haga pakhatchanale theinu Maan lou nwam mak ngaake.

Balangbe Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou atiga bachu thang ngaake, “Misa Sa Kapaisa ding mi nun kut pi pi swaklu rwe khatle banina Bating athatlune. Atiga Bating athatnu nung Maan ni thum ni ring thou latlune.”
Atiyeda heiba rin ongnu chong nga banina bakaba thei mak ngaake khatle Bakhou ngai lang kachi ngaake.
Haba nung Maan Capernaum bi hung rwe. Atiga Maan insung bi ongnu kaan bi Maanna bani khou ngai rwe, “Nani lampui bi nani cham kae ongnu ga pa-aam dingbo?”
Atiyeda bani thiap thiap ong ngaake, balangbe bani nun lampui bi tuna lian kataknu tolu dingbo diga kae kale ngaake.
Jisu na ongtaluga potroi pat somga kani ding kouluga bani khou rin rwe, “Tudannu kamanu to nwamnu maan ga, kakham kataknu khatle khangsung om swak to ding gaye.”
Haba nung bi Maanna kasinnu naosen khat ting kou hungluga bani lak pi bating pi badung thang rwe. Atiga Maanna bating Bapam bi pon thouluga Maanna bani khou rinne,
“Tudannuna Ameng bi heipai kasinnu naosen khat ting lou thangnu maan ga Ating lou thangnuwe khatle Ating lou thangnu mi gana Ating lou thangnu make atiyeda Ating lang hungnu Bating lou thangnuwe.”
John na bakhou katake, “Bachuthangnupa, ani nung sui se maknu mi pakhatna Nameng bi ri kasia ding bathou satnu anina mu rwe, maan ani nung sui mak briakpina anina bating khaam ngaake.”
Atiyeda Jisu na rinne, “Bating khaam mako, balangbe pakhatchana hakna Ameng bina tasiatnu chwan toluga barapka Alang bi sa maknu kabia ngam make.
Balangbe tudannu nani ding maitwang maknu maan ga ani pek la mi zung nge.
“Balangbe tudannu pakhatna Ameng bina nani Christa omme diga in lang tuidai ngai khatcha beida pi thang nge dabe, Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, maan impha ni beida baom taswan ga braanlaye.
“Atiyeda tudannuna Ating balumsanu heipai kasinnu pakhat ting ket pi basuinu bating ga baring bi saang tak lung khit thangluga tuipui bi sat thang damnu gana balaang sa inku dingnuwe.
Nakutna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga tanchat sat tammo. Kut kani amga khatchale mit lat maknu meikhun bi senu ma, kut thokka ringnu kum lousunu gana nalaang sa inkuwe.
Habei ga ‘Bani om kalung thi make khatle mei ga le mit make.’
“Naketna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga tanchat sat tammo. Ket kani amga khatchale mit lat maknu meikhun bi khutnu ma, ket thokka ringnu kum lousunu gana nalaang sa inkuwe.
Habei ga ‘Bani om kalung thi make, Khatle mei ga le mit make.’
Namikna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga ran sat tammo. Mik kani amga chok ongnu meikhun bi khutnu ma, mik khatcha phunluga Rikrwang om krwang talei khutnu gana nalaang sa inkuwe.
Habei ga ‘Bani om kalung thi make, Khatle mei ga le mit make.’
Balangbe mi bing ding le meina to bathianglune khatle rikhaang pot ting bachina to bathianglune.
“Bachi ya kasanu pote atiyeda bachi gana bathum ga braan damme dabe haga tatoga nanina pi thum lat langbo? Nani lak pi bachi pi ammo, khat le khat dai bazaangga ong ngo.”
Maan habei gana swakluga Jordan raan la amnu Judea taram la hung rwe. Mi nunna Bakim bi hung kadoi lat rwe khatle Maanna bachaang toga bani ding bachu thang lat rwe.
Pharisee rwanna hungluga Bating tamga Bakhou ngaiye, “Mi khatna bamei kanoinuwa zabo?”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Moses na nani khou pa-aam zathang pi thangbo?”
Banina rinne, “Mi khatna mei kanoi chonghiak hiakluga bating kanoi lang Moses na za thang ngaake.”
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani sung nat briakpina Moses na haba chongtan ga hiak thangnuwe.
Atiyeda talei ram dam thou tan bina Rikrwang na ‘kapaisa le kamaisa ding dam thang ngaake.’
‘Atibriakpina kapaisana banu bapa ding bathan thangsialuga bamei le diga karung ding gaye.
‘Atiga barwei pat ni ga pum khatcha to lang nge’; atiga barwei ga pat ni latlan rwe atiyeda pum khatcha to rwe.
Atibriakpina Rikrwang na kai karung thang damnu ga mi khatchanale to kapaang lat mak ting ngo.”
Insung bi Baom potroi rwanna haba om chong lang bi Bakhou ngai lat rwe.
Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Tudannu pakhatna bamei ding kanoi satluga pakhat ting katha latnu maan ga balu chung bi lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe.
Atiga kamaisa khatna babasan ding kanoi satluga kapaisa pakhat khou kalaak late dabe, maan ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe.”
Mi nunna kasinnu naosen rwan ding Jisu na bani ding banaan thang dam lang Bakhou kalwang hung rwe; atiyeda bani ding kalwang hungnu mi nun ding potroi rwanna twei ngaake.
Jisu na haga muluga Maan pem mak takka bani khou rinne, “Kasinnu naosen rwan ga Akhou hung ding ngo bani ding khaam mako; balangbe Rikrwang om krwang talei ga hei rwan dannu nun lang nge.
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tudannu heipai naosen khat tanga Rikrwang om krwang talei ding lou thang maknu maan ga impha ni beida habei ga khutlaye.”
Maanna bani ding Bapam bi pon thou rwe khatle bani lu chung bi Bakut kaising thangluga bani ding rithoi pi thang rwe.
Jisu na lampui bi se hungnu kaan bi mi khatna pak hungluga Bameithaan bi kekhok detaluga Bakhou ngaiye, “Kasanu Bachuthangnupa, ei ringzoknu kum lousu lang pa-aam to langbo?”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna pa-aam lang Ating kasanu diga kounubo? Pakhat tak pakhatcha amnu Rikrwang ga makka kasanu pakhatchale maake.
Nangna zathang bing ga theiye, ‘Lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to mako,’ ‘Mi athat mako,’ ‘Baru sa mako,’ ‘Kakoinu sake pi mako,’ ‘Rwan ding minam mako,’ ‘Nanu napa ding takung tazeiyo.’ ”
Manpa gana bakhou katake, “Bachuthangnupa, hei bing nga ei naosen badona zei hung rwe.”

Haba nung bi Jisu na bating phaangluga kriang rwe khatle bakhou rinne, “Nang khatpa baatmaang nge: Sero, naom ka am bing zwan satluga lungsianu nun lang piyo atiye dabe tambaan la nalaang lan amlune khatle hung ngo, cross ka pon thouluga Anung suiyo.”
Atiyeda maan heiba chong bi riangre rwe khatle sung riangrega thou drwe, balangbe maan lan tam takka am ngaake.
Jisu na phaang koiluga Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Lungsanu nunna Rikrwang om krwang talei khut lang intia kungnubo!”
Bachong bi potroi rwan ga loh lo rwe. Atiyeda Jisu na katak latka bani khou rinne, “Naosen rwan ga, lan bi sung thangnu mi nunna Rikrwang om krwang talei khut lang intia kungnubo!
Lungsanu mi khatna Rikrwang om krwang talei khutnu ma ut khatna kaphin kana bi lon brwannuna bai inkuwe.”
Habei ga bani cham taswang khak lang loh lo ga rin ngaake, “Ati dabe tuna kanthangnu lousu ngam dingbo?”
Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou phaangluga rinne, “Misa lang heiya hung tanglanuwe atiyeda Rikrwang khou hung tanglanu maake; balangbe Rikrwang khou pum brumza hung tangnuwe.”
Habei ga Peter na Bakhou kabia thou rwe, “Phaang thang ngo, anina pum brumza bathan satluga Nanung sui se ongme.”

Jisu na katake, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tudannu pakhatna Alaang chungna mak tabe sacham lang chungna bain balou mak tabe bau banao rwan banu bapa bamei basa rwan mak tabe bataram bathan sate dabe,

atun ring ongnu kum biya rainu le bachamga bani in lou, unao rwan, batang bau rwan, banu rwan, basa rwan khatle in lou badam raza inkuga lousulune atiga hung dingnu bakaan bi le khwa sei ringnu lousulune.
Atiyeda kamanu inzana kakhamnu tolune khatle kakhamnuna kamanu tolune.”

Atiga bani Jerusalem la se lang lampui bi se ong ngaake khatle Jisu na bani meithaan se kama ong ngaake; hei lang bi bani loh lo ngaake. Atiga Banung suinu nun gana kachi ngaake. Habei ga Jisu na potroi pat somga kani ding bani bapek khat la kalwang swak latluga Bakhou pa-aam swak tingbo dinu lang bi bani khou rin thang thou rwe:

“Phaang ngo, ani Jerusalem la se ongme atiga Misa Sa Kapaisa ding takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khou pi swaklune; banina Bating koi impu thangluga athat satlune khatle Bating Gentile rwan khou bachoi thanglune;
banina Bating kiamlune, Bating bweilune, Bakhou bachin thanglune khatle Bating athatlune. Atiga Maan ni thum ni ring thou latlune.”
Haba nung bi Zebedee sa kapaisa James le John na Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, anina ninu bing Nangna ani lang to thangnu bathaiye.”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina nani lang pa-aam to thangnu bathaigabo?”
Banina Bakhou rinne, “Nalwat liannu bi arwei pat ni ding pakhat ting Nakut inchang pek la, pakhat ting Nakut imbei pek la ong lang za thang ngo.”

Jisu na barwei khou rinne, “Narweina ni ongnu ga pa-aambo dinu narwei thei make. Eina in dingnu ngai ga narweina innu ngambo khatle Ating baptize to thangnu bi ga Ating batize to ongnu danga narwei ding baptize tonu ngam dingbo?”

Barweina Bakhou rinne, “Arwei ngam khope.” Jisu na barwei khou rinne, “Batak takka Eina innu ngai ga narweina inlune khatle Ating baptize to thangnu bi ga Ating baptize tonu danga narwei ding baptize tolune;
atiyeda Akut inchang pek la khatle imbei pek la ong dingnu ga Eina pi dingnu make atiyeda haga pi lang daan thang ongnu bani lang nge.”
Potroi pat som gana haga ngaisunu kaan bi banina James le John ding pem mak tak rwe.

Atiyeda Jisu na bani ding Bakhou kou hungluga rinne, “Gentile rwan om bapuba rwanna bani lu chung bi nam danga bapuba to rwe khatle bani om kaliannu nun gana bani lu chung bi ngam chwan ga namga towe dinu nanina theiye.
Nani lak pi ba haga ati mak ting ngo; atiyeda nani lak pi tudannu kaliannu to nwamnu maan gana nani om swak to ding ngo.
Nani lak pi tudannu kamanu to nwamnu maan ga khangsung om swak to ding ngo.

Balangbe Misa Sa Kapaisa gana tangga Bating chwanlaang pi to thang langna hungnu make atiyeda chwanlaang to thang langna khatle mi taswang khak ting ran swak thang lang Bakum ding bathan swak thangnu man toga pi swak thang langna hungnuwe.”

Atiga bani Jericho bi hung rwe. Haba nung Maan Baom potroi rwan le mi khang pui khat le diga Jericho bina se swaknu kaan bi Timaeus sa kapaisa Bartimaeus mik chonu pa lampui paan bi ni saga badung ong ngaake.
Hungnanu ga Nazareth Jisu we dinu maanna ngaisunu kaan bi maanna pao thouga rinne, “David Sa Kapaisa Jisu ating phaangkriang thang ngo!”
Habei ga mi taswang khakna bating thiap thiap ong lang twei rwe; atiyeda maanna pao rakan ranga rinne, “David Sa Kapaisa ating phaangkriang thang ngo!”
Habei ga Jisu na han basakluga mik chonu pa ding ga kou lang zathang pi rwe. Banina mik chonupa ding ga kouluga bakhou rinne, “Sung raang ngo. Thouro, Maanna nating kou ongme.”
Atiga maanna bapwan kazit sat thangsia rwe khatle thouluga Jisu khou hung rwe.
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina nalaang pa-aam to thangnu bathai gabo?” Mik chonupa gana Bakhou rinne, “Rabboni, ei mik munu lou nwamme.”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Sero; nabalumsat paan bina nating pi sa thang rwe.” Haba kahan bi ga maan mik mu lat rwe khatle lampui bi Jisu nung sui hung rwe.
Banina Jerusalem nai hungnu kaan bi Olive Rammwan kim bi amnu Bethphage le Bethany la hung rwe. Atiga Maanna Baom potroi rwan pat ni ding lang thangga

barwei khou rinne, “Narwei meithaan la amnu nam bi ga seyo khatle narweina habei khut khap tinu kaan bi mi pakhatchana hakna twang mak aangnu lola swan khat bang thang ongnu doulune. Haga sutluga lou hung ngo.
Tudannuna, ‘Heiya narwei paaam lang sutnubo?’ diga rinne dabe, ‘Heiya Pukraangba lang bathaang amme,’ diga rinno khatle maanna haga abeiya barapka bathan hung lat tam zung nge.”
Barweina seluga lola swan ga inkhaanmun kim bi lampui paan bi bang thang ngaaknu kadou rwe khatle barweina haga sut rwe.
Habei ga han ongnu mi kasemna barwei khou rinne, “Narweina pa-aam lang lola swan ding ga sutnubo?”
Habei ga Jisu na zathang pi thangnu danga barweina bani khou rin rwe. Atiga banina barwei ding pi se rwe.
Habei ga barweina lola swan ga Jisu khou lou hungluga banina haba chung bi bani pwan sap thang rwe khatle Maan haba chung bi twang rwe.
Mi taswang khakna lampui bi bani pwan phaa thang rwe khatle katei rwanna thingkung bina thing bom kasanu ramluga lampui bi phaa thang rwe.
Habei ga meithaan la khatle nung la senu mi nun gana pao rwe, “Hosanna! ‘Pukraangba meng bi hungnu Maan ga aih saye!’
“Pukraangba meng bi hungnu ani pa David om krwang talei ga aih saye! Basaang kataknu bi Hosanna!”
Jisu na Jerusalem khatle kalum in sung bi khut rwe. Maanna pot bing ding phaang koi rwe khatle bakaan ga rei briakpina Maan potroi pat somga kani le diga Bethany la thou dam ngaake.
Inswan lampai bani Bethany bina se swaknu kaan bi Maan chaam ngaak rwe.

Namla lamangna banaa bom sanu tacham kung khat phaangmuluga habei ga Maan bakraa kasem phangnu le zaye diga Maan habei ga se hung ngaake. Maan habei ga hungnu kaan bi haga bana makka katei khatchale dou make, balangbe haga karaanu bapha mak ngaake.
Atibriakpina Jisu na thingkung ding ga rinne, “Nakhouna pakhatchanale bakraa sa lat mak tingro.” Haga Baom potroi rwanna ngaisu ngaake.

Habei ga bani Jerusalem la hung ngaake. Atiga Jisu na kalum in bi khutluga kalum in bi kaleinu le zwan ongnu mi bing ding kazun sat rwe khatle sian kachoi kainu nun om table khatle banphi zwannu nun om kaong riak bing tun kalat sat rwe.
Atiga kalum in bi pakhatchanale langgonnu pot phunkhutnu Maanna za mak ngaake.
Maanna bachu thangga bani khou rinne, “Heiya atiga hiak thangnu makpo? ‘Ain na chaat bing lang kalum in diga kou lang nge.’ Atiyeda haga nanina ‘Baruksaak mi nun in’ pi to rwe.”

Haga chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le takopuba rwanna ngaisuluga Bating tatoga athat za dingbo diga lampui zong thou rwe; atiyeda Baom bachu thangnu bi mi bingna loh lo ong briakpina banina Bating kachi ngaake.
Khwazinren tanu kaan bi Maan nampui bi gana se swak lat rwe.
Louthwan banina se hungnu kaan bi tacham kung ga bakamong tangga baowei ta damnu banina mu rwe.
Habei ga Peter na baningsuluga Bakhou rinne, “Rabbi, Phaang thang ngo, Nangna seng thangnu tacham kung ga baowei ta drwe.”
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Rikrwang khou balumsawo.

Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tudannu pakhatna heiba rammwan ding nga, ‘Abeina swakluga tuipui la ga naraanto bazwan thang dammo’ diga rinne dabe khatle basung bi balumsianu maake dabe khatle maanna rinnu ga to dam zung nge diga balumsaye dabe, maanna rinnu bing ga bakhou hung tanglune.
“Atibriakpina Eina nani khou rinnuwe, nanina kalumnu kaan bi pa-aam aam ngaakle nanina ninu bing ga nang phangsu rwe diga balumsawo khatle ha bing ga nang lousulune.
Nanina hanga kalumnu kaan bi tudannu pakhat maitwang bi tanut amme dabe, tambaan la ongnu nani pa na le nani koi maan ga kok thang lang bating kok thangbiyo.
Atiyeda nanina kok thang make dabe, tambaan la ongnu nani Pa na le nani koi maan ga kok thanglaye.”
Haba nung bi bani Jerusalem la hung lat rwe. Maan atiga kalum in bi se koinu kaan bi takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le patso rwan Bakhou hung ngaake.
Banina Bakhou rinne, “Nangna pa-aam ngamna hei bing nga to ongnubo? Khatle heiba chwan bing nga to lang Nakhou tuna ngam pi thangnubo?”
Habei ga Jisu na bani khou katake, “Eina le nani khou tangai khat ngaide, haga nani Akhou katako; ati dabe Eina impei ngam paan bina ha bing ga Eina tonubo dinu nani khou rin thangne:
John na baptize to thangnu ga tambaan lanamo mak tabe mi nun khounabo? Akhou katako.”
Bani cham kathuiluga rin rwe, “Anina haga ‘Tambaan la naye’ diga rinnu kaan bi Maanna rinlune, ‘Ati dabe nanina pa-aam toga bating balumsa maknubo?’
Atiyeda ‘Mi nun khou naye’ diga anina rinne dabe,” bani mi nun ding kachiye, balangbe mi bing zana John ding bataknu thiamting khate diga chak thang nge.
Atibriakpina banina Jisu khou rinne, “Ani thei make.” Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina paaam ngamna hei bing nga tonubo dinu Ei le nani khou rinlaye.”

Habei ga Maanna bani khou chongchak rin thou rwe, “Manpa khatna drakha anqwat khat qwat thangluga imbaang baang qwat rwe, batui sumnu riak le chou thang rwe khatle thaamkang le raa thang rwe. Maanna haga anqwat chwantok mi nun khou saan thangsialuga namlaanu talei khat la thou dam ngaake.
Bakraa lwaknu dat pi anqwat mi nun khouna baom drakha kraa kasem lou lang maanna baswak pakhat ting drakha anqwat la lang thang rwe.
Atiyeda banina bating namluga bwei rwe khatle bating kut barwang bathan sat rwe.
Haba nung bi maanna swak pakhat ting bathan lat rwe, banina lungna satluga balu bi to bazam rwe khatle to tangam thangluga bathan sat rwe.
Maanna swak katei khat ting bathan lat rwe, banina bating athat satrwe: khatle mi taswang khak ting bathan rwe, kasem ding bwei rwe khatle kasem ding athat sat rwe.
Atibriakpina bathan lat lang maanna kriangnu sa kapaisa pakhatcha am ngaake, kakham bi maanna ‘Asa kapaisa ding ngabe bani takhwang tolu zung nge’ diga baningga bating bani khou bathan rwe.
Atiyeda anqwat mi nun gana bani cham rinne, ‘Heiya barakhum lwak tingnu mi rwe. Hungro, ani bating athat satrizo atiye dabe barakhum ga ani lang zung rwe.’
Atiga banina bating namluga athat rwe khatle bating drakha anqwat paan la bazwan sat rwe.
Atibriakpina drakha anqwatpuba gana pa-aam tolu dingbo? Maanna hungluga chwantok mi nun ding ga to braan satlune khatle drakha anqwat ka mi katei khou pi thang damlune.
Heiba Bathiangnu Chongdip heiya nani pa makchungbo, ‘Intok mi nunna bazwan sat thangnu lung gana, Intaki om bakung tonu lung imbei rwe.
Heiya Pukraangba na to thangnuwe, Haga ani mikphaang bi tasiatnuwe.’ ”
Banina Jisu ding nam lang zong rwe atiyeda mi khang ding kachi ngaake, balangbe bani om maitwang bi Maanna chongchak ka rinnuwe dinu thei rwe. Atiga banina Bating thangsialuga thou dam ngaake.
Bachongkaang lang bina banina Bating nam lang Pharisee rwan le Herod om mi nun kasem ding Bakhou bathan hung ngaake.

Banina Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Nang bazenuwe, pakhatcha mai le phaang make khatle pakhatcha ding hakna kathing aih to make atiyeda bazenu bi Rikrwang lampui ga bachu thang nge dinu anina theiye. Caesar lang ramkhai pinu zamo za makpo?
Anina pi langmo mak tabe anina pi mak langbo?” Maanna bani om sathot tonu ga theiluga bani khou rinne, “Nanina Ating pa-aam lang tam ongnubo? Akhou denari khat lou hung ngo, Ei haga phaangde.”
Banina haga lou hung rwe. Atiga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Heiya tu maangbo khatle pa-aam hiak thangbo?” Banina Bakhou rinne, “Caesar omme.”
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Caesar om pot ka Caesar khou piyo khatle Rikrwang om pot ka Rikrwang khou piyo.” Bani Maanna rinnu bi ga loh lo ngaake.
Ring thou latnu maake diga rinnu Sadducee rwanna Bakim bi hungluga banina Bakhou ngaiye,

“Bachuthangnupa, Moses na ani lang atiga hiak thang nge, ‘Manpa khat om batang thi damme dabe, bamei ding thangsiaye dabe khatle basa thangsia make dabe, banao gana batang mei ding ga louluga batang lang sa nao cha lang nge.’
Atiga unao pat siari am ngaake. Patsonu ga mei kou rwe; atiyeda maan sa nao cha mak ka thi drwe.
Kaninu banao gana batang mei ding lou rwe atiyeda maan sa nao cha makka thi drwe. Inthumnu ga le hadan rwe.
Atiga unao pat siari gana bating lou ngaake atiyeda bani sa nao khatchale cha make. Kham katak pi kamaisa ga le thi drwe.
Atibriakpina ring thou latnu kaan bi bani khangsungna ring thou latnu kaan bi ha mannu ga tu mei to dingbo? Balangbe bani pat siarina bating bamei toga lou ngaake.”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Nanina Bathiangnu Chongdip khatle Rikrwang ngam ding thei mak briakpina nani koinu makpo?
Balangbe banina thiluga ring thou latnu kaan bi bani tazwan bahwanlaye khatle tazwan bahwan lang le pi swaklaye atiyeda tambaan la tambaan chonglang rwan danlune.

Atiyeda thinu nunna ring thou late dinu lang bi nani Moses om chongdip pi pa makchungbo? Lou lak pi mei chok ongnu lang bi hiak thangnu riak pi Rikrwang na bakhou atiga rinne, ‘Ei Abraham Rikrwang, Isaac Rikrwang khatle Jacob Rikrwang nge.’
Maan thinu nun om Rikrwang make atiyeda ringnu nun om Rikrwang nge. Atibriakpina nani taswang khak koi rwe.”

Chongtan bachuthangnupa pakhat hungluga banina kathui ongnu ga ngaisu rwe khatle Maanna bani khou chong katak chuiga katak rwe dinu theiluga Bakhou ngai rwe, “Zathang lak pi ingaana bakung to kataknubo?”
Jisu na bakhou katake, “Zathang om bakung to kataknu ga heiye, ‘He Israel, ngaiyo, Pukraangba ani Rikrwang, Pukraangba khatcha zung nge.
Nangna Pukraangba Narikrwang ding nasung bing, nakatha bing khatle nalungning bing khatle nanat bingna kriang ding gaye.’ Heiya bakung to kataknu zathang nge.
Kaninu zathang ga heiye, ‘Nangna nainnai lounai ding nazan bahak ting danga kriang ding gaye.’ Hei bing ma thuk inkunu zathang katei maake.”
Chongtan bachuthangnupa gana Bakhou rinne, “Bazeye Bachuthangnupa. Nangna bazenu ga rin thang rwe, balangbe Rikrwang khatcha amme, Maan makka katei maake.

Bating sung bingna, theinu bingna, nalungning bingna, nat bingna kriang ding gaye khatle bainnai lounai ding bazan bahak ting danga kriangnu heiyana roumut satnu potkat khatle rikhaang pot bing ma inkunuwe.”
Maanna ningtingga katak rwe dinu Jisu na muluga, Maanna bakhou rinne, “Nang Rikrwang om krwang talei bina namlaa lan rwe.” Haba nung Bakhou pakhatchanale sung raangga chong ngainu ngamlan rwe.
Jisu na kalum in bi bachu thang ongnu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Tatoga chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Christa heiya David Sa Kapaisa ye diga rinnubo?

Balangbe Katha Bathiangnu paan bina David maan bahakna rinne, ‘Pukraangba na Apukraangba khou rinne, “Eina Nating munanu nun ding Naket kadim riak pi to mak basaan, Akut inchang pek la badung ong ngo.” ’
Atibriakpina David maan bahakna Jisu ding ‘Pukraangba’ diga kouwe dabe; Maan tatoga David Sa Kapaisa to dingbo?” Habei ga amnu mi khangna karoga Bachong ngai ngaake.
Haba nung bi Baom bachu thangnu bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Pon baswannu bathuluga se koinu ding bathainu, keithian lak pi mi nunna kadou chongkaang kabia thangnu ding lou nwamnu,
synagogue pi sa kataknu kaong riak pi khatle balou riak pi talunu kaong riak pi ong nwamnu,
tameinu rwan in kapumnu khatle mi nun ding pi mu langna kalum bakhwa seinu, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khouna cheksinno. Bani nun lu chung bi ta thang dingnu chongtok ka lian inkulune.”
Jisu na sian lan kat thangnu riak meithaan bi ongluga mi nunna tatoga sian rik riak pi sian thang tabo dinu phaang ngaake. Lungsanu mi nunna habei ga sian tamga thang rwe.
Habei ga lungsianu tameinu khat hungluga peisa khat le bachamnu sian pek swan kani sat thang rwe.
Jisu na Baom potroi rwan ding Bakhou kou hungluga bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, mi nunna pi swaknu ma lungsianu tameinu heiyana inkuga sian rik riak pi thang rwe;
balangbe banina bani om baleinu bi gana sat thangnuwe atiyeda maanna balungsiat sung bi baom ka amnu bing, maan sa ring dingnu bing ga thangta rwe.”
Jisu na kalum in bina se swaknu kaan bi Baom potroi pakhatna Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, phaang thang ngo, intia lang tasiatnu lung bing khatle intia lang liannu in bing abeiya amnubo!”
Jisu na bakhou katake, “Inpui bing nga nang mubo? To bakla dingnu lung khat chung bi lung khatchale am thang siala rwe.”
Maanna kalum in meithaan bi amnu Olive Rammwan bi ongnu kaan bi Peter, James, John khatle Andrew na Bakhou inthimthwei toga ngai rwe,
“Hei bing nga impei dat pi swak tingnubo? Atiga hei bing nga hung tang ding rwe dinu thei zanu pa-aam badan ambo? Ani khou rin thang ngo.”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Pakhatchanale nani ding minam mak lang cheksinno.
Balangbe Ameng bi mi tamga hungluga rinlune, ‘Ei Maan ga rwe’ khatle banina mi inza ding minamlune.
Nanina kraan khatle kraan cham ngaisunu kaan bi nani sung katop mako; balangbe ha bing ga swak tingnu zung rwe atiyeda kakhamnu ga mak aang nge.

Balangbe chaat khatna chaat khat luchung bi khatle krwang talei khatna krwang talei khat maitwang bi katwak thoulune. Atiga bariak inza bi talei kalingnu, bu taangnu khatle riangre kanang amlune. Hei bing nga nao lung lang nainu kaan bi riangrenu om hou thounu rwe.
“Nani barak theiyo, balangbe banina nani ding thampei in bi pi thanglune khatle synagogue pi bweilune. Alaang chungna bapuba rwan khatle krwang nun meithaan bi sake to lang nani ding phun hung lune.
Atiga sacham ma chaat bing khou kamaga kasamlune.

Atiyeda banina nani ding namluga nani ding pi swaknu kaan bi pa-aam kabia dingbo diga sung tam kama mako. Atiyeda haba chakrin bi nani khou pi thangnu ga kabiawo; balangbe kabia dingnu ga nani make atiyeda Katha Bathiangnu zung nge.
Banaona batang ding khatle bapana basa ding thi lang pi swaklune; sa nao rwanna nu pa rwan maitwang bi katwak thoulune khatle bani ding pi to thatlune.
Atiga Ameng lang chungna mi bingna nani ding batanlune. Atiyeda kakhamnu tangga khaangnu bating ga kan thanglune.

“Thiamting Daniel na rin thangnu ‘To braan to mutnu om batannu tonu,’ maanna han mak tingnu riak pi hannu ding nanina munu kaan bi” (panu mi gana bakaba thei ding ngo), “Judea bi ongnu nunna rammwan la pak thou dam ding ngo.
In chung bi ongnu maan gana in bi ta mak ting ngo mak tabe bain insung bi pot lou swak lang khut mak ting ngo.
Lou la ongnu maan gana bapwan lou lang han lat mak ting ngo.
Atiyeda haba kaan bi pum rit ongnu khatle naosen kainu kamaisa rwan ga aih sianuweda!
Nani om kraan pak ka sikpha bi swak mak lang kalummo.
Balangbe ha kaan ga Rikrwang na talei ram dam thou tan bina thouga atun tangnu sung bi hung mak aangnu khatle impha ni beida hung lat mak tingnu riangre kanang ga hunglune.
Pukraangba na haba kaan ga pi toi thang mak ngaake dabe pakhatcha hakna ringlaye; atiyeda Maanna kathang swaknu kathang thangnu mi nun lang chungna Maanna bakaan ga pi toi thang drwe.
Tudannuna nani khou, ‘Phaang ngo, abeiya Christa amme!’ mak tabe ‘Phaang ngo, Maan ula ga amme’ diga rinne dabe haga balumsa mako.
Balangbe kakoinu christa le kakoinu thiamting rwan hunglu rwe, zaye dabe kathang swaknu mi nun ding hakna minam lang badan le tasiatnu chwan tolu rwe.
Atiyeda barako; phaang ngo, Eina nani khou hei bing nga rin chaak thangnu rwe.
“Haba lumik bing bi, riangre kanang nung bi lumikna zing damlune khatle thana babaan pi bila rwe;
saangbaan insi bing bazwantalune khatle saangbaan la ngam bing le kanuklune.
Haba kaan bi Misa Sa Kapaisa gana tambu bi ngam liannu le lwat le bachamga hungnu banina phaangmulune.
Maanna Baom tambaan chonglang rwan ding lang hungluga talei taki balilana namla kataknu taram kalan khatle tambaan kalan lana Maanna kathang swaknu bing ding khom hung thanglune.
“Tacham kung bina heiba chongchak heiya bachuwo, bakachangna bazik kasat swaknu khatle banaa phun swaknu kaan bi khwalumpha nai rwe dinu nanina theiye.
Hadanga nani le ha bing ga swaknu nanina munu kaan bi Maan nai rwe, inkhaan bi hung tang rwe dinu theiyo!
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, ha bing ga swak mak basaan heiba mi chaat heiya khatchale braanlaye.
Tambaan le talei ya braan lune atiyeda Achongkaang bing nga impha ni beida braanlaye.
“Pakhatchanale haba lumik khatle chakrin ga thei make, tambaan la ongnu tambaan chonglang rwan mak tabe Sa Kapaisa hakna thei make atiyeda Pa zana theiye.
Phaang ngo, barak theiyo khatle kalummo; balangbe haga impei dat pi lu dingbo dinu nanina thei make.

Heiya manpa khatna bain asat thangsialuga khatle baswak rwan khou ngam pi thangluga, bani mi bing lang chwan sin thangsialuga khatle rangkaan khou ngaak chuiga ong lang zathang pi thangsialuga, namlanu taram la thou damnu manpa ga dannuwe.
“Atibriakpina barak theiyo, balangbe inpu gana hung dingnu ga khwazin lu dingmo, inmik kasia bi lu dingmo, aankhwang dat pi lu dingmo mak tabe louthwan lu dingmo dinu nanina thei make.
Maan thei mak daakka hungnu kaan bi Maanna nani ding inthi ongnu dounu le zaye.
Eina nani khou rin ongnuwa Eina khangsung khou rinnuwe, ‘Barak theiyo!’ ”

Takan swaknu Balou khatle Khai Sui maknu Uilu Balou hung tang lang ni ni baat ngaake. Takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Bating tatoga rin thiyamluga nam lang khatle Bating athat lang zong ngaake.
Atiyeda banina rinne, “Heiya bangei sung bi to makcho, balangbe mi nunna kasao kabao thounu le zaye.”

Jisu na Bethany bi imphaan ngaaknu Simon in bi bu sa lang ongnu kaan bi mannu pakhat baman kungnu nard thao thangnu alabaster tong khat choiluga hung ngaake. Maanna haba tong ga to bakluga Balu bi thao ga kanun thang rwe.
Habei ga ongnu mi kasemna balung pwanga bani cham atiga rinne, “Pa-aam to lang heiba banamsanu thao ding to braan ongnubo?
Balangbe haga denari raza thum katei ma inkuga zwanluga sian ga lungsianu nun lang pi thangnu zanuwe.” Atiga banina haba mannu ding twei rwe.
Atiyeda Jisu na rinne, “Barang to ong dam ding ngo. Pa-aam toga nanina bating to katop ongnubo? Maanna Alaang kasanu chwan to thangnuwe.
Balangbe lungsianu nun ga nani le chat makka ong bacham ongme khatle nanina baningnu kaan bi nanina bani lang kasanu chwan to thangnu zaye; atiyeda Eiba nani le bakaan bathin ong bachamlaye.
Maanna ngamnu ga maanna to thangnuwe. Imphum langna Apum bi thao kanun thang lang maanna basaamga hungnuwe.
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, heiba sacham ma talei ram bing bi kasamsenu kaan bi heiba mannuna to damnu chwan ga le bating baningsunu toga rinlune.”
Habei ga potroi pat somga kani lak pi suinu, Judas Iscariot na Jisu ding bani khou pi swak lang takopuba rwan khou thou drwe.
Haga banina ngaisunu kaan bi bani karo ngaake khatle balaang sian pi lang karen thang rwe. Atiga maanna Jisu ding pi swak lang badou chanu zong ngaake.

Khai Sui maknu Uilu Balou om kamanu lumik pi, banina Takan swaknu zao athatnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou ngaiye, “Takan Swaknu Balou Thaisaak sa lang anina bariak ingaipai laang thangnu Nangna bathaigabo?”
Maanna Baom potroi pat ni ding lang thangluga bani khou rinne, “Namlian laga sekhutro, tui ben phunluga se hungnu manpa khatna narwei ding kadoulune; banung ga suiseyo.
Maanna khut tamnu riak pi ga khutluga inpuba khou rinno, ‘Bachuthangnupa na rinne, “Eina Aom potroi rwan le diga Takan Swaknu Balou sa bacham dingnu bazin in kaa zo ingaabo?” ’
Atiye dabe daan thang ongnu kaliannu basaang in kaa khat maanna narwei khou pi mu thanglune; habei ga ani lang daanro.”
Baom potroi rwan gana se swakluga namlian bi khut rwe, Maanna bani khou rin thangnu bahak ka danga dou rwe; atiga banina habei ga Takan Swaknu Balou riak lang daan rwe.
Khwazinren Maan potroi pat somga kani le diga hung rwe.
Banina ongtaluga sa ong bi Jisu na rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Ei le diga sa bacham ongnu nani lak pi pakhatna Ating pi swaklu rwe.”
Habei ga bani sung riangre thou rwe khatle bani pakhat khatna Bakhou ngai rwe, “Haga eibo?” Kateina le “Haga eibo?” diga ngai rwe.
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Haga nani potroi pat somga kani lak pi Ei le diga theng bi kut kapunta bacham ongnu maan gaye.
Misa Sa Kapaisa om lang bi hiak thang ngaaknu danga Maanna seta ongnuwe atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisa ding pi swaknu manpa ga aih sianuweda! Bating pon thang mak ngaake dabe haga balaang sa inku dingnuwe.”
Banina sa ong bi Jisu na uilu ga louluga rithoi thangluga thiak bak rwe khatle haga bani khou pi luga rinne, “Louluga saro; heiya Apum rwe.”
Haba nung bi Maanna ngai ga lou rwe khatle Maanna swanka thangluga Maanna haga bani khou pi rwe khatle bani khangsung habei gana in rwe.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Heiya mi taswang khak lang ta thangnu chonghen kathan om Athi ga rwe.
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei la Eina haga kathan toga in lat mak basaan drakha tui Ei in latla rwe.”
Banina laa khat to taangnu nung Olive rammwan la se thou drwe.

Haba nung bi Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Aniya zingpha nani mi bing Alang bina ket basuinu doulu rwe, balangbe heiya atiga hiak thang nge, ‘Eina Zao siannu ding bwei balum talune, Khatle zao nun ga pak imphaanglune.’
Atiyeda Eina ring thou latnu nung, Nani meithaan Ei Galilee la selune.”
Habei ga Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Mi bingna ket basui ngaak peida eibe ket basuilaye.”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina nakhou batak sekka rinnuwe, aniya zingpha aan khongna khwang leng ninu meithaan nang Ating za mak leng thumlune.”
Atiyeda Peter na sung raang takka rinne, “Ei Nang le diga thi bacham dingnu am ngaaklena Nating khatchale za maknu tolaye!” Bani mi bingna le hadanga rin rwe.
Haba nung bi bani Gethsemane diga kounu riak la hung rwe; atiga Jisu na Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Ei kalum ong bi nani abeiya ong ngaako.”
Jisu na Peter, James khatle John ding kalwangluga se bacham rwe, atiga Maan sung katopka riangre thou rwe.
Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Akatha heiya thi dingnu danga tasiatnu riangre riangre rwe. Nani abeiya barak theiga ong ngo.”
Maanna kasem se swakluga talei bi in bakhup ta rwe khatle zaye dabe haba chakrin ga Bakhouna takan swak lang kalum rwe.
Maanna rinne, “Abba, Apa, Nakhou pot bingza hung tang nge. Heiba ngai ya Akhouna lou sat thang ngo; Atiyeda haga Eina baningnu makka Nangna baningnu to ding ngo.”
Habei ga Maan hung rwe khatle bani inthi ongnu dou rwe, Maanna Peter khou rinne, “Simon, nang chakrin khatcha hakna Ei le diga khaang bachamnu ngamlanrubo?
Nani bathemnu bi ta mak lang khaang ngo khatle kalummo. Batak takka katha nabe bathaiye atiyeda pum naba sonne.”
Maanna se latluga haba chongkaang bahak ka kabiaga kalum lat rwe.
Maanna hung latnu kaan bi bani inthi ong latnu hung dou rwe, balangbe bani in nwamnuna mik meng brak swaknu ngam mak ngaake khatle banina Bakhou impei chong katak tingbo dinu theilan rwe.
Maanna leng thumnu toga hung latluga bani khou rinne, “Nani atun tangga in basak ong maangbo? Heiya khoprwe! Chakrin ga hung rwe; phaang ngo, Misa Sa Kapaisa ding noh mi nun kut pi pi swak rwe.
Thouro, ani serizo. Phaang ngo Ating pi swak tingnu mi ga nai rwe.”

Jisu na heiba chong nga kabia ongnu kaan bi, potroi pat somga kani lak pi Judas na takolu, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle patso rwan khouna kachaak chem le thing kalok choinu mi khang pui le diga hung rwe.
Bating pi swaknu gana bani khou badannu khat piga rinne, “Eina kaput tingnu Maan ga rwe; Bating namro khatle Bating dwak mak lang kalwangsero.”
Judas na hung tang khap tinu le Jisu kim bi hung rwe khatle Bakhou rinne, “Rabbi, Rabbi!” diga Bating kaput rwe.
Habei ga banina Balu chung bi kut taluga nam thou drwe.
Habei ga han ongnu rwan lak pi pakhatna baom kachaak chem kaswaluga takolu swak ting bakanaa kapak chat thang rwe.
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina Ating kasut sanu maitwang bi danga kachaak chem le thing kalok choiluga Ating namlang hungnubo?
Ei kani bathin kalum in bi bachu thangga nani le diga ong bacham ngaake atiyeda nanina Ating nam make. Heiya Bathiangnu Chongdipna rin thangnu ga hung tang lang naye.”
Haba nung bi potroi rwanna Bating bathan satluga pak thou drwe.
Habei ga katangpa khat pum tangang linen pwan khatna bapum kabet namluga Banung sui se ngaake. Banina katangpa ding ga nam rwe,
habei ga maan linen pwan nui satluga bani khouna pum tangang pak thou dam ngaake.
Atiga banina Jisu ding takolu in bi kalwang hung rwe khatle takopuba rwan bing, patso rwan khatle chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Bakim bi hung kadoi rwe.
Peter na impaan saam saamga Banung suizon hungluga takolu in inkhu tangga sui hung ngaake. Habei ga maan kalum in ngaak nun le ong bachamga mei kahaiga ong ngaake.
Takopuba rwan le thampei rwanna Jisu ding athat lang Bamaitwang bi sake zong ong ngaake atiyeda khatchale dou make.
Balangbe mi taswang khakna Bamaitwang bi kakoinu sake taswang khak pi ngaake atiyeda bani om sake ga khatchale bacham kale mak ngaake.
Habei ga mi kasemna han thouluga Bamaitwang bi kakoinu sake piga rinne,
“ ‘Kutna bachanu heiba kalum in ding nga Eina to braanne khatle ni thum ni kutna bacha maknu kalum in katei khat Eina to thoune,’ diga Maanna rinnu anina ngaisuye.”
Haba nung tangga bani sake ga bacham mak ngaake.
Bani lak pi takolu gana han thouluga Jisu khou ngai rwe, “Nang khatchale kataklabo? Heiba mi nunna Namaitwang bi sake pi ongnuwa pa-aambo?”
Atiyeda Maan thiap thiapka khatchale katak makka ong ngaake. Takolu gana Bakhou ngai late, “Nang Swanka khopnu om Sa Kapaisa Christa gabo?”
Jisu na rinne, “Ei rwe. Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Ngam om kut inchang pek la badung ongnu khatle tambaan om tambu bi hungnu nanina phaangmulune.”
Habei ga takolu gana bapwan kachang reluga rinne, “Anina sake katei lou lat lang pa-aam bathaang am maang gabo?
Maanna Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat ongnuwa nani ngaisuru dabo! Nani pa-aam baningbo?” Bani khangsungna Bating thi lang khop rwe diga koi impu thang rwe.
Haba nung bi mi kasemna Bakhou bachin thang thou rwe, atiga Bamik khwam lemluga khatle Bating bweiluga Bakhou rinne, “Rin swako!” Kalum in ngaak nunna le bani kut bazaana Bating kabeng rwe.
Peter na kathwei bi, inkhu bi ongnu kaan bi takolu om swak rangaaknu rwan lak pi pakhat hung ngaake.
Peter na mei kahai ongnu ga maanna muluga bating phaangdengga phaangluga rinne, “Nang Nazareth Jisu le diga bacham ngaaknu gaye.”
Peter na za makka rinne, “Ei nangna rin ongnu ga thei make, bakaba le thei make.” Maan inkhu la swak tamnu kaan bi aankhongna khwang rwe.
Swak rangaaknu gana bating mu latluga habei ga han ongnu mi nun khou atiga rin thou rwe, “Maan bani lak pi pakhate.”

Habei ga le Peter na za mak lat rwe. Bakaan kasem nung bi habei ga han ongnu nun gana Peter khou rin late, “Nang soi makka bani lak pi pakhate; balangbe nang Galilee la miye dinu nachong kabiakna indaowe.”
Atiyeda maanna sengga khatle karenga rinne, “Nanina rin ongnu heiba Manpa ding nga ei thei make.”

Leng ninu toga aankhongan khwang rwe. Haba nung bi Jisu na bakhou rin damnu, “Aankhongna khwang leng ninu meithaan nang Ating za mak leng thumlune” diga rin thang ngaaknu chongkaang ga Peter na baningsu rwe. Haba lang bi kakhannu kaan bi maan chap rwe.

Louthwan khwan takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan, patso rwan khatle thampei rwan bing chong katu rwe; atiga banina Jisu ding karakluga Bating kalwang swak rwe khatle Bating Pilate khou bachoi thang rwe.
Habei ga Pilate na Bakhou ngaiye, “Nang Jihudi rwan Krwang bo?” Maanna bakhou katake, “Nangna rin damnu ga rwe.”
Takopuba rwanna Bating balang taswang khak pi koi impu thangnu chong kabia ngaake atiyeda Maan khatchale katak mak ngaake.
Pilate na Bakhou ngailate, “Nang khatchale kataklabo? Banina Namaitwang bi sake heiza pi ongnuwa phaang ngo?”
Atiyeda Jisu na khatchale katak mak ngaake, habei ga Pilate loh lo rwe.
Pilate na baom chaang toga Takan Swaknu Balou dat pi mi nunna ninu qwan mi pakhat ting bathan thang ngaake.
Habei ga Barabbas tiga kounu babaan rwan le diga parei ruina bang thang ongnu manpa khat am ngaake; bani talei chong swakpi mi athat ngaake.
Habei ga maanna bani lang baom chaang danga to thang lang mi khangna pao rakanga bakhou ni thou rwe.
Atiyeda Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Jihudi rwan Krwang ding eina nani lang bathan thangnu bathaigabo?”
Balangbe takopuba rwanna antiam briakpina Jisu ding pi swak thangnuwe dinu maanna thei ngaake.
Jisu om bahut toga Barabbas ting bathan thang lang takopuba rwanna mi nun ding kachui thang ngaake.
Pilate na bani khou rinlate, “Ati dabe nanina Jihudi rwan Krwang diga kounu Bating eina pa-aam to ding gabo?”
Banina pao lat rwe, “Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!”
Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Pa-aam langbo, Maanna pa-aam kasianu chwan torugabo?” Atiyeda banina rakan ranga pao rwe, “Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!”
Pilate na mi nun ding pi pem langna Barabbas ting bani khou bathan thang rwe khatle Jisu ding maanna pi bweiluga cross pi athat lang pi swak rwe.
Kraanmi nunna Bating Praetorium diga kounu riak pi kalwang khut rwe khatle banina kraanmi doi ding kou kadoi rwe.
Banina Bakhou sendumnu pwan sin thang rwe khatle banina kaling luthop khat bachaluga Balu bi run thang rwe,
banina Bating kalumga rinne, “Kalumme, Jihudi rwan Krwang!”
Banina Bating tou sungrwanna Balu bi bweiluga Bakhou bachin thang rwe khatle kekhok detaluga banina Bating kalum rwe.
Banina Bating kiamnu nung banina sendumnu pwan ga lou sat rwe, atiga Bakhou Bapwan sin thang lat rwe khatle banina Bating cross pi athat lang kalwang thou drwe.
Nam lana hungnu Alexander le Rufus pa Simon diga kounu Cyrene rwan manpa pakhat ting banina namga Jisu om cross pi phun ngaake.
Banina Bating Golgotha, bakabana Luru riak tiga kounu riak la kalwang hung rwe.
Banina zu le Myrrh thang karungluga Balaang in lang pi rwe atiyeda Maanna haga in mak ngaake.
Banina Bating cross pi bakhai thangnu kaan bi banina Bapwan ga kasemluga tuna impei dam lousulu dingbo diga tasaan phaang ngaake.
Chakrin inthum tanu dat pi banina Bating cross pi bakhai thang rwe.
Atiga Baom koi impu thangnu chongkaang: JIHUDI RWAN KRWANG diga lu chung pek la hiak thang rwe.
Banina Maan le diga kasut sanu pat ni, pakhat ting Bakut inchang la khatle katei pakhat tingna Bakut imbei pek la cross pi bakhai thang ngaake.
Atiga “Bating koi maan amnu mi nun lak pi basing sem thang rwe,” diga Bathiangnu chongdip pi hiak thangnu ga hung tang rwe.
Habei lampui bi se hungnu mi nunna Bating rin basiat rwe khatle bani lu kazinga rinne, “Aha! Kalum in ding raitaluga ha ding ni thum ni to thou latnu Nang,
Naraanto Nating kanro khatle cross pina taro!”
Hadanga takopuba rwanna le chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le diga bani lak pi balaa ga rin rwe, “Maanna katei rwan ding kan thang nge; atiyeda Baraanto Batingba kannu ngam make.
Anina muluga balumsa lang Israel rwan Krwang Christa ga cross pina ta ding ngo.” Maan le diga cross pi bakhai thang ongnu pat ni gana le Bating bala rwe.
Chakrin karuk tanu kaan bina chakrin kaqwa tangga haba talei bing ga zing rwe.
Chakrin kaqwa tanu kaan bi Jisu na baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Eloi, Eloi, lama, sabachthani?” bakabana, “Arikrwang, Arikrwang, Nangna Ating pa-aam lang bathan thangnubo?” dinuwe.
Habei ga han ongnu mi kasemna haga ngaisuluga rinne, “Phaang ngo, Maan Elijah ding kou ongme.”

Bani lak pi pakhatna pak seluga kathunnu drakha tui sponge bi li thangluga tou sungrwan bi thang rwe, atiga Balaang in lang pi luga rinne, “Baraanto ong dam ding ngo; Elijah na Bating louta lang hunglu dingmo ani phaangzo.”
Jisu na baraam basaangga paoluga Maan Bakatha bathan sat rwe.
Haba kaan bi kalum in bi amnu khamthing pwan ga balu lana bakalan tangga kani toga reta rwe.
Bamai thaan bi han ongnu kraanmi razapuba gana Jisu na paoga Maan Bakatha loi thang damnu ga muluga rinne, “Batak takka Manpa heiya Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye!”
Mannu rwan le namla lana hanphaang ong ngaake, bani lak pi Mary Magdalene, Kasinnu James le Joses nu Mary khatle Salome sui ngaake
Jisu na Galilee bi ongnu kaan bi bani ga Banung sui se ngaaknu, Bating chwanlaang to thang ngaaknu khatle Maan le diga Jerusalem la chwanlaang cham hung damnu katei mannu rwan le sui ngaake.
Khwazinren tanu kaan bi Sabbath ni meithaan haga Chamdaannu Lumik briakpina
thampei om takung tazei ongnu, Rikrwang om krwang talei ding ngaak ongnu Arimathea rwan Joseph na Pilate khou sung raangga hungluga Jisu pum ding ni rwe.
Jisu thi rwe diga ngaisunu kaan bi Pilate loh lo ngaake; atiga maanna kraanmi razapuba ding kouluga Maan thi damnu bakhwa seirubo diga ngai ngaake.
Pilate na kraanmi razapuba khouna chong ga bathiangga theinu kaan bi Jisu pum ga Joseph khou pi lang za thang rwe.

Habei ga Joseph na linen pwan kaleiluga Jisu pum ga louta rwe khatle pwan gana Bating kazwan thang rwe. Maanna lung pui bi ranluga bachanu thaan bi Jisu ding ri thang rwe khatle thaan inkhaanmun bi lung khatna lengnam thang rwe.
Mary Magdalene le Joses nu Mary na Bating ri thang damnu riak ka phaang ngaake.
Sabbath loi damnu nung Mary Madalene, James nu Mary khatle Salome na hungluga Bakhou kanun lang banamsanu pot kalei rwe.
Maap lak om kamanu ni om louthwan khwan lumik swaknu kaan bi bani nun thaan baloiga hung ngaake.
Bani cham atiga rinne, “Thaankham lung ga ani lang tuna ka lat sat thang dingbo?”
Balangbe haga lian tak ngaake. Atiyeda banina phaangkanu kaan bi lung ga tun swak thang ngaaknu banina mu rwe.
Banina thaan sung bi khutnu kaan bi katangpa pakhat baswannu pwan ngou sinluga inchang pek la badung ongnu banina mu rwe khatle habei ga bani loh lo ngaake.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani loh lo mako. Cross pi athat thang damnu Nazareth Jisu ding nani zong ongme. Maan ring thou drwe! Maan abeiya ong lan rwe. Banina Bating ri thangnu riak ka phaangro.
Atiyeda seluga Baom potroi rwan le Peter khou ‘Maanna rin thang damnu ga danga Maan nani meithaan Galilee la selune; habei ga nanina Bating mulune diga barinno.’ ”
Bani barapka swakluga thaan bina pak thou drwe, balangbe bani kachi kathokka loh lo ngaake. Atiga bani khatle khat meiri rai kale mak ngaake, balangbe bani kachi ngaake.
Maap lak om kamanu ni louthwan khwan Jisu ring thounu kaan bi Maanna ri kasianu siari ding kazun sat thaang ngaaknu Mary Magdalene khou kamaga Baman pi mu thang ngaake.
Maanna seluga chunto lo siaga khatle chapka ongnu Banung sui ong bacham thang ngaaknu nun khou bapu thang rwe.
Jisu ring ongme khatle maanna mu rwe diga rinnu kaan bi bani balumsa mak ngaake.
Haba nung bi Maanna nam la se ongnu pat ni khou teinu gong bi pi mu thang ngaake.
Banina seluga katei khou rin rwe atiyeda banina le barwei ding balumsa make.

Ha nung bi potroi pat somga khat ka table bi sa in lang ongnu kaan bi Maanna pi mu thang rwe; bani om balumsa maknu khatle bani sung natnu ding twei rwe, balangbe Maan ring thounu nung Bating mu damnu mi nun ding banina balumsa make.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Talei bariak bing bi seluga mi bing khou sacham kasamro.
Balumsanu khatle baptize tonu bating kan thangne; atiyeda balumsa maknu bating koi bi pi ta thangne.
Balumsanu nun khou heiba badan bingna bani le suilune: Ameng bi banina ri kasia nun ding kazun satlune khatle bani chong kathan kabialune,
banina barun nun ding kai thoulune; bani thinu zanu paaam ngaakle in beida bani ding liamlaye; banina naanu nun lu chung bi kut kaising thanglune khatle bani salune.”
Pukraangba na bani khou chong kabia taangnu kaan bi Bating tambaan la lou thou drwe khatle Rikrwang kut inchang pek la ongta drwe.
Banina se swakluga bariak thin kasam se ngaak rwe, Pukraangba na bani le diga chwanlaang bacham rwe khatle banina to ongnu badan paanna chong ding ga batake dinu pi mu thang rwe. Amen.
Ani lak pi hung tang thang damnu bing om lang bi baleng toga rin indao thang langna mi taswang khakna hiak lang karam ngaaknu nung suiga,
kama bina ha bing ga bani mikna mu ngaaknu khatle chongkaang lang bi chwanlaang tonu rwanna ani khou pi thei thangnu nung suiga,
