haga Abel om thi tanu dat pina thouga rikhaang riak khatle kalum in lak pi ta damnu Zechariah om thi ta damnu tang gaye. Eina nani khou rinnuwe, haba koi ga heiba mikin khou ta thanglune.
Chongtan theinu rwan nani aih sianuweda! Balangbe nanina theinu om taap thing ga louluga thou drwe. Nani nani zan bahakna le habei ga khut make khatle habei khutnu mi nun ding le nanina thing nge.”
Maanna bani khou hei bing nga rin ongnu kaan bi chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwanna Bating maitwangga kae rakan tak thou rwe khatle Bating balang taswang khak lang bi tangai ngaiga,
banina Bating koi impu thang lang khatle Bachong kabiak pina, Bating nam lang chwan ga ngaak ong ngaake.

Haba kaan bi ga, basing semngam maknu mi khang khat hung kadoinu kaan bi bani khatna khat chung bi kadim dan kale ngaake, kama kataknu bi Jisu na Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Pharisee rwan om khai, dinuba bani om sathot tonu ding ga cheksinno.
Balangbe indao swakla dingnu inkam thangnu khatchale maake mak tabe thei swakla dingnu inkam thangnu khatchale maake.
Atibriakpina zingnu bi nanina kabia damnu bing ga baannu bi ngaisulune khatle nanina insung kaa bing bi deza kanaa bi kabia damnu ga in chung bina pao swaklune.
“Abaan rwan ga, Eina nani khou rinnuwe, pum ding athatluga haba nung bi katei khatchale tonu ngam maknu bani ding ga kachi mako.
“Atiyeda nanina tu ding kachi dingbo dinu Eina nani khou pi thei thangne: Maanna athatnu nung, meikhun bi bazwan thang ngamnu Bating kachiyo: O, Eina nani khou rinne, Bating kachiyo!
Basak impaang ding peisa kani lang zwannu makkabo? Ati ngaak peida bani nun lak pi khatcha ding hakna Rikrwang meithaan bi banim thang make.
Atiyeda nani lu bi sam sang bing ga tangga basing sem thang nge. Atibriakpina nani kachi mako; naniba basak taswang khak ma bakung tonuwe.
“Eina nani khou rinnuwe, tudannu mi nun meithaan bi Ating indao thangnu bating ga, Misa Sa Kapaisana le Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang rwan meithaan bi indao thanglune.
Atiyeda mi nun meithaan bi Ating za maknu bating ga Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang rwan meithaan bi za thanglaye.
Tudannu Misa Sa Kapaisa maitwang bi chong kabianu bating kok thanglune; atiyeda Katha Bathiangnu maitwang bi rin basiatnu, bating ga kok thanglaye.
“Banina nani ding synagogue pi, talei choinu rwan khatle ngam amnu rwan khou phun hungnu kaan bi nanina tatoga mak tabe pa-aam katak tingbo mak tabe nanina pa-aam kabia dingbo diga sung riangre mako.
Balangbe nanina pa-aam kabia dingbo dinu haba chakrin bahak pi ga Katha Bathiangnuna nani khou bachu thanglune.”
Mi nun lak pi pakhatna Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, rakhum ga ei le kasem lang atang khou rin thang ngo.”
Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou rinne, “He manpa, nani lu chung bi chongsem lang mak tabe kasem thang lang tuna Ating haap thanggabo?”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Barak theiyo khatle ra-aamnu bina nani cheksinno, balangbe misa kum ga baom balim balei amnu lan nung suinu make.”
Habei ga Maanna bani khou chongchak khat rinne, “Tudannu lungsanu manpa pakhat om taram bi tapaan tara tam takka kraa ngaake.
Maanna baraantoza baningluga rinne, ‘Aom tapaanna thang lang bariak maak briakpina, ei pa-aam to langbo?’
“Maanna rinne, ‘Eina heiya tone: Eina aom inta nun ga rai satluga kasem liandomnu khat bachane, habei ga aom tapaan bing khatle aom pot bing thangne.
Atiga eina akatha khou rinne, “He katha, nangna sangwan taswang khak lang kasanu pot bing ri thang rwe; nang lo basakro; saro, inro khatle karo lozaang saro.” ’
“Atiyeda Rikrwang na bakhou rinne, ‘He kapangnu! Aniya zingpha nakathaga nakhouna lou damlu rwe; nangna nalaang laang thangnu pot bing ga tu langbo?’
“Baraantoza lang lan khom thangluga, Rikrwang pek la lungsa maknu mi ga hei dannuwe.”

Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Atibriakpina Eina nani khou rinnuwe, nani pa-aam sa dingbo, diga nani kum lang riangre mako khatle nani pum lang pa-aam sin basoi dingbo, diga nani sung katop mako.
Kum ga thaisaak ma inkunuwe khatle pum ga sin basoi ma inkunuwe.

“Ba-aak nun lang bi baning ngo, bani tachi bwan make, lou le aat make, basaak thang riak inta le maake; atiyeda Rikrwang na bani ding pi sa thang nge. Nani nunba basaa nun ma intia baman tam inkunubo!
Nani lak pi tudannuna basung riangrenuna bakum bi kutki khat hap thangnu ngamgabo?
Nanina sin kataknu ding hakna to ngam mak tabe, katei bing lang pa-aam lang sung katop ongnubo?

“Lily rei nunna tatoga thou kabo baning phaang ngo: bani chwan to make, laa le thun make; atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Solomon na le balwat bing bi hakna ha rwan lak pi khat tanga tapon to dam make.

Aniya lou bi thou ongnu khatle inswan mei bi sat thang dam dingnu, tamphoi ding Rikrwang na hadanga tapon to thang nge dabe, he balumsat sinnu naniga, Maanna nani lang intia inkuga tapon to thanglu dingbo?
Nanina pa-aam sa dingbo mak tabe pa-aam in dingbo diga zong mako khatle sung katop mako.
Balangbe talei ram chaat bingna hei bing ding nga rakanga zong nge atiyeda nani Pa na ha bing ga nani lang bathaang amme dinu theiye.
Atiyeda Rikrwang om krwang talei ding zong ngo khatle hei bing nga nani lang hap thanglune.
“Kasinnu zao nun, kachi mako, balangbe krwang talei ya nani khou pi thangnu ga nani Pa om pemnuwe.

Nani om ka amnu ga zwan satluga paangsun piyo; baraan latnu nai maknu sian khao nani lang daanno, braan latlanu lan tambaan la ri thang ngo, habei ga barusanuna le hung banainu ngam make sum tri nale sabraannu ngam make.
Balangbe nani om lan amnu riaklaga nani sung le amlune.
“Nani kongkhaak khaak tipo khatle nani om thaomei pi baanno;
tazwan bahwan riak lana hungluga, inkhaan bachunu kaan bi bakhou haba kahan bi inkhaan lat swak lang, bani om bapuba ding ngaaknu mi nun danga towo.

Bapuba gana hungnu kaan bi ngaak ongnu hung dounu swak rwan ga aih sanuwe. Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, bapuba gana kongkhaak khaak tipluga bani ding sa in lang pi badungta lune khatle maanna hungluga bani ding chwanlaang to thanglune.
Maanna kaninu rangkaan mak tabe inthumnu rangkaan dat pi hungnu zaye atiyeda ngaak ongnu swak rwan ga aih sanuwe.
Atiyeda heiya theiyo, inpu gana impei chakrin bi in baruk mi hung dingbo dinu thei ngaake dabe maan barakka ong ngaak tingnuwe khatle bain ga pi torai mak ngaak tingnuwe.
Atibriakpina nani le daanga ong ngo, balangbe nanina baning maknu chakrin bi Misa Sa Kapaisa ga hunglune.”
Habei ga Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nangna heiba chongchak heiya ani khouza rinnumo mak tabe mi bingza khoubo?”

Pukraangba na rinne, “Bainpuba na bain inkhun lu chung bi kasa kasia phaangsinnu mi pi to dingnu bakaan badat chaga bani lang thaisaak pi thang dingnu balumsalang khopnu khatle ningtingnu phaangsinnu mi tubo?
Bainpubana hungnu kaan bi atiga to ongnu dounu swak ka aih sanuwe.
Batak takka Eina nani khou rinnuwe, bapubana baom ka am bing lu chung bi bating phaangsinnu mi pi to thanglune.
“Atiyeda swak kana basung bi, ‘Ainpuba bakhwa seiga hung laye’ diga baningluga swak kapaisa rwan le swak kamaisa rwan ding bwei thou rwe khatle saluga inluga zu kalo thouwe dabe,
maanna baning maknu lumik, thei maknu chakrin bi, haba swak om bapuba gana hunglune, bating batut kani toga tanchat satlune khatle baom dam ga balumsa maknu nun le diga pi lou bachamlune.
“Bainpuba sung theinu swak khatna bapum bahak daan ong maknu mak tabe maanna baningnu to ong nge dabe, bating bwei tamga bweilune.

Atiyeda bapuba om baningnu ga thei makka, bwei lang khopnu chwan to thangnu swak tingga bwei tom lune. Balangbe taswang khak pi damnu bakhouna taswang khak loulune; taswang khak sin thang damnu bakhouna taswang khak nilune.
“Ei talei ram bi mei bathan thang lang hungnuwe, atiga haga chok daan ong ngaaknu ding Eina intia lang bathainubo!
Atiyeda Ei baptize lou lang baptize khat amme khatle haga pi hung tang mak basaan Ei intia lang sung katopnubo!
Ei talei ram bi dai bazaangnu pi lang hungnuwe diga nani baningbo? Eina nani khou rinnuwe, make atiyeda to kapaang lang naye.
Balangbe atunna thouga mi pat impaang amnu inkhun ga to kapaanglune: pat thum khatna pat ni om maitwang bi khatle pat nina pat thum om maitwang bi onglune.
Bapana basa om maitwang bi khak lang swaklune, banuna sa kamaisa maitwang bi, sa kamaisana banu maitwang bi, banina bamou maitwang bi khatle bamouna bani maitwang bi onglune.”
Jisu na mi khang khou rinne, “Nanina lumik taak pek la tambu kanu munu kaan bi nanina haba kahan bi ga rinne, ‘Khwa hung naye’ khatle haga ati rwe.
Nanina kathwei pek lana thiraang raang hungnu munu kaan bi nanina rinne, ‘Aniya nisat natlune’ khatle haga ati rwe.
Sathot tonu nun ga! Nanina saangbaan le talei om thot ting rin basaamnu ngamme atiyeda nanina hei kaan om badan ding ga thei maknuwa tatonubo?
“O, nani nazan bahakna bazenu ding ga pa-aam toga lang swak ngam maknubo?

“Nangna nating munanu maan le diga chongsempuba kim la senu kaan bi lampui bi maan le diga kasa to lang karammo, mak tabe maanna nating chongsempuba khou pi swaklune, chongsempuba gana nating ngam amnu khou khatle ngam amnu gana nating qwan in bi thanglune.
Eina nakhou rinnuwe, nangna pi dingnu kakhamnu sian ga pi mak basaan nang habei gana swak latnu zalaye.”
Galilee rwanna rikhaang pot katnu bi Pilate na bani ding athatluga bani thi ga thang katwak rwe diga Jisu khou hung pu ngaaknu mi nun kasem ha kaan bi ong ngaake.
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Galilee rwanna heipai riangre nang briakpina, banina Galilee mi katei rwan ma inkuga noh phunnuwe diga nani baningbo?
Eina nani khou rinnuwe, make; atiyeda nani nun sung le make dabe, hadanga nani mi bing le braanlune.
Mak tabe Siloam bi basaang in baotaluga badan that tamnu mi pat somga kariat ka, Jerusalem bi amnu mi bing ma noh tam inkunuwe diga nani baningbo?
Eina nani khou rinnuwe, make atiyeda nani sung le make dabe hadanga nani mi bing le braanlune.”

Jisu na heiba chongchak heiya rinne, “Tudannu manpa pakhatna baom drakha anqwat pi tacham kung khat ling thang ngaake khatle maanna hungluga haba kung bi ga bakraa zong ngaake atiyeda khatchale dou make.

Maanna drakha anqwat mi khou rinne, ‘Phaang ngo, sangwan thum eina heiba tacham kung biya bakraa hung zong ngaake atiyeda khatchale dou make. Heiya pun satro; pa-aam lang talei ding to katop ongne gabo?’
“Atiyeda anqwat mi gana bakhou rinne, ‘Bapuba, eina bakungri chou kaphok koiluga har thang mak basaan, ani kum le atiga am dam dingriyo.
Heiyana bakraa kraaye dabe sa rwe, karaa make dabe haba nung bina nangna pun satro.’ ”
Jisu na Sabbath ni synagogue khat pi bachu thang ong ngaake.
Phaang ngo, sangwan somga kariat katha khatna pi songa ongnu mannu pakhat habei ga am ngaake, maan bangum takuga baraanto han thou ngam mak ngaake.
Atiyeda Jisu na bating munu kaan bi Bakim bi kou hungluga rinne, “Kamaisa, nason bina nating sut swak thang rwe.”
Maanna balu chung bi Bakut kaising thang rwe, haba kahan bi ga maan hen kating thou rwe khatle Rikrwang ding swanka rwe.

Atiyeda Jisu na bating Sabbath ni pi sa thang briakpina, synagogue om kaithangnupana balung pwanga mi nun khou rinne, “Nani mi nunna chwan to lang ni karuk amme; atibriakpina haba dat pi ga naanu pi sa thang lang hung ngo, Sabbath ni hung mako.”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Sathot tonu! Sabbath ni nani pakhat khatna nani om sen chan mak tabe lola bain bina sutluga, tui pi in lang kai swak makkabo?
Phaang ngo, heiba Abraham sa kamaisa ding nga, Seitaan na sangwan somga kariat bang thang ngaake atiyeda heiba bang thang ongnu bina bating Sabbath ni sut swak thang lagabo?”
Maanna bani khou atiga kabianu kaan bi Bating munanu nun ga kazaknu dou rwe khatle Jisu na heitia lwat liannu chwan to thangnu langna mi khang bing ga karo ngaake.
Jisu na rinne, “Rikrwang om krwang talei ga pa-aam danbo? Haga Eina pa-aam le diga rin kaba langbo?
Haga mi khatna baom anqwat pi bwan thangnu, ancham mu khat tannuwe; haga thou kaluga kaliannu thingkung imbei rwe khatle basaang la zwangnu basaa nunna hungluga babaak bing bi bani kabu kai rwe.”
Maanna rin late, “Rikrwang om krwang talei ga Eina pa-aam le diga rin kaba langbo?
Heiya mannu pakhatna khai louluga sukdi luklei inthumna pwangka mak basaan habei ga ri thangnu khai ga le bachamme.”
Jisu na namlian khatle nam nam bi serwanluga mi nun ding bachu thangga, Jerusalem tang lang se ngaake.
Habei ga mi khatna Bakhou ngaiye, “Pukraangba, kanthangnu lousu damnu mi titcha zungbo?” Jisu na bani khou rinne,
“Barumnu inkhaanmun bi ga khut lang karammo, Eina nani khou rinnuwe, mi inzana habei ga khut lang karamlune atiyeda khutnu ngamlaye.

Inpu ga na thouluga inkhaan ga khaan damme dabe, nanina langkaang la hanluga inkhaan bachuga rinlune, ‘Pukraangba, Pukraangba, ani lang inkhaan lat thang ngo,’ habei ga Maanna nani khou rinlune, ‘Nani inlamnabo, Ei nani ding thei make,’
habei ga nanina rinlune, ‘Nameithaan bi ani sa in ngaake khatle Nangna ani lampui bing bi bachu thang ngaake.’
“Atiyeda Maanna rinlune, ‘Nani inlamnabo dinu Ei thei make. Sa maknu chwan tonu nani bing ga, Akhouna se swak tro.’
“Rikrwang om krwang talei la Abraham, Isaac, Jacob khatle thiamting rwan bing ding nanina munu kaan bi chapka khatle ngaatang ei karit ritka onglune khatle nani nun ding langkaang la bathou satlune.
Bani nun lumik swak lumik taak, kasak kathwei lana hungluga, Rikrwang om krwang talei la sa in lang hung ongtalune.
Phaang ngo, habei ga kakhamnuna kamanu tolune khatle kamanuna kakhamnu tolune.”
Ha ni bahak ka Pharisee rwan mi kasemna hungluga Bakhou rinne, “Abeina se swak tro, balangbe Herod na Nating athat nwam ongme.”

Maanna bani khou rinne, “Sero, haba lousa ui khou ga rinno, ‘Phaang ngo, Eina ri kasia nun ding kazun sat ongme, kasa kanaa bing ding aniya pi sa thang ongme, inswan le pi sa thanglune khatle ni thum tangbani Achwan loilune.’
Ati ngaaklena Ei aniya le, inswan le, tipni le se lang maang nge; balangbe thiamting pakhatcha hakna Jerusalem paan la thinu za make.

“He Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Thiamting rwan ding athatnu khatle bakhou lang hungnu nun ding lungna khumnu nang! Aan puina baswan rwan ding babatha thwei bi ka aw thangnu ga danga Eina nani sa rwan ding katupka ka aw thang nwam ngaake atiyeda haga nanina bathai make!

Phaang ngo, nani in bing nga lung taakluga nani khou thangsia rwe; Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, ‘Pukraangba meng bi hungnu Maan ga aih sanuwe!’ diga rin dingnu bakaan ga hung tang mak basaan nanina Ating khatchale mula rwe.”
Jisu na Pharisee rwan bapuba pakhat in bi Sabbath ni sa in lang khutnu kaan bi banina bating atka phaang ong ngaake.
Phaang ngo, Bameithaan bi tui ri phunnu manpa khat ong ngaake.
Habei ga Jisu na chongtan theinu rwan le Pharisee rwan khou rinne, “Sabbath ni naanu ding pi sa thangnuwa zabo?”
Atiyeda bani thiap thiap ong ngaake. Atiga Maanna bating banaan thangluga pi sa thang rwe khatle bating pi se drwe.
Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani lak pi tudannu lola mak tabe sen chan amnu maanna haga khun bi ta thang nge dabe, haba kahan bi ha ding ga Sabbath ni lou thou thang mak tingnu mi suigabo?”
Bani hei lang bi chong kataknu ngamlan rwe.
Talot mi nunna sa kataknu riak pi ong lang ka thang kale ongnu ga muluga, Maanna bani khou chongchak khat rinne:
“Tudannuna nani ding tazwan bahwan balou bi talotnu kaan bi sa kataknu riak pi ong mako, balangbe nama takungnu pakhat ting talot ngaaknu le zaye;
nating talotnu maan gana hungluga nakhou rinlune, ‘Heiba manpa lang kaong riak ka pi thangbiyo,’ habei ga nang kazakka bangiam kataknu riak la ta onglune.

Atiyeda nating talotnu kaan bi seluga nang bangiam kataknu kaong riak la ong ngo atiye dabe nating talotnu maan gana hungluga nakhou rinlune, ‘Abaanpa, sadomnu riak la kaong thang ngo.’ Haba kaan bi nang le diga sa in lang ongnu nun meithaan bi nating takhwang to thanglune.
Balangbe baraanto bating pi basaangnu bating ga pi bangiam talune khatle basung bangiamnu bating ga pi basaang ka thanglune.”

Jisu na Bating talotnu manpa khou le rinne, “Nangna louthwan mak tabe khwazin thaisaak pi sanu kaan bi nabaan rwan, naunao rwan, inkhun rwan khatle lungsanu innai rwan ding talot mako, balangbe banina nating le talot latluga nalei chaak thun lune.
Atiyeda nangna balou thaisaak pi sanu kaan bi lungsianu nun, kut ket lwamnu, ket thoknu khatle mik chonu nun ding taloto.
Banina haga nalaang thunnu ngam mak briakpina, nang aih sanu tolune; balangbe ririak senu mi nunna ring thou latnu kaan bi nalaang haga thun thang latlune.”
Jisu le diga sa in bacham ongnu nun lak pi pakhatna heiba chong nga ngaisunu kaan bi maanna Jisu khou rinne, “Rikrwang om krwang talei la sa in dingnu maan ga aih saye!”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Tudannu pakhatna balou pui rang swakluga mi taswang khak talot ngaake,
atiga khwazin thaisaak sa in dingnu kaan bi maanna swak pakhat ting lang thangluga pi rin rwe, ‘Hungro, balangbe atun pot bingza laang thang rwe.’
“Atiyeda bani khangsungna sung khatcha toga sui mak lang rin rwe. Kamanu manpana bakhou rinne, ‘Ei lou khat kalei rwe, haga baphaang kama maang nge. Ating kai thang lang ei Nakhou hweiye.’
“Katei khatna rinne, ‘Ei senpot impaang kalei rwe, ei bani ding talen maang nge. Ating kai thang lang ei Nakhou hweiye.’
“Katei pakhatna le rinne, ‘Ei tazwan lou hung rwe atibriakpina ei hung ngamla rwe.’

“Atibriakpina swak kana hungluga hei bing nga bainpuba khou pu rwe. Habei ga inpuba gana balung pwanga baswak khou rinne, ‘Namlian om lampui bing le in lak bing bi barapka seluga lungsianu nun, kut ket lwamnu, mik chonu khatle ket thoknu nun ding kou hungro.’
“Swak kana rinne, ‘Pukraangba, nangna zathang pi thangnu nung suiga ei to rwe atiyeda bariak pa atun le ammaang nge.’
“Haba nung bi inpuba gana swak khou ga rinne, ‘Ainna ongsip lang, nang lampui pui bing le in lak bing bi seluga mi nun ding twansa makka kou hungro.
Balangbe Eina nakhou rinnuwe, talot tamnu mi bing ga pakhatchanale Aom balou thaisaak heiya batem bila rwe.’ ”
Mi khang puina Banung sui se ngaake. Habei ga Maanna bani khou kanei swakluga rinne,
“Tudannu pakhatna Akim bi hungluga banu bapa, bamei basa rwan, bau banao rwan khatle bazan bahak om kum ding tangga batan make dabe, maan Aom potroi to ngamlaye.
Tudannu baom cross ka phunluga Anung sui maknu maan ga Aom potroi to ngamlaye.
Balangbe nani lak pi pakhatna, basaang in to nwamme dabe, kamaga badungtaluga maanna haba in ga to loi ngamnu sian khop lang amrubo dinu pabilabo?
Haga ati make dabe, in ga rang thouluga to loi ngam maknu kaan bi haga phaangmunu mi bingna bating kiamga
rinlune, ‘Heiba manpana in be to thou rwe atiyeda maanna to loi ngam lan rwe.’

“Ati mak tabe krwang khatna krwang katei khat ting kraan katwak lang senu kaan bi bating katwak lang mi raching somni ding kalwangluga hungnanu bating baom mi raching som gana ngamlu dingbo diga chong kathui kama bilabo?
Maanna katwak ngamla dingnuwe dabe, krwang katei gana namlaa takka ongnu kaan bi tabat rwan ding lang thangluga kasa to kale lang kabia ding gaye.
Hei danga, nani lak pi pakhatna baom ka am bing bathan sat maknu maan gana Aom potroi tonu ngam make.
Bachi ya kasanu pote; atiyeda bachi gana bathum ga braan damme dabe haga tatoga pi thum lat langbo?
Haga talei lang le har lang le kana lan rwe atiyeda mi nunna haga bun sate. Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo!”
Ramkhai khomnu rwan le noh mi nunna Jisu chong ngai lang Bakim bi hung rwe.
Pharisee rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna tu tu tam tamga rinne, “Heiba Manpana noh mi nun ding loukhutluga bani le diga sa in bachamme.”
Habei ga Jisu na bani khou heiba chongchak heiya rinne:
“Nani lak pi pakhat om zao raza am bina khat braan damnu kaan bi somkaqwaga kaqwa ding ramhaang bi thangsialuga, braan damnu khat ting ga maanna zongsu mak basaan zong mak tingnu tu ambo?
Maanna haga dou latnu kaan bi karoga badaan kong bi pon thou rwe.
Bain hung tangnu kaan bi maanna babaan rwan le bainnai rwan ding kou kadoiluga bani khou rinne, ‘Ei le karo bachamzo, balangbe aom braan damnu zao ga eina dou lat rwe!’
Eina nani khou rinnuwe hadanga sung le lang bathaang maaknu mi somkaqwaga kaqwa ga ma noh mi pakhatna sung lenu langna tambaan la karo inkulune.
“Haga danga tangka som amnu mannu pakhat om, tangka khat braan dam mebe maanna thaomei taan thouluga haga zongsu mak basaan in thanga, zong chuiga zongbilabo?
Maanna haga zongsunu kaan bi babaan rwan le bainnai rwan ding kou kadoiluga rinne, ‘Ei le karo bachamzo, balangbe aom braan damnu sian ga dou lat rwe.’
Eina nani khou rinnuwe, haga danga noh mi pakhatna sung lenu kaan bi Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang rwan meithaan bi karonu amme.”
Maanna rinne, “Tudannu manpa pakhat sa kapaisa pat ni am ngaake.
Naosennu gana bapa khou rinne, ‘Apa, nangna alaang pi dingnu lan badam ga akhou pi thangro.’ Atibriakpina bapana barwei lang baom lan ga kasem thang rwe.
“Bakhwa sei maknu nung, naosennu gana baom lan bing khom thouluga namlaanu taram la bazin thou dam ngaake, haba riak pi maan lung impham imphaaga baom lan bing to braan loi drwe.
Maanna baom ka am bing to braan loinu nung, haba taram bi ga sia taknu bu taangnu hung rwe khatle balaang khatchale maak thou rwe.
Habei ga maanna seluga haba taram bi khulung sa pakhat kim bi sui ong rwe khatle manpa gana bating balou la bok nun ding basaak bun lang lang thang rwe.
Bok nunna sa ongnu bokthai ga maanna babon sa imba nwam ngaak rwe atiyeda pakhatchanale balaang thaisaak pi thang lan rwe.
“Maan bakaba thei swaknu kaan bi maanna rinne, ‘Apa om lan thangnu swak rwanna impham imphaga sa in ongme atiyeda eina abeiya chaam taraan ga thi ding dan ga ongme!
Ei thouluga apa kim la se lat tam rwe khatle bakhou atiga rinne, “Apa, ei tambaan khatle nameithaan bi noh to rwe,
ei nasa kapaisa diga kou lang khopnu lan rwe. Ating naom lan thangnu swak pakhat ting danga lou thangro.”
“Atiga maanna thouluga bapa kim la hung rwe. Atiyeda maanna namlaa lamangna se hungnanu ga bapana mu rwe khatle bapana kriangga pak hungluga baring hungphotluga bating kaput rwe.
“Maanna bapa khou rinne, ‘Apa, ei tambaan khatle nameithaan bi noh to rwe, ating nasa kapaisa diga kou lang khopnu lan rwe.’
“Atiyeda bapana baswak rwan khou rinne, ‘Sa kataknu pon naat barapka aswakluga balaang sin basoi thangro, bakut pi kutthop run thangro khatle baket pi ketthop thop thangro.
Bami pi sa thangnu sen chan swan ga lou hungluga athatro khatle ani saluga karo bachamrizo;
balangbe asa kapaisa heiya thi bina ring lat rwe; maan braan dam bina dou lat rwe.’ Atiga bani karo thou rwe.
“Atiyeda sa kapaisa patsonu ga lou la am ngaake. Maan bain nai hungnu kaan bi laa tonu le laamnu khwan ngaisu rwe.
Atibriakpina maanna swak pakhat ting kouluga hei bing nga pa-aam to ongnubo diga ngai rwe.
Swak kana bakhou rinne, ‘Nanao ga hung lat rwe, napana bating naa sananu to makka dou lat briakpina, bami pi sa thangnu sen chan swan khat balaang athat thang rwe.’
“Atiyeda maan balung pwanga insung khut nwam mak ngaak rwe. Atibriakpina bapana swakluga bating bathem rwe.

Maanna bapa khou rinne, ‘Phaang ngo, sangwan heichan eina nating chwanlaang toga; naom zathang khatchale zei maknu to make; atiyeda nangna alaang ken swan khatcha hakna abaan rwan le diga karo bacham lang diga pi thangnu maake.
‘Atiyeda naom lan bing taloi rwan le diga sabraan loi damnu, nasa kapaisa heiyana hung latnu kaan bi nangna bami pi sa thangnu sen chan swan balaang athat thang rwe.’
“Bapa na basa khou rinne, ‘Asa kapaisa, nangba ei le diga ong bacham batwan dabo, aom ka am bing nga naom zung nge.
Ani karo bacham dingnu zung rwe, balangbe nanao wa thi bina ring latnu zung rwe khatle braan dam bina dou latnu zung rwe.’ ”
Jisu na potroi rwan khou le rinne, “Lungsanu manpa om chwanlaang mi khat am ngaake, chwanlaang mi gana bapuba om lan to braanne diga mi nunna koi impu thang ngaake.
Atibriakpina bapubana bating kou hungluga bakhou rinne, ‘Na lang bi eina ngaisu ongnuwa tatonu ombo? Nachwanlaang om lang bi sing chak ka piro, balangbe nang chwanlaang mi to lat zala rwe.’
“Chwanlaang mi gana baraantoza basung bi baning rwe, ‘Ei pa-aam to langbo? Balangbe ainpubana chwanlaang chwan ga akhouna lou sat tam ding rwe. Ei talei le chounu ngamlaye; ei ni sa lang le kazake.
“Achwanlaang chwan bina lou sat tamnu kaan bi mi nunna ating bani in bi loukhut za lang ei paaam to langbo dinu ei thei rwe.’
“Atibriakpina maanna bainpuba om lei chaaknu mi bing ding kou kadoiluga kamanu manpa khou rinne, ‘Nang ainpuba lei inza chaakpo?’
“Maanna rinne, ‘Thao badat razaye.’ Habei ga maanna bakhou rinne, ‘Naom lei chaak om che ga louro khatle barapka badungtaluga somnga hiak thangro.’
“Habei gana maanna katei khat khou rinne, ‘Nang inza chaakpo?’ Maanna rinne, ‘Gehu cor badat razaye.’ Maanna bakhou rinne, ‘Naom lei chaak om che ga louro khatle haga somkariat hiak thangro.’
“Ririak se maknu chwanlaang mi gana ningtingga chwan to briakpina bapubana bating swanka rwe. Balangbe heiba mikin om sa rwanna bani om mikin bi babaan om sa kapaisa rwan ma ningting inkuwe.
Eina nani khou rinnuwe, talei ram om lan paan bina nalaang baan khommo, hagana loi damnu kaan bi banina nani ding khwa sei lung dingnu in bi lou thanglune.

“Tudannu titcha riak pi balumsa lang khopnu maan ga taswang khak riak pi le balumsa zanuwe khatle tudannu titcha riak pi lungning bathiang maknu maan ga taswang khak riak pi le lungning bathiang maknuwe.
Atibriakpina nanina talei ram om lan bi balumsa lang khop maknu towe dabe, bazenu lan ga tuna nani khou bachoi thang dingbo?
Nani ding mi katei khat om lan bi balumsa lang maake dabe, tuna nani om ga nani lang pi thang ding gabo?

“Swak khatna bapuba kani ding chwanlaang tonu ngam make; balangbe maanna pakhat ting batanluga katei ding krianglune mak tabe maanna pakhat ting takungluga pakhat ting thou to mak lune. Nanina Rikrwang le lan om chwanlaang tonu ngam make.”
Sian bathai natnu Pharisee rwanna le, hei bing nga ngaisuluga Jisu ding balaa ngaake.

Maanna bani khou rinne, “Mi nun meithaan bi nanina ririak senu thot toga pi muwe atiyeda Rikrwang na nani sung ding theiye. Balangbe mi nun lak pi baning basaangnu maan ga Rikrwang mikphaang bi batannuwe.
“Chongtan khatle Thiamting rwan om chong ga John na hungnu tangga kasam ngaake. Ha kaan bi gana thouga Rikrwang om krwang talei sacham ga kasam ongme khatle mi nunna habei ga namga khut ongme.
Chongtan om kasinnu hiak khat hung tang maknu ma tambaan le talei braannuna bai inkuwe.
“Tudannu bamei ding kanoi satluga katei khat ting kou latnu maan ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe khatle tudannu babasanna kanoi satnu bating kou latnu maan ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe.
“Sendumnu khatle banemnu pon sin basoinu lungsanu kani bathin karo rangaaga lungnu manpa pakhat am ngaake.
“Haba lungsanu manpa om inkhaan pui bi Lazarus tiga kounu khaisanu, bapum bing takhotna sipnu manpa pakhat ting hung thang ngaake,
lungsanu manpa om table bina kadaaktanu katup baneng gana babon sa imba nwam ngaake. Haba chung bi ui nunna le hungluga batakhot zam ga baliak ngaake.
“Atiga lungsianu manpa ga thi rwe khatle bating tambaan chonglang rwanna Abraham pam la phun thou drwe. Lungsanu manpa ga le thi rwe khatle ri thang drwe.
Kathi ram la raiga ong bi, maanna basaang la phaangkanu kaan bi namlaa la Abraham khatle bapam bi badung ongnu Lazarus ting mu rwe.

Maanna paoga rinne, ‘Apa Abraham ating phaangkriang thang ngo, Lazarus ting bakut zung ga tui bi imphomluga abalei pi dai thang lang lang thang ngo; balangbe ei mei balei lak pi riangre khaang ongme.’

“Abraham na bakhou rinne, ‘Sa kapaisa, nang ring ongnu kaan bi kasanu bing nalaang lousu drwe, hadanga Lazarus na kasianu bing lousu drwe; atiyeda atunba bating abeiya pi lozaan thang rwe khatle nangna riangre khaang rwe.

Hei bing chung bi, abeina nani khou tangga takan swak nwamnu nunna takan swak ngam mak lang khatle haba riak pi gana ani khou takan hung mak lang, ani le nani lak pi kaliannu bahaang khat pi am thang rwe.’
“Habei ga maanna rinne, ‘Apa, eina nating kalumme, balangbe nangna Lazarus ting apa in la lang thang ngo,
balangbe au anao kapaisa pat impaang amme, banina le heiba riangrenu riak pi hung mak lang maanna bani khou sake pi ding ngo.’
“Abraham na bakhou rinne, ‘Bani lang Moses khatle Thiamting rwan amme; banina bani chong ga ngai ding ngo.’
“Maanna rinne, ‘Apa Abraham, make, thinu nun lak pina pakhatna bani khou hung nge dabe bani sung lelune.’
Atiyeda Abraham na bakhou rinne, ‘Banina Moses khatle Thiamting rwan chong ga ngai make dabe, thi bina ring thou latnu pakhatna bani ding bathemnu zalaye.’ ”
Jisu na potroi rwan khou rinne, “Ket basuinu dou maknu ngam make atiyeda ket pi basuinu maan ga aih sianuweda!
“Atiyeda tudannuna heipai kasinnu pakhat ting ket pi basuinu bating ga baring bi saang tak lung khit thangluga tuipui bi sat thang damnu gana balaang sa inku dingnuwe.
“Nani cheksinno. Nau nanao pakhatna namaitwang bi noh towe dabe, bating tweiyo khatle maanna sung leye dabe, bating kok thangbiyo.
Maanna namaitwang bi kani khat sung bi noh to leng siariye dabe atiluga nakhou hung leng siariluga maanna ‘Ei sung lerwe’ diga rinne dabe, nang bating kok thang ding gaye.”
Chonglang rwanna Pukraangba khou rinne, “Ani balumsat pi inku thou thang ngo.”
Pukraangba na rinne, “Nani khou balumsat ancham mu tiaza beida amme dabe, heiba pulang kung ding nga, ‘Nang nakamong phokluga tuipui la ga khut thou dammo’ diga rinne dabe nachong zei dam zung nge.
“Nani lak pi mi khat om lou khoinu mak tabe zao siannu swak pakhat amme dabe, maanna lou lana hungnu kaan bi bating, ‘Barapka hungro, sa in lang ongtaro’ diga rin dingnu tu ambo?
Atiyeda haba hut lang bakhou, ‘Nang alaang sa lang kasem daanno, ei sa in taang mak basaan kongkhaak khaak tipluga ating chwanlaang towo, ha taang bi nang sa inno’ diga rinlagabo?
Maanna bakhou zathang pi thangnu ga danga to briakpina swak ting ga maanna swanka dambo? Swanka make diga eina baning nge.
Hadanga nanina le nani khou zathang pi thangnu bing ga toluga, ‘Ani bathaang maaknu swak rwanne. Anina to dingnu thou ga anina tonu zung nge’ diga rinno.”
Jisu na Jerusalem la senu kaan bi Maan Samaria le Galilee taram se rwan hung ngaake.
Atiga Maan nam khat pi khutnu kaan bi namlaa la han ongnu imphaannu pat somna Bating kadou rwe.
Banina baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Pukraangba Jisu, ani ding phaangkriang thang ngo!”
Jisu na bani ding munu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Sero, nani pum ga tako rwan khou pi muwo.” Atiga banina se ongnu kaan bi bani pum ga bathiang drwe.
Habei ga bani lak pi pakhatna maan sa drwe dinu theiluga maanna han hung latluga baraam basaangga paoga Rikrwang ding swanka rwe
khatle Maanna Jisu ket pi in bakhup taluga Bating swan ngaake. Haba manpa ga Samaria rwan ngaake.
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Pat som ding to bathiang thang damnu makkabo? Atiyeda pat kaqwa ga inlam thoudrubo?
Talei khat la mi ya makka pakhatcha hakna han hungluga Rikrwang ding swanlanrubo?”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Thouluga sero, nabalumsatna nating pi sa thang rwe.”
Pharisee rwanna Rikrwang om krwang talei ga impei dat pi hunglu dingbo diga Jisu khou ngainu kaan bi Maanna bani khou katake, “Rikrwang om krwang talei ga badannu le bachamga hung make;
banina, ‘Abeiya Phaang ngo,’ mak tabe ‘Ula Phaang ngo,’ diga rinlaye. Batak takka, Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nani lak pi amme.”
Maanna potroi rwan khou rinne, “Misa Sa Kapaisa om lumik rwan lak pi khat ka nanina mu nwam taknu dat hunglune atiyeda nanina haga mulaye.
“Banina nani khou rinlune, ‘Abeiya Phaang ngo!’ Mak tabe ‘Ula ga Phaang ngo!’ Atiyeda bani nung sui se mako mak tabe bani nung sui mako.
“Balangbe khwa bathaaknuna tambaan kalan khat lana tambaan kalan khat la baan tangnu ga danga, Misa Sa Kapaisa ga le Baom lumik pi hadanlune.
Atiyeda kamaga Maan riangre kanang inza khaanglu rwe khatle heiba mikinna Bating za mak lune.
“Noah kaan bi swak tamnu ga danga, Misa Sa Kapaisa om lumik ka le hadanga swaklune:
Noah na lipui sung bi khut mak basaan banina saluga, inluga, tazwan bahwanluga khatle tazwan bahwan lang pi swakka lung ong ngaake khatle tui lian hungluga bani ding to braan sat loi ngaak rwe.
“Hadanga Lot kaan bi le swak ngaake, banina saluga, inluga, kaleiga, zwanga, banina tapaan lingga khatle in toga ong ngaake;
atiyeda Lot na Sodom bina se swaknu ni saangbaan lana mei le kanduk khwa suntaluga bani mi bing ding to braan sat rwe.
“Misa Sa Kapaisa ding indao thangnu lumik ka le hadanlune.
Ha ni ga tudannu in chung bi ong ngaaknu maan gana insung la amnu bapot talou mak ting ngo. Hadanga lou la ongnu maannale han hung mak ting ngo.
“Lot mei ding ga baningsuwo.
Tudannu bakum ring lang zongnu maan ga braanlune khatle tudannu bakum braannu bating ga pi ring thanglune.
“Eina nani khou rinnuwe, ha ni zingpha ga ria khat pi pat ni in onglune: Khat ting lou thou damlune, khat ting thangsialune.
Kamaisa pat ni saang tak bacham onglune: Khat ting lou thou damlune, khat ting thangsialune.
Lou bi manpa pat ni onglune: Khat ting lou thou damlune, khat ting thangsialune.”
Banina Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, haga inlambo?” Maanna bani khou rinne, “Kathi pum amnu riak pi ga langkiya rwan le hung kadoilune.”
Mi nunna chat makka hweini ong ding gaye khatle sung inkhin mak ting gaye dinu pi thei langna, Jisu na bani khou chongchak khat
rinne, “Namlian khat pi Rikrwang ding le kachi mak, mi nun ding le takung tazei to maknu chongsempuba khat am ngaake.
Haba namlian bi ga tameinu khatle am ngaake; maanna chongsempuba kim bi hungluga rinne, ‘Ating munanu lu chung bi bazenu chongsem kasem thang ngo.’
“Maanna bakaan kasem za mak ngaake; atiyeda bataang la basung bi atiga kakhan rwe, ‘Eina Rikrwang ding kachi mak ngaak peida khatle mi nun ding takung tazei to mak ngaak peida,
heiba tameinuna ating to katop ong briakpina, maanna hung katupka hungluga ating to riangre mak lang ei balaang bazenu chongsem kasem thang lang rwe.’ ”
Pukraangba na rinne, “Ririak se maknu chongsempuna rinnu ga ngaiyo.
Rikrwang na bani le khwa seiga khaang thang ngaak peida, Maanna kathang swak thangnu nunna zingpha thamlai Bakhou hweini ongnu nun lang Rikrwang na bazenu chongsem kasem thang makkabo?
Eina nani khou rinnuwe, maanna bani lang barapka bazenu chongsem kasem thanglune. Atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisana hungnu kaan bi talei ram bi balumsanu doulu dingbo?”
Mi kasemna bani ririak senuwe katei rwanba khatchale make, diga baraantoza ding balumsanu nun om lang bi Maanna heiba chongchak heiya rin ngaake,
“Mi pat ni kalum lang kalum in bi se ka rwe, pakhatna Pharisee, pakhatna ramkhai khomnuwe.
Pharisee gana hanluga baraanto atiga kalum rwe, ‘He Rikrwang, eina Nating swanne, eiba mi katei rwan danga kasut sanu, baze maknu, lungkoi lungmaannu mak tabe heiba ramkhai khomnu mi dannu make.
‘Eiba maap lak khat pi kalumsan leng niye; aom ka am bing om som dam le pi swake.’
“Atiyeda ramkhai khomnu manpa gana namlaa la hanluga, bamai kum hakna tambaan la taswang khak batou thou makka atiyeda bakachaang kachumga rinne, ‘He Rikrwang, noh mi ating phaangkriang thang ngo.’

“Eina nani khou rinnuwe, heiba manpa heiya pakhat ka ma pi baze thangluga bain la se drwe; balangbe bazan ding pi basaangnu ding pi bangiam talune khatle bazan ding pi bangiamtanu ding pi basaang ka thanglune.”
Banina kasinnu naosen rwan ding le bani lu chung bi banaan thang lang Jisu khou kalwang hung rwe; atiyeda potroi rwanna haga muluga bani ding twei ngaake.
Atiyeda Jisu na bani ding Bakim bi kou hungluga rinne, “Kasinnu naosen rwan ga Akhou hung ding ngo, bani ding khaam mako; balangbe Rikrwang om krwang talei ga hei rwan dannu nun lang nge.
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tudannu khatna kasinnu naosen khat tanga Rikrwang om krwang talei ding lou thang maknu maan ga habei ga khatchale khutlaye.”
Tudannu taleipuba pakhatna Jisu khou ngaiye, “Kasanu Bachuthangnupa, ringzoknu kum lousu lang ei pa-aam to langbo?”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna pa-aam lang Ating kasanu diga kounubo? Pakhat tak pakhatcha amnu Rikrwang ga makka kasanu pakhatchale maake.
Nangna zathang bing ga theiye, ‘Lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to mako,’ ‘Mi athat mako,’ ‘Baru sa mako,’ ‘Kakoinu sake pi mako,’ ‘Nanu napa ding takung tazeiyo.’ ”
Maanna rinne, “Hei bing nga ei naosen badona zei hung rwe.”

Jisu na hei bing nga ngaisunu kaan bi Maanna bakhou rinne, “Nakhou khatpa baatmaang nge. Naom ka am bing ga zwan satluga lungsianu nun lang kasem thangbiyo atiye dabe tambaan la nalaang lan amlune khatle hungluga Anung suiro.”
Maanna heiba chong nga ngaisunu kaan bi maan basung riangre tak rwe, balangbe maan lungsa taknu mi ngaake.
Jisu na maan basung riangre tak rwe dinu muluga rinne, “Lungsanu nunna Rikrwang om krwang talei khut lang intia kungnubo!
Balangbe lungsanu mi khatna Rikrwang om krwang talei khutnu ma ut khatna kaphin kana bi lon brwannuna bai inkuwe.”
Haga ngaisunu mi nunna rinne, “Ati dabe tuna kanthangnu lousu ngam dingbo?”
Jisu na rinne, “Misa lang hung tang lanu ga Rikrwang khou hung tang zanuwe.”
Peter na rinne, “Phaang thang ngo, anina pum brumza bathan satluga Nanung sui se ongme.”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei lang chungna, bain mak tabe banu bapa mak tabe bau banao mak tabe bamei mak tabe basa rwan bing bathan satluga,
hei kaan bi banina badam tam inkuga khatle hung dingnu bakaan bi khwa sei ringnu lou thang mak tingnu khatchale maake.”

Haba nung Jisu na potroi pat somga kani ding kalwang swakluga bani khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, ani Jerusalem la se ongme khatle Misa Sa Kapaisa lang bi thiamting rwanna hiak thang ngaaknu bing ga hung tanglune.
“Balangbe Bating Gentile rwan khou pi swaklu rwe, Bating kiamlune, pi kazaklune khatle bachin le bachin thanglune.
Banina Bating bweilune khatle athatlune. Atiga Maan ni thum ni ring thou latlune.”
Atiyeda rin ongnu bing nga banina bakaba khatchale thei mak ngaake; rin ongnu chong nga bani khouna inthim thang ngaake khatle rin damnu bing ga bani bakaba thei mak ngaake.
Jisu na Jericho hung tang lang nai hung bi, tudannu mik chonu pakhat nisaga lampui paan bi badungluga ong ngaake.
Mi khangna se hungnu ga ngaisuluga, maanna haga paaambo diga ngai rwe.
Banina bakhou Nazareth Jisu hung naye diga rin rwe.
Maanna paoga rinne, “David Sa Kapaisa Jisu ating phaangkriang thang ngo!”
Habei ga meithaan la se ongnu mi nunna bating rim rim ong lang twei rwe; atiyeda maanna pao rakan ranga rinne, “David Sa Kapaisa ating phaangkriang thang ngo!”
Jisu na han basakluga bating Bakim bi kalwang hung lang zathang pi rwe. Bakim bi hungnu kaan bi Jisu na bakhou
ngaiye, “Eina nalaang paaam to thangnu bathaigabo?” Maanna katake, “Pukraangba, ei mik munu lou nwamme.”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Namik mu lat tingro; nabalumsat paan bina nating pi sa thang rwe.”
Haba kahan bina maan mik mu lat rwe, atiga Rikrwang lwat liannu ding swanga Banung sui se rwe. Mi bingna haga munu kaan bi Rikrwang ding swanka rwe.
Jisu na Zericho bi khutluga habei ga se phao swak rwe.
Phaang ngo Zacchaeus tiga kounu, ramkhai khomnu rwan om balu tonu, lungsanu pakhat am ngaake.
Maanna Jisu wa tubo phaang lang zong ngaake atiyeda mi tam briakpina mungam mak ngaake, balangbe maan bangiamnu mi ngaake.
Atibriakpina maanna pak basom kaluga Jisu ding phaang lang heipong kung bi bazaak ka rwe, balangbe Jisu na haba lampui bi ga se rwan hung dingnu ngaake.
Jisu na haba riak pi ga hung tangluga phaangkanu kaan bi bating muluga bakhou rinne, “Zacchaeus barapka taro, balangbe Ei aniya nain bi riak lang rwe.”
Maanna barapka taluga Jisu ding karoga bain bi loukhut rwe.
Banina haga munu kaan bi bani khangsungna tu tu tam tamga rinne, “Phaang ngo, Maan noh mi khat om man to lang thou drwe.”

Habei ga Zacchaeus na han thouluga Pukraangba khou rinne, “Phaang thang ngo, Pukraangba, eina aom lan tangkhai lungsianu nun lang piye; eina tudannu om baze maknu baraan piga lou thangnu amme dabe, badam bali inkuga eina pine.”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Aniya heiba in bi ringriak hung rwe, balangbe heiba manpa heiya le Abraham sa kapaisa ye;
balangbe Misa Sa Kapaisa ga braan damnu ding zong lang khatle kan thang langna hungnuwe.”

Banina heiba chong bing nga ngai ongnu kaan bi Maanna chongchak katei khatle rinne, balangbe Maan Jerusalem hung tang lang nai hung ngaak rwe khatle Rikrwang om krwang talei ga barapka hunglu rwe diga banina baning ngaake.
Atibriakpina Maanna rinne, “Tudannu kaliannu manpa pakhatna namlaanu talei khat la seluga balaang krwang talei khat lousuluga hung lat lang se ngaake.
Maanna baswak pat som ding kou hungluga, bani pakhat khat khou mina khat khat pi luga bani khou rinne, ‘Ei hung lat mak basaan heiyana langgon ngaako.’
“Atiyeda batalei mi nunna bating batanga, banung la mi lang thangluga rinne, ‘Heiba manpana ani lu chung bi paannu ani bathai make.’
Maanna krwang talei louluga, han hungnu kaan bi maanna sian pi thang damnu swak rwan gana, langgonluga inza za tongrubo dinu thei langna, bakim bi kou hung lang, zathang pi rwe.
“Kamanu manpa gana hungluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, naom mina gana katei mina som tong rwe.’
“Maanna bakhou rinne, ‘To chui rwe, kasanu swak; nang titcha chung bi balumsa lang khop briakpina namlian som om bapuba toro.’
“Kaninu manpa gana hungluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, naom mina gana katei mina impaang tong rwe.’
“Maanna hadanga bakhou rinne, ‘Nang le namlian impaang om bapuba toro.’
“Katei khat kana le hungluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, naom mina ga abeiya am rwe, eina heiya pwanna kazwanluga ri thangnuwe.
Balangbe ei nating kachiye, balangbe nang kanthi sianu mi briakpina nangna thangta maknu riak pi kachung thounu khatle nangna bwan thang maknu ding khom thounu miye.’

“Bapubana bakhou rinne, ‘Sa maknu swak nang, namun bina kabia swaknu nung suiga eina nating chong sem lang rwe. Eiya kanthi sianu, eina thangta maknu riak pi lou thounu khatle eina bwan thang maknu ding khom thounu miye dinu nang theiye.
Ati dabe pa-aam toga nangna aom sian ga sian rik in bi thang maknubo, eina hung latnu kaan bi haga sianthoi le diga eina lousubilabo?’
“Maanna bakim bi han ongnu mi nun khou rinne, ‘Bakhouna mina ga lou swak tammo khatle mina som amnu bakhou ga pi dammo.’
“Atiyeda banina bakhou rinne, ‘Bapuba, bakhou mina som am rwe.’
‘Balangbe eina nani khou rinnuwe, ka amnu mi bing khouga pi thanglune khatle ka maaknu bakhou ga, bakhou amnu ga tangga lou swak tamlune.
‘Atiyeda ating munanu, eina bani lu chung bi paannu bathai maknu nun ding ga abeiya lou hungluga, ameithaan bi athat sat tammo.’ ”
Maanna heiya rinnu nung, sebasomluga Jerusalem la se ka ngaake.
Maan Olive Rammwan diga kounu riak pi amnu, Bethphage le Bethany kim bi hungnu kaan bi Baom potroi pat ni ding lang thangluga
rinne, “Narwei meithaan la amnu nam la ga sero atiga sekhut pi mi khatchanale twang mak aangnu, lola swan khat bang thang ong ngaakne. Haga sutluga abeiya lou hung ngo.
Tudannuna ‘Haga pa-aam lang sutnubo’ diga ngaiye dabe, bakhou rinno, ‘Heiya Pukraangba lang bathaang amme.’ ”
Maanna lang thang damnu pat ni gana se hungnu kaan bi barwei khou rin thangnu ga danga dou rwe.
Barweina lola swan ga sut lang to ong bi bapuba rwanna barwei khou rinne, “Narweina lola swan ding ga paaam lang sutnubo?”
Barweina rinne, “Heiya Pukraangba lang bathaang amme.”
Barweina haga Jisu khou lou hung rwe. Banina lola swan chung bi bani pwan sap thang rwe khatle banina ha chung bi Jisu ding pi twang rwe.
Maanna atiga se hung bi, banina bani pwan lampui bi pha thang rwe.
Maan Olive Rammwan setanu riak nai hungnu kaan bi potroi rwan mi khangna banina phaangmu damnu tasiatnu chwan bing langna baraam basaangga khatle karoga paoga Rikrwang ding swanga
rinne, “ ‘Pukraangba meng bi hungnu Krwang ga aih saye!’ Tambaan la dai bazaangnu khatle basaang kataknu bi lwat lian ding ngo!”
Mi khang lak pina Pharisee rwan mi kasemna Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Naom potroi rwan ding ga tweiyo.”
Atiyeda Maanna bani khou katake, “Eina nani khou rinnuwe, hei rwanna rim rim ta damme dabe heiba lung bingna barapka pao thoulune.”
Maanna Jerusalem nai hungnu kaan bi Maanna namlian ding phaangmuluga ha langna chapka
rinne, “Nangna aniya lumik pi, nazanna nalaang dai bazaangnu pi thang dingnu ding ga bapu thei ngaake dabe! Atiyeda atunba haga namikphaang bi inthim thang ong maang nge.
Balangbe nalu chung bi heipai bakaanna hunglu rwe nating munanu mi nunna kapan toga, nating nung ma imbei inchang ong qwatluga thing damlu rwe,

banina nating khatle nakhou amnu nasa rwan ding to mut satlu rwe khatle nakhou banina lung bing nga khat chung bi khat pi am latla rwe, balangbe nating hung phaang damnu dat ka nangna thei mak ngaake.”
Maan kalum in bi khutluga habei ga kaleinu zwannu chwan to ongnu nun ding kazun sat thouluga
bani khou rinne, “Heiya hiak thangluga amme, ‘Ain ga kalum in ne,’ atiyeda haga nanina ‘Baruksaak mi nun kabu’ pi to rwe.’ ”
Maan kalum in bi kani bathin mi nun ding bachu thangga ong ngaake. Atiyeda takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle mi nun ding kai thangnu nunna Bating athat lang zong ngaake,
atiyeda banina khatchale tonu ngam mak ngaake; balangbe mi nunna Bachong ga sung khutka ngai ngaake.
Kani khat Maanna kalum in bi mi nun ding bachu thangga khatle sacham kasam thangga ongnu kaan bi takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le patso rwan bing le bachamga Bating kaega
Bakhou rinne, “Ani khou rinno, Nangna pa-aam ngamna hei bing nga to ongnubo? Mak tabe Nakhou heiba ngamma pi thangnu maan ga tubo?”
Maanna bani khou katake, “Eina le nani khou chong khat ngaide, haga Akhou katako:
John na baptize to thangnu ga tambaan lanamo mak tabe mi nun khounabo?”
Bani cham kakhanluga rinne, “Anina ‘Tambaan la naye,’ diga rinne dabe, Maanna rinlune, ‘Ati dabe nanina pa-aam toga bating balumsa maknubo?’
Anina ‘Haga mi nun khou naye,’ diga rinne dabe, mi bingna ani ding lungna khum lune, balangbe banina John ding thiamting khate diga balumsaye.”
Atiga banina haga inlamnabo dinu thei make diga katak rwe.
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina pa-aam ngamna hei bing nga tonubo dinu Ei le nani khou rinlaye.”
Maanna mi nun khou heiba chongchak heiya rin thou rwe, “Tudannu pakhatna drakha anqwat bachaluga haga anqwat mi nun khou saan thangsialuga, maan namlaanu taram la bakhwa seiga bazin thou dam ngaake.

Drakha kraa lwaknu dat pi maanna baswak pakhat ting anqwat mi nun khou lang hung rwe, haga banina balaang drakha kraa kasem pi lang nge. Atiyeda anqwat mi nun gana bating bweiluga kut barwang bathan sat rwe.
“Maanna swak katei khat ting bathan lat rwe; banina bating le bwei rwe khatle bating to mai sia thangluga kut barwang bathan sat rwe.
Maanna leng thumnu toga pakhat ting bathan lat rwe; banina bating le to bazam thangluga bazwan sat thang rwe.
“Drakha anqwatpuna rinne, ‘Ei pa-aam tonuna sa dingbo? Eina kriangnu asa kapaisa ding ga bathanne. Banina bating munu kaan bi takung tazei tonu le zaye.’
“Atiyeda anqwat mi nunna bating munu kaan bi bani cham kakhanluga rinne, ‘Heiya barakhum lwak tingnu mi rwe. Hungro, barakhum ga anina lwak lang bating athat satrizo.’
Banina bating drakha anqwat paan la bazwan satluga athat rwe. Atibriakpina drakha anqwatpuba gana bani ding paaam tolu dingbo?
“Maanna hungluga anqwat mi nun ding ga to braan satlune. Atiluga anqwat ka mi katei rwan khou pi lune.” Mi nunna haga ngaisunu kaan bi banina rinne, “Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo.”
Maanna bani ding phaangluga rinne, “Ati dabe ‘Intok mi nunna bazwan sat thangnu lung gana, Intaki om bakung tonu lung imbei rwe.’ diga hiak thangnu ga pa-aambo?
Tudannu heiba lung chung bi bazwantanu ga baklune; atiyeda tudannu heiba lungna balu chung bi ta thangnu maan ga, tambut imbeilune.”

Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le takopuba rwanna haba chakrin bi ga Balu chung bi kut ta lang zong ngaake atiyeda bani mi nun ding kachi ngaake, balangbe Pukraangba na heiba chongchak heiya bani ding rinnuwe dinu banina thei ngaake.
Banina Jisu ding chwanga, inkamnu mi ririak senu thot tonu nun ding bathan thangluga, Bachongkaang bina Bating namluga, taleipuba om ngam khatle nat pi bachoi thang langna,
banina Bakhou ngai rwe, “Bachuthangnupa, Nangna bazega kabiaye khatle bachu thang nge dinu ani thei rwe, Nang mi mai phaang make atiyeda Rikrwang lampui ding bazega bachu thang rwe:
Caesar lang ramkhai pinu zamo za makpo?”
Maanna bani rou ga theiluga bani khou katake, “Nanina Ating pa-aam lang tamphaang ongnubo?
Akhou denari khat pi muwo. Heiya tu maangbo khatle pa-aam hiak thang ambo?” Banina katake, “Caesar omme.”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atibriakpina Caesar om pot ka Caesar khou piyo khatle Rikrwang om pot ka Rikrwang khou piyo.”
Banina Jisu ding mi nun meithaan bi Bachong kabiak pina namnu ngamlan rwe. Bachong katak pi ga bani loh lo ga thiap thiap ta drwe.
Ring thou latnu maake dinu Saducee rwan mi kasem Bakim bi hungluga

rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Moses na ani lang hiak thang ngaake, tudannu unao khatna mei kouluga sa nao cha makka thi damme dabe, banao gana batang mei ding ga louluga batang lang chungna sa nao cha ding gaye.
“Atiga unao pat siari am ngaake. Patsonu ga mei kouluga sa nao cha makka thi drwe.
Kaninu gana bating bamei lang lou rwe, maan le sa nao cha makka thi lat trwe.
Inthumnu gana bating lou lat rwe, hadanga bani pat siarina bating lou rwe; atiyeda bani khangsung sa nao cha makka thi loi drwe.
Kham katak pi mannu ga le thi drwe.
Atibriakpina ring thou latnu ni mannu ga tu mei to dingbo? Balangbe bani pat siarina bating bamei toga lou ngaake.”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Heiba bakaan om sa kapaisa rwanna tazwan bahwanne khatle tazwan bahwan lang pi swake.
Atiyeda hung dingnu bakaan lang ga khope diga baningnu khatle thi bina ring thou lang khopnu mi nun ga tazwan bahwan make, tazwan bahwan lang le pi swak make;
bani thi lat la rwe, balangbe bani tambaan chonglang rwan le bachamlune khatle bani ring thou latnu om sa rwan briakpina bani Rikrwang sa rwan to rwe.

Moses na Pukraangba ding ‘Abraham Rikrwang, Isaac Rikrwang khatle Jacob Rikrwang’ diga kounu kaan bi maan tangga chok ongnu lou lak om lang bi hiak thangnu riak pi thinu mi nunna ring thouwe dinu pi mu thang nge.
Balangbe maan thinu nun om Rikrwang make atiyeda ringnu nun om Rikrwang nge, balangbe Bakhou mi bingza ring nge.”
Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan mi kasemna Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Nangna rin chuiga rin thang rwe.”
Haba nung bina thouga banina Bakhou tangai ngai lat raang mak ngaak rwe.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Tatoga Christa heiya David Sa Kapaisa ye diga rinnubo?
Balangbe David maan bahakna Kalum Laa chongdip pi atiga rin thang nge, ‘Pukraangba na Apukraangba khou rinne,
“Eina Nating munanu nun ding Naket kadim riak pi to mak basaan, Akut inchang pek la badung ong ngo.” ’
Atibriakpina David na Bating ‘Pukraangba’ diga kouwe dabe, Maan tatoga Basa Kapaisa to langbo?”
Mi bingna ngai ongnu kaan bi Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou rinne,

“Pon baswannu thangnu, keithian lak pi mi nunna kadou chongkaang kabia thangnu ding lou nwamnu, synagogue pi sa kataknu kaong riak pi ong nwamnu, balou riak pi sa kataknu kaong riak ting bathainu, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan ding ga nani cheksinno,
baniga tameinu rwan in kapumnu khatle mi nun ding pi mulangna kalum bakhwa seiye. Bani nun lu chung bi ta thang dingnu chongtok ka lian inkulune.”
Jisu na phaang koinu kaan bi lungsanu nunna lan kat thangnu riak pi bani om potkat rwan sat thangnu mu rwe,
tudannu lungsianu tameinu pakhatna le sian pek swan kani sat thangnu Maanna mu rwe.
Maanna rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, lungsianu heiba tameinuna mi katei bing ma inkuga sat thang rwe;
balangbe katei bing gana bani om am tamnu bi gana Rikrwang lang leithwan kat thang nge atiyeda heiba mannuna balungsiat sung bi baom maaknu bina maan sa ring dingnu pum brum ga thangta rwe.”
Mi kasemna kalum in ga, intia lang kasanu lungna khatle potkatna tapon to thangbo diga kabia ngaake, Maanna rinne,
“Nanina mu ongnu hei bing nga, to bakla dingnu lung khat chung bi lung khatchale am thang siala dingnu bakaan ga hunglu rwe.”
Banina Bakhou ngaiye, “Bachuthangnupa, ati dabe hei bing nga impei dat pi swaklu dingbo? Hei bing nga swak tingnu kaan bi pa-aam badannu amlu dingbo?”
Maanna rinne, “Pakhatchanale nani ding minam mak lang cheksinno. Balangbe Ameng bi mi tamga hungluga rinlune, ‘Ei Maan ga rwe’ khatle ‘Bakaan nai rwe.’ Atibriakpina nani bani nung sui mako.
“Atiyeda nanina kraan cham khatle kasao kabaonu cham ngaisunu kaan bi nani kachi mako; balangbe hei bing nga kamaga swaklune atiyeda kakhamnu ga hung nong bila maang nge.”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Chaat khatna chaat khat lu chung bi khatle krwang talei khatna krwang talei khat maitwang bi kraan katwak thoulune.
Tei teinu bariak pi kanatnu talei kalinglune, bu taangnu le ripian; kachinu khatle tasiatnu badannu bing tambaan la mulune.

“Atiyeda ha bing ga swak maknu meithaan, banina nani lu chung bi kut taluga rai thoulune, synagogue le qwan in bi nani ding pi swaklune. Ameng lang chungna nani ding krwang nun le bapuba rwan khou phun thanglune.
Atiyeda haga sake to lang nani lang badou chanu tolune.
“Atibriakpina nanina katak tingnu meithaan pa-aam kabia dingbo diga kakhan kama mak lang nani sung hanno;
balangbe nani ding munanu mi nunna nani ding to kabat kabaangnu mak tabe kakhangnu ngamlanu mun khatle ningting Eina nani lang pi thangne.
“Nani nu pa rwanna, naunao rwanna, inkhun mi nun le baan rwanna nani ding pi swaklune khatle banina nani kasem ding athatlune.
“Ameng lang chungna mi bingna nani ding batanlune.
Atiyeda nani lu bina sam sang khat tangga braanlaye.
Nani nun khaang rakannu paan bina nani ringnu lousulune.
“Jerusalem ding kraanmi nunna han qwatnu nanina phaangmunu kaan bi haga lung taak lang nai hung rwe dinu theiyo.
Judea bi ongnu mi nun ga rammwan la pak thou dam ding ngo, namlian sung bi amnu nun ga le pak swak tam ding ngo khatle nam la mi nun le namlian bi ga khut mak ting ngo.
Balangbe hiak thang ngaaknu bing ga hung tang langna, takhum baannu bakaan ga hung tang rwe.
Ha kaan ga pum ritnu khatle nao chup ongnu nun lang aih sianuweda! Balangbe talei ram bi riangre taknu hunglune khatle heiba mi nun lu chung bi Rikrwang balung pwan ta thanglune.
“Bani ding kachaak chemna athatlune, bani ding kraan minam toga chaat bing khou phun thou damlune. Gentile rwan om kaan ga loi mak basaan Gentile rwanna Jerusalem ding bani ketna kadim kataalune.
“Lumik pi, tha bi, insi bing bi badannu mulune khatle talei ram bi chaat bing khou riangrenu, tuipui le tui kabaapnuna batok thei maknu tolune;
kachinu bina khatle talei ram bi hung dingnu om lang bi kakhanluga mi nunna balumta rwe, balangbe saangbaan la ngam bing kanuklune.
“Haba kaan bi Misa Sa Kapaisana tambu bi ngam khatle tasiatnu lwat le bachamga tanu banina phaangmulune.
Hei bing nga swak thounu kaan bi nani batou thouluga basaang la phaangkawo, balangbe nani ding kan thang dingnu bakaan ga nai rwe.”
Maanna bani khou chongchak khat rinne, “Tacham kung khatle thingkung bing ding ga phaang ngo,
ha bing gana bazik kasat swaknu kaan bi nanina khwalumpha nai rwe dinu theiye.
“Hadanga hei bing nga hung tangnu nanina munu kaan bi Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nai rwe dinu theiyo.
“Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, ha bing ga hung tang mak basaan heiba mi chaat heiya khatchale braanlaye.
Tambaan le talei ya braan lune atiyeda Achongkaang nga khatchale braanlaye.
“Sa innuna, zu in kalonuna, nani kum langza sung riangrenu gana, nani sung ding pi ritta mak lang khatle ha ni lumik ka thei mak daakka nani lu chung bi hung mak lang nani nani zanna barak theiyo.
Balangbe talei ram bariak bing bi lung ongnu mi bing lu chung bi phaa danga hunglune.
Atibriakpina hung dingnu heiza bina dwak swak lang khopnuwe diga chak thang lang khatle Misa Sa Kapaisa meithaan bi hannu ngam lang bakaan badat bathin barak theiga hweini ong ngo.”
Maanna thamlai bakaan bi kalum in bi bachu thang ngaake atiyeda zingphana Olive Rammwan diga kounu rammwan la ong dam ngaake.
Louthwan khwan mi nunna kalum in bi Bachong ngai lang Bakhou hung ngaake.
Takan Swaknu Balou diga kounu Khai Sui maknu Uilu Balou ga nai hung ngaak rwe.
Takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Jisu ding athat lang lampui zong rwe, balangbe bani mi nun ding kachiye.
Potroi pat somga kani lak pi suinu, Iscariot diga kounu Judas khou Seitaan khut rwe.
Maanna seluga Jisu ding tatoga bani khou pi swaknu za dingbo diga takopuba rwan khatle kalum in ngaak balu rwan le diga kathui ngaake.
Bani karo rwe khatle banina balaang sian pi lang za thang rwe.
Maanna karenluga mi nun maaknu kaan bi Jisu ding bani khou pi swak lang badou chanu zong ngaake.
Khai Sui maknu Uilu Balou Lumik, Takan Swaknu Balou lang zao athatnu kaan hung tang rwe.
Jisu na Peter le John ding lang thangluga rinne, “Anina sa lang, seluga ani lang Takan Swaknu Balou daanro.”
Banina Bakhou rinne, “Anina haga bariak ingaipai daan thangnu Nangna bathaigabo?”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, nanina haba namlian bi ga sekhutnu kaan bi manpa khat tui ben taanluga nani pek la se hunglune; maan khut tamnu in bi ga suikhutro.
Atiga nanina inpuba khou ga ngaiyo, ‘Bachuthangnupa na rinne, “Eina Aom potroi rwan le diga Takan Swaknu Balou sa bacham dingnu bazin in kaa zo ingaabo?” ‘
Maanna kaliannu, daan thangnu basaang in kaa khat pi mu thanglune; habei ga daanro.”
Banina senu kaan bi Maanna rin thangnu ga danga dou rwe, atiga banina Takan Swaknu Balou riak lang habei ga daan rwe.
Chakrin ga hung tangnu kaan bi chonglang rwan pat somga kani le diga sa in lang ongta rwe.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina riangre kanang khaang mak balei Takan Swaknu Balou Thaisaak heiya Ei nani le diga sa bachamnu bathai take;
balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei hung tang mak basaan Takan Swaknu Balou Ei sa latla rwe.”
Haba nung bi Maanna ngai ga lou thouluga, swanka thangluga rinne, “Heiya louluga nani lak pi kasemro;
balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei hung mak basaan Eina heiba drakha kraa bina in latla rwe.”
Maanna uilu ga lou thouluga swanka thang rwe khatle haga thiak bakluga, bani khou pi luga rinne, “Heiya nani lang pi thangnu Apum rwe; Ating baningsu ong lang heiya towo.”
Hadanga sa in taang bi Maanna ngai ga lou thouluga rinne, “Heiba ngai ya Eina nani lang ta thang damnu Athi bi han thangnu chonghen kathan ga rwe.
Phaang ngo Ating pi swak tingnu kut ka table chung bi Akut le am bacham ongme.
Heiya kak thangnu nung suiga batak takka Misa Sa Kapaisa gana seta ongnuwe atiyeda Bating pi swaknu maan ga aih sianuweda!”
Bani lak pi haba chwan to dingnu mi ga tubo diga khat le khat ngai kale thou rwe.
Atiga bani lak pi tuna lian kataknu tolu dingbo dinu lang bi le, bani kae kale thou rwe.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Gentile rwan om krwang nunna bani lu chung bi balu to rwe khatle bani lu chung bi chwan to ongnu nun ding ga ‘kriang theinu nun’ diga kou rwe.
Atiyeda nani lak piba hadan mak ting ngo; haba hut lang nani lak pi lian kataknu maan gana, kasinnu to ding ngo khatle balu tonu maan gana chwanlaang to ding ngo.
“Balangbe sa in lang badung ongnu maan ga le, chwanlaang tonu maan ga le, tuna lian inkubo? Sa in lang badung ongnu maan ga makkabo? Atiyeda Eiba nani lak pi chwanlaang tonu Khat tanga ongme.
Ating tamnu bing bi nani Ei le diga ong bachamnu nunne.
Apa na Akhou krwang talei sin thangnu danga, Eina le nani khou krwang talei sin thang nge,
heiya nanina Ei le diga Akrwang talei la sa in bacham lang khatle nanina chongsem kaong riak pi ongluga Israel chaat somga kani ding chong kasem lang nge.”
Pukraangba na rinne, “Simon, Simon! Phaang ngo, Seitaan na nating gehu ding basapnu danga basap lang niye.
Atiyeda nabalumsat ka braan mak lang, Ei nalaang hweini thang ongme; atiga nangna nasung le latnu kaan bi nau nanao rwan ding pi tip thang ngo.”
Peter na Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, qwan in bi khutnu ngaakle, thi dingnu ngaakle ei Nang le se bacham lang daan ongme.”
Maanna rinne, “Peter, Eina nakhou rinne, nangna Ating thei make diga za makka rin indao leng thum mak basaan aankhongna khwanglaye.”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina nani ding sian khao, bazin khao khatle ketthop phun makka lang thangnu kaan bi nani lang pa-aam baatnu amgabo?” Banina rinne, “Khatchale baatnu maake.”

Atibriakpina Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atiyeda atun, sian khao amnu maan gana, haga phunro khatle bazin khao amnu maanna le hadanga lou dingro; atiga kachaak chem maaknu maanna, baom sin basoi zwan satluga haga khat kalei ding ngo.

Balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, bathiangnu chong bi hiak thang ngaaknu ga Akhou hung tang lang nge, ‘Maan koi maan amnu mi nun lak pi basing sem thang rwe.’ Balangbe Alang bi rin thangnu ga pi hung tang lang nai rwe.”
Banina Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, phaang thang ngo, abeiya kachaak chem kani amme.” Maanna rinne, “Haga khop rwe.”
Maanna se swakluga Bachaang toga, Olive Rammwan la thou dam ngaake, atiga Potroi rwanna le Banung sui se ngaake.
Maanna haba riak pi ga hung tangnu kaan bi bani khou rinne, “Nani nun bathemnu bi ta mak lang kalummo.”
Maanna bani khouna lung tang sat tang zanu riak pi se swakluga, kekhok detaluga kalumga
rinne, “Apa, Nangna baningnuwe dabe, heiba ngai ya Akhouna lou sat thang ngo; atiyeda Eina baningnu to makka, Nangna baningnu to ding ngo.”
Tambaan lana tambaan chonglang khat hungluga Bating pi nat thang rwe.
Basung riangre briakpina, inkuga kalum rakanga kalum rwe. Baom baluptui ga talei bi kaliannu thitang nun danga santa rwe.
Maan kalum ong bina thouluga, Baom potroi rwan khou hungnu kaan bi bani sung riangre briakpina in ong ngaaknu dou rwe.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani pa-aam lang in ongnubo? Bathemnu bi ta mak lang thouluga kalummo.”
Jisu na chong kabia ong bi phaang ngo, potroi pat somga kani lak pi, Judas tiga kounu pakhat kana, bani meithaan se kamaluga mi khang khat ting, kalwangluga Jisu ding kaput lang Bakim bi hung rwe.
Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Judas, nangna Misa Sa Kapaisa ding kaputluga pi swak lang tonubo?”
Bakim bi ong qwat ongnu nunna swak tingnu thot ka muluga Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, kachaak chemna kapakrizobo?”
Bani lak pi pakhatna takolu om swak ting inchang kanaa kapak chat thang rwe.
Atiyeda Jisu na rinne, “Heiya khop rwe.” Maanna bakanaa ga banaan thangluga pi sa thang rwe.
Haba nung bi Jisu na Bakim bi hungnu takopuba rwan, kalum in ngaak milu nun khatle patso rwan khou rinne, “Nanina Ating kasut sanu maitwang bi danga kachaak chem khatle thing kalok choiluga hungnubo?
Eina kalum in bi kani bathin nani le diga ong bachamnu kaan bi Ating nam lang to make. Atiyeda heiya nani lang badou chanu chakrin ga rwe khatle kazingnu ngam ga rwe.”
Banina Bating namluga takolu in la kai thou drwe. Atiyeda Peter na impaan saam saamga Banung suizon hung ngaake.
Banina inkhu zai bi mei to thouluga ong kadoi ongnu kaan bi Peter le bani lak pi ong ong ngaake.
Maanna mei kim bi badung tanu kaan bi swak rangaaknu khatna bating phaang ong ngaake khatle phaang dengga phaangluga rinne, “Heiba manpa le Maan le diga se bacham ngaake.”
Atiyeda maanna Jisu ding za makka rinne, “Kamaisa, ei Bating thei make.”
Bakaan kasem nung bi pakhatna le bating muluga rinne, “Nang le bani lak pi naye.” Peter na rinne, “Manpa, ei make!”
Chakrin khat khak nung bi, manpa pakhatna rakanga rin rwe, “Batak takka heiba manpa le Maan le bacham ngaake, balangbe maan Galilee rwanne.”
Peter na katake, “He manpa, nangna rin ongnu ga ei thei make!” Maanna atiga kabia ongnu kahan bi aankhongna khwang rwe.
Atiga Pukraangba na kanei swakluga Peter ding phaang rwe. Atiga Pukraangba na bakhou, “Aankhongna khwang maknu meithaan, nang Ating za mak leng thumlune” diga rin damnu ga baningsu rwe.
Habei ga Peter na swakluga chap barung hingga chap rwe.
Jisu ding rakhi ongnu nun gana Bating kiamluga bwei rwe.
Banina Bating Bamik khwam lemluga Bamai kum bi kabengga ngaiye, “Rinno! Nating bweinuga tubo?”
Banina balaa ga kasianu chong taswang khak Balu chung bi kabia rwe.
Khwa baan swak khap tinu kaan bi mi nun om patso rwan, takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna hung kadoiluga Bating bani om thampei bi phun swakluga rinne,
“Nang Christa ye dabe, ani khou rinno.” Atiyeda Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou rin beida nanina balumsalaye.
Eina le nani khou ngaiye dabe nanina Akhou kataklaye mak tabe Ating bathanlaye.
Atunna thouga Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Rikrwang ngam kut inchang pek la badunglu rwe.”
Habei ga bani khangsungna rinne, “Ati dabe, Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa bo?” Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ei rwe diga nanina bazega rin rwe.”
Banina rinne, “Anina pa-aam sake lou lat lang bathaang am maang gabo? Balangbe Bamun bahakna kabia swaknu ga ani bahakna ngaisu rwe.”
Mi khang gana thouluga Jisu ding Pilate khou kalwang thou drwe.
Banina Bating koi impu thangga rinne, “Heiba Manpana ani chaat ting lampui kaimaan rwe, Caesar lang ramkhai pinu Maanna khaamme khatle Maan Bahakna Bating Krwang Christa ye diga rin rwe.”
Pilate na Bakhou ngaiye, “Nang Jihudi rwan Krwang bo?” Jisu na bakhou katake, “Nangna rin damnu ga rwe.”
Habei ga Pilate na takopuba rwan le mi khang khou rinne, “Heiba Manpa lu chung bi ei koi dou make.”
Atiyeda banina rakan ranga rinne, “Heiba Manpana mi nun ding to kasao kabaoga, Galilee bina thouga heiba riak tangga Judea taram bing bi bachu thang rwe.”
Pilate na Galilee om lang bi ngaisunu kaan bi heiba Manpa heiya Galilee rwanbo diga ngai rwe.
Jisu wa Herod na paan ongnu taram sung bi ongnu miye dinu Pilate na theinu kaan bi Jisu ding Herod khou bathan hung rwe, haba kaan bi Herod Jerusalem bi am ngaake.

Herod na Jisu ding munu kaan bi maan karo tak ngaake; balangbe maan bakhwa seiga Jisu ding kadou nwam ngaake, balangbe maan Jisu om lang bi taswang khak ngaisu ngaake khatle Jisu na tasiatnu chwan kasem tonu maanna mu nwam ngaake.
Maanna Jisu khou chong taswang khak ngai ngaake atiyeda Jisu na bakhou chong khatchale katak make.
Takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna han thouluga Jisu ding koi impu thangnu chong rakanga kabia ngaake.
Habei ga Herod na baom kraanmi rwan le diga Bating balaa ga kiam rwe, Bakhou phaangsanu baswannu pon sin basoi thangluga, Pilate khou bathan hunglat rwe.
Ha ni bahak ka Pilate le Herod baan to kale ngaak rwe, balangbe meithaan barwei muna kale ngaake.
Pilate na takopuba rwan, bapuba rwan khatle mi nun ding kou kadoiluga

bani khou rinne, “Heiba Manpa ding nanina mi nun ding lampui kaimaannu khat ting danga, akhou phun hung rwe. Phaang ngo, eina Bating nani meithaan bi tamphaangnu kaan bi nanina Balu chung bi koi impu thangnu bing om lang bi ei koi dou make;
balangbe Herod na le dou make, eina nani ding Herod khou bathan rwe; phaang ngo, Maan thi lang khopnu chwan khatchale tonu maake.
“Atibriakpina eina Bating laakluga bathan sat lang zung nge”
(balangbe Takan Swaknu Balou dat pi maanna bani lang mi pakhat ting bathan thang lang bathaang am ngaake).
Atiyeda bani khangsungna khwan khatcha toga pao thou rwe, “Heiba Manpa ding nga athat sat tammo, ani lang Barnabas ting bathan thang ngo.”
Barnabas ka namlian bi chong laa pi swaknu khatle mi athat briakpina bating qwan in bi nam thang ngaake.
Atibriakpina Pilate na, Jisu ding bathan thang nwamga, mi nun khou rinlat ngaake.
Atiyeda banina paoga rinne, “Bating cross pi athat tammo, cross pi athat tammo!”
Atiga Pilate na leng thumnu toga bani khou rinne, “Maanna pa-aam kasianu chwan torugabo? Bakhou thi lang khopnu koi dou make. Atibriakpina eina Bating laakluga bathan sat lang zung nge.”
Atiyeda banina baraam basaangga pao rakan ranga, Bating cross pi athat thang dam lang ni ngaake. Mi nun khatle takoluna paonu gana ngam rwe.
Banina bathainu ga ati dingro diga Pilate na chongtan pi swak rwe.
Atiga chong laa pi swaknu mi athatnu qwan in bi thang ongnu, banina ni ongnu bating bani lang bathan thang rwe; atiyeda Jisu dingna banina baningnu to dam lang bani khou bachoi thang rwe.
Kraanmi nunna Jisu ding kalwang se ong bi, tudannu nam lana hungnu, Cyrene rwan Simon ding banina namluga Jisu nung la cross ka suipon lang bakhou cross ka bason thang rwe.
Mi khang pui tam takka Banung sui se ngaake, habei ga mannu rwan taswang khakna le lo siaga khatle hweiga Banung sui se ngaake.
Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou kanei swakluga rinne, “Jerusalem sa kamaisa rwan ga, Alaangna chap mako atiyeda nani lang khatle nasa rwan langna chapo.
“Balangbe phaang ngo, ‘Sa pon maknu, khatchale pum rit mak aangnu khatle pi chup mak aangnu kamaisa rwan ga aih sanuwe!’ diga banina rin dingnu kaan ga hunglune.
Haba nung bi banina ‘Rammwan khou rinlune, “Ani lu chung bi badantaro!” khatle rammwan swan khou rinlune, “Ani ding thinlem thang ngo.” ’
Balangbe banina thing ring kung bi atiga towe dabe, thing thit kung ga tatolu dingbo?”
Atiga mi athatnu, katei pat ni ding le, Jisu le diga athat lang kalwang se ngaake.

Banina Calvary diga kounu riak pi hung tangnu kaan bi habei ga Jisu ding banina cross pi bakhai ka rwe, mi athatnu katei pat ni ding ga, pakhat ting inchang pek la pakhat tingna imbei pek la bakhai thang rwe.
Jisu na rinne, “Apa, bani ding kok thang ngo, balangbe bani paaam to ongnubo dinu banina thei make.” Banina Bapwan bing ga tasaanluga kasem rwe.

Atiga mi nunna han phaang ong ngaake. Atiyeda bapuba rwan le mi nun gana Bating banuiga rinne, “Maanna katei rwan ding kan thang rwe; Maan Christa khatle Rikrwang na kathang swaknuwe dabe, Baraanto Bating kan ding ngo.”
Kraanmi nunna le hungluga Bating kiam rwe, banina hungluga Balaang kathunnu zu pi luga
rinne, “Nang Jihudi rwan Krwang nge dabe, Naraanto Nating kanro.”
Balu chung pek la Greek, Latin Khatle Hebrew hiakna, “HEIYA JIHUDI RWAN KRWANG NGE” diga taan thang ngaake.
Haba riak pi bakhai thang ongnu mi athatnu pakhat kana Bating balaa ga rinne, “Nang Christa ye dabe Nating khatle arwei ding kanro.”
Atiyeda pakhat kana bating tweiga rinne, “Nang Rikrwang ding kachi makpo? Nangna bachamnu laak thangnu ga phang ongnuwe.
Batakka arweina khaang ongnuba khaangnu zek swaknuwe, balangbe arwei ba arwei chwan nung suiga phang dingnu taswan ga phang rwe; atiyeda heiba Manpana ka maknu chwan khatchale tonu maake.”
Maanna Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nangna Nakrwang talei hung tangnu kaan bi ating le baningsu thang ngo.”
Habei ga Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Batak sekka Eina nakhou rinnuwe, aniya lumik nang, Ei le diga Paradise pi ong bacham lune.”
Chakrin karuk phei bina, chakrin kaqwa tanu tangga talei ram bing zing rwe.
Lumik le zing drwe khatle kalum in khamthing pwan ga badam kani swakka re rwe.
Jisu na baraam basaangga paoluga rinne, “Apa, ‘Nakut pi Eina Akatha bachoi thang rwe.’ ” Heiba chong nga kabialuga Bakatha bathan sat rwe.
Kraanmi razapuba gana swak tamnu bing ga muluga, maanna Rikrwang ding swanga rinne, “Batak takka heiba Mi ya ririak senu Manpa zung nge!”
Haba riak pi hung kadoinu mi khang gana swak tamnu bing ga muluga, bani kachaang kachumga bani in la han thou dam ngaake.
Maan le diga bacham ngaaknu mi nun khatle Galilee lana Banung sui hungnu mannu rwanna, impaan saam saamga hanluga hei bing nga phaang ong ngaake.
Phaang ngo, Joseph tiga kounu sung sanu, bazenu, thampei patso pakhat am ngaake.
Thampeina kakhannu chonghen khatle bani chwan bing ga maanna za mak ngaake. Maan Jihudi rwan namlian Arimathea la miye, maan le Rikrwang om krwang talei ding ngaakka ong ngaake.
Heiba manpana Pilate khou seluga Jisu pum ding ni rwe.
Maanna pum ga loutaluga, banemnu pwanna kazwan rwe, atiga haga lung bi rannu, pakhatcha ding hakna thang mak aangnu thaan bi ri thang rwe.
Ha ni ga Chamdaannu Lumik ngaake khatle Sabbath nai hung ngaak rwe.
Galilee lana Banung sui hungnu mannu rwanna le thaan khatle Bating tatoga ri thangbo dinu phaang ong ngaake.
Banina han hungluga pot khatle tei lang babarim banamsanu thao daan rwe. Atiga Sabbath ni ga zathang nung suiga bani basak rwe.
Maap lak om kamanu ni louthwan karang takka bani le katei mannu rwan le diga banina daan thangnu barim banamsanu pot ka phunluga thaan la hung rwe.
Atiyeda thaankham lung ga thaan bina tun swak thangnu banina hung dou rwe.
Banina thaan sung bi khutnu kaan bi Pukraangba Jisu pum ga doulan rwe.
Banina haba lang bi batok bariak thei makka ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, bani kim bi manpa pat ni kabaannu pon sin basoiluga han ong ngaake.
Banina kachiga bani mai kum talei la kuntaluga ongnu kaan bi barweina bani khou rinne, “Nanina pa-aam toga thinu nun lak pi ringnu Bating zong ongnubo?
Maan abeiya ong lan rwe atiyeda ring thou drwe! Maan Galilee bi ongnu kaan bi Maanna nani khou tato rin thang ngaakpo dinu nani baningsuwo,
atiga rinne, ‘Misa Sa Kapaisa ding ga noh mi nun kut pi pi swaklune khatle Bating cross pi bakhai thanglune khatle Maan ni thum ni ring thou latlune.’ ”
Habei ga banina Bachong ga baningsu rwe.
Bani nun thaan lana han hungluga ha bing ga potroi pat somga khat atiluga katei rwan bing khou pu rwe.
Chonglang rwan khou pu thangnu baniga, Mary Magdalene, Joanna, James nu Mary khatle katei mannu rwanne.
Banina chong ga pang kabia kabianu ngaakne diga bani ding balumsa mak ngaake.

Atiyeda Peter na lon thouluga thaan la pak hung rwe khatle kuntaluga phaang khutnu kaan bi banemnu pwan ta thangnu za ding mu rwe khatle swak tamnu lang bi maan baraanto loh lo ga bain la thou dam ngaake.
Phaang ngo, Jisu nung sui ngaaknu nun lak pi pat ni ha ni ga Jerusalem bina mile siari khak namlaanu Emmaus tiga kounu nam la se ngaake.
Swak tamnu lang bing bi barweina meiri raiga se ong ngaake.
Barweina meiri raiga ngai swak ngai khut ka se ongnu kaan bi Jisu Maan Bahak barwei kim bi se hungluga barwei le se bacham ngaake.
Atiyeda barweina Jisu ding bapu thei mak lang barwei mik pi kabak thang rwe.
Maanna barwei khou rinne, “Narwei pat ni sega sega sung riangrega pa-aam lang bi meiri rai se ongnubo?”
Pat ni lak pi Cleopas tiga kounu gana Bakhou katake, “Lumik kasem sung bi swak tamnu lang bing bi thei maknu man mi Jerusalem bi Naraantoza zungbo?”
Maanna barwei khou rinne, “Hagazo pa-aambo?” Barweina Bakhou rinne, “Maan Rikrwang le mi nun meithaan bi chwan bi khatle chongkaang bi ngam amnu Thiamting, Nazareth Jisu lang biye.
Takopuba rwan le ani om bapuba rwanna Bating tatoga athat lang pi swak tamnubo khatle cross pi bakhai thang damnubo dinu lang biye.
Atiyeda Maan Israel rwan bing ding kan thang dingnu ga Maanne diga anina baning ngaake. Hei bing nga swak tamnu aniyana ni thum rwe.
Ani nun lak pi mannu rwan mi kasemna louthawn khwan thaan la seluga ani ding pi kalo rwe.
Banina Bapum ga dou maknu kaan bi Jisu ringga ongme diga bani khou indao thang ngaaknu tambaan chonglang rwan ding banina mu rwe diga le hung rin ngaake.
Ani le diga ong bacham ngaaknu kasem le diga thaan la se rwe khatle mannu rwanna rin thang ngaaknu ga danga dou rwe; atiyeda Batingba banina mu make.”
Habei ga Jisu na barwei khou rinne, “He kapangnu, thiamting rwanna rin thang ngaaknu bing ding balumsa lang bazaangnu!
Christa na riangre kanang bing ga khaangluga Balwat liannu bi khut lang makkabo?”
Moses le Thiamting rwan bing khouna thouga Pukraangba lang bi Bathiangnu chongdip pi amnu bing ga Maanna barwei khou bathiangga bachu thang rwe.
Barweina se ong bi nam ga nai hungnu kaan bi Maanna barwei ding sekhan dingnu danga se ka ngaake.
Atiyeda barweina Bakhou rin rwe, “Atun khwazinren ta rwe, ani le diga ong bacham thangro, rei le rei rwe.” Atiga Maan barwei le diga riak bacham lang khut rwe.
Maanna barwei le diga sa in lang ong ongnu kaan bi Maanna uilu ga louluga swanka thang rwe khatle haga thiak bakluga barwei lang pi rwe.
Habei ga barwei mik pi meng swak thang rwe khatle barweina Bating thei rwe; atiga Maan barwei mikphaang bina braan dam ngaake.
Barweina khatna khat khou rinne, “Maan lampui bi arwei le diga meiri raiga se ong bi khatle Maanna Bathiangnu Chongdip ka arwei khou rin thangnu kaan bi arwei sung mei bachwangnu dan makpo?”
Barweina haba kahan bi ga thouluga Jerusalem la han hung rwe khatle potroi pat somga khat atiluga bani le ong bachamnu rwan ga ong kadoi luga
“Batak takka Pukraangba ga ring thou drwe khatle Simon khou pi mu thang rwe!” diga rin ong ngaaknu ga barweina hung kadou ngaake.
Atiga lampui bi swak tamnu khatle Pukraangba na uilu thiak bak pi Bating tatoga thei damnu dinu lang bi barweina bani khou pu rwe.
Banina heiba chong bing nga kabia ong bi, Jisu Maan Bahak bani zai bi hung hanluga bani khou rinne, “Nani khou dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.”
Atiyeda bani balaoga kachi tak ngaak rwe khatle katha khat ting banina mu rwe diga baning ngaake.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani pa-aam toga sung katopnubo? Nani sung bi paaam lang balumsia ongnubo?
Phaang ngo Akut le Aket heiya, Ei zung nge. Ating banaanluga phaang ngo, Akhou amnu munu danga katha ba zanti le ru maake.”
Maanna heiya kabianu nung bani khou Bakut Baket pi mu rwe.
Atiyeda bani nun karo laiga balumsanu ngam makka, loh lo ongnu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani khou thaisaak ambo?”
Banina Balaang ngaa rounu kasem le khwei tui pi rwe.
Maanna haga louluga bani meithaan bi sa rwe.

Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ei nani le diga ong bachamnu kaan bi nani khou rin damnu chong ga heiya rwe, Moses om chongtan bi, thiamting om chongdip pi khatle Kalum Laa bi Alang bi hiak thang ngaaknu bing ga hung tang lang nge.”
Bathiangnu Chongdip ka bakaba theinu ngam lang, Maanna bani sung lat swak thang rwe.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atiga hiak thang nge, Christa ga riangre khaanglune khatle ni thum ni ring thoulune,
Jerusalem bina thouga chaat bing khou Bameng bi sung lenu khatle noh kok thangnu lang bi kasam lang nge.
Heiba lang bing bi nanina sake rwe.
Phaang ngo, Apana chong karen thang damnu ga Eina nani khou lang hungne; atiyeda nani ding basaang la ngamna nani lu chung bi hung thang mak basaan nani Jerusalem namlian bi ga ong ngo.”
Maanna bani ding Bethany tangga kalwang swak rwe khatle Bakut kai thouluga bani khou rithoi pi thang rwe.
Maanna bani lang rithoi pi thangga ong bi, Maan bani khouna kapaang drwe khatle Bating tambaan la lou thou drwe.
Banina Bating kalum rwe khatle bani nun karo takka Jerusalem la han hung rwe,
atiga bani nun kalum in bi chat makka Rikrwang ding swanga ong ngaake. Amen.
Thoutan bi Chongkaang ga am ngaake khatle Chongkaang ga Rikrwang le ong bacham ngaake khatle Chongkaang ga Rikrwang ngaake.
Maan thoutan bi Rikrwang le ong bacham ngaake.
Pot bingza Bapaan bina dam thang rwe khatle dam thang damnu pot bing ga Maan sui makka khatchale dam thang make.
Bakhou ringnu am ngaake khatle ringnu ga mi nun om babaan ngaake.
Babaan gana zingnu riak pi baan thang nge khatle zingnuna ha ding ga ngam make.
John diga kounu Rikrwang khouna lang hungnu manpa pakhat am ngaake.
Mi bing za bapaan bina balumsa dam lang, maanna Babaan om lang bi sake pi lang maan sake toga hung rwe.
Maan Babaan ga make atiyeda Babaan om lang bi sake pi lang lang hungnuwe.
Mi bing ding pi baan thangnu, talei ram bi hungnu ga bazenu Babaanne.
Maan talei ram bi am ngaake, Bapaan bina talei ram ding dam thang rwe atiyeda talei ram mi nunna Bating thei mak ngaake.
Maan Bami nun khou hung rwe atiyeda Bami nunna Bating loukhut thang make.
Atiyeda Bating lou thangnu bing ding, dinuba Bameng bi balumsanu nun ding Rikrwang sa rwan to lang Maanna ngam pi thang rwe:
bani ga thi bina mak tabe pum om baningnu mak tabe misa om baningnu bina ponnu make atiyeda Rikrwang om baningnu bina ponnuwe.
Chongkaangna zanti pum gonluga ani lak pi lung thang rwe khatle Pa khouna khat tak khatchanu Sa Kapaisa om lwat liannu, phaangkriang khatle bazenuna sipnu Balwat liannu ga anina phaangmu rwe.
John na Balang bi sake piga paoga rinne, “Eina rin damnu Maan ga heiya rwe, ‘Anung la hungnanu Maan ga ameithaanna am ngaak briakpina, Maan ama inkuwe.’ ”
Ani mi bingna Baom sipnu bina phaangkriang lu chung bi phaangkriang lousu rwe.
Balangbe Moses paan bina chongtan ga pi thang rwe atiyeda Jisu Christa paan bina phaangkriang le bazenu ga hung rwe.
Pakhatchanale Rikrwang ding impha ni beida mu make. Bapa pam bi ong ongnu, khat tak khatchanu Sa Kapaisa Maan gana Balang bi indao thang rwe.
Jihudi rwanna John khou, “Nang tubo?” diga ngai lang Jerusalem bi ongnu tako rwan le Levi rwan ding lang hungnu kaan bi maanna pi damnu sake ga heiye.
Maanna rin indao swak rwe khatle za maknu to make atiyeda “Ei Christa ga make” diga rin swak rwe.
Banina bakhou ngaiye, “Ati dabe nang tubo? Nang Elijah bo?” John na rinne, “Ei make.” “Nang Thiamting garubo?” Maanna katake “Make.”
Banina bakhou rinne, “Ani ding lang hungnu rwan khou anina chong katak pi lang, nang tubo? Nalang bi nang pa-aam rinnubo?”
John na rinne, “Thiamting Isaiah na rin damnu danga, ‘Ramhaang bi, “Pukraangba lampui ga to bazeyo,” diga pao ongnu khwan ga’ ei rwe.”
Bani ga Pharisee rwan khouna lang hungnu mi nunne.
Banina bakhou ngaiye, “Nang Christa le mak, Elijah le mak, Thiamting ga le mak tabe nang pa-aam to lang baptize tonubo?”
John na bani khou katake, “Eina tui bi baptize to thang nge atiyeda nanina thei maknu Pakhat nani lak pi han ongme.
Anung la hungnanu Maan ga ama inkuwe, baom sandal rui ga hakna sut lang ei khopnu make.”
