“Ei drakha zemme, nani bakachang nge. Tudannu Akhou chat makka ongnu khatle Eina bakhou chat makka ongnu maan gana, bakraa tamga kraaye; balangbe Ei sui makka nanina khatchale tonu ngam make.

Tudannuna Akhou chat makka ong make dabe, bating bakachang khat ting danga bazwan sate khatle baowei taye; atiga mi nunna bakachang ga khom kadoiluga mei bi bazwan thang nge khatle bakachang bing ga mei bati sate.
Nanina Akhou chat makka ong nge dabe khatle Achongkaang ga nani khou chat makka amme dabe, nanina ni nwamnu niyo, haga nani khou to thangne.
Nanina bakraa tamga karaanu heiyana, Apa om lwat pi lianne; atiga nani nun Aom potroi rwan tolune.
“Pa ga na Ating kriangnu danga, Eina le nani ding kriang nge; nani Akriang sung bi chat makka ong ngo.
Eina Apa om zathang bing zeiluga Bakriang sung bi chat makka ongnu ga danga, nanina le Aom zathang bing zeiye dabe, nani Akriang sung bi chat makka onglune.
Aom karo ga nani khou am lang khatle nani karoga khopsa langna, Eina heiba chong bing nga nani khou rinnuwe.
Eina nani ding kriangnu danga nani khatna khat ting kriang ngo, heiya Aom zathang nge.
Mi khatna babaan rwan lang bakum ga pi thangnu ga ma, lian inkunu kriang pakhatcha khou le maake.
Eina nani khou pinu zathang bing nga nanina towe dabe nani Abaan rwanne.

Eina nani ding swak rwan diga kou latla rwe, balangbe swak kana bainpubana pa-aam to ongnubo dinu thei make; atiyeda Eina nani ding baan rwan diga kou rwe; balangbe Eina Apa khouna ngaisunu bing ga nani khou pi thei thang rwe.

Nanina Ating ka thangnu make atiyeda nanina seluga bakraa kraa lang, nani khou bakraa ga chat makka am lang khatle nanina Ameng bi pa-aam aam ngaakle ninu ga Apana nani khou pi thang lang, Eina nani ding ka thang rwe khatle banei thang rwe.
Nani khatna khat ting kriang kale lang, hei bing nga Eina nani khou zathang pi rwe.
“Talei ramna nani ding batanne dabe, nani ding batan mak baleina hagana Ating batan rwe dinu nanina theiyo.

Nani nun talei ram omme dabe, talei ramna baom ding ga kriang ngaak tingnuwe. Atiyeda nani talei ram om mak briakpina atiyeda Eina talei ram bina kathang swak briakpina, talei ramna nani ding batannuwe.
“ ‘Swakna bainpuba ma liannu make,’ diga Eina nani khou rin thang damnu ga baningsuwo. Banina Ating raiye dabe, banina nani ding le railune. Banina Achong zeiye dabe, banina nani chong le zeilune.
“Atiyeda banina Ameng lang chungna hei bing nga nani khou tolune, balangbe Ating lang hungnu Bating banina thei make.
Eina hungluga bani khou kabia thang mak ngaake dabe bani noh maak ngaak tingnuwe atiyeda atunba bani noh bina dwak lat zanu riak maake.
Ating batannu maan gana Apa ding le batanne.
Pakhatchanale to maknu chwan bing ga Eina bani lak pi to mak ngaake dabe bani noh maak ngaak tingnuwe; atiyeda atunba banina haga muluga Ating le Apa ding le batan rwe.
Atiyeda ‘Banina Ating balang maakka batan rwe,’ diga bani om chongtan bi hiak thangnu chong ga hung tang lang heiya swak rwe.
“Eina Apa khouna nani khou lang hung dingnu Paangthangnu dinuba Apa khouna swaknu bazenu Katha gana, hungnu kaan bi Maanna Alang bi sake pi lune.
Nanina le Alang bi sake pi lune, balangbe kama bina nani nun Ei le diga ong bacham hung rwe.
“Nani nun ket basui mak langna, Eina hei lang bing nga nani khou rin rwe.
Banina nani ding synagogue inza bina kazun satlune; nani ding athatnu maan gana Rikrwang chwanlaang tonuwe diga baning dingnu chakrin ga hung nge.
Banina Pa ding le Ating le thei mak briakpina kabia ongnu bing nga banina nani khou tolune.

Atiyeda chakrin ga hung tangnu kaan bi heiba lang bing nga Eina nani khou rin drwe dinu nanina baningsu lang, Eina nani khou heiba chong bing nga rin ongnuwe. Eina nani le ong bacham briakpina, kama bi Eina heiba chong bing nga nani khou rin thang maknuwe.
“Atiyeda atun Ei Ating lang hungnu Pa kim la selune atiga nani pakhatchanale Akhou, ‘Nang inlam senebo?’ diga ngai make.
Atiyeda Eina heiba chong bing nga nani khou rin briakpina nani sung riangrenuna sip rwe.

Ati ngaaklena Eina nani khou bazenu ga rinnuwe. Ei se swaknuwa nani lang inkuga sanuwe; balangbe Eina se swak make dabe, Paangthangnu gana nani khou hunglaye; atiyeda Eina se swake dabe Eina Bating nani khou lang hunglune.
“Maanna hungnu kaan bi talei ram ding noh lang bi, ririak senu lang bi khatle chong kasemnu lang bi indao thanglune:
Noh lang bi dinuba banina Ating balumsa make;
ririak senu lang bi dinuba Eina Apa kim la seye atiga nani Ating mu lat pilaye;
“Chong kasemnu lang bi dinuba hei talei ram om bapuba ding chong kasem drwe.
“Ei nani khou rin lang chong taswang khak amme atiyeda nanina ha bing ga atun loukhutnu ngamlaye.

Atiyeda bazenu Katha gana, hungnu kaan bi Maanna nani ding bazenu bing bi kai thanglune; Maanna baraantoza ngam paan bina rinlaye atiyeda Maanna ngaisu damnu bing ga rinlune khatle swak tingnu bing ga nani khou pi thei thanglune.
Maanna Ating lwat pi lian thanglune, balangbe Maanna Akhouna louluga nani khou haga pi thei thanglune.
Apa om ka am bing ga Aomme. Atibriakpina Maanna ha bing ga Akhouna lou swakluga nani khou indao thanglune diga Eina rinnuwe.
“Bakaan inchan maknu lak pi nani Ating mulaye khatle inchan maknu lak pi nanina Ating mu latlune, balangbe Ei Apa kim la seye.”

Baom potroi rwan lak pi mi kasemna khat le khat atiga rinne, “Maanna ani khou ‘Bakaan inchan maknu lak pi nani Ating mulaye khatle bakaan inchan maknu lak pi nani Ating mu latlune, balangbe Ei Apa kim la seye’ diga rinnuwa pa-aam dingbo?”
Atibriakpina banina rinne, “Bakaan inchan maknu lak dinu Maanna rin ongnuwa pa-aambo dinu ani thei make.”

Banina Bakhou chong kasem ngai nwamnu ga Jisu na theiluga bani khou rinne, “Eina ‘Bakaan inchan maknu lak pi nanina Ating mulaye khatle bakaan inchan maknu lak pi nanina Ating mu latlune’ diga rinnu lang bi nani cham ngai kale ongnubo?
Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nani chaplune khatle nu hweilune. Atiyeda talei ramna karolune khatle nani sung riangre lune atiyeda nani sung riangre ga karonu bi gon swaklune.

Kamaisa khatna nao lung lang nainu kaan bi sung riangreye, balangbe baom chakrin ga hung tang rwe. Atiyeda maanna nao ga am thang khap tinu le talei ram bi misa khat lung hung rwe diga karo briakpina maanna riangrenu bing ga baningsula rwe.
Atiga nani le atun riangreye atiyeda Ei nani ding kadou latlune, nani sung karolune khatle nani karo ga pakhatchanale nani khouna lou satla rwe.
“Atiga ha ni ga nanina Akhou chong khatchale ngai latla rwe. Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nanina Ameng bi Apa khou ninu ninu ga Maanna nani lang pi thanglune.
Atun tangnu sung bi nanina Ameng bi khatchale ninu maake. Niyo, nanina lousulune khatle nani karo ga sipsalune.
“Hei bing nga Eina nani khou chongchak toga rin thang drwe. Atiyeda Eina nani khou chongchak toga kabia lat makka, Apa om lang bi nani khou bathiangga indao thang dingnu dat ka hunglune.
“Ha ni ga nanina Ameng bi nilune atiyeda Eina nani lang Apa khou hweinine diga nani khou rinnu make.
Balangbe Apa Maan Bahakna nani ding kriang nge, nanina Ating kriang nge; balangbe Ei Rikrwang khouna hungnuwe dinu nanina balumsaye.
Ei Apa khouna hungluga talei ram bi hung rwe. Atiluga Ei talei ram bathan thangsialuga Apa khou seye.”
Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Phaang thang ngo, Nangna atun ani khou chongchak to makka bathiangga rin thang rwe.
Nangna pum brumza thei phik phike, atun pakhatchanale Nakhou chong ngai lat lang maak rwe dinu anina thei rwe, hagana Nang Rikrwang khouna hungnuwe dinu ani balumsa rwe.”
Jisu na bani khou katake, “Atunbe nani balumsarubo?

Phaang ngo, batak takka nanina Ating asat thangsialuga balaang balaang pak imphaang dam dingnu chakrin ga hungna rwe, atun hungna rwe. Atiyeda Apana Ating ong bacham thang ong briakpina Ei Araantoza make.
Nani nun Akhouna dai bazaangnu lou langna Eina hei bing nga nani khou rin thang rwe. Talei ram bi nani riangre kanang doulune atiyeda nani lozaang sawo, Eina talei ram ding ngam rwe.”
Jisu na hei bing nga rinnu nung, tambaan la batoukaluga kalum rwe, “Apa, chakrin ga hung tang rwe. Nasa Kapaisana le Nating lwat pi lian lang, Nasa Kapaisa ding lwat pi lian thangro.
Mi bingza lu chung bi Nangna Basa Kapaisa khou ngam pi thangnu danga, Nangna Alaang pi thang damnu mi bing khou Eina khwa sei ringnu ga pi thang lang nge.
“Khat tak Khatchanu bazenu Rikrwang ding khatle Nangna lang hungnu Jisu Christa ding banina theinu ga khwa sei ringnu gaye.
Eina talei ram bi Nalwat pi lian rwe. Nangna Alaang pi thangnu chwan ga Eina to loi rwe.
He Apa, talei ram am mak baleina Nang le Akhou am ngaaknu lwat kana atun Nang le bachamga Ating lwat pi lian thangro.
“Apana talei ram bi Alaang pi thang ngaaknu mi nun khou Eina Nameng phun indao thang rwe. Bani ga Naomme, bani ding Nangna Akhou pi thang rwe khatle banina Nachong zei rwe.
Nangna Alaang pi thangnu bing ga Nakhou naye dinu atun banina thei rwe.

“Balangbe Nangna Akhou pi thangnu chong bing ga Eina bani khou pi rwe; banina chong bing ga lousu rwe, Ei Nakhouna hungnuwe dinu bani bathiangga thei rwe; atiga Nangna Ating lang hungnuwe dinu bani balumsa rwe.
Eina bani lang kalumme. Talei ram lang make atiyeda Nangna Akhou pi thangnu mi nun lang nge, balangbe bani ga Naomme.
Aom bing ga Naomme, Naom ga Aomme khatle bani khou Ating lwat pi lian rwe.

Ei talei ram bi ong lan rwe atiyeda bani nunba talei ram bi ong maang nge atiga ei Nakhou hung nge. Bathiangnu Apa, Arweina khatcha to nu danga, bani le khatcha to lang Nangna Akhou pi thang damnu mi nun ding Nameng paan bina ngaak thang ngo.

Eina bani le diga talei ram bi ong bachamnu kaan bi Eina bani ding Nameng bi ngaaksian thang ngaake. Nangna Akhou pi thangnu mi nun ding Eina ngaaksian thang ngaake; atiga Bathiangnu chongdip pi rin thangnu, braan dingnu sa kapaisa ga makka bani pakhatcha hakna braan make dinu ga hung tang rwe.
“Atiyeda atun Ei Nakhou hung rwe khatle bani khou Aom karonu ga sipsaga am dam langna, Eina talei ram bi chong bing nga rin thang rwe.
Eina Nachong ga bani khou pi thang rwe khatle talei ramna bani ding batan rwe balangbe Ei talei ram om maknu danga, bani nun le talei ram om make.
Nangna bani ding talei ram bina lou swak thang ngo diga Eina hweininu make atiyeda sa maknu bakhouna bani ding ngaak thang ngo dinuwe.
Ei talei ram om maknu danga bani le talei ram om make.
Bazenu Nachong paan bina bani ding to bathiang thang ngo. Nachong ga bazenuwe.
Nangna Ating talei ram bi lang thangnu danga, Eina le bani ding talei ram bi lang thang rwe.
Ei Azan ding to bathiangnu danga, bani ding bazenu gana to bathiang thang lang nge.
“Eina hei rwanza lang kalumnu make atiyeda bani chong paan bina Ating balumsa dingnu mi nun lang leye;
Apa, bani mi bing khatcha to lang, Eina kalumme, Nangna Akhou ongnu khatle Eina Nakhou ongnu danga; bani nun ani khou ong ding ngo, heiya Nangna Ating lang hungnuwe dinu talei ramna balumsa lang nge.
Arwei khatcha to nu danga, bani le khatcha to langna Nangna Akhou pi thangnu lwat liannu ga Eina le bani khou pi thang rwe:

“Eina bani khou ongnu khatle Nangna Akhou ong thangnu danga; khatcha tonu bi bani nun khopsanu to lang nge, atiga Ating Nangna lang hungnu khatle Nangna Ating kriangnu danga, bani ding le kriang nge dinu talei ramna thei lang nge.
“Apa, Nangna Akhou pi thang ngaaknu lwat ka banina mu dam lang khatle Eina ongnu riak pi ga bani le ongnu Ei bathaiye; balangbe talei dam mak baleina Nangna Ating kriang thang rwe.
“He ririak senu Apa, talei ramna Nating thei make atiyeda Ei Nating thei rwe khatle Nangna Ating lang hungnuwe dinu hei rwanna thei rwe.
Eina Nameng ding bani khou indao thang rwe, atiga Akhou amnu Nakriang ga bani khou le am lang khatle Ei bani khou am lang haga indao thangne.”
Jisu na heiba chong bing nga kabia taangnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwan le diga Kidron tuiqwa la thou dam ngaake, haba riak pi ga amnu anqwat khat pi, Maan le Baom potroi rwan le diga khut rwe.
Bating pi swak tingnu Judas na le, haba riak ka thei ngaake; balangbe Jisu na Baom potroi rwan le diga habei ga katupka kadou ngaake.
Haba nung bi takopuba rwan le Pharisee rwan khouna kalum in ngaak rwan le, kraanmi rwan ding, Judas na kalwangluga thaomei, meila khatle sung chem choiluga habei ga hung rwe.
Jisu na Bakhou swak tingnu bing ga thei briakpina, meithaan la se swakluga bani khou rinne, “Nani tu ding zongnubo?”
Banina Bakhou katake, “Nazareth Jisu ding nge.” Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Maan ga Ei rwe.” Atiga Bating pi swak tingnu Judas le bani le diga han bacham ong ngaake.
Jisu na, “Maan ga Ei rwe,” diga rinnu kaan bi banina nung la inkhin swakluga talei bi in balumta rwe.
Habei ga Jisu na bani khou ngai late, “Nani tu ding zongnubo?” Banina rinne, “Nazareth Jisu ding nge.”
Jisu na katake, “Nani khou Maan ga Ei rwe diga rin drwe. Atibriakpina nanina Ating zongnuwe dabe, bani ding ga pi sedro.”
Heiya rin thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang nge, “Nangna Alaang pi thangnu nun lak pi pakhatcha ding hakna Eina to braan make.”
Habei ga Simon Peter na kachaak chem kaswaluga takolu swak pakhat om inchang kana kapak chat trwe. Haba swak meng ga Malchus tiga kouwe.
Atibriakpina Jisu na Peter khou rinne, “Kachaak chem ga chemthaang bi thang dro. Apana Alaang pi thangnu ngai ga Ei in lang makpo?”
Haba nung bi kraanmi nun, kraan milu khatle kalum in ngaak rwanna Jisu ding namluga karak rwe.
Banina kamaga Jisu ding Anas kim la kalwang hung rwe, balangbe maan haba sangwan bi takolu to ngaaknu Caiaphas pu we.
Caiphas heiya Jihudi rwan khou mi pakhatna mi bing lang thi thangnu ga sanuwe diga rin ngaaknu gaye.
Simon Peter le potroi katei khatna Jisu nung sui hung ngaake. Takoluna potroi khat tingga thei briakpina, Jisu le bachamga barwei takolu in inkhu tangga suizon hung ngaake.
Atiyeda Peter na langkaang la han ong ngaake. Atibriakpina takoluna theinu potroi pakhat kana, swakluga inkhaan ngaak rangaaknu khou rinluga Peter ding kalwang khut rwe.
Habei ga inkhaan ngaak rangaaknu gana Peter khou rinne, “Nang le heiba Manpa om potroi rwan lak pi pakhat makpo?” Peter na, “Ei make” diga katak rwe.
Sik briakpina swak rwan le kalum in ngaak rwanna mei kahaiga han kadoi ong ngaake. Atiga Peter le bani lak pi mei kahaiga sui ong ngaake.
Takoluna Jisu khou Baom potroi rwan khatle Maanna bachu thangnu zekrin lang bi chong ngai ngaake.
Jisu na bakhou katake, “Eina talei ram mi nun khou indaoga rinnuwe. Eina Jihudi rwanna hung kadoinu riak synagogue inza bi khatle kalum in bi, bakaan thin inkamnu to makka bachu thang ngaake.
“Pa-aam toga nangna Akhou ngainubo? Eina rinnu ngaisu damnu mi nun khou ngaiyo. Phaang ngo, Eina rinnu ga banina theiye.”
Atiyeda Maanna ha bing ga rin taangnu kaan bi Bakim bi han ongnu kalum in ngaak nun lak pi pakhatna Jisu ding bakut bazaana kabengga rinne, “Nangna takolu meithaan bi atiga kataknubo?”
Jisu na katake, “Eina kasianu kabia damnu amme dabe, kasianu om lang bi sake piyo; atiyeda kasanuwe dabe, nangna pa-aam lang Ating bweinubo?”
Haba nung bi kut karakluga ongnu Jisu ding Anas na takolu Caiaphas khou bathan thang rwe.
Simon Peter mei kahaiga ong ngaake. Atibriakpina banina bakhou ngaiye, “Nang le Baom potroi rwan lak pi pakhat makpo?” Maanna, “Ei make!” diga katak rwe.
Takolu om swak pakhat, Peter na bakanaa kapakchat tamnu insung rwan pakhatna le rinne, “Eina anqwat pi Maan le diga chwanlaang bacham ngaaknu munu ga nang makpo?”
Habei ga le Peter na Jisu ding za mak lat rwe; atiga haba chakrin bi ga aankhongna khwang rwe.
Haba nung bi banina Jisu ding louthwan khwan, Caiaphas khouna Praetorium la kalwang hung rwe. Banina Takan Swaknu Balou sa bi tanaat mak langna, bani Praetorium sung bi khut mak ngaake.
Pilate na swakluga bani khou rinne, “Heiba Manpa lu chung bi pa-aam koi impu thangnu amga nanina Bating akhou kalwang hungnubo?”
Banina bakhou katake, “Heiba Manpana sa maknu chwan to maknu ngaake dabe anina Bating nakhou kalwang hunglaye.”

Habei ga Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Nanina Bating kalwangluga nani om chongtan nung suiga chong kasem sero.” Atibriakpina Jihudi rwanna bakhou rinne, “Mi khat ting athat lang ani khou ngam pi thang make,”
Jisu na Maan tatonu thit thilu dingbo dinu rin chaak thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang nge.
Habei ga Pilate na Praetorium sung la khutlatluga Jisu ding kouga, Bakhou ngai rwe, “Nang Jihudi rwan Krwang bo?”
Jisu na bakhou katake, “Heiya naraanto zana rinnumo mak tabe Alang bi nakhou mi khatna rin thanggabo?”
Pilate na katake, “Ei Jihudi rwanbo? Nachaatna khatle takopuba rwanna Nating akhou pi thang rwe. Nang paaam to ba dabo?”

Jisu na katake, “Akrwang talei ga heiba talei ram om make. Akrwang talei ga hei talei ram om ngaake dabe ating Jihudi rwan khou pi swak mak lang, Aswak rwanna katwak ngaak tingnuwe; atiyeda atunba Akrwang talei ga hei talei ram om make.”

Atibriakpina Pilate na Bakhou rinne, “Ati dabe Nang Krwang bo?” Jisu na katake, “Nangna Ei Krwang nge diga bazega rin rwe. Hei langna Ating pon thangnuwe khatle bazenu sake pi langna Ei talei ram bi hungnuwe. Bazenu mi bingna Akhwan ngaiye.”
Pilate na Bakhou rinne, “Bazenu dinuwa paaambo?” Maanna heiya rin taang bi, Jihudi rwan khou selatluga bani khou rinne, “Ei Balu chung bi koi khatchale dou make.
Atiyeda Takan Swaknu Balou dat pi eina nani lang mi pakhat ting bathan thang lang nani om chaang amme. Atibriakpina Jihudi rwan Krwang ding ga nani lang eina bathan thangnu nani bathaibo?”
Habei ga bani khangsungna paoga rinne, “Heiba Manpa ding nga make, Barnabas ting bathan thang ngo!” Barnabas ka kasut sanu mi ngaake.
Haba nung bi Pilate na Jisu ding kalwang swakluga pi bwei rwe.
Atiga kraanmi nunna kaling luthop khat bachaluga Balu bi thop thang rwe khatle banina Bakhou sendumnu pwan sin thang rwe.
Banina Bakhou rinne, “Kalumme, Jihudi rwan Krwang!” Atiga banina Jisu ding bani kutna kabeng rwe.
Pilate na swaklatluga, bani khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, eina Balu chung bi koi khatchale dou make dinu nanina thei lang, Bating nani khou phun swaknu rwe.”
Habei ga Jisu kaling luthop thopluga khatle sendumnu pwan sinluga swak rwe. Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, heiba Manpa ding nga!”

Atibriakpina takopuba rwan le kalum in ngaak rwanna Bating munu kaan bi banina paoga rinne, “Bating cross pi athat thang dammo, Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!” Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Nani raanto Bating kalwangseluga cross pi athatro, balangbe ei Balu chung bi koi dou make.”
Jihudi rwanna bakhou katake, “Ani om chongtan amme, ani om chongtan nung suiga Maan thi lang khop rwe, balangbe Maanna Baraanto Bating Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye diye.”
Rin ongnu chong ga Pilate na ngaisunu kaan bi maan kachi tak ngaak rwe,
maanna Praetorium la khut latluga Jisu khou ngaiye, “Nang inlamna hungnubo?” Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou katak make.
Pilate na Bakhou rinne, “Nang akhou pa-aam toga katak maknubo? Nating bathan thang lang khatle cross pi athat lang akhou ngam amme dinu nang thei makpo?”
Jisu na katake, “Nakhou basaang lana pi tanu mak ngaake dabe Alu chung bi naom ngam khatchale maak ngaak tingnuwe. Atibriakpina Ating nakhou pi swaknu maan ga noh lian inku rwe.”

Habeina thouga Pilate na Jisu ding bathan sat lang lampui zong thou rwe atiyeda Jihudi rwanna paoga rinne, “Nangna heiba manpa ding nga bathan sate dabe nang Caesar baan lan rwe. Tudannu baraanto bating krwang pi tonu maan ga Caesar ding rin basiatnu miye.”
Pilate na haba chong ga ngaisunu kaan bi maanna Jisu ding langkaang la kalwang swak rwe khatle Hebrew chong la, Gabatha diga kounu, chongsem riak pi badungta rwe.
Haga Takan Swaknu Balou lang Chamdaannu Lumik, chakrin karuk tanu dat pi ngaake. Maanna Jihudi rwan khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, nani Krwang ding ga!”

Atiyeda banina rakan ranga pao ong ngaake, “Bating kalwang thoudro! Bating kalwang thoudro! Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!” Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Nani Krwang ding eina cross pi athat lang zungbo?” Takopuba rwanna katake, “Caesar makka ani lang krwang maake!”
Habei ga Pilate na Jisu ding cross pi athat lang bani khou pi swak rwe. Atiga banina Jisu ding kalwang thou drwe.
Jisu na Baom cross phunluga Hebrew chong la Golgotha diga kounu Luru riak la hung rwe,
banina mi katei pat ni, pakhat ting inchang pek la, pakhat ting imbei pek la khatle Jisu dingna bazai bi cross pi taanka rwe.
Pilate na meng khat hiakluga cross pi thang rwe. Hiak thangnu ga, “NAZARETH RWAN JISU, JIHUDI RWAN KRWANG” dinuwe.
Jihudi rwan mi taswang khakna haga pa rwe, balangbe Jisu ding cross pi athat thangnu riak ka namlian kim bi ngaake; atiga haga Hebrew, Greek khatle Latin chong la hiak thang ngaake.
Atibriakpina Jihudi rwan om takopuba rwanna Pilate khou rinne, “ ‘Jihudi rwan Krwang,’ diga hiak thang mako, atiyeda ‘Maanna rinnu danga, “Ei Jihudi rwan krwang nge” diga rinnu ga hiak thang ngo.’ ”
Pilate na katake, “Eina hiaknu ga hiak trwe.”

Kraanmi rwanna Jisu ding cross pi athat thangnu nung, banina Jisu om pwan ga kraanmi pakhat khat lang, badam bali to swak rwe khatle talathu ga le lou rwe. Haba talathu ga bamun maaknu kasaklana pwan khatcha toga khongnu ngaake.

Atibriakpina bani cham atiga rinne, “Ani heiya kaire makcho, tuna lousulu dingbo dinu ani tasaan phaangzo,” heiya Bathiangnu chongdip pi rin thangnu, “Banina Apwan bani lak pi kasemluga, Apwan lang chungna banina tasaan rwe” dinu ga hung tang lang nge. Ha bing ga kraanmi nunna to ong ngaake.
Jisu om cross kim bi Banu le, Banu nao, Cleopas mei Mary khatle Magdalene Mary le han ong ngaake.
Jisu na Banu le, Maanna kriangnu potroina han ongnu ga muluga Banu khou rinne, “Kamaisa, Nasa Kapaisa ding ga phaang ngo.”
Habei ga Maanna Baom potroi khou rinne, “Nanu ding ga Phaang ngo,” Haba chakrin bina haba potroi gana Banu ding bain la kalwang thou dam ngaak rwe.
Heiba nung bi, Jisu na atunbe chwan bing loi rwe dinu theiluga Bathiangnu chongdip pi rin thang damnu ga hung tang langna atiga rinne, “Ei taraanne!”
Habei ga kathunnu drakha tui thangsipnu ben khat am ngaake; atiga banina kathunnu tui bi ga sponge bachemluga hyssop thing lan bi thangluga haga Bamun tangga balaanka rwe.
Jisu na haba tui ga batemluga, “Loi rwe!” diga rinnu nung Balu kuntaluga Bakatha bathan thang drwe.

Haga Chamdaannu Lumik briakpina pum bing ga Sabbath ni cross pi thang ong mak langna (balangbe haba Sabbath ni ga thuk kataknu lumik ngaake), bani ket bwei ropluga, lou thou dam lang Jihudi rwanna Pilate khou ni ngaake.
Atiga kraanmi rwanna Maan le diga cross pi bakhai thang bachamnu kamanu manpa khatle kaninu manpa ket ka bwei rop rwe.
Atiyeda banina Jisu khou hungnu kaan bi Maan thi rwe dinu theiluga Baket bwei rop mak ngaake.
Atiyeda kraanmi rwan lak pi pakhatna Babanaak pi sungna chou rwe khatle haba kahan bi ga thi le tui lwangta rwe.
Haga munu maan gana sake pi rwe khatle baom sake ga bazenuwe; maanna bazenu rinnuwe dinu nanina balumsa lang nge.
Balangbe Bathiangnu chongdip pi, “Baru khatchale to roppilaye,” diga rin thangnu bing ga swak ngaak rwe.
Bathiangnu Chongdip kateina rin late, “Banina sungna chounu Bating phaanglune.”

Haba nung bi Jihudi rwan ding kachi briakpina, Jisu om potroi to ngaaknu, Arimathea rwan Joseph na Pilate khou inkamga hungluga, Jisu pum ding ni ngaake; Pilate na bakhou haga za thang rwe. Atibriakpina Jisu pum ga louta rwe.
Meithaan kani khat zingpha Jisu kim bi hung ngaaknu Nicodemus le hung ngaake, maanna myrrh le aloes thang katwaknu banamsanu thao kilo somthumga impaang khak phunluga hung ngaake.
Banina Jisu pum ga louluga Jihudi rwan om pu pa chaang nung suiga ri lang banamsanu pot ka le diga Bapum ga banemnu pwanna kazwan rwe.
Atiga Bating cross pi bakhai thangnu riak kim bi anqwat khat am ngaake, haba anqwat sung bi ga pakhatcha ding le ri thang mak aangnu thaan kathan khat am ngaake.
Haga Jihudi rwan om Chamdaannu Lumik ngaak briakpina banina Jisu ding haba riak pi ga thang ngaake, balangbe thaan ga naiga am ngaake.
Maap lak om kamanu ni louthwan karang takka khwa baan swak mak balei, Magdalene Mary na thaan la hungnu kaan bi thaan bina thaankham lung ga lou sat tam ngaaknu mu rwe.

Atiga maanna pak seluga Simon Peter le Jisu na kriangnu potroi pakhat kim bi hungluga barwei khou rinne, “Pukraangba ding banina thaan bina lou thou drwe, Bating inlampai thang damnubo dinu theilan rwe.”
Atibriakpina Peter le potroi katei pakhat kana swakluga thaan la se ngaake.
Atiga barwei pat ni pak bacham ong bi, potroi pakhat kana Peter ding pak khan kaluga thaan la hung kama rwe.
Maanna kuntaluga phaang khutnu kaan bi banemnu pwan ga nui satsianu mu rwe; atiyeda maan basung la khut make.
Simon Peter na hungnu kaan bi barwei pat ni thaan sung la khut rwe; atiga banemnu pwan ga nui satsianu mu rwe,
Balu bi kabetnu pwan ga le banemnu pwan ga thang karung makka tei kadipluga thang ngaake.
Thaan bi hung kamanu potroi katei pakhat ka le suikhut rwe; atiga maanna muluga balumsa rwe.
Balangbe Jisu na thinu nun lak pina ring thou latlune diga Bathiangnu chongdip pi rin thang ngaaknu ga bani thei mak ngaak maang nge. Mary khou Pi mu thangnu
Haba nung bi potroi rwan ga bani riak la thou lat tam ngaake.
Atiyeda Mary na chapka thaan paan la han ong ngaake khatle maanna kuntaluga thaan sung la phaangkhut ngaake.
Jisu pum ding ri thangnu riak pi pwan kangounu sinnu tambaan chonglang pat ni, khatna lu pek la khatna ket pek la badung ongnu maanna mu rwe.

Barweina bakhou rinne, “Kamaisa, nang pa-aam toga chap ongnubo?” Maanna barwei khou rinne, “Balangbe banina Apukraangba ding lou thou drwe, banina Bating inlampai lou thou dambo dinu ani theilan rwe.”
Mary na heiba chong nga kabialuga, maan kanei swaknu kaan bi Jisu han ongnu ding mu rwe atiyeda haga Jisu we dinu thei mak ngaake.

Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Kamaisa, nang pa-aam toga chap ongnubo? Nang tu ding zongnubo?” Maanna Bating anqwat miye diga baningga Bakhou rinne, “Bapuba, Nangna Bating lou thou damnuwe dabe, ingaipai thang dambo dinu akhou rin thang ngo, Ei Bating lou thou damne.”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Mary!” Maanna kanei swakluga Bating “Rabboni!” diga kou rwe, (bakabana Bachuthangnupa dinuwe).

Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Ating banaan mako, balangbe Ei Apa kim la se mak aang nge; atiyeda nangna au anao rwan khou seluga bani khou, ‘Ei Apa khou khatle nani Pa khou, Arikrwang khou khatle nani Rikrwang khou semaang nge diga barinno.’ ”
Magdalene Mary na potroi rwan kim bi hungluga maan Pukraangba ding mu rwe khatle heiba chong bing nga Maanna bakhou rin thang rwe diga bani khou hung rin rwe.

Maap lak om kamanu lumik khwazinren tanu dat pi, potroi rwanna Jihudi rwan ding kachiga inkhaan khaanluga ong kadoi ong ngaake, habei ga Jisu na bani lak pi hung hanluga, bani khou rinne, “Nani khou dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.”
Atiga Maanna heiya rinnu nung, bani khou Bakut khatle Babanaak pi mu rwe. Habei ga potroi rwanna Pukraangba ding muluga karo ngaak rwe.
Haba nung bi Jisu na bani khou rin late, “Nani khou dai bazaangnu am ding ngo! Apana Ating lang thangnu danga Eina le nani ding lang thang rwe.”
Maanna heiya rinnu nung, bani khou Bakaphuk sem thangluga rinne, “Katha Bathiangnu louro.
“Nanina tudannu pakhat om noh kok thang nge dabe, bani noh ga le kok thang rwe; nanina kok thang make dabe, haga kok thang lan rwe.”
Jisu hungnu kaan bi potroi pat somga kani lak pi pakhat, Didymus tiga kounu Thomas ka bani lak pi ong mak ngaake.

Atibriakpina potroi rwan kateina bakhou rinne, “Ani Pukraangba ding mu rwe.” Atiyeda maanna bani khou rinne, “Bakut pi thinzum zam ga eina mu mak basaan, Bazam bi ga akut zungna banaan mak saan khatle Babanaak pi akut banaan mak basaan ei balumsa make.”

Atiga ni kariat nung bi Baom potroi rwan insung bi hung kadoi lat ngaake, habei ga Thomas le sui ngaake. Banina inkhaan khaanluga ong ongnu kaan bi Jisu na hungluga bani lak pi hanluga rinne, “Nani khou dai bazaangnu am ding ngo!”
Habei ga Maanna Thomas khou rinne, “Nakutzung ga abeiya tangga balaan swakluga Akut heiya phaang ngo khatle nakut balaan swakluga Abanaak pi banaanno. Balumsianu to mako atiyeda balumsawo.”
Thomas na Bakhou rinne, “Apukraangba khatle Arikrwang!”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Thomas, nang Ating mu briakpina balumsa rwe. Mu mak peida balumsanu maan ga aih sanuwe.”
Jisu na batak takka potroi rwan meithaan bi badannu chwan to thang damnu heiba chongdip pi hiak thang maknu amsip ammaang nge;
atiyeda Jisu wa Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dinu nanina balumsa lang khatle balumsaluga Bameng bina ringnu lousu dam langna heiba badannu bing nga hiak thangnuwe.
Hei bing nung bi Jisu na Bapum bahak ting Tiberias tuipui paan bi potroi rwan khou pi mu thang lat ngaake khatle Bating bani khou atiga pi mu thang rwe:
Habei ga Simon Peter, Didymus tiga kounu Thomas, Galilee taram Cana bina hungnu Nathanael, Zebedee sa kapaisa rwan khatle potroi pat ni le diga ong ngaake.

Simon Peter na bani khou rinne, “Ei ngaa namse maang nge.” Banina bakhou rinne, “Ani le nanung suide.” Bani nun se swakluga barapka li sung bi khut rwe atiyeda ha ni zingpha bani ngaa khatchale namsu mak ngaake.
Louthwan khwa baan swaknu kaan bi Jisu tui paan la han ong ngaake; atiyeda haga Jisu we dinu potroi rwanna thei mak ngaake.
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Naosen rwan ga, nani khou sa zanu pot ambo?” Banina Bakhou, “Maake” diga katak rwe.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Kalang ga li om inchang pek la sattawo atiye dabe nanina phangkhape.” Banina kalang ga satta rwe, atiga atun ngaa ga tamlai briakpina bani kalang ga kai thounu ngamlan rwe.

Atibriakpina Jisu na kriangnu potroi gana Peter khou rinne, “Heiya Pukraangba zung nge!” Simon Peter na haga Pukraangba ye dinu theinu kaan bi baom langkaangnu talathu na bapum bi kabet thangluga (balangbe maan pwan basoi mak ngaake), tuipui la kachakta rwe.

Potroi rwan katei gana liswan khat pi hungluga (balangbe bani tui paan bina namlaa makka, kutki raza ni khak dinuba, meter somkaqwa khak namlaanu riak pi am ngaake), ngaana sipnu kalang ga banina kai hung rwe.
Banina tui paan swaktang khap tinu le, mei toluga, mei bi ngaa rou ongnu khatle uilu ga mu rwe.
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina namnu ngaa ga lou hungro.”
Simon Peter na hungluga ngaa kaliannu raza somnga ga inthum suinu kalang ga tui paan la kai swak rwe; ngaa ga heitia lang tam beida, kalang ga re make.
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Hungro, louthwan thaisaak saro.” Atiyeda potroi rwanna haga Pukraangba ye dinu thei beida, “Nang Tubo?” diga pakhatchanale ngainu ngam mak ngaake.
Jisu na uilu ga hung louluga bani khou pi rwe, hadanga ngaa ga le pi rwe.
Jisu na thinu nun lak pina ring thou latnu nung Bapum bahak ting Baom potroi rwan khou pi mu thangnu heiyana leng thumnuwe.

Banina louthwan thaisaak sa taangnu nung, Jisu na Simon Peter khou ngaiye, “Jonah sa kapaisa Simon, hei bing ding ma nang Ating kriang inkubo?” Peter na Jisu khou rinne, “O, Pukraangba; eina Nating kriang nge dinu Nangna theiye.” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Aom zao swan nun ding basaak pi sa thang ngo.”

Jisu na leng ninu toga Simon Peter khou ngai late, “Jonah sa kapaisa Simon, nang Ating kriangbo?” Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, eina Nating kriang nge dinu Nangna theiye.” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Aom zao nun ding sian thang ngo.”

Jisu na Peter khou leng thumnu toga ngai late, “Jonah sa kapaisa Simon, nang Ating kriangbo?” Jisu na bakhou leng thumnu toga “Nang Ating kriangbo?” diga ngai briakpina Peter basung riangre rwe, maanna Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nangna pum brumza theiye; eina Nating kriang nge dinu Nangna theiye.” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Aom zao nun ding basaak pi sa thang ngo.

Batak sekka Eina nakhou rinnuwe, nang naosen bado, naraanto nakong bi kongkhaak khaakluga nangna se nwamnu riak la se ngaake; atiyeda nangna patso hungnu kaan bi nakut balaan swakluga mi khatna kongkhaak khaak thangluga nangna se nwam maknu riak la maanna nating kalwangselune.”
Maanna impei thit thiluga Rikrwang lwat pi lian dingbo dinu pi thei thangga Maanna hei bing nga rinnuwe. Maanna heiya rin taangnu nung Peter khou rinne, “Nang Anung suiro.”

Peter na nung la kanei swaknu kaan bi Jisu na kriangnu potroi ga sui hungnanu mu rwe, haba manpa ga khwazin thaisaak sanu kaan bi Pukraangba pam bi ongluga, “Pukraangba, Nating pi swak tingnu maanzo tubo?” diga ngai ngaaknu gaye.
Peter na bating muluga Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, heiba manpa lang bi tato langbo?”
Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina hung lat mak basaan maan ringga ongnu ga Eina baningnuwe dabe, hagana nalaang pa-aam togabo? Nang Anung suiro.”

Haba potroi ga thilaye dinu chong ga unao rwan bing lak pi thei chang thou dam ngaake. Atiyeda Jisu na maan thilaye diga rinnu make atiyeda “Eina hung lat mak basaan maan ringga ongnu ga Eina baningnuwe dabe, hagana nalaang pa-aam togabo? dinuwe.”
Haba potroi ga hei bing lang bi sung kahan pi thangnu khatle hiak thang ngaaknu maan gaye; atiga baom sung kahanga bazeye dinu anina theiye.
Jisu na to thang ngaaknu chwan katei katei le amsip amme, ha bing ga khat khat toga hiaktaye dabe hiak tingnu chongdip bing ga talei ram bi thangchanlaye diga ei baning nge. Amen.
He Theophilus, eina hiak ngaaknu kamanu meiri ga Jisu na chwan to thou damnu khatle bachu thang thou damnu bing lang bina,
Bating tambaan la lou thou damnu lumik tangga to damnu lang biye, Maanna kathang swak thangnu chonglang rwan khou Katha Bathiangnu paanna zathang pi thang damnu nung ngaake,

Maanna riangre kanang khaangnu nung, bataknu badannu chwan taswang khakna Pukraangba Maan Bahak ring ongme dinu bani khou pi mu thang rwe, atiga ni sombali sung bi chwanlaang nun khou pi mu thangga khatle Rikrwang om krwang talei lang bi tamga bachu thang ngaake.
Banina kadoi ongnu kaan bi Jerusalem bina se swak makka Pa na Karen thang damnu ga ngaak ong lang, Jisu na bani khou zathang pi thang ngaake, Maanna rinne, “Nani Akhouna ngaisu drwe;
balangbe John na tui bi baptize to thang nge atiyeda nani ding bakhwa sei maknu sung bi Katha Bathiangnuna baptize to thangne.”
Atibriakpina banina hung kadoinu kaan bi Bakhou ngai rwe, “Pukraangba, heiba kaan bi Israel rwan khou krwang talei ga pi thang lat tingbo?”
Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Apa na Bapum bahak om ngam nung suiga ret thangnu bakaan khatle bapha ga nanina thei lang make.
Atiyeda Katha Bathiangnuna nani khou ta thangnu kaan bi nanina ngam lousulune; atiga nani nun Jerusalem bi, Judea le Samaria taram bing bi khatle talei kalan tangga Aom sake tolune.”
Maanna heiba chong bing nga kabialuga banina phaang ongnu kahan bi, Bating phunka drwe, atiga tambuna Bating bani mikphaang bina lou thou drwe.
Maanna ka damnu kaan bi banina tambaan la phaang dengga phaang ongnu ngaake khatle phaang ngo, pwan kangounu sinnu manpa pat ni bani kim bi han ong ngaake,
banina rinne, “Galilee mi nun ga, nanina tambaan la phaangluga pa-aam lang han ongnubo? Nani khouna tambaan la lou thou damnu Jisu heiya nanina munu ga danga Maan hung latlune.”
Haba nung bi banina Jerusalem kim bi naiga amnu, Olive tiga kounu rammwan bina Jerusalem la han hung lat rwe, haba rammwan ga Sabbath ni se kaleknu bazin lampui ngaake.

Banina nampui ga hung tangnu kaan bi bani kaong riak basaang in kaa la ka rwe. Bani ga Peter, James, John, Andrew, Philip le Thomas; Bartholomew le Matthew, Alphaeus sa kapaisa James le Simon Zealot khatle James sa kapaisa Judas hei rwanne.
Bani khangsung kamaisa rwan le Jisu nu Mary khatle Jisu nao rwan le diga sung khat chun khatcha toga chat makka kalumga hweini ong ngaake.
Haba kaan bi ong kadoi ongnu potroi rwan (razaga somni khak) lak pi Peter na han thouluga rinne,
“Unao pasa rwan bing ga, Jisu ding namnu mi nun ding kai thangnu Judas lang bi David mun bina Katha Bathiangnuna rin thang ngaaknu Bathiangnu Chongdip ka hung tang lang nge;
balangbe maan ani le diga mi sing chak thang ngaake khatle heiba chwan om badam suilou ngaake.”
(Heiba manpana baom sa maknu chwan lo manna taram khat kalei rwe; maan habei gana balu tasuk khuntaluga babon pwak bak rwe khatle bakarin bing le zan swak rwe.
Haga Jerusalem bi lung ongnu mi bingna thei ngaak rwe; atiga haba taram ding ga bani chong la Akeldama, dinuba Thi Tram diga kou rwe.)
“Balangbe Kalum Laa chongdip pi atiga hiak thang nge, ‘Maan lungnu riak lung taak tam ding ngo, Habei ga pakhatchanale lung mak tam ding ngo’ khatle ‘Bachwan riak ka mi katei khatna lin ding ngo.’
Atibriakpina anina ani lak pi Pukraangba Jisu na se swak sekhutka bakaan bing bi ani le ong bacham ngaaknu manpa nun lak pi

John na Jisu ding baptize to thangnu lumik pina thouga Bating ani lak pina lou thou damnu lumik ka tangga, Jisu na ring thou damnu lang bi anina sake to lang heiba pat ni lak pi pakhat ting ka thang ding gaye.”
Atiga pat ni dinuba: Barsabas kounu Justas tiga le kounu Joseph le Matthias ting ka thang rwe.
Banina kalumga rinne, “Mi bing sung ding thei ongnu he Pukraangba, barwei pat ni lak pi Nangna ka thangnu ga ani khou pi thei thang ngo,
heiya Judas na bakaong riak bahak pi se lat za lang chong tanga zei mak tamnu chwandon khatle chonglang om kaong riak ka lou lang naye.”
Banina tasaan phaangluga haga Matthias khou ta rwe. Atiga bating chonglang pat somga khat le basing sem thang rwe.
Pentecost Lumik hung tangnu kaan bi bani khangsung sung khatcha toga bariak khat pi hung kadoi ngaake.
Habei ga thei mak daakka thiraang kanatnu khwan danga tambaan lana taluga banina ong ongnu in ga sip rwe.
Habei ga mei dannu balei rwanna phak swaknu bani khou pi mu thang rwe, haga bani pakhat khat lu chung bi ta ong thang rwe.
Atiga bani khangsung lu chung bi Katha Bathiangnuna sip thang rwe khatle Katha na chong pi kabia thangnu paan bina bani chong chaat tei tei kabia thou rwe.
Saangbaan thwei bi lung ongnu mi chaat bing lakpi ongnu, ri baning thuknu Jihudi kapaisa rwan Jerusalem bi ong ngaake.
Khwan ga ngaisunu kaan bi mi khang hung kadoi rwe khatle bani batok bariak theilan rwe, balangbe banina kabia ongnu chong ga mi bingna bachong bachong la kabianu danga ngaisu ngaake.
Bani loh lonu khatle tasiatnuna sipluga khatna khat khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, mi nunna Galilee rwan chong kabia ongnu nun makpo?
Ani mi bingza ani ding pon thangnu ani chaat chong la danga tatoga anina ngaisunubo?
Parthia rwan, Mede rwan le Elamite rwan, Mesopotamia la ongnu, Judea le Cappadocia, Pontus le Asia rwan,
Phrygia le Pamphylia, Egypt le Cyrene taram kim bi amnu Libya taram mi nun, Rome lana bazin mi toga lung ongnu nun, Jihudi rwan le Jihudi rwan zek lounu nun,
Crete le Arab rwan chong la danga Rikrwang om chwan lian lang bi kabianu ngaisu ongme.”
Heiyana bani khangsung ding pi loh lo ong ngaake khatle batok bariak pi thei mak ngaake, bani khatna khat khou rin rwe, “Heiya tatonu kababo?”
Mi kasemna choi banuiga rinne, “Heiba minunna drakha tui kathan in kalonu zung rwe.”

Atiyeda Peter na potroi pat som ga khat le diga han thouluga baraam basaangga paoga bani khou rinne, “Judea mi nun khatle Jerusalem bi ongnu mi nun ga, nani heiya thei thangga achong nga ngai thang ngo.
Balangbe heiya nanina baningnu danga bani drakha tui kathan in kalonu make, balangbe kani khat om chakrin inthumza maang nge.
Atiyeda heiya thiamting Joel na rin thang ngaaknu gaye:

‘Kakhamnu dat pi atiga hunglune, Rikrwang na rinne, Eina mi bing lu chung bi Akatha buntalune; Nani sa kapaisa rwan le nani sa kamaisa rwanna ri chong rin swaklune, Nani sa katang rwanna pi mu thangnu ga mulune, Khatle nani ding kai thangnu pa rwanna mang manlune.
Ha kaan ga eina Aswak kapaisa rwan le Aswak kamaisa rwan lu chung bi Akatha buntalune, Khatle banina ri chong rin swaklune.
Eina basaangnu tambaan la tasiatnu chwan inza, Khatle kathweinu talei bi badannu chwan inza: Thi, mei khatle meikhut pi mulune.
Pukraangba om tasiatnu khatle lwat liannu lumik ga hung tang mak balei, Lumikna zing damlune, Khatle thana thi danga sen damlune.
Atiga swaklune, Pukraangba meng ding kounu bating ga kan thanglune.’

Israel mi rwan ga, heiba chong nga ngai thang ngo: Nani bahakna le theinu danga, Rikrwang na Nazareth Jisu ding nani lak pi tasiatnu chwan khatle badannu bing pi to thangga, Maan heiya Rikrwang na chongtannu miye.
Rikrwang na han thang ngaaknu khatle thei chaaknu nung suiga Bating pi swak rwe, nani chongtan maaknu rwan kutna nam rwe khatle cross pi hemdan thangluga athat ngaak rwe;
atiyeda Rikrwang na Bating thinu om riangrenu bina kan thangluga pi ring thou thang rwe, balangbe thinu gana Bating bangnu ngam mak ngaake.
Balangbe David na Balang bi rinne, ‘Eina Pukraangba ding ameithaan bi bakaan bathin phaangmuwe, Balangbe ei kaling mak lang, Maan akut inchang la ong ongme.
Atibriakpina asungna karowe khatle achongbiak le karonuna sipe; Inkuga apumna le bachunnu bi basak ongne.
Balangbe nangna akatha ding kathi ram bi pi kapaang thanglaye, Khatle Naom Bathiangnu Bating ga pi thu braan thanglaye.
Nangna akhou ringnu lampui ga pi thei thang rwe; Nameithaan bi ating karonuna pi sip thanglune.’
“Unao rwan bing ga, ani pa David thi drwe khatle imphum drwe, atiga baom thaan ga aniya tangga ani kim bi amme dinu aniya le sung raangga eina kabianu ngamme.

Atibriakpina thiamting khat toga Rikrwang na bakhou chongren to thang damme dinu maan theiye, pum om lang bi baom mikin bi Christa ding Baom Krwang takung riak pi ong lang Maanna Christa ding pi ring thou thanglune,
Christa na ring thou latnu lang bi Maanna muchaakluga rin damme, Maanna Bakatha ding kathi ram la asat thang dam make khatle Bapum ga le pi thu thang make.
Rikrwang na heiba Jisu ding pi ring thou thang drwe, hei lang bi ani mi bing zana sake rwe.

Atibriakpina Rikrwang kut inchang pek la pi lian thou thangnu bi ga Pa khouna Karen thangnu Katha Bathiangnu ding lousunu kaan bi nanina atun mu ongnu khatle ngaisu ongnu heiya Pukraangba Maanna pi thang ongnuwe.
Balangbe David tambaan la ka dam make atiyeda maan bahakna rinne, ‘Pukraangba na Apukraangba khou rinne, “Akut inchang pek la ong ong ngo.
Eina nating munanu nun ding Naket kadim riak pi to mak basaan ong ong ngo.” ’
Atibriakpina nanina cross pi athat thang damnu Jisu ding Rikrwang na Pukraangba khatle Christa pi to thang rwe dinu Israel inkhun bingna bathiangga thei ding ngo.”
Atun banina haga ngaisunu kaan bi bani balung bi sungna chounu dan ngaak rwe, atiga Peter le chonglang katei rwan khou rinne, “Unao rwan ga, ani pa-aam to langbo?”
Habei ga Peter na bani khou rinne, “Sung lero khatle noh bing kok thang lang chungna nani Jisu Christa meng bi baptize toro; atiga nanina Katha Bathiangnu leithwan lousulune.
Balangbe karen thangnu ga nani, nani sa rwan, namlaa la ongnu nun khatle ani Pukraangba Rikrwang na kou thang dingnu mi bing lang naye.”
Atiga chong katei tamga kabialuga maanna bani khou sake pi rwe khatle kachui thangluga rinne, “Nani nani raantoza sa maknu mikin bina kanno.”
Haba nung bi bachong ga karoga lou thangnu mi bing ding baptize to thang ngaake; ha ni ga katha raching thum khak bani khou pi inku thang damme.
Banina chonglang rwan om bachu thangnu bi, badam lou bachamnu bi, uilu thiak baknu bi khatle hweininu bi chat makka badam lou bacham ngaake.
Habei ga mi nun lu chung bi kachinu hung ngaake atiga chonglang rwan om paan bina badannu khatle tasiatnu chwan tamga to ngaake.
Balumsanu mi bing ga karungluga pot bingza khangsung om toga choi ngaake,
bani om ka am bing khatle pot bing ga zwan satluga mi bing lak pi bathaang amnu tudannu lang kasem thang ngaake.
Bani nun kani bathin kalum in bi sung khatcha toga hung kadoiluga inkhun inkhun bi uilu thiak bakluga, karo lozaang saga khatle sung khatcha toga bani om thaisaak ka sa bacham ngaake,
banina Rikrwang ding swanga khatle mi bing khouna le kriang thangnu lousu rwe. Atiga kanthangnu lousu damnu nun ding kani bathin Pukraangba na rupkathan bi pi inku thou thang ngaake.
Kani khat Peter le John na kalumnu dat chakrin kaqwa bi kalum in la ka bacham ngaake.
Banu pok pina sethei maknu pakhat ting banina kalum in bi khutnu bing khouna paangsun nisa lang, kalum in om Phaangsanu diga kounu inkhaan pui bi ga kani bathin pon hung thang ngaake;
Peter le John na kalum in bi sekhut tingnu ga muluga paangsun pi thang lang ni ngaake.
Peter le John na bating phaangdengga phaangluga rinne, “Arwei ding phaang ngo.”
Barwei khouna kasem phanglu dingbo diga balumsa briakpina maanna sung khutka phaang ngaake.
Habei ga Peter na rinne, “Akhou kachaak kaphut maake atiyeda eina aom ka amnu ga nalaang piye: Nazareth Jisu Christa meng bina lon thouluga sero.”
Peter na bakut inchang ga kailuga pi han thou thang rwe, haba kahan bi baket khatle kasiangru ga pi nat thang rwe.
Maan kachak thouluga han thou rwe khatle se rwe. Seluga, kachak thouluga khatle Rikrwang ding swan ga bani le diga kalum in la suikhut ngaak rwe.
Maanna se koiga Rikrwang ding swannu ga mi nunna mu rwe.
Habei ga maan kalum in om Phaangsanu Inkhaan pui diga kounu riak pi paangsun ni ongnu gaye dinu banina thei rwe; atiga bakhou swak tamnu ga bani lang tasiatnu le loh lonuna sip ngaak rwe.
Sethei maknu bina sa damnu manpa gana Peter le John ding choiluga ongnu kaan bi mi nunna taswang khak lang loh lo ga Solomon inkhu diga kounu riak pi pak hung kadoi rwe.

Peter na haga munu kaan bi mi nun khou rinne, “Israel mi rwan ga hei ding nga pa-aam toga loh lonubo? Mak tabe ani ngam mak tabe ri baning thuknu paan bina pi sa thangnu danga ani ding phaangdengga phaang ongnubo?

Ani pu pa rwan Rikrwang, Abraham, Isaac, Jacob om Rikrwang na Bachwanlaang Jisu ding lwat pi lian thang rwe, Pilate na Bating bathan sat lang basung hannu kaan bi nanina pi swak tamme khatle Pilate meithaan bi za dam make.
Atiyeda nanina Bathiangnu le Bazenu Bating zalan rwe atiyeda nani lang mi athatnu pakhat ting pi thang lang ni ngaake,
Rikrwang na thinu bina pi ring thou damnu, ringnu pi thang dingnu Krwang ding athat rwe, hei lang bi anina sake rwe.

Jisu meng ding balumsanu paan bina heiba manpa ding nga pi nat thang damme, nanina muluga thei ongnu ga rwe. Rikrwang khou amnu balumsanu gana nani khangsung meithaan bi bating pi sa bathiang thang rwe.
“Unao rwan ga, atun nani om bapuba rwannale to damnu ga danga, naninale thei makka to damnuwe dinu ei theiye.
Christa na riangre khaanglune diga Rikrwang na Baom thiamting rwan mun bina rin basaam thang ngaaknu bing ga Maanna pi hung tang thang rwe.
Atibriakpina nani noh bing ga tumut sat thang lang nani sung leluga han hungro, heiya Pukraangba meithaan bina chaang pi ring thou thangnu bakaan hung lang nge,
atiga Maanna nani khou kamaga kasam thang ngaaknu, Jisu Christa ding bathan hung thang lang nge,

Pot bingza pi kathan thang lat tingnu bakaan tang mak basaan Jisu ding tambaan la pi onglune, hei lang bi Rikrwang na talei dam thoutan bina Baom bathiangnu thiamting rwan bing mun bina rin thang rwe.

Balangbe Moses na pu pa rwan khou bathiangga rin thang ngaake, ‘Nani lang Pukraangba Rikrwang na nani unao rwan lak pina ei dannu Thiamting pakhat ting pi thanglune. Maanna nani khou rinnu bing ga nanina zei lang nge.
Heiya swaklune, tudannu Thiamting chong zei maknu mi bing ding ga mi nun lak pina to braan satlune.’
O, Samuel khouna thouga thiamting rwan bing khatle bani nung hungnu thiamting bingna le hadanga atun kaan om lang bi rin basaam thang ngaake.
Nani nun thiamting rwan khatle Rikrwang na ani pu pa rwan khou chongren to thang ngaaknu sa kapaisa rwanne, Abraham khou rinne, ‘Nakik nataat pina talei ram mi bing rithoi lousulune.’
Rikrwang na Bachwanlaang Jisu ding pi ring thou thangluga nani mi bingna nani om kasianu bina pi kaleluga nani khou rithoi pi thang lang kamaga lang hung thang ngaake.”
Banina mi nun khou chong kabia ongnu kahan bi tako rwan, kalum in ngaakpuba khatle Sadducee rwanna bani khou hung ngaake,
banina mi nun khou bachu thangnu khatle thinu nun ding Jisu paan bina pi ring thou thang latne diga pao swaknu lang bi bani sung katop tak ngaak rwe.
Atiga banina Peter le John ding namluga inswan lampai tangga qwan in bi thang rwe, balangbe haga khwazinren ngaake.
Atiyeda haba chong ga ngaisu damnu mi taswang khakna balumsa ngaak rwe; atiga habei hung ngaaknu kapaisa rwan ga mi raching impaang khak ngaake.
Inswan lampai bani om taleipuba rwan, patso rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan,
takolu Annas, Caiaphas, John, Alexander khatle takolu in sung rwan bing mi taswang khak Jerusalem bi hung kadoi ngaake.
Banina Peter le John ding bani zai bi pi han thangluga ngai rwe, “Narweina tuom ngam paan bina mak tabe tu meng bina heiya to ongnubo?”
Habei ga Katha Bathiangnuna sipluga Peter na bani khou rinne, “Mi nun om taleipuba rwan khatle Israel om patso rwan ga:
Ani ding aniya lumik pi naaga ongnu pakhat khou kasanu chwan to damnu lang bi, tatonu chwanna heiba mi ding pi sa thangnubo diga chong kasemnuwe dabe,

nani khangsung khatle Israel rwan bingna thei ding ngo, nanina cross pi athat thang damnu khatle Rikrwang na thi bina pi ring thou damnu, Nazareth Jisu Christa meng bi dinuba Bapaan bina heiba manpana sa bathiangluga nani meithaan bi han ongme.
Heiya ‘Nani intok mi nun lang bathaang maaknu asat thangnu lung gana bakung tonu intaki lung imbei rwe’ dinu gaye.
Katei pakhatcha khou hakna ringriak maake, balangbe Jisu meng paan bina makka ani ding kan thang dingnu mi nun lak pi pi thangnu meng katei pakhatchale tambaan thwei bi maake.”

Habei ga banina Peter le John om sung raangnu ga muluga chongrik thei tomnu khatle bachunu baatnu zung nge dinu theiluga loh lo ong ngaake. Atiga barwei Jisu nung sui thang ngaaknu nunne dinu banina thei rwe.
Naa bina pi sa thang damnu manpa gana bani le diga han ongnu muluga banina haba om maitwang bi chong khatchale rinnu ngam mak ngaak rwe.
Atiyeda banina barwei ding thampei in bina langkaang swak tam lang zathang pinu nung, bani cham haba om lang bi kathuiluga

rinne, “Heiba pat ni ding nga ani pa-aam tozo dinubo? Balangbe batak takka barwei pat nina badan zanu tasiatnu chwan to rwe dinu Jerusalem bi ongnu mi nunna thei rwe, ha ding ga ani za maknu ngam make.
Atiyeda heiya mi nun khou kasam lat mak lang, banina Jisu meng bina pakhatcha khou hakna kabia mak lang anina barwei ding kachi dam lang basi thangrizo.”
Banina barwei ding kouluga pakhatcha khou hakna Jisu meng ding kabia lat mak lang khatle bachu thang lat mak lang barwei khou zathang pi rwe.
Atiyeda Peter le John na bani khou rinne, “Anina Rikrwang chong zeinu ma nani chong zeinuna Rikrwang mikphaang bi bazenu zungbo dinu nanina chong kasemmo.
Balangbe anina mu damnu khatle ngaisu damnu lang bi anina kabia maknu ngam make.”
Mi nunna to thang damnu langna Rikrwang lwat indaoga ong dam briakpina barwei ding laak lang batok maakka banina barwei ding rakanga to basiluga bathan drwe.
Balangbe heiba tasiatnu chwan paan bina naanu pi sa thang damnu manpa ga sangwan sombali sak la mi ngaake. Christian nun om Kalum
Barwei ding bathan thang bi bani doi rwan kim la seluga takopuba rwan le patso rwanna barwei khou rin damnu chong bing ga bani khou rin rwe.

Haga banina theisunu kaan bi bani sung khatcha toga baraam basaangga Rikrwang ding swanga pao rwe, “He Pukraangba, Nang be talei tambaan, tuipui khatle haba sung bi amnu bing ding dam thangnu Rikrwang nge,
Nangna Na swak David mun bina atiga rin thang ngaake, ‘Gentile rwanna pa-aam toga balung pwannubo, Pa-aam lang mi nunna bathaang maaknu chwan ga laangnubo?
Talei ram krwang nunna han thou rwe, Khatle taleipuba rwanna Pukraangba le Baom Christa maitwang bi hung kadoi rwe.’
Balangbe batak takka Naom bathiangnu Chwanlaang, Nangna thao kanun thang damnu Jisu maitwang bi, Herod le Pontius Pilate barweina, Gentile rwan le Israel mi nun le diga hung kadoi rwe,
heiya Nakutna khatle Nabaningna to lang meithaanna han thang damnu ga to lang nge.
Atun Pukraangba, banina basi ongnu ga phaang thang ngo atiga Naswak rwan ding Nachong ga sung raangga pi kabia swak thang ngo,
Nakut balaan swakluga naanu pi sa lang, Naom bathiangnu Chwanlaang Jisu meng bina badannu khatle tasiatnu chwan to dam ding ngo.”
Banina kalumnu kaan bi banina ong kadoi ongnu riak ka kanuk rwe; bani ga Katha Bathiangnuna sipluga banina sung raangga Rikrwang chong kabia swak rwe.
Balumsanu mi khangna sung khatcha, katha khatcha toga ong ngaake; pakhatchanale baom ka amnu pot ka baraantoza omme diga rin mak ngaake atiyeda bani om ka am bing ga bani khangsung om to ngaake.
Chonglang rwanna ngam liannu le bachamga Pukraangba Jisu na ring thou damnu lang bi sake pi ngaake. Atiga bani khangsung lu chung bi kaliannu phaangkriang tamga pi thang ngaake.
Bani lak pi pakhatcha hakna baatnu maak ngaake; balangbe taram mak tabe in amnu bing gana ha bing ga zwan sat rwe khatle zwan swaknu pot bing om man ga phun hung ngaake,
sian ga chonglang rwan kut pi hung bachoi thang ngaake; atiga tudannu bathaang amnu nung suiga mi bing lang banina kasem thang ngaake.
Cyprus la ponnu Levi phum bina manpa pakhat, chonglang rwanna bameng Barnabas tiga basak thangnu (bakabana Kachui thangnu sa kapaisa diga kounu) Joses na
lou khat zwan sat rwe, atiga maanna haba sian ga phun hungluga chonglang rwan kut pi hung bachoi thang ngaake.
Atiyeda Ananias tiga kounu manpa pakhatna bamei Sapphira le diga taram khat zwan ngaake.
Atiga maanna badam kasem khaak thangluga bameina le haga theiga taram man ga badam kasemza chonglang rwan kut pi hung bachoi thang ngaake.
Atiyeda Peter na rinne, “Ananias, nangna Katha Bathiangnu ding minam lang khatle taram man bina badam kasem khaak thang lang Seitaan na nasung ding pa-aam toga pi sipnubo?
Haga zwan mak balei naom makkabo? Atiga zwannu nung le narang tonu makkabo? Pa-aam toga heipai chwan to lang nasung bi baning swaknubo? Nang mi nun ding minamnu make atiyeda Rikrwang ding minamnuwe.”
Atiga Ananias na heiba chong nga ngaisunu kahan bi balumtaluga kaphuk kailan drwe. Haga ngaisunu bingna kachi tak ngaak rwe.
Atiga katang rwanna thouluga bapum ga pwanna kazwanluga pon thou dam ngaake khatle bating kairi thang drwe.
Chakrin inthum nung bi bamei ga pa-aam swak tambo dinu thei makka sekhut rwe.
Peter na bakhou ngai rwe, “Narweina taram ga hazaa za lang zwannu zunggabo? Akhou rinno.” Maanna rinne, “O, hazaa za lang zwannu zung nge.”

Habei ga Peter na bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba Katha ding tamphaang langna haga narweina tatoga zakalenubo? Phaang ngo, nabasan ding kairi thang damnu mi nun ga inkhaanmun bi han ong maang nge, banina nating le pon swaklu rwe.”
Haba kahan bi ga maan Peter ket kim bi balumtaluga kaphuk kailan drwe. Katang rwanna khutnu kaan bi maan le thi ngaaknu dou rwe, atiga banina bating le pon swakluga babasan thaan kim bi ri thang rwe.
Rupkathan bi amnu balumsanu bing khou khatle swak tamnu ga ngaisunu mi nun khou kachi taknu swak ngaak rwe.
Chonglang rwanna bani kutna mi nun lak pi badannu khatle tasiatnu chwan tamga to rwe. Bani khangsung Solomon inkhu bi sung khatcha toga ong ngaake.
Mi katei pakhatchanale bani khou karung raang mak ngaake atiyeda mi nunna bani ding takung tazei to takka ong ngaake.
Atiga kamaisa le kapaisa, mi khangna balumsaga Pukraangba khou mi tam khit khit thou ngaak rwe,
Peter na se hungnu kaan bi bakatha za beida bani khou ta thang langna, naanu nun ding lampui bi bani ria khatle kain riak pi thangluga pi in ong ngaake.
Jerusalem paan bi amnu namlian bing lana mi khang, bani om kasa kanaa bing ding khatle bathiang maknu katha na rainu nun ding pon hung rwe, atiga ha bing ding ga pi sa thang loi ngaake.
Habei ga takolu khatle maan le diga ong bachamnu mi bing (dinuba Sadducee rwanna) maitwangluga bani khou antiamnuna sip rwe,
atiga chonglang rwan ding bani kutna namluga mi khang ongnu qwan in bi thang rwe.
Atiyeda zingpha talak pi Pukraangba om Tambaan Chonglangna qwan in inkhaan bing lat thangluga bani ding langkaang la kalwang swakluga rinne,
Sero, nanina kalum in bi ga han thouluga mi nun khou heiba ringnu chong nga kasammo.”

Haga banina ngaisuluga louthwan khwan kalum in bi khutluga bachu thang rwe. Atiyeda takolu khatle maan le diga ong bachamnu nun ga hung tang rwe khatle banina Israel sa rwan om patso rwan khatle thampei rwan ding kou kadoiluga bani ding qwan in bina bani khou kalwang hung lang mi lang thang rwe.
Atiyeda ngam amnu nunna hungnu kaan bi bani qwan in bi maak ngaak rwe, banina seluga haga bapuluga
rinne, “Anina qwan in ga inkhaan khaan chuiga khatle bapaan bi rangkaan thang ong ngaaknu dou rwe; atiyeda anina inkhaan lat swaknu kaan bi basung bi pakhatcha ding le dou make!”
Takolu om rangkaan balu le takopuba rwanna heiya theinu kaan bi pa-aam swaklu dingbo diga bani loh lo ong ngaake.
Habei ga mi pakhatna hungluga bani khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, nanina qwan in bi thang ngaaknu kapaisa rwan ga kalum in bi hung hanluga mi nun ding bachu thang ongme!”
Kraanpuba gana ngam amnu nun le seluga bwei laak thang makka bani ding kalwang hung rwe, balangbe mi nunna bani ding lungna khumnu le zaye diga kachi ngaake.
Atiga banina ha rwan ding ga kalwang hungluga thampei meithaan bi pi han thang rwe. Atiga takolu gana bani khou ngaiga

rinne, “Heiba meng bi bachu thang mak lang anina nani khou rakanga zathang pi thangnu makpo? Phaang ngo, nanina bachu thang ongnu heiya Jerusalem namlian bi rin kazan bachang rwe khatle heiba Manpa thi ga ani lu chung bi pi ta lang karamme!”
Habei ga Peter le chonglang katei rwanna rinne, “Anina mi nun chong ding ma Rikrwang chong ding zei ding gaye.
Nanina cross pi bakhailuga athat thang damnu Jisu ding ani pu pa rwan Rikrwang na pi ring thou thang rwe.
Israel rwanna sung leluga noh kok thangnu lousu langna, Rikrwang na Bating Krwang khatle Kanthangnupa toga Bakut inchangna kai basaang ka thang rwe.
Hei lang bi anina sake rwe khatle Bachong zeinu mi nun lang Rikrwang na pi thang damnu Katha Bathiangnuna le haba lang bi sake rwe.”
Thampei mi nunna haga ngaisunu kaan bi bani balung pwan tak thou rwe khatle bani ding athat lang chong katu rwe.

Habei ga karung riak pi Pharisee rwan pakhat, mi nunna takung tazei tonu mi bing lak pi bameng senu chongtan bachuthangnupa Gamaliel na han thouluga chonglang rwan ding langkaang la bakaan kasem swak tam lang bani khou zathang pi rwe.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Israel mi rwan ga, hei rwan ding nga pa-aam to langbo dinu lang bi nani barak theiyo.

Balangbe bakaan kasem meithaan la baraanto bating mi khate diga baningnu, Theudas na maitwang ngaake. Kapaisa rwan, mi raza bali khak banung sui ngaake. Bating athat tamnu kaan bi bachong zeinu mi nun ga pak imphaang damme atiga haga khatchale maknu to damme.
Heiba manpa nung bi mi sing semnu kaan bi Galilee lana hungnu Judas na maitwang thouluga potroi rwan mi tamga khom rwe. Atiyeda bating le athat trwe, bachong zeinu nunna le pak imphaang drwe.

Atun eina nani khou rinnuwe, nani hei rwan khouna impaan swak tammo, bani raantoza ding bathan thang dro; balangbe heiba baning mak tabe heiba chwanna mi nun khouna ngaake dabe heiya braan dam zung nge;
atiyeda heiya Rikrwang khouna ngaake dabe hei ding nga nani to braannu ngamlaye, nani Rikrwang maitwang bi katwaknu tolune.”
Banina Gamaliel chong ga za thang rwe khatle banina chonglang rwan ding kou hungluga bwei rwe, bani ding Jisu meng bi chong kabia za make diga zathang rakanga pi luga bathan sat rwe.
Atiga chonglang rwanna Jisu meng lang chungna kazaknu dou lang khopnu rwe diga baningluga karo karoga thampei karung meithaan bina se swak trwe.
Banina kani bathin kalum in bi khatle inkhun bing bi seluga Jisu wa Christa ye diga chat makka bachu thang se ngaake khatle kasam se ngaake.

Haba kaan bi potroi rwan mi sing inku thounu kaan bi Greek chong kabianu Jihudi rwan lu chung bi tu tu tam tam thou rwe, balangbe kani bathin thaisaak kasemnu bi bani om tamei rwan lang thouto thang make dinu lang bi naye.
Habei ga pat somga kani gana potroi rwan mi khang ding kou hungluga rin rwe, “Anina sa in langza laangluga Rikrwang chong ding bathan satnu balang maake.
Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, anina bani ding heiba chwan langna hap thang lang, nani lak pina bameng sanu, Katha Bathiangnuna sipnu khatle ningtingnu manpa pat siari ding nani lak pina zongro;
atiyeda sacham kasamnu chwan khatle kalum thang nu bi anina chat makka sung khut ongne.”

Rin ongnu heiyana mi khang sung ding pi pem rwe. Atiga balumsatna sipnu khatle Katha Bathiangnuna sipnu Stephen le Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas khatle Antioch la mi Jihudi rwan gon damnu Nicolas ting banina ka thang rwe,
bani ding chonglang rwan meithaan bi pi han thang rwe; atiga banina kalumnu kaan bi bani lu chung bi kut kaising thang rwe.
Rikrwang chong ga kazan swakluga, Jerusalem bi potroi rwan mi sing tam tak thou rwe khatle tako rwan le mi tam takka balumsanu ding ga zei rwe.
Stephen balumsatna sipnu khatle ngam amnu mi briakpina mi nun lak pi tasiatnu le badannu chwan tamga to ngaake.
Habei ga rang tonu rwan om Synagogue diga kounu phom mi nunna (Cyrene lana hungnu Alexander khatle Cilicia le Asia talei lana hungnu mi nun) Stephen le chong kae thou rwe.
Atiyeda Stephen na baningting khatle Katha Bathiangnu paan bina kabianu chong ga banina kataknu ngam mak ngaake.
Habei ga banina manpa rwan mi kasem ding tasun toluga chong karwaknu chong pi rin rwe, “Maanna Moses le Rikrwang maitwang bi rin basiatnu anina ngaisu rwe.”
Atiga banina mi khang, patso rwan khatle chongtan bachuthangnu rwan ding kachui thangluga khatle khangsung hung karungluga bating nam rwe, atiga bani om thampei in bi bating kalwang hung rwe.
Banina chong karwaknu sake rwan ding phun swakluga pi rin rwe, “Heiba manpana bathiangnu riak le chongtan om maitwang bi rin basiate;
balangbe Nazareth Jisu na heiba riak tingga to braanluga Moses na ani lang pi thang ngaaknu chaang ding ga to kale lune diga rinnu anina ngaisu rwe.”
Habei ga thampei in bi badung ongnu mi nun gana bating phaangdengga ongnu kaan bi bamai kum ga tambaan chonglang mai kum danga mu rwe.
Haba nung bi takoluna rinne, “Hei bing nga bazenubo?”
Stephen na rinne, “Unao rwan khatle apu apa rwan ga, ngai thang ngo: Lwat liannu Rikrwang na ani pa Abraham khou, maan Haran bi lung mak balei Mesopotamia bi lungnu kaan bi pi mu thangga
bakhou rinne, ‘Nangna natalei khatle nathi rui ding thangsialuga nakhou pi mu thang dingnu talei la ga sero.’
“Habei ga maanna Chaldean taram bina se swakluga Haran bi lung ngaake. Bapa thi damnu nung Rikrwang na bating nanina atun lung ongnu talei biya pi hung thang rwe.

Atiyeda Rikrwang na balaang talei khatchale pi thang mak ngaake, baket kadim riak lang hakna pi thang make. Ati ngaak peida Abraham na basa pon mak aangnu meithaan tangga, Rikrwang na heiba taram ma maan khatle bakik bataat rwan khou bani om pi to thangne diga karen thang ngaake.
Rikrwang na bakhou rin ngaake, ‘Nakik nataat rwanna rwan ram la lunglune khatle mi nunna bani ding swak pi toluga sangwan raza bali raiga pi lung thanglune.
Atiyeda bani ding swak pi to ongnu chaat ting ga Eina chong kasemlune,’ diga Rikrwang na rinne, ‘Khatle banina swakluga heiba riak pi Ating chwanlaang tolune.’

Maanna bani khou mun romnu chongren pi thang rwe; atibriakpina Abraham na Isaac ting ponnu nung ni kariat tangnu kaan bi bating mun rom rwe; Isaac na Jacob ting pon rwe khatle Jacob na phum pa rwan somga kani ding pon thang rwe.
“Atiga phum pa rwanna Joseph ting antiam thouluga Egypt la zwan sat thang ngaak rwe. Atiyeda Rikrwang na Joseph ting ong bacham thang ong ngaake,

bating rainu bing bina kan thang ngaake khatle bakhou Egypt krwang, Pharaoh meithaan bi kriang thangnu khatle baningting pi thang ngaake; atiga maanna Joseph ting Egypt khatle bainkhun lu chung bi phaangsinnu mi pi to thang rwe.
Egypt le Canaan talei bing bi tasiatnu bu taangnu khatle riangre kanangnu hung rwe khatle ani pu pa rwan ga thaisaak zongsulan rwe.
Atiyeda Egypt la baza kalaanu cham Jokob na ngaisunu kaan bi maanna ani pu pa rwan ding haba riak pi kamaga lang thang ngaake.
Atiga lang hung leng ninu kaan bi Joseph na batang rwan khou baman pi thei thang rwe khatle Joseph in inkhun thirui bing ding le Pharaoh na thei thang rwe.
Haba nung bi Joseph na bapa Jacob le bain thirui rwan mi somsiariga impaang ding bakhou kou hung lang lang thang rwe.
Atiga Jacob Egypt pi talung rwe; maan khatle ani pu pa rwan habei ga thi thang ngaak rwe.
Atiga bani ding Shechem la phun hung ngaake khatle Abraham na Shechem bi amnu Hamor sa kapaisa rwan khouna sianna kaleinu thaan bi bani ding ui thang ngaake.
“Atiyeda Rikrwang na Abraham khou karen thang damnu bakaan ga nai hungnu kaan bi Egypt la mi sing inku thou rwe khatle lungking thou rwe,
heiya Joseph ting thei maknu krwang katei kathan khat paan lat mak basaan ngaake.
Haba krwang gana ani mi nun ding rou siaga to rwe khatle ani pu pa rwan ding sia takka to rwe atibriakpina bani sa nao rwan ding thi braan loi dam lang asat thang ngaake.
Haba kaan bi Moses ting pon thang rwe, maan Rikrwang mikphaang bi sa taknu naosen ngaake khatle bapa in bi tha thum bakot thou ngaake.
Atiyeda bating asat thangnu kaan bi Pharaoh sa kamaisana bating lou thouluga maanna ponnu sa kapaisa lang toga bakot thou ngaake.
Moses na Egypt om ningting bing bachu ngaake, atiga maan chongbiak laabiak pi khatle chwan bing bi ngam am ngaake.
“Maan sangwan sombali tangnu kaan bi bau-banao rwan, Israel sa rwan ding phaang se nwamnu basung bi swak rwe.
Atiga bani lak pi pakhat ting baze maknu thot pi rai ongnu ga Moses na muluga ha ding ga kan thangluga rai ongnu Egypt rwan manpa ding ga takhum baan ga maanna athat sat rwe.
Balangbe Rikrwang na Moses kut paan bina bani ding kan thanglune dinu bau-banao rwanna theiye diga maanna baning ngaake atiyeda baninaba haga thei mak ngaake.
Inswan lampai le pat ni rwei kamai ongnu maanna muluga barwei kasa to kale lang maanna rinne, ‘Narwei bau banao ga, pa-aam lang khatna khat khou koinu chwan to kale ongnubo?’
Atiyeda koinu chwan to ongnu bainnai gana bating tun satluga rinne ‘Tuna nating ani lu chung bi kai thangnu khatle chongsempuba to lang hap thanggabo?
Inzaan nangna Egypt rwan pakhat ting athat tamnuga danga ating le athatne dinubo?’
Heiya rinnu kaan bi Moses na Median talei la pak seluga man mi toga ong ngaake, habei ga maan sa kapaisa pat ni ding pon thang rwe.
“Sangwan sombali taang bi Sinai rammwan om ramhaang bi Pukraangba om Tambaan Chonglang khatna nilai lak thing bom khat pi meibom sung bi Moses khou pi mu thang ngaake.
Moses na haga phaangmunu kaan bi maan loh lo rwe khatle maanna phaang lang hung banainu kaan bi maan Pukraangba khwan ngaisu ngaake,
atiga rinne, ‘Ei nani pu pa rwan Rikrwang nge, Abraham Rikrwang, Isaac Rikrwang khatle Jacob Rikrwang nge.’ Moses na kachi kathokka phaang kadou raang mak ngaake.
‘Habei ga Pukraangba na bakhou rinne, “Naket pina ketthop ka lou sat tammo, balangbe nangna han ongnu riak ka bathiangnu riake.
Egypt talei bi Ami nun ding rai ongnu ga Ei mu rwe; banina kakou ongnu khwan ga Ei ngaisu rwe, atiga Ei bani ding kan thang lang tanuwe. Atun hungro, Eina nating Egypt la lang thang lang rwe.” ’

“ ‘Tuna nating ani lu chung bi bapuba khatle chongsempuba to lang hap thanggabo?’ diga rin ngaaknu banina za mak tamnu Moses ting ga nilai lak pi pi mu thang ngaaknu Tambaan Chonglang om ngam paan bina phaangsinnu mi khatle ranthangnupa to lang Rikrwang na lang thang rwe.
Maanna Egypt talei bi Kasennu Tuipui bi khatle ramhaang bi sangwan sombali tasiatnu chwan khatle badannu bing pi mu thangnu nung bani ding kalwang swak rwe.

“ ‘Nani Pukraangba Rikrwang na nani unao rwan lak pina ei dannu thiamting pakhat ting nani lang lang hung thanglune. Nanina Bachong zei dingnu rwe,’ diga Israel sa rwan khou rin ngaaknu Moses ka heiya rwe.
Sinai rammwan bi Tambaan Chonglang le diga chong kabia ngaaknu, ani pu pa rwan le diga ramhaang bi mi khang le ong ngaaknu khatle ani lang pi dingnu ringnu chong ga lousu damnu maan ga heiya rwe,
ani pu pa rwanna Bachong zei nwam makka bating lou thang make. Atiga bani sung Egypt la kanei damluga
Aaron khou rinne, ‘Ani meithaan bi se lang ani lang ri katha bacha thang ngo; balangbe ani ding Egypt talei bina kalwang swak thangnu Moses khou pa-aam swak tambo dinu ani theilan rwe.’
Haba kaan bi ga banina sen swan katha khat bachaluga, haba ri katha khou ga rikhaang pot kat thang rwe khatle bani kutna bachanu chwan bi ga bani karo rwe.

Habei ga Rikrwang na bani khouna Bamai kanei satluga saangbaan la insi ding kalum lang bani ding bathan thang rwe, heiya thiamting om chongdip pi hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, ‘He Israel rwan inkhun, Ramhaang bi sangwan sombali nanina alaang khouring athatluga rikhaang pot kat thanggabo?
“ ‘Nanina Moloch om pwan in, Khatle nanina kalum lang bachanu ri katha Remphan insi ding ga nanina kai thou rwe; Atiga Eina nani ding Babylon paan la phun sat thanglune.’
“Ramhaang bi ani pu pa rwan om sake pwan in am ngaake atiga Moses na phaangmu damnu ga khak khakka bacha lang nge diga Rikrwang na bakhou rin thang damnu ga danga banina bacha rwe,

haba pwan in ga am taangnu nung, Rikrwang na ani pu pa rwan meithaan bi Gentile rwan ding kazun sat ong bi, Joshua na kai thangga haba pwan in ga ani pu pa rwanna phunkhut ngaake, haga David kaan tangga ngaake,
David na Rikrwang meithaan bi phaangkriang ga lousu damme khatle Jacob om Rikrwang lang kaong riak pi thang lang ni ngaake.
Atiyeda Solomon na balaang in khat bacha rwe.
“Ati ngaak peida Basaang Kataknu Rikrwang ga kutna bachanu kalum in bi ga ong thang make, haga thiamting na rin thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe,
‘Tambaan ga Akaong riake, Khatle talei ga Aket kadim riake. Nanina Alaang impei in bacha thangne gabo, Mak tabe Eina basak tingnu riak ka ingaipaibo? diga Pukraangba na rinne.
“ ‘Ha bing ga Akutna bacha thangnu makpo?’
“He tun natnu, sung khatle kana mun rom maknu mi nun ga! Nanina bakaan bathin Katha Bathiangnu ding maitwang rwe; nani pu pa rwanna tonu danga nanina le to rwe.
Nani pu pa rwanna rai dam maknu thiamting tu ambo? Hungnanu Bazenu Pakhat lang bi rin basaam thangnu nun ding nanina athat rwe, atun nani Bating pi swaknu khatle athatnu mi nunne,
nani tambaan chonglang rwan paan bina chongtan ga lousunu mi nun rwe atiyeda haga nanina zei make.”
Banina ha bing ga ngaisunu kaan bi bani sung souga bamaitwang bi ngaatang ei karit thou rwe.
Atiyeda Stephen na Katha Bathiangnuna sipluga saangbaan la phaangkanu kaan bi Rikrwang om lwat liannu khatle Jisu na Rikrwang kut inchang pek la han ongnu ga muluga
rinne, “Phaang ngo, Tambaan inkhaan lat swaknu khatle Misa Sa Kapaisana Rikrwang kut inchang pek la han ongnu eina mu rwe!”
Habei ga banina baraam nat ka, bani kana baruluga paoga khangsung sung khatcha toga bakhou pak hung rwe;
banina bating namlian paan la tun swakluga lungna sat rwe. Atiga sake nunna bani pwan bing ga Saul diga kounu katangpa kut pi bachoi thang rwe.
Banina Stephen ding lungna sat ong bi maanna Pukraangba ding kouga rinne, “Pukraangba Jisu, akatha lou thou thangro.”
Haba nung bi maan kekhok deluga baraam basaangga paoluga rinne, “Pukraangba, bani lu chung bi noh pi ta thang mako.” Heiba chong nga kabia taangluga maan thi drwe.

Stephen ding athat pi ga Saul le za bacham ngaake. Ha kaan ga Jerusalem bi rupkathan ding taswang khak rai thou rwe khatle chonglang rwan maknu katei rwan bing Judea le Samaria la pak imphaang thou dam ngaake.
Rikrwang ding kachinu manpa rwan gana Stephen ding kairi rwe khatle balaang chungna bani taswang khak chunto lo siaga ong ngaake.
Atiyeda Saul na rupkathan ding torai to imphaangluga inkhun bing bi khutluga mannu manpa rwan ding kai swakluga bani ding qwan in bi thang rwe.
Pak imphaang thou damnu mi nun gana bariak thin se koiluga Rikrwang chong ga kasam se ngaake.
Philip na Samaria namlian la seluga bani khou Christa om lang bi kasam thang rwe.
Mi khang gana Philip chong ga sung khatcha toga ngai ong ngaake khatle maanna tonu tasiatnu chwan bing ga banina mu rwe.
Bathiang maknu katha na mi nun khouna baraam basaangga paoga se swak tam ngaake; habei ga pum baang thinu le ket sethei maknu nun ding pi sa thang ngaake.
Atiga namlian bi ongnu mi nun ga karo tak ngaak rwe.
Namlian bi ga meithaan dwei choi ngaaknu Simon diga kounu manpa pakhat am ngaake, atiga Samaria rwan mi nun ding pi loh lo ong ngaake khatle maan baraantoza kaliannu manpa khate diga rin ngaake,
kasinnu bina kaliannu tangga bakhou bani sung thangga rinne, “Manpa heiya Rikrwang ngam liannu ga rwe.”
Banina bakhouza bani sung thangga ong ngaake, balangbe maanna baom dwei chwan gana bakhwa seiga bani ding pi loh lo ong ngaake.
Atiyeda Philip na Rikrwang om krwang talei lang bi kasamnu ga banina balumsanu kaan bi Jisu Christa meng bi kamaisa le kapaisa rwan hungluga baptize to ngaake.
Haba nung bi Simon le balumsa ngaak rwe. Atiga maan le baptize toluga Philip le diga ong bacham rwe. Atiga tasiatnu khatle badannu chwan bing ga maan muluga loh lo rwe.
Jerusalem bi ongnu chonglang rwanna Rikrwang chong ga Samaria rwanna lou thang rwe dinu theinu kaan bi banina Peter le John ding bani khou lang hung rwe.
Banina Katha Bathiangnu ding lousu dam lang barweina hungluga bani lang kalum thang ngaake.
Balangbe Katha Bathiangnuna bani pakhatcha khou hakna ta thang mak aang nge, banina Pukraangba Jisu meng bi baptize to thangnuza zung nge.
Haba nung bi Peter le John na bani lu chung bi kut kaising thang rwe. Atiga banina Katha Bathiangnu ding lousu rwe.
Chonglang rwanna kut kaising thangnu kaan bi bani Katha Bathiangnu ding lousu rwe dinu Simon na munu kaan bi maanna bani lang sian kat rwe.
Atiga maanna rinne, “Eina mi khat lu chung bi kut kaising thangnu kaan bi maanna le Katha Bathiangnu ding lousu lang haba ngam ga alaang le pi thang ngo.”
Atiyeda Peter na bakhou rinne, “Naom sian ga nang le diga mut bacham dam ding ngo, balangbe Rikrwang leithwan ding nangna sianna kaleinu zaye diga baning nge.
Heiba chwan biya naom thou mak tabe naom badam maake. Balangbe Rikrwang mikphaang bi nasung baze make.
Atibriakpina kasianu nasung ga lero, Pukraangba khou hweiniyo atiye dabe nasung baning ding ga kok thangnu le zaye.
Balangbe kakhaanu gana hu pi to rwe khatle ririak se maknuna nating bang thang ong rwe dinu ei mu rwe.”
Haba nung bi Simon na katake, “Nangna kabia damnu bing ga akhou khatchale ta thang mak lang Pukraangba khou alaang hweini thangro.”
Atiga banina Pukraangba om sacham ga sake pi ga kasam thangsialuga khatle Samaria rwan nam bing bi le sacham bachu thangsialuga Jerusalem la han thou dam ngaake.
Pukraangba om tambaan chonglangna Philip khou rinne, “Thouluga Jerusalem bina Gaza la thou damnu lampui, kathwei pek la setaro.” Haga ramkaang ramme.
Atiga maanna thouluga se rwe. Phaang ngo, habei ga basa semnu Etheopia rwan pa, Etheopia rwan ramanu, Candace om lan bing choinu kaliannu ngam amnu gana Jerusalem la kalum lang se ong ngaake.
Maanna han hung latnu kaan bi baom raqwan gari sung bi badungluga thiamting Isaiah om chongdip pa ong ngaake.
Haba nung bi Katha Bathiangnuna Philip khou rinne, “Bakim la sero, baom raqwan gari ga le diga se bachamro.”
Atiga Philip na bakhou pak hungnu kaan bi thiamting Isaiah om Chongdip ka pa ongnu ngaisu rwe. Maanna rinne, “Nangna pa ongnu ga bakaba theibo?”
Atiga maanna rinne, “Mi khatna ating bachu thang mak tazuba ei tatoga theinu ngam ding gabo?” Maanna Philip ting raqwan gari bi kaluga maan le badung bacham lang rin rwe.

Bathiangnu chongdip pi maanna pa ongnu riak ka heiye, “Zao ding athat lang kai senu danga bating kalwang se rwe, Khatle zao swanna bamun kachatnu meithaan bi baraam maknu ga danga, Maan babao aang thou make.
Basung bangiam ta briakpina bakhou hung dingnu bazenu ding ga lou sat rwe. Atiga baom mikin ding tuna pao swak tingbo? Balangbe baom kum ga talei ram bina lou sat rwe.”
Atiga basa semnu manpa gana Philip khou katake, “Eina nakhou ngainuwe, thiamtingna tuom lang bi rinnubo? Balang bimo mak tabe mi katei om lang bibo?”
Philip na babao aang thouluga Bathiangnu chongdip pi gana thouluga Jisu om lang bi bakhou kasam thang rwe.
Barweina lampui bi setanu kaan bi tui amnu riak pi hung tang rwe. Atiga basa semnu manpa gana rinne, “Phaang ngo, abeiya tui am rwe ating baptize toza maknu om lang pa-aam ambo?”
Habei ga Philip na rinne, “Nangna nasung bingna balumsaye dabe zaye.” Atiga manpa gana katake, “Jisu Christa heiya Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dinu ei balumsaye.”
Atibriakpina maanna raqwan gari ding ga han basak lang zathang pi rwe khatle Philip le basa semnu manpa ga tui la taluga bating baptize to thang rwe.
Barwei pat ni tui bina kanu kaan bi Philip ting Pukraangba om Katha na lou thou drwe. Basa semnu manpa gana bating mu latlan rwe. Atiga maan karo karoga lampui la thou dam ngaake.
Atiyeda Philip ting Azotus pi kadou lat rwe. Atiga maanna Caesarea bi hung tang mak basaan namlian bing bi sacham kasam ngaake.
Haba nung bi Saul na Pukraangba om potroi rwan ding basi lang khatle athat lang baning briakpina maanna takolu khou se ngaake.
Atiga Lampui bi senu kamaisa ngaakle kapaisa ngaakle kadou kadounu mi bing ding karakluga Jerusalem la phun hung lang maanna Damascus om synagogue bing khou pi lang takolu khouna chamthwan ni rwe.
Atiga maan Damascus kim bi se hungnu kaan bi thei mak daakka tambaan lana babaan khatna bating baan qwat thang rwe.
Habei ga maan talei bi balumta rwe khatle khwan khatna atiga rinnu maanna ngaisu rwe, “Saul, Saul, nang pa-aam lang Ating rai ongnubo?”
Atiga maanna ngaiye, “Pukraangba, Nang Tubo?” Pukraangba na rinne, “Nangna rai ongnu Jisu ga Ei rwe, thingzum ding naketna basui lang nalaang kung lang zung nge.”

Maanna kachi kathokka loh lo ga ngaiye, “Pukraangba, nangna ating paaam tonu bathaigabo?” Haba kaan bi Pukraangba na bakhou rinne, “Thouluga namlian laga sero, nangna pa-aam to langbo dinu nakhou rin thanglune.”
Atiga maan le se bachamnu manpa rwan ga chong kabia makka thiap thiapka han ong ngaake. Bani khwan ga ngaisu ngaake atiyeda pakhatcha ding le mu make.
Haba nung bi Saul talei bina lon thouluga mik meng swaknu kaan bi pakhatcha ding le mulan rwe. Atiyeda banina bating kut kailuga Damascus namlian bi kalwang hung rwe.
Maan habei ga mik mu makka ni thum khatchale sa le sa mak in le in mak tiga ong ngaake.
Haba kaan bi Damascus pi Ananias tiga kounu potroi pakhat am ngaake. Atiga bakhou Pukraangba na pi mu thangga “Ananias,” tiga kou rwe. Atiga maanna, “Pukraangba, ei abeiya amme,” diga katak rwe.

Habei ga Pukraangba na bakhou rinne, “Thouluga nang Bazenu Lampui diga kounu riaklaga sero. Atiga Judas in bi Tarsus lana hungnu mi Saul diga kounu ding ga bazongro. Balangbe phaang ngo maan kalum ongme.
Atiga bakhou pi mu thangnu khat pi maan bamik mu lat lang Ananias tiga kounu pakhatna hungluga bakhou kut kaising thangnu mu ngaake.”
Haba nung bi Ananias na katake, “Pukraangba, haba manpa gana Jerusalem bi Naom bathiangnu mi nun ding kasianu tonu lang bi mi taswang khak khouna eina ngaisu rwe.
Atiga maanna Nameng ding kounu mi bing ding namluga karak lang takopuba rwan khouna kazanu lou ngaake.”
Atiyeda Pukraangba na bakhou rinne, “Sero, balangbe bating Gentile rwan khou, krwang nun khou khatle Israel sa rwan khou Ameng phunse lang Eina kathang swaknu Aom kutchoi rwe.
Balangbe maan Ameng lang chungna riangre kanang inza dou dingnu ga bakhou Eina pi mu thangne.”

Ananias na seluga haba in bi ga khut rwe khatle balu chung bi kut kaising thangluga rinne, “Unao Saul, nangna se hungnu lampui bi pi mu thang ngaaknu Pukraangba Jisu na ating lang hungnuwe. Atiga nang mik mu lat lang khatle nakhou Katha Bathiangnuna sip lang nge.”
Haba kahan bi ga bamik pina balip tannu khat ta dam ngaake. Atiga maan mik mu latluga lon thou rwe khatle baptize to rwe.
Atiga maan sa in latnu nung nat thou lat rwe. Haba nung Saul Damascus pi potroi rwan le diga bakaan kasem ong ngaake.
Haba kahan bi maanna synagogue bing bi Christa heiya Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye diga kasam thou rwe.
Habei ga bachong ngaisunu mi bingna loh lo ga rinne, “Heiya Jerusalem bi Jisu meng ding kounu nun ding to braan sat ngaaknu bani ding karakluga takopu khou phunse lang hungnu ga makpo?”
Atiyeda Saul na banat inkuga nat thouluga Jisu wa Christa ga rwe diga rakanga rin swak rwe. Ha bing gana Damascus pi ongnu Jihudi rwan ding bani sung to tamam rwe.
Atiga khwa sei hungnu kaan bi Jihudi rwanna bating athat sat lang tup ngaak rwe.
Atiyeda banina to ongnu ga Paul na thei rwe. Banina bating athat lang kapan bi zingpha thamlai thei makka chwan ong ngaake.
Haba nung bi potroi rwanna bating zingpha luklei pui khat pi thangluga kapan baang la basaam ta thang ngaake.
Atiga Saul na Jerusalem bi hungnu kaan bi maan potroi rwan nung sui lang karamnu kaan bi bani khangsungna bating kachi rwe. Balangbe bating potroi khate diga banina balumsa mak ngaake.

Atiyeda Barnabas na bating chonglang rwan khou kalwang hung rwe. Atiga Paul na lampui bi tatoga Pukraangba ding mu damnu, Pukraangba na bakhou impei chong kabia damnu khatle Damascus pi maanna basung raangga Jisu meng ding kasam damnu ha bing ga bani khou rin swak rwe.
Atiga maan Jerusalem bi bani le diga se swak sekhutka ong ngaake.
Atiga maanna Greek chong kabianu Jihudi rwan le diga Pukraangba Jisu meng bi sung raangga bani le diga kae kale rwe khatle banina bating athat lang to ngaake.
