Atiyeda unao rwanna haga thei swaknu kaan bi bating Caesarea la kalwang taluga Tarsus la bathan thang rwe.

Haba nung bi Judea, Galilee khatle Samaria taram bing bi amnu rupkathan bing bi dai bazaangnu am thou rwe khatle katha bi lian thou rwe. Atiga Pukraangba ding kachi theiga khatle Katha Bathiangnu om pui thangnu bi se rwe khatle bani mi sing inku thou rwe.
Peter na talei khat om bariak bing bi atiga serwan hungnu kaan bi Lydda bi ongnu bathiangnu mi rwan kim bi ta ngaake.
Habei ga maanna ria bi sangwan kariat in ongnu khatle pum baang thinu Aeneas tiga kounu manpa khat ting kadou ngaake.
Atiga Peter na bakhou rinne, “Aeneas, nang thouro, Jisu Christa na nating pi sa thang rwe, thouluga naria ga kakamro.” Haba kahan bi maan lon thou rwe.
Atiga Lydda bi khatle Sharon bi ongnu mi nunna bating muluga bani mi bingza Pukraangba khou balumsa rwe.
Joppa bi Tabitha diga kounu potroi pakhat am ngaake. Tabitha om bakabana Dorcus dinuwe. Heiba mannuwa maanna to damnu kasanu chwan khatle kriang theinu chwanna sipnuwe.
Atiyeda haba kaan bi atiga swak ngaak rwe. Maan naaluga thi rwe. Banina bating tui kasin thangluga basaang in kaa khat la thang ngaake.

Atiga Lydda ga Joppa le diga nai kale briakpina potroi rwanna Peter habei ga amme dinu ngaisu rwe. Atiga banina manpa pat ni ding lang thangluga bani khou, “Barapka ani khou hung thang ngo” diga rin ngaake.

Haba nung bi Peter na thouluga bani le diga se bacham rwe. Maan hung tangnu kaan bi banina bating basaangnu in kaa la kalwangka rwe. Habei ga tameinu rwan bingna chapka han kadoi ong ngaake. Dorcas na bani le diga ong bacham ngaaknu kaan bi maanna bacha thang ngaaknu pwan sin pon naat bing ga Peter khou pi mu rwe.

Atiyeda Peter na bani ding langkaang la pi swak rwe khatle kekhok detaluga kalum rwe. Maanna kathi pum pek la kaneiluga rinne, “Tabitha, thouro.” Habei ga maan mik meng swak rwe. Atiga maanna Peter ding munu kaan bi lon thouluga badung rwe.
Haba nung bi Peter na bakut balaan swakluga bating kai thou thang rwe. Atiga maanna bathiangnu mi rwan khatle tamei rwan ding koukhutluga Dorcus ting ringga bani khou bachoi thang rwe.
Haba cham ga Joppa taram bing thei chang thou damnu kaan bi mi taswang khak Pukraangba khou balumsa rwe.
Atiga maan Joppa bi zan mun langnu chwan tonu Simon in bi bakhwa seiga nei ngaake.
Caesarea bi Italy kraanmi doi diga kounu kraanmi razapuba, Cornelius tiga kounu tudannu manpa pakhat am ngaake.
Maan ririak senu khatle bain inkhun mi bing le Rikrwang ding kachinu miye. Maan mi nun lang pi swak theiga pi ngaake khatle Rikrwang khou bakaan bathin kalumga ong ngaake.
Kani khat chakrin kaqwa tanu phei bi pi mu thangnu bi Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang khatna bakim bi hungluga bating, “Cornelius” diga kounu ga maanna bathiangga ngaisu rwe.

Cornelius na bating phaangnu kaan bi kachi rwe. Atiga maanna, “Pa-aambo, Pukraangba” diga ngai rwe. Tambaan chonglang gana rinne, “Naom kalum khatle naom pi swak theinu ga Rikrwang meithaan bi baningsu langna pi hung tang thang rwe.
Joppa la kapaisa kasem ding lang thangluga Peter diga kounu Simon ding pi kouro.
Maan tuipui paan la zan mun langnu Simon in bi amme. Nangna to dingnu chwan ga maanna nakhou rin thanglune.”

Atiga Cornelius khou chong kabia ongnu tambaan chonglang ga se swak tam bi maanna bain swak lak pi pat ni ding khatle bakim bi chat makka ongnu kraan mi nun lak pina ririak sethuknu kraanmi pakhat ting kou ngaake.
Maanna bani khou balang bing ga rin bathiang thangluga bani ding Joppa la lang thang rwe.
Inswan lampai banina atiga se hung bi namlian ga nai hungnu kaan bi khatle chakrin karuk khak tanu phei bi Peter in chung la kalum lang ka ngaake.
Habei ga maan chaam takka sa in nwam ngaak rwe. Bani sa in lang ong ongnu lak pi maan trance se ngaak rwe.
Atiga tambaan inkhaan lat swaknu khatle pwan pui dannu theng pui khat bataki bali kailuga basaang lana talei la basaamtanu ga maanna mu ngaake.
Haba sung bi ga baket bali phunnu talei ram khouring bing, nilai lak khouring bing, babonna katwanga senu bing, basaang la zwangnu basaa bing sui ngaake.
Atiga khwan khatna bakhou rinne, “Thouro Peter, athatluga saro.”
Atiyeda Peter na rinne, “Pukraangba, haga ati mak ting ngo, balangbe ei impha ni hakna tanaatnu mak tabe bathiang maknu sa mak aang nge.”
Leng ninu toga khwan gana bakhou rin late, “Rikrwang na to bathiang thangnu ding ga nangna bathiang maknu diga kou lang make.”
Heiya atiga swak leng thum ngaak rwe. Haba kahan bi theng ga tambaan la kai ka lat trwe.
Peter na bakhou pi mu thangnu ga bakaba thei makka loh lo ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, Conelius na lang hungnu manpa rwan gana Simon in zong hungluga inkhaan pui bi hung han rwe.
Atiga banina kouga “Peter diga kounu Simon habei ga nei ong bo?” diga ngai rwe.
Peter na bakhou pi mu thangnu lang bi kakhan ongnu kaan bi Katha na bakhou rin rwe, “Phaang ngo, mi pat thumna nating zong ongme.
Atibriakpina nang thouro, balumsianu to mako khatle bani le diga se bachamro. Balangbe eina bani ding nakhou lang hungnu zung nge.”
Haba nung bi Peter na taluga Conelius na lang hungnu mi nun khou rin rwe, “Phaang ngo, nanina zong ongnu ga ei rwe, nani pa-aam lang hungnubo?”

Banina rinne, “Kraanmi razapuba, bazenu, Rikrwang ding kachinu khatle Jihudi rwan chaat lak pi bameng sanu Conelius khou ga bain la nating hung lang khatle nachong ngai lang bathiangnu tambaan chonglangna bachu thang rwe.”
Haba nung bi maanna bani ding koukhutluga riak bacham rwe. Inswan lampai Peter na bani le diga se bacham rwe. Atiga Joppa bina le unao rwan mi kasem maan le diga se bacham ngaake.
Inswan lampai bani Caesarea bi khutnu kaan bi Cornelius na bani ding ngaak ong ngaake. Atiga bain sung rwan khatle bacham chuinu baan rwan bing ding kou kadoiluga ong ngaake.
Peter na basung la sekhutnu kaan bi Cornelius na bating kadou rwe khatle maanna baket pi in bakhup taluga bating kalum rwe.
Atiyeda Peter na bating kai thouluga rinne, “Thouro, ei le misa khat chung nge.”
Atiga Peter na bating kabiaga sekhutnu kaan bi mi tam takka ong kadoi ongnu dou rwe.

Habei ga maanna bani khou rinne, “Jihudi rwan mi pakhatna Gentile rwan pakhat le diga ong bachamnu mak tabe se thang kalenu chongtanna za make dinu nanina theiye. Atiyeda eina mi khat ting tanaatnu mak tabe bathiang maknu diga kou mak lang Rikrwang na akhou pi mu thang rwe.
Atibriakpina nangna ating kou lang lang hungnu kaan bi ei za maknu to makka barapka hungnu rwe. Atiga nanina ating kou ongnuwa pa-aam lang binabo diga eina nani khou ngainuwe.”
Cornelius na rinne, “Ni bali meithaan lana atun chakrin tangga kalumsan ga ongme. Atiga chakrin kaqwa bi ain bi kalumme. Phaang ngo, kabaannu pwan sinnu manpa pakhat ameithaan bi hung han ngaake.
Maanna rinne, ‘Cornelius, nangna hweininu ga ngaisu thang rwe khatle naom pi swak theinu ga Rikrwang om mikphaang bi baningsu thang rwe.
Atiga Joppa la mi lang thangluga Peter diga kounu Simon ding ga abeiya kou hungro. Maan tuipui paan la zan mun langnu Simon in bi nei ongme. Maan hungnu kaan bi maanna nakhou chong rinlune.’

Atibriakpina eina bani ding nakhou barapka lang thangnu rwe. Nang hung thangnu heiya sa rwe. Atibriakpina atun ani mi bingza Rikrwang na nakhou zathang pi thang damnu bing ga ngai lang ani nun Rikrwang meithaan bi ong ongnuwe.”
Haba nung bi Peter na babao aang swakluga bani khou rinne, “Rikrwang nga kathing aih to make dinu batak takka eina thei rwe.
Atiyeda Rikrwang na mi chaat bing bating kachinu khatle bazenu tonu bating ga maanna lou thang nge.
Jisu Christa paan bina dai bazaangnu sacham kasamnu ga Rikrwang na Israel rwan sa rwan khou pi hungnu chong gaye, Maan ga pum brumza om Pukraangba ye.
Nanina theinu chong Judea taram bing bi kasamnu khatle baptize tonu nung Galilee bina thouga John na kasam damnu ga heiye.

Nazareth Jisu ding tatoga Pukraangba Rikrwang na Katha Bathiangnu le ngamna thao kanun thangluga Pukraangba na se koiluga kasanu chwan to thang ngaaknubo? Atiga Diabol na rai ongnu bing ding pi sa thang damnubo? Balangbe Rikrwang na Pukraangba ding ong bacham thang ngaake.
Maanna Jihudi rwan talei bi khatle Jerusalem bi to thang ngaaknu chwan bing om lang bi anina sake rwe. Atiluga banina bating cross pi bakhai that thang rwe.
Rikrwang na Bating ni thum ni pi ring thou lat rwe, atiga Bating indaoga pi mu thang rwe.
Haga mi bing khou make atiyeda Rikrwang na meithaanna kathang swak ngaaknu sake rwan khouwe. Maan thinu nun lak pina ring thou latnu nung maan le diga sa in bacham damnu ani khou le pi mu thang rwe.
Maanna ani ding mi nun khou sacham kasam lang zathang pi thang rwe. Atiga ring ongnu nun atiluga thi damnu nun ding chong kasem lang Rikrwang na Bating hap thang rwe diga sake to lang nge.
Balang bi thiamting rwan bingna sake pi rwe dinuba, bameng paan bina bating balumsanu bingna noh kok thangnu lousu rwe dinu gaye.”
Peter na heiba chong bing nga kabia ongnu kaan bi ngai ongnu mi bing khou Katha Bathiangnu ta thang rwe.
Atiga Peter le diga hung bachamnu mun romnu balumsanu nunna loh lo rwe. Balangbe Katha Bathiangnu leithwan ga Gentile rwan khou le bunta rwe.
Balangbe banina chong tei tei kabianu khatle Rikrwang ding swannu ga thei rwe. Haba kaan bi Peter na katake,
“Ani danga Katha Bathiangnu lousu damnu nun ding ga baptize to mako diga tudannuna khaam ngam dingbo?”
Maanna bani ding Pukraangba meng bina baptize to thang lang zathang pi thang rwe. Haba nung bi banina Peter ding lumik kasem bani khou neita lang rin ngaake.
Chonglang rwan khatle Judea bi ongnu unao rwanna Gentile rwanna le Rikrwang chong ga lousu rwe dinu thei rwe.
Peter na Jerusalem bi hungnu kaan bi mun romnu mi nunna bating kae thouluga
rinne, “Nangna mun rom maknu mi nun khou seluga bani le diga sa bachamme.”
Atiyeda Peter na bani khou swak tamnu lang bi thoutan bina thouga badon toga rin bathiang thang rwe. Atiga rinne,

“Ei Joppa namlian bi kalumga ong ngaake. Haba kaan bi ga ei trance seluga akhou pi mu thangnu khat mu rwe. Haga pwan pui dannu khat bataki bali kailuga tambaan lana basaam taluga akim bi ta thang rwe.
Haga eina bachak phaang dengluga kakhan ngaake. Habei ga baket bali phunnu talei ram khouring bing, nilai lak khouring bing, babonna katwanga senu bing khatle basaang la zwangnu basaa bing am ngaake.
Atiga khwan khatna akhou rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, ‘Peter, thouro, athatluga saro.’
Atiyeda eina rinne, ‘Pukraangba, haga ati mak ting ngo, balangbe ei impha ni hakna amun bi tanaatnu mak tabe bathiang maknu sa mak aang nge.’
Atiyeda tambaan la khwan gana akhou katak late, ‘Rikrwang na to bathiang thang damnu ding ga nangna tanaatnu diga kou lang make.’
Haga swak leng inthum ngaak rwe khatle ha bing ga tambaan la kai thou lat tam ngaake.
Atinu dat bahak pi ga Caesarea lana lang hungnu mi pat thum eina ongnu in inmai bi hung han rwe.
Habei ga khatchale balumsianu to makka ei bani le diga se bacham lang Katha na akhou rin ngaake. Haza makka, unao rwan pat karuk le ei le se bacham rwe khatle haba manpa in bi khut rwe.
Maanna tambaan chonglang khat bain bi tatoga mu dambo dinu lang bi rin rwe. Tambaan chonglang gana bakhou rinne, ‘Joppa la mi lang thangluga Peter diga kounu Simon ding bakouro.
Maanna nakhou chong rin thanglune, haba chong paan bina nang khatle nain inkhun mi bing kanthangnu lousulune.’
Kama bi ani khou ta thang ngaaknu ga danga eina kabia thounu kaan bi Katha Bathiangnuna bani lu chung bi ta thang rwe.
Habei ga Pukraangba na rin ngaaknu chong ga eina baningsu rwe dinuba, ‘John na batak takka tui bi baptize to thang ngaake atiyeda eina nani ding Katha Bathiangnuna baptize to thanglune.’
Atibriakpina nanina Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding balumsanu kaan bi Rikrwang na ani khou pi thang damnu leithwan ga nani khou le pi thang nge dabe Rikrwang maitwang bi han dingnu eiya tubo?”

Rin ongnu chong bing nga banina ngaisunu kaan bi bani thiap thiap ong drwe. Atiga banina Rikrwang lwat ting pi lianga rinne, “Ati dabe Rikrwang na Gentile rwan khou le ring langna sung lenu pi thang rwe.”
Stephen ding railuga athat tamnu nung pak imphaang thou damnu mi nunna Phoenicia, Cyprus khatle Antioch la tangga seluga sacham ga Jihudi rwan khouza kasam ngaake.
Atiyeda bani mi kasemba Cyprus le Cyrene la naye. Banina Antioch pi hungnu kaan bi Greek chong kabianu rwan khou le Pukraangba Jisu om lang bi kasam ngaake.
Pukraangba om ngam ga bani le diga ong bacham thang ngaake. Mi tamga balumsaluga Pukraangba khou hung rwe.
Atiga swak ongnu cham ga Jerusalem bi amnu rupkathan mi nun kana bi thei hung rwe. Banina Barnabas ting Antioch tang lang bathan thang rwe.
Maanna hung tangnu kaan bi Rikrwang om phaangkriang ga phaangmuluga karo rwe. Atiga bani khangsung ding sung hanga, Pukraangba khou chat makka ong dam lang kachui thang rwe.
Balangbe maan mi kasanu, Katha Bathiangnu khatle balumsanuna sipnu mi ngaake khatle mi tamga Pukraangba khou inku ka rwe.
Haba nung bi Barnabas na Saul ding zong lang Tarsus la thou dam ngaake.

Maanna bating kadouluga Antioch la kalwang hung rwe. Barnabas le Paul na sangwan chupka rupkathan le karungluga mi taswang khak ting bachu thang rwe. Antioch pi potroi rwan ding Christian diga kama katakka kou rwe.
Haba kaan bi thiamting rwan Jerusalem bina Antioch pi hung ngaake.

Habei ga bani lak pi Agabus tiga kounu pakhatna han thouluga talei ram bi bu taangnu hunglu rwe diga Katha paan bina bakhou pi mu thangnu ga rin swak rwe. Hadanga Claudius Caesar kaan bi swak tak ngaake.
Haba nung bi Judea bi ongnu unao rwan ding paang thang lang potroi rwanna maan maanna ngamnu nung suiga pi hung lang chong han thang rwe.
Hei danga banina to rwe, banina haba leithwan ga Barnabas le Saul kut pina chwan phunnu rwan khou pi thang ngaak rwe.
Haba kaan bi rupkathan om mi kasem ding rai langna Herod krwangna bakut ta rwe.
Maanna John nao Jacob ting kachaak chemna athat rwe.
Hagana Jihudi rwan ding pi pem rwe dinu maanna mu briakpina Peter ding le nam lang to thou rwe. Haga khai sui maknu uilu balou kaan bi ngaake.

Maanna Peter ding namluga qwan in bi thang rwe. Banina bating kraanmi patbali bali om badam bali khou bachoi thang rwe. Atiga bating Takan Swaknu Balou nung mi nun meithaan bi phun swak lang baning ngaake.
Banina Peter ding qwan in bi thang rwe, atiyeda rupkathanna Rikrwang khou balaangna chat makka hweini thang ong ngaake.
Herod na bating phun swak tingnu zingpha, Peter ga parei rui kanina bangluga kraanmi pat ni lak pi in ong ngaake. Atiga rangkaan rwanna qwan in inkhaanmun la ngaak ong ngaake.

Phaang ngo, Pukraangba om tambaan chonglangna Peter kim bi hung hanluga qwan in ga pi baan thang rwe. Maanna Peter ding babanaak pi bweiluga khatle kai thouluga rinne, “Barapka han thouro.” Habei ga bakut pina parei rui bing ga zokta drwe.
Haba nung bi tambaan chonglang gana bakhou rinne, “Nakongkhaak khaak tipo, ketthop rui le basuiro.” Maanna haga to rwe. Atiga rin late, “Napwan sinluga anung suiro.”
Maanna swakluga banung sui drwe. Atiga tambaan chonglangna to damnu ga bataknuwe dinu maanna thei make. Atiyeda maanna haga pi mu thangnu khate diga baning ngaake.

Barweina kamanu khatle kaninu rangkaan riak ka sekhan swaknu kaan bi namlian pek la se kaneinu thin kapan swaktang rwe. Barwei lang inkhaan ga baraanto lat thang rwe. Atiga barweina swakluga lampui pui khat la seta rwe. Haba kahan bi ga tambaan chonglang ga bakhouna se swak trwe.

Peter na bakaba thei swaknu kaan bi maanna rinne, “Batak takka heiya Pukraangba na Baom tambaan chonglang ding lang thangluga ating Herod kut pina khatle Jihudi rwan bing om baningnu bina pi dwak swak thang rwe dinu eina thei rwe.”
Maanna heiya kakhannu nung Mark tiga le kounu John nu Mary in bi hung rwe. Habei ga mi taswang khak hweiniga karung ong ngaake.
Peter na kapan inkhaan bachunu kaan bi Rhoda diga kounu swak rangaaknu gana lat swak thang lang swak rwe.
Maanna Peter khwan ga theinu kaan bi karo laiga inkhaan lat thang makka atiyeda pak khut latluga “Peter inmai inkhaan bi hung han ong rwe” diga rin ong ngaake.
Banina Rhoda khou rinne, “Nang kalo rwe.” Atiyeda maanna bataknuwe diga rakanga han rwe. Banina rinne, “Haga Peter om katha zung nge.”
Peter na inkhaan ga bachu ting ting ong ngaake. Banina inkhaan ga lat swaknu kaan bi bating muluga bani loh lo rwe.

Atiyeda maanna bani ding mang mang ong lang bakutna kabou rwe. Pukraangba na bating tatoga qwan in bina phun swak thangbo dinu bani khou rin indao thang rwe. Maanna rinne, “Nani sero, hei lang biya James khatle unao rwan bing khou barinro.” Atiga maan swakluga bariak katei la thou dam ngaake.
Haba nung khwa baan swak khap tinu le Peter lang bi paaam swaktrubo diga, kraanmi nun lak pi kasao kabao tak thou ngaak rwe.

Herod na bating rakanga zong rwe atiyeda bating zongsulanruga rangkaan rwan ding tamphaangluga, bani ding athat lang zathang pi swak rwe. Haba nung maan Judea bina Caesarea la taluga habei ga tanei ngaake.

Herod na Tyre le Sidon bi mi nun ding balung pwan tak ngaak rwe. Atiyeda bani khangsung sung khatcha toga Bakim bi hungluga krwang in insung bi chwanlaang mi nun ding phaangsinnu mi Blastus ting banina baan toluga dai bazaang ta lang bathem rwe. Balangbe bani taram ga krwang taleina thaisaak pi thangga ong ngaake.
Atiga dik thangnu lumik khat pi Herod na krwang pon naat sin basoiluga bakaong riak pi badungluga bani khou meiri rai rwe.
Mi nunna, “Heiya ri khwan zung nge, misa khwan make” diga pao ong ngaake.
Haba nung bi barapka Pukraangba om tambaan chonglangna bating bwei balumta rwe. Balangbe maanna Rikrwang lwat ting swan mak briakpi naye. Atiga bating kalungna sa sat trwe khatle thi drwe.
Atiyeda Rikrwang chong ga lian thou rwe khatle inku thou rwe.
Barnabas le Saul na barwei om chwandon loi thangluga Mark tiga le kounu John ding kalwangluga Jerusalem lana han hung lat rwe.
Antioch om rupkathan bi thiamting rwan, bachu thangnu rwan kasem, Barnabas, Niger diga kounu Simeon, Cyrene rwan Lucius, Herod tetrach in bi bakot thou ngaaknu Manaen khatle Saul bani nun am ngaake.
Banina Pukraangba chwanlaang toga khatle kalumsanga ongnu kaan bi Katha Bathiangnuna rin rwe, “Barnabas le Saul ding eina chwan to lang kou rwe, barwei ding kathang swak thangro.”
Barweina kalumsan ga hweini rwe. Haba nung banina barwei lu chung bi kut kaising thangluga barwei ding lang thang rwe.
Bani ding Katha Bathiangnuna lang thang briakpina bani Seleucia bi ta rwe. Habei gana Cyprus la li hwanluga hung rwe.
Barweina Salamis pi hung tangnu kaan bi Jihudi rwan om synagogue bing bi Rikrwang om sacham kasam thang rwe. Atiga barwei ding paang thang lang barweina John ding le kalwang ngaake.
Banina tuikoi ram se phaoluga Paphos pi hung tangnu kaan bi dwei choinu kakoinu thiamting, Jihudi rwan pa Bar Jisu diga kounu ding kadou rwe.
Maan talei choinu ningtingnu manpa Sergius Paulus le diga bacham ngaake. Haba manpa gana Barnabas le Paul ding kouluga barwei khouna Rikrwang chong ga ngai nwam tak ngaake.
Atiyeda dwei choinu Elymas na (bameng kabana “Dwei choinu” dinuwe) bani maitwang bi hanga talei choinu ding babalumsat pina kai imphaang lang lampui zong ngaake.
Habei ga Saul diga le kounu Paul na Katha Bathiangnu na sipluga bating phang dengga phaangluga
rinne, “He minamnu khatle bathot sianu, Diabol sa kapaisa, ririak senu bing om munanu, Pukraangba om bazenu lampui ding kaimaannu, nang nachwan ga lanlabo?

Batak takka Pukraangba kut nalu chung bi amme. Nang namik cholu rwe, bakaan kasem lumik mubila rwe.” Haba kahan bi ga kazingnu tambuna hungluga bating hwam lem rwe. Atiga tupai khatna bakut kai thang lang kalouga se ong ngaake.
Haba nung bi talei choinu gana swak tamnu ga muluga, maan balumsa rwe. Atiga Pukraangba lang bi bachu thangnu bi ga maan loh lo ngaak rwe.
Paul le babaan rwanna Paphos pina li hwan hungnu kaan bi Pamphylia bi amnu Perga bi hung tang rwe. Habei ga John bani khouna kapaangluga Jerusalem la han hung lat rwe.
Atiyeda Perga bi kapaangnu nung, bani Pisidia om Antioch pi hung rwe. Bani habei gana seluga Sabbath ni synagogue pi khutluga ongta rwe.

Atiga Moses om chongtan khatle thiamting om chongdip ka pa taangnu nung, synagogue om chwan phunnu rwan gana bani khou mi lang thangluga rinne, “Unao rwan ga, mi nun lang nanina kachui thang lang chong amme dabe haga rin thang ngo.”
Habei ga Paul na han thouluga bakut haiga rinne, “Israel manpa rwan khatle Rikrwang ding kachinu mi nun ga, achong nga ngai thang ngo.

Israel mi nun om Rikrwang na ani pu pa rwan ding kathang swak thang rwe. Atiga banina Egypt talei bi man ram mi toga lung ongnu kaan bi bani ding pi lian thou thang rwe. Bani ding kriang briakpina ngam kutpwam kating swakluga bani ding kai swak thang rwe.
Sangwan sombali khak om bakaan heiya maanna bani ding ramhaang bi rakhi rakha thang rwe.
Atiga maanna chaat siari ding Canaan bina to braan damnu kaan bi bani talei ga tasaanluga bani lang kasem thang rwe.
Haba nung bi maanna bani lang thiamting Samuel kaan tangga sangwan raza bali somnga khak chongsempuba rwan ding pi thang ngaake.
Haba nung bi banina krwang pi thang lang hweini rwe. Rikrwang na bani lang Benjamin in kik taat pina Kish sa kapaisa Saul ding sangwan sombali krwang toga paan lang pi thang rwe.

Rikrwang na Saul ding lou satluga bani krwang lang David ting pi thang lat rwe. Rikrwang na David om lang bi sake piga rinne, ‘Eina Jesse sa kapaisa Asungna bathainu David ting lousu rwe, maan Eina baningnu bing ga to lang nge.’
Karen thangnu nung suiga heiba manpa om kik taat pina Rikrwang na Israel rwan lang kanthangnu Jisu ding pi thang rwe.
Pukraangba hung mak balei meithaan, John na Israel mi nun khou sung leluga baptize to lang kasam ngaake.
Atiga John na bamadon to loiluga maanna rinne, ‘Nanina ating tuwe diga baningbo? Eiba Maan ga make. Ngaiyo, anung la Pakhat hung naye, Baom sandal rui ga hakna ei sut lang khopnu make.’
Abraham inkhun sa rwan, unao rwan ga, nani lak pi Rikrwang ding kachinu mi nun ga, ringriak om chong heiya ani khou phun hung thang rwe.

Balangbe Jerusalem bi ongnu mi nun khatle bani om bapuba rwanna Jisu ding khatle Sabbath ni bathin pa swak nu thiamting rwan khwan ding banina thei mak briakpina Bating koi impu thang ga haga pi hung tang rwe.
Bating thi lang khopnu koi dou mak peida banina Bating athat tammo diga Pilate khou ni ngaake.
Balang bi hiak thang ngaaknu bing ga banina pi hung tangnu kaan bi Bating cross pina loutaluga thaan bi ui thang rwe.
Atiyeda Rikrwang na Bating thi bina pi ring thou thang rwe.
Maan le diga Galilee lana Jerusalem bi hung bacham ngaaknu mi nun gana lumik taswang khak Bating mu ngaake. Ha rwan nun gana atun mi nun meithaan bi Baom sake rwe.
Anina nani khou karonu sacham, dinuba ani pu pa rwan khou karen thang ngaaknu ga indao thang rwe.

Rikrwang na Jisu ding pi ring thou thangga Pukraangba na bani sa rwan tonu ani langza haga pi hung tang thang rwe. Heiya Kalum Laa kani bi atiga hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, ‘Nang Asa Kapaisa ye, Aniya Eina Nating pon thang rwe.’
Rikrwang na Jisu ding thinu bina pi ring thou rwe, braan zanu thot pi han latla rwe dinu lang bi atiga rinne, ‘Eina David khou pi thang ngaaknu balumsa zanu phaangkriang ga nakhou pi thangne.’
Atibriakpina Maanna Kalum Laa bariak katei la le rinne, ‘Nangna Naom Bathiangnu Bating braan zanu thot ka pi mu latla rwe.’
Balangbe batak takka Rikrwang na baningnu nung suiga, David na bamikin bahak lang chwan to thangluga thi drwe, bapu pa rwan thaan kim bi ui thang drwe khatle braan zanu thot ka to drwe.
Atiyeda Rikrwang na pi ring thou damnu Maan gabe braan za maknu to drwe.
Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, heiya nanina thei thang ngo, dinuba Bapaan bina noh kok thangnu nani khou kasam thangnuwe.
Moses om chongtan paanna nani ding pi baze thangnu ngam maknu bing bina Bapaan bina balumsanu bing ding pi baze thang rwe.
Atibriakpina thiamting rwan om chongdip pi hiak thang ngaaknu ga nani lu chung bi ta thang mak lang barak theiyo.
‘Phaang ngo, kiamrai natnu rwan, Loh lo le loh lowo braan le braanno! Balangbe nani kaan bi eina chwan khat towe; Tudannuna nani khou chwan ga rin thang beida, Kanina khatchale balumsalaye.’ ”
Jihudi rwan nunna synagogue pina se swak tamnu kaan bi Gentile rwanna hung latnu Sabbath ni chong ga bani khou kasam thang lat lang hweicha ngaake.

Mi nunna kapaang damnu kaan bi Jihudi rwan khatle ri baning thuknu mi nun gana Paul le Barnabas nung sui ngaak rwe. Barweina bani le diga meiri raiga, Rikrwang om phaangkriang sung bi chat makka ong dam lang bani ding bathem thang ngaake.
Atiga hung latnu Sabbath ni namlian om mi katamna Rikrwang chong ga ngai lang hung kadoi lat rwe.
Atiyeda Jihudi rwanna mi khang ding munu kaan bi antiamnuna sip rwe. Paul na kabianu chong maitwang bi ka mak ka maknu chong kabiaga rin basiat thou rwe.

Haba nung Paul le Barnabas na sung raangga katak rwe, “Kamanu bi anina nani khou Rikrwang chong ga rin ding gaye; atiyeda nanina haga lou thang maknu khatle nani khwa sei ringnu lousu lang khopnu lan rwe diga nani bahakna han dam briakpina phaang ngo, ani Gentile rwan khou thou damnu rwe.
Balangbe Pukraangba na ani khou zathang pi thangga rinne, ‘Eina nating Gentile rwan khou babaan to lang, Khatle napaan bina talei ram kalan mi bingna ringriak lousu lang nating ka thang rwe.’ ”
Gentile rwanna haga ngaisunu kaan bi bani karo rwe. Atiga Pukraangba chong ding lwat pi lian rwe khatle ringzoknu kum lousu lang kathang swaknu mi nun ga balumsa rwe.
Pukraangba chong ga haba taram bing bi kazan swak rwe.

Atiyeda namlian om takhwang tonu khatle ri baning thuknu mannu rwan atiluga balu tonu manpa rwan ding Jihudi rwanna kachui thangluga banina Paul le Barnabas ting rai thou rwe. Atiga bani ding bani taram bina kazun sat rwe.
Atiyeda Paul le Barnabas na bani ket pi kaphut ka bani maitwang bi kathing tabasialuga Iconium la hung rwe.
Atiga potroi rwan ga karonu khatle Katha Bathiangnuna sip rwe.
Iconium bi Paul le Barnabas bachamluga Jihudi rwan om synagogue pi chong kabia ongnu kaan bi Jihudi rwan khatle Greek rwan mi khang puina balumsa rwe.
Atiyeda balumsa maknu Jihudi rwanna Gentile rwan ding bani sung to tanopluga bau banao rwan maitwang bi sa maknu pi imbei rwe.

Atibriakpina barweina habei ga khwa seiga neitaluga Pukraangba paan bina sung raangga kabia ngaake. Atiga Baom phaangkriang om chong lang bi sake piga, bani kutna badannu khatle tasiatnu chwan tamga to ong ngaake.
Atiyeda namlian bi mi nun ga lang swakluga kasemna Jihudi rwan nung, kasemna chonglang rwan nung sui drwe.
Gentile rwan le Jihudi rwanna bani om bapuba rwan le diga karungluga bani ding pi tangam lang khatle lungna sat lang to thou rwe.
Haba kaan bi banina haga theiluga Lycaonia taram om Lystra khatle Derbe namlian atiluga am qwatnu taram la thou dam ngaake.
Atiga banina ha la ga sacham kasam ngaake.
Lystra bi tudannu banu pok pina baket lwamnu seza maknu pakhat am ngaake.
Paul na chong kabia ongnu ga maanna sung khutka ngai rwe khatle Paul na bating basouga phaangnu kaan bi bating pi sa thang lang balumsanu thot ka mu rwe.
Paul na baraam basaangga bakhou rinne, “Naket ka han kating thouwo.” Habei ga maan kachak thouluga se rwe.
Paul na to ongnu ga mi nunna munu kaan bi Lyconium chong la na, “Ri nunna misa thot louluga ani khou hung thang rwe” diga baraam basaangga pao thou rwe.
Banina Barnabas ting “ Zeus,” Paul dingna chong kabia bi maan balu to briakpina “ Hermes” tiga kou rwe.
Zeus kalum in ga namlian meithaan la am ngaake, haba om takona sen chan khatle rei rui ga mi khang le bachamga rikhaang pot kat thang lang namlian om kapan inkhaan la phun hung ngaake.
Atiyeda chonglang Barnabas le Paul na haga ngaisuluga, bani om pwan kachang reluga mi nun lak pi pak khutluga pao rwe.

“Mi nun ga, nani pa-aam lang heiya to ongnubo? Ani le nani chaang khatcha zung nge. Nani nun bathaang maaknu chwan bing bina talei, tambaan, tuipui khatle habei ga amnu pot bing ding dam thangnu ringnu Rikrwang khou hung langna anina nani khou sacham kasamnu rwe.
Thou damnu mikin bi maanna chaat bing ding maan maanna se nwamnu lampui bi se lang za thang ngaake.

Atiyeda Pukraangba na Baom sake sui makka thangsia make. Dinuba Pukraangba Maanna kasanu to thangluga saangbaan lana khwa khatle tachi tapaan kraa dam lang bakum baphaa pi thang rwe, hagana thaisaak khatle karonuna ani sung pi sip thang nge.”
Heiba chong nga kabiaga bani lang kat thang dingnu mi nun ding ga kung takka khaam thang rwe.

Haba nung bi Antioch le Iconium lana Jihudi rwan haba riak pi ga hung rwe. Atiga banina mi khang ding kachui thangluga Paul ding lungna sat rwe. Maan thi rwe diga banina bating namlian paan la kai sat rwe.
Atiyeda potroi rwanna bating han qwat ongnu kaan bi maan thouluga namlian sung bi khut rwe. Atiga inswan lampai maan Barnabas le diga Derbe la thou dam ngaake.
Banina haba namlian bi ga sacham kasamluga potroi taswang khak bacha rwe. Haba nung bani Lystra, Iconium khatle Antioch la han hung lat rwe.
Banina potroi rwan ding bani sung pi tip thangluga, bani balumsat pi chat makka ong dam lang kachui thangga rinne, “Anina riangre kanang taswang khak khaangga Rikrwang om krwang talei khut lang rwe.”
Banina rupkathan bing bi chwan phunnu rwan hap thang rwe. Atiga kalumsannu le bachamga kalum thangluga barweina balumsanu bing ding Pukraangba khou bachoi thang rwe.
Haba nung bi banina Pisidia se phao hungluga Pamphylia bi hung rwe.
Atiga banina Perga bi sacham ga kasam thangsialuga Attalia la ta lat rwe.
Habei gana barwei chwan to zokluga hungnu chwandon lang Rikrwang om phaangkriang bi barwei ding sin thang damnu Antioch pi ga li hwanluga hung lat rwe.

Barweina habei ga hung tangnu kaan bi rupkathan om mi bing ding khom kadoiluga Rikrwang na bani le diga chwan to bacham thang rwe khatle Gentile rwan bingna le balumsat lousu dam langna inkhaan lat thang rwe diga bani khou meiri rai thang rwe.
Atiga banina habei ga potroi rwan le diga bakhwa seiga ong bacham ngaake.
Judea lana mi kasem Antioch pi taluga unao rwan ding “Moses om zek nung suiga nani mun rom make dabe ringriak lousulaye” diga bachu thang ngaake.

Haba kaan bi Paul le Barnabas khatle bani nun le diga sung cham maknu taswang khak swakluga bani le diga kae kale rwe. Atibriakpina banina kathuiluga Paul le Barnabas khatle mi kasem ding Jerusalem la hei lang bi chonglang rwan khatle chwan phunnu rwan khou se lang ka thang thang rwe.
Rupkathanna bani ding lampui bi katha swak thang rwe. Bani nun Gentile rwanna sung lenu lang bi meiri raiga Phoenicia le Samaria takan hung rwe. Atiga unao rwan bing ga karo tak ngaak rwe.
Banina Jerusalem bi hung tangnu kaan bi rupkathan, chonglang rwan khatle chwan phunnu rwanna bani ding lou thang rwe. Atiga Rikrwang na bani khou to thang damnu bing ga bani khou pu thang rwe.
Atiyeda Pharisee rwan pek la suinu balumsanu mi kasemna han thouluga rinne, “Gentile rwan bing le mun rom lang khatle Moses om zathang ga zei langna chongtan pi lang bathaang amme.”
Atiga rin ongnu lang bi ga chonglang rwan khatle chwan phunnu rwan hung kadoiluga kakhan rwe.

Bakhwa seiga kakhannu nung Peter na han thouluga bani khou rinne, “Unao rwan ga, amun bina Gentile rwanna sacham ga ngaisuluga balumsa dam lang meithaanna Rikrwang na ating ani lak pina kathang swak thang rwe dinu nanina theiye.
Atiga mi bingza sung ding thei ongnu Rikrwang na ani khou pi thang damnu danga bani khou le Katha Bathiangnu ding pi thangga bani ding thei thang rwe.
Atiga balumsanu paan bina bani sung ding to bathiang thangluga bani le ani lak pi bacham maknu pi am thang make.
Atibriakpina atun ani nun khatle ani pu pa rwanna le phunnu ngamlanu ringok ka paaam toga potroi rwan daankong bi bason thangluga Rikrwang ding tamphaang ongnubo?
Atiyeda Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang paan bina ani le bani danga ringnu lousulune diga anina balumsaye.”

Habei ga mi khang ga rim rim ta drwe. Paul le Barnabas paan bina Gentile rwan lak pi Rikrwang na tasiatnu khatle badannu chwan bing to thang ngaaknu ga barweina rin swak thangnu bi ga bani khangsungna ngai ong ngaake.
Atiga banina rim rim ta damnu kaan bi James na katake, “Unao rwan ga, achong nga ngai thang ngo,
Rikrwang na Bameng lang chungna mi khang khat Gentile rwan lak pina kathang swak lang tatoga kamaga bani lak pi hung damnu bo dinu ga Simon na bathiangga ndao thang rwe.
Haga thiamting rwan om chong ga le diga bacham rwe. Atiga hiak thang nge,
‘Haba nung bi Ei han hunglune, Khatle David om raita damnu pwan in ga Eina bacha thou latlune. Raita damnu bing ga Eina bacha thou latlune, Khatle pi han thou latne.
Balangbe nung la ong thang sianu mi nunna Khatle Ameng kou damnu Gentile rwanna Pukraangba ding zong lang nge. Pum brum heiya to ongnu Pukraangba na rinne.’
Kama thoutan bina Rikrwang na baom chwan bing ding theiye.
Atibriakpina aom baning ga heiye, Gentile rwan lak pina Rikrwang khou kanei hung damnu mi nun ding ga anina to katop mak lang nge.
Atiyeda ri katha lang kat thangnu tanaatnu pot, lungmaannu chwan, karek thatluga thinu zan sanu khatle thi sanu hei bing bina impaan lang anina bani khou chamthwan ga hiaknuwe.
“Balangbe Moses om chongtan ga mikin bing bi, namlian bing bi khatle synagogue bing bi Sabbath ni bathin bani khou kasam thang ngaake.”

Habei ga unao rwan lakpi kai thangnu Barsabas tiga kounu Judas khatle Silas ting bani lak pina kathang swakluga Paul khatle Barnabas le bachamga Antioch la bathan thangnu heiya chonglang rwan, chwan phunnu rwan khatle rup kathan mi bingna sanuwe diga za ngaake.
Banina haba chamthwan bi ga atiga hiak rwe: “Chonglang rwan, chwan phunnu rwan khatle unao rwanna Antioch pi, Syria bi khatle Cilicia bi amnu Gentile rwan bing ding kalumme.

Mi kasemna ani khouna swakluga bani chongna nani ding pi katopnu, nani sung pi souga nani ding mun rom lang zung nge, chongtan ga zei lang zung nge diga rinnu anina theisu rwe. Bani khou anina hapai zathang pi thangnu maake.
Atibriakpina anina sung khatcha toga zakaleluga mi kasem kathang swakluga bani ding anina kriangnu Barnabas le Paul ding pi se bachamnu sa rwe diga baning ngaake.
Bani nun heiya ani om Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng lang chungna bakum pi swaknu nunne.
Atibriakpina anina Judas le Silas ting barwei munna ha bing ga bachangga nani khou rin thang lang lang hungnu rwe.
Balangbe bakung tonu lang heiya makka potrit katei nani khou badan thang maknuna saye diga Katha Bathiangnu khatle anina baning rwe.
Dinuba ri katha lang katnu, thi sanu, karek thatnu zan sanu khatle lungkoi lungmaannu hei bing bina nani impaan ding gaye. Nanina hei bing bina impaanne dabe nani lang salune. Donsanu towo.”
Atiga bani ding lang thangluga bani Antioch pi hung rwe. Habei ga banina mi khang ding khom karungluga chamthwan ga bani khou pi rwe.
Haga banina panu kaan bi bani ding kachui thangnu langna bani karo rwe.
Judas le Silas ka barwei bahak thiamting briakpina bani khou chong taswang khak kabiaga unao rwan ding kachui thang rwe khatle bani sung pi tip thang rwe.
Atiga bani bakaan kasem bani le diga ong bachamnu nung, barwei ding unao rwanna chonglang rwan kim la dai bazaangga bathan thang drwe.
Atiyeda Silas pa habei ga ongnuna sa rwe diga baning ngaake.
Paul le Barnabas na le katei rwan bing le diga Antioch pi ongluga Pukraangba om sacham ga bachu thangga kasam thang ngaake.
Lumik kasem nung bi Paul na Barnabas khou rinne, “Arweina Pukraangba om sacham kasam thang damnu namlian bing bi se latluga unao rwan ga tato ongbo dinu phaang sezo.”
Barnabas na Mark diga le kounu John ding le kalwang nwam ngaake.
Atiyeda Pamphylia bina bani khouna se kapaang damnu Mark ting bani le diga chwan to bacham mak lang Paul na baning ngaake.
Atiga khat le khat za kale makka rakanga kae kalenu nung, barwei kapaang kale drwe. Barnabas na Mark ting kalwangluga Cyprus la li hwanluga thou drwe.
Atiyeda Rikrwang phaangkriang paan bina unao rwanna za thangnu nung suiga Paul na Silas ting ka thangluga thou drwe.
Maanna Syria le Cilicia serwan thangluga rupkathan bing ding pi tip thang rwe.
Haba nung bi maan Derbe le Lystra bi hung rwe. Phaang ngo, habei ga tudannu potroi Timothy diga kounu balumsa zanu Jihudi rwan mannu sa kapaisa khat am ngaake, bapana Greek rwanne.
Lystra le Iconium bi ongnu unao rwanna balang bi rin chuiga rin ong ngaake.
Paul na maan le diga se bacham lang bathai ngaake. Maanna bating chwanlaang bachamluga mun rom thang rwe. Balangbe Timothy ding ponnu pa ga Greek rwanne dinu habei ongnu Jihudi rwanna thei ngaake.
Banina namlian bing bi se thangnu kaan bi Jerusalem bi chonglang rwan khatle chwan phunnu rwanna han thang damnu chongren ga zei lang banina pi thei thang ngaake.
Atiga rupkathan bing ga bani balumsat tip thou rwe khatle kani bathin bani mi sing inku thou ngaak rwe.
Banina Phrygia le Galatia taram serwan hungnu kaan bi Asia taram bi sacham kasam mak lang Katha Bathiangnuna bani ding khaam ngaake.
Banina Mysia bi hung tangnu kaan bi Bithynia bi khut lang to ngaake atiyeda Katha na bani ding za mak ngaake.
Banina Mysia tram se rwan hungluga Troas la seta rwe.
Atiga zingpha Paul khou pi mu thangnu khat indao thang rwe. Dinuba, Macedonia rwan manpa pakhatna hanluga bakhou hweiga rinne, “Macedonia la hungluga ani ding paang thang ngo.”
Indao thangnu ga mu taang bi, Rikrwang na bakhou sacham kasam lang bating kou thang rwe dinu theiluga barapka anina Macedonia la se lang daan rwe.
Atibriakpina anina Troas pina li hwan hungluga lampui se chuk chuk ka Samothrace tuikoi ram bi se hungluga inswan lampai Neapolis namlian bi hung rwe.
Haga Macedonia om namlwan bakung tonu namlian khatle Rome rwanna lungnu riake. Ani haba Philippi namlian bi ga lumik kasem nei ngaake.

Atiga Sabbath ni anina namlian inkhaan pui bi gana se swakluga tuiqwa paan la se ngaake. Habei ga Ri kalum lang bariak amlune diga baning ngaake atiga ani habei ga ongtaluga habei ga ong ngaaknu mannu rwan khou chong kabia thou rwe.

Thyatira namlian bi Lydia diga kounu sendumnu pwan langgonnu Rikrwang ding kalum ongnu mannu khatna ani chong ngai ong ngaake. Paul na kabia ongnu ga sung khutka ngai lang Pukraangba na basung lat swak thang ngaake.

Atiga maan khatle bain inkhun bing ding baptize to thangnu kaan bi maanna ani ding hweiga rin rwe, “Nanina ating Pukraangba khou balumsanuwe diga chak thang nge dabe aniya ain la hungluga riak thang ngo” khatle ani riak rwe.
Anina kalum lang se ongnu kaan bi ri chong rin swaknu katha amnu swak rangaaknu khat ani ding kadou rwe. Maanna ri chong rin swak briakpina bapuba rwan lang tongnu tamga lousu ngaake.
Haba rangaaknu gana Paul le ani nung suiga seluga paoga rinne, “Heiba mi nunna Rikrwang swak rwanne, banina ani khou ringriak lousu dingnu lampui kasam ongme.”

Haba mannuna bakhwa seiga ati to ong ngaake. Atiyeda Paul na basung nungngai mak takka bakhou kanei khutluga katha khouga rinne, “Bakhouna swak tam lang eina Jisu Christa meng bina nakhou chongtan piye.” Haba kahan bina katha ga se swak trwe.
Atibriakpina haba mannu om bapuba rwanna bani om tong dingnu om badou chanu ga se damnu munu kaan bi banina Paul le Silas ting namluga keithian sung bi bapuba rwan meithaan bi kai hung rwe.
Atiga barwei ding chongsempuba rwan khou kai hungluga rinne, “Heiba manpa pat nina Jihudi rwan toga ani namlian bi taswang khak to katop rwe.
Rome talei mi nun anina zeinu khatle ngaaknu za maknu zek ting ani khou bachu thang rwe.”
Haba nung bi mi khang gana bani maitwang bi han thou rwe. Atiga chongsempuba rwan gana Paul le Silas om pwan kaireluga barwei ding thin sungrwanna bwei lang zathang pi rwe.
Banina barwei ding bazam taswang khak bwei thangnu nung, qwan in bi bazwan thang rwe. Atiga qwan in ngaakpuba khou ngaak chuiga ngaak lang zathang pi thang rwe.
Maanna chongtan ga lousunu kaan bi barwei ding qwan in basung la kaa khat pi thang rwe khatle barwei ket thingpek pi balak thang rwe.
Atiyeda zingpha inmik kasia bi, Paul le Silas na hweiniga Rikrwang ding swan ga laa to ong ngaake. Atiga qwan in mi nunna haga ngaiga ong ngaake.
Habei ga thei mak daakka talei kaling rwe khatle qwan in inmun ga kanuk thou rwe, atiga inkhaan bing le lat swak rwe khatle mi bing khouna thin parei rui le zokta rwe.

Qwan in ngaakpuba na in ong bina barak swaknu kaan bi qwan in inkhaan bing ga lat ongnu mu rwe. Maanna qwan in mi nun pak dwak loi drwe diga baningluga baom kachaak chem kaswaluga baraanto bating athat lang to thou rwe.
Atiyeda Paul na baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Naraanto nating sia lang to mako, balangbe ani mi bingza abeiya amme.”
Haba nung bi maanna thaomei niluga pak khut rwe. Atiga Paul le Silas meithaan bi kathokka khut in balumta rwe.
Maanna barwei ding kalwang swakluga rinne, “Bapuba rwan ga, eina kanthangnu lousu lang pa-aam to langbo?”
Barweina rinne, “Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding balumsaro atiye dabe nang khatle nain inkhun mi bing ringriak lousulune.”
Haba nung bi banina bakhou khatle bain bi ongnu mi bing khou Pukraangba om chong kasam thang rwe.
Haba ni zingpha ga maanna barwei ding kalwang swakluga barwei pum bi bazam bing ga kasin sat thang rwe, atiga haba kahan bi ga maan le bain inkhun mi bing baptize to rwe.
Maanna barwei ding bain bi kalwang khutluga thaisaak barwei meithaan bi balam thang rwe. Atiga bain inkhun bing Rikrwang ding balumsa briakpina bani karo tak ngaak rwe.
Khwa baan swaknu kaan bi chongsempuba rwanna kaliannu rwan ding lang hungluga rinne, “Barwei ding ga bathan sat tro.”

Qwan in ngaakpuba gana haba chong ga Paul khou hung rin rwe, atiga rinne, “Chongsempuba rwanna narwei ding bathan sat lang mi lang hung rwe. Atibriakpina atunbe narwei senu za rwe, dai bazaangga sero.”

Atiyeda Paul na bani khou rinne, “Banina Rome mi ani ding chong to makka, mi nun meithaan bi bweiluga qwan in bi thang rwe. Atiga ani ding inkamga bathan sat lang tonubo? Haga ani za nwam make. Bani bahak hung tangluga ani ding phun swak ting ngo.”
Kaliannu rangkaan mi nun gana haba chong ga chongsempuba rwan khou seluga rin rwe. Bani ga Rome mi nunne dinu theiluga kaliannu rwan ga kachi rwe.
Haba nung bi banina hungluga barwei ding phun swakluga namlian bina se swak thang lang bathem rwe.
Atiga bani qwan in bina swakluga Lydia in bi khut rwe khatle barweina unao rwan ding munu kaan bi bani ding kachui thangluga habei gana se swak tam ngaake.
Barwei Amphipolis le Apollonia se phaoluga Thessalonica bi hung rwe. Habei ga Jihudi rwan om synagogue khat am ngaake.
Habei ga Paul na bani khou khutluga baom chaang toga Sabbath lumik inthum khak Bathiangnu Chongdip ka bani le diga kathai karung ngaake.
Bani khou rin katupka, rin bachakka Christa na riangre kanang inza khaangluga khatle thiluga ring thoulune khatle “Eina nani khou kasam ongnu Jisu wa Christa ga rwe” diga rin ngaake.
Mi kasemna balumsa rwe. Habei ga ri baning thuknu Greek rwan mi khang pui atiluga balu tonu mannu rwan mi tamga hungluga Paul le Silas khou karung rwe.

Atiyeda sacham ding ga balumsa maknu Jihudi rwanna bani ding antiamga keithian lana sa maknu mi kasem phun hungluga mi khang khom kadoiluga banina haba namlian sung bi ga pi kasao kabao thou rwe. Banina Jason in bi hungluga Paul le Silas ting mi nun khou phun swak lang hung zong rwe.

Atiyeda banina barwei ding zongsu maknu kaan bi Jason le unao rwan mi kasem ding namlian om chongsempuba rwan khou kai hungluga paoga rin rwe, “Talei ram ding to tasuk talatnu mi nun ga abei le hung tang rwe.
Ha rwan ding ga Joson na loukhut rwe khatle Jisu dinu Krwang khat amme diga rinluga banina Caesar om zathang ding to kabat kabaangga to rwe.”
Haba chong ga theinu kaan bi mi khang khatle namlian bapuba rwan sung katop rwe.
Banina Jason khatle katei rwan khouna khopsanu sian louluga bani ding bathan thang rwe.
Haba nung bi unao rwanna Paul le Silas ting barapka zingphana Berea la pi pen thou drwe. Barweina habei ga hung tangnu kaan bi Jihudi rwan om synagogue pi khut rwe.

Habei mi nun ga Thessalonica bi mi nun ma bani sa inku dingnuwe. Balangbe banina cham ga taraan ga khatle Bathiangnu Chongdipna rin ongnu ga bazenubo dinu lang bi kani bathin sung khutka zong ong ngaake.
Atibriakpina mi taswang khak khatle takhwang to lang khopnu Greek rwan mannu manpa taswang khakna le balumsa rwe.
Atiyeda Berea bi Paul na Rikrwang chong kasam ongnu ding ga Thessalonica bi ongnu Jihudi rwanna theiluga bani habei ga le hung rwe. Atiga mi nun ding kachui thangluga pi kasao kabao thou lat rwe.
Habei ga unao rwanna barapka Paul ding tuipui lampui la bathan thang drwe. Atiyeda Silas le Timothy habei ga ongsia rwe.
Paul ding kalwangsenu mi nun gana bating Athens la kalwang hung rwe. Habei ga Paul na Silas le Timothy ding barapka banung sui hung lang rin thangnu nung bani thou lat trwe.
Paul na Athens pi barwei ding ngaak ongnu kaan bi haba namlian ga ri katha kalumnuna sipka ongnu muluga basung sou thou rwe.
Atibriakpina maanna synagogue pi Jihudi rwan le Rikrwang ding kalum ongnu Gentile rwan atiluga keithian bi kadounu mi nun le diga kani bathin chong kaphat kalega ong ngaake.

Habei ga Epicurean Le Stoic rwan ningtingnu rwanna Paul ding kae rwe. Mi kasemna rin rwe, “Tu tu tam tamnu manpa heiyana pa-aam kabia nwamnubo?” Kateina rinne, “Maanba man ram om ri bing ding kasamnu mi dannuwe.” Balangbe maanna Jisu om lang bi khatle Maan ring thou damnu lang bi bani khou kasam ngaake.
Banina bating kailuga Areopagus pi phun hungluga rin rwe, “Nangna kasam ongnu zekrin kathan ga pa-aambo, ani le theinu zabo?
Balangbe nangna ani kana bi teithaknu chong khat pi thei thang rwe atibriakpina ha bing ga pa-aambo dinu ani thei nwamme.”
Balangbe Athens pi mi nun khatle habei ga talei khat la mi nun gana chong kathan kathan kabiaga mak tabe ngaikalega chwan khatchale to makka bakaan to braan ga ong ngaake.
Haba nung bi Paul na Areopagus zai bi han thouluga rinne, “Athens manpa rwan ga, nani ririak se chuinu mi nunne dinu ei thei rwe.

Balangbe eina se koiga serwan hungnu kaan bi nanina kalum ongnu om lang bi kakhannu kaan bi nani om kalum riak pi ‘Thei maknu Rikrwang khou’ diga hiak thangnu ga eina dou rwe. Atibriakpina nanina thei maknu bating kalum ongnu lang bi eina nani khou kasamnu rwe.
“Talei ram khatle basung bi amnu pot bing ding dam thangnu Rikrwang ga tambaan le talei ram om bapuba to briakpina, Maan kutna bachanu kalum in bi ong make.
Balaang kabaatnu amme diga misa kutna Bating pui thang lang bathaang maake. Balangbe Maanna mi bing lang ringnu kaphuk khatle pot bingza pi thang nge.
“Maanna thi pum khatcha bina mi chaat bing ding talei ram bi lung dam lang dam thang rwe. Atiga Maanna kamaga han thangnu kaan khatle bani kaong riak om ramret bing kamaga bacha thang rwe.
“Balangbe Maan ga ani mi bing khouna namlaaga ong mak ngaak peida misana Pukraangba ding zong dam lang Bating kutna kalouga phangsu lang khatle Bating phangsu za lang nge.
“Balangbe Pukraangba khou ani ringga, kalingga khatle ringnu ga lousu rwe. Nani nun lak pi chongdip hiaknuna atiga hiak ngaaknu ga dannuwe, ‘Balangbe ani nun bing Bakik taat rwanne.’
“Atibriakpina ani nun Rikrwang kik taat rwan to briakpina, Rikrwang chaang misa ningtingna bachanu kachaak tannu, tangka dannu khatle lung om kutthiam dannuwe diga baningla dingnuwe.
Batak takka thei maknu kaan bi ga Rikrwang na mutwan ngaake atiyeda atunba bariak bing bi mi bing ding sung le lang zathang pi thang rwe.

Balangbe Maanna ka thang damnu Mi Pakhat kana talei ram mi bing lang ririak senu chongsem to lang lumik khat dik thang rwe. Rikrwang na Bating thinu bina pi ring thou thangluga mi bing khou badan pi mu thang rwe.”
Atiga thinu nunna ring thou latnu cham ga theisunu kaan bi mi kasemna choi banui ngaake. Katei rwanna rinne, “Hei lang bi ani nakhouna ngai lat maang nge.”
Haba nung bi Paul bani khouna thou drwe.
Atiyeda manpa rwan mi kasemna banung suiluga balumsa rwe. Balumsanu nun lak pi Areopagus rwan Dionysius, Damaris tiga kounu mannu khat atiluga katei rwan le sui ngaake.
Haba nung bi Paul Athens pina Corinthia la thou drwe.

Habei maanna Jihudi rwan, Pontus pi ponnu Aquila diga kounu pakhat ting kadou rwe. Maan Italy lana bamei Priscilla le diga hungnu nai ngaak maang nge. Balangbe Claudius na Jihudi rwan bing ding Rome talei bathan sat lang zathang pi swak rwe. Atiga Paul na barwei ding kadou lang hung rwe.
Bachwan ga bacham briakpina Paul na barwei le diga ong bachamluga chwan to bacham ngaake. Balangbe bani pwan in bachanu mi nunne.
Maanna Sabbath ni bathin synagogue pi hungluga Jihudi rwan le Greek rwan ding balumsa langna bani le diga kaphat karung ong ngaake.
Silas le Timothy na Macedonia lana hungnu kaan bi Katha Bathiangnuna bathouga Paul na Jisu ding Christa rwe diga Jihudi rwan khou sake pi ngaake.

Atiyeda banina bating thingluga khatle rin basiatnu kaan bi maanna bapwan kathingga bani khou rinne, “Nani thi nani lu chung bi ta ding ngo, eiba bathiang nge. Atunna thouga ei Gentile rwan khou thou dam rwe.”
Maan habei gana swakluga Rikrwang ding kachinu Jastus tiga kounu in bi khut rwe. Bain ga synagogue kom bahak pi ngaake.
Haba nung bi synagogue om kai thangnu Crispus bainkhun mi bing le diga Rikrwang khou balumsa rwe. Cham ga ngaisunu Corinthia rwan mi taswang khakna le balumsaluga bani baptize to ngaak rwe.
Atun Pukraangba na Paul khou zingpha pi mu thangga rinne, “Rou mako atiyeda kabiawo. Nang mang mang ong mako.
Balangbe Ei nang le ong bacham ongme. Pakhatchanale nating katwak pilaye khatle pi liamlaye. Heiba namlian biya Ami tamga amme.”
Maan habei ga sangwan khat tha karuk bani lak pi Rikrwang chong bachu thangga ong ngaake.
Gallio na Achaia om talei choi ongnu kaan bi Jihudi rwanna sung khatcha toga Paul maitwang bi han thouluga bating chongsem riak meithaan bi phun hung rwe.
Banina rinne, “Heiba manpana chongtan ding to kabat kabaangga Rikrwang ding kalum lang mi nun ding bathemme.”

Paul na chong kabia lang babao aang thou lang tonu kaan bi Gallio na Jihudi rwan khou rinne, “Jihudi rwan ga, heiba manpana ka maknu chwan tonu mak tabe, mi thi mi naa zanu to ngaake dabe ei nani le diga barit phun bacham lang balang amme.
Atiyeda haba chongkaang om, meng om khatle nani om chongtan om lang bina kaenu ngaake dabe, haga nani cham kae kaleyo. Balangbe heipai om lang bi ei chongsempuba to kaate.”
Maanna bani ding chongtok riak pina bathou sat trwe.
Haba nung bi Greek rwan bingna synagogue om kaithangnupa Sosthenes ting namluga chongsem kaong riak meithaan bi bwei rwe. Atiyeda haga Gallio na sung khut thang mak ngaake.

Paul bakhwa seiga Corinthia bi ong ngaake. Haba nung bi maan habei ga unao rwan khouna kapaangluga, Priscilla le Aquila ding kalwangluga Syria la se lang li hwan rwe. Baom chong ren khat am briakpina Paul Cenchrea bi balu bwat sat rwe.
Maan Ephesus pi hung bi Priscilla le Aquila ding habei ga thangsia rwe. Maan bahak synagogue pi khutluga Jihudi rwan le diga chong kakhan rwe.
Banina bating bakaan kasem ongsei thang lang rinnu kaan bi maan zalan rwe.

Atiyeda maan bani khou kapaang chong kabia thangsialuga, “Jerusalem la laang swak tingnu balou ga ei soimakka sui lang tone, atiyeda Rikrwang na zanuwe dabe ei nani khou hung latlune” diga rinluga maan Ephesus pina li hwan thou dam ngaak rwe.
Atiga maan Caesarea bi hung tangnu kaan bi Jerusalem la kaluga rupkathan ding kalumluga Antioch la ta rwe.
Maan habei ga bakaan kasem ongnu nung, Galatia le Phrygia taram bing serwanluga potroi rwan bing om balumsat ting pi tip thang rwe.
Apollos tiga kounu Alexandria nampui bi ponnu Jihudi rwan pakhat Ephesus pi hung rwe. Maan chong kabia theinu khatle Bathiangnu Chongdip om lang bi thei taknu mi pakhat ngaake.

Heiba manpa ding nga mi khatna Pukraangba lampui om lang bi bachu thang ngaake. Atiga maanna bakatha na rakan takka bathainu le bachamga Pukraangba om lang bi rin bazega rin thang ngaake khatle bachu thang ngaake. Atiyeda maan John na baptize to thangnu za ding thei ngaake.

Maanna basung raangga synagogue pi chong kabia thou rwe. Atiyeda Priscilla le Aquila na bachong ga ngaisunu kaan bi bating inkamga kalwang swakluga Rikrwang om lampui lang bi inkuga khatle bazenu ga bachu thang rwe.

Maanna Achaia talei la se nwamnu kaan bi bating loukhut thang lang unao rwanna haba riak pi ongnu potroi rwan khou chamthwan hiak ngaake. Atiga maanna hung tangnu kaan bi phaangkriang paan bina balumsanu nun ding taswang khak paang thang rwe.
Balangbe maanna khang meithaan bi Jihudi rwan chong ding ga kae ngam rwe. Atiga Jisu wa Christa ye diga Bathiangnu chongdip pina pi mu thang ngaake.
Apollos na Corinthia bi ongnu kaan bi Paul na kasak taram bing serwan hungluga Ephesus pi hung rwe. Habei ga potroi rwan mi kasem dou ngaake.
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nanina balumsanu paan bina Katha Bathiangnu ding lousurubo?” Banina bakhou rinne, “Lousu make. Katha Bathiangnu amme dinu hakna ani thei make.”
Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ati dabe nani tatonu baptize tonubo?” Banina katake, “Ani John na baptize to thangnu ga lousu rwe.”
Paul na rinne, “Nung la hungnanu Pukraangba ding dinuba Jisu ding balumsa lang zung nge diga John na mi bing khou rinluga sung lenu om baptize to thang rwe.”
Haga banina ngaisunu kaan bi Pukraangba Jisu meng bi baptize to rwe.
Atiga Paul na bani lu chung bi kut kaising thangnu kaan bi Katha Bathiangnu bani khou ta thang rwe khatle bani chong tei tei kabiaga Rikrwang chong rin swak thou rwe.
Haba mi nun ga somga kani khak ngaake.
Paul na synagogue pi khutluga tha thum sung raangga Rikrwang om krwang talei lang bi kaphat ngaake khatle bani ding balumsa lang bathem ngaake.

Atiyeda mi kasemna bani sung natka balumsa mak ngaake. Mi nun meithaan bi Pukraangba om Lampui lang bi kasianu kabia rwe. Paul na bani ding asat thang sialuga potroi rwan ding kalwangluga Tyranus pi kani bathin haba lang bi kakhan bacham ong ngaake.
Atiga heiya sangwan kani seta ngaake. Atibriakpina Asia bi amnu Jihudi rwan le Greek rwan bingna Pukraangba Jisu om chong ngaisu ngaake.
Rikrwang na Paul om kut pina teithak thaknu tasiatnu chwan pi to ong ngaake.
Atibriakpina Paul khouna baom rumaan mak tabe bapwan ga naanu khou lou hungluga banaannu kaan bi naanu ga sa ngaake khatle katha kasia rwan ga bani khouna swak tam ngaake.
Ha taang bi se koi senu Jihudi rwan dwei choinu kasemna Jisu meng panga katha kasia nun khutnu mi rwan lu chung bi rinne, “Ani Paul na kasamnu Jisu meng bina nating kazunne.”
Jihudi rwan takolu Sceva sa kapaisa pat siarina heiba chwanna to ong ngaake.
Katha kasia gana katake, “Jisu ding ei theiye, Paul ding le theiye; atiyeda nani tubo?”
Haba nung bi katha kasia khutnu manpa gana bani lak pi pak khutluga bani ding nam katatluga maanna ngam rwe. Atiga bani haba in bi gana pum tangang pak swak rwe khatle bani liam le liam ngaak rwe.
Haga Ephesus pi lung ongnu Jihudi rwan le Greek rwan lak pi thei chang thou dam ngaake. Atiga bani lak pi kachinu swak rwe khatle Pukraangba Jisu meng lwat pi lian rwe.
Habei ga balumsanu mi taswang khak hungluga sung leluga banina to ngaaknu chwan bing rin indao rwe.
Dwei choinu mi nunna le dwei om chongdip ka lou hungluga khangsung meithaan bi mei thaang sat rwe. Haga banina baman chaknu kaan bi tangka raching somnga man ngaake.
Haba nung Pukraangba om chong ga ngam lian thou rwe khatle nat thou rwe.
Haba chwan bing ga loi damnu nung Paul na Macedonia khatle Achaia se takan taluga Jerusalem tangga se lang balungningna baning briakpina rinne, “Ei ha la ga tangluga Rome le phaang lang maang nge.”
Maanna bating paang thangnu pat ni, Timothy le Erastus ting Macedonia la lang thang rwe. Atiyeda maan bakaan kasem Asia bi nei ngaake.
Haba kaan bi Pukraangba om Lampui lang bi tasiatnu kasao kabaonu swak ngaak rwe.
Balangbe tudannu tangka thin sweinu Demetrius tiga kounu gana Diana ri katha bachaluga chwantok mi nun lang siantong tamga baloi ngaake.
Maanna hapai chwan tonu mi nun ding kou kadoiluga bani khou rinne, “Mi nun ga, heiba chwan paan bina nani lan tamga lousu rwe dinu nanina thei rwe.
Ephesus pi za makka, Asia taram bing bi Paul na mi nun ding bathemga, bani sung pi lega, kutna bachanu ri bing ga ri nun make diga rin ngaaknu ga nanina mu rwe khatle ngaisu rwe.

Ani chwan heiya bameng braan ta zanu makka, Asia talei bing khatle talei chung bingna kalum ongnu kaliannu rinu Diana kalum in tangga rin basiatnu khatle balwat braan ta dam lang ani sung tamnu amme.”
Haga banina ngaisunu kaan bi banina balung pwan takka paoga rinne, “Ephesus rwan om Diana lian kataknuwe.”

Atiga namlian bing ga kasao kabaonuna sip rwe. Bani mi khang karung riak pi sung khatcha toga pak hung kadoiluga Paul le maan le diga chwanlaang bachamnu baan Macedonia lana hungnu Gaius le Aristarchus ting nam rwe.
Paul na mi nun khou se nwamnu kaan bi potroi rwanna za mak ngaake.
Haba nung bi Asia bi kasei kaliannu babaan rwan mi kasemna bakhou mi lang hungluga, bani karung riak pi bating khut mak lang bathem ngaake.
Atibriakpina mi kasemna chong khat, kateina chong khat tiga pao thou rwe. Balangbe bani karungga kasao kabao rwe. Mi katamna bani pa-aam lang hung karungnubo dinu hakna theilan rwe.
Banina Alexander ding mi khang lak pina kai swak rwe, balangbe Jihudi rwanna bating meithaan la tun swak ngaake. Alexander na bakut haiga mi nun khou chong kabia lang kakhang ngaake.
Atiyeda banina maan Jihudi rwanne dinu theinu kaan bi bani khangsungna chakrin kani khak, “Ephesus rwan om Diana na lian kataknuwe” diga pao rwe.

Namlian om hiakpuba gana bani ding khaamdai taluga rinne, “Ephesus mi rwan ga, heiba Ephesia mi nun om namlian heiya kaliannu rinu Diana katha, Zeus lana baotanu katha kalum in ding ngaaknuwe dinu thei maknu mi tu ambo?
Atibriakpina ha bing ga zei maknu za mak briakpina nani rim rim dingnuwe khatle kakhan makka khatchale to mako.
Balangbe ri katha kalum in bi in baruk mi le maknu, ani ri nun ding le rin basiat maknu manpa rwan ding nanina abeiya lou hung rwe.

Atibriakpina Demetrius le babaan kutthiam mi nun gana mi khat maitwang bi chong amme dabe, chongtok in ga inkhaan lat ongme khatle taleipuba rwan le amme. Bani cham koi impu thang kale ong dam ding ngo.
Atiyeda nanina katei katei om lang bi chong ngai nwam taknu amme dabe, haga chongsem om karung riak pi kakhan ding gaye.
Balangbe ani omma balang maaknu, kasao kabaonu riak pina bani ding kouluga chong ngaiza ongnuwa ani bachan sianuwe. Atiga chaang nai makka hung kadoinu om lang bi ani rinnu ngamlaye.”
Maanna heiya rinluga karung ongnu mi khang ding pi kapaang thang drwe.
Kasao kabaonu ga lan damnu kaan bi Paul na potroi rwan ding bakhou kou kadoiluga bani ding kapon thangsialuga, haba nung maan Macedonia la thou dam ngaake.
Atiga maanna haba taram ga serwan hungluga bani ding kachui thangnu chong taswang khak kabia thangsialuga Greek taram la hung rwe.

Maan habei ga tha thum nei thang ngaake. Atiga maanna Syria la se lang li hwanluga se ding ga ongnu kaan bi Jihudi rwanna bating athat lang tup ngaake. Haba nung bi maan Macedonia serwan hung lat lang baning ngaak rwe.
Berea la mi Sopater, Aristarchus le Thessalonica rwan Secundus, Derbe lana Gaius, Timothy khatle Asia lana Tychicus le Trophimus bani maan le se bacham ngaake.
Ha rwan gana se kamaluga Troas pi ani ding ngaak ong ngaake.
Atiyeda khai sui maknu uilu balou ni nung bi Philippi bina li hwan hungluga ni impaang ni Troas pi bani kim bi hung tang rwe. Habei ga ni siari hungnei ta rwe.

Maap lak om kamanu lumik pi uilu thiak bak lang potroi rwan hung kadoi rwe. Paul na inswan lampai haba riak pina se swak tam ding briakpina maanna bani khou chong kabialuga inmik kasia tangga meiri rai ngaake.
Banina ong kadoi ongnu basaang in kaa bi thaomei taswang khak taan thang ngaake.

Habei ga Eutychus tiga kounu katangpa swan khat inkhaan swan bi badungluga inthi chui tak thou dam ngaake. Maan in nwamnuna khang ngam mak ngaak rwe. Pual na chong kabia bakhwa sei hungnu kaan bi maan in thaak inthum lana bazwantaluga thiga kachung thou ngaak rwe.
Paul na taluga haba katangpa swan lu chung bi kuntaluga kapon thangga bani khou rinne, “Nani sung riangre mako, balangbe bakhou katha ammaang nge.”
Habei ga Paul na uilu thiak bakluga sa damnu basaang in la ka lat ngaake khatle bakhwa seiga, khwa baan swaknu tangga chong kabialuga se swak trwe.
Banina katangpa ding ga ringga kalwang hung rwe khatle bani karo tak ngaak rwe, atiga bani om karonu ga titcha mak ngaak rwe.
Haba nung bi anina kamaga lipui bina seluga Assos la se rwe, habei ga Paul ding li bina kalwang lang nge. Balangbe maan baraanto ketna se lang to ong ngaake.
Maanna Assos pi ani ding kadounu kaan bi anina bating li bina kalwangluga Mitylene la se rwe.

Ani habei gana li hwan hung rwe atiluga inswan lampai Chios tuikoi ram le mai pon kadounu riak pi hung rwe. Inswan lampai Samos tuikoi ram bi hung tang rwe khatle Trogyllium bi hungnei rwe. Inswan lampaina Miletus namlian bi hung rwe.
Balangbe Paul na Asia bi ongsei mak langna, Ephesus takan swakluga li hwan thou dam lang sung han ngaake. Balangbe maan zaye dabe Pentecost lumik pi Jerusalem bi ong lang barapka se ngaake.
Paul na Miletus pina Ephesus la mi bathanluga rupkathan om chwan phunnu rwan ding kou rwe.
Banina bakhou hungnu kaan bi maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina Asia bi hung tang khap tinu lumik pi gana thouga ei nani le diga tatonu gong bi ong ngaakpo dinu nanina theiye.
Ei talu taga khatle mikthi taswang khak tanu le bachamga Pukraangba om chwanlaang to rwe. Jihudi rwanna tupka ating tamphaang ngaake.
Nani lang kana dingnu khatchale eina khaak thang make. Atiyeda nani khou rin indao thang damme khatle inkhun bing bi khutluga nani ding mi bing meithaan bi bachu thang damme.
Eina Jihudi rwan khou le Greek rwan khou le Rikrwang khou sung lenu khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou balumsanu lang bi sake pi rwe.
“Phaang ngo, atun ating Katha Bathiangnuna Jerusalem la se lang bathou ongme. Hala ga akhou pa-aam swaklu dingbo dinu ei thei make.
Heiza be eina theiye dinuba qwan in khatle riangrenuna ating ong ngaak ongme dinu Katha Bathiangnuna namlian bing bi akhou pi thei thang nge.

Atiyeda kabia ongnu lang bingna ating pi kaling make, eina akum ding kungga baning make. Eina achwan don ga karoga loi thang lang khatle Rikrwang om phaangkriang sacham om sake pi lang eina Pukraangba Jisu khouna lousunu chwanlaang to ongnuwe.
Batak takka eina Rikrwang om krwang talei sacham ga nani lak pi sechangluga kasam thang ngaak rwe. Phaang ngo, nani aman mu lat pila rwe.
Atibriakpina mi nun thi om koi akhou maake dinu eina aniya nani khou sake tonuwe.
Balangbe Rikrwang na baningnu bing ga eina nani khou khaaknu to makka indao thang rwe.

Atibriakpina nani nun khatle zao nun lang barak theiyo, bani ding ga phaang thang lang Katha Bathiangnu bi bani ding phaangsin thangnu mi nun to lang hap thang rwe. Bathina kalei thang damnu Rikrwang om rupkathan ding ga sian thang ngo.
Balangbe ei thou damnu nung sa maknu tangiya nun nani lak pi hunglu rwe dinu ei theiye. Zao nun ding ga khaak thanglaye.
Atiga nani cham lak pina le mi nunna potroi rwan ding bani lang kai lang swak lang ka maknu chong kabianu mi nun nani khouna swaklu rwe.
Atibriakpina nani barak theiyo. Ei sangwan thum zingpha thamlai thei makka mikthi taga khangsung khou lannu maakka cheksin lang bachu thang damnu ga nani baningsuwo.

“Unao rwan ga, atun eina nani ding Rikrwang khou khatle Baphaangkriang chong bi bachoi thang rwe. Haba chong gana nani ding bacha thou lang khatle to bathiang thang damnu mi nunna lousu dingnu dam ga lousunu ngam lang nge.
Ei pakhatcha om kachaak tangka mak tabe sin basoi khatchale lou nwam make.
Akut heiyana alaang khatle ei le diga chwanlaang bachamnu bing lang bathaang amnu ga pi thang rwe dinu nanina theiye.

Eina atiga chwan toluga balang bing bi nani khou pi mu thang rwe. Dinuba nanina le kasonnu nun ding paang thang lang nge. Atiga Pukraangba Jisu na rin damnu, ‘Lousunu ma pi swaknuna aih saye’ dinu ga nani baningsuwo.”
Maanna haga rinnu nung, maan kekhok deluga maan le diga khangsung kalum bacham rwe.
Haba nung bi bani khangsung chap barung hingga chap rwe khatle banina Paul ding baring photluga kaput rwe.
Maanna baman mu lat pila rwe diga rin briakpina bani sung riangre tak ngaak rwe. Atiga banina bating lipui bi tangga katha swak thang rwe.
Ani bani khouna kapaangnu nung, lipui twangluga sechuk chukka se hungluga tuikoi ram Cos pi hung tang rwe. Inswan lampaina Rhodes pi khatle habeina Patara bi hung rwe.
Habei ga Phoenicia la se dingnu lipui am ngaakka, ani habei ga twangluga se rwe.
Anina Cyprus hungmunu kaan bi imbei pek la setakanluga Syria pek la li hwan hung rwe, atiga ani Tyre bi ta rwe. Balangbe habei ga li pot louta lang am briakpi naye.
Habei ga anina potroi rwan ding kadouluga ni siari neita ngaake. Banina Katha Bathiangnu paan bina Paul ding Jerusalem la se mak lang rin rwe.

Atiga ani lang bakaan ga maak hungnu kaan bi ani kapaangluga ani lampui la se lat rwe. Banina bani mei sa rwan le diga namlian ga sekhan mak basaan ani ding katha swak rwe. Atiga anina tuipui paan bi kekhok detaluga kalum ngaake.
Habei ga anina bani ding kapaangnu nung ani li hwan lat rwe, atiga bani le in han lat rwe.
Ani nun Tyre bina tuipui lamsek ka loinu kaan bi Ptolemais namlian bi hung tang rwe, habei ga unao rwan ding kalumluga ni khat riak ta rwe.
Inswan lampai Paul le diga kapaangluga ani Caesarea bi hung rwe. Atiga pat siari lak pi evangelist Philip in bi khutluga maan le riak bacham rwe.
Heiba manpa sa reizuni pat bali am ngaake. Bani ri chong rin swaknu karwak ngaake.
Ani habei ga lumik kasem nei ongnu kaan bi Agabus tiga kounu tudannu thiamting pakhat Judea lana ta rwe.

Maanna ani khou hungnu kaan bi Paul om kongkhaak louluga hagana bakut bake krakluga rinne, “Katha Bathiangnuna rinne, ‘Heiba kongkhaakpuba ding ga Jerusalem bi Jihudi rwanna karakluga Gentile rwan khou pi swaklu rwe.’ ”
Heiba chong bing nga anina ngaisunu kaan bi ani le diga habei ga ongnu mi nunna bating Jerusalem la se mak lang bathem ngaake.
Habei ga Paul na katake, “Nanina chapka asung to katop ongnubo? Balangbe atiga krak lang za makka Pukraangba Jisu meng lang Jerusalem la thi lang tangga ei daan ong rwe.”
Anina bating bathemnu ga maan za maknu kaan bi anina haga “Pukraangba na baningnu to dingro” diga rin rwe.
Haba nung bi ani pot bachaluga Jerusalem la ka ngaake.
Ani le diga Caesarea lana hungnu potroi rwan kasem le ani le se bacham ngaake. Banina ani ding meithaan potroi to ngaaknu Cyprus rwan Mnason in bi kalwang khut thangluga riak rwe.
Anina Jerusalem bi hung tangnu kaan bi unao rwanna ani ding karoga loukhut thang rwe.
Inswan lampai Paul ani le diga James ting kadou lang hung rwe. Habei ga chwan phunnu rwan bingle ong ngaake.
Paul na bani ding kalumnu nung chwan tonu sung bi Rikrwang na Gentile nun lak pi to thang ngaaknu bing ga katupka bani khou rin thang rwe.

Banina haga ngaisunu kaan bi Pukraangba lwat indaoga bakhou rinne, “Unao, nangna munuga hei rwe, Jihudi rwan lak pi balumsanu mi raching raching amme. Bani khangsung Moses om chongtan bi sung khut ongme.
Atiyeda nalang bi banina thei rwe dinuba, nangna Gentile rwan lak pi amnu Jihudi rwan khou bani sa rwan ding mun rom mako diga Moses chongtan mak tabe zek nung se mak lang bachu thang rwe.
Ati dabe into langbo? Balangbe nang hung rwe dinu banina ngaisuwe dabe bani soi makka hung karunglu zung rwe.
Atibriakpina anina nakhou rin ongnu heiya nang to thang ngo. Ani lak pi bazanna chong karennu mi pat bali am rwe.

Haba manpa rwan ding ga kalwang seluga nang le diga pum to bathiang sero. Atiluga bani lu bwat lang sian nangna pi thangbiyo. Atiye dabe nalang bi banina theinu bing ga khatchale make atiyeda nang bazega han ongme khatle nazanna chongtan ga zei ongme dinu mi nunna thei lang nge.

Atiyeda balumsanu Gentile rwan khou ri lang kat thangnu pot sanu, thi sanu, karek thatnu zan sanu, lungmaannu, hei bing bina namlaaga ong lang khatle katei bing ga zei mak lang anina kathuiluga bani khou chong ga hiak trwe.”

Haba nung bi Paul na haba manpa rwan ding inswan lampai kalwangluga bani pum to bathiangluga kalum in bi khut rwe. Haga to bathiangnu ni ga loi rwe dinu indao lang nge. Haba kaan bi ga bani pakhat khat lang potkat kat thang lang nge.
Ni siari tang lang nai hungnu kaan bi Asia lana hungnu Jihudi rwanna Paul ding kalum in bi mu rwe khatle mi nun ding bathou thangluga bating namluga

pao rwe, “Israel mi nun ga, ani ding paang thang ngo, heiya bariak thin mi nun ding, chongtan ding khatle heiba riak om maitwang bi bachu thangsianu manpa ga rwe. Haza makka maanna Greek rwan ding le kalum in bi kalwang khutluga bathiangnu riak ting to tanaat rwe.”
Balangbe meithaan bani le diga Ephesus lana hungnu Trophimus ting namlian sung bi mu ngaake. Atiga bating Paul na kalum in bi kalwang khute diga banina baning ngaake.
Atiga namlian bi ga kasao kabao thou rwe khatle mi nun pak hung kadoiluga Paul ding nam rwe. Atiga bating langkaang la kai swakluga kalum in inkhaan ga barapka khaan drwe.
Banina Paul ding athat lang zong ongnu kaan bi Jerusalem bi kasao kabaonu swak rwe dinu kraan milu khou cham ga thei hung ngaak rwe.
Kraan milu gana barapka kraanmi rwan khatle kraanmi razapuba rwan ding kalwangluga bani khou pakta rwe. Banina kraan milu khatle kraanmi rwan ding munu kaan bi Paul ding bwei ongnu ga lan drwe.
Haba nung bi kraan milu gana hungluga Paul ding nam rwe, atiga bating parei rui kanina bang lang kraan milu gana zathang pi rwe. Maanna, “Nang tubo, pa-aam to ba dabo?” diga ngai rwe.

Habei ga mi khang lak pi kasemna chong khat atiluga katei rwanna chong khat kabia rwe. Atiga kasao kabao ong briakpina bazenu ga paaambo dinu thei maknu kaan bi maanna Paul ding kraan mi nun ongnu riak la kalwang hung lang zathang pi rwe.
Paul na kalaak ka hung tangnu kaan bi mi khangna kasao kabao briakpina kraanmi nunna bating pon thouluga se rwe.
Balangbe mi khangna bani ding suizonga, “Bating athat sat tammo” diga pao ong ngaake.
Bating kraanmi nun ongnu riak la kalwang khutnu kaan bi Paul na kraan milu khou rinne, “Eina nakhou chong kasem kabianu zabo?” Habei ga maanna rinne, “Nang Greek chong theibo?
Ati dabe bakaan kasem meithaan la kraan laang thouluga mi athatnu manpa rwan mi raching bali ding kalwang se ngaaknu Egypt rwan pa ga nang makpo?”
Paul na rinne, “Eiba Cilicia bi Tarsus om Jihudi zwe, bakung tonu namlian om khulungsa zwe. Eina mi nun khou chong kabia lang nangna za thang ngo diga hweiye.”

Atiga maanna chong kabia lang bating za thangnu kaan bi Paul na kalaak pi thou hanluga mi nun khou bakut hai rwe. Habei ga mi nun ga rim rim ta damnu kaan bi maanna bani khou Hebrew chong la rin thou rwe,
“Unao rwan khatle pu pa rwan ga, atun nani meithaan bi eina kakhangnu chong nga ngai thang ngo.”
Maanna bani khou Hebrew chong la kabianu ga ngaisunu kaan bi bani inkuga thiap thiap ta rwe.

Maanna rinne, “Ei Cilicia taram om Tarsus namlian bi ponnu khatle haba namlian bi lian thounu Jihudi rwanne. Gamaliel kim bi ani pu pa rwan om chongtan ga bachu thounu, haga choitipka choinuwe khatle nanina aniya to ongnu danga Rikrwang khou asung thang ngaake.
“Heiba Lampui bi senu nun ding eina railuga athat ngaake. Kapaisa kamaisa rwan ding karakluga qwan in bi le thang ngaake.

Hei lang biya takolu khatle patso rwan om thampeina aom sake rwe. Eina unao rwan khou pi lang chamthwan bani khouna louluga Damascus la se ngaake. Bani ding parei ruina bangluga bani ding Jerusalem la laak lang kalwang hung lang se ngaake.
“Lumik badingnu phei bi ei Damascus tang lang nai hungnu kaan bi thei mak daakka tambaan lana babaan khat taluga ating baan qwat thang ngaake.
Habei ga ei talei bi bazwanta rwe khatle khwan khatna akhou atiga rinnu ngaisu rwe, ‘Saul, Saul, nang pa-aam lang Ating rai ongnubo?’
Habei ga eina katake, ‘Pukraangba, Nang tubo?’ Maanna akhou rinne, ‘Ei nangna rai ongnu Nazareth Jisu we.’
Ei le diga ong bachamnu nunna le batak takka baannu ga mu ngaake atiga bani kachi tak ngaak rwe. Atiyeda akhou chong kabianu gabe bani ngaisu mak ngaake.
Eina ngai rwe, ‘Pukraangba, ei pa-aam to langbo?’ Pukraangba na akhou rinne, ‘Thouluga Damascus la khutro, habei ga nangna to lang han thang damnu chwan bing ga nakhou rin thanglune.’
Atiga kanatnu babaan gana amik mulanruga ei le se bachamnu rwan gana akut kailuga Damascus pi khut rwe.
“Habei ga ongnu Jihudi rwan bingna rin chuiga rinnu khatle chongtan nung suiga senu Ananias tiga kounu pakhat am ngaake.
Maanna ameithaan bi hung hanluga rinne, ‘Unao Saul, nang namik mu lat tingro.’ Haba kahan bi ga ei bating phaangmu ngaake.
Maanna rinne, ‘Ani pu pa rwan om Rikrwang na Maanna baningnu ga thei lang Bazenu Bating ga mu dam lang khatle Bakhwan ga ngaisu lang nating kathang swak rwe.
Balangbe nangna mu damnu khatle ngaisu damnu bing ga mi nun khou sake to lang nge.
Atun nang pa-aam ding ngaak ongnubo? Thouro, baptize toro khatle nanoh kasin bathiangro khatle Pukraangba meng ding kouro’ diga rin ngaake.
“Eina Jerusalem la han hung latluga kalum in bi kalum ongnu kaan bi ei trance se ngaake
khatle ei Jisu ding mu rwe, Maanna akhou rinne, ‘Barapro, Jerusalem bina barapka swak tro, balangbe Alang bi naom sake banina lou thanglaye.’
“Eina rinne, ‘Pukraangba, synagogue bing bi Nating balumsanu mi nun ding eina qwan in bi thang ngaaknu khatle bwei ngaaknu ga banina thei rwe.
Pukraangba om sake langna Stephen thi tanu kaan bi eina bating athatnu nun ding za ngaaknu khatle mi athatnu nun om pwan ngaaknu to ngaak rwe.’
Haba nung bi Pukraangba na akhou rinne, ‘Sero, balangbe Eina nating Gentile rwan khou lang thangne.’ ”
Bani khangsungna bachong ga ngai ong ngaake. Haba nung bi banina baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Talei ram bina heiba manpa ding nga athat sat tammo, balangbe maan ring lang khopnu mi lan rwe.”
Haba nung bi banina paoga bani pwan kachang reluga basaang la tambut bwan ka rwe.

Habei ga kraan milu gana bating kraanmi nun ongnu riak la kalwang hung lang chongtan pi rwe. Atiga mi nunna bamaitwang bi heitia pao ongnu ga pa-aam tonu lang binabo dinu thei lang bating railuga chong ak lang rin rwe.
Atiga banina bating zan mun ruina bang rwe, habei ga Paul na bakim bi han ongnu kraanmi razapuba khou rinne, “Rome rwan mi pakhat ting chong to makka bweinu zagabo?”
Haga kraanmi razapuba gana ngaisunu kaan bi maanna kraan milu khou seluga rinne, “Nangna tonu chwan ga cheksinno, balangbe manpa heiya Rome talei mi zung nge.”
Haba nung bi kraan milu gana hungluga bakhou rinne, “Akhou rinno, nang Rome rwanbo?” Maanna “O,” diga katak rwe.
Kraan milu gana katake, “Eiba sian taswang khak pi luga Rome rwan mi tonuwe.” Paul na katake, “Atiyeda eiba Rome mi toga ponnuwe.”
Haba nung bi bating tamphaang dingnu mi nun ga bakhouna impaan thou drwe. Atiga Paul Rome mi ye dinu theiluga kraan milu ga kachi rwe, balangbe maanna Paul ding karak ngaake.

Inswan lampai Jihudi rwanna bating tatoga koi impu thangnubo dinu bathiangga thei lang bating bang thang ong bina bathan thang rwe. Maanna takopuba rwan le thampei rwan karung lang zathang pi ngaake, atiga Paul ding phun hungluga bani meithaan bi pi han rwe.
Haba nung bi Paul na thampei rwan khou phaang dengga phaangluga rinne, “Manpa rwan khatle unao rwan bing ga, ei aniya tangga Rikrwang meithaan bi akum bi kasanu ding theiga lung ongme.”
Habei ga takolu Ananias na bakim bi han ongnu nun khou Paul ding bamun bi bweiyo diga zathang pi rwe.

Habei ga Paul na bakhou rinne, “He wai teingounu imbaang, nating Rikrwang na bweilu rwe. Balangbe nangna chongtan nung suiga ating chongsem riak pi badung rwe. Atiga chongtan om kabat kabaangnu bi ating bweiyo diga nangna zathang pinubo?”
Habei ga han ongnu mi nunna rinne, “Rikrwang om takolu ding nangna atiga tweinubo?”
Habei ga Paul na rinne, “Unao rwan ga, ei bating takoluwe dinu thei make. Balangbe atiga hiak thangluga amme, ‘Nangna nani om bapuba ding rin basiat sa make.’ ”

Atiyeda bani kasemna Sadducee rwan, kasemna Pharisee rwanne dinu Paul na theiluga maanna thampei rwan meithaan bi paoga rinne, “Manpa rwan khatle unao rwan ga, ei Pharisee, Pharisee sa kapaisa zung nge, thinu nunna ring thou latnu khatle haba om balumsat lang bi ating chongsem ongnuwe.”
Maanna haga rinnu kaan bi Pharisee rwan le Sadducee rwan lak pi kae kale thou rwe. Atiga mi nun ga balang kani swak rwe.
Balangbe Sadducee rwanna ring thou latnu, tambaan chonglang khatle katha maake diga rinne. Atiyeda Pharisee rwannabe ha bing ga amme diga balumsaye.

Haba nung bi bani pao kale thou rwe. Atiga Pharisee rwan pek la hannu chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna han thouluga rakanga kae kaleluga rinne, “Heiba manpa khou ani kasianu dou make. Atiyeda bakhou katha na mak tabe tambaan chonglangna kabia thangnu ngaake dabe, ani Rikrwang maitwang bi katwak kale makcho.”

Kae kalenu ga rakan thounu kaan bi Paul ding mi nunna kaichat katup tamnu zaye diga kachi briakpina kraan milu gana bami nun ding lang thangluga Paul ding bani khouna kai swakluga kraanmi nun ongnu riak la kalwang hung lang zathang pi thang rwe.

“Atiyeda inswan lampai zingpha Pukraangba na bakim bi hung hanluga bakhou rinne, ‘Paul, nang lozaang sawo, nangna Jerusalem bi Alang bi sake to damnu ga danga nang Rome rwan meithaan bi le Aom sake to lang rwe.’ ”
Louthwan khwan baan swaknu kaan bi Jihudi rwan mi kasemna chong kathuiluga banina Paul ding athat mak basaan bani khatchale sa in mak lang diga sengga karen thang ngaake.
Atiga tup ong ngaaknu nun ga mi sombali katei ngaake.
Banina takopuba rwan khatle chwan phunnu rwan kim bi hungluga rinne, “Ani Paul ding athat mak basaan khatchale sa in mak lang sengga chong karen rwe.

Atibriakpina inswan balang bi inkuga zong lang danga Paul ding nani khou kalwang hung lang nani nun le thampeina kraan milu khou rinro. Atiga maan abeiya hung tang mak balei anina bating athat lang daan ong rwe.”
Paul basannuna ponnu sa kapaisana bani daan ongnu ga ngaisuluga kraanmi nun ongnu riak pi khutluga Paul khou pu rwe.
Haba nung Paul na kraanmi razapuba khat ting kouluga rinne, “Heiba katangpa ding nga kraan milu khou pi hung thang ngo, maan bakhou chong kasem rin lang amme.”
Maanna bating kraan milu khou kalwang hungluga rin rwe, “Qwan in mi Paul na ating kou hungluga heiba katangpa ding nga nakhou kalwang hung lang rin rwe. Maan nakhou chong rin lang amme.”
Haba nung bi kraan milu gana bating bakut kailuga kalwang tei swak rwe. Atiga inthimthwei toga bakhou ngai rwe, “Nangna akhou rin nwamnu ga pa-aambo?”
Maanna rinne, “Jihudi rwanna inswan thampei meithaan bi Paul ding banina inkuga balang bi chong ngai dingnu danga kalwang hung lang nakhou rin lang diga sung cham drwe.

Atibriakpina nang bani chong ga za thang mako. Balangbe bani manpa rwan pat sombali kateina Paul ding athat lang tup ongme. Banina Paul ding athat mak basaan bani khatchale sa in mak lang sengga karen drwe. Bani atun daan ong rwe khatle naom chongren za ding bani ngaak ongme.”
Kraan milu gana katangpa khou, “Nang heiba chong nga akhou rin thang drwe diga pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako” diga zathang pi luga bating bathan sat trwe.

Maanna kraanmi razapuba rwan lak pina pat ni ding kouluga rinne, “Caesarea la se lang kraanmi raza ni, raqwan twangnu kraanmi somsiari khatle sung choinu kraanmi raza ni daanro. Atiga chakrin inthum bi se lang nge.
Paul ding khouring chung bi pi twangluga khatchale khamnamnu to makka taleipuba Felix khou tang lang to lang nge.”
Maanna chamthwan khat hei danga hiak rwe,
“Claodius Lysias eina, ngam liannu taleipuba Felix ting kalumme.
Heiba manpa ding nga Jihudi rwanna namluga athat lang titcha ngaak rwe. Maan Rome mi zung nge dinu thei briakpina eina kraanmi nun le diga hungluga bating kan thang rwe.
Banina bating impu thangnu ga thei bathiang nwamga eina bani om thampei meithaan bi kalwang hung ngaake.
Eina thei rwe dinuba banina bating koi impu thangnu ga bani om chongtan om tangai lang bi bathiangga thei nwam ngaake. Atiga bating athat lang mak tabe bang thang lang khopnu koi khatchale dou make.

Jihudi rwanna heiba manpa ding nga chwan ong rwe dinu akhou thei hung briakpina eina bating barapka nakhou bathan hungnu rwe. Atiga bating koi impu thangnu nunna balu chung bi tanut amnu nun ga nameithaan bi banina rin lang eina bani ding zathang pi damnuwe. Donsanu towo.”
Haba nung bi kraanmi rwan khou zathang pi thangnu nung suiga Paul ding zingpha Antipatris namlian bi kalwang hung rwe.
Atiyeda inswan lampai raqwan twangnu mi nun khou Paul ding kalwang se lang sin thang sialuga kraanmi rwan ga bani riak la han lat trwe.
Banina Caesarea bi hungluga chamthwan ga taleipuba khou pinu kaan bi Paul ding le bakhou bachoi thang rwe.
Taleipuba gana chamthwan ga paluga maan impei talei lanabo diga ngai rwe. Maanna Paul ga Cilicia la naye dinu theinu kaan bi
bakhou rinne, “Nating koi impu thangnu nun ga hungnu kaan bi ei nakhou chong ngaide.” Atiga bating Herod krwang in bi rangkaan thangluga thang lang zathang pi rwe.

Ni impaang nung bi takolu Ananias na chwan phunnu rwan le Tartullus tiga kounu chong kabia theinu tudannu pakhat ting kalwangluga hung rwe. Atiga banina Paul maitwang bi taleipuba khou sake pi ngaake.
