Banina Paul ding koukhutnu kaan bi Tartullus na bating koi impu thangga rin rwe, “Anina napaan bina bakaan seiga dai bazaang ga ong hung nge khatle nangna phaangkhut thangnu paan bina heiba chaat piya baning su zanu chwan taswang khak to thang rwe.
Anina takung tazei to ongnu Felix, bakaan bathin khatle bariak bathin anina swankanule bachamga heiya za rwe.
Atiyeda takhwang to lang khopnu bapuba ding bakhwa seiga to katop mak langna kriang thangga ani chong kasem ngai thang lang hweiye.
“Balangbe manpa heiya to tum to braannu phun hungnu, talei ram bi amnu Jihudi rwan lak pi kraan saraan pi swaknu khatle Nazareth kraanmi rwan om milu we dinu anina thei rwe.
Maanna kalum in ding tangga to tanaat briakpina anina bating chongsem nung suiga chong to lang bathaiga bating namnu rwe.
Atiyeda kraan milu Lysias na hungluga bating ani kut pina ngamsam samga kasut tam ngaake.
Bating koiye dinu rwan ding nakhou hung lang zathang pi ngaake. Anina bakhou koi impu thang ongnu bing nga nangna bakhou ngaiye dabe ha bing ga bakhouna theilune.”
Atiga rin ongnu chong bing nga bazeye dinu Jihudi rwan bingna le chong bacham rwe.

Haba nung bi taleipuba na Paul ding chong kabia lang balu hai rwe. Haba kaan bi maanna katake, “Bapubana bakaan bakhwa seiga heiba chaat om chongsempuba to ongnu eina thei briakpina, eina kakhangnu chong nga karoga kataknuwe.
Ei Jerusalem la Ri kalum lang senu ni somga kani bina hen mak aang nge dinu nangna bathiangga thei thang nge.
Bani ei le diga kalum in bi khatchale kae kanaanu mak tabe eina mi nun ding chong laa pi swaknu synagogue pi mak tabe namlian sung bi kadou dam make.
Banina ating koi impu thangnu bing nga bani rin bachak lang amlaye.

Atiyeda eina nakhou rin indao thangnuwe, hagazo banina khok langnu mi nunne diga rinnu ‘Lampui bi’ eina sega, apu apa rwan om Rikrwang ding kalumme. Moses om chongtan ding khatle thiamting rwan om chongdip pi hiak thangnu ding ga eina balumsaye.
Atiga banina balumsanu danga, eina le kasanu mi ngaakle kasianu mi ngaakle thi bina ring thou latlune dinu Rikrwang khou ei balumsaye.
Haba lang bi ei bakaan bathin Rikrwang khatle mi nun meithaan bi koi maan chwan to mak lang karam ongme.
“Sangwan taswang khak nung la eina achaat om lungsianu mi nun khou paangsun khatle potkat phunluga hung ngaake.
Eina to dingnu achwan toga apum to bathiangnu chwan to ongnu kaan bi banina ating kalum in bi kadou ngaake. Habei ga akim bi mi khang le ong make, kae kanaanu le maake.
Banina akhou koi impu thang dingnu amme dabe heiba riak pi nameithaan bi hanluga ating koi impu thang ngaak tingnuwe.
Mak tabe heiba riak pi ongnu nunna le thampei in meithaan bi han ong bi banina aom koi zongsuwe dabe rin swak ting ngo.
‘Thinu nunna ring thou latnu lang bi aniya ei bani meithaan bi chong kasem ongnuwe’ dinu khwan za be eina bani lak pi hanluga pao damme.”

Haba kahan bi Felix na Lampui om lang bi thei bathiangga theiluga, “Chongsem ga kraan milu Lysias na tanu kaan bi nani chong ga eina kasem thangne” diga rinluga chongtok ka lumik kai inkhin thang rwe khatle mi nun ding pi kapaang thang drwe.

Atiga maanna kraanmi razapuba khou Paul ding rangkaan bi thang lang atiyeda kasem barang to dam lang khatle balaang babaan rwan khouna chwanlaang to thang dingnu amme dabe bating khaam mako diga zathang pi thang rwe.
Lumik kasem Felix na bamei Jihudi rwan Drusilla le diga hungnu kaan bi Paul ding pi kouluga Christa khou balumsanu lang bi bakhou chong ngai rwe.

Atiga maanna ririak senu lang bi, bazanna bazan ding raaknu lang bi khatle hung dingnu chongsem om lang bi kakhannu kaan bi maan kachi rwe khatle atiga katak rwe, “Atunbe nang sero, alaang badou chanu kadou latnu kaan bi eina nating kou hunglune.”
Haba kaan bi ga Paul na bating bathan thang lang sian pi lune diga maanna baning ngaake. Atibriakpina maanna bating kou hung katupluga maan le diga meiri rai ngaake.
Atiyeda sangwan ni nung bi Felix hut Porcius Festus na paan lat rwe khatle Felix na Jihudi rwan ding pi karonu bathai briakpina Paul ding bathan makka qwan in bi thang ngaake.
Festus na baom chwan ga hungphunnu ni thum nung bi maan Caesarea bina Jerusalem la ka ngaake.
Habei ga takolu khatle Jihudi rwan om kai thangnu rwanna Paul maitwang bi chong kat thang rwe.
Atiga banina bani ding kriang thangga Paul ding Jerusalem la kou hung lang rin rwe, balangbe banina Paul ding lampui bi athat lang chwan ong ngaake.
Atiyeda Festus na Paul ding Caesarea la lang thang lang zung nge, maan bahak le ha la ga barapka hung lang amme diga katak rwe.
Maanna rinne, “Atibriakpina nani om milu nun ga ei le diga se bacham ding ngo khatle haba manpa gana kakoinu chwan tonu am ngaake dabe bakhou koi impu thang ding ngo.”
Maan bani lak pi ni som katei neitanu nung Caesarea la ta drwe. Inswan lampai maan chongsem kaong riak pi badungluga Paul ding bakhou kalwang hung lang zathang pi rwe.
Paul na hungnu kaan bi Jerusalem lana hungnu Jihudi rwanna bating han qwatluga sake pinu ngam maknu karit karitnu impu thangnu chong Paul lu chung bi badan thang rwe.
Habei ga Paul na kakhangga rinne, “Jihudi rwan om chongtan maitwang bi ngaakle, kalum in om maitwang bi ngaakle khatle Caesar maitwang bi ngaakle ei ka maknu chwan to make.”
Atiyeda Festus na Jihudi rwan ding pi karo langna Paul khou rinne, “Nang Jerusalem la hungluga hei lang bi ameithaan bi chong kasemnu bathaibo?”
Habei ga Paul na rinne, “Ei Caesar om chongsem meithaan bi han ongme, habei ga ating chong kasem lang nge. Jihudi rwan khou eina sa maknu chwan to thangnu maake dinu nangna bathiangga theiye.

Balangbe eina kakoinu chwan khatle thi lang khopnu chwan to ngaaknuwe dabe, ei thi lang za maknu to make. Atiyeda mi nunna alu chung bi koi impu thang ongnu bing ga bazenu khatchale mak ngaake dabe, pakhatchanale ating bani khou pi swaknu ngam make. Eina Caesar khou heiba chong nga kat thangnuwe.”
Haba nung bi Festus na baom thampei rwan le diga kathuiluga bakhou rinne, “Nangna Caesar khou chong kat thangnu nung suiga, nang Caesar khou se lang rwe.”
Lumik kasem nung bi krwang Agrippa le Bernice na Caesarea bi Festus ting kadou lang hung ngaake.
Habei ga bani nun bakhwa seiga ong bacham ongnu kaan bi Festus na Paul om chong ga krwang meithaan bi phun swakluga rinne, “Felix na qwan in bi thang ngaaknu tudannu manpa khat amme.
Eina Jerusalem bi ongnu kaan bi haba manpa lang bi takopuba rwan khatle Jihudi rwan om patso rwanna chong phun thangluga bating chong kasem thang lang akhou ni ngaake.

Eina bani khou atiga katak rwe ‘Koinu maan gana koi impu thangnu mi nun ga le maitwang kalega balu chung bi ta thangnu chong langna bating kakhang lang badou chanu phang mak balei haba mi ding pi swaknu dinu heiya Rome rwan om chaang make.’
Atibriakpina banina bakhwa sei maknu nung hung kadoinu kaan bi inswan lampai eina chongsem riak pi badungluga haba manpa ding ga kalwang hung lang zathang pi rwe.
Bakhou koi impu thangnu nunna han thounu kaan bi eina baning ong ngaaknu danga banina kasianu chong khatchale phun swak make.
Atiyeda bani bahak om ririak om lang bi khatle ring ongme diga Paul na tipka hannu Jisu kounu thi damnu Mi khat om lang bi baom maitwang bi tangai kasem am ngaake.
Atiga heiba tangai lang bi eina thei bathiang mak briakpina maan Jerusalem la seluga hei lang bi chong kasemnu bathaibo diga ngai ngaake.
Atiyeda Augustus na baom chonghan ga lou thang lang hweininu kaan bi Caesar khou bathan thangza mak basaan bating rangkaan thangluga ngaak thang lang eina zathang pi ngaake.”
Haba nung bi Agrippa na Festus khou rinne, “Ei heiba manpa chong nga ei bahak ngai nwamme.” Festus na rinne, “Inswan nang bachong ga ngai lang rwe.”
Inswan lampai Agrippa le Bernice na kraan milu rwan le namlian om milu nun le diga kasan hingga karung riak pi hung rwe. Habei ga Festus om zathang nung suiga Paul ding kalwang hung rwe.

Festus na rinne, “Krwang Agrippa khatle abeiya hung ongnu kapaisa rwan bing ga, nanina heiba manpa ding nga mu rwe. Heiba manpa om lang bi maan ring lang khopnu mi lan rwe diga paoga Jerusalem khatle abeiya ongnu Jihudi rwanna akhou chong impu thang rwe.

Atiyeda eina baom koi maan lang bi zongnu kaan bi maan thi lang khopnu koi bakhou maake dinu ei thei rwe. Atiga maanna Augustus khou chong phun thang briakpina eina bating lang thang lang asung han rwe.

Balang bi aom bapuba khou eina inkuga hiak lang maake. Atibriakpina eina bating nameithaan bi, bakung toga krwang Agrippa khou phun hungnu rwe. Bakhou ngai minga ngailuga haba nung bi eina hiak tingnu ga hiak lang nge.
Balangbe qwan in mi khat ting chong to lang lang thangnu kaan bi balu chung bi impu thangnu baom koi ga pi thei maknu dinuwa baze maknuwe diga eina baning nge.”
Habei ga Agrippa na Paul khou rinne, “Nalang bi kabia lang nating za thang rwe.” Habei ga Paul na bakut balaan swakluga balang bi kakhangga
rinne, “Krwang Agrippa, Jihudi rwanna alu chung bi impu thangnu heiza lang bi eina aniya nameithaan bi katak tingnuwa alaang aih sanuwe diga baning nge.
Balangbe Jihudi rwan om chaang khatle kakungnu tangai om lang bi nangna inkuga thei thang nge. Atibriakpina achong nga khaang theiga ngai thang lang eina hweiye.
“Atibriakpina kama bi ei babwa toga achaat lak pi khatle Jerusalem bi toga lung thounu ga Jihudi rwan bingna theiye.
Banina kamaga ating thei briakpina banina alang bi sake pi nwamme dabe, ei ani om ririak pi se thuknu mi nun Pharisee khat toga lung ngaake.
Rikrwang na ani pu pa rwan khou pine diga karen thang ngaaknu lang bi aom bachun am briakpina, ei han ongme khatle ating chong kasem ongme.

Ani phum somga kanina le heiba karen thangnuwa lousulune dinu om baning amga zingpha thamlai sung khutka Rikrwang ding chwanlaang to ngaake. He krwang Agrippa, rin ongnu heiba bachun om lang bina Jihudi rwanna ating koi impu thang ongme.
Rikrwang na thinu mi nun ding pi ring thou thang nge dinu dingga nanina pa-aam lang balumsa lang maaknuwe diga kakhan ongnubo?
“Batak takka, Nazareth Jisu meng om maitwang bi chwan taswang khak tone diga ei azan bahakna le baning ngaake.
Haga eina Jerusalem bi le to ngaak rwe. Eina takopuba rwan khouna ngam lousuluga bathiangnu mi taswang khak ting qwan in bi thangnuza makka bani ding athatnu kaan bi le eina ka zanu pi thang ngaake.
Eina bani ding synagogue bing bi katupka rai ngaake khatle ririak ting pi rin basiat ngaake. Eina bani maitwang bi balung pwan laiga man ram namlian namlian la tangga seluga bani ding rai ngaake.
“Eina takopuba rwan khouna ka zanu khatle chongtan lousuluga Damascus namlian la se ngaake.
He krwang, eina lampui bi se ongnu kaan bi lumik badingnu phei bi tambaan lana babaan khat, lumik ma baan inkunu babaan gana ei khatle ei le bazin se bacham ongnu mi nun khou baan thang ngaake.

Ani mi bingna talei bi balumtanu kaan bi khwan khatna Hebrew chong la kabianu eina ngaisu rwe. Atiga rinne, ‘Saul, Saul, nang pa-aam lang Ating rai ongnubo? Thingzum ding naketna basuinuwa nalaang kung lang zung nge.’
Haba kaan bi eina rinne, ‘Pukraangba, Nang Tubo?’ Maanna rinne, ‘Nangna rai ongnu Jisu ga Ei rwe.

Nang thouluga naketna hanno. Balangbe hei langna ating nakhou pi mu thangnuwe. Dinuba nangna Ating mu damnu khatle Eina nakhou indao thang dingnu lang bi nangna chwanlaang to lang khatle sake to lang Eina nating pi mu thangnuwe.
Eina atun nating lang thang ongnu Jihudi rwan mi nun khatle Gentile rwan khouna Eina nating kan thangne.

Haga bani mik meng swak lang, bani kazingnu riak pina kabaannu riak la hung lang, Seitaan om ngam bina Rikrwang khou hung lang, bani nun noh kok thangnu lousu lang khatle Ating balumsanu paan bina to bathiang thangnu nun lak pi bani om badam lousu lang nge.’
“Atibriakpina krwang Agrippa, tambaan om pi mu thangnu ding ga ei zei maknu ngam make.

Atiyeda eina kama bi Damascus khatle Jerusalem bi ongnu nun, Judea taram bing bi khatle Gentile rwan khou bani nun sung leluga Rikrwang khou kanei hung lang nge. Atiga sung lenu om khopsanu chwan to langna diga eina kasam ngaake.
Ha langna Jihudi rwanna ating kalum in bina namluga athat sat lang to ngaake.

Atiyeda Rikrwang na paang thangnu paan bina aniya tangnu sung bi ei abeiya hanga kasinnu khatle kaliannu mi nun khou chong katei kabia makka thiamting rwan khatle Moses na swaklu rwe diga rin damnu ga sake pi ongme.
Hagazo Christa na tatoga riangre kanang khaang dingnu, thi bina kamaga ring thou lat tingnu atiluga Jihudi rwan le Gentile rwan khou babaan om lang bi kasamne diga banina rin basaam thang nge.”
Maanna kakhangga kabianu kaan bi Festus na bakhou baraam natka rinne, “Paul, nang nazan bahak kalo rwe, nangna taswang khak bachunu gana nating to kalo rwe.”
Atiyeda Paul na rin late, “He ngam liannu Festus, ei kalonu make, eina kasanu khatle bazenu lungning om chong rinnuwe.

Balangbe krwangna hei bing nga thei ongme atiga eina krwang meithaan bi khaaknu to makka rin swaknu rwe. Krwangna ha bing ga thei maknu tolaye diga ei baning nge. Balangbe haga inthimthwei toga tonu make.
Krwang Agrippa, nang thiamting rwan ding balumsabo? Nang balumsaye diga ei baning nge.”
Haba nung bi Agrippa na Paul khou rinne, “Nangna ating bathemga Christian pi to lang khwa sei lan rwe.”

Paul na rinne, “Rikrwang khou eina bathaiye, dinuba naraantoza makka aniya achong ngai ongnu bing heiya, titchana ngaakle taswang khakna ngaakle ating parei ruina bang thang ongnu heiya makka ei dan phik lang eina Rikrwang khou kalumme.”
Paul na hei bing nga rin taangnu kaan bi krwang khatle maan le diga ong bachamnu taleipuba le Barnice bani khangsung han thou rwe.
Banina se pen swaknu kaan bi bani cham kabiaga rinne, “Manpa heiya thi lang mak tabe parei ruina bang thang lang khopnu chwan tonu maake.”
Haba nung bi Agrippa na Festus khou rinne, “Heiba manpana Caesar khou chong kat thang mak ngaake dabe eina bating meithaanna bathan thang dam dingnu zung rwe.”
Anina Italy la li bina se lang baningnu kaan bi banina Paul le qwan in mi kasem ding Augustus om kraanmi doi khat om kraanmi razapuba Julius tiga kounu khou ani ding bachoi thang rwe.
Atiga anina Asia taram tui paan la se dingnu Adramyttium lipui bi khut twangluga se rwe. Atiga Thessalonica rwan Macedonia bi ongnu Aristarchus le ani le diga se bacham ngaake.
Inswan lampai ani Sidon bi hung tang rwe. Habei ga Julius na Paul ding ga kung takka maanna babaan rwan khou seluga banina balaang bathaang amnu bing le pi thang lang chongtan ngaake.
Habei gana ani tuipui la se hungnu kaan bi thiraangna ani maitwang bi raang briakpina Cyprus taram lim la serwan hung rwe.
Anina Cilicia le Pamphylia meithaan bi amnu tuipui ga takan swakluga Lycia om namlian Myra bi hung rwe.
Habei ga kraanmi razapuba gana Italy la se dingnu Alexandria lipui khat kadouga maanna habei ga ani ding pi twang rwe.
Ani lumik taswang khak bazaang bazaangga se hungluga riangre takka Cnidus tui paan hung tang rwe. Habei gana ani thiraangna senu ngamlanruga Crete Salmone tuikoi ram om lim bi li hwan hung rwe.
Riangre takka haba taram ga sekhan hungluga Lasea diga kounu namlian kim bi amnu “Phaangsanu Li Basak Riak” diga kounu riak pi hung tang rwe.
Ani bakaan taswang khak ongnu nung li twang lat lang soi zanu kaan ga tangnu kaan bi kalumsannu dat ka le khandru briakpina Paul na kachui thang rwe.
Atiga rinne, “Kapaisa rwan bing ga, ani lamsek pi phunse ongnu pot bing khatle lipui, hei bingza makka ani kum hakna riangrenu khatle braannu dounu zaye dinu ei thei rwe.”
Atiyeda kraanmi razapuba gana Paul na rinnu chong ding ma li hwannu khatle lipuipuba chong ding balumsa ngaake.

Li basak riak ka sikphaa kaan nei lang badou cha mak briakpina li hwanluga se lang mi katamna sung han rwe. Zaye dabe batok khat toluga kathwei lumik taak khatle kasak lumik taak kaneiluga amnu Crete om li basak riak Phoenix la tangluga habei ga sikphaa hung ong lang baning ngaake.
Atiga kathwei pek la thiraangna raang kabin ri riga raang hungnu kaan bi banina baningnu ga hung tang rwe diga baningluga anchor kai thouluga Crete taram om tui kom la se hung rwe.
Atiyeda bakhwa sei maknu nung, bani maitwang bi “Euroclydon” diga kounu kanatnu thirwei thiraang raang hung rwe.
Li ga thirwei thiraang nang rwe, atiga thiraang ding maitwangnu ngamlanruga lipui ga bathan thangnu kaan bi thiraangna ani ding phunse rwe.
Atiga Claudia diga kounu tuikoi ram bi se hungluga riangre takka anina li ding ga bang tipka bang thang rwe.
Atiga banina hung basaknu kaan bi lipui ga lungtasi daam bi su thangnu le zaye diga kachi briakpina li ding ga bang tip thang rwe. Atiga li pwan ga pi bangiam taluga thiraang ding pi phunse rwe.
Thiraang ga raang kabet lai briakpina inswan lampai ani lipui ga pi zaang lang to thou rwe.
Ni thum tangbani ani kut bahakna lipui bi amnu li thounu om pot bing tui la bazwan sat thou rwe.
Lumik taswang khak anina lumik khatle insi man mulan hungnu khatle kanatnu thiraangna ani ding phunse ongnu kaan bi bataang la ani ringlune dinu baning ga braan hung ngaak rwe.

Atiga ani sa in maknu bakhwa sei hungnu kaan bi Paul na bani lak pi han thouluga rin rwe, “Mi nun ga, nani nun achong zeiluga Crete pina se thou mak ngaake dabe liamnu khatle braannu dou mak ngaak tingnuwe.
Atun eina nani sung katop mak lang rakanga rinnuwe. Balangbe lipui ya makka ani lak pi pakhatcha hakna kum braannu tolaye.
Balangbe eina Rikrwang mi tonu, eina chwanlaang to ongnu Rikrwang om tambaan chonglangna aniya zingpha akim bi hung han ngaake.
Atiga rinne, ‘Paul, nang kachi mako, nating Caesar meithaan bi phun hunglu rwe. Batak takka nang le diga li bi se bachamnu bing ding Rikrwang na nakhou pi thang rwe.’
Atibriakpina mi nun ga, sung raang ngo. Atiga akhou rin thang ngaaknu ga danga swaklune diga ei Rikrwang khou balumsaye.
Atiyeda ani tuikoi ram khat pi hungsunu twanla rwe.”

Atiyeda zingpha somga bali tangba ni, Adriatic tuipui bi thiraangna ani ding phun swak phunkhut ka se ngaake. Atiga inmik kasia raan li hwannu manpa rwanna bani taram khat nai rwe dinu thei ngaak rwe.
Atiga tui thuk ka badatnu kaan Bi fathom somni thuk ngaake. Kasem setouluga badat latnu kaan bi fathom somga impaang dou lat rwe.
Haba nung bi anina li ga lung pui lak pi hung kadenglang kachiga li sung bina anchor bali bata rwe, atiga khwa baan swak lang kalum ong ngaake.
Atiyeda li hwannu rwan gana li bina pak dwak lang toga lipui meithaan la anchor batanu katap toga liswan ga tui bi bata lang to ngaake.
Paul na kraanmi razapuba khatle kraanmi rwan khou rinne, “Haba mi nun ga lipui sung bi ong make dabe, nani ding kannu ngam bila rwe.”
Haba nung bi kraan mi nunna rui ga tanchatluga li ga bathan thang rwe.
Atiga khwa baan swakna Paul na bani khangsung ding thaisaak sa lang rin rwe, “Nani nun khatchale sa in makka riangrega ngaak hungnu aniyana ni somga bali tang rwe.
Atibriakpina eina nani ding sa in lang hweinuwe. Balangbe hagana nani ring lang nge. Nani pakhatcha lu bina sam sang khat tangga chunta bilaye.”
Maanna hei bing nga rinluga uilu louluga bani khangsung meithaan bi Rikrwang ding swanka rwe. Maanna haga thiak bakluga sa rwe.
Atiga bani khangsung lungning pi thou thangga sa bacham rwe.
Atiga ani lipui twang bachamnu mi sing ga raza ni somsiariga karuk ngaake.
Banina sa in taangnu kaan bi lipui ga zaang langna bani om gehu ga tuipui bi bazwan sat rwe.
Khwa baan swaknu kaan bi bani haba taram ga bapu theilan rwe. Atiyeda banina lungtasi daam khat amnu muluga habei ga zaye dabe bani lipui ga hung han lang baning ngaake.
Banina anchor ga tui bi bataluga barui sut sat rwe. Pwan ga laam thouluga tuikom bi lungtasi daam ga tang lang thiraang ding pi phun se rwe.

Atiyeda tuipui kani hung kamannu riak pi hung tangnu kaan bi lipui ga lungtasi daam bi pak khutluga habei ga khutsu thang drwe khatle li ga kalingnu ngamlan rwe. Atiluga lipui nung la tui kabaapnuna hung bweiluga li ga to bak thou rwe.
Atiga kraanmi rwan gana qwan in mi nun ding tui kalaapluga pak dwak thou damnu zaye diga bani ding athat sat lang chong katu ngaak rwe.
Atiyeda kraanmi razapuba gana Paul ding kan thang langna banina to ongnu ding ga khaam rwe. Atiga tui kalaap theinu maan gana li bina kachakta kamaluga tui paan la swak lang zathang pi ngaake.
Atiga katei bing gana lipui om thingbak thing tut pi twangluga takan swak lang chongtan pi rwe. Atiga bani khangsung tui paan la dwak swak rwe.
Atiga banina dwak swaknu kaan bi tuikoi ram ga Malta ye dinu thei rwe.
Haram rwan gana ani ding tasiatnu kriang kriang thangnu ga tamang make. Balangbe mei to thouluga khwa sunluga kasik nangnu ani ding loukhut thang rwe.
Paul na thing khwapluga mei bi thangnu kaan bi mei kaphuk ka briakpina dintu khat swakluga Paul kut pi kabet rwe.

Atiga dintu gana bakut pi bakhai ongnu ga haram rwanna muluga bani khatna khat khou rinne, “Balumsia lang maak rwe, manpa heiya mi athatnu mi zung nge. Maan tuipui bina dwak swak ngaak peida, bazenu chongtok kana bating ring lang za thang lan rwe.”
Atiyeda maanna dintu ding ga mei bi kathing thang rwe, atiga maan khatchale liam mak ngaake.

Banina maan pwan thou luzung rwe mak tabe maan barapka thiluga balumta luzung rwe diga baning ngaake. Atiyeda banina bakhwa seiga phaang ongnu kaan bi maan khatchale liam maknu ga muluga bani sung kale rwe. Atiga “Maan ri zung rwe” diga banina rin ngaake.
Atiga haba tuikoi ram kim bi Publius tiga kounu kaliannu tuikoi rampuba khat am ngaake. Maanna ani ding kriang takka loukhut thangluga ni thum bakhou pi riak thang rwe.
Habei ga Publius pa bakhun ga khatle thi etka naa ong ngaake. Atiga Paul na hungluga balaang khut kalum thang rwe khatle Paul na bakhou kut kaising thangnu kaan bi maan sa drwe.
Atiga to thangnu nung tuikoi ram bi kasa kanaa amnu rwan bing le bakim bi hung rwe. Atiga bani ding pi sa thang ngaake.
Banina ani ding takung tazei to takka to thang rwe. Atiga ani nun bani khouna kapaangna ani lang bathaang amnu pot bing le pi thang rwe.
Tha thum nung bi li thot Ka Ngaphinnu unao pat ni diga kounu Alexandria lipui bina tuikoi ram bi sikpha hungnei ngaaknu lipui bi ani twang hung rwe.
Atiga ani Syracus pi hung tangluga habei ga ni thum hungnei rwe.
Habei gana anina se koi hungluga Rhegium namlian bi hung tang rwe. Kani khat nung bi kathwei pek lana thiraang raang hung rwe. Haba nung inswan lampai ani Puteoli bi hung rwe.
Habei ga ani balumsanu unao rwan ding kadou rwe. Banina ani ding ni siari bani khou neita lang bathem rwe. Haba nung ani Rome la se ngaake.

Unao rwanna ani cham theinu kaan bi ani ding “Appius Keithian” khatle “Bazin in Inthum” diga kounu riak tangga swak kadou rwe. Paul na bani ding munu kaan bi Rikrwang ding swanka rwe khatle sung thou rwe.

Atiga ani Rome bi hung tangnu kaan bi kraanmi razapuba gana qwan in mi nun ding rangkaan om kraan puba khou sin thang rwe. Atiyeda Paul dingna rangkaan thangluga kraanmi nun le diga ong bacham dam lang za thang rwe.

Ni thum nung bi Paul na Jihudi rwan ding kai thangnu nun kou kadoi ngaake. Banina hung kadoinu kaan bi maanna bani khou rinne, “Unao rwan ga, eina mi nun maitwang bi mak tabe ani pu pa rwanna se ong ngaaknu chaang om maitwang bi kasianu chwan tonu maak peida ating qwan in mi toga Jerusalem bi Rome rwan kut pi pi swak thang rwe.
Banina ating tamphaangluga bathan sat lang baning ngaake. Balangbe ating athat lang khopnu koi maak ngaake.
Atiyeda Jihudi rwanna amaitwang bi chong kabia briakpina eina Caesar khou chong phun thang ngaake. Heiya eina achaat mi nun lu chung bi koi impu thang langna tonu make.
Atibriakpina eina hei lang bi nani ding kadouluga kabia lang amme diga kounu rwe. Balangbe Israel rwan bachun om lang bi ating parei ruina bang thang ongme.”
Habei ga Jihudi rwanna bakhou rinne, “Ani Judea lana nalang bi chamthwan lousu mak ngaake. Atiga unao rwan pakhatchanale hungluga impu thangnu khatle nalang bi kasianu hung kabianu le maake.
Atiyeda bani nun om lang bi ga nangna baningnu pa-aambo dinu nakhouna ani ngai nwamme. Balangbe bariak bathin mi nunna haba mi doi om maitwang bi chong kabianu anina ngaisu rwe.”

Banina balaang lumik khat kak thangnu ni bakaong riak pi mi taswang khak hung rwe. Habei ga Paul na Rikrwang om krwang talei lang bi khatle Moses om chongtan bina khatle thiamting rwan chong bina Jisu om lang bi rin thang ngaaknu bing ga bani khou louthwanna thouga khwazinren tangga bani ding bathemga khatle cheksinga bachu thang rwe.
Atiga rin thangnu chong ga mi kasemna balumsa rwe atiyeda mi kasemnaba balumsa mak ngaake.
Bani lak pi za kale maknu kaan bi bani kapaang drwe. Habei ga Paul na bani khou chong khat rinne, “Haga Katha Bathiangnuna thiamting Isaiah paan bina ani pu pa rwan khou rin thang ngaak rwe.
“Atiga rinne, ‘Heiba mi nun khouwa seluga rinno, “Nanina ngai bi ngaisulune atiyeda bakaba theilaye, Khatle nanina munu ga bakaba khatchale theilaye.

Balangbe mi nun mikna munu, Bani kanana ngaisunu, Bani lungningna theinu, Kanei khut latnu, Khatle eina bani ding pi sa lang za mak lang, Heiba mi nun om sung pi inde rwe. Bani kana set rwe, Khatle bani mik inmu rwe.” ’
“Atibriakpina heiya nanina thei ding ngo dinuba Rikrwang om ringriak ka Gentile rwan khou le pi thang rwe khatle banina ha ding ga ngailune.”
Maanna heiba chong bing nga rinnu nung Jihudi rwan ga thou drwe khatle bani lak pi kae kanaanu taswang khak swak ngaak rwe.
Haba nung bi Paul om basonu in bi sangwan ni ong ngaake. Atiga bakhou hungnu mi bing ding maanna lou thang ngaake.
Atiga pakhatchanale bating khaamnu to makka sung raangga maanna Rikrwang om krwang talei lang bi kasam ngaake khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa om lang bi bachu thang ngaake.
Jisu Christa om swak, chonglang to lang kou swak thangnu khatle Rikrwang om sacham kasam lang lang swak thangnu Paul na heiba chamthwanna hiaknuwe.
Sacham gazo meithaan Rikrwang na Baom thiamting rwan paan bina Maanna kamaga bathiangnu chongdip pi karen thang rwe.
Hagazo Sa Kapaisa ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa lang biye. Maan misa pum nung suiga David om kik taat pi pon rwe.
Bathiangnu Katha nung suiga Pukraangba ga thi bina ring thou latnu paan bina ngam le bachamga Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dinu indao thang rwe. Haga ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa ye.
Bameng lang chungna chaat bing khou balumsanu om chong zeinu phunhung lang Bapaan bina anina phaangkriang khatle chonglang tonu om pham lousu rwe.
Jisu Christa na kou thangnu mi chaat bing lak pi ani le suinu rwe.

Rikrwang na kriangnu khatle bathiangnu mi rwan to lang kou thang damnu Rome bi ongnu nani mi bing khou, ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.
Kama bi eina nani mi bing lang chungna Jisu Christa paan bina Rikrwang ding swanne. Balangbe talei ram bariak bing bi nani om balumsat lang bi rin kazan ongme.
Balangbe eina hweininu bakaan bing bi eina nani meng panga kalum ongme dinu eina Basa Kapaisa om sacham chwan bi sung khutka chwanlaang to ongnu Rikrwang na aom sake rwe.
Rikrwang na baningnu paan bi ei bataang la upai kasem toluga nani khou hung lang alaang lampui lat thang lang ei chat makka kalum ongme.
Balangbe nanina tipka hanza lang Katha leithwan kasem nani khou eina pi thang langna nani ding kadou lang ngaak ongme.
Hagazo ei nani lak pi ongnu kaan bi nani ding le ating le bachamga nani ding aom balumsatna khatle ating nani om balumsatna sung pi thou thang kale lang nge.

Unao rwan ga, ei nani khou hung lang chat makka karamga hung ngaake atiyeda atun tangga khamnamnu ammaang nge dinu nanina thei maknu ei bathai make. Eina hung nwamnu langbe Gentile rwan khouna bakraa kasem lousunu ga danga nani khouna le bakraa kasem lousu lang naye.
Greek rwan khou le, barbaros rwan khou le, ningtingnu khatle ningting maknu bing khou ei lei chaak ongme.
Atibriakpina ei ngamnu bing Rome bi ongnu nani khou le sacham kasam lang daan ongme.
Balangbe sacham lang bi ei kazak make, balangbe haga balumsanu mi bingna ringriak lousu lang Rikrwang om ngamme. Haga kama bi Jihudi rwan lang nge khatle Greek rwan lang le rwe.

Balangbe heiba sacham bi Rikrwang khouna ririak senu ga indao thang rwe, ririak senu ga thounu bina loinu tangga balumsanu om paan naye. Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Ririak senu maan gana balumsat paan bina ringlune.”
Balangbe minun om ririak se maknuna bazenu ding khaamnu, Rikrwang ding kachi maknu khatle ririak se maknu mi bing maitwang bi Rikrwang om balung pwan tambaan lana indaowe.
Balangbe Rikrwang na bani khou pi mu thang briakpina Rikrwang om langbi thei zanu ga bani khou pi thei thang rwe.

Balangbe talei ram dam bina thouga mikna phaangmu ngam maknu Baom thot gong bing ga bathiangga pi mu thang rwe, Rikrwang om tonu khwa seinu ngam khatle Rikrwang om chaang ga dam thang damnu kutthiam bing paan bina theinu ngam rwe, atibriakpina bani nun lang dwak zanu lampui maake.

Balangbe banina Rikrwang ding thei beida Rikrwang khat tanga banina Bating lwat pi lian make mak tabe Bating swan make. Atiyeda bani om baning ga bathaang maaknu imbei hung rwe khatle bani om kapangnu sung baning ding pi zing rwe.
Bani cham ningtingnu mi nunne diluga kapangnu to rwe.
Banina braan latlanu Rikrwang om lwat ting braan zanu misa om, basaa nun om, baket bali phunnu khouring bing om khatle babonna katwannu khouring bing om dannu katha bi pi gon rwe.
Atibriakpina bani sung om bathainu nung suiga bathiang maknu ga to lang Rikrwang na bani ding bathan thang rwe. Haba om langna banina bani cham lak pi bani bani om pum ding takung tazei mak lang nge.

Balangbe Rikrwang om bazenu le bani om chong karwaknu le diga takhe rwe. Atiga khwa seiga swanka dingnu Damthangnu Bapuba om bahut pi dam thang damnu pot ting kalum rwe khatle chwanlaang to rwe. Amen.

Atibriakpina Rikrwang na bani ding pum om kazak zanu boulaanu chwan to lang bathan thang rwe, balangbe bani om kamaisa rwanna banina to dingnu chaang ding bathan satluga bachaang maknu gong bi gon swak rwe.

Hadanga kapaisa rwanna le kamaisa rwan le bachaang toga barui bazem amnu ga bathan sat rwe. Atiga khatna khat khou bani om bathainu gana mei rounu danga kapaisa le kapaisa cham kazaknu chwan to rwe. Atiga banina to damnu kazaknu chwan om bakraa ga bani bahakna lousu rwe.
Bani sung bi theinu bingna Rikrwang ding thang nwam mak briakpina, banina to hoi maknu chwan bing ga to lang Rikrwang na bani ding sa maknu lungning bi bathan thang rwe.
Atiga bani ririak se maknuna sipluga lungkoi lungmaannu, sa maknu, antiamnu, sa maknu sung, raaamnuna sipnu, mi athatnu, kabit kamainu, minamnu, kasianu sungna sip ngaake. Bani tu tu tam tamnu rwan,
rin basiat kalenu, Rikrwang ding batannu, kaphu kaphenu, lian tonu, phun liannu, noh chaat kathan to lang phun swaknu, nu pa chong zei maknu nun,
bakaba thei maknu nun, balumsa lang khop maknu nun, kriang thei maknu nun, kok thang thei maknu nun khatle phaangkriang maaknu mi nunne.
Heiba chwan bachaang toga tonu mi nunna thi lang khopnuwe dinu Rikrwang om ririak senu chongsem ga thei ngaak peida haga bahak tonuza makka, haga bachaang tonu mi nun le diga za thang nge.

Atibriakpina he misa, mi katei ding chong kasem ongnu nalaang dwak lang maake. Balangbe nangna katei rwan ding chong kasem ongnu chongtan gana nazanna nazan ding kakoinu bi pi ta rwe. Balangbe chong kasem ongnu nangna haga rin ongnu ga bahak to rwe.
Hei dannu chwan tonu nun maitwang bi Rikrwang om chongsem ga bazenu nung suinuwe dinu anina theiye.
Hapai chwan ga bachaang toga tonu nun ding chong kasem ongnu khatle ha bahak ka to ongnu he misa nang, nang Rikrwang om chongsem bina dwak khope diga baningbo?
Rikrwang om kasanu gana nating sung pi le thang nge dinu thei makka nangna Baom bakalan maaknu kasanu gong, khaang theinu khatle khwa seiga khaangnu ding ga baiga baningbo?
Atiyeda nasung natnu khatle sung le nwam maknu nung suiga, Rikrwang om balung pwan lumik lang khatle bazenu chongsem ga indao thang dingnu lang balung pwan nalaang pei thang rwe.
Rikrwang na “Mi bing lang maan maanna to damnu chwan nung suiga pi thanglune.”
Kasanu chwan tonu bi khaang theinu, lwat liannu, takungnu khatle braan lanu ding zongnu bani lang maanna khwa sei ringnu pi thanglune.
Atiyeda balaangza baloinu khatle bazenu ding zei makka, ririak se maknu ding zeinu nun lu chung bi balung pwan khatle sung sounu ga pi thanglune.
Sa maknu chwan tonu mi bing lu chung bi riangre kanangnu khatle sung riangrenu ga pi thanglune. Haga kamanu bi Jihudi rwan khouwe khatle Greek rwan khou leye.
Atiyeda kasanu chwan to ongnu mi bing khou lwat liannu, takungnu khatle dai bazaangnu ga pi thanglune. Haga kamanu bi Jihudi rwan khouwe khatle Greek rwan khou leye.
Balangbe Rikrwang khou kathing aih tonu maake.
Balangbe chongtan sui makka noh tonu mi bing ga chongtan sui makka braanlune khatle chongtan thwei bi noh tonu mi bing ding chongtanna chong kasemlune.
Balangbe chongtan ding ngainu banina Rikrwang meithaan bi bazenu make atiyeda chongtan ga to ongnu bani ding pi baze thanglune.
Balangbe chongtan maaknu Gentile na chongtan chwan ga bachaang toga towe dabe, bani om chongtan maak ngaak peida bani nun bahak ka chongtan zo rwe.

Habei ga bani sung bi hiak thang damnu chongtan om chwan ga banina indao rwe; atiga bani om kakoi baze theinu sung gana sake to rwe. Bani sungna khat le khat za kale makka koi impu thang kaleye khatle bani ding kok thang nge.
Heiya chongsem lumik pi eina sacham kasam ongnu nung suiga mi nun om inkamnu ding ga Jisu Christa paan bina Rikrwang na chong tolune.
Atiyeda nangna Jihudi rwanne diga rinne dabe, chongtan bi hai thangluga Rikrwang khou lian towe dabe;
Rikrwang na baningnu ga theiye dabe, chongtanna bachu thang damnu gana sa inkunu pot bing ga kathang swaknu ngamme dabe;
nangna nang bahak mik chonu nun ding lampui kainuwe khatle kazingnu riak pi ongnu nun om babaanne dinu bathiangga balumsaye dabe,
nangna chongtan bi ningting khatle bazenu gong ga amga kapangnu rwan ding bachu thang nge dabe khatle katha bi naosen tonu nun ding bachuthangnupa towe dabe,
mi katei ding bachu thangnu nang, naraanto nating bachu thang makkabo? Barusa mak ting gaye diga kasamnu nang, nangna barusanubo?
Rwan mei rwan basan laan mako” diga rinnu nang, rwan mei rwan basan laannubo? Ri katha ding batannu nang, kalum in bina barusabo?
Chongtan lang bi lian tonu nang, chongtan ding to bakluga Rikrwang ding takung maknubo?
Balangbe hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Nani riak pina Gentile lak pi Rikrwang meng ding rin basiat rwe.”
Balangbe nangna chongtan ga zeiye dabe mun romnu ga batak takka tongnuwe. Atiyeda nangna chongtan ga zei make dabe, nang mun romnu ga, mun rom maknu imbei rwe.
Atibriakpina mun rom maknu maan gana chongtan om bazenu ding ga zeiye dabe, mun rom maknu bating ga mun romnu bi chak thang bilabo?
Pum bi mun rom maknu pakhatna chongtan ding zeiye dabe, hiak thangnu chongtan amnu khatle mun romnu nangna chongtan zei make dabe maanna nating chong kasem bilabo?
Balangbe bapaan la Jihudi rwan tonu maan ga Jihudi make khatle pum bi bapaan la mun romnu ga mun romnu make.
Atiyeda basung lana Jihudi tonu maan ga Jihudi ye khatle hiak thangnu gana makka, katha na sung bi mun romnu ga mun romnuwe; atiga bating rinswannu ga mi nun khouna make, Rikrwang khou naye.
Ati dabe Jihudi rwan lang pa-aam tongnu ambo? Mak tabe mun romnuna pa-aam tongnu ambo?
Balang bing bi tamga amme. Kamanu bi bani khou Rikrwang chong ga sin thang ngaake,
balangbe mi kasemna balumsa make dabe pa-aam swaklu dingbo? Bani om balumsa maknu gana Rikrwang om balumsa lang khopnu ding khatchale bathaang maaknu pi tone gabo?

Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Mi bingza chong karwaknu ngaak peida Rikrwang be bazenu to ding ngo. Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Nachong paan bina nating pi baze thang lang, Khatle nating chong kasem bi nangna ngam lang nge.”

Atiyeda ani om ririak se maknu gana Rikrwang om bazenu ding pi mu thang nge dabe ani pa-aam rin langbo? Balung pwanna takhum baannu Rikrwang ga ririak se maknu rugabo? Heiya eina misa chaang toga rinnuwe.
Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Ati dabe Rikrwang na talei ram ding tatoga chong kasem langbo?
Balangbe “Aom chong karwaknu gana Rikrwang om bazenu ding indaoga balwat pi lianne dabe, atun tangga ating le noh mi danga chong kasem ongnu pa-aam langbo?”

Mi kasemna ani om lang bi rin basiatnu khatle mi kasem nabe “Kasanu swak lang anina kasianu tozo” diga anina rinne diga rinnu danga anina pa-aam toga rin mak tingbo? Bani ding koi impu thangnu heiya bazeye.
Ati dabe pa-aambo? Ani bani ma inkuga sanurubo? Haga khatchale baze make. Balangbe Jihudi rwan le Greek le noh thwei bi amnuwe diga anina nani khou kamaga rin drwe.
Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Ririak senu pakhatcha hakna maake, maake, pakhatcha hakna maake.
Bakaba theinu pakhatcha hakna maake, Rikrwang ding zongnu pakhatcha hakna maake.
Bani mi bingza lampui maan drwe, Bani mi bing ga bathaang maak rwe, Pakhatcha hakna kasanu chwan tonu maake, maake, khatcha hakna maake.”
“Bani krwan ga lat swaknu thaan dan rwe, Bani baleina minamme;” “Bani kanan thwei bi brun hu amme.”
“Bani mun ga taseng khatle kakhaanuna sipe.”
“Thi pi ta lang bani ket zaang nge.
Bani lampui bi braantanu khatle riangre kanangnu amme.
Dai bazaangnu lampui ga banina thei mak ngaake.”
“Bani mikphaang bi Rikrwang ding kachinu maake.”
Chongtanna rinnu bing gana, chongtan thwei bi ongnu mi nun khouwe dinu anina theiye. Heiya mun bing ding khwam thang lang khatle talei ram mi bing ding Rikrwang meithaan bi chong katak pi lang nge.
Atibriakpina chongtan chwan paan bina bamikphaang bi pakhatcha ding le pi baze thanglaye, balangbe chongtan paan bina noh ding bapu thei hung nge.
Atiyeda atunbe chongtan paan bina makka Rikrwang khouna ririak senu ga indao thang rwe. Haga chongtan khatle thiamting rwanna sake pi rwe.
Rikrwang om ririak senu ga Jisu Christa khou balumsanu paan bina balumsanu mi bapum brum khou indao thang rwe. Balangbe teinu khatchale maake.
Balangbe mi bingza noh to rwe khatle Rikrwang lwat liannu bi hung tang lan rwe.
Christa Jisu khou amnu ran swak thangnu paan bina Pukraangba om phaangkriangna bathaam pi baze thang rwe.

Christa ding Bathi bi balumsanu paan bina hungnu pi pemnu rikhaang pot toga Rikrwang na Bating pi swak rwe. Heiya Rikrwang om ririak senu ding pi mu lang nge. Balangbe Rikrwang na khaang sei thangnu paanna kamaga to ngaaknu noh ga Maanna takan swak thang rwe.
Rikrwang na Baom ririak senu ga heiba kaan bi indao thang lang naye. Balangbe Maan heiya bazenu khatle Jisu ding balumsanu mi bing ding pi baze thangnu bapuba pi to lang nge.
Ati dabe lian to lang ingaipai ambo? Lian to lang khatchale maake. Impei chongtannabo? Chwannabo? Khatchale maake; atiyeda balumsanu chongtan paan bi naye.
Balangbe chongtan om chwan sui makka, balumsanu paanna mi ding pi baze thang nge diga anina balumsaye.
Atiga Rikrwang ga Jihudi rwanza om Rikrwang bo? Gentile nun om Rikrwang le makpo? O, Gentile rwan om leye.
Heiya bataknuwe. Rikrwang khatcha briakpina Gentile rwan om Rikrwang leye. Maanna mun romnu ding le mun rom maknu ding le balumsanu paan bina pi baze thanglune.
Ati dabe balumsanu heiyana chongtan ding khatchale bathaang maaknu pi torubo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Haba om hut lang anina chongtan ding pi tip thang nge.
Ati dabe ani pa Abraham na pum nung suiga lousu damnu lang bi anina pa-aam rin dingbo?
Balangbe bating bachwan paan bina pi baze thang nge dabe, maan lian to lang amme; atiyeda haga Rikrwang meithaan bibe make.
Balangbe Bathiangnu Chongdipna pa-aam rin thangbo? Atiga rinne, “Abraham na Rikrwang ding balumsa rwe, hagana bating ririak senu diga basing chak thang rwe.”
Mi pakhatna chwan tonu kaan bi baom lo man ga leithwan make atiyeda phangnu zek swaknuwe diga chak thang nge.
Chwan sui maknu atiyeda Rikrwang ding kachi maknu nun ding pi baze thangnu Bating balumsanu ding ga baom balumsat kana ririak senu diga chak thang rwe.
Chwan sui makka Rikrwang na mi pakhat ting ririak senu diga chak thangnu maan ga aih sanuwe diga David na rin thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe,
“Bani om chongtan thouto maknu chwan bing ding kok thang damnu Khatle bani om noh bing ding thinlem thang damnu mi nun ga aih sanuwe,
Pukraangba na noh impu thangla dingnu maan ga aih sanuwe.”
Hei dannu rithoiya mun romnu nun lang zamo mak tabe mun rom maknu mi nun lang lebo? Balangbe balumsanu paan bina Abraham ding ririak senu diga chak thang rwe diga anina rinne.
Ati dabe haga tatoga chak thangnubo? Bating mun rom maknu meithaan namo mak tabe mun romnu nung nabo? Haga mun romnu nungna make, mun rom mak balei naye.

Maanna mun rom maknu meithaan balumsat om ririak senu seal ga mun romnu badan toga phang ngaake. Haga mun rom mak ngaak peida balumsanu mi bing om pa to lang chungna khatle ririak senu ga le bani khou chak thang za lang naye.
Atiga mun romnu nun om pa za makka atiyeda ani pa Abraham na maan mun rom mak balei bakhou amnu balumsat ket kaam bi senu bing om mun romnu pa to lang nge.
Balangbe Abraham khatle baom kik taat rwanna talei ram rakhum lwaknu mi tolune diga karen thang ngaaknu ga chongtan paan bina make atiyeda haga balumsat om ririak senu paan bi naye.
Balangbe chongtan zeinu paan bina rakhum lwaknu mi towe dabe balumsat ka bathaang pi maak thang nge khatle chong ren ga le bakaba pi maak thang nge.
Balangbe chongtanna balung pwan phun hung nge. Atiyeda chongtan maaknu riak pi chongtan ding to bak nu le maake.

Atibriakpina chongren ga chongtan bi hai thang ongnu nun zakhou makka ani mi bingza pa to ongnu Abraham om balumsanu nung suiga ongnu kik taat bing khou pi tip thang lang rakhum lwaknu mi ga phaangkriang nung suiga balumsat paan bi naye.

Heiya hiak thangnu ga dannuwe, “Eina nating chaat taswang khak pa pi to thang rwe.” Maan heiya maanna balumsa damnu Rikrwang om meithaan bi ani pa ye. Rikrwang gabe thinu nun ding ringnu pi thangnu khatle ka maaknu pot bing ding kouluga pi am thangnu Rikrwang nge.
Bachunnu maak ngaak peida Abraham na bachun amga balumsa ngaake. Balangbe heiya “Naom kik taat ka ati lune” diga balang bi rin thang damnu ga danga, maanna chaat taswang khak pa to rwe.
Bapum thinu danrunu (balangbe maan sangwan raza khak ngaak rwe) khatle Sarah om kathinu dannu nao khao riak ka kakhannu kaan bi maan balumsanu bi sonta make.
Atiga Rikrwang om chongren lang bi balumsia mak ngaake atiyeda Rikrwang ding lwat pi lianga balumsanu bi lian thou damme.
Rikrwang na karen thang damnu ga maanna tonu ngamme diga Abraham na batak takka balumsa damme.
Atibriakpina “Haba balumsat ka ririak senuwe diga balaang chak thang rwe.”
Abraham ding ririak senu diga basing chak thang rwe. Heiya baraantoza lang hiaknu make.
Atiyeda ani lang leye; balangbe ani Pukraangba Jisu ding thinu nun lak pina pi ring thou thangnu bating balumsanu ani ding le ririak senuwe diga basing chak thanglune.
Bating ani koi maan riak pina thinu bi pi swak rwe khatle ani ding pi baze thang briakpina Bating thi bina pi ring thou thang rwe.
Atibriakpina balumsanuna ani ding pi baze thang briakpina, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bina Rikrwang le ani dai bazaangga ongme.
Ani om kahan riak to ongnu phaangkriang bi ga balumsanuna Bapaan bina lampui am rwe. Atiga Rikrwang om lwat liannu ga ani om bachunnu to briakpina ani karowe.
Haza make atiyeda anina riangre kanangnu bi le karowe, balangbe riangre kanangnuna khaang theinu phun hung nge,
khaang theinuna kasanu khei khatle kasanu kheina bachunnu phun hung nge
khatle bachunnuna sung pi inkhin make, balangbe ani khou pi thang damnu Katha Bathiangnu paan bina ani sung bi Rikrwang om kriang ga bunta thang rwe.
Balangbe anina batok maakka ongnu kaan bi bakaan chaga Rikrwang ding kachi maknu mi nun lang Christa na thi thang rwe.
Balangbe kasanu mi pakhat lang tupai pakhatna sung raangga thi thang za ngaakle ririak senu mi pakhat lang mi khatna thi thangnu dinuwa kungnuwe.
Atiyeda anina noh mi to ongnu kaan bi Christa na ani lang chungna thi thangnu gana Rikrwang na Baom kriang ding ani khou indao thang rwe.
Atibriakpina haza makka inkuga, Bathina ani ding pi baze thang briakpina Bapaanna ani ding Babalung pwan bina kan thanglune.

Balangbe anina Rikrwang om munanu toga ongnu kaan bi Basa Kapaisana thi thangnu paan bina ani ding Rikrwang le diga pi taman thang nge dabe, pi taman thangluga Baom ringnu om paanna intia lang ani ding inkuga kan thang dingnu!
Haza makka ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bina Rikrwang khou ani karowe. Atiga Jisu Christa paan bina ani ding pi taman thangnu ga lousu rwe.
Atibriakpina mi khat om lang bina talei ram bi noh khutnu khatle noh om langna thinu khutnu danga thinu ga mi bing khou kazan swak rwe. Balangbe mi bingna noh to rwe.
Balangbe chongtan ga pi thang mak baleina talei ram bi noh am ngaak rwe. Atiyeda chongtan ga maaknu kaan bi noh ding ga chak thang make.
Atiyeda thinuna Adam khouna Moses tangga paan rwe. Adam na chongtan to baknu ga le bachamga noh to maknu mi nun lu chung bi tangga thinuna paan ngaake. Adam ga hung dingnu Baom badanne.

Atiyeda bathaam leithwan gabe koi maan dannu make, balangbe mi pakhat om koi maanna mi taswang khak thiye dabe Rikrwang om phaangkriang khatle Mi Pakhat om dinuba, Jisu Christa om phaangkriangna pinu leithwan ga mi taswang khak khou inkuga, sipsaga pi thang rwe.

Haba leithwan ga mi khatna noh tonu bina hungnu ga dannu make. Balangbe noh om lang bi chong kasemnu gana koi impu thangnu phun hung rwe. Atiyeda koi maan taswang khak nung bi hungnu bathaam leithwan gana pi baze thangnu phun hung nge.

Balangbe mi khat om chongtan zei maknu langna, thinuna mi khat om paanna krwang danga paanne dabe phaangkriang khatle ririak senu om leithwan sipsaga lousu damnu nunna, mi khat dinuba Jisu Christa paan bina inkuga ringnu bi krwang danga paanlu dingbo!
Atibriakpina mi khat om koi maan lang bina mi bing lu chung bi chongsem hungnu ga danga, Mi khat om ririak senu chwan paan bina le mi bing ding ring lang pi baze thangnu bi kai thang rwe.
Balangbe mi khat om chong zei maknu riak pina mi taswang khak ting noh mi pi tonu danga, Mi khat om chong zeinu paan bina le mi bing ding ririak senu pi to thanglune.
Hei bing chung bi koi maan tam inku thou langna chongtan le hung rwe. Atiyeda noh inkunu riak pi ga phaangkriang le taswang khak inku ka late.
Heiya thinu bi nohna krwang paannu danga, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om langna khwa sei ringnu bi ririak senu om paanna phaangkriangna krwang danga paan lang nge.
Ati dabe atun ani pa-aam kabiazobo? Phaangkriang tam inku lang ani noh toga ong maangzobo?
Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Noh pek la thi damnu anina habei ga tatoga ong ting ting dinggabo?
Mak tabe Jisu Christa om thinu bi baptize to damnu ani mi bingna Baom thinu bi baptize to rwe dinu nani thei makpo?

Atibriakpina baptize tonu paan bina ani ding Christa le bachamga thinu bi ui bacham thang rwe. Heiya Bapa om lwat liannu paanna Christa ding thinu bina pi ring thou thang damnu danga anina le kum kathan bi lung bacham lang nge.
Balangbe anina Jisu Christa le diga Baom thinu thot pi karung nge dabe, ani le Maan ring thou latnu thot pi soi makka bachamlune.
Noh swak toga ongting ting mak lang mi lui ga Pukraangba le diga cross pi bakhai bacham drwe. Haga noh pum ga braan lang nge dinu anina theiye.
Balangbe thi damnu Bating ga noh bina rang pi to thang rwe.
Atibriakpina Christa le diga thi bachamme dabe, ani Maan le diga ring bachamlune dinu anina balumsaye.
Balangbe thinu nun lak pina Christa ga pi ring thou dam briakpina Maan thi lat la rwe, thinuna Christa lu chung bi paan lat lang ngam maak rwe dinu anina theiye.
Balangbe Jisu Christa na thi damnu thit ka noh pek la bakaan bing lang toga thi leng oweiza ngaake. Atiyeda Maanna ringnu kum ga Rikrwang pek la ringnuwe.
Hadanga nani le batak takka noh pek la thi rwe atiyeda ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou Rikrwang pek la ring ongnuwe diga chak thang ngo.
Atibriakpina nanina sung om bathainu gana rinnu zei mak lang thi zanu nani pum ding noh bi krwang danga pi paan mako.

Nani pum naat ting ga ririak se maknu om kutchoi toga noh bi pi swak lat lanro. Atiyeda nani pum ding ga thinu nun lak pina pi ring thounu mi nun toga khatle nani pum naat ka Rikrwang khou ririak senu om kutchoi toga Rikrwang khou kat swako.
Balangbe nohna nani ding pi ngam lat mak tingnu rwe, balangbe nani chongtan thwei bi ongnu make atiyeda phaangkriang thwei bi ongnuwe.
Ati dabe pa-aam tozobo? Ani chongtan thwei bi ong makka phaangkriang thwei bi ong briakpina ani noh to dingnubo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo.

Nanina thinu pi swaknu noh swak ngaakle mak tabe ririak senu pi swaknu chong zeinu swak ngaakle, nanina nani zan ding swak toga tudannu pakhat khou pi swake dabe nanina chong zeiga ongnu baom swak to rwe dinu nani thei makpo?
Atiyeda Rikrwang ding swankaye balangbe nani nun meithaan noh swak to ngaak peida nani khou bachoi thang damnu bachu thangnu ding ga nani sung khutka zei rwe.
Atiga nani ding noh bina rang pi to thangluga ririak senu swak pi to thang rwe.

Nani pum bi sonnu ga am briakpina eina misa chaang toga rinnuwe, balangbe nanina bathiang maknu khatle chongtan thouto maknu bi, chongtan inkuga thouto mak lang swak tanga nani pum naat bing ding pi swak ngaaknu danga, bathiangnu to lang ririak senu swak toga nani pum naat bing atun pi swako.
Balangbe nani nun noh om swak to ong bi nani ririak senu pek la rang to ngaake.
Atun nanina kazak ongnu chwan bing om lang bi, nani khou pa-aam tongnu lousu dambo? Balangbe haba chwan bing om kraabe thinuwe.
Atiyeda atunba noh bina nani ding rang pi to thangluga Rikrwang swak rwan pi to thangru briakpina, nanina baloi ongnu bakraa gana bathiangnu pi swake khatle haba om kraabe khwa sei ringnuwe.
Balangbe noh om lo manbe thinuwe atiyeda Rikrwang om leithwan gabe ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou khwa sei ringnuwe.
Unao rwan ga, misana ring ong basaan chongtanna nani lu chung bi ngam amme dinu nani thei makpo? Heiya eina chongtan theinu mi nun khou rinnuwe.
Balangbe babasan amnu kamaisa ga babasanna ring basaan, chongtanna babasan khou bang thang ongnuwe. Atiyeda babasan gana thi damme dabe bating tazwan bahwannu om chongtan bina rang pi to thang rwe.

Atiga babasan ring ongnu kaan bi kamaisa khatna kapaisa khat khou kalaake dabe bating rwan basan laannu diga kou rwe atiyeda babasanna thi damme dabe chongtan bina maan rang to rwe; atiga maan kapaisa katei khou kalaak peida rwan basan laannu lan rwe.

Hadanga he unao rwan ga, nani nun Mi khat om dinuba, thinu nun lak pina ring thou damnu Pukaangba om to langna, nani le Christa pum paan bina nani ding le chongtan pek la pi thi rwe. Haga anina Rikrwang langna bakraa kraa lang nge.
Balangbe ani nun zanti pum om chaang bi lung ongnu kaan bi chongtanna pi swaknu noh om bathainuna thinu kraa kraa lang ani pum om naat pi chwan to ong ngaake.
Atiyeda ani ding bang thang ngaaknu chongtan bi thiru briakpina, atunba chongtan bi gana bathan thang rwe; atiga anina chongtan lui bina makka, Katha om kum kathan bi bating chwanlaang to lang naye.

Ati dabe ani pa-aam rin dingbo? Chongtan ga nohbo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo; atiyeda chongtan paan bina makka ei noh ding bapu thei mak ngaak tingnuwe. Atiga rinne, “Nang ra-aam mako” diga chongtanna rin thang make dabe ei ra-aamnu ding thei mak ngaak tingnuwe.
Atiyeda zathang paan bina nohna badou chanu louluga ra-aamnu bachaat bing bi ating kachui thang rwe; balangbe chongtan maake dabe noh ga thinuwe.
Balangbe ei bakaan khat pi chongtan sui makka ring ong ngaake atiyeda zathang ga hungnu kaan bi noh ga ring thou rwe khatle ei thi rwe.
Atiga ringnu pi thang dingnu zathang ga alaangba thinu pi swak rwe.
Balangbe nohna zathang om badou chanu louluga ating minam rwe khatle hagana ating athat rwe.
Atibriakpina chongtan ga bathiang nge khatle zathang ga bathiang nge, bazeye khatle saye.

Ati dabe kasanu gana ating pithi lang tonubo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Atiyeda noh ga nohwe dinu pi thei lang kasanu om paanna noh gana akhou thinu pi swak rwe. Atiga zathangna noh dinu heiya heitia lang siaye dinu pi muwe.
Balangbe chongtan ga katha omme dinu anina theiye atiyeda eiba noh swak toga zwan sat ngaaknu zanti pum omme.
Balangbe eina to ongnuwa ei bakaba thei make, eina to nwamnu ga eina tonu make. Atiyeda eina batannu ga eina towe.
Eina to nwam maknu ga eina towe dabe, chongtan ga sanuwe dinu chongtan ding ei zaye.
Atiyeda atun eina to ongnu heiya eina make atiyeda haga akhou am ongnu noh ga naye.
Balangbe akhou dinuba aom zanti pum bi kasanu khatchale maake dinu ei theiye. Kasanu to lang baningnu akhou amme atiyeda kasanu chwan to lang balampui ei zongsu make.
Balangbe eina to nwamnu kasanu ga ei to make atiyeda eina to nwam maknu kasianu ga eina towe.
Atiga eina to nwam maknu ga eina towe dabe, to ongnu ga eina make atiyeda haga akhou amnu noh ga naye.
Atiga eina kasanu to nwamnu kaan bi sa maknu ga ei le diga ong bacham ongme dinu chongpham khat eina lousu rwe.
Balangbe basung la amnu mi nung suiga Rikrwang om chongtan bi ei karowe.

Atiyeda asung baning om maitwang bi chwan to ongnu khatle apum naat sung bi amnu chongtan katei khat eina theiye. Rin ongnu chongtan heiyana ating apum naat bing bi amnu noh chongtan om qwan mi pi to rwe.
He kasonnu bachan sianu ei, thi dingnu apum ding tuna kan thang dingbo?

Heiya ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bi naye diga ei Rikrwang ding swanne. Sung baning nabe Rikrwang om chongtan ding apum bahakna chwanlaang towe. Atiyeda aom zanti pum nabe noh om chongtan ding chwanlaang to ongme.
Atibriakpina atun noh om chaang nung suiga se makka katha nung suiga se ongnu Jisu Christa khou ongnu mi bing ding pi koi thang make.
Balangbe Jisu Christa khou amnu ringnu katha om chongtan gana ating noh khatle thinu om chongtan bina rang pi to thang rwe.
Balangbe zanti pumna pi sonnu, chongtanna tonu ngam maknu ding Rikrwang na Basa Kapaisa ding noh mi thot ting kapwaga noh lang chungna langta thangluga pum bi noh ding kakoinu pi ta rwe.
Hagazo zanti pum nung suiga amnu ga se makka Katha nung suiga senu ani khou chongtan om bathaang amnu ririak senu ga hung tang lang nge.
Balangbe zanti pum nung suiga lungnu nun gana zanti pum om tonu bi bani sung thang nge atiyeda Katha nung suiga lungnu nun gana Katha om tonu bi bani sung thang nge.
Balangbe zanti pum om lang bi baningnu ga thinuwe atiyeda Katha om ding baningnu ga ringnuwe khatle dai bazaangnuwe.
Balangbe zanti pum om lang bi baningnu ga Rikrwang ding munanuwe khatle haga Rikrwang om chongtan thwei bi ongnu make khatle ongnu le ngam make.
Atibriakpina zanti pum bi ongnu gana Rikrwang ding pi pemnu ngam make.
Atiyeda Rikrwang Katha na nani khou ong thang nge dabe, nani zanti pum om chaang bi ongnu make atiyeda Katha bi ongnuwe. Atiga tudannu pakhat khou Christa om Katha ga maake dabe maan Christa om make.
Christa na nani khou ong thang nge dabe noh om lang bina pum ga thi ngaak peida Katha gabe ririak senu paan bina ringnuwe.

Atiyeda Jisu ding thi bina pi ring thou damnu Bakatha gana nani khou ong thang nge dabe, Jisu Christa ding thi bina pi ring thou damnu Rikrwang na nani khou amnu Bakatha paan bina thi zanu nani pum ding le pi ring thou thanglune.
Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, anina lei chaak rwe atiyeda zanti pum om chaang nung suiga ring langna zanti pum om lei chaaknu make.
Balangbe nanina zanti pum om chaang nung suiga lung nge dabe nani thilune atiyeda Katha paan bina nanina pum om chwan ding ga pi thiye dabe nani ringlune.
Balangbe Rikrwang Katha na kai thangnu mi bing ga Rikrwang sa rwanne.
Balangbe nani nun kachinu bi ta thang lang swak tonu katha ga lousunu make atiyeda sa kapaisa pi to thangnu Katha ding ga nanina lousunuwe; atiga Bapaan bina anina “Abba, Apa” diga kou rwe.
Ani Rikrwang sa rwanne dinu Katha Maan Bahakna ani katha le diga karungluga sake pi rwe.

Ani Basa rwan towe dabe rakhum lwaknu mi le to rwe. Ani Rikrwang om rakhum lwaknu mi to rwe khatle Christa le rakhum lwaknu mi to bacham rwe. Atiga Pukraangba le diga riangre kanang khaang bachamme dabe lwat liannu ga maan le diga lou bachamlune.
Balangbe atun kaan riangre kanang khaang ongnu heiya ani khou indao thang dingnu lwat liannu le diga rin kaba lang khopnu make diga eina baning nge.
Balangbe Rikrwang sa rwan ding indao thang dingnu ding ga kaling prip bingna taraan ga ngaak ongme.
Balangbe kaling prip bingna bathaang maaknu thwei bi ongnu heiya baom baom bathainu make. Atiyeda bachunnu le bachamga ba thwei bi pi ongnu heiya Rikrwang na ati dam lang baning bada zung rwe.
Balangbe kaling prip bahak ting le braan dam dingnu swak to ong bina Rikrwang sa rwan om lwat liannu rang tonu bi bathan thanglune.
Balangbe kaling prip bingna atun tangga kakouga khatle nao am nat naa ongme dinu anina theiye.
Haza make atiyeda katha om kamanu kraa lousu damnu ani bahakna le sa kapaisa pi to thangnu dinuba, ani pum ding ran swak thangnu ding taraan ga ngaakka ong bi ani bahak le ani sung bi kakouga ongme.
Balangbe ani ding heiba bachunnu bi kan thang rwe. Atiyeda munu ngamnu bachunnu ga bachunnu make, balangbe mi khatna maanna mu damnu pot langna bachun ong ding gabo?
Atiyeda anina mu maknu ding ga siat siatka bachunne dabe, ani ha langna khaang theinu le bachamga taraan ga ngaak ongme.
Hadanga ani om sonnu bi Katha na le ani ding paang thang rwe, balangbe anina tatoga kalum dingbo thei make. Atiyeda Katha bahak kana rin lang thei makka kakouga ani langna hweini thang ongme.
Sung ding zong ongnu Pukraangba na Katha om sung ga pa-aambo dinu theiye, balangbe Katha gana Rikrwang om baningnu nung suiga bathiangnu mi nun lang hweini thang ongme.
Rikrwang ding kriangnu mi bing lang, Baom baningnu nung suiga kou thangnu bani lang pum brum zana sa lang to swak karung nge dinu anina theiye.
Balangbe Rikrwang na kamaga thei thangnu bani ding Basa Kapaisa thot tan lang kamaga badan thang rwe; atiga Maanna unao rwan bing lak pi natainu sa kapaisa to lang nge.
Maanna kamaga badan ngaaknu nun ding kou le kou thang rwe, kou thangnu nun ding ga Maanna le pi baze thang rwe. Atiga pi baze thang damnu bani ding lwat pi lian thang rwe.
Ati dabe hei bing lang bi anina pa-aam rin langbo? Rikrwang nga ani lang nge dabe tuna ani ding maitwangnu ngam ding gabo?
Basa Kapaisa Bahak ting kan thang makka ani lang pi swak thangnu Maanna Sa Kapaisa ding le diga pot bing ding ani lang bathaam pi thang bilabo?
Rikrwang na kathang swaknu nun lu chung bi tuna koi impu thang dingbo? Pi baze thangnu ga Rikrwang naye.
Koi impu thang dingnu mi ga tubo? Thi thang ngaaknu ga Christa Jisu we khatle haza makka thinu nun lak pina pi ring thouluga Rikrwang kut inchang pek la ongluga ani lang chungna hweini thang ongme.

Ani ding Christa om kriang bina tuna pi kapaang ding gabo? Riangre kanang namo mak tabe sung katopnu namo mak tabe rainu namo mak tabe bu taangnu namo mak tabe sin basoi maaknu namo mak tabe kachinu namo mak tabe kachaak chem namo?
Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Balangbe nalaang chungna ani ding thamlai tarin athat rwe, Ani ding athat tingnu zao nun ding danga chak thang rwe.”
Ati ngaaklena balang bing bi ani ding kriangnu Pukraangba paan bina ani ngamnu nun ma inkuga ngamnu to rwe.
Balangbe eina balumsaye dinuba, thinuna ngaakle, ringnuna ngaakle, tambaan chonglang rwanna ngaakle, kangam nu nunna ngaakle, ngam amnuna ngaakle, am ongnu potna ngaakle, hung dingnu potna ngaakle,
basaangnuna ngaakle kathuknuna ngaakle, dam thangnu pot kateina ngaakle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou amnu Rikrwang om kriang bina ani ding pi kapaang latnu ngamla rwe.
Eina Christa meng bi bataknu rinnuwe, ei chong karwaknu make. Aom kakoi baze theinu sungna le Katha Bathiangnu khou sake piye.
Dinuba ei asung bi riangre taknu khatle chat makka asung naanu amme.
Balangbe pum nung suiga aunao rwan khatle atalei mi nun lang apum bahak pi taseng ta thangnu, Christa khouna kapaang lang bathaiga ei baning ngaake.
Bani ga Israel rwanne, bani sa kapaisa rwan pi to thangnu, lwat, chonghen rwan, chongtan pi thangnu, Rikrwang chwanlaang tonu khatle chongren to thangnu bing ga bani omme.
Atiga pu pa rwan bing ga bani omme, zanti pum nung suiga Christa ga bani khou naye; Maan ga pum brum lu chung bi amnu, khwa seiga swanka dingnu Rikrwang gaye. Amen.
Atiyeda Rikrwang chong ga khatchale maknu dan rwe diga rinnu make. Balangbe Israel kik taat bing Israel rwan karwak make.
Bani Abraham om mikin bina ngaak peida bani mi bingza basa rwan make; atiyeda “Nakik nataat rwan ding Isaac khouna thouga chak thoulune.
Dinuba zanti pum om chaang sa rwan ga Rikrwang sa rwan make atiyeda karen thangnu sa rwan ding ga Abraham om kik taat lang chak thang rwe.”
Balangbe karen thangnu chong ga heiye, “Hei dannu kaan bi ei hunglune khatle Sarah na sa kapaisa khat lousulune.”
Heiza make, Rebecca na le mi khatle dinuba ani pa Isaac le rakhum bachaluga pum rit ngaake.
(Atiyeda pon mak balei banina kasanu kasianu chwan to mak balei kathang swak thangnu nung suiga Rikrwang baning hung tang langna chwanna make atiyeda kou thangnu Pukraangba paan bi naye).
Rebecca khou atiga rinne, “Batangna banao ding chwanlaang tolune.”
Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Ei Jacob ting kriang nge atiyeda Ei Esau ding batanne.”
Ati dabe ani pa-aam rin dingbo? Rikrwang khou kathing aih tonu ambo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo.
Balangbe Rikrwang na Moses khou rinne, “Eina phaangkriang thangnu bating ga phaangkriang thanglune, Eina kriang thang dingnu bating ga kriang thanglune.”
Atibriakpina heiya bathainu balaang le make, pak ongnu balaang le make atiyeda phaangkriang pi mu thang ongnu Rikrwang khou naye.
Balangbe Bathiangnu Chongdipna Pharaoh khou rinne, “Eina nakhou Angam indao lang khatle talei chung bing bi Ameng kasam lang hei bahak langna Eina nating pi basaang thang rwe.”
Atibriakpina Pukraangba Maanna baningnu bating phaangkriang thang nge khatle Maanna sung pi nat thang dingnu bating sung pi nat thang nge.
Ati dabe nangna akhou rinlune, “Rikrwang na pa-aam toga mi nun om koi ding zongnubo? Balangbe Maanna baningnu ding tuna kakhang gabo?”
Atiyeda he misa, Rikrwang maitwang bi chong kataknu nang tubo? Bacha thangnu pot kana bacha thangnu bapuba khou “Nang ating paaam lang atiga bacha thangnubo” diga rin dingbo?
Mak tabe ben bachanu maanna talei imphaannu tum khat pina khat ting takungnu toga choi lang khat ting baiga choi lang bacha lang bakhou ngam amnu makpo?

Rikrwang na Baom balung pwan tak nu ga indao swakluga mi nun khou Baom ngam ga pi thei thang nwam ngaak peida Maanna to mut lang daan thang ngaaknu balung pwan ben ga Maanna taswang khak khaang theiga khaang thang rwe.
Heiya lwat langna Maanna kamaga daan thang ngaaknu phaangkriang om ben nun khou Baom balim balei amnu phaangkriang ga Maanna pi mu lang nge.
Balangbe Maanna ani ding Jihudi rwan lak cha bina makka Gentile rwan lak pina le kou thang rwe.
Maanna Hosea om chongdip pi le atiga rin thang nge, “Ami nun mak ngaaknu ding Ami nun diga koulune, Khatle kriang thang maknu bating kriangnu diga koulune.”
“Atiga swaklune dinuba bani khou, ‘Nani Ami nun make’ diga rin damnu riak bahak pi ga, Bani ding ‘Ringnu Rikrwang sa rwan diga koulune.”
Isaiah na le Israel rwan lang bi atiga pao ong ngaake, “Israel sa rwan mi sing ga tuipui lungtasi za dan ngaak peida, Balei thangnu mi nun za ding kan thangne.
Balangbe Pukraangba na Baom chwan loi thanglune. Ririak senu bi haga pi toi thanglune. Balangbe Pukraangba na talei ram bi barapnu chwan tolune.”

Isaiah na meithaan atiga rin thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Kraanmi rwan om Pukraangba na ani lang kik taat thangsia mak ngaake dabe, Ani Sodom dan ngaak tingnuwe, Khatle Gomorrah le bacham ngaak tingnuwe.”
Ati dabe ani pa-aam rin dingbo? Ririak senu baloi maknu Gentile rwanna ririak senu dinuba balumsanu paan bina hungnu ririak senu ga lousu rwe.
Atiyeda chongtan om ririak senu ding zongnu Israel rwanna ririak senu chongtan ding lou thang make.
Pa-aam lang binabo? Balangbe banina ha ding balumsanu gana zong mak ngaake atiyeda banina chongtan om chwan paan bina danga zong ngaake. Balangbe “Ket basui dingnu lung” bi ga ket basui rwe.
Chongdip pi hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Phaang ngo, Eina Zion bi ket basui dingnu lung khatle balum dingnu lung pui ga thang nge, Khatle tudannu Pukraangba ding balumsanu bating pi kazaklaye.”
Unao rwan ga, asungna bathainu khatle Rikrwang khou Israel rwan lang hweininu gazo banina ringriak lousu dam lang naye.
Balangbe bani Rikrwang om lang bi thouna sa ongme atiyeda haga bani bakaba theinu nung suiga make dinu eina bani lang bi sake piye.
Balangbe bani Rikrwang om ririak senu ding thei make khatle bani om ririak senu ga bacha thou lang zong ga bani cham Rikrwang om ririak senu thwei bi ong make.
Balangbe balumsanu mi bing ding ririak senu chak thang lang chongtan ga Christa khou loi thang rwe.
Balangbe Moses na Chongtan om ririak senu lang bi atiga hiak thang nge, “Chongtan nung suiga tonu maan ga haba paan bina ringlune.”
Atiyeda balumsanu bi hai thangnu ririak senuna rinne, “Nani sung bi ‘Tuna tambaan la ka dingbo?’ diga rin mako.” (Haga Christa ding balu chunglana phunta lang rinnuwe).
Mak tabe, “ ‘Tuna bakalan maaknu khun la ta langbo?’ diga rin mako.” (Haga Christa ding thinu nun lak pina lou thou lang dinuwe).
Atiyeda hiak thang ngaaknu gana pa-aam rinbo? Atiga rinne, “Chongkaang ga nakim bi, namun bi khatle nasung bi amme.” Haga anina kasam ongnu balumsat chong ding gaye.
Hagazo nangna namunna Jisu ding Pukraangba ye diga rin swake dabe khatle Bating thi bina Rikrwang na pi ring thou rwe dinu nasungna balumsaye dabe nating kan thanglune.
Balangbe mi khatna ririak senu to langna basungna balumsaye khatle ringriak lousu langna bamunna rin swake.
Balangbe Bathiangnu Chongdipna rinne, “Tudannu Pukraangba ding balumsanu bating ga pi kazaklaye.”
Balangbe Jihudi le Greek lak pi tei teinu khatchale maake, balangbe khangsung om lu chung bi amnu Pukraangba ga khatcha zwe. Atiga Bating kounu mi bing lang rithoi tamga pi thang nge.
Balangbe “Tudannu Pukraangba meng ding kounu bing ding kan thanglune.”
Ati dabe banina balumsa maknu Pukraangba ding tatoga kou dingbo? Banina ngai thang makka Bating tatoga balumsa dingbo? Kasam thangnu mi sui makka banina tatoga ngaisu langbo?

Bani ding lang thang make dabe banina tatoga kasamnu ngam dingbo? Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Dai bazaangnu sacham kasam ongnu, Khatle karonu sacham phun hungnu bani ket ka intia lang phaang sanubo!”
Atiyeda bani mi bingna sacham ga zei thang make. Balangbe Isaiah na rinne, “Pukraangba, ani om chongpuk ting tuna balumsarubo?”
Atibriakpina ngaisunu paan bina balumsanu hung nge khatle ngaisunu ga Rikrwang chong paan bi naye.
Atiyeda eina rinne, “Bani ngaisu damnuru makpo? Bani batak takka ngaisu drwe. ‘Bani khwan ga talei ram bing thei chang drwe, Khatle bani chong ga talei kalan bing tang drwe.’ ”

Atiyeda eina rinne, “Israel rwanna theinuru makpo? Moses na kamaga rin ngaake, ‘Gentile rwan paan bina nating antiam lang Eina laolune, Khatle kapangnu chaat om paan bina Eina nating pi balung pwanne.’ ”
Atiyeda Isaiah na basung raangga atiga rinne, “Ating zong maknu mi nunna Ating lousu rwe; Ating ngai maknu mi nun khou Eina indao thang rwe.”
Atiyeda Israel rwan om lang bi maanna rinne, “Chong zei maknu khatle chong khetnu mi nun pek la thamlai tarin ei akut kating swak rwe.”
Ati dabe eina rinne, Rikrwang na Bami nun ding bazwan sat thangrubo? Haga khatchale bazwan sat thang make; balangbe ei le Israel rwan miye. Abraham om kik taat khatle Benjamin om phum bi naye.

Rikrwang na kamaga thei thang damnu Bami nun ding Maanna bazwan sat thang make, mak tabe Elijah om lang bi Bathiangnu Chongdipna pa-aam rin thangbo dinu nani thei makpo? Maanna Israel rwan maitwang bi Rikrwang khou atiga hwei ngaake,
“Pukraangba, banina Naom thiamting rwan ding athat sat rwe, Naom rikhaang riak bing to rai sat rwe; araan toza zung rwe. Ating banina athat lang zong ong rwe.”
Atiyeda Rikrwang na katakka bakhou tato rin dambo? “Baal meithaan bi kekhok deta maknu kapaisa mi raching siari ding Eina Alaang thang ongme.”
Hadanga atun le phaangkriang paan bina kathang swak thangnu balei thangnu mi kasem ammaang nge.

Haga phaangkriang paan binaye dabe chwan paan bina lan rwe; ati mak tabe haga phaangkriang latlan rwe. Heiya chwan paannaye dabe, phaangkriang ga phaangkriang latlan rwe mak tabe chwan ga chwan latlan rwe.
Ati dabe pa-aambo? Israel rwanna rakanga zongnu ga dou make atiyeda kathang swak thangnu mi nun gana lousu rwe khatle ongsianu rwan ga bani sung pi nat thang rwe.
Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Rikrwang na bani lang inmu nwamnu katha, Mulaanu mik, Khatle ngaisulanu kana, Aniya tangga pi thang rwe.”
David na rinne, “Bani om thaisaak ka bani ding nam lang le phaa to ding ngo, Khatle ket basui riak khatle takhum baannu riak to ding ngo.
Banina mu mak lang bani mik zing ding ngo, bakaan bathin bani ngum ga taku ding ngo.”
Ati dabe eina rinne, Bani balumnu langna ket basuirubo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Atiyeda bani ding pi antiam lang bani om koi maan langna Gentile rwan khou ringriak hung rwe.
Bani koi maan gana talei ramna lungsa lang khatle bani lang braannu gana Gentile rwan lang lungsanuwe dabe, bani lang khopsanu gana intia inku latlu dingbo?
Balangbe eina nani Gentile rwan khou rinnuwe, balangbe eiba Gentile rwan om chonglang to briakpina eina to ongnu chwan dinga ei takung nge.
Atiga eina baningnuba achaat mi nun ding pi antiam lang laoga bani mi kasem ding kanthangnu za lang nge.
Balangbe bani ding bazwan satnu gana talei ram ding pi taman thang nge dabe, bani ding loukhut thangnu gana thinu nun lak pina pi ring thounu makka pa-aambo?
Balangbe kat thang kamanu kraa gana bathiang nge dabe, sukdi tum ga bathiang rwe khatle bakamong gana bathiang nge dabe bakachang bing ga le bathiang nge.
Atiyeda bakachang kasem ding thiaktutluga nilai lak talwan kraa kung, nating bani lak pi pi kaman thangluga talwan kraa kung om kamong bina bathao ga badam lou bachamme dabe,
thing kachang bing om maitwang bi lian to mako atiyeda nangna lian towe dabe bakamong ding phunnu ga nang make; atiyeda bakamongna nating phunnuwe dinu baningsuwo.
Ati dabe nangna rinlune, “Ating pi kaman thang langna bakachang bing ding thiaktut rwe.”
Sa rwe, banina balumsa mak briakpina bani ding thiaktut rwe khatle nangba nabalumsat paan bina han ongme. Atiyeda nang naraanto nating baning basaang mako atiyeda nang kachiyo.
Balangbe Rikrwang na bakung bahak om kachang bing ding ga hoi thang make dabe, maanna nating le hoi thanglaye.

Atibriakpina phaang ngo, Rikrwang om kasanu khatle chongsem natnu ding ga kakhanno: balum damnu rwan pek la chongsem natnu atiyeda nangna Rikrwang kriang bi chat makka ong nge dabe napek la kasanu amlune; ati make dabe nating le katap chat satlune.
Atiga banina le bani om balumsa maknu bi ga atiga ong make dabe bani ding le pi kaman thanglune; balangbe Rikrwang na bani ding pi kaman thang ngamme.

Balangbe nating bachaang om tonu nilai lak talwan kraa kung bina thiaktutluga bachaang makka anqwat om talwan kraa kung bi pi kaman thang nge dabe, bachaang om bakachang nun ga bazan bahak om kung bi intia lang pi kaman thanglu dingbo?

Balangbe unao rwan ga, nanina nani baning bi ningtingnuwe diga baning mak lang inthim chong heiya nanina thou to maknu ei bathai make. Dinuba, Gentile rwan bing khut bachang mak basaan, Israel rwan khou sung nat khutnu kasem swak rwe.
Israel rwan mi bing ding kan thanglune. Hiak thangnu ga dannuwe, “Kanthangnupa ga Zion bina hunglune, Khatle Maanna Jacob khouna Rikrwang ding kachi maknu ga lou satlune.
Eina bani noh bing ding lou sat thangnu kaan bi, Bani Ei le diga chonghen tonu ga hagaye.”
Sacham om lang bi nani lang chungna bani nun munanu nunne atiyeda kathang swak thangnu om lang bi ani pu pa rwan lang chungna baniya kriang thangnu nunne.
Balangbe Rikrwang om kriangnu leithwan khatle kou thangnu heiya kale latnu za make.
Balangbe bakaan khat pi nani Rikrwang chong zei mak ngaake atiyeda atun Israel rwanna chong zei mak briakpina nani nun phaangkriang ga lousu rwe,
hadanga bani atun le chong zei maknu to rwe heiya nani khou pi mu thang damnu phaangkriang paan bina banina le phaangkriang lousu dam lang naye.
Balangbe Rikrwang na bani bing ding chong zei maknu bi pi khut thang rwe, haga Maanna mi bing khou phaangkriang pi thang lang naye.
Tasiatnuweda, Rikrwang om ningting khatle theinu om balim balei ga intia lang thuk tamnubo! Baom chongsem ga intia lang zong tang ngam maknubo khatle Balampui ding ga intia lang suingam maknubo!
“Balangbe Pukraangba sung ding tuna theinu ngambo? Mak tabe, tuna Pukraangba ding bachuthangnupa torugabo?”
“Ati mak tabe, Rikrwang na bakhou thun thang lang Rikrwang khou tuna pi dambo, Pukraangba lang kamaga pi luga Bakhouna lou lat tingnu tu ambo?”
Balangbe Bakhouna khatle Bapaan bina khatle Balaang zana pot bingza am ongme. Lwat liannu ga khwa seiga Balaang to ding ngo. Amen.

Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, nanina nani pum ding baring, bathiangnu, Rikrwang na lou thang zanu rikhaang pot toga kat thang lang eina Rikrwang phaangkriang paan bina nani ding hweiye. Haga nanina tonu zek swaknu chwandonne.
Heiba talei ram om thot ting bazei mako atiyeda Rikrwang na baningnu kasanu, lou thang zanu khatle bachang sanu ga ingaabo dinu nanina tamphaangluga thei lang nani sung bi pi kathanluga kale swako.

Balangbe Rikrwang na Baom phaangkriang akhou pi thangnu paan bina, nani lak pi ongnu mi bing khou eina rinnuwe. Nanina kakhan hoinu bi gana baning basaang mak lang atiyeda mi bing khou Rikrwang na bani balumsat chaang nung suiga bazan bazan ding raakluga kakhan lang eina rinnuwe.
Balangbe ani pum bi naat taswang khak amluga naat bingna to dingnu bathouga bacham maknu danga,
ani taswang khak ngaak peida Christa khou pum khatcha to rwe; ani pakhat khat heiya khat le khat om naat to rwe.
Atiga ani khou pi thangnu Baom phaangkriang nung suiga ani khou tei teinu leithwan amme. Ri chong rin swaknu omme dabe haga ani om balumsanu chaang nung suiga sizinzo.
Mak tabe chwanlaang tonu omme dabe chwanlaang tonu bi sizin ding gaye; bachu thangnu omme dabe maanna bachu thang ding gaye.

Kachui thangnu omme dabe maanna kachui thang ding gaye, pi swaknu omme dabe maanna batainu to makka pi swak ting gaye. Kai thangnu omme dabe maanna sung khutka kai thang ding gaye, phaangkriang chwan tonu omme dabe maanna karo karoga to ding gaye.
Kriangnu ga sathot to makka kriang ding ngo. Sa maknu ding ga batanno, kasanu ga choitipo.
Unao kriang kalenu danga khat le khat kriang kaleyo. Khatna khat ting inkunuwe diga takung tazei to kaleyo.
Chwan chang ngo khatle takaat mako. Sung khutka Pukraangba chwanlaang towo.
Bachunnu bi karowo, riangre kanangnu bi khaang theiyo; hweininu bi chat maknu towo.
Bathiangnu mi nun om bathaang amnu bi ga badam lou bacham thang ngo. Man rwan ding takungga to thangbiyo.
Nani ding rainu nun khou rithoi pi thangbiyo, rithoi pi thang ngo khatle seng thang mako.
Karonu nun le karo bachammo, chapnu nun le chap bachammo.
Khat le khat chong cham laa chammo, naraanto nating baning basaang mako; lungsianu nun le bachammo. Nazan om baningnu bi ga ningtingnuwe diga baning mako.
Pakhatcha khou hakna kasianu langna kasianu baan mako. Mi bingza meithaan bi kasanu ga to lang kakhanno.
Zanu bing nangna ngam basaan mi bing le dai bazaangga ong bachammo.

Kriangnu nun, nani cham takhum baan kale mako atiyeda Rikrwang balung pwan bi lang khaak thang ngo. Balangbe heiya hiak thangga amme, “Takhum baannu Aomme; Eina takhum baan thangne” diga Pukraangba na rinne.
Atibriakpina “Nating munanu gana chaamme dabe pi sa thangbiyo, Taraanne dabe pi in thangbiyo. Balangbe atiga tonu gana nangna balusip pi choknu meithin pei thanglune.”
Kasia nuna pi ngam mako atiyeda kasanuna kasianu ding ga pi ngammo.
Mi bingza ngam choinu rwan thwei bi ong ding gaye. Balangbe Rikrwang khouna makka ngam choinu maake. Am ongnu ngam choinu bing ga Rikrwang na hap thangnuwe.
Atibriakpina tudannu ngam choinu nun ding maitwangnu maan ga Rikrwang na kathang swak thangnu ding maitwangnuwe. Maitwangnu nun gana bani pum bi chongsem lousulune.

Balangbe taleipuba rwan ding kasanu chwan tonu mi nunna kachi lang make atiyeda kasianu chwan tonu mi nun langba kachinuwe. Atiga nang ngam choinu bating kachi maknu to nwambo? Kasanu chwan towo. Atiye dabe nangna ngam choinu bakhouna nating swankanu lousulune.

Balangbe maan nalaang sa langna Rikrwang om swake. Atiyeda nangna sa maknu chwan towe dabe nang bating kachiyo. Balangbe maanna baom kachaak chem ga bathaang maaknu bi phunnu make khatle maan Rikrwang swake. Atiga maan sa maknu chwan tonu bating ga balung pwannu om takhum baan lang ongnuwe.
Atibriakpina balung pwannu lang za bina makka kakoi baze theinu sung lang chungna ba thwei bi ong ding gaye.
Atibriakpina nanina ramkhai le pi ongnu rwe, balangbe ngam choinu rwan heiya bakaan bathin Rikrwang swak rwan toga bani om chwan sung khutka to ongnu nunne.

Nanina mi bing khou pinu zek swaknu ga piyo: ramkhai pinu zek swaknu mi khou ga ramkhai piyo khatle rampon pinu zek swaknu mi khou ga rampon piyo, kachi dingnu bating kachiyo khatle takhwang to dingnu bating takhwang towo.
Khat le khat kriang kalenu lei makka, pakhatcha khou hakna lei chaak mako. Balangbe mi khatna mi katei khat ting kriangnu gana chongtan ding pi bapung pha thang nge.

Balangbe zathangna rinne, “Lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to mako,” “Mi athat mako,” “Barusa mako,” “Kakoinu sake pi mako,” “Ra-aam mako.” Zathang katei am ngaaklena, “Nangna nainnai lounai rwan ding nazan bahak ting danga kriang ding gaye” dinu zathang biya kai karung thang rwe.
Kriangnuna bainnai lounai khou kasianu to make. Atibriakpina kriangnuna chongtan bing ding pi bapung pha thangnuwe.
Bakaan heiya thei thang ngo, atun in ong bina barak swaknu kaan zung rwe. Balangbe ani om ringriak ka anina meithaan balumsa ngaaknu kaan ma atunna nai inku rwe.
Zingpha loi dam ding rwe, khwa baan lang nai rwe. Atibriakpina anina kazingnu chwan ga bathan satluga baannu kraan pon naat ka sin basoirizo.
Ani thamlai danga se chuiga sezo, sa in kalonu khatle zu kalonu, lung rangwangnu khatle imbet boulaanu, kabit kamainu khatle antiamnu to makcho.
Atiyeda pwan sinnu danga, Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding sin basoiyo khatle zanti pumna bathainu ga pi hung tang lang zanti pum bi badou chanu khatchale pi mako.
Balumsanu bi sonnu bating ga loukhut thang ngo atiyeda balumsia zanu pot om lang bi kae lang make.
Balangbe mi khatna pot bingza sa zaye diga baning nge atiyeda kasonnu katei khatna anpekcha saye.
Sa ongnu maanna sa maknu bating ga balaanu to mak ting ngo khatle sa maknu maan gana sa ongnu bating ga chong kasem mak ting ngo, balangbe Rikrwang na bating loukhut thang rwe.

Mi pakhat om swak ting chong kasem ongnu nang tubo? Maan han ong ngaakle balumnu ngaakle bapuba meithaan bi amme. Batak takka bating pi han thanglune, balangbe Rikrwang na bating pi han thangnu ngamme.
Mi khatna lumik khat ting lumik khatna inkuwe diga baning nge, mi khatna lumik bing bachamme diga baning nge; mi bing zana basung basung bi siat siatka thei ding ngo.

Tudannu lumik khat ting ngaaknu maan ga Pukraangba lang ngaaknuwe khatle lumik khat ting ngaak maknu maan gana Pukraangba langna ngaak maknuwe khatle tudannu sanu maan gana Pukraangba langna sanuwe, balangbe maanna Rikrwang ding swanne. Atiga sa maknu maan gana Pukraangba langna sa maknuwe khatle maanna Rikrwang ding swankaye.
Balangbe ani pakhatchanale bapum bahak lang ring make khatle pakhatchanale bapum bahak lang thi make.
Balangbe ani ring nge dabe Pukraangba lang ringnuwe, ani thiye dabe Pukraangba lang thinuwe. Atibriakpina ani thi le ring le Pukraangba omme.
Balangbe Christa na thinu nun khatle ringnu nun om Pukraangba to langna Maan thi rwe khatle ring le ring thou drwe khatle ringga ongme.
Atiyeda nangna pa-aam toga nau nanao ding chong kasem ongnubo? Mak tabe nau nanao ding balaanubo? Balangbe ani mi bingza Christa om chongsem kaong riak meithaan bi hung hanlune.
Balangbe atiga hiak thang nge, “Pukraangba na rinne, Ei ringga ong briakpina, Mi bingza Ameithaan bi kekhok deta lune, Khatle balei bingna Rikrwang ding swan lune.”
Atiga ani mi bing zana baom baom lang bi singchak ka Rikrwang khou hung pi lune.
Atibriakpina ani khatna khat ting chong kasem kale latlanrizo atiyeda unao rwan lampui bi kalan lang mak tabe ket basui dingnu pot thang mak lang ani sung hanrizo.

Pot bingza baraantoza tanaat khap tinu khatchale maake dinu Pukraangba Jisu khou ei bathiangga theiye khatle ei siat siatka theiye; atiyeda pot khat ting tanaatnuwe diga baningnu bakhou haga balaangza tanaatnuwe.
Balangbe thaisaak om lang bina naunao pakhat ting basung pi katope dabe, nang kriangnu nung suiga selan rwe; atiga Christa na bahut toga thi thang damnu bating naom thaisaakna to braan mako.
Atibriakpina nani om kasanu ding ga mi nunna kasianu zwe diga rin mak ting ngo.
Balangbe Rikrwang om krwang talei ga kasa kain om make atiyeda Katha Bathiangnu khou ririak senu dai bazaangnu khatle karonuwe.
