Balangbe hei bing bi Christa ding chwanlaang to ongnu bating ga Rikrwang na pem thang nge khatle mi nunna le lou thang nge.
Atibriakpina dai bazaangnu khatle khatna khat ting bacha thounu bing ga ani sui baloizo.
Thaisaak lang chungna Rikrwang chwan ding to braan mako. Batak takka pot bingza bathiangnuwe. Atiyeda ket pi basuinu le bachamga sa ongnu manpa lang ga kakoinuwe.
Zu zan sa innu sa make mak tabe nau nanao khat ting pi balum dingnu, ket pi basui dingnu mak tabe sung pi son dingnu bing ga tonu sa make.
Nakhou balumsat ambo? Haga Rikrwang meithaan bi naraan toza om towo. Bazanna za thang damnu lang bi bazan ding koi impu thang maknu maan ga aih sanuwe.
Atiyeda balumsiaga sanu maan ga kakoinu to rwe, balangbe maanna balumsaga sa make; balumsanu bina maknu bing ga noh we.
Kanatnu anina kasonnu rwan om soinu ding khaang thang ding gaye. Anina ani raantoza ding pi pem mak ting gaye.
Ani mi bing zana bainnai lounai rwan ding sa lang khatle bacha thou pui lang anina bani ding pemnu to ding gaye.
Balangbe Christa na le Baraanto Bating pi pem mak ngaake. Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Nating rin basiatnu mi nunna rin basiatnu bing ga alu chung bi ta rwe.”

Balangbe kamana hiak thang ngaaknu bing ga ani lang bachu thang lang naye. Haga Bathiangnu Chongdip pina hungnu khaang seinu khatle kachui thangnu paan bi, ani khou siat siatnu theinu baning ga am lang naye.
Atiga khaang seinu khatle kachui thangnu pi thangnu Rikrwang na nani khou Jisu Christa na baningnu nung suiga nani khat le khat sung khatcha tonu ga pi thang ding ngo.
Heiyana nani khangsung karungluga khwan khatcha toga ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Rikrwang khatle Pa ding swannu ngam lang nge.
Atibriakpina Christa na le ani ding loukhut thangnu danga, Rikrwang lwat lian langna nani cham khatna khat ting lou thang kaleyo.
Balangbe eina rinne, ani pu pa rwan khou karen thang ngaaknu chongren ding pi tip thang lang khatle Rikrwang om bazenu ga pi mu thang lang Jisu Christa na mun romnu mi nun lang chwan to rwe.

Gentile rwanna le Rikrwang na phaangkriang thangnu langna Bating lwat pi lian lang nge. Haga hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Atibriakpina Gentile rwan lak pi eina Nating swanne, Khatle eina Nameng ding swanga laa tone.”
Atiga rin late, “Gentile rwan bing ga, Bami nun le diga karo bachammo.”
Atiga le rin late, “Gentile rwan bing ga, Pukraangba ding swanno! Chaat bingna Pukraangba ding swan ding ngo!”
Isaiah na le rinne, “Jesse om Kamong khat lung hunglune, Khatle Maan Gentile rwan lu chung bi krwang paan lang thoulune. Gentile rwanna Bakhou bachunnu amlune.”
Atun bachunnu om Rikrwang na nani khou balumsanu bi karonu khatle dai bazaangnu pi sip thangnu to ding ngo. Hagana Katha Bathiangnu om ngam paan bina nani om bachunnu ga tam inku thou lang nge.
He au anao rwanga, nani khou kasanuna sip rwe, theinu bingna sip rwe khatle khatna khat ting cheksin lang bachu thang kalenu ngam rwe dinu akhou balumsanu am rwe.
Atiyeda Rikrwang na akhou phaangkriang pi thang briakpina nani khou pi baningsu thangnu toga eina balang kasem bi sung raang takka nani khou hiake.

Hagazo, Gentile rwan khou eina Christa Jisu om chwanlaang mi to lang Rikrwang om sacham chwanlaang to rwe. Hagazo Katha Bathiangnuna to bathiang thang damnu Gentile rwan ga Rikrwang na lou thang lang khopnu potkat to lang naye.
Atibriakpina Rikrwang om chwan lang bi ei Jisu Christa paan bina alian tonu lousu lang balang amme.
Balangbe chongkaang khatle chwan bi Gentile rwanna chong zei lang Christa na ating sizin thangga to damnu chwan rwan ga makka eina pa-aam tatonu khatchale sung raangga kabialaye.

Haga badan liannu khatle tasiatnu chwan bing ga Rikrwang Katha om ngam paan bina swak ngaake. Jerusalem bina thouga se koiluga Illyricum taram tangga Christa om sacham ga bachang saga eina kasam ngaake.
Christa meng ngai thang maknu riak pi sacham kasamnu heiya aom badannuwe. Heiya eina mi katei om inmun bi to thou mak lang naye.
Atiyeda haga hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Balang bi rin thang mak aangnu mi nunna Bating mulune, Khatle khatchale ngaisu mak aangnu mi nunna bakaba theilune.”
Haba om lang bina nani khou hung mak lang ating hanga hanga to khamnam rwe.
Atiyeda atun ala pek alaang bariak maak hungru briakpina khatle sangwan inza ei nani khou hung lang baning hung ngaak briakpina,

eina Spain la senu kaan bi nani kim bi hungluga nani le diga kadou lang bachunne. Atiga kamaga bakaan kasem eina nani le karoga ong bachamnu nung alamsek pi ga nanina ating paang thanglune diga baning nge.
Atiyeda atunba ei Jerusalem la bathiangnu mi nun lang chwanlaang to lang se maang nge.
Balangbe Jerusalem bi amnu bathiangnu mi nun lak pi lungsianu rwan lang paang thangnu ga Macedonia rwan khatle Achaia rwanna pemnuwe.

Haga bani lang taswang khak pemnuwe, bataknuba ha rwan ga bathiangnu mi nun khou lei chaak rwe. Balangbe bani om Katha om badam ga Gentile rwanna lou bachamme dabe, banina le pum om tonu pot lang bi Gentile rwanna Jihudi rwan khou chwanlaang to lang lei chaaknuwe.
Atibriakpina eina heiba chwanna loi thangsialuga paang thangnu pot heiya bani khou soi makka pi thangsialuga Spain la senu kaan bi nani khou hungne.
Eina nani khou hungnu kaan bi Christa om rithoina sipnu sacham le bachamga ei hunglune dinu ei theiye.

Unao rwan ga, atun eina nani ding hweiye dinuba, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khatle Katha na akhou kriangnu pi thangnu paan bina nanina ei le bachamga rakanga Rikrwang khou alaang hweini thang ong lang ninuwe.
Atiga Judea bi amnu balumsa maknu nun kut pina ating kan thang lang khatle Jerusalem la eina to thang damnu achwan ga bathiangnu mi nunna lou thang zanu to lang hweini thang ngo.
Atiga Rikrwang na baningnu sung bi ei nani khou karoga hungluga nani le chaang pi ring bacham lang nge.
Atun dai bazaangnu Rikrwang na nani le diga ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
Cenchrea om rupkathan bi chwanlaang to ongnu ani sannu Phoebe ding loukhut thang lang eina nani khou man pi thei thangnuwe.

Khopsaga bathiangnu mi nun danga nanina bating Pukraangba khou loukhut thang ngo khatle nani khouna balaang bathaang amnu bing bi nanina bating sui paang thang ngo. Balangbe maan bazan bahakna mi taswang khak ting paang thang rwe khatle ating le paang thang rwe.
Jisu Christa khou ei le diga chwan to bachamnu Priscilla le Aquila ding kalum thang ngo.
Akatha ding kan langna barweina thinu tangga kachi lan rwe. Barwei ding araanto zana makka, Gentile rwan om rupkathan bingna le rinswan rwe.
Hadanga barwei in bi amnu rupkathan ding le kalum thang ngo. Christa khou ongnu Achaia om kamanu kraa to ongnu eina kriangnu Epaenetus ting kalum thang ngo.
Ani langna chwan katop ongnu Mary ding kalum thang ngo.
Ei le diga qwan in bi ong bacham ngaaknu ain thirui Andronicus le Junia ding kalum thang ngo. Bani nun chonglang rwan lak pi meng senu khatle ama Christa khou hung kamanu mi nunne.
Pukraangba khou eina kriangnu Amplias ting kalum thang ngo.
Christa khou ani le diga chwan to bachamnu Urbanus khatle eina kriangnu Stachys ting kalum thang ngo.
Christa khou sanuwe diga chak thang damnu Apelles ting kalum thang ngo, Aristobulus in inkhun mi bing ding kalum thang ngo.
Ain thirui Herodion le Pukraangba khou ongnu Narcissus in inkhun ding kalum thang ngo.
Pukraangba khou chwan to ongnu Tryphena le Tryphosa ding kalum thang ngo. Pukraangba khou chwan to rakan ongnu kriangnu Persis ting kalum thang ngo.
Pukraangba khou kathang swaknu Rufus le anu to ongnu banu ding kalum thang ngo.
Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobus, Hermes khatle bani le diga ong bachamnu unao rwan bing ding kalum thang ngo.
Philologus, Julia, Nereus le banao kamaisa khatle Olympas, bani le diga ong bachamnu bathiangnu mi bing ding kalum thang ngo.
Bathiangnu kaput le bachamga khat le khat kalum kaleyo. Christa om rupkathan bingna nani ding kalumme.
Unao rwan ga, atun eina nani ding hweiye, nanina thei damnu bachu thangnu om maitwang bi hennu, lang swaknu khatle ket pi basuinu bani ding ga bapu theiyo; bani ding ga karung mako.

Balangbe hadannu mi nun ga ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding chwanlaang tonu make atiyeda bani bon langza baloinu mi nunne. Munthiam saga chong kabianu khatle thumnu chong biakna chamnu mi nun om sung ding banina minamme.
Balangbe nani om chong zeinu lang bi mi bing zana thei rwe. Atibriakpina nani lang bi ei karowe atiyeda nani nun kasanu lang bi ningtingnu to lang atiluga kasianu lang bi koi maaknu eina bathaiye.
Bakaan inchan maknu sung bi dai bazaangnu Rikrwang na Seitaan ding nani ketbaza thwei bi kadim kataalune. Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang nani khou ong thang ding ngo. Amen.
Eile chwan to bachamnu Timothy, ain thirui Lucius, Jason khatle Sosipater nale nani ding kalumme.
Heiba chamthwan hiaknu Tertius na Pukraangba khou nani ding kalumme.
Aom bazin inpuba Gaius khatle rupkathan bingna nani ding kalumme. Namlian om sianripuba Erastus le unao Quartus na nani ding kalumme.
Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang nani mi bing khou am ding ngo. Amen.

Atun eina rin indao swak ongnu sacham khatle Jisu Christa ding kasamnu nung suiga, talei dam bina thouga inkam thangga hung ngaaknu inthim chong ding indao thangnu nani ding bacha thou thang ngamnu nung suiga

(atiyeda atunba indao thangdamnu khatle thiamting rwan om Bathiangnu Chongdip paanna chaat bing khou pi thei thangdamnu) khatle khwa sei ringnu Rikrwang om zathang nung suiga balumsaga rinnu zei lang nani ding pi nat thang ngamnu
Rikrwang, Baraantoza ningtingnu, Bakhou, Jisu Christa paanna khwa sei lwat liannu to ding ngo. Amen.
Rikrwang om baning thangnu paanna Jisu Christa om chonglang to lang kou thangnu, Paul khatle ani unao Sosthenes na,

Corinthia namlian bi amnu Rikrwang om rupkathan bi amnu bathiangnu rwan to lang kou thangnu, Jisu Christa khou to bathiang thang damnu mi nun khou, bani om le ani om le tonu Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng ding kounu bariak bathin bi ongnu mi bing khou,
ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou am ding ngo.
Jisu Christa na nani khou pi thang damnu Rikrwang om phaangkriang langna eina nani lang bi araantoza ding bakaan bathin swanne,
dinuba Bakhou ong ga balang bing za bi, dinuba nanina kabia swaknu bing bi khatle theinu bing bi, nani ding Maanna pi inku ka thang rwe
khatle Christa om sake ga tangga nani khou pi tip thang rwe.
Atibriakpina Pukraangba Jisu Christa om indao thang dingnu ding ga taraan ga ngaak ong bi nani lang Katha om leithwan ga khatchale baat make.
Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om lumik pi nani koi maaknu to lang nani ding kakhamnu tangga pi tip thanglune.
Rikrwang heiya balumsa zanuwe, Maanna Basa Kapaisa Jisu Christa, ani Pukraangba om badam lou bacham lang nani ding kou thang rwe.

Unao rwan ga, nani khangsungna khatcha toga kabia lang khatle nani lak pi khak langnu maak lang nani nun sungcham laachamnu bi khatle chongsem laasemnu bi khopsaga karung dam lang atun eina ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng bi nani ding kachui thang nge.
Au anao rwan ga, nani lak pi kae kanaanu amme diga nani lang bi Chloe in inkhun mi rwan kasemna akhou pu thang rwe.
Atun eina heiya rinne, nani pakhat khat na, “Eiba Paul omme,” mak tabe “Eiba Apollos omme,” mak tabe “Eiba Cephas omme,” mak tabe “Eiba Christa omme” diga rinne.
Christa ding khak langrubo? Paul ding nani lang chungna cross pi bakhai thangrubo? Mak tabe nani ding Paul meng bi baptize to thangrubo?
Eina Crispus le Gaius ting makka nani pakhatcha ding le baptize to dam make, ha langna eina Rikrwang ding swanne.
Mi pakhatchanale eina ameng bina baptize to rwe diga rin mak lang nge.
O, eina Stephenas in inkhun mi nun ding le baptize to thang damme. Haga maknu mi katei rwan ding baptize to thang damme dinu ei thei make.
Balangbe Christa na ating baptize to lang lang thangnu make atiyeda Christa om cross ka bathaang maaknu to mak lang chongkaang om ningtingna makka, sacham kasam lang lang thang rwe.
Balangbe braan ongnu rwan khou cross om chong ga kapangnuwe atiyeda kan thang damnu ani langba heiya Rikrwang om ngamme.
Heiya hiak thangga amme, “Eina ningtingnu rwan om ningting ding to braan satne Khatle bakaba theinu nun om bakaba theinu ding ga khatchale maknu pi tone.”
Ningtingnu ingaipai ambo? Chongtan bachuthangnu ingaipai ambo? Heiba bakaan om kae theinu mi ingaipai ambo? Rikrwang na heiba talei ram mi nun om ningting ding kapangnu pi tonu makpo?
Balangbe talei ram om ningtingna Rikrwang ding theinu ngam mak briakpina, Rikrwang om ningtingbe sacham kasamnu om paan bina balumsanu nun ding kan thang lang dinuwa Rikrwang na baningnuwe.
Balangbe Jihudi rwanna badannu ding zong nge khatle Greek rwanna ningting ding zong nge.
Atiyeda anina cross pi athat tamnu Christa ding kasamme, Jihudi rwan langba heiya ket basui riak khatle Greek rwan lang kapangnuwe.
Atiyeda Rikrwang na kou thang damnu nun Jihudi rwan khatle Greek rwan khou Christa heiya Rikrwang om ngam khatle Rikrwang om ningting nge.
Balangbe Rikrwang om kapangnu gana misa ningting ma ningting inkuwe khatle Rikrwang om sonnu gana misa om nat ma nat inkuwe.
Balangbe unao rwan ga, nani ding kou thangnu ding phaang ngo, pum nung suiga ningtingnu mi tomme, kangamnu mi tomme khatle kasei kalian tam make;
atiyeda ningtingnu rwan ding pi kazak langna talei ram om kapangnu nun ding Rikrwang na ka thang rwe khatle ngam amnu nun ding pi kazak langna talei ram om kasonnu nun ding Rikrwang na ka thang rwe.
Bakung tonu pot bing ding khatchale maknu to lang Rikrwang na talei ram om talunu pot ting khatle phaang batanu pot bing ding ka thang rwe.
Heiya pakhatchanale Rikrwang meithaan bi lian to mak lang nge.
Bapaan bina nani Christa Jisu khou amme, maanna ani lang Rikrwang khouna ningting khatle ririak senu, to bathiang thangnu khatle ran swakthangnupa to rwe.
Hagana, “Lian tonu maan gana, Pukraangba khou lian to ding ngo” diga hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe.
Aunao rwan ga, eina nani khou hungnu kaan bi Rikrwang om sake ga indao thang lang hungnuwe, sa inkunu om mak tabe ningting om chongbiak le bachamga hungnu make.
Balangbe Jisu Christa khatle cross pi athat tamnu Bating ga makka nani lak pi khatchale thei mak lang asung bi han ngaake.
Ei songa, kachiga khatle kathok dun dun ga nani le ong bacham ngaake.
Achong biak khatle aom kasam ongnu heiya misa om ningtingna bathem swaknu chongkaangna make atiyeda katha ding khatle ngam ding indaonuwe.
Heiya nani om balumsat ka misa om ningtingna makka, Rikrwang om ngam bi to lang nge.
Atiyeda mipu phanu mi nun lak pi ani ningting chong kabiaye atiyeda heiba bakaan om ningting mak tabe bathaang khatchale maaknu heiyabe bakaan om bapuba rwan om ningting make.
Atiyeda Rikrwang om ningting ga anina inthim toga kabiaye, haga ani om lwat langna talei dam mak baleina Rikrwang na kamaga som thangnu, inkam thangnu ningting nge.
Atiyeda heiba bakaan om bapuba rwan pakhatchanale thei mak ngaake, balangbe banina thei ngaake dabe banina lwat liannu Pukraangba ding cross pi athat mak ngaak tingnuwe.
Atiyeda haga hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Rikrwang na Bating kriangnu nun lang daan thang damnu lang bing ga mikna mu dam make, Kanana ngaisu dam make, Khatle misa om lungning bi khut tam make.”
Atiyeda bani ga Rikrwang na Bakatha paan bina ani khou indao thang rwe. Balangbe Katha gana balang bing, o, Rikrwang om kathuknu lang bing ding zong nge.
Balangbe misa sung bi amnu katha gana makka mi nun lak pi mi khat om lang ding theinu ngamgabo? Hadanga Rikrwang om lang heiya le Rikrwang om katha gana makka tupai pakhatchanale theinu ngam make.
Anina talei ram om katha ga lousunu make atiyeda Rikrwang na ani khou bathaam pi thangnu pot ting anina thei lang Rikrwang khouna Katha ga lousunuwe.
Hei bing nga ani le misa om ningtingna bachu thangnu om chong bina make atiyeda Katha om lang ding Katha om chong le kabialuga Katha Bathiangnuna bachu thangnu chong bing ga anina kabiaye.
Bachaang om mina Rikrwang Katha om balang ding loukhutnu ngam make; balangbe bani ga bakhou kapangnuwe; balang rwan ga Katha om lang bi tamphaang briakpina maanna bani ding theinu ngam make.
Katha om mi gana balang bing ga tamphaang nge atiyeda pakhatchanale bazan ding bazega tamphaang make.
Balangbe “Tuna Pukraangba sung ding theiga Bating bachu thang ding gabo?” Atiyeda ani khou Christa om lungning amme.

Aunao rwan ga, eina nani khou Katha om mi nun khou kabianu danga kabianu ngam mak ngaake atiyeda eina nani khou pum nung suinu mi nun khou danga, Christa khou naosen rwan to ongnu mi khou danga kabia damme.
Ei nani khou sen kanu tui pi in thang nge, kanatnu thaisaak pi sa make; balangbe haba kaan bi nanina lou thang ngam make khatle atun tang ga le nani ngam mak aang nge.
Balangbe atun tangga nani pum nung suinu mi nun to ong maang nge. Balangbe nani lak pi antiamnu, kae kalenu khatle khak langnu, nani pumna bathainu mi nun khatle misa nun danga senu makkabo?
Balangbe mi pakhatna rinne, “Eiba Paul omme,” pakhatna, “Eiba Apollos omme,” nani nun pum nung suinu mi nun makkabo?
Ati dabe, Paul tubo? Apollos tubo? Atiyeda Pukraangba na nani pakhat khat khou pi thang damnu chwan danga, chonglang nun paanna nanina balumsanuwe.
Eina ling thang rwe, Apollos na tui sai rwe atiyeda Rikrwang na pi sing thou thang rwe.
Ati dabe ling thangnu khatle tui sai thangnu maan ga khatchale make atiyeda bakung tonuba pi sing thou thang ongnu Rikrwang gaye.
Ling thangnu mi ga le tui sainu mi ga khatcha zwe, mi bingna baom bachwan nung suiga baom taswan lousulune.
Balangbe ani Rikrwang le chwan to bachamnu nunne, nani nun Rikrwang om lou gaye, nani Rikrwang om inne.

Rikrwang na akhou pi thangnu phaangkriang nung suiga, ningtingnu in to theinu mi khat tanga eina inmun thwan thang rwe khatle katei pakhatna habei ga in to thou rwe. Atiyeda mi bingna habei ga maanna tatoga to thou langbo dinu cheksin ding ngo.
Balangbe thwan thang damnu inmun, Jisu Christa ga makka pakhatchanale inmun katei thwannu ngam make.
Tudannu pakhatna heiba inmun chung bi kachaakna, tangkana, baman kungnu lungna, thingna, thingna louna chaanna, saangbuna in to thouwe dabe,
mi bing om chwan ga indaolune; lumikna haga pao swaklune, meina haga indaolune; meina mi bing om chwan ga pa-aambo dinu tamphaanglune.
Tudannu pakhat om chwan, dinuba maanna habei to thounu in ga kaling makka atiga am ong nge dabe, maan taswan ga loulune.
Tudannu pakhat om chwan ga meina rou sat tamme dabe balaang braanlune atiyeda maan bapum dingba mei sung bina dwak swaknu danga kan thanglune.
Nani Rikrwang om inne khatle Rikrwang om Katha na nani khou ong ongme dinu nani thei makpo?
Tudannu pakhatna Rikrwang om in ga to tanaate dabe, Rikrwang na bating to tanaat lune. Balangbe Rikrwang om in ga bathiangnuwe, nani haba in gaye.
Pakhatchanale bazan bahak ting minam mak ting ngo. Nani lak pi tudannu pakhatna heiba bakaan bi maan ningtingnu miye diga baning nge dabe, ningtingnu to lang maan kapangnu to ding ngo.
Balangbe talei ram om ningting ga Rikrwang khou kapangnuwe. Balangbe atiga hiak thang nge, “Rikrwang na ningtingnu rwan ding bani bahak om rou sianu bi namme”
khatle atiga hiak thang late, “Pukraangba na ningtingnu mi nun om sung ga bathaang maaknuwe dinu theiye.”
Atibriakpina pakhatchanale misa om lang bi lian to mak ting ngo. Balangbe pot bingza nani omme;
Paul ngaakle Apollos ngaakle Cephas ngaakle talei ram ngaakle ringnu ngaakle thinu ngaakle am ongnu pot ngaakle hung dingnu ngaakle pot bingza nani omme.
Nani nun Christa omme, Christa ga Rikrwang omme.
Mi pakhatna ani ding Christa om swak rwan khatle Rikrwang om inthim chong om chwanlaang mi nun ding danga baning ding gaye.
Haza makka chwanlaang mi nun ga balumsa lang khopnu mi nun toga dou ding gaye.
Atiyeda nanina ating tamphaang nge dabe mak tabe mi nun om chongtok nung suiga chong towe dabe, haga akhou khatchale make. Batak takka, ei azan bahakna ating chong kasem make.
Balangbe ei azanna akoi khatchale thei make atiyeda heiyana ating pi baze thangnuba make; atiyeda ating tamphaang ongnu Maan ga Pukraangba ye.

Atibriakpina Pukraangba na hung lat mak basaan, bakaan tang makpi chong kasem mako. Kazingnu bi inkam thangnu lang bing Maanna baannu bi phun swaklune khatle mi nun om sung bi amnu baning inza ding le indao swaklune; haba kaan bi mi bingna Rikrwang khouna bani om swankanu ga lousulune.

Au anao rwan ga nani pakhatchanale mi khat maitwang bi lian to mak lang hiak thangnu bi gana inkuga kakhan mak lang hei bing nga ani paanna bachu lang nani langna eina azan ding khatle Apollos ting rin kabanuwe.
Balangbe nani ding tuna mi katei khouna pi tei thanggabo? Nangna katei khouna lou thang maknu pa-aam amgabo? Nangna haga lousuluga nangna lousu maknu danga paaam lang lian to ongnubo?
Atun nani sipsaga am rwe! Nani lungsa rwe! Ani sui makka nani krwang nun danga paan rwe khatle anina nani le diga paannu ga eina bathaiye.

Balangbe Rikrwang na chonglang ani nun ding kham katak pani athat tingnu nun ding danga phun swak lu rwe diga ei baning nge; ani ding talei ram bi tambaan chonglang rwan khou khatle mi bingna phaang langna bacha thang rwe.
Ani Christa lang chungna kapangnu nunne atiyeda nani Christa khou ningtingnu to rwe! Ani sonne atiyeda naniba nate! Nani ding takung thang nge atiyeda aniba mai sianu dou rwe!
Atun chakrin tang ga ani bon chaamme khatle taraanne khatle pwan tomga sin basoiye khatle bweiye khatle in make.
Ani kut bahakna chwan to rakanne. Rin basiatnu kaan bi anina rithoi pi thang nge, rainu kaan bi anina khaang nge;
meng to basiatnu kaan bi anina bathemme. Ani talei ram om imphom tanaatnu dan rwe, atun tangga mi nun om tanaatnu dan rwe.
Eina hei bing nga nani ding pi kazak lang hiaknu make atiyeda kriangnu asa rwan ding danga cheksin lang bachu thangnuwe.
Balangbe Christa khou nani ding bachu thang lang mi raching som am ngaak peida, nani pa rwan tam make; balangbe eina nani ding sacham paan bina Christa Jisu khou pon thang rwe.
Atibriakpina ating bazei lang eina nani ding kachui thangnuwe.

Hei langna eina bariak bing bi, rupkathan bing bi bachu thang damnu ga danga, Christa khou aom chaang bing ga nani khou pi baning su thang dingnu om kriangnu khatle Pukraangba khou balumsa lang khopnu sa kapaisa Timothy ding nani khou eina lang hungnuwe.
Atun ei nani khou hungla dingnu danga mi kasemna lian to rwe.
Atiyeda Pukraangba na baningnuwe dabe, ei nani khou karangga hunglune khatle eina lian tonu mi nun om chong ga makka, bani pa-aam ngam ambo dinu ga le theilune.
Balangbe Rikrwang om krwang talei ga chongkaang bi make atiyeda ngam biye.
Nani pa-aam bathaigabo? Ei sungrwan choiluga mak tabe kriangnu le bachamga mak tabe bazaangnu sungna nani khou hungzo gabo?

Nani lak pi rwan mei rwan basan laannu amme diga bathiangga pu thang rwe khatle hei dannu rwan mei rwan basan laannu heiya Gentile rwanna tangga tolan rwe dinuba mi khatna bapa mei ding bamei lang louwe dinuwe.
Atiga lungchung dingnu saruk nanina lian to rwe, dinuba heipai chwan tonu bating nani lak pina lou sat tammo.
Balangbe ei batak takka pum toga nani lak pi sui mak ngaak peida, akatha naba nani lak pi sui ongme, heipai chwan tonu bating ga ei ongnu danga chong kasem rwe.
Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng bi akatha na Pukraangba Jisu Christa om ngam le nani hung karungnu kaan bi
atinu pakhat ting Pukraangba om lumik ni bakatha ding kanthangnu lousu lang bapum braan lang Seitaan khou pi swako.
Nani lwat ka sa maknuwe. Khai titcha kanot thangnu gana sukdi tum bing ding pi pwangkaye dinu nani thei makpo?
Nani khai sui mak briakpina kanot thangnu sukdi kathan to lang khai raan ga lou sat tammo. Balangbe Christa ani om kai takan thangnu ding ani lang khaang drwe.
Atibriakpina anina khai raan ga sui makka mak tabe uilu suinu le antiamnu khatle kasianu om khai ga sui makka sung bathiangnu le bataknu om khai sui maknu uilu ga suinu balou ga ngaakcho.
Lungkoi lung maannu nun le karung mak lang aom chamthwan bi eina nani khou hiak tamnu rwe.
Atiyeda heiba talei ram om lungkoi lung maannu mak tabe ra-aamnu nun, kasut sanu nun mak tabe ri katha kalumnu nun khou eina rinnu make. Ati dabe nani talei ram bina se swak lang bathaang am rwe.

Atiyeda unaowe dinu pakhatna lungkoi lung maannu mak tabe ra-aamnu, ri katha kalumnu, chongbiak laabiak sianu mak tabe zu kalonu mak tabe kasut sanu mi towe dabe hadannu mi ding karung mako khatle atinu mi khat le sanu tangga sa karung mako diga hiak tamnu rwe.
Balangbe langkaang la ongnu mi nun ding ei chong kasem lang pa-aam thou amgabo? Basung bi ongnu nun ding nanina chong kasemnu makkabo?
Atiyeda langkaang la ongnu mi nun ding Rikrwang na chong kasemme. Atibriakpina “Nani lak pina sa maknu bating ga kazun sat tammo.”
Nani lak pi tudannnu khatna mi khat maitwang bi chong swaknu amluga, bathiangnu mi rwan meithaan bi se makka ririak se maknu nun meithaan bi chong to lang sung raangga senubo?
Bathiangnu mi rwanna talei ram mi nun ding chong kasemlune dinu nani thei makpo? Nanina talei ram mi nun ding chong kasemme dabe, kasinnu chong swak ting ga chong kasem lang nani khopnu makpo?
Anina tambaan chonglang rwan ding chong kasemlune dinu nani thei makpo? Ati dabe atun ring ong balei swak ongnu lang bing nga anina inkuga ngamnu zek swak makpo?
Atibriakpina atun ring ong balei swak ongnu lang bing om lang bi nanina chong kasemnu kaan bi rupkathan bi bakung to maknuwe diga baningnu mi nun ding chong kasem lang nanina kathang swaknubo?
Heiya nani nun kazak tam lang eina rinnuwe. Ati dabe nani lak pi, bau banao rwan lak pi chong kasem ngamnu ningtingnu pakhatcha hakna maakrubo?
Atiyeda unao khatna unao khat maitwang bi chong impu thang lang seye khatle haga balumsa maknu mi nun meithaan biye!

Atibriakpina atun nani lak pi nani khatna khat maitwang bi chong impu thang kalenu amme dinu heiya batakka nani lang soi taknuwe. Haba hut lang nani khou koi thangnu ding ga pa-aam toga khaang thang maknubo? Haba hut lang nani khou gotnu ding ga pa-aam toga za thang maknubo?
Haba hut nani kakoinu chwan towe khatle gote khatle nanina nani unao rwan khou hei bing nga tonuwe.

Ririak se maknu nunna Rikrwang om krwang talei lousulaye dinu nani thei makpo? Nani ding pi minam mako. Lungmaannu nun mak tabe ri katha kalumnu nun, rwan mei rwan basan laannu nun, imbet boulaanu nun, kapaisa cham khatle kamaisa cham lungnu nun,
mak tabe barusanu nun mak tabe ra-aamnu nun mak tabe zu kalonu nun mak tabe chongbiak laabiak sianu nun mak tabe kasut sanu nunna Rikrwang om krwang talei khut laye.
Nani kasemba hadannu nun ngaake. Nani ding kasin thang rwe, nani ding to bathiang thang rwe, Pukraangba Jisu meng bi khatle ani Rikrwang om Katha paan bina nani ding pi baze thang rwe.
“Alaangbe balang bingza zanuwe,” atiyeda balang bing ga akhou bathaang maake. “Alaangbe balang bingza zanuwe,” atiyeda ei pa-aam khatcha om ngam thwei bi onglaye.

“Thaisaak ka bonpui lang nge khatle bonpuina thaisaak lang nge,” atiyeda Rikrwang na kani rwei ding to braan satlune. Pum ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to lang make atiyeda Pukraangba lang nge khatle Pukraangba ga pum lang nge.
Rikrwang na Pukraangba ding thinu bina pi ring thou thang rwe khatle ani ding le Bangam paan bina thinu nun lak pina pi ring thou thanglune.
Nani pum ga Christa pum om naate dinu nani thei makpo? Christa pum om naat bing ding eina louluga taloi rwan pum naat pi to dingbo? Haga ati mak ting ngo.
Bapum bahak taloi rwan khou karungnu maan ga, taloi le pum khatcha to rwe dinu nani thei makpo? Balangbe Maanna rinne, “Pat ni ga pum khatcha to lang nge.”
Atiyeda Pukraangba le karungnu maan ga, Pukraangba le Katha khatcha to rwe.
Lungkoi lungmaannu bina pak tammo. Mi khatna tonu noh bing ga pum om paanlaye atiyeda lungkoi lungmaannu tonu maan gana bazan bahak om maitwang bi noh tonuwe.
Ati mak tabe nani pum ga nanina nani sung bi am ongnu Katha Bathiangnu inne khatle anina bating Rikrwang khouna lousunuwe khatle naniya nani om make dinu nani thei makpo?
Balangbe nani ding baman pi luga kalei taang rwe; atibriakpina Rikrwang om to damnu nani pum bi khatle nani Katha bi Rikrwang lwat pi lianno.
Nanina akhou hiak hungnu chong om lang bi, kamaisa khat ting banaan maknu heiya kapaisa lang saye.
Atiyeda lungkoi lungmaan briakpina, kapaisa bingna bamei am dam ding ngo khatle mei bingna le babasan am ding ngo.
Babasanna bamei lang pi dingnu ga bakhou pi ding ngo khatle hadanga meina le babasan khou pi dam ding ngo.
Mei ga maan bapum bahak om ngam maake atiyeda babasan omme. Hadanga babasanna le bapum bahak om ngam maake atiyeda bamei omme.

Nanina kalumsan ga khatle kalum lang bakaan kasem zakalenu makka, narwei khatna khat ting khaam kale mako khatle nani om pum ding karak thei mak briakpina, Seitaan na nani ding bathem mak lang hung karung lato.
Heiya akhou za thangnu nung suiga eina rinnuwe, heiya zathang make.
Mi bingna ei bahak tannu eina bathaiye. Atiyeda mi bingna baom baom leithwan tei teiga Rikrwang khouna lousuwe.
Atiyeda eina mei kou kalaak mak aangnu nun khatle tameinu rwan khou rinne, bani ei danga ongnu saye.
Atiyeda banina bani pum ding karaknu ngam make dabe, bani mei kou kalaak tam ding ngo. Balangbe bathainu gana mei bachwangnu danga ongnu ma mei kou kalaaknuna sa inkuwe.
Mei kou kalaaknu nun khou eina zathang piye, eina make; atiyeda Pukraangba naye. Meina babasan khouna kapaang mak ting gaye;
atiyeda maanna kapaang nge dabe, mei gana kalaak makka ong ding ngo mak tabe babasan khou karung lat ting ngo. Basanna bamei ding kapaang mak ting gaye.
Atiyeda katei rwan khou eina rinne, Pukraangba na make, tudannu unao khatna balumsa maknu mei amme dabe, meina babasan le diga lung bacham nwamme dabe, maanna bamei ding ga kapaang mak ting gaye.
Mei khatna balumsa maknu basan amme dabe, maanna bamei le lung bacham nwamme dabe, maanna babasan ding kapaang mak ting gaye.

Balangbe balumsa maknu basan ding ga mei paan bina to bathiang thang rwe khatle balumsa maknu mei ding ga basan paan bina to bathiang thang rwe; ati make dabe, nani sa rwan ga bathiang maknu tolune atiyeda atun bani bathiang rwe.

Atiyeda balumsa maknu maan gana kapaang damme dabe, maan kapaang dam ding ngo; unao kapaisa mak tabe unao kamaisa ga hei lang bi bang thangnu make. Atiyeda Rikrwang na ani ding dai bazaang lang kou thang rwe.
He mei, nangna nabasan ding kan thanglune dinu tatoga theigabo? Mak tabe he basan, nangna namei ding kan thanglune dinu tatoga theigabo?
Atiyeda Rikrwang na mi pakhat khat khou kasem thang damnu danga, Pukraangba na mi pakhat khat ting kou thangnu bi ga maan se ding ngo. Eina rupkathan bing khou heiba chongtan bing nga pinuwe.
Mun rom damnu mi ding kou thangbo? Ati dabe maan mun rom maknu mi to mak ting ngo. Mun rom maknu mi ding kou thangbo? Maan mun rom mak ting ngo.
Mun romnu heiya khatchale make khatle mun rom maknu heiya khatchale make atiyeda Rikrwang om zathang bing ding zeinu heiyana bakung tonuwe.
Mi bingna bating kou thangnu bi am ngaaknu bi ga atiga am ding ngo.
Swak to ongnu kaan bi kou thangbo? Haba lang bi nating pi riangre mak ting ngo; atiyeda nangna rang tonu lousunu ngamme dabe, lousu lang karammo.
Balangbe swak to ongnu kaan bi kou thangnu maan ga Pukraangba om rang tonu mi rwe. Hadanga rang to ongnu kaan bi kou thangnu maan ga Christa om swak rwe.
Nani ding baman pi luga kaleinu rwe; nani mi nun om swak to mako.
Unao rwan ga, bating kou thangnu bi ga mi pakhat khatna Rikrwang le diga kale makka haom gong bi ong ding ngo.
Reizuni rwan om lang bi, ei Pukraangba khouna zathang maake; atiyeda ei Pukraangba na Baom phaangkriang lousu briakpina balumsa lang khopnu mi khat pi to thangnu danga, eina chongsem piye.
Atibriakpina atun riangrenu am briakpina mi khatna baom am ongnu lung bi ga atiga ongnuna saye diga ei baning nge.
Nang mei khou bangrubo? Bathan sat lang zong mako. Nang mei khouna kapaangrubo? Mei zong mako.
Atiyeda nangna mei kouwe dabe, nang noh to make khatle reizuni khatna kalaake dabe maan noh to make. Atiyeda hei dannu heiyana pum bi riangrenu amlune atinu riangrenu nanina dou maknu eina bathaiye.
Au anao rwan ga, eina heiya rinne, bakaan toi rwe, atunna thouga mei amnu rwanna bani mei maaknu danga ong ding ngo,
chap ongnu nunna bani chap maknu danga, karonu rwan gana bani karo maknu danga, pot kaleinu rwanna le bani maaknu dan ding ngo,
heiba talei ram pot ting choinu rwanna le ha ding sung lungning thangga choi mak ting ngo. Balangbe talei ram om se ongnu gong ga takanse ongme.
Atiyeda nani nun thou to makka ongnu ei bathai make. Mei kou kalaak mak aangnu maan gana Pukraangba ding tatoga pi pem dingbo dinu lang bing bi kakhanne.
Atiyeda mei kou kalaaknu mi gana bamei ding tatoga pi pem dingbo diga talei ram om tonu pot bing lang bi kakhanne.

Mei le reizuni lak pi bacham maknu amme. Kalaak mak aangnu kamaisa gana maan bapum bi khatle katha bi bathiangnu to lang Pukraangba om lang bi kakhanne. Atiyeda kalaaknu kamaisa gana babasan ding tatoga pi pem dingbo diga talei ram pot bing om lang bi kakhanne.
Nani lang tong langna eina heiya rinnuwe, eina nani meithaan bi phaa to thangnu make atiyeda nanina bazega khatle sung khoranu to makka Pukraangba ding cheksinga chwanlaang to lang naye.

Tudannu pakhatna baom reizuni pek la lamchat salan rwe diga baning nge dabe, maanna kalaaknu dat khan damme dabe khatle maan katha dam ding ngo diga baning nge dabe maanna baningnu nung suiga to dam ding ngo. Maan noh to make; bani mei kou kalaak ting ngo.
Atiyeda basung han tipnu maan gana, bathaang maaknu makka atiyeda maanna baningnu chung bi ngam amme dabe khatle baom reizuni ding bathiangga thang lang basung bi hanne dabe haga sanuwe.
Atiyeda bating katha lang pinu maan gana to chuiga to rwe atiyeda bating katha lang pi maknu maan gana inkuga to chuinuwe.
Babasan ring ong basaan chongtanna mei ding ga bang thang nge; atiyeda babasanna thi damme dabe maanna baningnu bakhou ga katha lang maan rang to rwe atiyeda haga Pukraangba khouza dingnuwe.
Atiyeda abaning nung suiga maan ga atiga am ong nge dabe balaang inkuga karo inkunuwe; Rikrwang om Katha ga akhou amme diga ei baning nge.
Ri katha khou kat thangnu lang bi heiye; ani khangsung om theinu amme dinu ani theiye. Theinuna lian pi to thang nge atiyeda kriangnuna bacha thouwe.
Tudannu khatna maan kasem theiye diga baning nge dabe, maanna thei dingnu ga atun tangga thei make.
Atiyeda tudannuna Rikrwang ding kriang nge dabe, bating ga Rikrwang na thei thang nge.
Atibriakpina ri katha lang kat thangnu pot sanu lang bi, ri katha dinu talei ram bi khatchale make khatle Rikrwang khat makka rikrwang katei maake dinu ani theiye.
Balangbe tambaan le talei ram bi mi nunna ri nun diga kounu taswang khak amme, batak takka ri amsip amme khatle pukraangba taswang khak amme.

Atiyeda ani langbe Rikrwang khat amme, Maan Pa gaye, pot bingza Bakhouna hungnuwe, ani Balaangza ringnuwe khatle Pukraangba khat dinuba Jisu Christa paan bina pot bingza Bakhou naye khatle Bapaan bina ani ring ongnuwe.

Atiyeda mi bingna heiya thei make; mi kasem bi atun tangga ri katha kalumnu sung am briakpina, ri katha lang kat thangnu pot tanga saye khatle bani om kakoi baze theinu sung ga son briakpina to tanaat rwe.
Atiyeda thaisaakna ani ding Rikrwang khou pi za thangnu make, balangbe anina sa ngaakle anina sa inkunu make mak tabe anina sa maklena sia inkunu make.
Atiyeda nani om rang tonu gana sonnu nun ding ket pi basui mak lang cheksinno.
Balangbe ri katha om in bi sa lang ongnu katheinu nating tudannu pakhatna muwe dabe, kakoi baze theinu sung ding ri katha lang katnu pot ka sa lang sung pi raang bilabo?
Christa na thi thang damnu kasonnu naunao ding naom theinu gana to braan bilabo?
Atiyeda nanina hadanga naunao rwan maitwang bi atiga noh tonu kaan bi khatle nanina kasonnu bani om kakoi baze theinu sung ding pi lem rwe, nani Christa maitwang bi noh to rwe.
Atibriakpina thaisaakna aunao ding ket pi basuiye dabe, eina aunao ding ket pi basui mak lang ei zan impha ni beida salaye.
Ei chonglang khat makpo? Ei rang tonu makpo? Ei ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding munu makpo? Nani Pukraangba khou achwan om bakraa makpo?
Ei katei khou chonglang khat mak ngaak peida, nani khouba ei chonglang khate. Balangbe nani Pukraangba khou aom chonglang om seal ne.
Ating tamphaangnu nun khou heiya achong katake:
Sa in lang ani khou bazek maakkabo?
Chonglang katei rwan, Pukraangba om banao rwan khatle Caiaphas tanga, balumsanu mei rwan ding ani le bachamga phun lang ani khou bazek amnu makkabo?
Ring lang chwan to maknu za maknu gazo Barnabas le arweiza zunggabo?
Tudannuna baraanto om sian tingluga kraan katwak lang segabo? Drakha lingluga haba om bakraa sa maknu tu ambo? Mak tabe zao nun dwanluga bani om kanu tui insu maknu tu ambo?
Ei heiya tamang mi danga rinnubo? Mak tabe chongtanna le hei danga rinnu makkabo?
Balangbe heiya Moses om chongtan bi hiak thang amme, “Saang kadim ta ongnu sen chan ding nangna bamun khwam mak ting gaye.” Rikrwang na sen chan nun lang banang thangbo?

Ati mak tabe Maanna rinnu hei bing nga ani lang nge, batak takka heiya ani lang nge atiga hiak thangluga amme dinuba lou khoinu maan gana bachun le suiga khoi lang nge khatle bachunnu bi loulaaknu maan gana baom bachun bi badam suilou lang nge.
Anina nani lang Katha om tachi bwanluga nani pum om tonu bakraa lwake dabe haga barwannubo?

Nani lu chung bi katei rwanna heiba zek om badam suilou bachamme dabe, anina bani khouna inkuga ngam amnu nun makpo? Atiyeda anina heiba zek heiya sizin make atiyeda Christa om sacham ding anina khamnamnu to mak lang balang bing bi khaang ongme.

Kalum in om bathiangnu pot bing om chwanlaang to ongnu nunna kalum in om pot ka saye dinu nani thei makpo khatle rikhaang riak pi chwan to ongnu bani gana rikhaang riak pi katnu pot kat le badam lou bachamnu makpo?
Hadanga sacham kasamnu rwan gana sacham paan bina ring lang nge diga Pukraangba na zathang pi thang rwe.

Atiyeda haga akhou to thang langna, eina hapai bing ga khatchale sizin make mak tabe eina ha bing ga hiaknu make; balangbe alian tonu ding tupaina khatchale make diye dabe, ei thi damnuna alaang sa inku dingnuwe.
Balangbe eina sacham kasamme dabe, ei alian to lang khatchale maake, balangbe ei haga kasam lang bathaang amnuwe; eina sacham ding kasam make dabe, ei aih sianuweda!
Balangbe eina heiya kasam nwamga kasamme dabe, alaang taswan amme; atiyeda abaning om maitwang bi ngaake dabe, akhou sacham kasam lang chwan ga bachoi thang rwe.
Ati dabe aom taswan ga pa-aambo? Eina sacham kasamnu kaan bi sacham bi aom ngam ga choi maan mak lang Christa om sacham ga baman lou makka kasamme.
Balangbe ei mi bing khouna rang to ngaak peida, eina mi bing ding eina ngamnu bing Christa khou tamga phun hung lang ei azan bahak ting mi bing om swak pi to rwe.
Eina Jihudi rwan ding phun hung za langna ei Jihudi rwan khou Jihudi rwan danga to hung rwe. Chongtan thwei bi ongnu nun ding phun hung za langna, ei chongtan thwei bi ongnu danga to hung rwe.

Chongtan maaknu nun ding phun hung za langna, ei chongtan maaknu danga to hung rwe. Atiyeda Rikrwang meithaan bi chongtan maakka ongnu make atiyeda Christa meithaan bi chongtan sung bi ongnu mi nun dan rwe.
Kasonnu nun ding phun hung za langna kasonnu rwan khou ei sonnu dan rwe. Eina pa-aam gong bina mi kasem ding kan thang langna mi bing khou ei pum brumza to hung rwe.
Eina nani le badam ga lou bacham langna sacham lang chungna eina hei bing nga to rwe.
Nampak pi mi bingna pake atiyeda mi pakhatchana taswan lousuwe dinu nani thei makpo? Nani taswan lousu lang pako.
Takhem bi ngam lang talen ongnu mi bingna balang bingza bi bapum ding raake. Banina braan zanu luthop lousu langna haga tonuwe atiyeda aniba braan latlanu luthop ka lou lang naye.
Atibriakpina eina tang dingnu riak thei maknu dan makka pak ongme. Bathaam barwang bi katwak maknu danga ei katwak ongnuwe.
Atiyeda eina mi katei khou sacham kasamnu kaan bi azan bahak lou thang za maknu to mak lang apum ding raakka aswak pi to rwe.
Unao rwan ga, heiya nanina thei maknu eina bathai make, dinuba ani pu pa rwan bingna tambu thwei bi ongluga bani bing ga tuipui takan swak ngaake.
Bani mi bing ding Moses khou tambu bi khatle tuipui bi baptize to thang damme.
Bani mi bing bachamnu Katha om thaisaak sa bacham ngaake,
bani mi bing bachamnu Katha om tui in ngaake. Balangbe banina bani nung sui hungnu Katha om lung pui bina tui in ngaake khatle haba lung pui ga Christa ngaake.
Atiyeda Rikrwang ding bani mi katamna pemlan rwe, balangbe bani pum ding ramhaang bi to imphaang thangsia rwe.
Banina sa maknu ding bathainu danga aninaba sa maknu ding bathai mak langna hei bing nga ani khou rin kaba thang rwe.
Bani mi kasemna ri katha ding kalumnu danga, nani ati mako. Heiya hiak thang amme, “Mi nunna sa lang khatle in lang badungta rwe khatle kadai lang han thou ngaake.”
Bani mi kasemna lungmaan ongnu ga danga ani hadan makcho khatle kani khatcha bi bani mi raching somniga inthum balumtaluga thi ngaak rwe,
bani mi kasemna tamphaangluga bani ding barunna to that tamnu danga anina Christa ding tamphaang makcho,
mak tabe bani mi kasemna tu tu tam tamluga to braannuna to tum damnu danga nani tu tu tam tam mako.
Hei bing nga bani khou rin kaba thangnu danga swaknuwe khatle ani nun lang barak thei lang banina hiak thangnuwe. Kakhamnu bakaan ani khou hung tang rwe.
Atibriakpina han ongme diga baningnu maan gana blumnu zaye diga cheksin ding ngo.

Misa khou hungnu bathemnu ga makka bathemnu katei pakhatchale nani khou hung mak aang nge; atiyeda Rikrwang be balumsa lang khopnuwe. Nanina khaangnu ngamnu bi gana inkuga nani ding bathem lang Rikrwang na za thanglaye atiyeda nani ding bathemnu kaan bi nanina khaangnu ngam lang maanna le dwaknu lampui daan thanglune.
Atibriakpina eina kriangnu unao rwan ga, ri katha kalumnu bina pak tammo.
Eina ningtingnu mi nun khou rinnu danga rinnuwe, eina rinnu heiya nani nazanna kakhanno.
Anina swankanu rithoi ngai ga Christa om thi bi badam lou bachamnu makkabo? Anina to baknu uilu ga Christa om pum bi badam lou bachamnu makkabo?
Balangbe ani mi taswang khak ngaak peida ani uilu pek khat tannuwe khatle pum khat tannuwe, balangbe ani mi bingna haba uilu pek khat pi ga badam lou bachamnuwe.
Zanti pum nung suiga Israel rwan ding kakhanno. Rikhaang pot sanu rwan ga rikhaang riak om badam lou bachamnu nun makkabo?
Ati dabe eina rin ongnu heiya pa-aambo? Ri katha ga pot khatpo mak tabe ri katha nun lang kat thangnu ga pot khatpo? Mak tabe mi nunna ri katha lang kat thangnu ga pot khatpo?
Gentile rwanna khaangnu pot ka Rikrwang khou makka ri kasia nun lang khaang thangnuwe atiyeda nanina ri kasia nun le badam lou bachamnu ga eina bathai make.
Nanina Pukraangba om ngai khatle ri kasia nun om ngai ding innu ngam make; nanina Pukraangba om table khatle ri kasia nun om table bina le badam lou bachamnu ngam make.
Anina Pukraangba ding pi antiam lang laozo gabo? Ani Bama nat inkunubo?
Alaang balang bingza zanuwe, atiyeda balang bingza kanaanu make. Alaang balang bingza zanuwe, atiyeda balang bingza bacha thou make.
Pakhatchanale bazan langza zong mak ting ngo atiyeda pakhat khatna katei lang le kana lang zong ding gaye.
Zan zwannu riak pi zwan ongnu bing ga kakoi baze theinu sung lang chungna tangai ngai makka sawo,
balangbe “Talei ram khatle basung bi amnu bing ga Pukraangba omme.”
Tudannu balum sa maknu pakhatna nani ding sa lang talote dabe khatle nanina se nwamme dabe, nani om kakoi baze theinu sung lang chungna tangai ngai makka, nani meithaan bi thangnu ga sawo.

Atiyeda tudannu pakhatna nani khou, “Heiya ri katha lang kat tamnurwe” diga rinne dabe, nani khou rinnu mi lang chungna khatle kakoi baze theinu sung lang chungna haga sa mako, balangbe talei ram khatle basung bi amnu pot bing ga Pukraangba omme.
Eina rin ongnu heiya kakoi baze theinu nasung lang rinnu make atiyeda pakhat om ding nge. Balangbe aom rang tonu ding mi khat om kakoi baze theinu sungna paaam toga chong kasem langbo?
Atiyeda eina swankanu le bachamga badam lou bachamme dabe, eina swankanu thaisaak langna pa-aam toga kasianu rinnubo?
Atibriakpina nanina sanu ngaakle, innu ngaakle mak tabe nanina pa-aam tonu ngaakle, ha bing ga Rikrwang lwat lian lang towo.
Jihudi rwan khou mak tabe Greek rawan khou mak tabe Rikrwang om rupkathan khatcha ding hakna ket pi basui mako.
Balang bing bi eina mi bing ding pi pem lang tonu danga, ei alaang tong lang zong makka bani ding kan thang lang mi taswang khak lang tong lang zong nge.
Eina Christa chaang bazeinu danga nani achaang bazeiyo.
Au anao rwan ga, nanina balang bing bi ating baningsu thangga eina nani khou bachoi thangnu ga seta ongnu bing ga nanina tipka ngaak ongme diga eina nani ding swankaye.
Atiyeda kapaisa bing om balu ga Christa ye, kamaisa om baluna kapaisa ye khatle Christa om balu ga Rikrwang nge dinu nanina theinu ei bathaiye.
Lu runluga kalumnu mak tabe, ri chong rin swaknu kapaisa bing ga balu ding takung tazei to maknuwe.
Atiyeda lu run makka kalumnu mak tabe ri chong rin swaknu kamaisa bingna balu ding takung tazei to maknuwe. Balangbe haga balu bwat satnu le bachamme.
Balangbe kamaisa khatna lu run make dabe, basam kachat sat ting ngo. Atiyeda balusam kachat satnuna mak tabe, balu bwat satnuna kazak tingnuwe dabe, maan lu run ding ngo.
Kapaisa ga Rikrwang thot khatle Rikrwang om lwat am briakpina batak takka maan lu run mak ting gaye atiyeda kamaisa ga kapaisa om lwate.
Kapaisa ga kamaisa khouna make atiyeda kamaisa ga kapaisa khou naye.
Kapaisa ding kamaisa lang dam thangnu make atiyeda kamaisa ding kapaisa lang dam thangnuwe.
Heiba om langna tambaan chonglang rwan lang bina, kamaisana balu chung bi ngam khat amme dinu badannu khat balu chung bi am ding gaye.
Atiyeda Pukraangba khou kamaisa sui makka kapaisa maake khatle kapaisa sui makka kamaisa maake.
Balangbe kapaisa khouna kamaisa hungnu danga, kamaisa khouna kapaisa hungnuwe; atiyeda pot bingza Pukraangba khou naye.
Nani lak pi nani raantoza chong kasemmo. Kamaisana lu run makka Rikrwang khou kalumnu bazebo?
Kapaisana balusam seiye dabe, bazan ding takung maknuwe dinu chaang gana nani ding bachu thang makpo?
Atiyeda kamaisa khatna sam seiye dabe, haga baom lwate, bakhou sam seinu ga balu thin lang pi thangnuwe.
Atiyeda tudannuna hei lang bi kae nwamnu amme dabe, ani khou mak tabe Rikrwang om rupkathan rwan bi le chaang katei maake.
Nanina karungnu ga sa inku lang makka sia inku lang briakpina heiba bachu thangnu bi eina nani ding swan make.
Balangbe kama katak pi rupkathan toga hung karungnu kaan bi nani lak pi khak langnu amme diga ei ngaisuwe khatle ei kasem balumsaye.
Balangbe za thangnu bani ga nani lak pi thei langna nani lak pi baze makka bachu thangnu phom am ngaaknu le zaye.
Atibriakpina nanina bariak khat pi hung karungnu kaan bi nani Pukraangba thaisaak sa bacham lang karungnu make.
Balangbe sanu bi mi pakhat khatna mi katei rwan ding ngaaknu to makka balaang balaang saye khatle pakhatna bon chaamga ong nge khatle katei khatna drakha tui in kaloluga ong nge.

Heiya pa-aam langbo? Nani sa in lang in maakkabo? Mak tabe nanina Rikrwang om rupkathan ding thou to maknubo khatle ka maaknu nun ding pi kazaknubo? Ei nani khou paaam rin langbo? Hei langna eina nani ding swanka dingbo? Ei nani ding swanka make.
Balangbe eina Pukraangba khouna lousu damnu ga eina nani lang pi swak rwe: Pukraangba Jisu ding pi swaknu zingpha Maanna uilu lou rwe
khatle Maanna uilu ga louluga swanka thang rwe khatle Maanna haga to bakluga rinne, “Louluga saro, heiya nani lang to bak thang damnu Apum ga rwe Ating baningsu ong lang heiya towo.”
Hadanga Maanna sanu nung bi ngai ga le lou thouluga rinne, “Heiba ngai ya Athi bi chongren kathanne. Nanina in bathin Ating baningsu ong lang heiya towo.”
Balangbe nanina uilu heiya sanu khatle ngai bina in bathin Maanna hung lat mak basaan Pukraangba na thi thang damnu ga nanina pao swaknuwe.
Atibriakpina tudannuna heiba Pukraangba om uilu ding khopsa makka saye dabe khatle heiba ngai ding khopsa makka inne dabe maan ga Pukraangba om pum khatle thi bi koinu rwe.
Atiyeda haba mi gana bazan ding tamphaang ding ngo khatle maanna uilu ga sa ding ngo khatle ngai bina in ding ngo.
Balangbe maanna takung tazei makka saye dabe khatle inne dabe Pukraangba pum ding kakhan makka, maanna bazan ding chong kasem lang sanuwe khatle innuwe.
Atibriakpina nani lak pi mi taswangkhakna sonne khatle naaye khatle kasemna thi drwe.
Balangbe anina ani raantoza ding chong kasemme dabe, ani ding chong kasem thanglaye.
Atiyeda ani ding chong kasemnu kaan bi Pukraangba na ani ding talei ram mi nun le diga kakoinu bi pi ta thang mak lang Pukraangba na ani ding laak thang rwe.
Atibriakpina au anao rwan ga, nanina sa lang hung karungnu kaan bi nani khatna khat ting ngaak kaleyo.
Atiyeda tudannu khatna chaamme dabe, nanina karungnu ga chong kasem mak lang maan bain la sa ding ngo. Atiga ei hungnu kaan bi katei lang bi nani khou sin thangne.
Aunao rwan ga, Katha leithwan bing om lang bi nanina thei maknu ei bathai make.
Nanina Gentile rwan toga ong ngaak balei nani ding lampui kaimaanluga, chong thei maknu ri katha nun khou kai thang nge.

Atibriakpina eina nani khou pi theiye, dinuba Rikrwang Katha paan bina kabianu pakhatchanale Jisu khou taseng ta thang ding ngo diga khatchale rin make khatle Katha Bathiangnu paan bina makka pakhatchanale Jisu heiya Pukraangba ye diga rinnu ngam make.
Leithwan tei tei amme atiyeda Kathaba khatcha zung nge.
Chwandon tei tei amme atiyeda Pukraangba ga khatcha zung nge.
Chwan tonu gong tei tei amme atiyeda mi bingza khou chwan to ongnu Rikrwang heiya khatcha zung nge.
Atiyeda mi bingza lang tongnu lousu langna indao swaknu leithwan ga Katha na pi thang rwe:
balangbe mi khat khou Katha paan bina ningting chong, katei pakhat khouna Katha bahak kana theinu chong pi thang nge.
Mi khat khou haba Katha paan bina balumsanu, mi katei khat khou Katha paan bina naanu ding pi sa thangnu leithwan bing pi thang rwe.

Mi katei khat khou tasiatnu chwan bing to lang mi katei khat khou chong rin swak lang mi katei khat khou katha rwan khat le khat bacham maknu thei lang mi khat khou chong chaat tei tei kabia lang mi khat khou chong bakaba han swaknu om leithwan pi thang rwe.
Atiyeda Maanna baningnu danga mi pakhat khat khou leithwan ga kasem thangga, khat tak khatchanu Katha gana heiba chwan bing nga to ongnuwe.
Balangbe pum ga khatcha zung nge khatle naat tamga amme khatle haba pum om naat bing tam beida, pum khatcha zung nge hadanga Christa le rwe.

Balangbe Katha khat paan bina ani mi bing ding pum khatcha bi baptize to thang rwe; Jihudi rwan ngaakle, Greek rwan ngaakle, swak ngaakle, rang tonu mi nun ngaakle, ani khangsung ding Katha khatcha bi pi in thang rwe.
Balangbe pum naat heiya khatcha make, atiyeda tamme.
Ketna atiga rinne dabe, “Eiba kut mak briakpina ei pum om naat make,” atibriakpina haga pum om naat makkabo?
Kanana atiga rinne dabe, “Eiba mik mak briak pina pum om naat make,” atibriakpina haga pum om naat makkabo?
Pum bing nga mik ngaake dabe, ngai lang ingaipaibo? Atiluga pum bing nga kana ngaake dabe barim banam lang ingaipaibo?
Atiyeda atun Rikrwang na pum om naat khat khat ting Maanna bathainu danga pum bi thang rwe.
Pum om naat bing ga khatcha ngaake dabe, pum ga ingaipaibo?
Atiyeda pum om naat tamga amme atiyeda batak takka pumba khatcha zwe.
Atiga “Nang alaang bathaang maake” diga mikna kut khou rinnu za make mak tabe “Ei nani ding bathaang maake” diga luna ket khou rinnu za make.
Heiya make, songa munu pum om naat bing gana bathaang amnuwe.

Atiluga anina hei ding ngabe takung thang mak peida zaye diga baningnu pum om naat bing khou anina inkuga takung thang nge; atiluga anina phaangsa maknu pum om naat bing ding anina phaangsa lang towe.
Atiyeda ani om phaangsanu naat bing ga bathaang maake. Atiyeda Rikrwang na takungnu make diga baningnu naat bing khou inkuga takung thangga pum ding pi karung thangnuwe.
Heiya pum bi khak lang swaknu to mak lang atiyeda pum om naat bingna khatna khat lang banang bacham thang lang pum naat bing ding khatcha toga thang karung rwe.
Atiga naat khatna riangrenu khaang nge dabe, naat bingna haga le riangrenu khaang bachamme mak tabe, naat khat ting takung tazeiye dabe, naat bingna haga le karo bachamme.
Nani Christa om pumme khatle pakhat khat ka pum om naat bing nge.

Rikrwang na rupkathan sung bi mi kasem ding kathang swak thang rwe: Kama bi chonglang rwan, kani bi thiamting rwan, inthum bi bachu thangnu rwan, haba nung bi tasiatnu chwan tonu nun khatle naanu nun ding pi sa thangnu leithwan amnu nun, katei ding paang thangnu nun, ngaaksian thangnu nun khatle chong chaat tei tei kabianu nunne.
Ha bing ga chonglang rwanbo? Ha bing ga thiamting rwanbo? Ha bing ga bachu thangnu rwanbo? Ha bing ga tasiatnu chwan tonu rwanbo?
Mi bing khou kasa kanaa ding pi sa thang lang leithwan amphikpo? Mi bingna chong tei tei kabiabo? Mi bing chong han swaknu nunbo?
Atiyeda kasa kataknu leithwan ding ga bathaiyo. Eina nani khou sa kataknu lampui khat pi mu thangne.
Einav misa om khatle tambaan chonglang rwan chong kabia ngaak peida, kriangnu maake dabe, ei baraam kabaangnu sianmu khatle laak ongnu siantwei ga dannuwe.

Eina chong kabianu leithwan phang ngaak peida khatle inthim chong khatle theinu bing am ngaak peida, rammwan bing ding lou sat ngamnu balumsat bing am ngaak peida akhou kriangnu maake dabe, ei khatchale make.
Aom ka am bing lungsianu rwan lang pi swak ngaak peida khatle eina apum ding mei rou sat lang pi swak ngaak peida akhou kriangnu maake dabe, hagana alaang khatchale tongnu maake.
Kriangnuna khwa seiga khaang thang nge khatle kriang thang nge, kriangnuna antiam make, kriangnuna lian to make, phun lian make,
kasianu lamchat to make, balaangza baloi make, balung pwan nong make, kasianu kakhan make,
ririak se maknu bi karo make atiyeda bazenu tonu bi karowe.
Balang bingza phun thang nge, balang bing bi balumsaye, balang bing bi bachunnu amme, balang bing bi khaang thang nge.
Kriangnu bi impha bani hakna inkhin tanu to make. Atiyeda Chong rinnu nun le inkhin talune. Chong chaat tei tei am ngaaklena ha bing ga lan damlune. Theinu am ngaaklena haga braan damlune.
Balangbe anina kasemza theiye khatle anina kasemza chong rin swake.
Atiyeda bapung phanu ga hung tangnu kaan bi kasemza dinu ga amla rwe.
Ei naosen bado naosen danga kabia ngaake, eina naosen danga thei ngaake, eina naosen danga kakhan ngaake; atiyeda eina mipu phanu kaan bi naosen thot bing bathan sate.

Balangbe atun anina katha an bi muraam raamnu danga mu ongme atiyeda bataang labe ani mai le mai pon kadou kalelune. Atun anina kasemza theiye atiyeda ating bathiangga thei damnu ga danga, kanung eina le bathiangga theilune.
Balumsanu, bachunnu, kriangnu, hei inthum ma kaling makka amme atiyeda hei bing lak pi inku kataknuba kriangnuwe.
Kriangnu ga nani khou am lang karammo khatle Katha om leithwan rwan ding bathaiyo atiyeda bakung toga nanina chong rin swak lang lungning khutka karammo.
Balangbe chong chaat katei kabianu maan gana mi nun khou kabianu make atiyeda Rikrwang khouwe. Balangbe pakhatchanale bating thei make atiyeda katha khou maanna inthim chong kabiaye.
Atiyeda chong kabia swaknu maan gana mi nun ding bacha thou lang kachui thang lang khatle bathem thangnu chong kabianuwe.
Chong katei kabianu maan gana baraantoza ding bacha thouwe atiyeda ri chong rin swaknu maan gana rupkathan ding bacha thouwe.

Nani mi bingna chong chaat tei tei kabianu eina bathaiye atiyeda ha ma nanina ri chong rin swaknu eina bathaiye; balangbe rupkathan ding bacha thou lang chong kabia ongnu maan gana chong bing nga bakaba han swak make dabe, chong tei tei kabia ongnu mi ga ma Rikrwang chong rin swak ongnu maan gana lian inkuwe.

Atiyeda aunao rwan ga, atun eina nani khou chong chaat tei tei kabiaga hung nge dabe, indao thangnuna, theinuna mak tabe, ri chong rin swaknuna mak tabe, bachu thangnuna kabianu makka ei nani lang tongnu paaam ambo?
Katha sui maknu pot tamrwang mak tabe taraa kainuna ngaakle bazenu baraam ga pi baraam make dabe, haga tamrwangmo mak tabe pa-aam taraabo dinu tatoga thei dingbo?
Balangbe trumpet sem bi bazenu baraam pi baraam make dabe, tuna baraantoza kraan lang daan dingbo?
Nani le haga dannuwe. Mi nunna thei bai dingnu chongna baleina kabia swak make dabe, pa-aam rinnubo dinu tatoga thei langbo? Balangbe nani baha bi kabialune.
Talei ram bi baraam bachaat tamga amme khatle bakaba maaknu khatchale maake.
Atibriakpina baraam om bakaba ga eina thei make dabe, kabia ongnu bakhou ei talei khat la mi tolune khatle chong kabia ongnu maan ga alaang talei khat la mi tolune.
Haga danga ani khou le nani Katha om leithwan ga bathai tak briakpina rupkathan ding bacha thou lang inkunu ga zong ngo.
Atibriakpina chong katei kabianu gana maanna bakaba han swak lang kalum ding ngo.
Balangbe eina chong katei lana kalumme dabe, akatha na kalumnuwe atiyeda asung biba bakraa kraa make.
Ati dabe kakhamnu ga pa-aambo? Eina akatha le diga kalumlune khatle bakaba theinu le diga kalumlune. Eina katha le diga laa tolune khatle theinu le diga laa tolune.
Ati mak tabe nangna katha le diga swankanu kaan bi thei maknu mina nangna rin ongnu ga maanna thei mak briakpina tatoga “Amen” diga rin langbo?
Balangbe nang batakka swan chuiye atiyeda nangna mi katei dingba bacha thou lan rwe.
Eina nani mi bing ma chong chaat tamga kabia briakpina eina Arikrwang ding swanne;
katei rwan ding bachu thang lang eina chong kabianu bi chongkaang raching som kabianu ma, eina theinu le diga rupkathan bi chongkaang impaang kabia nuna inkuga bathaiye.
Unao rwan ga, theinu bi nani naosen rwan dan mako atiyeda kasianu tonu bi naosen danno atiyeda nanina theinu bi mipu phanu towo.

Chongtan bi atiga hiak thang nge, “Chong katei kabianu mi nun khatle katei rwan mun paan bina eina heiba mi nun khou rinlune; Ati ngaak peida banina Achong ding ngai thanglaye” diga Pukraangba na rinne.
Atibriakpina chong katei kabianuwa balumsanu nun lang makka balumsa maknu nun lang badannuwe atiyeda ri chong rin swaknuwa balumsa maknu nun lang make dida balumsanu nun lang nge.

Atibriakpina rupkathan mi bing bariak khatcha bi hung kadoinu kaan bi mi bingna chong chaat tei teinu kabiaye dabe, khatchale bachu maknu mak tabe balumsa maknu mi nunna habei ga khutnu kaan bi banina nani ding kalo rwe diga rin bilabo?
Atiyeda mi bingna chong rin swake dabe atiga balumsa maknu mak tabe bachu maknu tudannu pakhat sekhute dabe, mi bingna bakoi pi thei thang nge khatle mi bingna bating tamphaanglune.
Hadanga basung lamang om inkamnu ga indao swaklune; bamai bakhup taluga maanna Rikrwang ding kalumlune khatle batak takka Rikrwang nani lak pi amme diga rinlune.

Ati dabe unao rwan ga, haga pa-aambo? Nanina hung kadoinu kaan bi nani mi bingna kalum laa, bachu thangnu, chong katei, indao thangnu khatle chong han swak lang amme. Balang bingza bacha thou lang to ding ngo.
Tudannuna chong katei kabiaye dabe haga pat nina mak tabe tam kalan bi mi pat thumna baleng toga kabia ding ngo khatle mi pakhatna chong ga han swak ting ngo.
Atiyeda chong ga han swak lang mi maake dabe, rupkathan sung bi maan thiap thiap ong ding ngo khatle maan baraantoza khatle Rikrwang khou kabia dam ding ngo.
Thiamting pat ni mak tabe pat thumna kabia ding ngo. Mi kateina kakoi baze cheksinga phaang ding ngo.
Atiyeda bakim bi ongnu mi khat khou Rikrwang na pa-aam ngaakle indao thang nge dabe, kamanu mi ga thiap thiap ong ding n
Balangbe mi bingna bachu dam lang khatle mi bing ding kachui thang lang nani pakhat khat toga chong rin swak tam ding ngo.
Thiamting rwan Katha bing ga thiamting rwan thwei bi amnuwe.
Balangbe bathiangnu mi rwan om rupkathan bing bi se ongnu chaang nung suiga Rikrwang nga kasao kabaonu Rikrwang make atiyeda dai bazaangnu Rikrwang nge.
Nani kamaisana rupkathan sung bi thiap thiapka ong ding ngo, balangbe bani ding chong kabia lang za thang make; atiyeda chongtanna le rinnu danga, bani ha thwei bi ong ding ngo.
Banina pa-aam ngaakle bachu nwamnu amme dabe, haga in bi bani basan rwan khou ngai ding ngo; balangbe rupkathan sung bi chong kabianuwa kamaisa rwan lang kazaknuwe.
Ati mak tabe Rikrwang chong ga nani khouna hungnubo? Mak tabe haga nani khouza hung tangnubo?
Tudannu pakhatna maan thiamting khate mak tabe katha miye diga baning nge dabe, eina nani khou hiak tamnu bing ga Pukraangba om za thang nge diga maanna za ding ngo.
Atiyeda tudannuna haga intaamme dabe, bating intaam ding ngo.
Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, ri chong rin swaknu ga taraan ga bathaiyo khatle chong katei kabianu ding ga khaam mako.
Chwan bingza to chuiga khatle baleng toga towo.
Unaovrwan ga, hei bing chung bi eina nani khou kasam ngaaknu sacham ga nani khou rin indaonuwe. Nanina haga lousu rwe khatle nanina habei ga han ongme.
Nani om balumsat ka bathaang maaknu to mak lang Eina nani khou kasam ngaaknu sacham ga nanina choitipka ong nge dabe, haba sacham paan bina nani ding kan thang ongnuwe.
Balangbe eina le lousu damnu ga kamaga nani khou eina pi swak rwe. Haga Bathiangnu Chongdip nung suiga Christa na ani noh bing lang chungna thi thang rwe.
Bating ri thang drwe khatle Bathiangnu chong nung suiga ni thum ni Maan ring thou lat rwe,
Maanna Cephas khou atiluga potroi rwan pat somga kani khou pi mu thang ngaak rwe.
Haba nung bi Maanna unao rwan mi raza impaang katei khou leng oweiza toga pi mu thang rwe, bani lak pi mi katamna aniya tangga ring ongme atiyeda kasemna thi drwe.
Haba nung bi Maanna James khou, hageina chonglang rwan bing khou Bating pi mu thang rwe.
Heiba nung bi, bakaan tang makka ponnu naosen dannu akhou le pi mu thang rwe.
Balangbe eiba chonglang rwan khon bi sin kataknu khate. Eina Rikrwang om rupkathan ding rai damnu langna ating chonglang diga kou lang khopnu make.

Atiyeda eina to ongnuwa Rikrwang phaangkriang paan bina to ongnuwe khatle Maanna akhou pi thangnu phaangkriang ga bathaam make atiyeda eina bani mi bing ma inkuga chwan to rwe. Haga eina make atiyeda ating kalwang thang ongnu Rikrwang phaangkriang paan bina to ongnuwe.
Atibriakpina eina ngaakle, banina ngaakle anina kasam rwe atiyeda nanina balumsa rwe.
Thinu nun lak pina Bating pi ring thou rwe diga Christa ding kasamme dabe, nani lak pi mi kasemna thinu nun ring thou make diga tatoga rinnubo?
Atiyeda thinu nunna ring thou make dabe, Christa Bahak le ring thou make.
Atiga Christa na ring thou make dabe, anina kasam ongnuwa bathaang maak rwe khatle nanina balumsa ongnu ga le bathaang maak rwe.

Maanna Christa ding thi bina pi ring thou rwe diga anina Rikrwang om sake pi briakpina thinu nun ding pi ring thou thang make dabe Rikrwang na Christa ding pi ring thou make. Ati dabe ani Rikrwang om kakoinu sake nunne.
Thinu nunna ring thou make dabe, Christa le ring thoulan rwe.
Christa ring thou make dabe, nani balumsat ka bathaang maak rwe; nani noh bi ong maang nge.
Atiluga Christa khou thi damnu bani ga braan rwe.
Ring ong basaan za lang Christa khou bachunnu amme dabe ani mi bing lak pina aih sia kataknuwe.
Atiyeda atunba Christa na thi bina ring thouluga, thi damnu nun lak pina kamanu kraa to rwe.
Balangbe mi pakhat khouna thinu danga, Mi khat khouna thinu nun om ring thounuwe.
Balangbe Adam khou mi bingza thinu danga Christa khou mi bing ding pi ring thanglune.
Atiyeda baleng toga ring thoulune; kamanu kraa bi Christa, haba nung bi Maan hung latnu kaan bi Christa om mi nun ga ring thoulune.
Haba kaan bi Pukraangba na chongsem bing, ngam khatle nat bing to braan dingnu kaan bi Pukraangba na dinuba Bapa Rikrwang khou Krwang talei ga pi swak tingnu kaan bi kakhamnu ga hunglune.
Balangbe Maanna munanu bing ding Baket thwei bi thang mak basaan Maanna paanlune.
Kham katak pi to braan dingnu munanu ga thinu gaye.

Balangbe “Maanna pot bing ding Baket thwei bi thang rwe.” Atiyeda “Pot bing ding Christa thwei bi thang rwe” diga Maanna rinnu kaan bi bapum brum Christa thwei bi thang ongnu dinu biya Maan Bapum dingba sui make.
Rikrwang na pum brum om bapuba to lang Rikrwang na pot bing ding Bathwei bi thangnu kaan bi pot bing ding Bathwei bi thang damnu Basa Kapaisa Christa ding hakna Bathwei bi thanglune.
Ati mak tabe thinu nunna ring thou make dabe, thinu nun om langna baptize lou thangnu bani into langbo? Banina bazan bahak ting thinu nun om riak pi pa-aam lang baptize lou thangnubo?
Anina chakrin bathin bachan sianu bi intoga han ongnubo?
Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou nani lang bi eina lian to ongnu ga danga eina chongren toga rinnuwe. Ei kani bathin thi rwe.

Misa chaang nung suiga eina Ephesus pi nilai lak khouring nun le katwak ngaake dabe, alaang pa-aam tongnu ambo? Thinu nun ding pi ring thou mak ngaake dabe, “Ani sazo, inzo, balangbe ani inswan thilune!”
Nani ding pi minam mako, “Sa maknu mi ding karungnuna kasanu khei ding to braanne.”
Ririak senu chwan to lang barak swakro khatle noh to mako, balangbe mi kasemna Rikrwang om theinu ga maake. Nani ding to kazak langna eina heiya rinnuwe.
Atiyeda mi kasemna rinlune, “Thinu nun ding tatoga pi ring thounubo? Pa-aam pum phunluga bani hungnubo?”
He kapangnu, nangna bwan thangnu bamu ga thi make dabe haga ring thou make.
Atiga nangna bamu bwannu ga thou ka dingnu bapum gong langna bwannu make, bamu za ga bwannuwe. Bamu ga gehu mak tabe katei mu khatnu le zaye.
Atiyeda Rikrwang na Maanna bathainu nung suiga bapum gong ga pi thang nge khatle bamu bing bi ga baom baom bapum gong ding pi thang nge.
Zanti bing bacham make, misa om zanti tei, khouring bing om zanti tei, ngaa om tei, basaa om teiye.
Tambaan om pum atiluga talei ram om pum le amme. Atiyeda tambaan om lwatna khate talei ram pum om lwatna teiye.
Lumik om lwat khat amme, tha om lwat kana teiye khatle insi om lwat kana khate; balangbe insi khat om lwat ka katei insi khat om lwat le bacham make.
Thi bina ring thounu ga le hadan nuwe. Pum ga braan zanu bi bwan thang nge, baraan za maknu bi pi ring thou thang rwe.
Takung maknu toga bwan thang nge, lwat liannu bi pi ring thou thang rwe. Kasonnu bi bwan thang nge, nat pi pi ring thou thang rwe.
Bachaang om pum ga bwan thang nge, katha om pum toga pi ring thou thang rwe. Bachaang om pum khatle katha om pum amme.
Atiga hiak thang amme, “Kamanu mi Adam ga ringnu katha ngaake;” kakhamnu mi Adam ga ringnu pi thangnu katha to hung rwe.
Atiyeda katha om ga kamanu make, bachaang om gaye khatle bataang la katha om gaye.
Kamanu mi ga talei ram bi naye, kaphutna bachanuwe; kaninu Mi ga tambaan la om Pukraangba ye.
Kaphutna bachanu mi nun ga, kaphutna bachanu mi ga dannuwe; tambaan om mi nun gana tambaan om Mi ga dannuwe.
Ani nun kaphutna bachanu gong lounu danga, anina tambaan la Mi om gong le loulune.
Unao rwan ga, atun eina heiya rinnuwe, zanti le thi pum gana Rikrwang om krwang talei phangsulaye mak tabe braan zanu gana braan mak tingnu ga lousunu ngam make.
Phaang ngo, eina nani khou inthim chong rinnuwe, ani khangsung thilaye atiyeda ani ding pi gon swak thanglune.
Barapka mik karuplak pi, kakhamnu trumpet semnu kaan bi thi damnu nun ding braan lat lanu bi pi ring thou thanglune khatle ani ding pi gon thanglune.
Balangbe braan zanu ga braan lat lanuna sin basoi lune khatle thinu zanu ga thi lat lanuna sin basoi lune.
Atiga braan zanu ga braan lat lanuna sin basoi lune khatle thinu zanu ga thiza lanuna sin basoi lune, haba nung bi hiak thang damnu ga pi hung tanglune, “Thinu ding ngamnu gana kadwan drwe.”
“He thinu, naom kasat ingaabo? He kathi ram, naom ngamnu ingaabo?”
Thinu kasat ka noh we, noh om nat ka chongtanne.
Atiyeda ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bina ani lang kraan ngamnu pi thangnu Rikrwang ding swankazo.
Atibriakpina eina kriangnu unao rwan ga, han tipo, kaling maknu towo, nanina Pukraangba khou to ongnu chwan ga bathaam make dinu theiga bakaan bathin Pukraangba chwan ga khopsaga towo.
Naninavbathiangnu mi rwan lang sian khom thounu lang bi eina Galatia om rupkathan rwan khou chongtan pi thangnu danga nanina le towo.
Ei hungnu kaan bi nanina sian khai lat mak lang nani pakhat khat khou pi inku thou thangnu nung suiga nani pakhat khatna maplak om kamanu lumik pi pa-aam ngaakle kasem khai swakluga thang ngo.
Ei hungnu kaan bi nanina zanu mi kasem ding ga eina nani om chamthwan rwan le diga Jerusalem la nani om leithwan ga phunse lang bathanlune.
Atiyeda ei le se lang bathaang amme dabe, bani ei le diga se bachamne.
Eina Macedonia se rwan luga nani khou hunglune. Balangbe ei Macedonia se rwan lang amme.
Ei nani le diga hung ong bachamnu zaye mak tabe eina senu riak bing bi nanina ating bathan thang lang ei nani le sikpha ong bachamnu zaye.
Balangbe nani ding lampui bi se ong bi kadounu ei bathai make atiyeda Pukraangba na za thangnuwe dabe ei nani le diga bakaan kasem ong bacham lang baning nge.
Ei Pentecost lumik tang mak basaan Ephesus pi nei onglune.
Balangbe kaliannu khatle bakraa kraanu inkhaan khat lat thang rwe atiyeda ha ding maitwangnu mi tamga amme.
Timothy hung nge dabe, maan khatchale kachinu to makka nani le diga ong bachamnu zamo dinu phaang ngo. Balangbe eina tonu danga, maan le Pukraangba om chwan tonuwe.
Atibriakpina mi pakhatchanale bating balaanu to mak ting ngo. Atiyeda maan akhou hung lat lang bating dai bazaangga bathan thang ngo, balangbe ei khatle au anao rwanna bating ngaak ongme.
Ani unao Apollos lang bi unao rwan le diga nani khou hung lang eina bating rakanga rin ngaake atiyeda atun tangnu bi maan khatchale se nwam make atiyeda badou chanu kaan bi maan hunglune.
Barak theiyo, balumsat pi ga han tipo, sung raang ngo, kanatnu towo.
Nanina tonu bing ga kriangga towo.
Unao rwan ga, nanina Stephenas in inkhun ding theiye, bani Achaia taram om kamanu kraaye khatle banina bathiangnu mi rwan om chwanlaang to lang bazan ding kat swak rwe.
Nanina hei dannu mi nun thwei bi ong lang khatle ani le diga chwan to bachamnu khatle riangrega chwanlaang bachamnu mi bing thwei bi ong lang eina nani ding kachui thang nge.
Stephenas, Fortunatas khatle Achaicus na hungnu om lang bi ei karo take, balangbe nani pi hung maknu om kabaatnu ga banina pi thang rwe.
Banina akatha khatle nani katha ding le pi lozaan thang rwe. Atibriakpina hei dannu mi nun ding ga thei thang ngo.
Asia om rupkathan bingna nani ding kalumme. Aquila le Priscilla na le khatle bani in bi karungnu rupkathanna le nani khangsung ding Pukraangba khou karo rangaaga kalumme.
Unao rwan bingna nani ding kalumme. Bathiangnu kaputnu le bachamga nani khatna khat ting kalummo.
Kalumnu heiya Paul akutna hiaknuwe.
Tudannu mina Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding kriang make dabe, bakhou taseng ta thang ding ngo. He Pukraangba, hung thangro!
Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriangna nani ding kalwang thang ding ngo.
Jisu Christa khou ongnu nun nani khou aom kriang le ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.

Rikrwang om baning thangnu paanna Jisu Christa om chonglang toga kou thangnu Paul khatle ani unao Timothy na Corinthia bi amnu Rikrwang om rupkathan khatle Achaia taram bing bi amnu bathiangnu mi nun bing khou:
ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou am ding ngo.
Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa Pa, phaangkriang theinu Pa khatle balang bing bi bathem thangnu Rikrwang ding swankawo.
Rikrwang na ani ding bathem thangnu bathem om paanna anina riangre kanang dou ongnu bani ding bathem thang lang Rikrwang na ani om riangre kanang bing bi bathem thang nge.
Balangbe Christa om riangre kanang inza khang thangnu ani khou inku thounu danga, ani ding bathem thangnu le khopsaga Christa paan bina pi inku thou thang rwe.

Atiyeda anina riangre nangnu douwe dabe, haga nani ding bathem thang lang khatle ringriak lang nge. Haba om bakraa toga anina khaangnu danga nanina le riangrenu khaang nge. Ani ding bathem thang nge dabe haga nani ding bathem thang lang khatle ringriak lang nge.
Anina nani lang bachunnu ga tipka amme, balangbe nani om riangrenu dam lou bachamnu danga, bathem thangnu dam le lou bacham rwe dinu anina theiye.

Balangbe unao rwan ga, Asia la ani khou riangre kanang dou damnu lang bi nanina thei maknu anina bathai make: Anina khaangnu ngamnu bina inkuga ani nat chung bi potrit badan thang ngaake. Habei ga ani ringlune dinu tangga baning lan rwe.
Anina ani zan ding balumsa makka, thinu nun ding pi ring thounu Rikrwang khou balumsa lang batak takka ani lu chung bi thi lang laaknu ga am ngaake.
Rikrwang na ani ding heitia lang lianga thinu bina kan thang rwe khatle kan thang ongme, atun le Maanna ani ding ran swak thanglune diga anina balumsaye.
Nanina kalumnu kaan bi nani nun ani le diga chwan to bacham ongme. Mi nunna kalumnu paan bina Rikrwang na ani khou pi thangnu phaangkriang langna, ani om lang bina mi nunna swanka lang nge.

Balangbe ani om lian tonu ga heiye: anina talei ram bi tatonu lung bi lungbo dinu ani om kakoi baze theinu sungna sake piye. Sung khatcha toga khatle Rikrwang om bathiangnu sungna se damnuwe. Pum om ningtingna makka Rikrwang om phaangkriangna, inkuga nani pek la atiga se damnuwe.
Balangbe nanina pa ongnu mak tabe thei ongnu ga makka anina nani khou katei khat om lang bi hiak tam make. Kakhamnu tangga nanina haga theilune diga ei baning nge.
Batak takka nanina ani om lang bi kasemba thei rwe dinuba, nani nun ani om lang bi lian to rwe; hadanga ani Pukraangba Jisu om lumik ni anina le nani lang bi lian to lang nge.
Eina balumsanu am briakpina, nanina leng ninu toga tongnu lousu langna ei nani khou kamaga hung lang baning ngaake.
Eina Macedonia la senu kaan bi nani ding kadou lang khatle Macedonia bina nani khou han hung lang diga baning ngaake, atiga nanina ating Judea la sebi paang thanglune diga baning ngaake.
Atibriakpina eina heiya rang thangnu kaan bi haga ei bai takka baningbo? Mak tabe eina rang thangnu ga pum om baning nung suigabo? Eina “O, o,” khatle “Make, make” diga rin indao dingbo?
Atiyeda Rikrwang ba balumsa lang khopnuwe, nani khou ani chong ga “O” khatle “Make” dinu kani ga make.
Balangbe ei le Silvanus le Timothy na Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa Jisu Christa om lang bi nani khou kasam thangnu ga “O” khatle “Make” dinu make, balangbe Bakhou bakaan bathin “O” dinuwe.
Balangbe Rikrwang om chongren bing ga Bakhouba “O” dinuwe khatle ani paan bina Rikrwang lwat liannu bi Bakhou “Amen” dirwe.
Ani khatle ani ding Christa khou pi tip thangnu khatle ani khou thao kanun thangnu Maan ga Rikrwang nge.
Baom seal ga ani khou thang rwe khatle Katha Bathiangnu ding ani sung bi pi chainu toga pi thang rwe.
Inkuga alu chung bi sake toga eina Rikrwang ding kouwe, dinuba ei Corinthia bi hung maknuwa nani ding pi riangre mak langna ngaake.
Anina nani balumsat chung bi bapuba tonu bathai make atiyeda nani nun karo lang chwan to bachamnu rwanne, balangbe balumsanu paan bina nani tipka han ongme.
Ei asung riangrega nani khou hung lat mak lang asung han rwe.
Balangbe eina nani ding sung pi riangreye dabe, eina sung pi riangre damnu maan ga makka ating pi karo thang dingnu mizo tubo?

Eina hungnu kaan bi ating pi karo thang dingnu banina asung pi riangrenu le zaye diga eina heiba chong nga nani khou hiaknuwe. Nani mi bing om karonu ga aom karonuwe diga nani mi bing lu chung bi abalumsat amme.

Balangbe inkuga riangre kanang khaangga, sung sokka khatle mikthi taga eina nani khou hiaknu rwe. Heiya nani ding sung to riangrenu make atiyeda eina nani lang taswang khak kriangnu amnu ga nanina thei lang nge.
Tudannu pakhatna sung to riangreye dabe, maanna atingza to riangrenu make; atiyeda kasemba nani mi bing ding to riangrenuwe, eina rin inku mak lang kasemza rinnuwe.
Mi katamna bating laaknu ga balaang khopnuwe.
Haba om hut lang nanina bating kok thang ngo khatle bathem thang ngo. Ati make dabe, hadannu mi ga sung riangre lainuna hwamlem damnu le zaye.
Atibriakpina nanina bating kriang nge dinu bathiangga pi mu thang lang eina nani ding hweinuwe.
Balangbe nani nun balang bing bi rinnu ga zeibo dinu tamphaang lang eina nani khou hiaknuwe.

Nanina tudannu mi khat ting pa-aam riak pina kok thang nge dabe, eina le kok thang rwe. Balangbe eina tudannu ding kok thang nge dabe, eina kok thang damnu bating nani lang bina Christa meithaan bi kok thang rwe.
Ati mak tabe Seitaan na ani khouna badou chanu lou dam mak lang nge. Balangbe baom rang thangnu ga anina thei maknu make.
Christa om sacham langna ei Troas namlian la hungnu kaan bi Pukraangba na alaang inkhaan khat lat swak thang rwe.
Eina unao Titus ting kadou mak briakpina ei akatha bi basak riak thei mak ngaake atiyeda eina bani khou kapaang thangsialuga Macedonia la se ngaake.
Christa paan bina ani ding bakaan bathin Christa khou mai aangga kai thangnu khatle ani paan bina banamsanu barim ga bariak bathin Baom theinu ga pi phang thangnu Rikrwang ding swankaye.
Balangbe kan thang damnu nun khatle braan ongnu mi nun lak pi ani Rikrwang khou Christa om banamsanu barimme.
Thinu nun khou thinu bina thinu bi kai thangnu barim towe khatle kanthangnu nun khou ringnu bina ringnu bi kai thangnu barim to rwe. Hei bing langna khopsanu tubo?
Balangbe aniba Rikrwang chong ding to tanaatluga phun se ongnu mi nun dannu make atiyeda anina sung bathiangga Rikrwang khouna danga, Christa khou Rikrwang meithaan bi kabianuwe.

Anina ani raantoza ding rin swan latnu gabo? Mak tabe nanina bani khou pi dingnu swankanu chamthwan bing mak tabe nani khouna swankanu chamthwan bing tupaina phun hungnu danga anina le phun hung lang bathaang ambo?
Ani sung bi hiak thang damnu mi bingna thei ongnu khatle pa ongnu ani om chamthwan ga naniye.

Batakka anina chwanlaang to ongnu Christa om chamthwan ga naniye, haga mukna hiaknu make atiyeda ringga ongnu Rikrwang Katha na hiaknuwe. Lungpek pi hiak thangnu make atiyeda lungning om zanti pek pi hiak thangnuwe.
Christa paan bina Rikrwang khou hei dannu tipnu balumsat ka ani khou amme.
Anina heiba chwanna ani raanto zana tonu ngamnuwe di lang khatchale khopnu make. Atiyeda anina tonu ngamnu ga Rikrwang khou naye.
Rikrwang na ani khou chonghen kathan om khopsanu chwan tonu nun pi to thang rwe, haga bahiak om make atiyeda Katha om chwanne; balangbe bahiakna athate atiyeda Katha na ringnu piye.
Rikrwang na lung bi hiak thang damnu bahiak ka thinu om chwandon ngaake. Haga balwat am ngaake. Thi ta dingnu ngaakle Israel sa rwanna lwat om paan bina Moses om mai kum phaangban ngam mak ngaake.
Ati dabe Katha om chwandon gana inkuga lwat lian bilabo?
Balangbe pi koi thangnu chwanlaang tonu om lwat liannu amme dabe, ririak senu chwanlaang to ongnu ma lwat kana lian inkunuwe.
Balangbe inku kiatnu lwat liannu ga amnu paan bina lwat liannu am ngaaknu lwat ka atunba hei lang bi maak rwe.
Balangbe thita dam dingnu gana lwat lianne dabe, am ongnu gana lwat lian inkuwe.
Atibriakpina ani khou hei dannu bachunnu am briakpina anina sung raangga rin swake.
Israel sa rwanna braan dingnu om loinu tangga phaangban mak lang bamai kum thin thangnu Moses dannu make.
Atiyeda bani sung nat rwe. Balangbe aniya tangga banina Chonghen Lui ga panu kaan bi thin thang damnu mai kum ga lat swak make, balangbe Christa khou thin thangnu mai kum ga lou sat rwe.
Atiyeda aniya tangga banina Moses om chongdip panu kaan bi thin thangnu mai kum khatna bani sung ding ga thin thang ongme.
Ati ngaaklena tudannu khatna Pukraangba khou han hungnu kaan bi thin thang ongnu mai kum ga lat swak rwe.
Pukraangba heiya Katha ye, Pukraangba om Katha na ongnu riak pi rang tonu amme.

Atiyeda ani mi bingza ani mai kum thin thangnu to makka Pukraangba om lwat liannu ding katha an bi phaang ongme. Ani ding bachamnu Katha ga, dinuba Pukraangba om Katha paan bina ani ding lwat liannu khat pina lwat liannu khat pi pi kale thang rwe.
Heiba om langna anina phaangkriang thangnu lousunu danga heiba chwanlaang tonu chwan ga lousunuwe atibriakpina ani sung inkhinta make.

Atiyeda anina inkam thang ongnu kazaknu bing ga bathan sat rwe, rou sianu bi se makka mak tabe Rikrwang om chong ding minamga choi makka bazenu ga indao swaknu paan bina anina ani zan ding Rikrwang meithaan bi mi bing om sungna thei lang pi mu rwe.
Atiyeda ani om sacham ding ga thin thang nge dabe, braannu rwan khou thin thang rwe.
Bani khou Rikrwang om baman to ongnu, Christa om lwat liannu babaan om sacham ga bani khou baan swak mak lang hei talei ram om rina balumsa maknu mi nun mik pi cho rwe.
Balangbe anina ani om lang bi kasam make atiyeda Jisu Christa na Pukraangba ye khatle Jisu om lang bi ani nani swak rwanne diga kasamnuwe.
Balangbe kazingnu riak pi babaan ga baan thang lang Rikrwang na zathang pi thang rwe. Jisu Christa mai kum bi Rikrwang lwat theinu om baannu ga pi thang lang ani sung bi baan thang rwe.
Atiyeda kaliannu ngam ga ani khouna make atiyeda Rikrwang khou naye dinu indao lang talei ben bi ani om lan ga amme.
Ani ding nung ma imbei inchang lana kachat khute atiyeda kachat rop make; ani batok bariak thei make atiyeda baningba braan make;
raiye, bathan thang make, bazwantaye atiyeda to braan make;
