Jisu om ringnu ga ani pum bi indao swak lang Pukraangba Jisu om kathinu ga ani pum bi bakaan thin phunse ongme.
Balangbe Jisu om ringnu ding ani om thi zanu pum bi indao lang ringga ongnu ani ding bakaan bathin Jisu om lang bina thi lang pi swak rwe.
Atibriakpina thinuna ani khou chwan to rwe atiyeda ringnu gana nani khou chwan towe.

Bathiangnu chongrik pi hiak thangluga amme, “Eina balumsa damme atibriakpina eina rin damme,” diga hiak tamnu nung suiga ani khou balumsanu Katha ga am bacham ongme, anina le balumsaye khatle haba om langna rin ongme.
Pukraangba Jisu ding pi ring thou thang damnu Rikrwang na Jisu paan bina ani ding le pi ring thou thanglune khatle ani ding nani le bachamga pi mu thanglune dinu theiye.
Balangbe mi taswang khakna swankanu paan bina khopsanu baphaangkriang ga Rikrwang lwat liannu ding pi inku thou lang nani lang chungna hei bing nga hiake.
Atibriakpina ani sung inkhin make. Ani om langkaang mi ga braan ngaak peida basung la mi ga kani khat khat lang pi kathan thang ongme.
Balangbe bakaan toizanu ani om riangre kanang bahak kana ani lang balang bing bi inkuga khwa sei ringnu lwat liannu pi to rwe,
anina munu ngamnu pot pi ga phaang makka, munu ngam maknu pot pi ga phaang ongme. Munu ngamnu pot bing ga bakaan toiza zung nge atiyeda mu ngam maknu pot bingbe khwa seinu omme.
Balangbe ani om pwan in dannu talei in heiya pi braanne dabe, ani lang misa kutna bacha maknu Rikrwang khouna tambaan la khwa seinu in ani lang amme dinu anina theiye.
Atibriakpina tambaan lana ani inna pwan danga sin thang dingnu ding taraan ga ngaakka ong bi ani kakou ongme,
batak takka pwan ga sin thangnu kaan bi ani ding pum tangang doubila rwe.

Balangbe anina heiba pwan in biya ongnu kaan bi potrit phun ong briakpina ani kakou ongme, ringnuna thinu ding kadwan dam lang pwan sin thang maknu ding anina bathai make atiyeda pwan sin thangnu ding bathainuwe.
Hei langna ani ding daan thang ngaaknu ga Rikrwang nge. Maanna ani khou Katha ding le pi chainu toga pi thang rwe.
Anina pum bi in toga ong ongnu kaan bi ani Pukraangba khouna namlaaga amme dinu theiga anina bakaan bathin tipka balumsanu amme.
Balangbe ani balumsanu paan bina se ongme, munu paan bina make.
Ani tipka balumsaye khatle anina pum bina se swakluga Pukraangba le diga ong bachamnu bathainuwe.
Atibriakpina anina pum bi ong ngaakle mak tabe se swaknu ngaakle Pukraangba ding pi pemnu ga ani om badannuwe.

Balangbe mi bingna maan maanna to damnu nung suiga kasanu ngaakle, kasianu ngaakle mi bingna pum om lung bi to damnu bing om lang ga lousu lang ani mi bingza Christa om chongsem riak meithaan bi hung hanlune.
Atibriakpina Rikrwang ding kachi theiga anina mi nun ding bathemme; atiyeda ani ding Rikrwang khou indao thang rwe khatle kakoi baze theinu nani sung bi le indao thang rwe dinu ei le balumsa rwe.

Balangbe anina nani khou ani ding rinswan latnu make. Atiyeda sung bi amnu lang bi makka mu zanu lang bi lian tonu bani khou nani om chong katak pi lang nge. Hagana ani lang bi lian to langna anina nani khou badou chanu pi thang nge.
Ani kalo ngaak peida haga Rikrwang lang nge mak tabe ani bazega kakhan ngamme dabe, haga nani lang naye.
Balangbe Christa om kriangna ani ding bang thang rwe, balangbe mi pakhatna mi bing lang thi thangnu gana mi bingza thi rwe dinu anina bathiangga thei rwe;
atiga ringga ongnu rwanna bani bazan lang ring lat makka bani lang thi thangluga ring thou lat tamnu Balaang chungna ring lang Maanna mi bing lang thi thang rwe.
Atibriakpina atunna thouga anina pakhatcha ding hakna pum nung suiga thei make. Anina Christa ding pum nung suiga thei ngaaklena, atunba anina Bating han latka thei make.
Atibriakpina tudannu pakhatna Christa khou ong nge dabe, maan dam kathannu kutthiam rwe, baraannu pot bing ga thou drwe; phaang ngo, pot bingza kathan hung rwe.
Pot bingza Rikrwang khou naye, Maanna ani ding Jisu Christa paan bina Bazan Bahak khou pi taman thang rwe khatle ani ding bakhou pi taman thangnu chwandon to lang pi thang rwe,

hagazo Rikrwang na Christa khou talei ram mi nun ding Bazan Bahak khou pi taman thang rwe, mi nun om koi maan thangnu ding bani zan bi basing sem thang lan rwe khatle bakhou ani ding pi taman thangnu om chong ga bachoi thang rwe.
Atibriakpina ani Christa om chong phunnu nunne, Rikrwang na ani paan bina rinnu danga, anina Christa om saruk toga rinne, nani Rikrwang khou kasa towo.
Balangbe ani nun bapaan bina Rikrwang om ririak senu to lang noh dinu thei maknu Bating ani lang chungna noh pi to rwe.
Atibriakpina Maan le diga chwan to bachamnu nun toga nanina Rikrwang phaangkriang ga bathaang maaknu bi lou thang maknu to mak lang anina le nani ding kachui thang nge.

Balangbe Maanna rinne, “Za thangnu kaan bi eina naom kalumga ngai thang rwe, Khatle ringriak om lumik pi Eina nating paang thang rwe.” Phaang ngo, atun za thangnu bakaanne phaang ngo, atun ringriak om lumik e.
Balang bing bi mi nunna meng sianu pi mak lang anina pakhatcha ding le ket pi basui make.
Atiyeda balang bing bi ani Rikrwang chwanlaang tonu rwan danga anina khopsanu danga ani ding pi muwe, taswang khak khaang theinu bi, riangre kanang bi, bathaang amnu bi, katop kachinnu bi,
bweinu bi, qwan in bi, kasao kabaonu bi, chwan rakannu bi, in maknu bi, bu heinu bi,
bathiangnuna, theinuna, khaang seinuna, kriang thangnuna, Katha Bathiangnuna, bazenu kriangnuna,
bazenu kabianuna, Rikrwang om ngam na, kut imbei inchang la ririak senu kraan kutchoi bing paan bina,
takung tazei tonu bi khatle takung tazei to thang maknu bi, sa maknu chong impu thangnu khatle kasanu chong impu thangnu bi, minamnu nun dan peida bazenuwe;
thei bathiang maknu dan peida thei bathiang rwe, thi dam dingnu dan peida phaang ngo, ani ring ongme, laak thangnu nun dan peida athat make;
sung riangrenu nun dan peida bakaan bathin karowe, lungsianu nun dan peida taswang khak ting pi lungsa thang nge; khatchale maaknu nun dan peida pot bingza amme.
He Corinthia mi nun, nani khou anina bathiangga rin thangnu rwe, ani sung lat lian thang rwe.
Nani khou ani sung talit thang make atiyeda nani om kriangnu bi nani raan toza ding talit thang nge.
Atiga heiba om le bachamga nani sung le ani khou lat thang ngo. Heiya eina asa rwan khou danga kabianuwe.
Balumsa maknu nun le daankong pon bacham mako. Balangbe ririak senu nun le chongtan thouto maknu nun le pa-aam karung gabo? Baannu le zingnu le pa-aam badam lou bacham gabo?
Christa Le Belial le pa-aam karungnu amgabo? Mak tabe balumsanu le balumsa maknu mi le pa-aam badam amgabo?

Rikrwang om kalum in le ri maang nun le paaam zakalenu amgabo? Balangbe naniba ring ongnu Rikrwang om kalum inne. Rikrwang na rin damnu ga danga, “Eina bani khou onglune, Khatle bani lak pi selune. Eina bani Rikrwang tolune, Khatle banina Ami nun tolune.”
Atibriakpina “Bani lak pina se swakro, Khatle bani khouna tei swakro diga Pukraangba na rinne. Bathiang maknu khatchale banaan mako Atiga Eina nani ding loukhut thanglune.”
“Ei nani Pa tolune, Khatle nanina Asa kapaisa rwan khatle Asa kamaisa rwan tolune, diga Ngam Bachangnu Pukraangba na rinne.”

Atibriakpina kriangnu nun ga, ani lang heiba chongren bing nga am briakpina, mi pum le katha ding to tanaat ongnu bing bina ani raantoza to bathiang swakcho. Rikrwang ding kachinu bi bathiangnu ga pi khopsazo.
Ani khou nani sung lat thang ngo. Anina pakhatcha ding hakna pi koi thang make ani pakhatcha khou hakna to braan make, ani pakhatcha khou hakna chong karwak make,
heiya Eina nani ding koi pi ta lang rinnu make; balangbe thi bacham lang le, ring bacham lang le nani ani sung bi amme dinu eina meithaanna rin drwe.
Nani khou chong kabia lang asung raangnu amme, nani lang bi alian tonu taswang khak amme. Bathem thangnuna akhou sip rwe. Ani om riangre kanangnu bapum brum bi ei karonuna sip rwe.

Batakka pa-aambo dida ani Macedonia bi hungnu kaan bi ani pum lo basaknu am dam make atiyeda ani kim bangzaang bing bi ani ding pi riangrenu khaang nge. Langkaang lana kae kanaanu khatle basung lana kachinu am ngaake.
Ati ngaak peida phaang batanu bing ding bathem thangnu Rikrwang na Titus hungnu paanna ani ding bathem thang rwe.

Titus hungnu paanza bina makka, nanina bating bathem thangnu bathem paan bina leye. Maanna ani khou nani om lou nwam bathai taknu, nu hweinu, alaang nanina sung khut thangnu ding rin thangnu kaan bi ei karo inku thouwe.

Balangbe aom chamthwanna nani sung pi riangre thang beida ei baning ngam maknu to make. Ei baning ngam maknu am ngaak peida chamthwanna batak khatcha lang nani sung pi riangre thangnuwe dinu ei theiye.

Nani sung pi riangre thangnu makka nani sung pi riangre thangnu gana sung pi le swak briakpina atun ei karowe. Balangbe nanina ani khouna braannu khatchale dou mak lang Rikrwang om bathainu gong bi nani ding sung pi riangre rwe.
Balangbe Rikrwang om baningnu sung riangrenuna sung lenu khatle sung lenu gana ringriak pi hung nge, baning ngam maknu pi am make; atiyeda talei ram om sung riangrenuna thinu pi swake.

Balangbe phaang ngo, nani Rikrwang om baningnu sung riangrenuna riangre ngaake, hagana nani lang intia khak sung khutnu, intia khak chongkaangna kakhangnu, intia khak pi balung pwannu intia khak kachinu, intia khak bathai inkunu, intia khak sung khutnu, intia khak koinu ding laaknu pi swak ongnubo! Balang bing bi nani bahakpe heiba chonglang biya bathiang nge dinu indao rwe.

Atibriakpina eina nani khou hiak ngaak peida baze maknu chwan tonu mi om lang bi make khatle kakoinu nang damnu mi om lang bi le make; atiyeda intia khak lang anina sung khutnubo dinu ga Rikrwang mikphaang bi nani khou bathiangga indao lang naye.
Atibriakpina nani om bathem thangnu gana ani ding pui thang rwe. Ani ding Titus om karonu bi ani inku inkiatka karowe, balangbe baom katha ding nani bapum brumna bachaang pi ring thang rwe.
Balangbe eina bakhou nani om lang bi lian to thang damnu langna, ei kazak make. Atiyeda anina nani khou bataknu kabianu danga, anina Titus meithaan bi lian tonu ga le bataknu rwe.
Nanina Titus ting kachiga khatle kathokka loukhut thangluga nani mi bing zana chong zeiye dinu ga maanna baningsunu kaan bi baom kriangnu nani khou pi inkuka thang nge.
Balang bingza bi eina nani khou balumsa tipnu am ongnu langna ei karowe.
Unao rwan ga, Macedonia bi amnu rupkathan bing khou pi thang damnu Rikrwang om phaangkriang ga anina nani khou pi theiye
dinuba, riangre kanang lak pi, tamphaangnu bi ta thang ngaak peida bani taswang khak karowe khatle lungsia tak ngaak peida bani om sung lianga pi swak theinu ga inkuga lian thou rwe.
Banina ngamnu bing pi swake dinu eina sakeye. O! banina ngamnu bina inkuga pi nwamga pi swak rwe.
Banina bathiangnu mi rwan lang leithwan khatle chwanlaang tonu dam lou bachamnu ga lou thang lang ani khou rakanga hweini ngaake.
Haga anina bachun ngaaknu dannu make atiyeda kama bi Rikrwang na baningnu nung suiga banina bani pum ding Pukraangba khou khatle ani khou pi swak ngaak rwe.
Atiga Titus na to thou ngaaknu ga danga heiba phaangkriang heiya le maanna nani khou bapung pi pha thang lang anina bakhou rakanga kabia ngaake.
Atiyeda nanina balumsanu bi, rin swaknu bi, theinu bi, cheksinnu bing bi khatle nanina ani ding kriangnu, balang bing bi khopsanu danga, heiba phaangkriang bi le nani khou khopsanu to ding ngo.
Eina nani khou zathang pi ga rinnu make atiyeda mi katei rwanna cheksinnu ga muluga nani kriangga bathiang nge bathiang make dinu tamphaang lang eina rinnuwe.
Balangbe nanina ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang ding theiye, hagazo Pukraangba na lungsianu paan bina nani lungsanu to lang Maan lungsa ngaak peida nani lang bina Maan lungsianu to rwe.
Atiga abaning pi thei thangnuwe. Heiya nani lang sa inkuwe, thou damnu sangwan bi nani chwan to thou thang damnuza makka to nwamnu le nanina kamanu ngaake.
Atiyeda to nwamnu chwan rang thang ngaaknu danga, nanina nani khou amnu bi gana to loi thang lang tonu ga le atun bapungphaga to loi satro.
Balangbe pi lang baning thangnu amme dabe, bakhou amnu nung suiga pinu ga Rikrwang na lou thang nge, bakhou maaknu nung suiga make.
Balangbe katei ding pi zaangluga nani ding pi ritnu ei bathai make;

Atun kahan biya nani om katamnu gana bani om katomnu bi thang impam thangnuna saye; hagana bachamnu to lang bani om katamnu gana le nani om katomnu bi thang impam thangnuna saye. Hagana bachamnu to lang nge.
Heiya hiak thangluga amnu ga dannuwe, “Khom thang tamnu balaang ga balei make khatle titcha khom thangnu balaang ga baatnu maake.”
Titus lungning bi ei le bachamga nani langza banang thangnu pi thangnu Rikrwang ding swankaye.
Balangbe kachui thangnu ding ga lou thangnuza makka, inkuga sung khutka, maanna se nwamga nani khou se damnuwe.
Atiga maan le diga sacham kasamnu lang bi rupkathan bingna swanka ongnu unao ding anina bathan thang damnuwe.

Haza makka rupkathan bingna leithwan le bachamga ani le bazin bachamnu mi to lang bating kathang swak thang rwe. Pukraangba Bahak om lwat langna khatle anina to thang dingnu ga pi mu langna anina heiba phaangkriang om chwanlaang tonuwe.
Mi nunna inkuga pi hungnu khopsanu leithwan om chwanlaang tonu bi tudannuna ani ding pi koi mak lang ani karam ongme.
Anina Pukraangba mikphaang biza makka, mi nun mikphaang bi le bazenu ga towe.

Anina bani le diga ani unao ding lang thang rwe. Balang bing bi anina bating chat makka tamphaangnu kaan bi bakhou sung khutnu amme. Maanna nani khou balumsa taknu am briakpina atun maan inkuga sung khutnuwe.

Tudannu Titus lang bi ngaiye dabe maan abaanne khatle nani lang bi chwan to bachamnuwe. Ati mak tabe ani aunao rwan om lang bi ngaiye dabe, bani ga rupkathan om cham phunsenu nun khatle Christa om lwat liannuwe.
Atibriakpina nanina kriangnu om khatle anina nani lang bi lian tonu ga batake dinu ga nanina bani khou khatle rupkathan bing meithaan bi pi muwo.
Bathiangnu mi rwan ding chwanlaang tonu lang bi, eina nani khou hiaknu bathaang maake;

balangbe nanina paang thang nwamnu ga ei theiye; haba lang bi eina Macedonia rwan khou nani lang bi lian tonu amme, dinuba, Achaia taram la mi nunna sangwan khat meithaan lana daan thang ongnu amme; nani khou sung khutnu amnu gana mi katam ding kachui thang rwe.

Ati ngaak peida anina nani lang bi lian tonu ga heiba lang bi bathaang maaknu bi to mak lang eina unao rwan ding nani khou bathan thangnuwe, hagazo eina rin damnu ga danga, nanina daanga ong lang naye.
Ati mak tabe Macedonia rwan nun ei le diga hung bi nanina daanga ong ngo. Ati make dabe anina lian tonu om tipka balumsanu bi ani kazaknu doulune.

Atibriakpina unao rwan ding nani khou kamaga se lang kachui thangnu sa rwe diga ei baning ngaake. Balangbe nanina kamaga za kale thang damnu leithwan ga sung lianga pi lang naye. Haga bataiga pi makka sung lianga pi ding gaye.
Atiyeda eina heiya rinnuwe, tomga bwan thangnu maan gana tomga lwaklune, tamga bwan thangnu maan gana tamga lwaklune.
Mi pakhat khatna balungning bi han thangnu ga pi ding gaye, kheithinu to makka mak tabe pi maknu za maknu danga pi mak ting gaye; balangbe karo karoga pinu mi ding Rikrwang na kriang nge.
Atiga balang bing bi, bakaan bathin nani khou baatnu to mak lang kasanu chwan bing khopsaga am dam lang Rikrwang na Baphaangkriang ga nani khou pi khopsa thangnu ngamme.
Heiya hiak thangnu ga dannuwe, “Maanna chai imphaang sat tamme, Maanna lungsianu nun lang pi thang damme; Baom ririak senu ga khwa sei kaling makka amme.”

Tachi bwannu mi lang tachi pi thangnu khatle thaisaak lang uilu pi thangnu Maanna nani lang le bwan lang tachi pi khopsa thang dam ding ngo, nanina bwan damnu tachi ga pi tam thang ding ngo khatle nani om ririak senu kraa ga pi inku thang ding ngo.
Nani nun aangga pi ngam lang balang bing bi nani ding pi lungsa thanglune, haba om langna ani paan bina Rikrwang ding swankalune.
Balangbe nanina chwanlaang to ongnu gongna bathiangnu mi rwan om kabaatnu lang pi thangnuza makka, mi nunna Rikrwang ding swankanu pi khopsa thang nge.
Nanina heiba chwan tonu om sake langna Christa om sacham rin swaknu ding banina zei rwe khatle nanina bani khou khatle mi bing khou pi nwamga pi swak thangnu langna banina Rikrwang lwat pi lian rwe.
Atiga banina nani lang hweininu kaan bi nani khou amnu Rikrwang om khopsanu phaangkriang paan bina banina nani ding kadou nwam tak ngaake.
Rikrwang om rin ngamlanu Baom tasiatnu leithwan langna Bating swankanu to ding ngo.
Christa om sung banemnu khatle bazaangnu paan bina Paul, ei azan bahakna nani khou kachui thangnuwe. Ei nani le ong bachamnu kaan bi sung banemme atiyeda ong bacham maknu kaan bi sung raang nge.

Ei ongnu kaan bi eina balumsa tipnu le bachamga, mi kasem maitwang bi asung raangnu indaone diga baning ngaaknu ga sung raangnu to mak lang eina nani ding hweiye. Banina ani ding pum nung suiga senu nunne diga baning nge.
Anina pum nung suiga se ngaaklena ani pum nung suiga kraan katwak make.
Balangbe anina kraan kutchoi ga pum om make atiyeda kraan kapan ding to bak lang Rikrwang paan bina kutchoi bing ga ngam amnuwe.
Baningnu bing khatle Rikrwang ding theinu ding maitwangluga kaliannu basaangnu chwan bing bi anina to bakluga lungning bing ding qwan in mi ding danga Christa na rinnu zeinu tangga phun hung nge.
Nanina chong zei chuiga ongnu kaan bi chong zei maknu bing ding laak lang anina daan ongme.

Nanina balang bing bi langkaang la munu nung suiga phaangnubo? Tudannu khatna maan Christa om rwe dinu bathiangga theiye dabe, maan Christa om tonu danga, ani le Christa omme diga maan baraanto kakhan han lat ting ngo.
Balangbe ani ngam om lang bi eina kasem lian to ngaak peida, ei kazak lang maake. Heiya nani ding bacha thou lang Pukraangba na ani khou ngam pi thang rwe khatle nani ding to braan lang make.
Aom chamthwan bing paan bina eina nani ding basinuwe diga baningnu ei bathai make.
Balangbe banina rinne, “Baom chamthwan bing ga chong nate khatle ngam amme atiyeda bapum amnu kaan biba sonne khatle bachong biakpa khatchale make.”
Heipai mi gana atiga baning ding ngo, hagazo ani ong maknu kaan bi chamthwan om paanna chongkaang bi danga ani ongnu kaan bi le chwan toga tolune.

Balangbe bani raan toza ding swankanu tudannu nun le bachamga ani raan to zana ani ding balang khat pi thang lang mak tabe rin kaba lang ngam make. Atiyeda bani chamna bani raanto bani ding badat ongnu khatle bani chamna khat khat ting rin kaba ongnu bani ga thei ka maknu mi nunne.

Atiyeda ani haba badat thangnu chwanlaang om chaang bi gana inkuga lian tolaye atiyeda Rikrwang na ani khou pi thangnu chwanlaang om chaang nung suiga anina lian to lang nge, haba chwanlaang om chaang ga nani khou le hung tang lang nge.
Balangbe anina nani khou hung tang lang anina ani bahak ting inkuga balaan swak make; balangbe anina nani khou Christa om sacham phunluga anina hung damnu ga nani khouwe.

Ani khou am ongnu chaang bina inkuga dinuba, katei mi nun om chwan lang bi ani lian to make. Atiyeda anina nani om balumsat inku thounu kaan bi nani paan bina nani lak pi ani om chwan chaang inku kalune dinu ani bachun amme.
Heiya nani khouna inkuga katei riak pi anina sacham kasam lang khatle mi khatna kamaga to ngaaknu chwan lang bi lian to mak lang naye.
Atiyeda “Lian tonu maan gana Pukraangba khou lian to ding ngo.”
Balangbe baraantoza ding rinswannu ga za thang make atiyeda Pukraangba na rinswannu bating ga za thangnuwe.
Eina pang domnu bi nanina khaang thangnu bathaiye; batak takka, alaang chungna nanina khaang thang rwe.
Balangbe Rikrwang om antiamnu gana nani lang chungna antiam rwe. Balangbe bathiangnu reizuni toga kat thang langna khat tak khatchanu basan tonu Christa khou munchat thang rwe.
Barunna baom barou sianuna Eve ting bathem swak tamnu ga danga, Christa khou amnu nani sung bathiangnu baning ding to braannu zaye diga ei kachiye.

Balangbe anina kasam maknu Jisu katei khat kasamnu mi khat hungnu le zaye atiga nanina bating ga bathiangga loukhut thang nge. Meithaan lou thang maknu katha khat ting lousunu zaye mak tabe nanina kamaga lou thang mak ngaaknu sacham katei khat nanina lousunu zaye, nanina haga loukhut chuiga loukhut thangnu zaye.
Balangbe ei inkunu chonglang rwan ma sinnu make diga ei baning nge.
Ei chong kabia thei maknu ngaaklena, theinu bi baatnu make. Atiyeda anina ani zan ding balang bing bi bathiangga nani lak pi pi mu thang rwe.
Eina nani khou Rikrwang om sacham bathaam kasam thangnu paan bina nani ding pi lian thou lang ei azanna ating pi bangiam ta briakpina ei noh torubo?
Eina nani ding chwanlaang to langna katei rupkathan bing bina lo man louluga bani khouna kasut rwe.

Eina nani le ong bachamnu kaan bi khatle alaang baatnu kaan bi eina nani khou potrit pi to make. Balangbe Macedonia taram lana hungnu unao rwanna alaang kabaatnu bing pi thang rwe, balang bing bi ei nani lang potrit imbei mak langna ei azan ding cheksinne khatle ei cheksinga ongne.
Christa om bazenu ga akhou am briakpina eina asung liannu kaan bi Achaia taram la amnu pakhatchanale ating khaamlaye.
Pa-aam to ba dabo? Eina nani ding kriang mak briakpinabo? Rikrwang na theiye.
Banina lian tonu bi ga ani le bachamnu to lang badou chanu zong nge. Bani om badou chanu to braan sat tam lang eina to ongnu ga eina tone.
Balangbe ha rwan ga baze maknu chonglang rwan khatle minamnu nunne. Bani bazan bahakna Christa om chonglang rwan thot pi gonne.
Habei ga loh lo lang maake, balangbe Seitaan na le bating kabaannu tambaan chonglang om thot pi gonne.
Atibriakpina baswak rwanna le ririak senu nun om thot gon swaknu heiya kungnu chwan make, bani om kakhamnu ga banina tonu chwan nung suilune.
Eina rin han late, ei kapangnuwe diga pakhatchanale baning mak ting ngo. Atiga baning nge dabe, ei alian to lang kapangnu mi khat ting loukhutnu danga ating loukhut ting ngo.
Eina kabianu ga Pukraangba na kabianu nung suiga make atiyeda lian tonu om tipka balumsanu bi kapangnu mi khatna kabianu danga kabianuwe.
Mi taswang khakna pum nung suiga lian towe khatle eina le lian tolune.
Balangbe nani nun ningting briakpina nanina kapangnu rwan ding karoga khaang thang rwe.

Balangbe mi khatna nani ding swak pi towe dabe, mi khatna nani ding kadwanne dabe, mi khatna nani khouna lou swake dabe, mi khatna baraantoza ding pi lianne dabe, mi khatna namai kum bi kabeng nge dabe, nanina haga le khaang thang nge.
Ani songa ongnuna, eina kazaknu le bachamga kabiaye! Atiyeda mi khatna sung raang nge dabe, eina le sung raang dingnuwe. Eina kapangnu danga kabianuwe.
Bani Hebrew sa rwanbo? Ei leye. Bani Israel mi rwanbo? Ei leye. Bani Abraham kik taatpo? Ei leye.

Bani Christa om chwanlaang tonu rwanbo? Eina kapangnu khat tanga kabianuwe. Eina inkunu maang nge; atiyeda eina chwan tonuna taswang khak inkuwe, ating bweinu basing thei make, qwan in bi ong katupe, thinu riak pi ta thang katupe.
Jihudi rwan khouna ating bwei leng sombali lang khatcha baatka tazam khaang leng impaang ngaake.
Thingna bwei leng inthum ngaake, lungna phet leng owei ngaake, li kasuk leng thumnu nang ngaake, ei tuipui bi zingpha khat thamlai khat nei ngaake;

bazin se katup ngaake, tuiqwa bi riangre nangnu, bruksaak mi nun khouna riangre nangnu, man ram sa rwan lak pi riangre nangnu, Gentile rwan lak pi riangre nangnu, namlian bi riangre nangnu, ramhaang bi riangre nangnu, tuipui bi riangre nangnu, baze maknu unao rwan khouna riangre nangnu,
lo maaknu, chwan to riangrenu bi, katupka insu maknu bi, chaam taraan khaangnu bi, katupka sasu insu maknu bi, sikpha kasik nangnu, sin basoi maaknu, hei bing dou ngaake.
Langkaang la om hei bingza makka rupkathan bing om potrit kani bathin akhou hung ngaake.
Mi kasemna sonne dabe ei le sonnu makpo? Banina mi kasem ding ket pi basuiye dabe, asung sounu makpo?
Eina alian towe dabe, ei ason lang bi alian to lang nge.
Ei minamnu chong kabia make diga thei thangnu ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Pa, Rikrwang le tonu Bating bakhwa seiga swankawo.
Damascus namlian om krwang Aretas thwei bi ongnu taleipubana ating nam langna Damascus rwan namlian ding ga rangkaan thang ong ngaake.
Atiyeda ating luklei khat pi thangluga kapan inkhaan swan bina bathantaluga ei bakut pina dwak ngaak rwe.
Lian tonuna alaang tong make. Atiyeda Pukraangba na akhou pi mu thangnu khatle indao thangnu paan bina eina atiga kabiane.

Christa khou ongnu mi pakhat ting ei thei ngaake; sangwan somga bali meithaan la Rikrwang na bating inthumnu tambaan la phunka ngaak rwe. Bapum amnubo dinu ei thei make mak tabe bapum maakrubo dinu ei thei make, Rikrwang na theiye.
Hei dannu mi ding ga ei theiye, dinuba bapum suinumo sui maknubo ei thei make, Rikrwang na theiye.
Bating Paradise la phunka drwe khatle mi khatna rin swaknu za maknu khatle kabia tang ngam maknu chong bing theisu rwe.
Eina hei dannu mi om lang bi lian tone; atiyeda ei son briakpina makka, azan lang bi lian tolaye.

Balangbe eina lian to nwam beida kapangnu miba tolaye; balangbe ei bazenu kabiane. Tudannu pakhatna ating munu khatle akhouna thei briakpina maanna alang bi taswang khak kakhan mak lang ei lian tolaye.
Indao thangnu tam briakpina ei inkuga lian to mak lang apum bi kaling khat pi thang rwe. Eina inkuga lian to mak lang, ating to riangre lang Seitaan om cham phunnu pi thang rwe.
Atibriakpina haga akhouna se swak tam lang eina Pukraangba khou hweini leng thum ngaake.
Atiyeda Maanna akhou rinne, “Aom phaangkriang nalaang khop rwe; balangbe sonnu kaan bi anat ting pi khopsa thang nge.” Atibriakpina Christa om ngam ga akhou am lang ei sonnu bi karo takka lian tone.
Atibriakpina eina Christa khou sonnu bi, kazaknu bi, baatnu bi mak tabe rainu bi, riangre kanang dounu bi ei hweini ngaake; ei sonnu kaan bi ei nate.

Eina alian tonu kaan bi ei kapangnu towe, haga nanina ating pi tonuwe. Balangbe nanina ating swanka rwe diga rin lang naye; balangbe Ei khatchale maknu mi ngaak peida, inkunu chonglang rwan ma ei khatchale maknu to make.
Batakka eina chonglang khat tonu om badan ga nani lak pi khaang theinu badan bing amnu tasiatnu chwan bing khatle ngam liannu chwan bing to loi thang ngaak rwe.
Balangbe eina azan ding nani khou potrit pi to thang maknu makka, tatonu gong bi rupkathan katei ma nanina son inkunu paaam amgabo? Heiba kakoinu lang bi ating kok thang ngo.

Phaang ngo, ei leng thumnu toga nani khou hung lang daan ongme. Ei nani ding potrit pi phunlaye; balangbe ei nani pot ting zongnu make atiyeda nani ding nge. Balangbe basa rwanna banu bapa rwan lang khom thang lang make atiyeda banu bapa rwanna khom thang lang nge.
Atibriakpina eina nani lang aom ka amnu ga karoga ting thangne khatle nani khou sin thangne; Eina nani ding kriang tak peida naninaba ating titcha kriang nge,
hagana bazenu ngaaklena eina nani ding potrit pi phun dam make; atiyeda nani ding eina minamnu gana nani ding namsu rwe.
Eina nani khou bathan thang damnu mi nun paan bina ei nani khouna badou chanu lougabo?

Eina Titus ting kachui thang ngaake khatle au anao ding maan le diga nani khou bathan thang rwe. Titus na nani khouna tongnu lousurubo? Ani nun Katha khat paan bina se bachamnu makpo? Ani ket kaam khatcha kaam bachamnu makpo?
Anina ani pum ding kakhang latnuwe diga nani baningbo? Anina Rikrwang meithaan bi Christa khou kabianuwe; atiyeda kriangnu rwan ga, nani ding bacha thou langna anina hei bing nga kabianuwe.

Balangbe eina hungnu kaan bi eina bathainu danga nani ding kadou maknu zaye khatle nanina bathai maknu toga ating kadounu zaye diga ei kachiye; kae kanaanu, antiamnu, balung pwan taknu, balaang theinu, impu thang kalenu, nung ma khanrainu, tu tu tam tamnu, lian tonu, chong swak laa swaknu zaye.

Ei hung latnu kaan bi Arikrwang na ating nani lang bina pi bangiamtanu zaye atiga mi taswang khakna noh toga, banina to damnu bathiang maknu lungkoi lungmaannu, imbet boulaanu hei bing bina sung le mak ngaaknu bani om lang bi ei lungchungnu le zaye.
Eina nani khou hung dingnu heiya leng thumnu lamsek lang nge. “Sake pat ni mak tabe pat thum om munsupnu bina balang bing baze rwe diga lou ding gaye.”

Eina nani khou kamaga rin drwe khatle eina nani le leng ninu toga ong bachamnu danga rin basaamnuwe; atun ei ong maknu kaan bi meithaan noh to damnu nun khatle mi bing khou eina hiaknuwe, hagazo eina hung late dabe, bani katei ding bathaam bathanlaye;
Christa na asung bi kabia thangnu ding nanina bazenumo baze maknubo dinu lang bi zong ongme. Christa ba nani pek la sonnu make atiyeda Maan nani khou nate.

Balangbe batak takka sonnu bi Bating cross pi banina athat ngaak peida Rikrwang om ngam paan bina Maan ringga ongme. Hadanga ani Bakhou sonne atiyeda Rikrwang ngam paan bina nani pek la ani Maan le ring bachamlune.

Atiga nani balumsanu bi ongmo ong makpo dinu thei lang nani bahakna tamphaang ngo. Nani nazan bahakna kakhan phaang ngo. Mak tabe Jisu Christa nani khou ongme dinu nani thei mak chunggabo? Mak tabe nani za maknuwe.
Atiyeda ani khopsa maknu mi nun make dinu nani theiye diga ei balumsaye.
Atun nanina sa maknu chwan to mak lang eina Rikrwang khou kalumme, ani ding za thang rwe dinu pi mu langna make atiyeda ani ding za maknu nun toga mu ngaaklena, nanina bazenu chwan to lang naye.
Balangbe anina bazenu om maitwang bi khatchale chwan tonu ngam make atiyeda bazenu lang naye.
Balangbe anina sonnu khatle nanina natnu kaan bi ani karowe. Nani nun khopsanu to langna le ani hweiniye.
Atibriakpina to braan lang makka bacha thou lang Pukraangba na akhou pi thang damnu ngam nung suiga ei ongnu kaan bi sialaiga to mak tam lang eina ong maknu kaan bi heiba lang bing nga hiaknu rwe.
Kakhamnu bi unao rwan ga, karo ngo, sung raang ngo, sung kazonga ong ngo, dai bazaangga ong ngo; kriangnu khatle dai bazaangnu pi thangnu Rikrwang na nani ding ong bacham thang ding ngo.
Bathiangga kaput kalega nani khatna khat ting kalum kaleyo.
Bathiangnu mi bingna nani ding kalumme.
Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang, Rikrwang om kriang khatle Katha Bathiangnu om badam lou bachamnu gana nani ding ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
Paul, mi nun khouna le maknu, mi khat paan bina le maknu atiyeda Jisu Christa paan bina khatle Bating thinu bina pi ring thou thangnu Pa Rikrwang paan bina chonglang tonu
khatle ong bachamnu unao rwan bingna Galatia bi amnu rupkathan bing khou,
Pa Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou pi thang ding ngo.
Maanna ani Pa khatle Rikrwang na baningnu nung suiga heiba sa maknu bakaan bina ani ding kan thang langna Jisu Christa na Bapum bahak ting ani noh lang chungna pi swak thang rwe.
Rikrwang khou khwa sei lwat liannu to ding ngo. Amen.
Christa om phaangkriang bi nani ding kou thangnu Bakhouna nanina heitia lang barapka sacham katei khat la kanei damnu langna ei loh lowe.
Haga katei make atiyeda nani ding pi riangre ongnu mi kasemna Christa om sacham ding to kale lang tonu nun amme.
Atiyeda anina nani khou kasam ngaaknu sacham ga maknu sacham katei khat ani bahakna mak tabe, tambaan chonglang khatna taluga kasam ngaake dabe bakhou taseng ta thang ding ngo.
Anina meithaan rin damnu ga danga atun le eina rin latnuwe, tudannu pakhatna nanina lousu damnu ga maknu sacham katei khat kasamme dabe maan ga taseng phang dam ding ngo.

Balangbe atun ei mi nun ding pi pem za lang zongnumo ati mak tabe Rikrwang ding pi pem lang zong ongnubo? Mak tabe mi nun ding pi pem lang karam ongnubo? Balangbe eina mi nun ding pi pemnu towe dabe, ei Christa om swak to mak ngaak tingnuwe.
Atiyeda unao rwan ga, eina kasam ongnu sacham heiya misa khouna make dinu eina nani khou pi thei nwamme.
Balangbe heiya eina misa khouna lousunu le make, mi khatna bachu thangnu bina le make. Atiyeda Jisu Christa na akhou indao thangnu paan bi naye.
Balangbe bakaan khat pi Jihudi rwan om ririak pi eina se ong ngaaknu thot ka nanina thei rwe. Rikrwang om rupkathan ding eina heitia lang railuga to braan sat lang to ong ngaake.
Eina apu apa rwan om chaang bi, inkuga sung khutluga atalei bi mi nun lak pi, abaan rwan inza ma Jihudi rwan ririak pi kamaga se ngaake.
Atiyeda Rikrwang na pem thangga ating anu bonpui sung bina kathang thang rwe khatle Baphaangkriang paan bina ating kou thang rwe.
Heiya Basa Kapaisa ding akhou indao thangluga eina Bating Gentile rwan khou kasam lang nge. Eina haba kahan bi pakhatcha khou le kathuinu make.
Jerusalem bi ameithaan ong ngaaknu chonglang rwan khou le ei se make atiyeda ei Arab la seye khatle Damascus la hung late.
Haba nung sangwan inthum nung bi ei Jerusalem la Peter ding kadou lang se ngaake khatle habei ga maan le diga ni somga impaang nei bacham ngaake.
Atiyeda Pukraangba nao kapaisa James ting maknu chonglang katei pakhatcha ding le mu make.
Atun eina nani khou hiaknu om lang bi phaang ngo, ei Rikrwang meithaan bi chong karwak make.
Haba nung bi ei Syria le Cilicia la se ngaake.
Atiga Christa khou ongnu Judea bi amnu rupkathan bingna ating man thei mak ngaake.
Atiyeda banina alang bi ngaisu zaga ong ngaake, “Meithaan ani ding rai ong ngaaknu mi gana to braan sat lang to ngaaknu balumsat ting maanna kasam ong rwe.”
Banina alang bi Rikrwang ding swan ngaake.
Sangwan somga bali nung bi eina Barnabas le Titus ting kalwangluga Jerusalem la se ngaake.

Atiga akhou indao thangnu nung suiga eina senuwe. Eina Gentile rwan lak pi kasam ngaaknu sacham ga balu tonu rwan khou eina inthimthwei toga pi thei rwe. Haga eina pak ongnu khatle pak hung ongnuwa bathaang maaknu pi to nwam mak briakpi naye.
Atiyeda ei le diga se bachamnu Titus ka Greek rwan ngaak peida, bating mun rom lang banina bathem mak ngaake.

Atiyeda ani ding swak rwan pi to lang Jisu Christa om paan bina anina lousunu rang tonu ding ga inthimthwei toga phaang lang inkamga khutnu baze maknu unao rwan ding phunkhutnu langna heiba lang bing nga swaknuwe.
Sacham om bazenu ga nani khou chat makka am lang anina chakrin khatcha hakna bani thwei ong lang za mak ngaake.

Atiyeda basaangnu nun danga ongnu nun ga bani pa-aam aam ngaakle, akhouba khatchale teinu maake. Rikrwang na mi thot mi mai phaang make. Balangbe basaangnu nun danga ongnu nun gana akhou khatchale pi inku kanu maake.
Atiyeda balang khat la Peter khou mun romnu mi nun lang sacham bachoi thangnu danga, mun rom maknu mi nun lang sacham akhou pi thang rwe dinu banina mu ngaake.
Balangbe mun romnu rwan lang chonglang rwan chwan bi Rikrwang na Peter khou bakraa kraa ga chwan tonu danga, Gentile rwan lang akhou le to thang rwe.

Atiga akhou pi thangnu phaangkriang ga inteng toga thei kale ongnu James, Cephas khatle John na theinu kaan bi Barnabas le arwei khou badam lou bachamnu kut inchang balaan swak rwe. Anina Gentile rwan khou se lang atiluga banina mun romnu rwan khou se lang za thang rwe.
Anina lungsianu rwan lang kakhan thangnu bahak heiya banina bathainuwe; eina le ha bahak to lang taswang khak bathai ngaake.
Atiyeda Peter na Antioch pi hungnu kaan bi bakhou koi am briakpina eina bamaitwang bi twei ngaake.

Balangbe James khouna mi kasem hung mak balei, maanna Gentile rwan le sa in bacham ngaake. Atiyeda banina hungnu kaan bi maanna mun romnu nun ding kachiga maan bazan ding baning inkhinluga tei swak thou rwe.
Katei am thang sianu Jihudi rwan mi kasemna le Peter le diga sathot to rwe. Atiga Barnabas ting tangga banina kai lang swak rwe.

Banina sacham om bazenu nung suiga bazega se make dinu munu kaan bi eina khangsung meithaan bi Peter khou rin ngaake, “Nang Jihudi rwan toga bani om chaang se makka Gentile rwan om chaang danga lung ong nge dabe, nangna Gentile rwan ding Jihudi rwan om chaang danga se lang tatoga namga pi to ongnubo?
Ani basana Jihudi rwanne khatle noh phunnu Gentile rwan dannu make.

Mi khat ting chongtan zeinu paan bina pi baze thangnu make atiyeda Jisu Christa ding balumsanu paan bi naye dinu theiga anina le chongtan zeinu paanna makka, Christa khou balumsanu paan bina ani ding pi baze thang lang Christa Jisu khou balumsa rwe. Balangbe chongtan zeinu paan bina pakhatcha ding le pi baze thanglaye.
Atiyeda Christa paan bina ani ding pi baze thang lang zong ong bi, ani ding ani bahakna noh phunnuwe dinu douwe dabe Christa ga noh om chwanlaang tonu gabo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo.
Balangbe eina to basiat tamnu pot ting eina bacha thou late dabe, ei chongtan zei maknu miye dinu araanto ating pi mu rwe.
Balangbe ei Rikrwang khou ring langna chongtan paan bina ei chongtan bi thi rwe.

Ei Christa le diga cross pi thi bacham rwe. Ei ringga ongnuwa eina ringnu make atiyeda heiya Christa na asung bi ong thangnu paan bi naye. Atun ei apum ringga ongnuwa ating kriang thang ongnu khatle alaang chungna pi swak thangnu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding balumsanu paan bi naye.
Eina Rikrwang phaangkriang ding ga bathaang maaknu pi to make. Balangbe chongtan zeinu paan bina ririak senu towe dabe Christa na thi thangnu ga baha bi zung rwe.”

He kapangnu Galatia rwan ga, nanina bazenu ding ga zei mak lang tuna nani sung ding pi tamam thangrugabo? Nani mik meithaan bahak pi Jisu Christa ding cross pi athat thang damnu lang bi bathiangga pi mu thang rwe.
Eina nani khouna heiza theinu bathaiye, “Nani chongtan zeinu paan binamo mak tabe nanina ngaisunu ga balumsaluga Katha Bathiangnu ga phangnubo?
Nani intia lang pangnubo? Katha paan bina sing thou damnu ga atun nanina pum om paan bina pi bapung pha thang ongnubo?
Nanina baha bi heitia lang riangre kanang khaangnubo? Haga batak takka baha bi zunggabo?

Atibriakpina nani khou Katha ding pi thangnu Rikrwang na nani lak pi tasiatnu chwan bing to thang rwe. Maanna haga chongtan zeinu paan binamo mak tabe nanina ngaisunu ga balumsaluga Maanna haga to thangnubo?
Haga danga Abraham na le Rikrwang ding balumsanu paan bina bating ririak senu diga chak thangnu ga dannuwe.
Atibriakpina balumsanu nun za ga Abraham sa rwanne dinu nani thei thang ngo.

Rikrwang na Gentile rwan ding balumsanu paan bina pi baze thangne dinu Bathiangnu Chongdip mu chaak briakpina, Abraham khou sacham ga kamaga kasam thangga rinne, “Napaan bina chaat bing khou rithoi pi thangne.”
Atibriakpina balumsanu Abraham le bachamga balumsanu mi bing ding rithoi pi thang rwe.

Balangbe chongtan om chwan tonu bing ga taseng thwei bi ongnuwe. Balangbe atiga hiak thang nge, “Chong zei lang chongtan om chongdip pi hiak thang damnu bing ga bakaan bathin zei maknu bing khou taseng phang ding ngo.”
Atiyeda Rikrwang meithaan bi chongtan paanna pakhatcha ding le pi baze thang make dinu bathiangnuwe. Balangbe “Ririak senu maan gana balumsat paan bina ringlune.”
Atiyeda chongtan gabe balumsanu bina make atiyeda “Chongtan bing zeinu maan ga ha bing paan bina ringlune.”
Christa na ani hut toga taseng to thangluga, chongtan om taseng bina ani ding ran swak thang rwe. Balangbe atiga hiak thang ngaake, “Thing chung bi bakhai thangnu mi ga taseng phangnuwe.”
Hagazo Christa Jisu paan bina Abraham om rithoi ga Gentile rwan khou le hung tang lang nge. Anina balumsanu paan bina karen thangnu om Katha ga lousu lang nge.
Au anao rwan ga, eina misa om chaang nung suiga rinnuwe. Mi nun om chongren tangga pi tip thang damnu kaan bi pakhatchanale baha bi pi ta make mak tabe habei ga hap thang make.

Chongren bing ga Abraham khatle baom Kik taat khou pi thang ngaake. Maanna “Kik taat rwan khou” diga rin make atiyeda pakhatcha lang bi rinluga “Naom Kik taat khou” diga rinne. Kik taat ka Christa ye.

Atun eina rinnu ga heiye, Rikrwang na Christa khou meithaanna pi tip thang damnu chongren ding ga sangwan raza bali somthum nung la hungnu chongtan gana chong karennu ga bakraa kraa mak lang to mut make.
Balangbe phang dingnu rakhum lwak ka chongtan paan binaye dabe, chongren paanna lan rwe. Atiyeda Rikrwang na Abraham khou karen thangnu paan bina haga pi thang damnuwe.

Ati dabe chongtan om kanaanu pa-aambo? Karen thang damnu mi nun khou Kik taat ka hung mak aangnu tangga koi maan om langna chongtan ga pi tip thang rwe. Heiya tambaan chonglang rwan paanna tabat tonu kutna chongtan ga bacha thou thangnuwe.
Tabat to thangnu maan gana phom khatcha ding kai karung thangnu make. Atiyeda Rikrwang ba khatcha zung nge.

Ati dabe chongtan ga Rikrwang chongren bing maitwang bi amnubo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Balangbe ringnu pi thang ngamnu chongtan pi thang ngaake dabe, batak takka ririak senu heiya chongtan paan bina to ngaak tingnuwe.
Atiyeda Jisu Christa khou balumsanu paan bina karen thangnu ga balumsanu nun lang pi thang lang Bathiangnu Chongdipna ha bing ding noh thwei bi thang rwe.
Atiyeda hung dingnu balumsat ka indao thang mak basaan, chongtanna ani ding ong qwat thang ong ngaake. Kanung indao thang dingnu langna ani ding thin thang ong ngaake.
Atibriakpina ani ding Christa khou kai hung thang lang chongtanna ani om bachuthangnupa pi to thang rwe. Heiya balumsanu paanna ani ding pi baze thang lang naye.
Atun balumsanu gana hungnu kaan bi anina haba bachuthangnupa thwei bi ong latlan rwe.
Balangbe nani nun Jisu Christa khou balumsanu paan bina Rikrwang sa kapaisa rwanne.
Balangbe Christa khou baptize to damnu nani mi bingna Christa ding pwan sinnu danga sin rwe.
Jihudi mak tabe Greek rwan, swak mak tabe rang tonu, kapaisa mak tabe kamaisa dinu bacham maknu maake. Balangbe nani mi bing Christa Jisu khou khatcha zung nge.
Nani Christa omme dabe, nani Abraham om kik taat rwanne. Atiga chongren nung suiga nani rakhum lwak tingnu nunne.
Atun eina heiya rinnuwe, rakhum lwaknu maan gana naosen basaan maan ga pum brumza bapuba to beida, swak ka le teinu maake.
Atiyeda bapana ret thangnu bakaan ga hung tang mak basaan, maan bating ngaaksian thangnu nun om khatle phaangkhut ongnu thwei bi ong nge.
Hadanga anina naosen bado talei ram om bakung tonu om bachu thangnu thwei bi ani ding le bang thang ong ngaake.
Atiyeda bakaan badat ka hung tangnu kaan bi Rikrwang na Basa Kapaisa ding lang hung rwe. Maan kamaisana ponnu, chongtan thwei bi ponnuwe.
Heiya chongtan thwei bi ongnu nun ding ran swak thang lang nge. Basa kapaisa pi to thangnu ga anina lousu lang nge.
Nanina sa kapaisa rwan to briakpina Rikrwang na Basa Kapaisa om Katha ding ani sung bi lang hung thang rwe. Katha gana “Abba, Apa” diga kou rwe.
Atibriakpina nang swak to latlan rwe. Atiyeda sa kapaisa to rwe. Sa kapaisa to briakpina Christa paan bina nang Rikrwang om rakhum lwaknu mi to rwe.
Atiyeda haba kaan bi nanina Rikrwang ding thei mak balei bachaang toga ri ka maknu nun ding kalum ong ngaake.

Atiyeda atun nanina Rikrwang ding theiru briakpina mak tabe Rikrwang na nani ding theiru briakpina, tatoga nanina kasonnu khatle khopsa maknu bachu thangnu bi ga kanei khut latluga nanina swak to lat lang bathainubo?
Nanina lumik, tha, bakaan khatle sangwan ding ngaake.
Eina baha bi nani lang chwan to damnubo diga nani langna ei kachinu amme.
Au anao rwan ga, nani eina nani ding hwei ongme, Ei dan lang to thang ngo; balangbe ei le nani dan ongme. Nanina apek leng ka maknu chwan khatchale to make.
Atiyeda eina azan songa, nani khou kama katakka sacham ga kasam hung ngaake dinu nanina theiye.
Azan bi tamphaangnu ga nanina ating za maknu mak tabe, lou thang maknu to make. Atiyeda nanina ating Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang khat ting danga, dinuba Christa Jisu bahak ting danga lou thang rwe.
Ati dabe nani khou am ngaaknu karonu ga pa-aam torubo? Balangbe eina nani khou sake tonuwe, dinuba nanina zaye dabe nani mik ka ran swakluga akhou pi ngaak tingnuwe.
Eina bazenu ri chong rin swaknu langna ei nani om munanu torubo?
Banina nani ding sung khutka zong ngaake atiyeda haga kasanu lang mak ngaake. Nanina bani khou sung khutka zong lang banina nani ding pi sui mak ngaake.
Atiyeda eina nani le diga ong bachamnu za bi makka, bakaan bathin kasanu om lang bi sung khutnu ga sanuwe.
Eina kriangnu naosen rwan ga, nani sung bi Christa om thot gong ga bacha thou mak basaan, ei nani langna nao lung lang nainu kaan bi riangrenu danga ong maang nge.
Ei atun nani le diga ong bacham nwamme khatle achong biak kalenu bathai rwe. Balangbe ei nani langna asung tamamnu amme. Hagar le Sarah
Chongtan thwei bi ongnu bathainu nani ga akhou rinno, Chongtanna rinnu ga nani ngai thang makkabo?
Balangbe atiga hiak thang nge, Abraham sa kapaisa pat ni am ngaake, pakhat ka swak mannu saye, pakhatna rang tonu mannu saye.
Atiyeda swak mannuna ponnu sa ga misa pumna bathainu nung suiga ponnuwe. Rang tonu mannuna ponnu sa ga chongren nung suiga ponnuwe.
Heiba chong nga rin kaba thangnuwe, balangbe kamaisa pat ni ga chongren to thang ngaaknu kaniye. Pakhatna Sinai rammwan lana swak toga basa rwan ding pon thangnu Hagar ngaake.
Balangbe Hagar ga Arab la amnu Sinai rammwan gaye. Haga atun am ongnu Jerusalem dannuwe. Balangbe Jerusalem khatle basa rwan le diga swak toga lung ongme.
Atiyeda basaang la Jerusalem gabe rang tonu mannuwe. Haga ani khangsung nu we.

Balangbe atiga hiak thang ngaake, “He naosen kai maknu, sa pon maknu nang, karoro! Nao lung lang riangre maknu nang, pao rakanga paoro! Balangbe basan amnu kamaisa, Ma braanto ongnu maan gana sa nao tamnuwe.”
Unao rwan ga, atun Isaac tanga ani nun chongren sa rwan to rwe.
Atiyeda pum nung suiga ponnu maan gana Katha nung suiga ponnu bating rai ngaake, heiya atun le hadan ong maang nge.

Ati ngaaklena Bathiangnu Chongdipna pa-aam rin thangbo? “Swak mannu ding ga basa kapaisa le diga kazun sat tammo, balangbe swak mannu sa kapaisa gana rang tonu mannu sa kapaisa le diga rakhum lwak bachamlaye.”
Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, ani swak mannu sa rwan make atiyeda rang tonu mannu sa rwan zung nge.
Atibriakpina Christa na ani ding rang pi to thang briakpina rang tonu riak pi ga han tipka hanno. Swak om ringok thwei bi onglanro.
Phaang ngo, Paul, eina nani khou rinnuwe, nanina mun romme dabe Christa ga nani lang tongnu khatchale maake.
Mun romnu mi bing khou eina sake piye, dinuba chongtan bing zei lang lei chaaknuwe.
Chongtanna nani ding pi baze thang lang karamnu nani, Christa khouna lang swak trwe. Nani phaangkriang bina bukta drwe.
Balangbe Katha paan bi balumsanuna ririak senu om bachun ding anina taraan ga ngaak ongme.
Balangbe Christa Jisu khou mun romnu mak tabe mun rom maknu bathaang khatchale maake. Atiyeda balumsanuna kriangnu bi chwan tonu bathaang amnuwe.
Nani pak chuiga pak ngaake. Atiyeda bazenu ding ga zei mak lang nani ding tuna khaamgabo?
Nani ding bathem swaknu heiya nani ding kou thangnu Bakhouna make.
Khai titchana uilu tum pui ding pi pwangkaye.
Nanina nani sung katei am ngaaklaye diga eina Pukraangba khou balumsaye. Atiyeda tudannu nani ding pi riangrenu maan ga, tudannu ngaakle chong tonu kaan bi baom chongsem ga lousulune.
Atiyeda unao rwan ga, eina atun tangga mun rom ding gaye diga kasamme dabe, pa-aam to lang banina ating rai ongnubo? Ati dabe cross lang bi ket basuinu ga pi am thangla rwe.
Nani ding to riangre ongnu nun gana bani pum bahakna basa sem ngaake dabe ei pem dingnuwe.
Balangbe unao rwan ga, nani ding rang to lang kou thang rwe. Nani om rang tonuwa, pum lang badou chanu langna sizin mako. Atiyeda kriangnu paan bina khat le khat chwanlaang to kalewo.
Balangbe chongtan bing ga chongkaang khatcha bi pi hung tang thang rwe. Hagazo, “Nangna nainnai lounai ding nazan ding danga kriang ding gaye.”
Atiyeda nanina khat le khat eih kalega sa sat kaleye dabe, nani khatna khat ting to mut mak lang barak thei ding gaye.
Heiya eina rinnuwe, Katha om paanna seyo atiye dabe pum om bathainu ga pi hung tanglaye.
Balangbe pum om bathainu gana Katha ding mu naye. Atiga Katha om bathainu gana pum ding mu naye, Balangbe nanina to nwam to nwamnu ga to mak lang barwei khat le khat munaga maitwang kaleye.
Atiyeda Katha na nani ding kai thang nge dabe, nani chongtan thwei bi ongnu make.
Atiga pum om chwan bing ga indaowe. Hagazo, rwan mei rwan basan laannu, lungkoi lungmaannu, bathiang maknu lamchat, imbet boulaanu,
ri katha kalumnu, dwei choinu, phaang batannu, kabit kamainu, antiam kalenu, balung pwan taknu, balaangza baloinu, zakale maknu khatle kakoinu bachu thangnu,

antiamnu, mi athatnu, zu kalonu khatle sa in kalonu hadannu bing heiye. Eina meithaanna nani khou rin thang damnu ga danga, atun eina nani khou hei lang bi rin chaak thangnuwe, dinuba hei dannu chwan tonu mi bingna Rikrwang om krwang talei la badam lousulaye.
Atiyeda Katha om kraa gabe, kriangnu, karonu, dai bazaangnu, khaang theinu, kriang thang theinu, kasanu, balumsa zanu,
sung bazaangnu, bazan ding karaknu hei bing nge. Hei bing om maitwang bi chongtan khatchale maake.
Christa om tonu mi nunna zanti pum ga, haba om bathainu bing ga le sungna baningnu le bachamga cross pi athat bacham drwe.
Ani nun Katha paan bina ringnuwe dabe, Katha paan bina se le sezo.
Ani nun lian toga khatna khat ting to balung pwan kale makcho khatle antiam kale makcho.

Unao rwan ga, koi maan bi ta thangnu pakhat ting nanina namsuwe dabe, Katha om mi tonu nanina hadannu bating ga sung bazaangnu Katha paan bina pi kathui thang lato. Nating le bathem mak lang nazan bahakna barak theiyo.
Nani nun khat khat om potrit phunkaleyo. Atiga Christa om chongtan ding pi hung tang ngo.
Balangbe tudannu khatchale maknu mi pakhatna maan mi khat chung nge diga baning nge dabe, maan baraanto bating minamnuwe.
Atiyeda bazanna baraanto baom chwan ga tamphaang ding ngo. Hagana mi khat om lang bi maknu, balang bi lian tonu lousulune.
Balangbe mi bingna baom baom potrit ka phun lang nge.
Rikrwang chong bachu thangnu lousunu maan gana kasanu bing bakhou bachu thang ongnu maan ga le badam lou bacham ding ngo.
Nani ding pi minam mako. Rikrwang ding choi banui dingnu make. Balangbe mi khatna maanna bwan thang damnu ga maanna lwak le lwaklune.
Balangbe bazan bahak lang bwannu mi gana bapum bina braannu lwaklune; atiyeda katha langna bwannu mi gana katha khouna khwa sei ringnu lwaklune.
Kasanu to bi ani riangrenu to makcho. Balangbe anina sung inkhin make dabe, bakaan tang bi anina bakraa lwaklune.
Atibriakpina ani badou chanu lousu ong bi mi bing khou khatle inkuga balumsanu inkhun bing bi kasanu chwan tozo.
Phaang ngo, akut bahakna nani khou heitia liannu bahiakna hiak thangnuwa!
Langkaang la sanu thot pi muza lang bathainu bingna nani ding mun rom lang banina rakanga bathemme. Heiya Christa om cross lang bina bani ding rai mak lang naye.
Balangbe mun romnu banina tangga chongtan ga zei make. Atiyeda banina nani lang bi lian to langna nani ding mun pi rom nwamnuwe.
Atiyeda alaangbe, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om cross lang bi makka, khatchale alian to make. Hei paan bina talei ramna akhou khatle eina talei ram bi cross pi thi rwe.
Balangbe mun romnu ngaakle rom maknu ngaakle khatchale make. Atiyeda bakung tonuba dam kathannu heiye.
Rin ongnu chaang nung suiga bazega se ongnu bing khou khatle Rikrwang om Israel rwan bing lu chung bi dai bazaangnu khatle phaangkriang pi thang ding ngo.
Atunna thouga ating mi khatchanale to katop mak tam ding ngo. Balangbe Jisu Christa om toga apum bi aandim inza phun ongme.
Au anao rwan ga, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang gana nani katha le ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
Rikrwang na baningnu paan bina, Jisu Christa om chonglang Paul na, Ephesus pi amnu bathiangnu mi nun khatle Jisu Christa khou balumsanu nun khou,
ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou am ding ngo.
Christa khou ani ding Katha om rithoi bing tambaan ram bariak bing bi rithoi pi thangnu, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Rikrwang khatle Pa ding swankawo.
Ani Bameithaan bi bathiangnu khatle koi maaknu to lang talei ram dam mak baleina kriangnu bi Maanna ani ding Bakhou ka thang thangnu danga,
Maanna baningnu om kasanu pem thangnu nung suiga ani ding Jisu Christa paan bina Bapum bahak pi sa kapaisa toga lou thangnu heiya kamaga daan thangga,
Maanna kungga kriangnu Bapaan bina ani lang pi thang damnu Baphaangkriang om lwat ting anina swanka lang nge.
Khopsanu Baphaangkriang nung suiga, Bathi paan bina ani ding Bakhou ran swak thang rwe dinuba, ani koi maan ding kok thangnu lousu rwe.
Haba phaangkriang ga Baom ningting khatle theinu bing nung suiga ani khou sipsaga pi thang rwe.
Maanna baningnu kasanu Babaning nung suiga inthim chong ga ani khou pi thei thangga,
bakaan bing om talun ga hung tang bi, Maanna tambaan le talei ram bi amnu bing ding Christa khou khatcha toga kai karung thang lang nge.
Maanna baningnu nung suiga chwan bing to ongnu Baom rang thangnu nung suiga kamaga daan thangnu om langna anina le Christa khou rakhum ga lwaksu rwe.
Hagazo Christa khou kamaga bachun damnu anina balwat liannu ding swan lang nge.
Nanina le bazenu chong, nani ringriak om sacham ngaisuluga, Bakhou balumsaluga karen thangnu Katha Bathiangnu le diga nani ding Christa khou seal nam thang rwe.
Rikrwang om to damnu nun ding ran swak thang mak basaan, Katha Bathiangnu ga anina lwak tingnu rakhum lang pi chainuwe. Haga Balwat liannu ding swanka lang nge.
Atibriakpina Pukraangba khou nani om balumsat khatle bathiangnu mi bing ding nanina kriangnu cham ga eina ngaisuluga,
aom hweininu bi nani ding baningsu thangga nani langna swanka thangnu le chat make.
Dinuba, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Rikrwang, lwat liannu Pa na Bating theinu ningting khatle indao thangnu om katha ding nani khou pi thang lang

khatle nani lungning mik pi baan swakluga, hagana Maanna nani ding kou thangnu om bachun ga pa-aambo dinu thei lang bathiangnu mi rwan khou amnu Barakhum ga intia lang lwat liannubo dinu nanina thei lang
khatle ngam liannu chwan nung suiga, balumsa damnu ani khou amnu Baom kanatnu ngam ga intia lang liannubo dinu nanina thei lang nge.
Maanna Christa ding thi bina pi ring thouluga tambaan ram bariak bing bi Bakut inchang la pi ong thangnu kaan bi ngam gana Christa khou chwan to thang rwe.
Balu tonu nun, ngam, nat raangnu nun khatle bapuba tonu nun lu chung bi, meng bing lu chung bi heiba bakaan za bi makka hung dingnu bi le bapum brumza lu chung bi pi ong thang rwe.
Pot bing ding Baket baza thwei bi thang rwe khatle Christa ding pot bing om balu toga rupkathan bi pi thang rwe.
Haba rupkathan ga balang bing bi sipsanu, bachang sanu Bapum gaye.
Thou damnu kaan bi nani koi maan le noh bi thi ngaak rwe.
Nani bakaan khat pi talei ram chaang nung suiga, saangbaan om ngampuba chaang nung suiga se ong ngaake. Haba katha ga chong zei maknu sa rwan lu chung bi atun le chwan to ongme.

Bani lak pi ani bing le bakaan khat pi bani danga ani zanti pumna bathainu thot pi seluga ani zanti pumna khatle sungna bathainu bing toga ong ngaake. Ani nun katei rwan danga, bachaang toga balung pwan ta thangnu sa rwan to ong ngaake.
Atiyeda kriang thang theinuna sipnu Rikrwang na, Baom liannu phaangkriang paan bina ani ding Maanna kriang thangga,
ani koi maan bi thi ong bina tangga ani ding Christa le diga pi ring thou bacham thang rwe. Phaangkriang paan bina ani ding kan thang rwe.
Atiga ani ding Maan le diga pi ring thou bacham thangluga Christa Jisu khou tambaan ram bariak bing bi ani ding Maan le pi ong bacham thang rwe.
Haga Maanna Christa Jisu paan bina ani ding kriang thangnu bi Baom inkuga sipsanu Baphaangkriang ding hung dingnu kaan bi pi mu thang lang nge.
Balangbe phaangkriang paan bina balumsa briakpina nani ding kan thang rwe, heiya nani khouna make, Rikrwang leithwan zung nge.
Pakhatchanale lian to mak lang heiya chwan paan bina make.
Balangbe Rikrwang na kamaga laang thangnu kasanu chwan bing bi anina se lang Christa Jisu khou dam thang damnu ani Baom kutthiamme.
Atibriakpina nani baningsuwo dinuba, bakaan khat pi nani nun pum bi Gentile rwan toga, zanti pumna bachanu mun romnu diga kounu nunna nani ding mun rom maknu diga kou ngaake.

Ha kaan ga nani Christa sui maknu, Israel khulung sa rwan to makka, man ram sa rwan toga karen thangnu chongren bina man rwan, bachunnu maaknu nun khatle talei ram bi Rikrwang sui maknu nun toga ong ngaake.
Atiyeda bakaan khat pi namlaaga ong ngaaknu nani ding Christa thi paan bina Christa Jisu khou pi banai hung thang rwe.
Balangbe Maan Bahak ani lang dai bazaangnuwe. Maanna kani ding khatcha pi to thangluga ani lak pi khak lang thang ongnu imbaang ding torai thang rwe.
Kani bi gana mi kathan khat Bapum bahak paan bina bacha langna bapum bi munanu dinuba, zathang om chongtan bing ding lou sat thang rwe. Atiga dai bazaangnu phun hung thang rwe.
Munanu ding ga athatluga kani ding ga pum khatcha toga Rikrwang khou cross paan bina pi taman thang lang nge.
Maanna hungluga namlaaga ong ngaaknu nani khou khatle naiga ongnu bani khou dai bazaangnu sacham ga kasam thang rwe.
Balangbe Bapaan bina arwei pat nina Katha khatcha bi Pa khou khutnu riak lousu rwe.
Atibriakpina nani nun man mi khatle talei khat la mi lan rwe atiyeda bathiangnu mi nun khatle Rikrwang inkhun le diga nani khulung sa to bacham rwe.
Nani chonglang rwan khatle thiamting rwan om inmun bi bacha thou rwe. Jisu Christa Bahakna inmun om bakung tonu intaki lung gaye.
Bakhou in pum ga bariak cha chaga chan thangluga Pukraangba khou bathiangnu kalum in to lang bacha thounuwe.
Bakhou nani ding le Katha paan bina Rikrwang ongnu riak to langna bacha thou karungnuwe.
Ha langna nani Gentile rwan lang bi Christa Jisu om qwan in bi ongnu Paul eina,
nani lang akhou pi thang damnu Rikrwang om phaangkriang om talun ga nanina batak takka ngaisuwe dabe,
haga eina meithaanna toiga hiak tamnu ga dannuwe. Dinuba, inthim chong ga indao thangnu paan bina akhou pi thei thang rwe.
Nanina heiya panu kaan bi Christa om inthim chong ga eina theiye dinu nanina thei ngamlune.
Inthim chong ga atun Katha paan bina bathiangnu chonglang rwan khatle thiamting rwan khou indao thang ngaaknu danga, thou damnu bakaan bi mi rwan khouba pi thei thang mak ngaake.
Inthim chong gabe sacham paan bina Gentile rwan ga Jihudi rwan le rakhum lwaknu mi to bacham rwe khatle pum khat om naat to bacham rwe khatle Christa khou Baom karen thangnu badam ga lou bacham rwe.
Bangamna chwan tonu paan bina akhou pi thangnu Rikrwang phaangkriang om leithwan nung suiga ating sacham om chwanlaang pi to thang rwe.
Bathiangnu mi nun khon bina sin kataknu akhou heiba phaangkriang pi thang rwe. Haga Christa om zongsu ngamlanu lan ga Gentile rwan khou eina kasam lang
khatle Jisu Christa paan bina pot bing ding dam thang damnu Rikrwang khou talei ram thoutan bina inkam hung ngaaknu inthim chong om rang thangnu ga pa-aambo dinu mi bing khou pi thei lang nge.
Tambaan ram bariak bing bi kasei kalian nun khatle ngam phunnu nun khou Rikrwang om ningting bachaat bing ding atun rupkathan paan bina pi thei thang lang nge.
Haga ani Pukraangba na Christa Jisu khou to thangnu khwa sei lang laang thangnu nung sui gaye.
Bapaan bina khatle anina Bakhou balumsanu paan bina ani sung raangga khatle sung ritka khutsu rwe.
Atibriakpina nani lang chungna eina riangre kanang dounu kaan bi nani sung inkhin ta mak lang eina nani ding hweinuwe, balangbe aom riangre kanangga nani lian to lang naye.
Hei lang chungna eina ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Pa khou kekhok deluga kalumme.
Tambaan le talei ram bi amnu inkhun bing ga Bakhouna meng basaknuwe.
Eina hweiye dinuba nani om basungnu mi ga, Baom khopsanu lwat nung suiga Bakatha paan bina nani ding ngam le suiga pi nat thou thang lang
hagazo balumsanu paan bina Christa na nani sung bi ong thang lang khatle nani nun kriangnu bi kamong taluga tipka ong lang nge.
Christa om kriang ding ga basei, balian babasaang khatle bathuk paaambo dinu bathiangnu mi bingna theinu ngam lang nge.
Theinu ngamnu bina inku kiatka Christa om kriang ding thei lang khatle Rikrwang om khopsanu bing gana nani ding pi sip thang lang nge.
Ani sung bi chwan to ongnu ngam nung suiga anina hweininu khatle baningnu chung bi inku kiatka chwan to thangnu ngamnu Bakhou,
rupkathan lang bi Christa Jisu paan bina mikin bing bi lwat liannu ga Bakhou khwa seiga am ding ngo. Amen.
Atibriakpina nani ding kou thangnu kou bi ga khopsanu toga se lang Pukraangba langna qwan mi to ongnu eina nani ding hweinuwe.
Bangiam ta taknu khatle sung bazaangnu towo. Khaang theiga kriangnu paan bina khatna khat lang kriangnu bi khaang thang kaleyo.
Dai bazaangnu om karungnu bi, Katha om sung chamnu ga am ngam lang banangga karam thang ngo.
Nani ding kou thangnu dat pi bachunnu khatcha bi kou thangnu danga pum khat, Katha khat,
Pukraangba khat, balumsat khat, baptize khat,
Rikrwang khat khatle mi bing om Pa khat khatle Maan bani bing lu chung bi amme khatle bani bing khou chwan to thang ongme khatle nani bing khou ong ongme.
Atiyeda Christa na kasem thangnu leithwan nung suiga ani pakhat khat khou phaangkriang pi thang rwe.
Atibriakpina Maanna rinne, “Maanna basaang la ka damnu kaan bi Maanna namnu mi nun ding kai se rwe, Khatle mi nun khou leithwan bing pi thang rwe.”
“Maan basaang la ka drwe” dinu heiyana rinnuba Maan kama bi talei thwei kalan la ta ngaak rwe dinu om bakaba makka katei pa-aambo?
Talei thwei la ta ngaaknu Maan ga pot bing ding pi sip thang lang tambaan om Basaang kataknu riak la ka damnu ga Maan bahake.
Atiga Maanna mi kasem ding chonglang, kasem ding thiamting, kasem dingna evangelist, kasem ding pastor khatle kasem ding bachu thangnu to lang
haga chwanlaang om chwan langna bathiangnu mi nun ding pi khopsa thou lang nge. Haga Christa pum ding bacha thou lang nge.
Bacha thounu ga ani mi bingna balumsanu bi khatcha tonu khatle Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding theinu khatle khopsanu mi nun to lang Christa om sipsanu chaang ga hung tang mak basaan lang nge.

Tui kabaapnu bingna phun swak phunkhutnu, bachaat bachaat bachu thangnu thiraangna phunkoi senu zekrin khatle mi nun om rou siatna phun swak phunkhut senu, minam lang chwan ongnu kaan bi ani nun kasinnu naosen rwan dan mak tingnuwe.
Atiyeda bazenu ga kriangnu bi kabiaga balang bing bi balu tonu Christa khou lian thou lang nge.

Bakhouna pum om naat bing kai karung thang nge, ren bing ding bariak cha chaga don thangluga naat bingna bathou bathou to chuiga tonu kaan bi Bakhouna pum bing ding kriangnu bi baraantoza bacha thou lang pi lian thou thang nge.
Atibriakpina eina heiya rinnuwe, Pukraangba khou nani ding kachui thang nge dinuba, Gentile rwanna bani om bathaang maaknu bani sung baning bi senu danga nani se latlanro.
Bani khou thei maknu ga am briakpina, bani sung nat thouluga bani om theinu ga pi zing drwe khatle Rikrwang om ringnu bina impaan drwe.
Bani sung natnu gana banina theinu ngamnu om lungning ga braan dam briakpina bathiang maknu lamchat ka pemga to lang bani pum ding imbet boulaanu chwan to lang pi swak rwe.
Atiyeda Christa om lang bi atiga nani bachu dam make.
Nanina Balang bi batakka ngaisunu ngaake khatle Jisu khou amnu bazenu nung suiga nani ding bachu thang rwe.
Nanina meithaan se ngaaknu lamchat om lang bi, minamnu pum om bathainu nung suiga braan ongnu mi lui ga bathan sato.
Nani sung katha ga pi kathanno.
Bazenu ririak senu khatle bathiangnu bi Rikrwang thot gong bi dam thangnu mi kathan ga nanina sin basoiyo.
Atibriakpina chong karwaknu kabianu ga bathan satro. “Nani mi bing zana bainnai lounai rwan le diga bazenu chong kabiawo.” Balangbe ani khatna khat om naate.
“Balung pwannu bi noh to mako,” nani balung pwan ong bi lumik pi ta mako
khatle Diabol lang bariak pi mako.
Barusanu maan gana baru lat mak ting ngo atiyeda ka maaknu nun lang pi thang lang bakhou am lang maanna bakutna kasanu chwan rakanga to ding ngo.
Nani mun bina sa maknu chong kabia swak mak ting ngo. Atiyeda bacha thou langna bariak badat chaga kasanu chong kabianu to ding ngo. Hagana ngai ongnu nun khou phaangkriang pi thanglune.
Ran swak thangnu lumik tang lang Maanna nani ding seal nam thangnu Rikrwang om Katha Bathiangnu ding sung pi riangre mako.
Kakhaanu sung bing khatle sung sounu, balung pwannu khatle thot siaga paonu khatle kasianu kabianu, phaang batannu sung bing le suiga nani khouna asat tammo.
Atiyeda nani khat le khat kriang kaleyo, sung banemmo, Rikrwang na Christa paan bina nani noh kok thangnu danga, nani khat le khat kok thang kaleyo.
Atibriakpina nani nun kungga kriangnu sa rwan danga Rikrwang ding sui bazeiyo.
Christa na ani ding kriang thangga Rikrwang khou barim banam sanu potkat khatle rikhaang pot toga ani lang Bapum bahak ting kat swaknu danga nani kriangnu bi seyo.
Atiyeda nani lak pi lungkoi lungmaannu, bathiang maknu bing mak tabe ra-aamnu hei bing nga bameng hakna rin pan mako. Ha bing ga bathiangnu mi nun lang khopsanu make.
Tanaatnu lamchat, kapangnu chong kabianu khatle kasianu talwan tapa tonu hei bing nga khopsanu make atinu hut swankawo.
Nanina heiya batak takka theiye dinuba, lungkoi lungmaannu mi, bathiang maknu mi, ra-aamnu mi hagazo ri katha ding kalumnu mi ga Christa khatle Rikrwang om krwang talei rakhum lousulaye.
Tudannuna nani ding bathaang maaknu chongna minam mak ting ngo. Balangbe hagana chong zei maknu mi nun lu chung bi Rikrwang balung pwan hung nge.
Atibriakpina bani le diga badam lou bacham mako. Baannu bi Seyo
Balangbe nani nun bakaan khat pi zing ga ong ngaake. Atiyeda atunbe Pukraangba khou nani babaan to ong rwe. Naniba kabaannu sa rwan danga seyo,
balangbe Katha om kraa gabe balang bing bi kasanu, ririak senu khatle bazenuwe
khatle Pukraangba na lou thang zanu ga pa-aambo dinu zong ngo.
Kazingnu om bakraa kraa maknu chwan bing ga badam suilou bacham mako. Haba hut lang bani koi ga indao swako.
Balangbe banina inkamga to ongnu chwan bing ga rin swak lang hakna kazaknuwe.
Atiyeda ha bing ding ga baannu gana indao swak pi pot bing ding pi mu thang nge. Balangbe pi phaangmunu bing ga babaan naye.
Atibriakpina Maanna rinne, “Inthi ongnu nang insaang thouro, Thinu bina nang ring thouro, Khatle Christa na nakhou baan thanglune.”
Atibriakpina nanina kapangnu rwan dan makka atiyeda ningtingnu mi danga nanina se ongnu ga tatoga se ongbo dinu barak theiyo.
Nani om bakaan ga choi chuiyo, balangbe lumik heiya sia rwe.
Atibriakpina ningting maknu to makka atiyeda Pukraangba na baningnu ga paaambo dinu theiyo.
Zu kalo mako, habei ga chong swak la swak amme atiyeda Katha na sipo.
Nani khat le khat khou kalum laa, swannu laa khatle Katha om laana kabia kaleyo. Nani Pukraangba khou sung kalan la balung sianu khwan le suiga to thang ngo.
Balang bing bi ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng bi Pa Rikrwang khou bakaan bathin swanno.
Rikrwang ding kachiga nani khatna khat thwei bi talu tawo.
Mei rwan ga, Pukraangba khou danga nani basan bahak thwei bi talu tawo.
Balangbe Christa na le rupkathan om balu tonu dan basan ga mei om baluwe. Atiga Maan pum ding Kanthangnupaye.
Atibriakpina rupkathanna Christa thwei bi ongnu danga mei rwanna le balang bing bi bani basan bahak thwei bi ong ding ngo.
Basan rwan ga, Christa na rupkathan ding kriang thangga ha langna Bapum bahak ting pi swak thangnu danga nani mei rwan ding kriang ngo.
Christa na pi swak thangnu rupkathan ga to bathiang thangga tanaatnu maak lang tuina kasinnu danga chongkaangna kasin bathiang thang lang nge.

Atiga Maanna rupkathan ding imphom tanaatnu, chu thangnu mak tabe, charutnu mak tabe hadannu khatchale maaknu atiyeda haga bathiangnu khatle koi maaknu lwat liannu rupkathan toga maanna Bapum bahak khou pi thang lang nge.
Hadanga basan rwanna bani pum ding kriangnu danga bani mei bahak rwan ding kriang ding gaye. Bamei ding kriangnu maan gana bapum ding le kriangnuwe.
Balangbe pakhatchanale bapum ding batannu maake. Atiluga Pukraangba na rupkathan lang to thangnu ga danga haba mi gana bapum ding bakot thouwe khatle banang thang nge.
Balangbe ani nun Bapum, Bazanti khatle Baru om naat nunne.
“Atibriakpina kapaisa khatna banu bapa ding thangsialuga bamei khou karung ding gaye khatle barwei ga pum khatcha to ding gaye.”
Heiya kathuknu inthim chong nge atiyeda heiya eina Christa khatle rupkathan om lang bi rinnuwe.
Ati ngaaklena mi bingna le bamei ding bapum bahak ting danga kriang ding ngo khatle bameina le babasan ding takung tazei to lang barak thei ding ngo.
Naosen rwan ga, Pukraangba khou nani nu pa rwan chong zeiyo, balangbe heiya bazenuwe.
“Nanu khatle napa ding takung tazeiyo,” heiya karen thangnu le bachamga kamanu zathang nge.
Haga “Nalaang sa lang nge khatle nang talei ram bi lungsei bara inkuan lang nge.”
Pa rwan ga, nani sa rwan ding balung pwan lang lao mako. Atiyeda Pukraangba om lang bi bachu thang, rin thangga bani ding bakot thouwo.
Swak rwan ga, Christa khou danga nani sung bathiangga talei ram bi nani nun om bapuba rwan ding kachi kathokka chong zeiyo.
Mi nun ding pi pem langna mikphaang om chwan tonu makka sung bathiangga Christa om swak rwan danga, Rikrwang na baningnu ga towo.
Mi nun khou to thangnu dan makka Pukraangba khou to thangnu danga sung khutka chwanlaang towo.
Balangbe swak ngaakle rang tonu mi ngaakle tudannu khatna kasanu chwan towe dabe, maanna tonu om kasanu ga maanna Pukraangba khouna lousu latlune dinu nanina theiye.
Bapuba rwan ga, hadanga bani khou to thang ngo. Bani ding basi mako. Balangbe napum bahak om Bapuba tambaan la amme dinu nanina theiye khatle Bakhou kathing aih tonu maake.
Kakham bi unao rwan ga, Pukraangba khou khatle Baom kanatnu ngam bi nani natro.
Diabol om rou ding maitwangnu ngam lang nani Rikrwang om kraan pon bing ga sin basoiyo.

Balangbe anina katwak ongnuwa zanti le thi pum maitwang bi make. Atiyeda kangamnu, nat raangnu rwan, ngam phunnu khatle heiba bakaan om kazingnu bapuba rwan lu chung bi, tambaan ram bariak bing la amnu sa maknu katha om ngam nun maitwang biye.
Atibriakpina sa maknu lumik ting ga nanina maitwangnu ngam lang Rikrwang om kraan pon bing ga sin basoiro. Ha bing ga toluga nani tipka han lang nge.
Atibriakpina bazenuna kongkhaak toga khaakluga hen tipka han ong ngo. Ririak senuna kachaang thop to ding gaye.
Dai bazaangnu sacham bina hungnu chamdaannu gana ketthop toga nani ket pi thopo.
Hei bing chung bi balumsat om kapho ga choi thouro. Hagana sa maknu baom mei choknu thanthing bing ding to mitnu ngam lang nge.
Ringriak om kraan luthop thopo khatle Katha om kachaak chem dinuba Rikrwang om chong ga choiyo.
Kalumnu khatle hweininu hei bing nga bakaan bathin Katha paan bina towo. Heiba sung bing nga amga, khaang theinu bingna bathiangnu mi nun lang kalum thangga barak theiga ong ngo.
Atiga alaang le sacham om inthim chong ga sung raangga kabianu ngam lang eina abao aang thouluga chongkaang ga rin swaknu ngam lang kalum thang ngo.
Sacham langna eibe parei ruina bang thang ongnu tabate. Eina rinnu zek swaknu danga sung raangga rin swaknu ngam lang alaang hweini thang ngo.

Atiyeda nanina le ei tatoga ongbo khatle pa-aam to ongbo dinu thei lang eina kriangnu unao khatle Pukraangba khou balumsa lang khopnu chwanlaang Tychicus na nani khou balang bing ga pi thei thanglune.
Eina bating hei langna nani khou lang hungnu rwe. Balangbe nanina ani om lang bi thei lang khatle maanna nani sung ding lozaang pi sa thang lang nge.
Unao rwan khou Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna dai bazaangnu khatle balumsat le bachamga kriangnu am ding ngo.
Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding sung bathiangga kriangnu bing khou phaangkriang am ding ngo. Amen.
Jisu Christa om swak tonu Paul le Timothy na, Philippi bi ongnu Christa Jisu om bathiangnu mi nun, phaangsin thangnu mi nun khatle deacon nun khou,
ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukaraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.
Eina bakaan bathin nani ding baningsuga Arikrwang ding swanne.
Ei bakaan bathin nani langna karoga kalum ong ngaake.
Balangbe nanina kamanu lumik pina aniya tangga sacham om badam lou bacham ongnu lang naye.
Atiga hei lang bi eina balumsaye dinuba, thoutan bina nani khou kasanu chwan to thang damnu Rikrwang na Jisu Christa om lumik ka tangga haga pi to loi thanglune.

Nani khangsung lang bi eina baning ongnuwa alaangba bazenuwe. Balangbe naniya asung bi am ongme khatle ating parei ruina bangnu bi, kakhangnu bi khatle sacham ding pi tip thangnu bi, nani nun ei le diga phaangkriang om badam lou bachamnu nunne.
Balangbe Jisu Christa kriang le bachamga eina nani lang intia taraan ngaakpo dinu lang bi Rikrwang na aom sakeye.
Heiya eina kalumme dinuba, nani kriangga ningting khatle kakoi baze theinu bi inku khit khit thou lang nge.
Nani lang ingaana sa kataknubo dinu nanina kakhannu ngam lang khatle Christa om lumik tangga bathiangnu to lang khatle koi maaknu to lang nge.
Atiga Jisu Christa paan bina nani ririak senu karaa gana sip lang nge. Haga Rikrwang lwat liannu lang khatle Bating swan lang nge.
Atiyeda unao rwan ga, akhou swak tamnu bing gana batak takka sacham ga kasam inku thou lang nge dinu nanina theinu bathaiye.
Parei ruina ating bang thang ongnu heiya Christa lang naye dinu krwang in ngaaknu bingna khatle mi katei rwan bingna thei rwe.
Ating bang thang ong briakpina Pukaraangba khou balumsa ongnu unao rwan inzana kachinu maakka chong ga kasam lang inkuga bani sung raang rwe.
Mi kasemna batakka antiamnuna khatle kae kanaanu riak pina khatle mi kasemna sung bathiangga Christa om sacham ding kasamme.
Ating bang thang ongnu chung bina inkuga riangre lang kamanu mi kasem gana bani rang toza lang baning briakpina sung bathiang makka Christa sacham ding kasamme.
Atiyeda sacham ding hankhou lang ating ka thang rwe dinu thei briakpina kakhamnu mi nun gana kriangnu bina sacham ga kasamme.
Ati dabe tato langbo? Bakung tonu bi, balang bing bi sathot tonuna ngaakle bazenuna ngaakle Christa sacham ding kasamme. Ha langna ei karowe khatle karoga ongme.
Balangbe nanina kalum thangnu paan bina khatle Jisu Christa om Katha na paang thangnu paan bina akhou swak ongnu heiya ating ran swak thanglune dinu ei theiye.

Ating pi kazak thanglaye dinu eina taraan ga baning ongme khatle bachun ongme. Atiyeda bakaan bathin bi tonu danga atun le, ei thi ngaakle ring ngaakle apum bi Christa ding lwat pi lian lang sung raangnu ga akhou sipsaga amme.
Balangbe alaangba eina ringga ongnuwa Christa lang nge. Atiyeda thinu gana alaang tongnuwe.
Atiyeda eina pum bi ringga ong nge dabe, haga achwantok om bakraa tolune. Atiyeda eina pa-aam ding ka thang langbo dinu ei thei make.
Balangbe kani lak pi ei batok theilan rwe, kum ga bathan satluga Christa le diga ong bachamnu bathai rwe. Hagana alaang sa inku rwe.
Ati ngaaklena pum toga atiga ongnuna nani lang bathaang am inkunuwe.
Ei ringga onglune dinu bathiangga thei briakpina nani lian thou lang khatle balumsanu bi karonu am lang eina ong bachamluga nani mi bing le bacham ting ting onglune dinu theiye.
Atiga ei nani khou hung lat pi alang bina Christa khou nani karoga khopsanu to lang nge.

Nani khei ga Christa om sacham le khopsanu zaga towo. Atiga eina nani ding hungmunu ngaakle mak tabe hungmu maknu ngaakle sacham om balumsat pi sung khatcha toga chwan to bachamga nani Katha bi khatcha toga tipka ongme dinu nani lang bi eina ngaisu lang nge.
Nani ding munanu nunna khatchale pi kachinu to mak ting ngo. Kachi maknu dinuwa bani braan dingnu om badanne. Atiyeda nani langba batak takka ringriake khatle haga Rikrwang khou naye.
Balangbe Christa meng lang chungna Bakhou balumsanu za makka Bariak pina riangre khaangnu heiya le nani khou za thang rwe.
Balangbe nani akhouna mu damnu khatle atun ei katwak ongme dinu nanina ngaisu damnu bahak ka nanina le katwak ongme.
Atibriakpina Christa paan bina nani lang kachui thangnu amme dabe, kriangga bathem thangnu amme dabe, Katha bi badam lou bachamnu amme dabe, kriangnu khatle phaangkriang amme dabe,
nani khou sung khat tonu khatle badannu khatcha toga, kriangnu amga, sung chamga akaro ga pi sip thang ngo.
Balaangza baloinu mak tabe lian tonu bi khatchale chwan to mako. Atiyeda sung bangiam taga, katei rwanna nama sa inkunuwe diga chak thang ngo.
Nani pakhat khatna balannai za lang phaangnu to mako atiyeda katei rwan lang le baning ding ngo.
Christa Jisu khou am ngaaknu sung ga nani khou le am ding ngo:
Maan Rikrwang om thot gong bi ong ngaak peida, Rikrwang le diga bachamnu ga tipka choi dingnu danga kakhan mak ngaake.
Atiyeda Maan bahakna Bating pi barwang thangluga swak pakhat thot gong danga khatle mi khat tanga hung rwe.
Thot gong bi Maan misa khat tanga hungluga Maan Bapum bahak sung bangiam taga thinu tangga chong zei rwe hagazo cross pi thinu tang gaye.
Atibriakpina Rikrwang na le Bating pi basaang ka thang rwe. Atiga Bakhou meng bing chung bi basaangnu meng pi thang rwe.
Tambaan le talei ram bi khatle talei thwei bi amnu nun om kekhok bingna Jisu meng bi detaga kalum lang nge.
Balei bingna Pa Rikrwang lwat lian langna Jisu Christa heiya Pukaraangba ye dinu rin indaolune.

Atibriakpina eina kriangnu nun ga, nani bakaan bathin chong zeinu ga danga, eina nani khou ongnu kaan za bi makka atiyeda atun ei ong maknu kaan bi le ha ma inkuga kachi kathokka nani om ringriak ka pi khopsawo.
Balangbe Bating pi pem langna nanina to nwam lang khatle to lang nani sung bi chwan tonu ga Rikrwang nge.
Nanina chwan bingza tu tu tam tamnu khatle kae kanaanu sui makka towo.
Nani sa maknu khatle tun natnu mikin lak pi koi impu thang lang maaknu khatle koi maaknu Rikrwang sa rwan to lang nge. Atiga nani talei ram bi bani lak pi babaan toga baan ongme.
Eina pak ongnu mak tabe to ongnu achwan heiya bathaam make diga Christa lumik pi eina karo lang ringnu chongkaang ding ga tipka choiyo.
O, nani om balumsat, rikhaang pot khatle chwan paan bina ating Rikrwang om innu potkat toga bun swak ngaak peida ei karowe khatle nani le diga karo bachamme.
Ha langna nani le karowe khatle ei le diga karo bacham thang ngo.
Atiyeda eina nani cham ga ngaisunu kaan bi ating le kachui thang lang Timothy ding nani khou karangga pi hung lang Pukaraangba Jisu khou ei balumsaye.
Balangbe nani nun om lang bi sung bathiangga banang thang dingnu maan danga kriang thang theinu mi alaang pakhatchale maake.
Balangbe katei rwan ga bapum za lang zongnu karwake. Atiyeda Christa Jisu lang bi zongnu mi maake.
Atiyeda nanina baom bataknu thot ka theiye, dinuba, basana bapa ding chwanlaang tonu danga, eina sacham kasam hungnu kaan bi maanna ei le chwan to bacham rwe.
Atibriakpina eina akhou pa-aam swaklu dingbo dinu thei khap tinu le bating karangga nani khou lang hung lang baning nge.
Atiyeda ei bahak le nani khou karangga hunglune diga Pukaraangba khou balumsaye.

Atiyeda unao tonu, chwan to bachamnu khatle kraanmi to bachamnu atiyeda nani om chongpuk mi tonu khatle alaang bathaang amnu kaan bi chwanlaang to thang ongnu Epaphroditus ting nani khou lang hungnuna sa rwe diga ei baning nge.
Maan nani mi bing ding mu nwamga baning nge, maan naa ngaake dinu nanina ngaisu briakpina maan basung riangre rwe.

Balangbe maan batak takka thi dingnu danga naa ngaak rwe atiyeda Rikrwang na bating phaangkriang thang rwe. Batingza make, riangrenu chung bi riangrenu akhou hap thang mak lang Maanna ating le phaangkriang thang rwe.
Atibriakpina nanina bating mu latnu kaan bi karo chui lang khatle ariangre le pi zaang thang langna eina bating nani khou bathunga bathan hungnuwe.
Atibriakpina bating Pukaraangba meng bi karo karoga loukhut thang ngo. Hei dannu mi nun ding nga basaangga takung tazei to thang ngo.
Balangbe nanina alaang chwanlaang tonu bi baatnu amnu ga pi nang thang lang bakum ding batainu to makka Christa om chwan langna maan thi dingnu dan ngaak rwe.
Kakham katak pi, unao rwan ga, Pukaraangba khou karowo. Balangbe eina nani khou hiak han latka hiaknu ga alaang riangre make. Haga nani nun ding ngaaksian thang lang naye.
Ui nun ding ga cheksinno, sa maknu chwan tonu mi nun ding ga cheksinno, bani pum ding aat bazamnu mi nun ding ga cheksinno.
Balangbe aniba Katha bi Rikrwang ding kalumnu nun Christa Jisu khou karonu khatle pum bi balumsanu maaknu, mun romnu mi nun zung nge.
Einabe pum ding balumsanu balang am ngaak peida einaba balumsanu maake. Tudannu pakhatna bakhou pum ding balumsa lang balang amme diga baning nge dabe eina inku lat maang nge:
Eiba ni kariat tang bi mun romnu, Israel chaat mi, Benjamin in phum mi, Hebrew rwan lak pi bathiangnu Hebrew mi; chongtan lang bina Pharisee;
chwan bi sung khutnu lang bi, rupkathan ding rainu; chongtan om ririak senu bi, koi maaknu ngaake.
Atiyeda alaang toga tongnu nun ga Christa lang chungna bathaang maaknu toga ei chak thang rwe.

Atiyeda batak takka Apukraangba Jisu Christa ding theinu gana inku kataknu le phaang kabanu kaan bi pum brum ga bathaang maaknuwe diga eina chak thang rwe. Pum brum baraannu ga eina Balaang zana khaang thang rwe khatle pum brum ga imphom tanaatnuwe diga eina chak thang rwe, heiya eina Christa ding adam toga lousu langna
khatle Christa khou ongsunu za lang nge. Chongtan zeinu bina lousunu ririak senu ga akhou maak rwe atiyeda Christa ding balumsanu paan bina lousunu ririak senu ga akhou amme.
Heiya Maan le thinu thot gong louluga, Maan khatle Bating thinu bina pi ring thounu ngam ga thei langna khatle Bariangrek ka badam lou bacham lang naye,
pa-aam aam ngaakle, thinu bina ring thounu ga eina le lousu lang nge.
Eina lousu rwe dinu make mak tabe ei khopsa rwe diga rinnu make. Atiyeda ating Jisu Christa na nam damnu ga danga eina le taswan ga lousu lang karam ongme.
