Unao rwan ga, ei haga lousu rwe diga chak thang make atiyeda khatpa eina towe, hagazo nung la amsia damnu ding ga banim satluga meithaan la amnu ding ga lousu lang baloiga pak ongme.
Christa Jisu khou Rikrwang na basaang lana kou thangnu taswan ga lousu langna ei kapan ga baloiga pak ongme.
Atibriakpina bachang sanu bingna heiba sung nga ani khou amzo khatle nanina baningnu katei am ngaaklena haga le nani khou Rikrwang na indao thanglune.
Atiyeda anina hung tangnu thaak nung suiga khatle anina bachamnu zek nung suiga lungzo, atiga ani sung khat chun khat tozo.
Unao rwan, nani mi bingna mi katei rwan danga ating sui bazeiyo. Atiga anina nani khou pi mu thangnu ga danga sianu mi nun ding ga thei thang ngo.
Balangbe eina nani khou meithaanna katupka rin thang damnu danga, atun le eina nani khou mikthi taga rinnuwe, mi taswang khakna Christa om cross ting munanu nun toga lung ongme.
Banina tang dingnu riak ka baraannu, mutnu gaye, bani ri ga bani bonne khatle bani lwat ka kazaknu gaye khatle bani sung ga talei ram pot pi amme.
Balangbe ani khulung ga tambaan laye, habei gana ani ding kanthangnu Pukaraangba Jisu Christa ding anina taraan ga ngaak ongme.
Maanna pot bing ding Bathwei bi thangnu ngamnu ngam paan bina, ani om son damnu braan zanu pum ding lwat liannu Bapum danga pi gon swak thanglune.
Atibriakpina eina kadou lang taraan ga ngaak ongnu kriangnu unao rwan, aom karok khatle taswan luthop tonu kriangnu nani nun ga, Pukaraangba khou han tipka ong ngo.
Eina Euodia le Syntyche ding Pukaraangba khou sung khatcha toga ong lang kachui thang nge.

Bataknu potrit phun bachamnu baan, sacham lang bi ei le diga chwan to bachamnu mannu rwan, Clement ding le, bani meng ringnu chongdip pi am damnu, chwan to bachamnu mi katei ding paang thang lang eina nating hweinuwe.
Bakaan bathin nani Pukaraangba khou karoga ong ngo. Eina rin late, karowo.
Nani sung bazaangnu ga mi bing khou pi theiyo. Pukaraangba hung lang nai rwe.
Nani sung riangre mako atiyeda balang bing bi kalumnu khatle hweininu ga swankanu le bachamga Rikrwang khou nanina ni nwamnu bing ga pi theiyo.
Atiga theinu bina inkuga Rikrwang om dai bazaangnu gana nani sung ding Christa Jisu paan bina ngaaksian thang ding ngo.

Kakhamnu bi, unao rwan ga, bazenu bing, lemsanu bing, bataknu bing, bathiangnu bing khatle kriang thang zanu bing khatle kasanu toga chong impu thangnu bing, pa-aam aam ngaakle sa inkunu khatle swanka lang khopnu amme dabe, ha bing lang bi nani sung thang ngo.
Nani akhouna bachu damnu, lousu damnu, ngaisu damnu khatle mu damnu bing ga to thang ngo. Atiga dai bazaangnu Rikrwang na nani khou ong thanglune.

Atiyeda atun kakhamnu kaan bi nanina alaang banang thangnu ga pi kathan thangnu langna Pukaraangba khou ei taswang khak karowe. Nani nabe alaangna banang thang ngaak rwe atiyeda nani lang badou chanu phang dam make.
Haga eina baatnu riak pina rinnu make. Balangbe eiba alung gong bi paaam aam ngaakle ei pem rwe.

Ei baatka lung lang le, khopka lung lang le thei rwe. Bariak bathin khatle balang bing bi ei bon imbanu ngaakle chaamnu ngaakle balim balei amnu bi le, maaknu bi le tatoga lung langbo dinu ningting ga akhou am rwe.
Ating pi nat thangnu Christa paan bina pum brumza tonu ngamme.
Atiyeda ariangrek pi nanina badam suilou thangnu bi ga nani kasanu chwan to rwe.

Atun Philippi mi rwan nanina theiye dinuba, sacham kasam thou kama bi eina Mecedonia bina se swaknu kaan bi nani zana makka rupkathan khatchanale paang thangnu khatle sui pui thangnu lang bi ei le diga badam lou bacham mak ngaake.
Balangbe Thessalonica bi tangga nanina alaang bathaang amnu pot bing pi hung thang lat lat ngaake.
Atiyeda leithwan ding ga rakanga zongnuba make atiyeda nani lang bakraa toga chak thang dingnu ga eina rakanga zongnuwe.

Batak takka, ei pum brumza sipsaga lousu rwe, baatnu khatchale maak rwe. Nani khouna pi hungnu banamsanu, lou thang lang khopnu kat swaknu khatle Rikrwang na pem thangnu rikhaang pot ka Epaphroditus kut pina lousuluga alaang bathaang amnu bing ga bachangga am rwe.
Arikrwang na nani lang bathaang amnu bing ga Christa Jisu paan bina Balwat liannu bi amnu lan nung suiga pi thanglune.
Atun ani Rikrwang khatle ani Pa khou khwa seiga lwat liannu to ding ngo. Amen.
Christa Jisu khou bathiangnu mi bing ding kalum thang ngo. Ei le ong bachamnu unao rwanna nani ding kalumme.
Bathiangnu mi bingna atiyeda inkuga Caesar in inkhunna nani ding kalumme.
Ani Pukaraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriangna nani mi bing lu chung bi kalwang thangnu to ding ngo. Amen.
Rikrwang na baningnu nung suiga Jisu Christa om chonglang Paul khatle ani unao Timothy na
Colosse bi ongnu Christa khou bathiangnu khatle balumsanu unao rwan khou hiaknu: Ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu khouna nani khou phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu pi thangnu to ding ngo.
Anina nani lang chat makka kalum thangga, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa Pa Rikrwang ding swanne.
Balangbe Jisu Christa khou nani balumsat khatle bathiangnu mi bing lang nanina kriangnu cham ga anina ngaisu rwe.
Haga tambaan la nani lang am ongnu bachunnu paan bi naye. Haba bachunnu ga sacham om bazenu chong bi ga nanina kamaga ngaisu drwe.

Sacham ga nani khou hung rwe. Atiga talei ram bariak bathin bakraa kraa ga lian thou ongnu ga danga, nanina le Rikrwang om phaangkriang ding ngaisunu khatle bathiangga theinu lumik pi gana thouga nani khou le bakraa kraa ongme.
Haga ani nun chwanlaang to bachamnu, kriangnu Epaphras khouna le nanina thei rwe. Maan ga nani hut toga Christa om balumsa zanu chwanlaang tonu khate.
Katha paan bina nanina ani ding kriangnu ga maanna ani khou indao thang rwe.
Hei langna anina haga ngaisunu lumik pina thouga Maanna baningnu ningting bing khatle Katha lang bi theinu ga nani khou sipka am dam lang ani chat makka nani lang hweini ong ngaake.
Heiya nanina kasanu chwan bing bi bakraa kraaluga, Rikrwang ding theinu bi inku kaluga khatle balang bing bi Rikrwang ding pi pemluga Pukraangba lang zana khopsaga ring lang nge.
Karonu le bachamga sung sei inku lang khatle khaang thei lang Balwat liannu ngam nung suiga ngam bingna nani ding pi nat thang ding ngo.
Atiga babaan bi ga bathiangnu mi nun le diga rakhum lou bacham langna ani ding khopsanu pi to thangnu Pa ding swankawo.
Maanna ani ding kazingnu ngam bina kan thang rwe khatle Maanna kriangnu Sa Kapaisa krwang talei la kai takan swak thang rwe.
Bakhou ani Bathi paan bina, noh bing kok thangnu dinuba ran swak thangnu lousu rwe.
Maan heiya mikna mungam maknu Rikrwang thot gong nge khatle dam thang damnu bing lu chung bi amnu natainuwe.

Balangbe Bapaan bina tambaan la amnu khatle talei ram bi amnu, mikna munu, mikna mu maknu, krwang takung riak ngaakle, krwang talei ngaakle, bapuba rwan ngaakle mak tabe ngam ngaakle ha bing ding dam thang ngaak rwe. Pot bing ga Bapaan bina khatle Balaang zana dam thang rwe.
Maan pot bing ma kamaga am ong ngaake khatle Bakhou pot bingza bariak cha chaga am karung nge.
Maan pum om dinuba, rupkathan om baluwe. Atiga Maan thou kamanu, thinu nun lak pina natainuwe. Haga Maan pum brumza lak pi basaang kataknu to lang nge.
Balangbe Bakhou Rikrwang om sipsanu amnu ga Pa sung pemnuwe.
Baom cross pina tanu thi paan bina dai bazaangnu phun hung thangga, Bapaan bina talei ram bi ngaakle, tambaan la ngaakle, am ongnu pum brumza Maan le pi taman thang rwe.
Atiga bakaan khat pi naniba khak lang satnu toga khatle sa maknu chwan toga munanu mi nun to ong ngaake. Atiyeda atunba Maanna pi taman thang rwe.
Haga Bapum bahak thi thangnu paan bi naye. Haga nani ding Bamikphaang bi bathiangnu, koi maaknu khatle khan lang maaknu to lang nge,

batak takka nani balumsat pi ga han tipka khatle kaling makka ongluga, tambaan thwei bi amnu kutthiam bing lang sacham kasam damnu, Paul ating ha lang chungna chwanlaang mi pi to thangnu, nanina ngaisu damnu sacham om bachunnu bi ga kaling makka ong nge dabe heiya hung tanglune.
Atun eina nani lang chungna riangre kanang khaang beida ei karowe. Atiga Christa om riangre kanang bi kabaatnu ga rupkathan to ongnu Christa pum lang chungna apum bi pi bapung pha ongme.
Nani lang sa langna akhou pi thang damnu Rikrwang chwan nung suiga ating heiba rupkathan om chwanlaang mi pi to thang rwe. Haga Rikrwang chong ding eina bapung phaga kasam lang nge.
Haba chongkaang ga thou damnu bakaan inza khatle mikin inza lana inthim thang ongnu ding ga Baom bathiangnu mi nun khou atunba indao thangnu chong gaye.

Gentile rwan lak pi heiba inthim thangnu chong om khopsanu lwat lian ga intia lianbo dinu bathiangnu mi nun khou pi thei thang lang Rikrwang na ka thang thang rwe. Haba inthim thangnu ga lwat liannu bachun to ongnu Christa na nani khou ong thangnu gaye.
Anina mi bing ding Christa Jisu khou bachang sanu toga bachoi thang lang mi bing ding kachui thangga khatle ningting bing le suiga mi bing ding bachu thangga Christa lang bi kasam rwe.
Hei lang chungna akhou chwan to rakan ongnu Bangam nung suiga karam rakanga eina karam ongme.
Balangbe eina nani lang, Laodicea bi ongnu mi nun lang khatle aman mu mak aangnu bing lang riangre takka ongnu lang bi nanina theinu bathaiye.

Dinuba, kriang kalenu bi khatcha toluga sung bi kachui thang lang Pa khatle Christa om to ongnu, Rikrwang om inthim thangnu chong banina theiluga, theinu bing bina hungnu khopsanu lan bing ga banina lousu lang naye.
Christa khou Rikrwang na ningting khatle theinu lan bing ga inkam thang ongme.
Eina heiya nani ding tudannuna munthiam sanu chongna minamga bathemnu le zaye diga rinnuwe.
Balangbe ei apum toga ong mak ngaak peida, katha bi nani le ong bacham ongme atiga nani kasanu gong khatle Christa khou nani balumsat tipka han ongnu ding muluga ei karowe.
Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding lousu damnu danga nani Bapaan bina ring ngo.
Nani khou bachu thang damnu danga balemphu taluga, Bakhou bacha kaluga, balumsanu bi tipnu towo khatle swankanuna sipka ong ngo.

Christa chong nung sui makka, talei ram om ningting, bathaang maaknu minamnu, mi nun chaang, khatchale bathaang maaknu talei ram om chong bachuk paan bina nani ding pakhatchanale lampui kaimaan mak lang barak theiyo.
Balangbe Bakhou Rikrwang om sipsanu bing ga pum toga amme.
Atiga bapuba bing khatle ngam bing om balu tonu Bapaan bina nani bachang sanu to rwe.
Zanti pum om noh ga asatluga Bakhou nani mun rom rwe, haga misa kutna tonu mun romnu ga makka atiyeda Christa na tonu mun romnu gaye.
Baptize tobi nani Maan le ui bacham rwe. Atiga thinu nun lak pina pi ring thou thangnu Rikrwang chwan bi balumsanu paan bina nani ding Pukraangba le diga pi ring thou thang rwe.
Atiga naniba, nani om koi maan khatle mun rom mak briakpina thiga ongnu nani ding, nani koi maan bing ding kok thangluga Pukraangba le diga Maanna pi ring thou bacham thang rwe.
Ani ding munanu ani maitwang bi hiak thangluga amnu ani lei ga to mut sat rwe khatle ha ding ga cross pi hemdan thangluga haga ani khouna lou sat thang rwe.
Rikrwang na bapuba tonu bing khatle ngam choinu mi nun om ngam lou satluga, ha bing ding ga maanna ngamluga, mi nun khou cross paan bina indao thang rwe.
Atibriakpina pakhatchanale kasa kain lang bi mak tabe bangei bangui lang bi mak tabe tha than mak tabe Sabbath lang bi nani ding chong kasem mak ting ngo.
Ha bing ga hung dingnu om bakathaye. Atiyeda bataknuba Christa gaye.

Tambaan chonglang rwan ding kalumnu paan bina, mikna mu maknu pot bing bi basung thangnu, zanti pum om lungning bi bathaang maakka lian tonu bi karonu, bazek ka maknu bi talu tanu mi gana nani ding minamluga nani taswan ga lou mak tam ding ngo.

Maan gana Balu tonu le barui bazem maak rwe. Ren khatle katha rui bingna bathon thangluga, pi nat thangnu paan bina Balu tonu khou gana pum tamun ding Rikrwang khouna sing thounu ga le bachamga sing thou rwe.
Atibriakpina talei ram om bakung tonu seta ongnu chaang bi gana nani Christa le diga thi bachamme dabe, pa-aam toga nanina talei ram bi ongnu danga talei ram om chongren thwei bi ongnubo?
Chongren nun gabe, “Banaan mako, batem mako, choi mako.”
Ha bing ga mi nun om zathang khatle bachu thangnu bi hai thang briakpina hei bing nga sizinnu le bachamga braan lang lang swaknuwe.

Mi nunna bachanu ririak, bazek ka maknu bi talu tanu mi gana, pum ding rai basiatnu ha bing ga batak takka ningting om thot am ngaak peida zanti pumna bathainu bing ding thingnu ga khatchale bathaang maake.
Nanina Christa le diga ring thou bachamme dabe, basaang la amnu pot bing ding ga zong ngo. Habei Christa na Rikrwang kut inchang pek la badung ongme.
Basaang la amnu pot bing bi ga nani sung thang ngo, talei ram bi amnu bi nani sung thang mako.
Balangbe nani thi rwe khatle nani kum ga Christa le diga Rikrwang khou inkam thang rwe.
Ani ringnu riak to ongnu Christa ding indao thangnu kaan bi nani ding le Pukraangba le diga lwat liannu bi indao thanglune.

Atibriakpina talei ram bi nani pum naat bing ga, lungkoi lungmannu, bathiang maknu, boulaanu, kasianu to nwamnu khatle ri katha ding kalumnu toga chak thang ongnu dinuba raaamnu, hei bing nga thinuwe diga chak thang ngo.
Atibriakpina chong zei maknu mi nun lu chung bi Rikrwang balung pwan hunglune.
Nani nun heipai chwan bi lung ong ngaaknu kaan bi nani le habei ga se ong ngaake.
Atiyeda atunba balung pwannu, sung sounu, phaang batannu sung, rin basiatnu, nani mun bina chong ru kabianu bing ga bathan satro.
Nani khatna khat khou chong karwaknu kabia kale mako. Balangbe nani khouna mi lui ga bachwan le diga asat trwe.
Atiga theinu nung suiga Bating dam thangnu Rikrwang katha louluga pi kathan thang damnu Mi kathan ga nanina sin basoiyo.
Habei ga Greek rwan, Jihudi rwan, mun romnu, mun rom maknu, barbaros rwan, Scythia rwan, swak khatle rang tonu rwan dinu maake. Atiyeda Christa Maan ga pum brum zaye khatle pum brumza bi ongme.

Atibriakpina Rikrwang na kathang swak thangnu nun toga bathiangnu rwan khatle kriangnu nun ga, nani khou kriang theinu sung, sung sanu, bangiamtanu, sung bazaangnu khatle khaang theinu ha bing ga pon naat tanga sin basoiyo.
Khat na khat ting khaang thang kaleyo khat le khat kok thang kaleyo. Khat le khat pem maknu amme dabe Christa na nani ding kok thangnu ga danga nanina le atiga towo.
Atiyeda hei bing chung bi, pum brum ding sung chamnu bi bang karung thangnu kriangnu ga sin basoiyo.
Rikrwang om dai bazaangnu gana nani sung ding kai thang ding ngo. Ha langna nani ding pum khatcha to lang kou le kou thang rwe khatle nani swan le swanka dingnuwe.

Christa chongkaang ga nani sung bi sipsaga amnu to ding ngo. Kalum laana khatle swannu laana khatle katha laa le bachamga, ningting bing paan bina khatna khat ting bachu thangga, kachui thang kaleyo. Atiga swankanule bachamga nani sung kalan lana Pukraangba khou towo.
Nanina chongkaang bi ngaakle, chwan bi ngaakle balang bing bi Pukraangba Jisu meng bina towo khatle Bapaan bina Pa Rikrwang ding swanno.
Mei rwan ga, Pukraangba khou tonu zek swaknu danga nani basan rwan bahak thwei bi ong ngo.
Basan rwan ga, nani mei rwan ding kriang ngo, bani ding siaga to mako.
Naosen rwan ga, balang bing bi nani nu pa rwan chong zeiyo. Balangbe haga Pukraangba khou pem taknuwe.
Pa rwan, nani sa nao rwan ding bani sung pi inkhin mak langna bani ding balung pwan lang lao mako.
Swak rwan ga, mi nun ding pi pem langna mikphaang om chwan tonu makka sung bathiangga Rikrwang ding kachiga talei ram bi nani om bapuba rwan ding balang bingza bi rinnu zeiyo.
Pa-aam ngaakle nanina tonu bi ga mi nun khou tonu dan makka Pukraangba khou tonu danga sung khutka towo.
Pukraangba khouna taswan toga rakhum lousulune dinu nanina theiye. Balangbe naniba Pukraangba Christa ding chwanlaang tonu mi nunne.
Atiyeda tudannu kakoinu chwan tonu maan gana, maanna to damnu chwan nung suiga taswan phanglune khatle habei ga kathing aih tonu maake.
Bapuba rwan ga, tambaan la nani om Bapuba khat amme dinu theiga, nani swak rwan ding bazega khatle saga to thang ngo.
Sung khutka, chat makka kalumga, habei ga swankanu le bachamga barak theiga ong ngo.
Haga le bachamga Christa om inthim thangnu chong ga kasam langna Rikrwang na sacham inkhaan ga ani lang lat thang lang kalum thang ngo. Sacham langna ating le atun bang thang ongme.
Eina kabia dingnu zek ka bathiangga indao swaknu ngam lang kalum thang ngo.
Nani bakaan ga choi chuiga balumsa maknu mi nun meithaan bi ningtingga seyo.
Nanina mi bing khou tatoga chong katak tingbo dinu thei lang nani chongbiak laabiak ka bachi danga thumga phaangkriang le bachamga kabiawo.
Anina kriangnu unao, balumsa lang khopnu chwanlaang mi khatle Pukraangba khou chwanlaang to bachamnu Tychicus na aom cham bing nani khou rin thanglune.
Heiba om langna eina bating nani khou lang hungnuwe. Hagazo maanna nani lang bing ga theiluga nani sung ding kachui thang lang nge.
Nani lak pina le, nani mi to ongnu, balumsa lang khopnu kriangnu unao, Onesimus ting Tychicus le diga lang hung nge. Barweina ala ani khou swak ongnu lang bing bi nani khou pi thei thanglune.
Ei le diga qwan in bi ong bachamnu Aristarchus le Barnabas unao Mark na le nani ding kalumme (balang bi nanina chongtan kasem lousu rwe. Maan nani khou hung nge dabe bating loukhut thang ngo).
Justus tiga kounu Jisu na nani ding kalumme. Mun romnu bani zana ei le diga Rikrwang om Krwang talei lang chwan to bachamnu nunne. Bani ga ating pi lozaang sa thangnu mi nunne.

Nani lak pina le nani mi to ongnu, Christa chwanlaang tonu Epaphras na nani ding kalumme. Rikrwang na baningnu bi bachang saga khatle tipka hannu ngam lang maanna bakaan bathin rakanga hweini thang ongme.
Balangbe maanna nani lang Laodicea bi khatle Hierapolis pi ongnu mi bing lang banang thang ongme dinu lang bi eina sake rwe.
Anina kriangnu doctor Luke le Demas na nani ding kalumme.
Laodicea bi amnu unao rwan, Nymphas le bain bi amnu rupkathan ding kalum thang ngo.
Heiba chamthwanna nanina pa taangnu kaan bi Laodicea om rupkathan bi le pa lang pi thang ngo. Atiga Laodicea lana pi hungnu chamthwan ga nanina le pa thang ngo.
Archippus khou, “Nangna Pukraangba khouna lousu damnu chwandon ga to zok lang sung khutka to thang ngo” diga rin thang ngo.
Kalumnu heiya Paul akut bahakna hiaknuwe. Ating bang thang ongnuwa baningsu thang ngo. Phaangkriang nani khou amnu to ding ngo. Amen.

Paul, Silvanus khatle Timothy na, Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou ongnu Thessalonica rupkathan bi: ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.
Anina hweini bi nani nun ding panga Rikrwang khou chat makka swan ongme.
Nani nun om balumsat chwan, kriangnu chwan khatle ani Rikrwang atiluga Pa mikphaang bi Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou nani om khaang theinu bachun bing lang ga anina chat makka baningsuwe.
Kriangnu unao rwan ga, nani ding Rikrwang na kathang swak thangnu ga theiye.

Balangbe ani om sacham ga nani khou chongkaangza hungnu make atiyeda ngam le suiga Katha Bathiangnu bi khatle bataknu bi hungnuwe. Balangbe nani nun lang chungna anina to ongnuwa ani tatonu mi nunbo dinu nanina theiye.
Nanina riangre kanang lak pi chong ga Katha Bathiangnu om karonu le bachamga, lousuluga, ani nung khatle Pukraangba nung suinu nun to rwe.
Hagana nani nun Macedonia bi khatle Achaia bi ongnu balumsanu mi bing khou bazei zanu to rwe.

Balangbe nani khouna Macedonia le Achaia za bi makka bariak bathin Pukraangba om chongkaang ga kazan swak trwe. Rikrwang khou nani balumsat ka kazan swak trwe, atiga anina katei kabia lat lang maak rwe.

Balangbe ani om lang bi dinuba, anina nani khou tatoga hungbo dinu lang bi bani bahakna indao rwe. Nanina tatoga ri katha kalum ong bina Rikrwang khou kanei hungluga ringga ongnu khatle bazenu Rikrwang ding chwanlaang tonu lang bi,
Basa Kapaisana tambaan lana ta dingnu, thi bina Maanna pi ring thou damnu khatle Rikrwang balung pwan bina ani ding kanthangnu Jisu ding ngaak ong lang nge.
Balangbe unao rwan ga, nanina theiye dinuba anina nani khou hungnuwa bathaam make.
Atiyeda ani nun meithaan Philippi bi mai sianu khatle rainu dou ngaake. Anina Rikrwang om sacham ga nani khou rin swak lang maitwangnu inza am ngaak peida Rikrwang khou ani sung raangnu amme.
Balangbe anina nani ding kachui thangnuwa kabaknu bina mak tabe bathiang maknu mak tabe minamnuna make.
Atiyeda Rikrwang na za thangga sacham ga ani khou sin thang rwe. Atibriakpina anina mi nun ding pi pemnu dan makka atiyeda ani sung ding tam ongnu Rikrwang ding pi pem langna anina kabianuwe.
Balangbe nanina theinu ga danga anina impha ni hakna rin thiyamnu chongna mak tabe antiamnuna nani khou anina tonu make dinu Rikrwang na sake rwe.
Ati mak tabe ani khou Christa om chonglang rwan to lang khopnu ngaak peida ani mi nun khouna mak tabe nani khouna mak tabe katei rwan khouna lwat liannu ding ga ani zongnu make.
Atiyeda ani banuna basa rwan bahak ting pi karo thangnu ga danga nani nun lak pi sung bazaangnu to rwe.
Anina nani ding heitia lang kriangga nani khou Rikrwang om sacham za makka ani kum hakna pi thang rwe. Balangbe naniya anina kriangnu nunne.

Balangbe unao rwan ga nanina ani chwan khatle ani riangre kanang ding baningsu thang rwe. Anina nani pakhatcha khou hakna potrit pi thang mak langna zingpha thamlai thei makka chwan toga nani khou sacham ma kasam thang rwe.
Balumsa damnu nani lak pi anina ririak sega, bazega khatle koi maakka se ongbo dinu nanina le Rikrwang na le sake rwe.
Nanina theinu ga danga anina nani ding kachui thangga khatle pi karo thangga, nani pakhat khat ting bapana basa rwan ding phaang thangnu danga phaang thang rwe.
Rikrwang na Baom krwang talei khatle lwat liannu bi kou thangnu nung suiga, nani nun khopsanu nun toga se lang naye.

Ha langna anina Rikrwang ding chat makka swankaye. Balangbe nanina ani khou Rikrwang chong ga ngaisuluga lousu damnu kaan bi haga nanina mi nun om chong dan makka, bazenu Rikrwang chong nge diga karoga lou thang rwe. Hagana balumsanu nani khou rakanga chwan to rwe.

Balangbe unao rwan ga, nani Judea bi amnu Rikrwang om rupkathan nun om thot lounu mi nun to rwe. Balangbe Jihudi rwan khouna bani riangre kanang khaang damnu ga danga, nani nun le nani talei mi nun khouna haba riangre khaang rwe.
Banina Pukraangba Jisu Christa khatle bani om thiamting rwan ding athat sat rwe khatle ani ding le rai rwe. Atiga Rikrwang ding le pi pemlan rwe atiluga mi nun ding to kabat kabaang thang rwe.
Gentile rwan ding kan thang lang chong kabianu ani ding banina khaamme. Hagana bani noh ga bakaan bathin inku thou rwe. Atiyeda Rikrwang om balung pwan ga bani chung bi inku kiatka hung rwe.
Atiyeda unao rwan ga, anina ani sung bi kapaang maklena, ani pum bi nani le diga bakaan kasemza kapaang kale biya anina nani man mu lat nong lang rakanga karam ngaake.
Atibriakpina Paul ei le diga anina nani khou hung lang karam lat lat ngaake. Atiyeda Seitaan na ani ding to tan ngaake.
Ati dabe Pukraangba Jisu Christa na hungnu kaan bi ani om bachun mak tabe karonu mak tabe karonu luthop ka pa-aambo?
Balangbe nani nun ga ani om lwat liannu khatle karonu gaye.
Atibriakpina eina khaang ngam mak hungnu kaan bi Athens pi araanto ong damnuna sa rwe diga anina baning rwe.
Christa om sacham bi chwanto bachamnu, Rikrwang om chwantok mi ani unao Timothy ding nani balumsat pi nani ding pi tip thang lang khatle kachui thang lang lang hung rwe.
Heiba riangre kanang ngana pakhatcha ding hakna to kaling mak tam lang hei langna ani ding chwan hap thangnu rwe dinu nani bahakna theiye.
Balangbe ani riangre kanang khaang lang rwe diga ani nani le diga ong bacham ongnu kaan bi rin chaak thang ngaaknu ga danga batak takka hung tang rwe dinu nanina theiye.

Atibriakpina eina khaang ngam mak hungnu kaan bi eina nani khou Timothy ding nani balumsat ka thei lang lang hungnuwe. Balangbe nani ding bathemnu gana bathemnu le zaye khatle ani om chwan ga bathaang maaknu le zaye diga baning briakpi naye.

Atiyeda atun Timothy nani khouna ani khou hung tang lat rwe. Maanna nani nun balumsat khatle kriangnu kasanu cham ga phun hung rwe. Nanina ani ding chat makka baningsu thang ongnu, ani ding mu nwam takka ongnu cham ga thei rwe.
Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, nani lang bi, ani riangrek khatle nangnu bing bi nani balumsat kana ani ding sum thang rwe.
Balangbe nanina Pukraangba khou han tipka ong nge dabe, atun ani ringlune.
Balangbe ani Rikrwang meithaan bi nani lang bina lozaang sa ongnu karok bing lang ga Rikrwang khou ani saruk swankanu intoga anina indao tang ngam ding gabo!
Anina nani man mu nwamga khatle nani balumsat pi lian thou langna, zingpha thamlai thei makka hweini rakanga hweini ongme.
Ani Pa Rikrwang Maanna khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa na ani ding nani khou lang hung thang ding ngo.
Anina nani khou tonu danga Pukraangba na nani lak pi khatna khat ting kriangnu inku thou lang pi thang ding ngo.
Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa na Baom bathiangnu mi rwan le diga hungnu kaan bi ani Pa Rikrwang meithaan bi nani sung koi maakka bathiangnu to lang Maanna nani ding pi nat thanglune.

Kakhamnu bi unao rwan ga, nani ani khouna lousu damnu ga danga into se langbo, intoga Rikrwang ding pi pem langbo dinu lang bi inku thou lang Pukraangba Jisu khou anina nani ding bathemga kachui thang nge.
Balangbe anina nani khou Pukraangba Jisu paan bina paaam zathang pi thangbo dinu nanina theiye.
Balangbe nani ding to bathiang thangnu heiya Rikrwang na baningnuwe dinuba nani nun lungkoi lungmaannu to mak ting gaye.
Dinuba nani mi bingza bamei le diga tatoga bathiangga khatle takungga lung dingbo dinu thei lang nge.
Rikrwang ding thei maknu Gentile rwan danga boulaanu mi nun to mak ting gaye.

Dinuba pakhatchanale hei lang bi baunao ding minamluga balaangza zong mak ting gaye. Anina nani khou kamaga rin thang rwe khatle sake pi drwe. Hadanga Pukraangba heiya heipai bing ding takhum baannu Pa ye.
Balangbe Rikrwang na ani ding tanaat lang kou thangnu make atiyeda bathiangnu to lang kou thang rwe.
Atibriakpina tudannu hei ding nga za maknu maan ga mi ding za maknu make; atiyeda Baom Katha Bathiangnu ani lang pi thangnu Rikrwang ding za maknuwe.
Atiyeda naniba unao rwan khat le khat kriang kalenu lang bi eina nani khou hiak lang balang maak rwe. Balangbe nani khat le khat kriang kale lang Rikrwang na nani ding bachu thang rwe.
Batakka nanina Macedonia taram bing bi ongnu unao rwan bing ding atiga to rwe. Atiyeda nanina haga inku inkuga to lang anina nani ding kachui thangnu rwe.
Anina nani khou zathang pi thangnu danga nani thiap thiapka ong lang nani thou ga to chui lang khatle nani kutna chwan to lang karammo.
Langkaang la ongnu mi nun meithaan bi sung bathiangga ong lang nge khatle nani lang khatchale baatnu maak lang nge.
Atiyeda unao rwan ga, thi damnu nun om lang bi nanina thei maknu eina bathai make, dinuba bachunnu maaknu nun danga nani sung riangrenu ei bathai make.
Balangbe Jisu Christa thiluga ring thou lat trwe dinu anina balumsaye dabe, haga danga Jisu khou thi damnu mi nun ding Maan le bachamga Rikrwang na kalwang hung lune.
Balangbe heiya anina nani khou Rikrwang chong paan bina rinuwe dinuba Pukraangba hungnu tangga ringga ongnu khatle am ongnu anina thi damnu nun ma khatchatle se kamalaye.
Balangbe Pukraangba Maan Bahak tambaan lana tambaan chonglang rwan khwan le Rikrwang om trumpet baraam le bachamga talune. Atiga Christa khou thi damnu rwan gana ring thou kamalune.
Haba nung bi ring ga ongnu ani nun ding bani nun le diga tambu bi phunkaluga, basaang la Pukraangba ding ka kadoulune. Atiga ani nun Pukraangba le diga bakaan khwa seiga ong bachamlune.
Atibriakpina heiba chong ngana nani nun khat le khat bathem thang kalega ong ngo.
Atiyeda unao rwan ga, bakaan khatle bapha lang bi eina nani khou hiak lang bathaang maake.
Balangbe Pukraangba lumik ka in baruk mina zingpha hungnu ga danga hunglune dinu nanina bathiangga thei rwe.

Balangbe banina “Dai bazaang rwe khatle kakham kanam maak rwe” diga rinnu dat pi kamaisana nao lung lang nainu kaan bi riangrenu danga thei mak daakka to braannu ga bani lu chung bi hunglune khatle bani habei gana dwakla rwe.
Atiyeda unao rwan ga, naniba zingnu bi ong lan rwe. Haba Lumik ka inbruk mi danga nani lu chung bi hungla rwe.
Naniba kabaannu khatle thamlai sa rwan zung rwe. Ani zingpha mak tabe zingnu om lan rwe.
Atibriakpina ani katei rwan danga inthi ong makcho. Atiyeda ani barak theiga khatle ningting ga ongzo.
Balangbe innu nunna zingpha innuwe khatle zu kalonu nun gana zingpha kalonuwe.
Atiyeda aniba thamlai mi nun briakpina ani balumsat khatle kriangnu kachaang thop khatle ringriak om bachunnu ga kraan luthop toga thopluga ningtingga ongrizo.
Balangbe Rikrwang na ani ding balung pwan dou lang makka, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bina ringriak lousu lang ka thang thang rwe.
Balangbe anina insaang thounu ngaakle in ongnu ngaakle ani le diga lung bacham langna Maan thi ngaak rwe.
Atibriakpina nanina le to ongnu ga danga nani khatna khat ting pi lozaang sa kaleyo khatle bacha thou kaleyo.
Unao rwan ga, nanina nani nun lak pi chwan to ongnu khatle Pukraangba khou nani lu chung bi ong ongnu nani ding bachu thang ongnu nun ding takung tazeiyo diga rinnuwe.
Bani om chwan lang gana bani ding inkuga takhwang to lang anina nani ding kalumme. Nani lak pi dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.

Unao rwan ga, atun anina nani ding bachu thangnuwe, takaatnu nun ding ga laak thang ngo, katha bi sonnu nun ding ga kachui thang ngo, kasonnu ding ga kai thou thang ngo khatle bani mi bing le diga khaang bachammo.
Pakhatchanale kasianu tonu langna kasianu to baan mak lang towo. Atiyeda khatna khat lang atiluga khangsung lang kasanu to lang bakaan bathin zong ngo.
Bakaan thin karowo.
Chat makka hweiniyo.
Balang bing bi swankawo, balangbe haga Christa Jisu khou nani lang Rikrwang na bathainuwe.
Katha Bathiangnu ding khaam mako.
Ri chong rin swaknu ding balaa mako.
Pot bing ding ga tamphaang ngo, kasanu ga choitipo.
Kasianu thot bing ga bathan sato.

Atun dai bazaangnu Rikrwang na nani ding balang bing bi to bathiang thang ding ngo. Bani katha, ringnu khatle pum ding Pukraangba Jisu Christa na hungnu ga tangga, koi maan maak lang Maanna to bathiang thang ding ngo.
Nani ding kou thangnu Maan ga balumsa lang khopnuwe. Maanna haga nani lang to le to thanglune.
Unao rwan ga, ani lang hweini thang ngo.
Bathiangga kaputnu le bachamga unao rwan bing ding kalum thang ngo.
Chongdip heiya bathiangnu unao rwan bing khou pa indao thang lang eina Pukraangba meng bi sin thangnuwe.
Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang ga nani khou amnu to ding ngo. Amen.
Paul, Silvanus khatle Timothy na Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou ongnu Thessalonica rupkathan khou,
ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou am ding ngo.

Unao rwan, anina nani lang bi Rikrwang ding bakaan bathin swankaye, haga anina to dingnu zek bahak rwe, balangbe nani balumsat taswang khak sing thou ongme khatle nani mi bing khatna khat ting kriangnu le inku thou rwe.
Atibriakpina nani ding rai ongnu khatle nanina khaang ongnu riangre kanangnu bing lak pi nani om khaang seinu khatle balumsanu langna Rikrwang om rupkathan bing bi nani lang bi ani lian to rwe.

Hei bing ngana, Rikrwang om ririak senu chongsem ma bazenuwe dinu indao rwe. Nani ding Rikrwang om krwang talei langna khopsanu mi nun toga chak thang lang nge. Balangbe ha langna nani le riangre khaang ongnuwe.
Nani ding to riangre ongnu mi nun ding ga Rikrwang na riangre kanangnu piga takhum baannu bazenuwe.

Pukraangba Jisu ding Baom ngam liannu tambaan chonglang rwan le diga tambaan lana indao thangnu kaan bi riangre kanang khaang ongnu nani nun ding ani le diga Rikrwang na lo pi basak thangnu bi Rikrwang ga bazenuwe.
Rikrwang na Bating thei maknu nun ding khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om sacham ding lou thang maknu mi nun ding meina takhum baanlune.
Bani ding Pukraangba khatle Baom lwat liannu ngam meithaan bina laak thangga khwa sei lang to braan satlune,

heiya Baom bathiangnu mi nun lak pi lwat liannu to lang khatle Bating balumsanu mi bing lak pi Bating bathai lang haba lumik pi Pukraangba na hungnu kaan bi haga pi hung tang thanglune. Balangbe ani om sake ga nanina balumsa rwe.

Atibriakpina nani ding kou thangnu om khopsanu ga ani Rikrwang na chak thang lang khatle kasanu bathainu bing khatle balumsanu chwan bing ngam le suiga pi hung tang thang lang anina le nani lang bakaan bathinza bi hweini ongme.
Haga ani Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang nung suiga nani khou ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng ding khatle Bakhou nani ding lwat pi lian thang lang nge.
Unao rwan ga, Pukraangba Jisu Christa na hung dingnu khatle ani nun Bakhou hung karung dingnu lang bi anina nani khou hweinuwe,

dinuba katha na ngaakle, chongkaang na ngaakle ani khouna bathwan hungnu chamthwan danga pi hungnuna ngaakle, Christa lumik ka hungna rwe diga rinnu gana, nani sung ding to kanuknu khatle to riangrenu to mak lang nge.

Nani ding pakhatchanale pa-aam aamna ngaakle minamnu to mak ting ngo. Balangbe balumsanu bathan satnu ga kamaga hung mak basaan khatle to braannu sa kapaisa dinuba chongtan thouto maknu mi ding ga indao thang mak basaan haba lumik ka hung tanglaye.

Maanna Rikrwang nge diga kounu mak tabe kalum dingnuwe dinu bing ding maitwanglune khatle haba lu chung bi baraanto bating phun basaanglune. Maanna Rikrwang kalum in bi Rikrwang danga badungluga maan Rikrwang nge diga pi mulune.
Eina nani le diga ong bachamnu kaan bi hei bing lang bi nani khou rin thang damnu ga baningsu makpo?
Atun Baom bakaan bi indao thang dingnu ding khaam thang ongnu ga tubo dinu nanina theiye.
Balangbe chongtan thouto maknu om inthim thangnu gana atun bachwan to ong rwe. Atiyeda atun khaam thang ongnu bating ga lou thou dam mak basaan maanna khaam thang onglune.
Haba nung bi chongtan thouto maknu bating indao thanglune khatle Pukraangba mun bina swaknu kaphuk kana bating athat satlune khatle Pukraangba hungnu babaan gana bating to braan satlune.
Chongtan thouto maknu maan hungnu ga Seitaan om chwan nung sui gaye. Haga baom ngam bing, badannu chwan bing khatle katap tonu tasiatnu chwan bing le hunglune.
Braan dam dingnu mi nun ding minamnu baze maknu bing ga le bachamga hunglune. Balangbe bani ding kanthangnu lousu lang bazenu kriang ding ga lou thang make.
Atibriakpina banina kakoinu ding ga balumsa dam lang rakanga minamnu ngam ding ga Rikrwang na lang thanglune.
Bazenu ding ga balumsa maknu bing ding khatle ririak se maknu bi pemnu nun ding pi koi thang lang nge.

Atiyeda Pukraangba na kriangnu unao rwan ga, nani langna bakaan bathin Rikrwang ding swan dingnu zek swake. Balangbe Katha na nani ding to bathiangnu paan bina khatle bazenu ding ga balumsanu paan bina, ringriak ka lousu lang Rikrwang na thoutan bina nani ding ka thang rwe.
Ha langna ani sacham paan bina nani ding Maanna kou thang rwe. Haga nanina Pukraangba Jisu Christa lwat liannu ga lousu dam lang nge.
Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, han tipka ong ngo. Nani ding chongkaangna ngaakle, ani chamthwanna ngaakle nani khou bachu thangnu chaang ga choitipka choiyo.
Atun ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa Maan Bahakna khatle ani Pa Rikrwang, ani ding kriang thang ongnu khatle chat makka kachui thangnu khatle phaangkriang paan bina kasanu bachun pi thangnu gana
nani sung pi lum thang ding ngo khatle kasanu chongkaang khatle chwandon bingna nani ding kachui thang ding ngo.
Kakham katak pi, unao rwan ga, nani khou amnu danga Pukraangba chong ga barapka kazan swakluga lwat pi lian langna ani lang kalum thang ngo.
Ani ding bagong cha maknu khatle sa maknu mi nun khouna kan thang lang kalum thang ngo, balangbe balumsat ka mi bing khou amnu make.
Atiyeda nani ding pi nat thang lang khatle kasianu khouna nani ding ngaak sian thang lang Pukraangba gabe balumsa zanuwe.
Anina zathang pi thang damnu ga nanina towe khatle toga onglune diga anina nani lang bi Pukraangba khou balumsanu amme.
Atun Rikrwang om kriangnu bi khatle Christa om sung seinu bi ga Pukraangba na nani sung ding kai thang ding ngo.

Unao rwan ga, anina nani ding Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng bi zathang piye, dinuba: Bagong ta maknu khatle nanina ani khouna lousu damnu bachu thangnu chaang nung suiga lung maknu bing ga bathan sato.
Balangbe nanina ani thot ting intoga bazei langbo dinu nanina theiye. Balangbe ani nun nani lak pi takaatnu to make.
Mak tabe mi khat om thaisaak anina bathaam sa innu maake atiyeda nani pakhatcha ding hakna to riangre mak lang anina zingpha thamlai thei makka chwan rakanga towe.
Haga ani nani om paang thangnu lounu zek maak briakpina make. Atiyeda nanina ani ding tatoga sui bazei langbo dinu anina nani khou pi mu lang naye.
Balangbe ani nani le diga ong bachamnu kaan bi anina heiba zathang nga nani khou pi thang damnu rwe, “Tudannu pakhatna chwan to takaate dabe sa le sa mak tam ding ngo.”
Balangbe nani lak pi tudannu mi kasem batun cha maknu khatle chwan khatchale to makka atiyeda chwan katopnu katap tonu mi nun kasem amme dinu anina ngaisuwe.
Atun heiba mi nunna, banina chwan to thiap thiapluga, bani baom baom thaisaak sa lang Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bina anina zathang piye khatle kachui thang nge.
Atiyeda unao rwan ga, nani nun kasanu chwan to bi riangrenu to mako.
Tudannu ani om chamthwan bi amnu ani chong bachuk zei maknu towe dabe, bating ga bapu theiyo atiluga bating pi kazak langna nani bating bacham mako.
Ati ngaaklena bating nanina munanu khat ting danga chak thang mako atiyeda unao ding danga bachu thang ngo.
Atunba dai bazaangnu Pukraangba bahakna nani nun khou bakaan bathin balang bingza bi dai bazaangnu pi thangnu to ding ngo. Pukraangba na nani mi bing le ong bacham thang ding ngo.
Kalumnu heiya Paul akut bahakna hiaknuwe. Hei dannu gong bi chamthwan bing bi eina badannu toga hiake.
Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang gana nani khangsung khou ong bacham thangnu to ding ngo. Amen.
Ani ding Kanthangnupa Rikrwang khatle ani bachun to ongnu Pukraangba Jisu Christa om zathang nung suiga, Jisu Christa om chonglang Paul eina,
balumsanu bi bataknu sa kapaisa Timothy khou ani Pa Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang, kriang thang theinu khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.
Banina zekrin katei bachu thang mak lang nangna bani ding bachu thang lang eina Macedonia la se damnu kaan bi nang Ephesus pi ong lang rakanga rin damnu danga,
pwaknu meiri khatle loinu nai maknu pu pa rui bi sung thang mak lang bani khou chongtan pi thang ngo. Hagana balumsat pi Rikrwang khou lian thounu hut kae kanaanu pi swake.
Atun heiba zathang pi thangnu lang bi bathiangnu sung lana, kakoi baze theinu sung lana khatle bataknu balumsat pina swaknu kriangnu gaye.
Hei bing bina mi kasemba lampui maanluga takaatnu meiri la kanei drwe.
Banina rin ong nu ga pa-aambo khatle bani balumsat ka pa-aambo dinu bakaba thei mak peida, bani chongtan bachuthangnu mi nun tonu bathaiye.
Atiyeda tupai pakhatna bazega sizinne dabe chongtan ga sanuwe dinu anina theiye.

Heiya theiye dinuba, chongtan ga ririak senu mi lang bacha thangnu make atiyeda haga chongtan thouto makka ringnu mi nun, rwan thwei ong takaatnu mi nun, Rikrwang ding kachi maknu mi nun, noh mi nun khatle bathiang maknu mi nun, imphom tanaatnu mi nun, banu bapa ding athatnu mi nun, mi athatnu nun,
lungkoi lungmaannu nun, kapaisa cham khatle kamaisa cham lungnu nun, mi nam mi kainu nun, mun theinu nun, chong karwaknu chongren tonu nun khatle bazenu zekrin maitwang bi hannu ha bing lang nge.
Bazenu zekrin ga akhou sin thang damnu aih sanu Rikrwang om sacham nung sui gaye.
Ating pi nat thang ongnu ani Pukraangba Christa Jisu ding ei swankaye. Balangbe chwanlaang to lang Maanna ating kathang swak thangga, balumsa lang khopnu mi toga chak thang rwe.
Ei bakaan khat pi rin basiatnu mi, rainu mi khatle bathot sianu mi khat to ngaak peida, eina thei makka khatle balumsa makka to briakpina akhou phaangkriang ga pi thang rwe.
Ani Pukraangba phaangkriang gabe Jisu Christa khou amnu balumsat khatle kriangnu le bachamga khopsaga amme.
Jisu Christa talei ram noh mi nun ding kan thang lang hung rwe dinu chong nga balumsa lang khopnu khatle lou thang lang khopnuwe, atiga noh mi nun khon bina eina sia kataknuwe.

Ati ngaaklena, khwa sei ringnu ga lousu langna kanung Bating balumsa dingnu mi nun khou rin bachaknu toga, Jisu Christa na Baom loinu nai maknu khaang seinu ga, noh mi nun khon bina sia kataknu akhou pi mu thang lang eina phaangkriang ga lousu rwe.
Atun khwa sei ringnu Krwang, thi latlanu, mikna mu maknu, Baraantoza ningtingnu Rikrwang khou takhwang khatle khwa sei lwat liannu to ding ngo. Amen.

Sa kapaisa Timothy, thou damnu bakaan bi nalang bi indao thang damnu chong nung suiga, chongtan ga eina nakhou sin thang nge. Indao thang damnu chong heiyana nangna kasanu kraan katwaknu toga katwak lang nge.
Ha lang chungna balumsanu khatle kasanu lungning am ding gaye. Mi kasemna hei ding nga bathan sat rwe khatle bani om balumsanu lang bi li baknu danga bak trwe.
Rin basiat mak lang bachu lang Seitaan khou eina pi swak tamnu Hymenaeus khatle Alexander heiya bani nun lak pi le sui ngaake.
Atibriakpina kama katak pi mi bingza lang Rikrwang khou kalumga, hweiniga, katei lang hweini thangga khatle swan lang eina kachui thang nge.
Rikrwang ding baningga khatle sung bathiangga, ani nun dai bazaangga khatle chongsok saga lung lang krwang nun khatle ngam choinu mi bing lang hweini thang ngo.
Balangbe heiya ani ding Kanthangnupa Rikrwang mikphaang bi kasanu khatle lou thang lang khopnu gaye.
Mi bing zana kanthangnu lousunu khatle bazenu ding theinu ga Maanna bathainuwe.
Balangbe Rikrwang khat amme khatle Rikrwang le mi nun lak pi Tabat pakhat amme, Maan Misa tonu Christa Jisu we.
Maan mi nun ding kan thang lang bathan swaknu man toga Bapum ding pi swak ngaak rwe. Atiga Baom sake ga kachanu kaan bi pi thang lang nge.

Ha langna ating sacham kasamnu mi, chonglang (Ei Christa khou bazenu kabia ongnuwe ei chong karwaknu make), balumsanu khatle bazenu lang bi Gentile rwan khou bachuthangnupa toga ating kathang thang ngaak rwe.
Atibriakpina bariak bathin kapaisa rwanna bathiangnu kut kai thouluga balung pwannu khatle balumsianu to makka kalumnu eina bathaiye.

Hadanga kamaisa rwanna le phaang lemnu sin basoi, phaangsaga khatle lungning amga sin basoinu ei bathaiye. Sam phannuna mak tabe kachaak, baman kungnu lung mak tabe baman kung taknu potna tapon to makka,
atiyeda Rikrwang ding kachinu kamaisa rwanne diga rinnu rwan lang hoinu kasanu chwan gana tapon towo.
Kamaisana bangiamtanu le bachamga thiap thiapka bachu dam ding ngo.
Kamaisa khatna kapaisa ding bachu thangnu mak tabe kapaisa lu chung bi ngam choinu ei za make atiyeda maan thiap thiap ong ding ngo.
Balangbe Adam ding dam kama ngaake, haba nung bi Eve ting nge.
Adam ding minamnu make atiyeda kamaisa ding minamnuwe, atiga maan koi maan bi ta thang rwe.
Atiyeda banina balumsanu bi, kriangnu bi, bathiangnu bi khatle chat makka bazan ding raak ong nge dabe, nao amnu dat pi kan thanglune.
Rin ongnu heiya balumsa lang khopnuwe dinuba, mi pakhatna phaangsin thangnu mi chwan to lang bathainu ga maan kasanu chwan ding bathainuwe.
Phaangsin thangnu maan ga koi maaknu, kamaisa khat om basan tonu, sung bazaangnu, bazan ding raak theinu, takhwang man phunnu, pi sa pi in theinu, bachu thang ngamnu,
zu in maknu, kabit kamai maknu, sian ra-aam maknu atiyeda sung bazaangnu, kae kanaa maknu, antiam maknu,
maanna bain inkhun ding phun chuiga basa rwan ding takung tazeinu bing le bachamga pi talu ta ding gaye.
Balangbe mi khatna bain inkhun ga tatoga phun dingbo dinu thei make dabe, maan tatoga Rikrwang om rupkathan ding phunnu ngam dingbo?
Haga sung le hungnu mi kathanna phun mak ting ngo. Mak tabe maan balian to thouluga Diabol danga, braannu bi ta thangnu le zaye.
Haza makka, bating rupkathan paan la mi nun lak pi le rinswannu mi to lang nge. Haga bating rin basiatnu to mak lang khatle maan Diabol phaa bi man mak lang nge.
Hadanga deacon rwan le takungnu thot phunnu, balei kani phun maknu, zu in maknu, sian ra-aam maknu,
bathiangnu sung le bachamga balumsat om inthim chong ga choitipnu mi to ding gaye.
Atiyeda bani ding ga le tamphaang kama ding gaye. Bani ding khan lang maake dabe, banina deacon toga chwanlaang to ding ngo.
Hadanga bani mei rwan le takungnu thot phunnu, rwan ding sia lang rin maknu, sung bazaangnu khatle balang bing bi balumsa lang khopnu to ding ngo.
Deacon rwanna le mei khat basan tonu, basa rwan khatle bain inkhun ding phun chuinu to ding ngo.
Balangbe deacon toga chwanlaang to chuinu bani ga kasanu pham khatle Christa Jisu khou amnu balumsat lang bi bani sung raangnu ga lousu rwe.
Ei nani khou hung nong lang baning ong beida hei bing nga eina nani khou hiak hungnuwe.

Atiyeda eina hungreiye dabe, Rikrwang in bi dinuba, ringnu Rikrwang om rupkathan, bazenu om inteng khatle bakung tonu ket pan bi ga nanina tatoga se dingbo dinu nanina thei lang eina heiba chong bing nga nani khou hiaknuwe.

Zet lang maaknu ririak senu om inthim chong ga tasiatnuwe: Rikrwang ding zanti pum bi indao thang rwe, Katha na ririak senu diga indao thang rwe, Tambaan chonglang rwanna mu rwe, Gentile rwan khou kasam thang rwe, Talei ram bi balumsa rwe, Lwat liannu le bachamga Bating lou thou drwe.”
Katha gana bathiangga rin thang rwe dinuba, kakhamnu kaan bi minamnu katha nun khatle ri kasia nun om zekrin ding mi kasemna bazeiluga balumsat ka bathan satlune.
Banina bani kakoi baze theinu sung ding kasanu thinna bachaan indehnu danga pi indehluga, sathot toga chong karwaknu kabiaye.
Banina mei kou kalaaknu ding khaamme, balumsa damnu khatle bazenu ding theinu mi nunna swankanu le bachamga sa dingnu, Rikrwang na dam thangnu thaisaak ting sa mak lang banina zathang piye.
Rikrwang na dam thangnu pot bing ga kasanu karwake, haga swankanu le bachamga saye dabe, za mak lang khatchale maake.
Balangbe haga Rikrwang om chongkaang khatle kalumnu paan bina to bathiang thang rwe.
Nangna hei bing lang bi unao rwan bing khou bachu thang nge dabe balumsanu chongna khatle nangna cheksinga bazei damnu bazenu zekrinna pi sing thou thangnu Jisu Christa om kasanu chwanlaang tolune.
Atiyeda bathaang maaknu khatle pwaknu katampi rwan meiri ding lou mako, Rikrwang ding kachinu lang bi nang talen ong ngo.
Balangbe pumna talennu ga titcha kanaaye atiyeda Rikrwang ding kachinuna balang bing bi kanaanuwe. Balangbe atun ring ongnu kum khatle hung dingnu kum om chongren ga habei amme.
Rin ongnu chong nga balumsa lang khopnu khatle khangsungna lou thang lang zanuwe.
Balangbe anina hei langna chwan to rwe khatle rin basiatnu le khaang rwe, balangbe mi bing ding Kanthangnupa, bakung toga balumsanu mi bing ding kanthangnu ringnu Rikrwang khou ani balumsaye.
Hei bing nga zathang piga bachu thang ngo.

Nating naosenne diga pakhatchanale balaanu to mak ting ngo atiyeda balumsanu mi nun lak pi nachong biak pi, lamchat pi, kriangnu bi, katha bi, balumsanu bi khatle bathiangnu bi nating bazei zanu pi towo.
Eina hung lat mak basaan bathiangnu chong panu bi, bani ding kachui thangnu bi khatle bachu thangnu bi nang sung khuto.
Chwan phunnu rwanna nalu chung bi kut kaising thangluga indao thangnu paan bina nakhou pi thangnu, nakhou amnu leithwan ding ga nang intaamnu to mako.
Hei bing lang bi kakhan chuiyo. Naom chwan ga mi bing khou sing thounu pi mu lang hei bing bi nasung khut thang ngo.
Nakum khatle naom bachu thangnu ga cheksinno. Habei ga khaang theiyo, balangbe atiga tonu gana nang nating bahak khatle nachong ngai ongnu mi nun ding kan thang lang nge.
Patso rwan ding twei mako atiyeda bating napa ding danga kachui thang ngo khatle nama naosennu kapaisa dingna nanao ding danga,
nama patsonu kamaisa rwan ding nanu ding danga khatle nama naosennu kamaisa ding nasannu ding danga, bathiangga kachui thang ngo.
Bataknu tamei rwan ding takhwang towo.

Atiyeda tameinu gana basa rwan mak tabe batu rwan amme dabe, ri baning thuke dinu kama bi inkhun bi pi mu lang khatle banu bapa khou lei thun lang bachu ding ngo. Balangbe haga Rikrwang meithaan bi kasanu khatle lou thang zanuwe.
Bataknu tamei, baraantoza lungnu maan gana Rikrwang khou balumsaye. Zingpha thamlai thei makka kalumga hweiniga ongme.
Atiyeda bapum pi pem langza baningga lungnu tameinu ga ringga ringga thi rwe.
Bani ding koi maaknu to lang heiba zathang bing nga pi thangbiyo.
Atiyeda tudannu khatna bain thirui khatle bakung toga bainkhun mi nun lang hakna pi thang phaang thang make dabe, maan balumsanu ding za maknuwe, atiga maan ga balumsa maknu mi ma sia inku rwe.
Sangwan somruk tang maknu tamei ding tamei rwan lak pi chak thang mako, maan kapaisa khatcha mei toga,

kasanu chwan langna mi nunna rinswan thangga, naosen rwan ding pi sing thou thangga, man rwan ding pi sa pi inga, bathiangnu mi nun ket kasin thangga, riangre kanang nun ding paang thangga khatle kasanu chwan bing bi sung khutka lung nge dabe bating tamei rwan lak pi chak thangnu zaye.
Atiyeda tamei naosennu rwan ding tamei rwan lak pi chak thang mako, balangbe bani boulaanu gana bani ding Christa khouna pi namla thangnu kaan bi bani balung lung nwam thouwe.
Kamanu balumsat ka bathan sat briakpina bani koi maan dou rwe.
Hei bing chung bi, banina in khat pina in khat la se koiluga takaat lang bachuwe, takaatnuza makka mi chorin choraiga banina kabia mak tingnu ga kabiaga chwan katopnu katap towe.
Atibriakpina tamei naosen rwanna kalaakluga sa nao chanu, inkhun phunnu, rin basiat lang munanu nun khou badou chanu pi thang maknu ei bathaiye.
Balangbe mi kasemna Seitaan nung suiga lampui semaan thou drwe.

Tudannu balumsanu kapaisa mak tabe kamaisa in inkhun bi tamei rwan amnu towe dabe bani ding phaang thang ding ngo atiga banina rupkathan bi potrit bason thang mak ting ngo. Heiya bataknu tamei rwan ding rupkathanna paang thang za lang nge.
Chwan phunnu rwan chwan phun chuinu, bakung toga Rikrwang chong khatle zekrin lang bi bachu thang ongnu bani ding ga badam kani inkuga takhwang to lang khopnuwe.
Bathiangnu Chongdipna rinne, “Saang kadim ta ongnu sen chan ding nangna bamun khwamsa make” khatle “Chwantok mi maan ga balo man phang lang khopnuwe.”
Pat ni mak tabe pat thum om sake makka chwan phunnu lu chung bi impu thangnu chong ga lou mako.
Noh tonu bani ding khang meithaan bi tweiyo atiye dabe katei rwanna le kachi lune.

Eina Rikrwang, Pukraangba Jisu Christa khatle kathang swaknu tambaan chonglang rwan meithaan bi heiba chong bing nga kathing aih to makka khatle mi mai phaangga khatchale to mak lang nating rakanga kachui thang rwe.
Tupai pakhat lu chung bi kut kaising thang nong mako mak tabe mi khat om noh badam suilou mako; nang bathiangga ong ngo.
Tui za in mako atiyeda nabonpui langna khatle naa katupnu langna drakha tui kasem inno.
Mi kasem om noh ga bathiangga muwe, chong kasem langna meithaan la se ongme atiyeda mi katei om nohna bani nung sui hung nge.
Hadanga mi kasem om kasanu chwan gabe bathiangga phaangmuwe khatle mu bathiang maknu rwan ga le inkamnu ngam make.
Rikrwang meng ding khatle zekrin ding rin basiat mak lang ringok phunnu swak bingna bani om bapuba rwan ding takhwang to lang khopnuwe diga chak thang ding ngo.

Balumsanu bapuba rwan amnu swak rwan gana bani inpuba rwan le diga unao we diga bani ding thou to maknu to mak ting ngo. Atiyeda kanaanu phang ongnu ga balumsanu nun khatle kriangnu nun to briakpina bani ding inkuga chwanlaang to ding gaye. Hei bing nga bachu thang ngo khatle kachui thang ngo.
Tudannu pakhatna kabat kabaangga bachu thang nge dabe khatle bazenu chongkaang dinuba, Pukraangba Jisu Christa om chong le Rikrwang ding kachi dingnu lang bi bachu thangnu le za kale make dabe,
maan ga lian tonu, khatchale thei maknuwe. Atiyeda kae kanaanu khatle chong zetnu bi sung thang nge. Habei gana hei bing nga swake: antiamnu, kabit kamainu, rin basiatnu, siaga balumsianu,
sung sa maknu khatle bazenu ding thei maknu mi nun lak pi katupka kae kanaanu swake. Ririak senu ga lungsanu lampuiye diga banina baning nge. Hadannu mi nun khouna nang namlaaga ong ngo.
Atiyeda pemtheinu le bachamga ririak senu dinuwa taswang khak lang kanaanuwe.
Balangbe anina talei ram bi khatchale phun hung make khatle anina khatchale phun se laye dinuwa bataknuwe.
Sa lang in lang khatle sin basoi lang amme dabe anina pem dingnuwe.
Atiyeda lungsanu ding bathainu bani ga bathemnu bi, phaa bi khatle braannu le mut tanu bi pi imphum tanu kapangnu khatle liam zanu bathainu inza bi ta thang nge.
Balangbe sian bathainuwa kasianu bing om bakungriye, habei ga mi kasemna ra-aam briakpina bani balumsat lampui bina maan thou drwe; atiga riangre kanang inza gana bani ding hwam lem rwe.
Atiyeda he Rikrwang mi nang, hei bing bina pak tammo khatle bazenu, ririak senu, balumsanu, kriangnu, khaang theinu khatle bazaangnu ding zong ngo.
Balumsat om kasanu kraan ga katwako, khwa sei ringnu ding ga choitipo, habei ga nating kou thang rwe khatle nangna sake taswang khak meithaan bi kasanu sake ga indao rwe.
Pot bing khou ringnu pi thangnu Rikrwang khatle Pontius Pilate meithaan bi kasanu sake pi ngaaknu Christa Jisu meithaan bi eina nakhou zathang pi ye.
Dinuba ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa na hung lat mak basaan, heiba zathang nga nang bathiangga khatle koi maaknu toga ngaak tingnuwe.
Haga aih sanu, khatchanu Pum ngam Ngamnu, krwang bing Krwang, bapuba bing Bapubana Baom bakaan bi pi hung tanglune.

Thi maknu ga Maan baraantoza zung nge. Pakhatchanale hung banai ngam maknu babaan bi amme khatle pakhatchanale Bating mu mak aang nge khatle munule ngam make. Bakhou takhwang khatle khwa seinu ngam am ding ngo. Amen.

Atun kaan om lungsanu mi nunna lian to mak lang balumsaza maknu lan bi balumsanu to mak lang atiyeda ani khou lozaang sa lang pum brumza khopsaga pi thangnu Rikrwang khou sung thang lang zathang pi thang ngo.
Bani kasanu chwan tamga to lang sung lianga pi swak thei lang atiluga khat le khat badam lou bacham nwam lang kasanu to ding ngo.
Haga danga ringzoknu kum ga banina lousu lang nung la lang kasanu inmun bani lang banina ri thang nge.
He Timothy, bathaang maaknu chong, bakaba maaknu chong khatle ningting ding ga baze makka kabat kabaangga kounu bi ga sui makka nakhou sin thang damnu ga nang ngaak chuiyo.
Haba ningting lousu rwe dinu mi kasem balumsat pina bani lampui maan drwe. Phaangkriang nakhou amnu to ding ngo. Amen.
Jisu Christa khou amnu ringnu om karen thangnu nung suiga, Rikrwang na baningnu paan bina Jisu Christa om chonglang Paul eina,
kriangnu asa kapaisa Timothy khou: Pa Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Christa Jisu khouna phaangkriang, kriang thang theinu khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.
Zingpha thamlai kalumnu bi eina nani ding chat makka baningsuga apu apa rwanna to damnu danga bathiangnu kakoi baze theinu sung le bachamga eina chwanlaang to ongnu Rikrwang ding swankaye.
Ei karonuna sip lang nangna mikthi ta damnu ga baningsuga nating kadou nwam take.
Napi Lois khatle nanu Eunice khou kamaga am ngaaknu nakhou amnu bataknu balumsat ka ei baningsuwe. Haga nakhou le amme dinu ei bathiangga thei rwe.
Atibriakpina eina kut kaising thangnu paan bina nakhou amnu Rikrwang leithwan ga pi chok thou lang eina nating pi baningsuwe.
Balangbe Rikrwang na ani khou zamnu katha pi thang make, haba hut lang ngam amnu, kriangnu khatle bazan ding karaknu om katha pi thang rwe.

Atibriakpina ani Pukraangba lang bi sake pinu langna mak tabe Balaang zana qwan mi to ongnu alaangna nang kazaknu to mako; atiyeda Rikrwang om ngam nung suiga sacham lang chungna riangrenu bi badam suilou thang ngo.

Rikrwang na ani ding kan thang rwe khatle bathiangnu kou bi ga ani ding kou thang rwe, anina tonu chwan nung suiga make atiyeda Maan bahakna baning thangnu khatle phaangkriang nung suiga kou thangnuwe. Heiba phaangkriang nga talei ram dam mak baleina Christa Jisu khou ani lang pi thang rwe.

Atiyeda ani ding Kanthangnupa Christa Jisu hung thangnu paan bina atun indao thang rwe. Jisu Christa na thinu ding lou sat thangga sacham paan bina ringnu khatle thi latlanu kum ding ga babaan bi phun hung rwe,
haba sacham ga kasam lang ating sacham kasamnupa, chonglang khatle Gentile rwan khou bachuthangnupa toga hap thang rwe.

Hei langna, ei hei bing nga khaang ongnuwe; ati ngaaklena ei kazak make; balangbe eina balumsa ongnu Bating ei theiye khatle eina Bakhou sin thang damnu ga Maanna le ha ni Lumik ka tangga ngaak thangnu ngamme dinu ei bathiangga theiye.
Nangna akhouna ngaisu damnu bazenu chong ga Christa Jisu khou balumsanu khatle kriangnu bi badan toga tipka choiyo.
Nakhou sin thang damnu kasanu pot ka ani khou ong thang ongnu Katha Bathiangnu paanna ngaako.
Phigellus le Harmogenes suiga Asia tram bi ongnu mi bing zana ating bathan thangsia rwe dinu nangna theiye.
Pukraangba na Onesiphorus in inkhun ding phaangkriang thang ding ngo; balangbe maanna ating katupka sung pi thou thang nge khatle ei qwan in bi ongnu langna maan kazak make,
atiyeda maan Rome bi hungnu kaan bi ating sung khutka zongluga zongsu ngaake.

Chongtok ni ga maanna Pukraangba khouna kriang thangnu lousu lang Pukraangba na bating phaangkriang thang ding ngo, maanna Ephesus pi ating balang inza bi paang thang damme dinu nangna bathiangga theiye.
Atibriakpina asa kapaisa, Christa Jisu khou amnu phaangkriang bi ga nang natnu towo.
Sake taswang khak meithaan bi nangna akhouna ngaisu damnu bing ga katei rwan khou le bachu thang ngam dingnu balumsa zanu mi nun khou sin thang ngo.
Atibriakpina nangna Jisu Christa om kasanu kraanmi khat toga riangre khaang ngo.
Kraanmi khat toga chwan to ongnu tudannu pakhatna kani khat khat om lungna baraantoza ding pi katop make, haga bating kraanmi toga kathang thang damnu Bating pi pem lang nge.
Tudannu mi khatna le kadai bi takhemme dabe, maanna kadai om chaang nung suiga takhem make dabe maan taswan phang make.
Chwan rakannu loumi gana tapaan om badam lousu kama lang nge.
Eina rin ongnu lang bi kakhanno, balangbe Pukraangba na balang bingza bi nakhou bakaba theinu pi thang ding ngo.
Eina kasam ongnu sacham nung suiga, thinu nun lak pina pi ring thou thang damnu David kik taat Jisu Christa ding baningsuwo.
Hei langna sa maknu chwan tonu mi khat tanga, ei bang thangnu tangga riangrenu khaang ongnuwe; atiyeda Rikrwang chong gabe bang thang make.
Atibriakpina Christa Jisu khou khwa sei lwat liannule bachamga amnu ringriak ka banina lousu dam lang Rikrwang na kathang swak thangnu mi nun lang eina hei bing nga khaang ongme.
Heiya balumsa lang khopnu chong nge: Anina Maan le diga thi bachamme dabe, Ani Maan le ring bachamlune.
Anina riangre khaang nge dabe, Ani Maan le diga krwang toga paan bachamlune; Anina Bating za make dabe, Maanna le ani ding za thanglaye.
Anina balumsa lang khopnu mak peida, Maanbe balumsa lang khopnu toga atiga amme: Maan Baraanto Bating za maknu ngam make.

Heiba chong bing nga chat makka pi baningsu thang ngo, banina khatchale tong maknu, ngai ongnu rwan ding ga pi braannu chong om lang bi ga kae kanaa mak lang Pukraangba meithaan bi tipka rin thang ngo.
Bazenu chong ga bazega sizinga kazak lang bathaang maaknu chwantok mi Rikrwang khou lou thang zanu toga napum bahak kat swak lang karammo.
Atiyeda batak maknu khatle pang kabia kabianu minun khouna pen dammo; balangbe banina Rikrwang ding kachi maknu inku thoulune.
Bani om bachu thangnu gana taket ri naanu danga sakhutlune, bani lak pi Hymenaeus le Philetus le suiye.
Banina ring thounu ga loi drwe diga bazenu bina lampui maan thou drwe khatle banina mi kasem om balumsat ting to braanne.
Atiyeda Rikrwang om tipnu inmun ga kaling makka heiba om seal le suiga han ongme, “Pukraangba na Bami nun ding theiye” khatle “Christa meng ding kounu mi bingna kakoinu bina impaan swak ting ngo.”
Atiyeda inpui khat sung bi kachaak khatle tangka om theng amnuza makka thing khatle talei om theng le amme. Kasem dingna takungga khatle kasem dingna baiga choiye.

Atibriakpina tudannu pakhatna bapum ding heiba kasianu bing bina to bathiang nge dabe, maan ga kasanu chwan bing lang daan thangnu takungnu theng, to bathiang thangnu khatle Bapuba lang sizin zanu theng tolune.
Babwa rwan om pumna bathainu bing bina pak tammo atiyeda sung bathiangga Pukraangba ding kounu mi nun le diga ririak senu, balumsanu, kriangnu khatle dai bazaangnu nung suiyo.
Atiyeda kapangnu khatle bakaba maaknu chongngai inzana kae kanaanu pi swake dinu theiga habei gana pen dammo.
Rikrwang om swak pakhatna kae kana mak ting gaye atiyeda mi bing khou sung bazaangnu, bachu thang ngamnu khatle khaang theinu to ding gaye.
Bamaitwang bi ongnu nun ding sung bazaangnu le bachamga maanna bachu thang ding gaye, banina bazenu ga thei lang Rikrwang na bani sung pi le thangnu le zaye.
Banina bakaba thei swak latka, maanna baningnu ga to lang maan nam thang ongnu Diabol om phaa bina dwak swaknu le zaye.
Atiyeda heiya theiyo, hagazo kakhamnu dat pi sia taknu kaan hunglune.
Balangbe mi nunna bani raanto za ding kriangnu, sian bathainu, lian tonu, phun liannu, Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiatnu, nu pa rwan chong zei maknu, swanka thang thei maknu, bathiang maknu,
kriangnu maaknu, kok thang thei maknu, rwan ding sia lang rinnu, bazan ding karak maknu, khouring dannu khatle kasanu ding bathai maknu,
rou sianu, tun natnu, ra-aamnu, Rikrwang ding kriangnu ma bazan ding pi lozaannu ding inkuga bathainu,
ririak senu thot phunnu atiyeda haba om ngam dingba za maknu hunglune. Hei dannu mi nun khouna pen dammo.
Balangbe banina in in bi khutluga noh pot ritna nam dannu, bachaat bachaat om pum bi bathainuna kainu kasonnu mannu rwan ding namme.
Bani bakaan bathin bachuwe atiyeda banina bazenu ding impha ni beida theinu ngam make.
Jannes le Jambres na Moses ting kakhangnuga danga, baninale bazenu ding kakhang nge: Tanaatnu sung phunnu mi nun, balumsat om lang bi za make,
atiyeda bani ga lian thoula rwe; balangbe barwei om kapangnu ga indao damnu ga danga bani om kapangnu ga le mi nun khou indaolune.
Atiyeda nangna bachang saga thei rwe, hagazo aom zekrin, aom khei, baningnu, balumsanu, khaang seinu, kriangnu, khaang theinu,
Antioch pi, Iconium bi khatle Lystra bi akhou swak tamnu bing ga sui bazei thang ngo. Atiyeda Pukraangba na ha bing bi gana ating kan thang damme.
Batak takka, Christa Jisu khou, ririak sega lung nwamnu mi nunna rainu khaanglune.
Atiyeda sa maknu mi nun khatle minamnu mi nun gana mi nun ding minamga khatle mi nunna bani ding minamga sianu inku thoulune.
Atiyeda nang tukhouna bachunubo dinu nang thei briakpina, nangna bachu damnu khatle bazenuwe diga thei thang damnu bi ga tipka han ong ngo.
Christa Jisu khou balumsanu paan bina ringriak lang nating pi ningting ngamnu Bathiangnu Chongdip ka nang naosen badona thei drwe.
Chongdip bing Rikrwang om kaphuk pi naye khatle bachu thang lang, laak thang lang, to baze thang lang khatle ririak senu bi rin thang lang kanaanuwe.
Hagana Rikrwang om mi ga sanu chwan bing to lang chamdaan chuiluga khopsaga ong lang nge.

Atibriakpina Rikrwang meithaan bi, Maanna hungnu kaan bi khatle Bakrwang talei la ring ongnu khatle thi damnu rwan ding chong kasem thang dingnu Pukraangba Jisu Christa meithaan bi eina nakhou chongtan piye:
Chong ga kasammo! Bakaan cha bi le, bakaan mak pi le daan ong ngo. Khaang seinuna sipka khatle bachu thangnu le bachamga kakoinu ga to baze thang ngo, twei thang ngo khatle kachui thang ngo.

Balangbe bazenu zekrin bachu thangnu ding ga mi nunna khaang thanglanu kaan hunglune atiyeda banina kana bathak briakpina bani om bathainu nung suiga, banina bani lang bachuthangnupa rwan khom thanglune
khatle bani kana ga bazenu bina pon penluga, pwaknu meiri bing la kanei thou damlune.
Atiyeda nangba balang bing bi barak theiyo, riangrenu khaang ngo, katei rwan ding Christa khou phun hungnu evangelist chwan ga towo, naom chwanlaang ga pi bapungphawo.
Balangbe ei innu potkat toga kat swak rwe, akum loi dingnu kaan nai rwe.
Kasanu kraan ga ei katwak rwe, nampak ka ei pak loi rwe; eina balumsanu ga ngaak rwe.

Kakhamnu bi, ririak senu luthop ka alaang thang ong rwe, haga Pukraangba ririak senu Chongsempuna haba Lumik pi akhou pi thanglune khatle Maanna akhouza pi thangnu makka atiyeda Maan hung latnu ding bathainu mi bing khou le pi thanglune.
Nang akhou karangga hung lang karam thang ngo;
balangbe Demas na atun am ongnu heiba talei ram ding nga kriangga ating bathan satluga Thessalonica la thou drwe. Crescens na Galatia la, Titus na Dalmatia la thou drwe.
Akim bi ongnu Luke cha zung rwe. Nang Mark ting kalwangluga hung ngo, balangbe maan chwanlaang to lang akhou bathaang amme.
Atiga Tychicus ting eina Ephesus la bathan damme.
Nang hungnu kaan bi eina Troas pi Carpus kim bi thangsia damnu aom talathu pui le chongdip nun, bakung toga zan mun bi hiak thangnu chongdip nun ga phun hung ngo.
Konri thin sweinu Alexander na alu chung bi kasianu chwan tamga to rwe. Bachwan nung suiga Pukraangba na bating takhum baan thang ding ngo.
Nang le bating cheksinno, balangbe maanna ani chong ding rakanga thing nge.
Kama bi achong katak pi pakhatchanale apek lengnu maake atiyeda khangsungna ating bathan sat rwe. Haga Pukraangba na bani lu chung bi basing chak thang mak ting ngo.
Atiyeda eina sacham ga khopsaga kasam lang khatle Gentile rwan bingna ngaisu dam lang Pukraangba na apek leng thang rwe khatle ating pi nat thang rwe. Atiga ating takhu krwang mun bina kan thang rwe.
Pukraangba na ating sa maknu chwan bing bina kan thangluga, Baom tambaan krwang talei lang ngaak thanglune. Bakhou khwa seiga lwat liannu to ding ngo. Amen.
Priscilla, Aquila khatle Onesiphorus in inkhun bing ding kalum thang ngo.
Erastus Corinthia bi ongsia drwe atiyeda Trophimus ting eina Miletus pi naaga thangsia drwe.
Sikpha kaan tang mak balei nang hung lang rakanga karam thang ngo. Eubulas, Pudens, Linus, Claudia khatle unao rwan bingna nating kalumme.
Pukraangba Jisu Christa na nakatha le ong bacham thang ding ngo. Phaangkriang nani khou am ding ngo. Amen.
Rikrwang om swak khatle Jisu Christa om chonglang Paul, Rikrwang na kathang swak thangnu nun om balumsat nung suiga khatle Rikrwang ding theinu bazenu bi bani ding kai thang langna eina kalumme.
Khwa sei ringnu om bachun bi chong karwak maknu Rikrwang na bakaan hou thou mak baleina ani khou karen thang rwe.
Atiyeda badou chanu dat pi Bachong ga kasamnu paan bina indao thang rwe. Kasamnu ga ani ding Kanthangnupa Rikrwang om zathang nung suiga akhou sin thang rwe.
Ani balumsat bachamnu bataknu asa kapaisa Titus khou Pa Rikrwang khatle ani ding Kanthangnupa Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang, kriang thangnu khatle dai bazaangnu ga am ding ngo.
Hei langna eina nating Crete pi thangsianu lang bi to baatnu chwan bing ga nangna baleng toga to lang khatle namlian bing bi chwan phunnu rwan ding som thang lang eina zathang pi thang damnu ga rwe.
Koi maaknu, mei khatcha basan tonu kae kanaanu mak tabe rwan thwei ongnanu om khan lang maaknu balumsa zanu sa rwan amnu mi khat ting chwan hap thang ngo.
Balangbe rupkathan bi balu tonu maan ga Rikrwang om chwanlaang mi, khan lang maaknu, rang to maknu, sung sia barap maknu, zu kalo maknu, kabit kamai maknu, sian ra-aam maknu to ding gaye.
Atiyeda pi sa pi in theinu, kasanu ding bathainu mi, basung ding karaknu, bazenu, bathiangnu khatle bazan ding karak theinu
khatle bating bachu thang damnu danga balumsa zanu chong ga tipka choinu bazenu zekrinna chong khetnu mi nun ding kachui thang ngamnu khatle koi indao thang ngamnu to ding gaye.
Balangbe balu tonu rwan thwei ong maknu, takaat chong kabianu mi khatle minamnu mi tamga amme, bakung toga bani mun romnu nun khou naye.
Bani mun khwamnu taye. Hapai mi nun gana sian raaamga banina bachu thang mak tingnu ga bachu thangga, inkhun bing ding to imphaang rwe.
Bani lak pi bani om thiamting nge dinu pakhatna rinne, “Crete rwan ga bakaan bathin chong karwaknu, sa maknu nilai lak khouring, takaatnu takwam sanu nunne.”
Heiba sake ya bazenuwe. Atibriakpina bani bazenu balumsat pi tipka ong dam lang bani ding rakanga raak thang ngo.
Jihudi rwan om pwaknu meiri ding ga ngai mak lang khatle bazenu bina mi nun om zathang pek la kanei mak lang bani ding rakanga raak thang ngo.
Bathiangnu mi nun lang pot bingza bathiang nge atiyeda tanaatnu khatle balumsa maknu nun lang bathiangnu khatchale maake atiyeda bani lungning khatle kakoi baze theinu sung ga hakna tanaat rwe.
Banina Rikrwang ding theinu katap towe atiyeda bani chwan bingna Bating za make. Haga batannu, chong zei maknu khatle kasanu chwan bing lang batik cha maknuwe.
Atiyeda nangba bataknu zekrin le bachamnu ga rinno.
Dinuba kapaisa patso rwanna sung bazaang lang, lem lang, chaang nai lang, balumsat tipka ong lang, kriang thei lang khatle khaang thei lang to ding ngo.
Hadanga kamaisa patso rwan le bani lamchat takhwang man phunnu to lang, rwan ding sia lang rin theinu to mak lang, zu kalo mak lang khatle kasanu bachu thang thei lang to ding ngo.
Haga banina nulwei rwan ding bani basan rwan ding kriang lang khatle bani sa rwan ding kriang lang bachu thang ding ngo.

Banina bani zan ding karak thei lang, bathiang lang khatle lung thei lang, kasanu rwan to lang bani basan rwan thwei bi ong lang khatle Rikrwang chong ding pi rin basiat mak lang bachu thang ding ngo.
Hadanga palwei rwan ding le bani sung bazaang lang bachu thang ngo.
Balang bing bi naraan to za ding kasanu chwan bi bazei zanu toga pi muwo; bachu thangnu bi sung bathiangnu, takhwang man phunnu khatle imphom tanaat maknu ga pi muwo.
Nalang bi sianu rin lang maakka maitwangnu nun ga kazak tam lang khetnu ngamlanu bazenu chong ga kabiawo.
Swak rwanna le bani om bapuba rwan thwei bi ong lang, balang bing bi bani ding pi pem lang khatle banina chong katak kadou mak lang bachu thang ngo.
Bani pot baru mak lang atiyeda banina ani ding Kanthangnupa Rikrwang om bazenu bachu thangnu ding tapon to thang lang balumsaza taknu thot ka pi muwo.
Balangbe ringriak phun hung thangnu Rikrwang phaangkriang ga mi bing khou pi mu thang rwe.
Hagana Rikrwang ding kachi maknu talei ram om bathainu ding bathan satluga, sung karakka lung lang ririak senu khatle heiba bakaan bi ririak sega lung lang ani ding bachu thang nge.
Aih sanu bachun le tasiatnu Rikrwang khatle Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa na lwat lianga hung dingnu ding ga anina lamphaang ongme.

Maanna chongtan thouto maknu chwan bing bina ani ding ran swak lang, kasanu chwan lang sung khut lang khatle Baom bakung tonu mi nun ding Balaang to bathiang thang lang Baraanto Bating ani lang pi swak thang rwe.
Hei bing nga bani khou kabiawo, kachui thang ngo khatle ngam suiga bani ding tweiyo. Nating pakhatchanale thou to maknu to mak ting ngo.
Banina taleipuba rwan le kangamnu nun thwei bi ong lang, bani chong zei lang khatle kasanu chwan bing ga to lang pi baningsu thang ngo.
Pakhatcha khou hakna kasianu kabia mak lang dai bazaangnu, sung bazaangnu, talu tanu thot mi bing khou pi mu lang pi baningsu thang ngo.

Balangbe ani le bakaan khat pi kapangnu toga, chong zei makka, minamga, pumna bachaat bachaat bathaiga, karo rangaa om swak toga, sianu khatle antiamnu bi lungga, khatna khat ting batan kalega ong ngaake.
Atiyeda ani ding Kanthangnupa Rikrwang om kriang thangnu khatle kriangnu ga mi nun khou pi mu thangnu kaan bi

anina ririak senu chwan to thang damnu paan bina makka atiyeda Maanna ani ding phaangkriang thangnu nung suiga ani ding pi pon kathan thangluga khatle Katha Bathiangnu om pi kathan thangnu paan bina Maanna ani ding kan thang rwe.
Ani ding Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa paan bina Katha Bathiangnu ding ani khou khopsaga bunta thang rwe.
Haga Baphaangkriang paan bina ani ding pi baze thangluga khwa sei ringnu ani bachun nung suiga rakhum lwaknu mi to lang nge.

Heiya balumsa lang khopnu chong nge. Hei lang biya Rikrwang khou balumsa damnu nunna kasanu chwan tonu bi bani sung khutka to lang nangna bani khou chat makka rin thangnu bathaiye. Hei bing nga mi nun lang sanuwe khatle tongnuwe.
Atiyeda kapangnu om kae kanaanu, pu pa rui ding zongnu, kabit kamainu khatle chongtan om lang bi kae kanaanu hei bing bina pen dammo. Balangbe bani ga tongnu maaknu khatle bathaang maaknuwe.
To kapaang lang tonu mi ding ga twei owei kani bina zei make dabe,
hapai mi ga lampui maannu khatle noh toga baraanto bating pi koinuwe dinu theiga kalang sat tammo.
Eina Artemas mak tabe Tychichus ting nakhou lang hungnu kaan bi Nicapolis pi nang akhou hung lang karam thang ngo. Balangbe ei sikpha habei ga hung ong lang baning nge.
Chongtan theinu mi Zenas le Apollos ting barapka lang thang ngo, barwei lamsek lang khatchale baatnu to mak lang phaang thang ngo.
Ani mi nunna bakraa kraa maknu to makka bathaang amnu bing ga lousu lang kasanu chwan bing bi to talen ong ding ngo.
Ei le diga ong bachamnu mi bingna nani ding kalumme. Balumsat pi ani ding kriangnu bing ding kalum thang ngo. Phaangkriangna nani khangsung khou ong thangnu to ding ngo. Amen.
Jisu Christa om lang bina qwan mi Paul khatle ani unao Timothy, ani le diga chwan to bachamnu kriangnu baan Philemon khou
khatle kriangnu Apphia, ani baan kraanmi Archippus khatle nain bi amnu rupkathan khou,
ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou am ding ngo.
Eina bakaan bathin nating rinpanga, baningsuga Arikrwang khou swankaga hweiniye.
Nangna Pukraangba Jisu khou atiluga bathiangnu mi bing khou kriangnu khatle balumsanu amnu ga eina ngaisu omme.
Dinuba, ani khou amnu kasanu bing om lang bi bathiangga theinu khatle nangna balumsat lousu damnu gana Christa Jisu khou bakraa tamga kraa lang nge.
Balangbe ani nakriang bi karo liannu khatle sung pi thou thangnu lousu rwe. Balangbe unao nangna bathiangnu mi nun sung ding taswang khak pi chaang ring thang rwe.
Atibriakpina nangna to lang hoinu chwan ga to lang nakhou zathang pinu bi Christa khou ei sung raang zanu ngaaklena,
nating kriangnu paan bina Christa om lang bi patso khat tonu qwan mi Paul eina nating hweinuwe.
Ei qwan in bi ongnu kaan bina pon thang ngaaknu asa Onesimus langna nakhou hweinuwe.
Maan bakaan khat pi nalaang bathaang maaknu to ngaake. Atiyeda atunba nalaang le alaang le bathaang amnu to rwe.
Eina bating nakhou lang hung latnu rwe atibriakpina nang bating asung bahak ting danga lou thangro.
Ei sacham lang chungna qwan in bi ongnu kaan bi naom hut toga ating maanna chwanlaang to thang lang bathainuwe.
Atiyeda naom kasanu ga twansa makka tonu makka atiyeda to thang nwamga tonu to lang nangna za thangnu ga sui makka ei khatchale to nwam make.
Balangbe Onesimus ka nang le diga bakhwa seiga ong bacham langna bakaan kasem lang kapaangnu ngaakle zaye.
atiga maan swak tan makka atiyeda swak ma inkuga kriangnu unao zung rwe, haga bakung toga akhouwe atiyeda nakhouba talei ram bi le Pukraangba khou le inku chuiga ong lat lang nge.
Nangna ating nang le diga chwan to bachaamnuwe diga chak thang nge dabe ating lou thangnu danga bating le loukhut thang ngo.
Atiyeda maanna nakhou koi maan thangnu mak tabe nalei chaak thangnu am ngaake dabe haga alei chaak toga chak thang ngo.
Napum bahak ka akhou naom leiye diga rin mak lang Paul eina heiya akut bahakna hiaknu rwe. Haga eina thun thangne.
O, unao, ei nakhouna Pukraangba khou karonu lousu lang Pukraangba khou asung pi chaang ring thang ngo.
Nangna chong zeinu bi ga eina balumsaga rinnu ma inkuga nangna tolune dinu theiga eina nakhou hiaknuwe.
Atiyeda ei hung mak balei alaang bazin in kaa khat daan thang ngaako, balangbe nangna hweini thangnu paan bina Rikrwang na ating nakhou pi hung thanglune diga ei balumsaye.
Christa Jisu langna ei le qwan in bi ong bachamnu Epaphras na nating kalumme.
Ei le diga chwanlaang bachamnu Mark, Aristarchus, Demas, Luke banina le nating kalumme.
Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriangna nakatha le diga ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
Kama meithaan katupka khatle bachaat tei tei toga thiamting rwan paan bina pu pa rwan khou Rikrwang na kabia thang ngaake.

Maanna pot bing om rakhum lwaknu mi to lang Rikrwang na kathang swak thang damnu khatle Maanna Bapaan bina le talei ram ding dam thang damnu Basa Kapaisa paan bina Maanna heiba kakhamnu dat pi ani khou chong kabia thang rwe.

Maan Rikrwang lwat liannu om baan chuinuwe khatle Rikrwang om thot bahake. Bangam amnu chongkaang paan bina pot bing nga ngaak thang nge. Maan Bapum bahakna ani om noh to bathiang thangnu chwan toloi thangluga basaang la Ngam lian kataknu om kut inchang la ongta drwe.
Maan rakhum lwaknu paan bina tambaan chonglang rwan om ma sa inkunu meng lousu briak pina bani ma sa inku rwe.
Balangbe “Nang Asa Kapaisa ye, Aniya Eina Nating pon thang rwe.” Atiga “Ei Bapa tolune, Khatle Maan Asa Kapaisa tolune” diga Rikrwang na tambaan chonglang rwan lak pina pakhat khou impha rin dambo?

Maanna talei ram bi natainu Basa Kapaisa ding lang hung Hiakpuba : Thei maknu Phang damnu : Balumsanu Jihudi Rwan Hiak tamnu bakaan: A.D. 67-69 latnu kaan bi Maanna rinne, “Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang rwan bingna Bating kalum ding ngo.”
Atiyeda tambaan chonglang rwan lang bi Maanna rinne, “Rikrwang na Baom tambaan chonglang rwan ding thiraang Khatle Bachwan tonu rwan ding mei balei pi to thang rwe.”
Atiyeda Basa Kapaisa lang bi Maanna rinne, “He Rikrwang, Naom takung riak ka khwa sei am ongme, Naom Krwang talei om chongsem sungrwan ga ririak senu om chongsem sungrwanne.
Nang ririak senu ding bathaiye, Khatle chongtan thouto maknu nun ding batanne, Atibriakpina Rikrwang na dinuba Narikrwang na Nating Nabaan rwan lak pina inkuga karonu om thao kanun thang rwe.”
Atiga “He Pukraangba, Nangna thoutan bina talei ram ding dam thang rwe, Khatle tambaan heiya Naom kutthiamme.
Bani ga braan damlune Atiyeda Nang be am onglune, Atiga bani ga pon dan baraan ta damlune.
Nangna bani ding baswannu pon danga kadip thoulune, Khatle bani ga kale damlune. Atiyeda Nangbe bakaan bathin kale make, Khatle Naom kum ga impha ni beida loinu amlaye.”
Atiyeda Maanna impha ni beida tambaan chonglang rwan lak pina pakhat khou “Eina Nating munanu rwan ding Naket kadim riak pi to mak basaan, Akut inchang pek la ong ngo” diga rin dambo?
Tambaan chonglang rwan bing ga ringriak lousu dingnu rwan ding chwanlaang to lang lang hungnu katha rwan makkabo?
Atibriakpina ani ding daan braan dam mak lang anina ngaisu damnu chong ga choitip ong lang rwe.
Balangbe tambaan chonglang rwan paan bina kabia damnu chong ga bazenu kale za maknuwe dabe khatle chongtan zei maknu khatle chong zei maknu bing langna khopsanu laak thangnu ga phang nge dabe,

anina heitia liannu ringriak ting thou to make dabe, anina tatoga pak dwaknu ngam ding gabo? Pukraangba na kamanu bi ringriak ka pao swak trwe khatle Maanna rinnu ngaisu damnu banina haga ani khou pi tip thang rwe.
Rikrwang na le badannu tasiatnu chwan khatle tasiatnu ngam chwan inza Maanna baningnu nung suiga Katha Bathiangnu om leithwan le bachamga sake pi damme.
Balangbe anina kabia ongnu hung dingnu talei ramma Rikrwang na tambaan chonglang rwan thwei bi pi ong thang make.
Atiyeda tudannu pakhatna bariak khat pi atiga rinne, “Nangna baningsu thang ongnu talei mi ya pa- aambo, Mak tabe Nangna banang thang ongnu Misa Sa Kapaisa ga Tubo?
Nangna Bating tambaan chonglang rwan ma titcha pi bangiam ta thang rwe, Khatle Nangna Bakhou lwat liannu khatle takhwang luthop thop thang rwe, Nangna Bating Nakutthiam bing lu chung bi thang rwe;

Nangna pot bingza Baket thwei bi pi ong thang rwe.” Balangbe Rikrwang na pot bingza Ba thwei bi bapuba pi to thangnu kaan bi Maanna ba thwei bi pi ong thang maknu pot khatcha hakna maake. Atiyeda atun anina pot bing Ba thwei bi pi ong thangnu mu mak aang nge.

Atiyeda Maanna thinu om riangre khaang thangnu langna atun lwat liannu khatle takhwang luthop thop thangnu, tambaan chonglang rwan ma titcha pi bangiam ta thangnu Jisu ding anina muwe. Thinu om riangre khaangnu heiya Rikrwang om phaangkriang paan bina mi bing lang Maanna thinu ga batem lang nge.

Balangbe sa kapaisa inza ding lwat liannu bi phun hung bi, riangre khaang thangnu paanna bani om ringriak bapuba ding pi khopsa thangnuwa Balaang khopnuwe. Pot bingza Balaang to ongme khatle Bapaan bina amnuwe.
Balangbe mi nun ding to bathiang thang ongnu khatle to bathiang thang damnu bani le khatcha bi naye. Hei langna Maanna bani ding unao rwan kou lang kazaklan rwe.
Maanna rinne, “Eina Nameng Au Anao rwan khou indao thanglune, Khang karungnu lak pi Ei Nalang bi swankanu laa tone.”
Maanna rin late, “Ei Rikrwang khou balumsa ongne.” Atiga rinne, “Ei khatle Rikrwang na Akhou pi thangnu sa rwan ga abeiya amme.”

Naosen rwan heiya zanti pum le thi om badam suilou briakpina Maan Bahak le bani nun danga misa om badam suilou bacham rwe. Balangbe Maanna thi thangnu paan bina thinu ngam amnu Diabol ding to braan lang nge.
Mi nunna thi lang kachinuna bani kum ambasaan Diabol thwei bi swak pi to ongnu ding pi dwak thang lang nge.
Batak takka, Maanna tambaan chonglang nun ding paang thang make. Atiyeda Abraham om kik taat ting paang thang nge.
