Atibriakpina balang bing bi Maanna Bau banao rwan le bacham dingnu thouwe. Balangbe mi nun om noh bing lang pi pemnu rikhaang pot toga khaang lang Maanna Rikrwang om balang bing bi phaangkriang theinu khatle balumsa lang khopnu Takolu to lang nge.
Balangbe Maan Bahak bathemnu bi riangrenu dou briakpina bathemnu ding maitwang ongnu bani ding Maanna paang thang ngamme.
Atibriakpina tambaan om kou thangnu bi badam lou bachamnu bathiangnu unao rwan, anina rin indao swaknu Chonglang khatle Takolu Christa Jisu ding baning ngo.
Moses na Rikrwang om inkhun bi balumsa lang khopnu danga, Bating kathang thangnu Rikrwang khou Jisu le balumsa zanuwe.
Balangbe in to thangnu mi pakhat ting in ding ma takhwang tonu danga, Jisu ding Moses ma inkuga balumsa lang khopnuwe diga chak thang rwe.
Balangbe in bing nga tudannu mi pakhatna bacha thangnuwe. Atiyeda pot bing ding bacha thangnu ga Rikrwang nge.
Nung la kabia dingnu chong bing nga maanna sake to lang Moses na swak pakhat toga Rikrwang om inkhun bing bi balumsa lang khopnu to rwe.

Atiyeda Christa be Rikrwang om inkhun bi Sa Kapaisa toga balumsa lang khopnu ngaake. Anina ani om sung raangnu khatle anina karo ongnu bachunnu bi ga loinu tangga tipka choiye dabe ani Rikrwang om inkhun to rwe.
Atibriakpina Katha Bathiangnuna rinnu danga, “Aniya nani Rikrwang khwan ngaisuwe dabe,
Ramhaang bi tamphaangnu kaan bi, Tun natnu danga nani sung pi nat mako.
Habei ga nani pu pa rwanna Ating chaang phaang nge, Tamphaang damme, Khatle sangwan sombali Achwan inza mu damme.
Atibriakpina haba mikin ding ga Ei balung pwan ngaak rwe, Khatle atiga rin rwe, ‘Bani ga bani sung bi bakaan bing bi lampui maan rwe, Khatle banina Alampui theilan rwe.’
Atibriakpina Eina balung pwanga karen thang damme, ‘Bani ga Aom lo basaknu bi ga khutlaye.’ ”
Unao rwan ga barak theiyo mak tabe nani lak pi tudannuna ring ongnu Rikrwang khouna pi se swakluga balumsa maknu sung amnu le zaye.
Atiyeda chong karwaknu om nohna tudannu nani sung pi nat mak lang “Aniya” diga kounu bakaanna am ong bi nani khatna khat ting kani bathin kachui thang kaleyo.
Balangbe ani balumsanu om thoutannu ga loinu tangga tipka choiye dabe, ani nun Christa om badam lou bachamnu nunne.
Heiya rin damnu danga, “Aniya nani Rikrwang om khwan ngaisuwe dabe, Nani pu pa rwanna tun natnu danga nani sung pi nat mako.”
Balangbe Rikrwang chong ngaisuluga tun natnu tubo? Batak takka Moses na Egypt pina kalwang swaknu bani bingna makkabo?
Tu lu chung bi Rikrwang na sangwan sombali balung pwan dambo? Noh toluga ramhaang bi bani om kathinu pum bing ta thang damnu bani nun gana makpo?
Baom lo basaknu bi banina khutla rwe diga tu khou Rikrwang na karen thang damgabo? Haga chong zei maknu bani khou makkabo?
Atibriakpina banina balumsa mak briakpina karen thangnu talei bi ga khutnu ngamlan rwe dinu anina thei rwe.
Atibriakpina Baom lo basaknu bi khut lang chongren ga am ong briakpina nani lak pi tudannuna lo basaknu bi khutnu bi gana hung tang maknu zaye diga ani barak theizo.

Balangbe ani khou sacham ga kasam thang damnu danga, bani khou le sacham kasam thang rwe. Atiyeda banina ngaisu damnu chong gana bani khou kanaanu phun hung dam make. Balangbe haga ngaisu ongnu banina balumsanu le bachamga ngai dam make.

Balangbe balumsanu ani lo basaknu bi ga khute. Talei ram dam thou khap pina chwan bing ga loi ngaak peida heiya Maanna rin damnu ga dannuwe, “Eina balung pwannu bi karen ngaak rwe, Bani ga Aom lo basak riak pi ga khutpilaye.”
Balangbe Rikrwang na bariak khat pi ni siari ni lang bi rin thang nge, “Rikrwang na ni siari ni Bachwan bing bina basak rwe.”
Hei riak pi le atiga rin thang late “Bani ga Aom lo basak riak pi khutpilaye.”
Haba lo basak riak pi khut tingnu mi kasem amme. Atiyeda kamaga sacham kasamluga pi ngaisu damnu bani ga chong zei mak briakpina haba om lo basak riak pi khut tam make.

Rikrwang na lumik khat ret thang lat ngaake, ha ding ga “Aniya” diga kou damme. Sangwan taswang khak nung la David khou kamaga rin damnu danga rin ngaake, “Aniya nanina Bakhwan ngaisuwe dabe, Nani sung pi natlanro.”
Balangbe Joshua na bani khou lo basaknu pi thang ong ngaake dabe bataang la Rikrwang na bani khou katei lo sak ni lang bi rin mak tingnuwe.
Rikrwang mi nun lang basaknu ga am ongme.
Balangbe Rikrwang om basaknu bi khut tamnu maan gana Rikrwang na Bazan Bahak om chwan bina basak tamnu danga Maan le Baom chwan bina basak rwe.
Atibriakpina tudannuna chong zei maknu nun om thot tanga tupai khatchanale balumta mak lang anina lo saknu riak pi ga khut lang ngamnu bing karamzo.

Balangbe Rikrwang om chong heiya ringnuwe khatle ngam amme khatle balem kani amnu kangainu kachaak chem ma le ngaiye. Hagana sung le katha bi khatle ru bathon riak khatle bing ding tangga chouluga to kapaang thangnu ngamme khatle to kapaang thangnu misa om baning khatle lungningna bathainu ding tangga chong tonu ngamme.
Bamikphaang bi inkam dingnu kutthiam khatchale maake. Atiyeda anina ani om singchak hung pi lang nge. Bameithaan bi pum brumza thin thang makka lat thang omme.
Rikrwang Sa kapaisa Jisu, tambaan tang ga serwan damnu kaliannu Takolu ani lang amme. Atibriakpina anina rin indaonu balumsat ka tipka choizo.
Balangbe ani son bing khaang bacham thangnu ngam maknu Takolu ani lang amnu make. Atiyeda ani danga balang bing za bi bathemnu dounu ati ngaak peida noh maaknu Takolu ani lang amme.
Atibriakpina anina kriang thang theinu lousu lang khatle bathaang amnu kaan bi paang thangnu phaangkriang lousu lang phaangkriang om krwang takung riak pi sung raangga hungzo.
Balangbe mi nun lak pina ka thangnu takolu bing ga Rikrwang om chwanlaang lang toga ka thang thang nge. Hagazo maanna noh lang leithwan khatle rikhaang pot khaang lang nge.
Maan bahak le sonnuna ong qwat ong briakpina thei maknu khatle lampui semaannu mi bing lu chung bi sung bazaangga kriang thangnu ngamme.
Sonnuna ong qwat ong briakpina mi nun lang khatle bapum bahak lang noh lang khaangnu rikhaang pot heiya bathaang amme.
Pakhatchana hakna takungnu heiya bapum bahakna lou make. Atiyeda Aaron danga Rikrwang na kou thangnu nunna phangsuwe.
Haga danga Christa na le Bapum bahak ting takolu to lang lwat pi lian dam make. Atiyeda “Nang nga Asa Kapaisa rwe, Aniya Eina Nating pon thang rwe” diga bakhou rin thang ngaaknu Maan gaye.
Bariak khat pile Maanna rin thang late, “Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi nang khwa sei tako to rwe.”
Maanna zanti pum toga ong ngaaknu kaan bi thinu bina Bating kanthang ngamnu Bakhou chap rakan takka khatle mikthi taga kalumga hweini ngaake. Maanna ri baning thuk briakpina katak thang ngaake.
Maan Sa Kapaisa ngaak peida, Maanna khaangnu paanna Maan chong zeinu bachu rwe.
Maan mipu phanu toga, Bachong zeinu bing khou Maan khwa sei ringriak om bapuba to rwe.
Atiga Bating “Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi” Takolu toga Rikrwang na kou thang rwe.
Balang bi rin lang taswang khak amme. Atiyeda nani louthei maklai briakpina rin bathiang thang lang kung nge.

Balangbe atun nani bachu thangnu rwan to lang khopnu zung rwe. Atiyeda nani khou tudannu pakhatna nani ding Rikrwang om kamanu bachu thangnu ga bachu thang lat lang bathaang ammaang nge. Nani kanatnu thaisaak sanu ma sen kanu tui bathaang am maang nge.
Balangbe sen kanu tuiza in ongnu bing ga ririak senu om chong bi bathuk thei mak aangnu nunne. Balangbe maan naosen zung maang nge.
Atiyeda kanatnu thaisaak kabe patso rwan lang nge. Dinuba bani sung ga talennu paan bina kasa kasia ding theinu ngamme.
Atibriakpina Christa om thou kamanu zek bing ga asat thangluga anina mipu pha lang karamzo. Thinu chwan bing bina sung lenu om lang bi Rikrwang pek la balumsanu om,
kasin bathiangluga to bathiang thangnu om khatle kut kaising thangnu om thinu nunna ring thounu om khatle khwa sei chong kasemnu om lang bi inmun ga thwan lat lanrizo.
Rikrwang na za thangnuwe dabe anina to dingnuzo heiya rwe.
Balangbe pi baan thang owei damnu, tambaan om leithwan batem taang damnu khatle Katha Bathiangnu om badam lou bacham damnu nun,
Rikrwang om sanu chong ding khatle hung dingnu bakaan om ngam ding batem taang damnu nunna,

banina balum damme dabe bani ding sung le lat langna pi kathan lat zalan rwe. Balangbe banina bani bahak lang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding cross pi bakhai that thang late khatle Bating mi bing meithaan bi pi kazak thang nge.
Balangbe taleina bakhou khwa katupka sunta thang damnu ding innu khatle lou chwan tonu nun lang bathaang amnu tapaan pi thangnu talei ga Rikrwang khouna rithoi lousuwe.
Atiyeda haba talei bi ga kaling dannu khatle babaak karwaknu kaling kung thouwe dabe haga bathaang maak rwe khatle Rikrwang om taseng ta thang lang bakaan nai rwe. Haba om kakhamnu ga meina roulune.
Atiyeda kriangnu nun ga, anina atiga rin ong ngaak peida nani lang bi balumsaye. Ringriak sa inkunu rithoi nani lang am rwe dinu ani thei rwe.
Balangbe nani om chwan khatle bathiangnu mi rwan khou Bameng lang chungna to thang damnu kriangnu chwanlaang ga banim lang Rikrwang be ririak se maknu make.
Nani mi bing om sung khutnu ga loinu tangga tipka bachunnu anina bathaiye.
Siat siatka bachunnu ga am lang loinu tangga nani mi bingna bacham khak khakka sung khutnu anina bathaiye.
Balangbe Rikrwang na Abraham khou chongren to thang bi, bama lian inkunu am lat mak briakpina maan bahakna karenga
rinne, “Eina nating batak takka rithoi thangne khatle nakik taat inku thoulune.”
Atiga maan khaang seiga khaangnu paan bina haba chongren ga lousu damme.
Balangbe mi nunna bani ma lian inkunu ding kai basaamga chongren towe. Atiga baze rwe dinu sake khatna bani om chong swak bing ding pi loi thang nge.
Hadanga Rikrwang na Baom chongren ga lousu dingnu mi nun khou chongren ga kale latza maknuwe dinu pi thei bathiang thang nwam briakpina Baom chongren ga chongsemna pi tip thang rwe.

Hagazo Rikrwang na chong karwak lat zamaknu kale lat zamaknu lang kani bi ani meithaan bi thang ongnu bachun ga lousu langna inkam riak pi pak hung damnu anina kachui thangnu lousu lang Maanna pi tip thang rwe.
Ani khou amnu haba om baning ga ani katha lang anchor dannuwe. Heiya soi make khatle tipe. Khamthing pwan li la ga khut rwe.
Habei ga Jisu na Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi khwa sei Takolu toga, ani hut toga lampui kai thang kamanu toga khut thang rwe.
Balangbe krwang nun ding athat thangsialuga hung latnu kaan bi Abraham ding Melchizedek, Salem nampui om krwang, Basaang kataknu Rikrwang om tako heiyana, kadouluga rithoi pi thang ngaake.

Bakhou Abraham na karaan bina phun hungnu bing bina som om badam khat balaang pi ngaake. Bameng om bakaba ga kamanu bi “Ririak senu krwang” khatle kaninu bi “Salem om krwang” bakabana “Dai bazaangnu krwang” dinuwe.
Melchizedek heiya bapa maaknu, banu maaknu, bapu bapa rui maaknu khatle maan ponnu le thinu maaknu atiyeda maan Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa danga khwa sei lang tako to ongme.
Maan intia liannubo baning Phaang ngo, Bakhou pa Abraham na tangga kraan bina phun hungnu bing bina som om badam khat pi ngaake.

Atiga tako tonu pham lousunu Levi sa kapaisa rwanna batak takka zathang nung suiga mi nun khouna, dinuba Abraham na ponnu ngaaklena, bani om unao rwan khouna som om badam khat lou lang chongtan lousu rwe.
Atiyeda Levi om bapu bapa rui bi sui maknu Melchizedek na Abraham khouna som om badam khat lou ong ngaake khatle chongren lousu damnu bakhou rithoi pi thang ngaake.
Kasinnu ding liannuna rithoi thang nge dinu kae lang maaknuwe.
Abeiya thi zanu mi nunna som om badam khat louwe. Atiyeda habei ga maan ring ongme diga sake amnu maan gana louwe.
Atiga kabianu kaan bi som om badam khat lounu Levi le Abraham paanna som om badam khat pi ngaake diga rin zaye.
Balangbe Melchizedek na Abraham ding kadounu kaan bi Levi ga bapa Abraham khou am ngaake.

Atibriakpina khopsanu heiya Levi sa rwan om tako rwan om chwan thou paannaye dabe, (balangbe haba om paan bina mi nunna chongtan lousu ngaake) Aaron na to damnu chaang bi maknu atiyeda Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi takolu katei hung lat lang pa-aam bathaang amgabo?
Balangbe tako rwan om chwan thou ga kalenu kaan bi Chongtan ga le kale lang bathaang am rwe.
Balangbe phum teinu mi pakhat om lang bi heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe. Haba om phum bi gana pakhatchanale rikhaang riak pi chwanlaang to mak ngaake.
Balangbe Judah phum bina ani Pukraangba pon ngaake dinu bathiangga theiye. Atiga Moses na tako om lang bi kabianu kaan bi heiba phum om lang bi khatchale kabia dam make.
Anina rin ongnuwa bathiang rwe. Balangbe Melchizedek tannu takolu katei khat hung rwe.
Bating mi pum om zathang om chongtan nung suiga takolu pi to mak ngaake. Atiyeda bakalan maaknu ringnu ngam nung suiga Takolu pi to ngaake.
Balangbe Maanna rinne, “Nang Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi khwa sei Takowe.”
Balangbe khat pek lana kama om zathang ga sonnu khatle bathaang maak briakpina thangta drwe.
(Balangbe Chongtanna bapung phanu khatchale pi to mak ngaak rwe). Atiga khat pek la inkunu bachunnu khat phun hung rwe. Hei paanna anina Rikrwang khou banai hung rwe.
Maan chong karen thangnu sui makka tako pi tonu make.

Balangbe bani chong karen thangnu sui makka tako to ngaake. Atiyeda Bating be chong karen le bachamga Ba khou, “Pukraangba na chongren towe, Khatle Bachong kale make, ‘Nang nga Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi khwa sei Tako to rwe,’ ” diga rinnu Maanna Tako pi to thang rwe.
Jisu wa sa inkunu chonghen om barit lou thangnu to rwe.
Meithaan tako tamga am ngaake. Balangbe thinu am briakpina bani atiga tako toga ong lang za mak ngaake.
Atiyeda Maan khwa seiga ring ong briakpina, kale lat maknu Tako to rwe.
Atibriakpina Bapaan bina Rikrwang khou hungnu bing ding Maanna bachang ga kanthangnu ngamme. Balangbe Maan bani lang hweicha thang lang ringga ongme.
Balangbe atinu bathiangnu, koi maaknu, to imphom maknu noh mi nun lak pina tei swaknu khatle tambaan bing lu chung bi amnu Takolu heiya ani lang khopsanuwe.

Takolu bingna kama bi bani bapum bapum om noh lang haba nung mi nun om noh lang kani bathin khaangnu danga khaang lang bakhou bathaang maak ngaake. Balangbe Maanna Bapum bahak ting bakaan bathin lang toga khaang oweiza toga khaang thang drwe.
Balangbe sonnu amnu mi nun ding Chongtanna takolu toga som thang rwe. Atiyeda khwa sei lang pi khopsa thangnu Sa Kapaisa ding chongtan nung hungnu chongrenna Takolu toga som thang nge.
Atun anina kabia ongnu chong bing om bakung tonu chong ga heiye: Tambaan la Ngam lian kataknu krwang takung riak om kut inchang la badung ongnu Takolu ani lang am rwe.
Bathiang Kataknu Riak khatle misana makka Rikrwang na bacha thou thangnu bazenu pwan in bi chwanlaang towe.
Balangbe takolu bing nga leithwan khatle rikhaang pot khaang lang som thangnuwe. Atibriakpina heiba Takolu heiya le khaang lang pot khat amnu zek swake.
Balangbe Maan talei ram bi ong ngaake dabe Chongtan nung suiga leithwan khaangnu om tako rwan am briakpina Maan tako tola dingnuwe.

Bani tambaan pot bing om bakatha le bakatap tonu chwanlaang towe. Heiya Moses na pwan in bacha thouna Rikrwang na rin thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe. Maanna rinne, “Nakhou rammwan la pi mu thang damnu nung suiga nangna pot bing ga bacha lang cheksinno.”
Atiyeda atunbe Maanna sa inkunu chongren bing lu chung bi bacha thou thangnu sa inkunu chonghen om Tabat le to briakpina Maan sarannu chwanlaang lousu rwe.
Balangbe kamanu chonghen ga koi maake dabe kaninu chonghen ga bathaang am latlanuwe,
balangbe bani om koi zongsuga, Pukraangba na rinne, “Maanna rinne, phaang ngo, bakaan ga hung nge, haba kaan bi ga Israel inkhun le Judah inkhun le chonghen kathan khat Eina bacha thangne.

Eina bani ding Egypt pina bani kut kaiga kalwang swaknu lumik pi ga Eina bani pu pa rwan le to thang damnu chonghen nung ga suilaye. Balangbe banina Aom chonghen bi ong ting ting mak ngaake atibriakpina Eina bani ding baningsu mak ngaak rwe diga Pukraangba na rinne.

Balangbe haba lumik bing nung bi, Eina Israel inkhun le to dingnu chonghen ga heiye, diga Pukraangba na rinne. Eina Aom chongtan rwan ga bani sung bi thanglune. Atiga bani sung bi le hei bing nga hiak thanglune. Eina bani om Rikrwang tolune khatle banina Ami nun tolune.
Atiga ‘Pukraangba ding theiyo’ diga mi bingna bainnai lounai rwan ding mak tabe bau banao rwan ding bachu latla rwe. Balangbe bani kasinnu bina thouga kaliannu tangga mi bingna Ating theilune.
Balangbe Eina bani om ririak se maknu bing ding ga phaangkriang thanglune. Bani om noh bing khatle chongtan thouto maknu chwan bing ga Eina baningsu latla rwe.”
Maanna “Chonghen Kathan” diga rinnu bi ga, kamanu chonghen ga baraan pi imbei drwe. Atiga baraan khatle balui ga baraan dam ding rwe.
Batakka, kamanu chonghen hakna Rikrwang ding kalum dingnu gong khatle talei ram om Bathiangnu riak amme.
Balangbe pwan in khat daan thang ngaake. Habei kamanu kaa bi thaomei, table khatle bathiangnu uilu am ngaake. Haba riak ka Bathiangnu riak tiga kouwe.
Kaninu khamthing pwan li bi ga pwan in om kaa khat, pum brum bina Bathiang Kataknu diga kounu riak amme.

Habei ga kachaak om ankam khatle kachaakna bataki bing lei thangnu chonghen tambung amme. Haba tambung sung bi ga manna thangnu kachaak ben, bazik kasat ngaaknu Aaron om sungrwan khatle chonghen lungpek kani ga am ngaake.
Haba tambung lu chung bi ga lwat liannu om Cherubim kanina phaangkriang kaong riak pi ga ong lem thang ong ngaake. Hei lang bi atun ani bathuk rintangnu ngam make.
Pot bing ga atiga daan thangnu nung tako rwanna pwan in om kamanu kaa bi ga katupka khutluga chwanlaang to ngaake.

Atiyeda kaninu kaa bi gabe Takolu baraanto zana sangwan bi khut leng oweiza khute. Bapum bahak lang khatle mi nun om thei makka to thang damnu noh bing ga kok thang lang khaang thangnu thi ga sui makka khut make.
Hei bing nga Katha Bathiangnuna pi mu thang nge, hagazo, kamanu pwan in ga am ong basaan, pum brum bina Bathiang Kataknu Riak pi khut lang lampui ga indao thang mak aang nge.

Haba pwan in ga atun kaan bi lang badannuwe. Habei ga kalum ongnu rwan om kakoi baze theinu lungning ding pi bapung pha thang ngam maknu leithwan khatle rikhaang pot bing ding banina khaang thang nge.
Ha bing ga sa innu, kasin bathiangnu bachaat inza khatle kalenu kaan hung mak basaan to maknu za maknu misa pum om zek ka ani ding pi to ngaake. Christa om Thi
Atiyeda Christa na hung dingnu heiya sanu pot nun om Takolu toga hung rwe. Maanna kutna bacha maknu hei talei ram om maknu lian inkunu, inkuga bachang sanu pwan in bi Maan khut rwe.
Christa Maan Bathiang Kataknu Riak pi bakaan bathin lang toga khut owei za bi, ken chan khatle sen swan thi makka Bathi bahak suiga khute. Atiga ani lang khwa sei ran swak thangnu lousu rwe.
Balangbe sen chan khatle ken chan om thi khatle sen zan om tambutna imphomnu mi nun lu chung bi chai thangnuna pum ding to bathiang nge dabe,

khwa sei Katha paanna Rikrwang khou imphomnu maaknu toga Bapum bahak kat thangnu Christa om thi gana, ring ongnu Rikrwang ding anina kalum lang thinu chwan bing bina ani om kakoi baze theinu lungning ding intia lang inkuga to bathiang thanglu dingbo?

Ha lang chungna kamanu chonghen thwei bi ong ngaaknu koi maan bing bina kandwak swak thang lang thinu paanna kou thangnu nunna khwa sei rakhum om karen thangnu ga lousu lang Maan chonghen kathan om Tabat rwe.
Balangbe chonghen khat amnu bi ga, chonghen han thang ngaaknu mi om thinu le bathaang am lang rwe.
Balangbe chonghen khat heiya mi thinu nungna bakaba amme. Chonghen han thangnu mi ga ring ong basaan chonghen ga bangam maake.
Atibriakpina kamanu chonghen ga hakna thi sui makka som thang mak ngaake.

Balangbe Chongtan nung suiga Moses na chongtan bing ga mi nun khou bachu thangnu kaan bi maanna sen swan, ken chan thi ga tui le sendumnu mun le hyssop le louluga chongdip pi le mi bing khou kazin thang rwe.
Atiga rinne, “Heiya nanina zei lang Rikrwang na pi thangnu zathang om thi rwe” diga maanna rinne.
Heiza makka, pwan in bi ga le khatle chwanlaang tonu bi sizinnu pot bing bi ga le thi ga kazin thang rwe.
Chongtan nung suiga pot bing thina to bathiang nge. Atiga thi ta makka noh kok thangnu maake.

Atibriakpina tambaan la amnu pot nun om bakatha le bachamnu bing ga hei dannu bingna to bathiang lang bathaang amme atiyeda tambaan om pot bing ga hei ma sa inkunu rikhaang pot bingna to bathiang lang bathaang amme.
Balangbe bataknu om katha le, kutna bachanu bathiangnu riak pi Christa na khut tam make. Atiyeda tambaan bahak pi ani lang Rikrwang meithaan bi ani hut langna han lang Maan khut rwe.
Takoluna Bathiang Kataknu Riak pi ga sangwan bathin katei om thi louluga khutnu danga, Maan Bapum bahak ting chat makka kat thang lang khut mak ngaake.

Ati mak ngaake dabe talei ram dam thang khap pina thouga Maanna riangre khaang katup ong ngaak tingnuwe. Atiyeda atun kakhamnu bakaan tangnu bi Maanna Bapum bahak ting khaang thangnu paanna noh lou sat thang lang bakaan bathin lang toga leng oweiza toga Maan hung rwe.
Misa heiya thi leng oweinu khatle haba nung chong kasem lang ret thangnu danga,

mi taswang khak noh phun thang lang Christa ding bakaan bathin lang toga kat swak thang rwe. Maanna noh phun thang lang makka Bating ong ngaak ongnu bing lang ringriak pi thang lang leng ninu toga Maan hung latlune.

Balangbe chongtan ga batak makka, hung dingnu kasanu pot nun om bakatha to briakpina, banina sangwan bathin chat makka kat thangnu, bachaat khatchanu rikhaang pot nun om paanna kalumnu mi bing ding impha ni beida pi khopsa ngam make.

Hagana pi khopsa ngam ngaake dabe, kalumnu mi nun ding ga pi bathiang thang oweinu nung bani noh ammaang nge dinu lungning khatchale bani khou am latla ding briakpina rikhaang pot ka khaang lan dingnu makkabo?
Atiyeda rikhaang pot nunna sangwan bathin noh pi baningsu thang nge.
Balangbe sen chan le ken chan om thina noh lou sat thangnu ngam make.
Atibriakpina Maanna talei ram bi hungnu kaan bi Maanna rinne, “Rikhaang pot khatle potkat Nangna bathai make, Atiyeda Nangna Alaangna mi pum khat daan thang rwe.
Rou satnu potkat nun khatle noh lang khaang thangnu rikhaang pot bing Nangna pemlan rwe.
Habei ga Eina rinne, ‘Phaang ngo, chongdip pi Alang bi hiak thangnu danga, He Rikrwang Nangna baningnu to lang Ei hung rwe.’ ”

“Rikhaang pot khatle potkat, rou satnu potkat khatle noh lang khaangnu potkat Nangna bathai make khatle habei ga Nasung pem thang make” diga kamaga rin drwe. (Heiya chongtan nung suiga khaang thangnu gaye).
Haba nung Maanna rinne, “Phaang ngo, He Rikrwang Naom baningga to lang Ei hung rwe.” Maanna kaninu chonghen ga ling thou lang kamanu chonghen ga lou sate.
Hagana Jisu Christa om pum ding bakaan bing lang leng oweiza khaang thangnu paanna ani ding noh bina to bathiang thang rwe.
Atiyeda tako bingna lumik bathin hanluga, noh kok thangnu khatchale ngam maknu khaangnu chwan ga bachaat khatchanu rikhaang pot ka chat makka khaang nge.
Atiyeda Christa na noh lang bakaan bing lang khaang oweiza rikhaang pot khaang thangluga Rikrwang kut inchang la ongta drwe.
Habei gana thouga, Bating munanu bing ding Baket thwei bi kadim riak pi to mak basaan ngaakka ongme.
Balangbe Maanna potkat khatna to bathiang thang damnu mi nun ding ga khwa sei lang pi bapung pha thang rwe.
Katha Bathiangnuna le ani khou sake pi thang nge. Balangbe Maanna le kamaga rinne,
“Haba lumik bing nung la Eina bani le han dingnu chonghen ga heiye diga Pukraangba na rinne, ‘Eina Aom chongtan bing bani sung bi thanglune khatle bani lungning bi ha bing ga hiak thangne.’ ”
Haba nung bi Maanna rinne, “Bani noh bing khatle bani om chongtan thouto maknu bing Eina baningsu lat la rwe.”
Hei bing kok thang dam briakpina noh lang khaang lang bathaang maak rwe.
Atibriakpina unao rwan Jisu thi paan bina Bathiang Kataknu Riak pi ga khut lang ani khou sung raangnu am briakpina,
heiya khamthing pwan dinuba Bazan bahak pi ani lang kathan khatle ringnu lampui khat bacha thangnu paan bi naye.
Rikrwang in bi ani lang Takolu am briakpina,

kasianu lungning baning mak lang ani sung ding thi kazin thangluga khatle ani pum ding bathiangnu tuina kasin bathiang thang taang bi ani khou balumsa siat siatnu amlu bataknu sung le bachamga Rikrwang kim bi hungzo.
Anina rin indao ongnu bachunnu ga balumsianu maakka tipka choizo. Balangbe heiba chongren to thangnu Maan ga balumsa lang khopnuwe.
Kriangnu khatle sanu chwan bi khat khat ting sung pi thou thang lang ani kakhan rizo.
Mi kasem om chaang tonu danga, ani bacham kadoinu ga bathan sat makka ani khatna khat ting kachui thang kalezo. Lumik ka nai hungna rwe dinu nanina munu nung suiga inkuga tozo.
Balangbe anina bazenu ding lousu damnu nung anina theiga noh to late dabe noh lang rikhaang pot maak rwe.
Atiyeda chongsem om khatle munanu nun ding to braan dingnu balung pwan mei ding kachiga ong ngaak lang zung rwe.
Tudannu Moses om chongtan ding choi balanu mi ding sake pat ni pat thum om chong bina phaangkriang lousu makka thiye.

Atiyeda Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding kadim dannu mi khatle to bathiang thangnu chonghen om thi ding bathiang maknu pote diga chak thangnu khatle phaangkriang om Katha ding thou to maknu mi ding ga intia inkuga sia kataknu laak thangnu phang lang khopnubo diga nani baningbo?
Balangbe “Takhum baan thangnu Aomme, Eina baan thangne” diga Pukraangba na rinne. Atiga “Pukraangba na Bami nun ding chongsem lune” diga rin latnu Bating anina theiye.
Ringnu Rikrwang kut pi ta thangnu ga kachinu thote.
Atiyeda nani ding sung pi baan thangnu nung, nanina riangre kanang khaangnu om rakanga katwaknu khaang damnu, kama kaan om bakaan bing ga baningsuwo.
Balak lak pi nani ding khang meithaan bi rin basiat ngaake khatle to riangre ngaake khatle balak lak atiga sega tonu kadounu bing le nani badam lou bacham ngaake.

Balangbe ating qwan mi toga ong ngaak balei nanina kriang thang ngaake khatle tambaan la nani lang sa inkunu khatle kaling maknu pot amme dinu heiya nanina theiga nani om kasut sat tamnu lan bi ga karoga khaang thang ngaake.
Atibriakpina taswan lianga amnu nani om balumsat ka lou sat mako.
Balangbe nanina Rikrwang om baningnu ga to thang taangluga karen thangnu ga lousu lang nani khaang sei lang bathaang amme.
Balangbe “Atun bakaan kasem nung bi hung dingnu Maan ga hunglu rwe, Atiga Maan ngianlaye.
Atun ririak senu mi ga balumsanu paan bina ringlune. Atiyeda nung han late dabe, Akatha na balu chung bi pemnu maake.”
Atiyeda ani be braan lang nung han lat tamnu nun lak pi sui make. Atiyeda katha kanthangnu bi balumsanu nun lak pi suiye.
Balumsanu dinuwa bachunnu pot ka soilan rwe dinu bathiangga lou thangnu khatle mu maknu pot ting amme diga balumsa tipnu ding nge.
Balangbe balumsanu paan bina kama mi nun gana kasanu sake lousu rwe.
Balumsanu paan bina heiba talei ram ma Rikrwang chongna dam thang rwe dinu anina theiye. Haba om langna mu ongnu pot heiya mu maknu pot pina bacha thang nge.

Balumsanu paan bina Abel ga Cain om ma sa inkunu rikhaang pot Rikrwang khou kat ngaake. Haba paan bina Rikrwang na baom leithwan ga sake pi thangluga maan ririak senu manpaye dinu sake lousu rwe. Haba om paanna maan thi dam ngaak peida atun tangga kabia ongme.

Balumsanu paan bina Enoch na thinu dou makka bating lou thou dam ngaake. Rikrwang na bating lou thou dam briakpina bating zongsu mak ngaake. Balangbe bating lou thou mak balei meithaan maanna Rikrwang ding pi pem thang ngaake dinu baom heiba sake amme.
Balumsanu sui makka Rikrwang ding pi pem ngam make. Balangbe Rikrwang khou hungnu maanna Rikrwang amme khatle Bating zongnu bing khou rithoi pi thangnu Pa ye dinu balumsa ding gaye.

Balumsanu paan bina Noah na mu maknu chwan lang bi Rikrwang na rin chaak thangga, Rikrwang ding kachiga baningnu le bachamga bainkhun ding kan lang lipui bacha rwe. Haba om paanna maanna talei ram ding kakoinu bi pi ta thang rwe. Atiga balumsanu nung suiga ririak senu om rakhum lwaknu mi to rwe.
Balumsanu paan bina Abraham na bating kounu dat pi nung la maanna rakhum toga lousu dingnu talei la ga se lang rinnu zei ngaake. Atiga maan se ongnu ga inlampaibo dinu thei makka se swak ngaake.
Balumsanu paan bina maanna man ram la danga, karen thangnu taram la ga maan bazin mi toga, karen thang bachamnu om rakhum lwaknu mi to bachamnu Isaac le Jacob le bachamga pwan in bi lung ngaake.
Balangbe Rikrwang na rang thangnu khatle bacha thangnu, hagazo inphung amnu namlian ding maanna ngaakka ong ngaake.

Balumsanu paan bina Sarah bapum bahakna le nao phun lang nat lousu ngaake. Atiga maan nao lung lang bakaan hennu dat pi naosen khat pon thang ngaake. Balangbe bakhou chongren to thangnu Bating balumsa lang khopnuwe dinu maanna chak thang rwe.
Atibriakpina mi khat khouna, bapum thi taangnu dannu khouna mi sing tamga saangbaan la insi za tamga khatle basing sem lat ngamlanu tuipui paan lungtasi za cha swak ngaake.

Karen thangnu bing ga lou thang makka bani mi bing balumsaluga thi ngaake. Atiyeda namlaa lana haga phaangmuga khatle kadou thangga, ha ding ga kaponluga bani heiba talei ram bi bazin mi khatle manram la mi toga ongnu zung nge diga rin indao thang ngaake.
Balangbe hadannu bing ga rin thangnu banina lung dingnu bani bahak om talei khat rakanga zong ongme dinu bathiangga indao thang nge.
Batak takka, banina se swaknu talei ding ga baningsu lat ngaake dabe bani han lat lang badou chanu phang ngaak tingnuwe.
Atiyeda banina sa inkunu dinuba tambaan om talei ding bathai rwe. Atibriakpina bani om Rikrwang nge diga kounu bi Rikrwang na kazak lan rwe, balangbe Maanna bani lang namlian khat daan thang rwe.
Balumsanu paan bina Abraham na bating tamphaangnu kaan bi Isaac ting khaang thang rwe. Chongren ga lousunu maan gana khat tak khatchanu basa kapaisa ding kat thang ngaake.
Balang bi atiga rin thang ngaake, “Nakik taat Isaac khouna som thoulune.”
Rikrwang na thinu bina tangga bating pi ring thou thang ngamme dinu maanna balumsa ngaake. Chong lang ringa, maanna Isaac ting hanga phang lat ngaake.
Balumsanu paan bina Isaac na hung dingnu bing om lang bi Jacob le Esau khou rithoi thang ngaake.
Balumsanu paan bina Jacob na maan thina Joseph sa kapaisa kani khou rithoi pi thang ngaake. Baom sungrwan bi hai thangluga Rikrwang ding kalum ngaake.
Balumsanu paan bina Joseph na thina Israel sa rwan Egypt lana se swak tingnu lang bi ringa baru lang bi bachu thang ngaake.

Balumsanu paan bina Moses ting pon thangnu kaan bi bating banu bapana tha inthum inkam thang ngaake. Balangbe maan bathot baman sanu naosenne dinu banina mu ngaake. Banina krwang om zathang ding kachi mak ngaake.
Balumsanu paan bina Moses na maan mipu phanu kaan bi bating Pharaoh sa kamaisa om sa kapaisa kou thangnu ding lou nwam mak ngaake.
Haba hut lang noh om lo zaannu bi pemnu ma bakaan toiza Rikrwang mi nun le riangre khaang bachamnu ga maan ka thang ngaake.
Egypt om lan bing ma Christa langna kazaknu khaang thangnu gana sa inkunu lan ne diga chak thang ngaake. Balangbe maanna bameithaan bi amnu rithoi bi ga phaang ngaake.
Balumsanu paan bina maanna krwang om balung pwan ding kachi makka Egypt bathan thangsia ngaake. Balangbe mu maknu Bating munu danga riangre khaang ngaake.
Balumsanu paan bina natainu sa kapaisa ding athatnu gana bani ding to maan mak lang Takan Swaknu Balou khatle thi kazin thangnu ding ngaak rwe.
Balumsanu paan bina Israel sa rwanna Kasennu Tuipui ding tui paan danga takan swak ngaake. Atiyeda Egypt rwanna haga danga karamnu kaan bi tuina daan ngaake.
Balumsanu paan bina Jericho namlian om kapan ga banina ni siari se koinu nung baota ngaake.
Balumsanu paan bina taloi Rahab na inthim mi nun ding karoga lou thang briakpina maan chong zei maknu nun le suiga braan mak ngaake.
Atiga eina pa-aam inkuga rinne gabo? Balangbe Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephthah, David, Samuel khatle thiamting rwan om lang bi rin ong lang bakaan maak rwe.
Bani yana balumsanu bina Krwang talei ding ngam ngaake, bazenu chwan to ngaake, karen thangnu bing ga lousu ngaake, takhu krwang bao thing ngaake,
mei om nat ting to mit ngaake, kachaak chemlem bina ring hung ngaake, son ong ngaak pina nat thou rwe, kraan bi natnu mi imbei ngaake, man ram om kraan mi nun ding kazun sat ngaake.
Kamaisa nunna bani kathinu pi ring thounu lousu ngaake. Katei rwan ding rai ngaake. Bani ding bathan thangnu ding za mak ngaake. Hagana bani thinu bina sa inkunu ring thounu ga lousu za lang nge.
Katei rwanna bani ding choi banuinu khatle bwei basiatnu khaang damme, O, parei ruina bang thangluga qwan in bi tangga thang damme.

Bani ding lungna sat ngaake. Bani ding kani swak ka rom ngaak rwe, bani ding bathem swak rwe, bani ding kachaak chemna athat rwe. Banina zao khatle ken munna pon naat toga sin basoiluga poise ngaake. Bani ga nangga, riangre khaangga rainu lousu ngaake.
Bani lang heiba talei ram ma khopnu make. Bani ramhaang bing bi, ching ram bi khatle chen lang khatle khun kapop pi poi se ngaake.
Bani heiba mi bing balumsanu paan bina mi nun lang bi sake phangsu ngaak peida karen thangnu gabe bani lousu mak ngaake.
Balangbe Rikrwang na ani lang sa inkunu pot khat daan thang ongme. Haga ani soi makka bani ding pi bapung pha thang mak lang nge.

Atibriakpina heitia liannu tambu dannu sake rwanna ani ding ong qwat ong briakpina, anina le karitnu bing le ani ding bai takka kabet thang ongnu noh ga asatcho. Ani meithaan bi amnu nampak pak tingnu ga khaang rakannu le suiga pakcho.

Ani om balumsanu om bapuba khatle ani ding pi khopsa thangnu Jisu ding phaangzo. Bameithaan bi am ngaaknu karo lozang sanu lang ga Maanna kazaknu ding thou to makka cross ka phun thang drwe. Atiga Rikrwang om Krwang kaong riak om kut inchang la ongta drwe.
Balangbe nani riangre mak lang khatle nani sung inkhin mak langna, Bapum bahak lu chung bi noh mi nun om heitia lang batannu khaang thang damnu Bating baning ngo.
Naniba noh om maitwang bi katwakka atun thi tanu tangga katwak mak aang nge.

Atiga sa kapaisa rwan khou danga kachui thangnu chong rin thangnu ga nani banim rwe dinuba, “Asa kapaisa, Pukraangba na laak thangnu ding thou to maknu to mako, Khatle Maanna nating tweinu kaan bi sung inkhin mako.”
“Balangbe Pukraangba na kriangnu bing ding twei thang nge, Khatle Maanna lou thangnu sa kapaisa rwan ding laak thang nge.”
Twei thangnu nanina khaang nge dabe, Rikrwang na sa kapaisa rwan khou danga, nani khou to thangnuwe. Balangbe Pa na laak thang maknu sa kapaisa tu ambo?
Atiyeda mi bing zana badam lou bacham ongnu twei thangnu ga nakhou hung thang mak tabe nani takhaisiasa rwan zung rwe khatle sa kapaisa rwan lan rwe.
Inkuga ani ding twei thangnu talei ram bi ani pa rwan am ngaake. Atiga anina bani ding takhwang towe. Ani ha ma inkuga katha om Pa thwei bi ong ga ring onglagabo?
Balangbe banina saye dinu nung suiga bakaan kasem lang ani ding twei thang ngaake. Atiyeda Baom bathiangnu ga anina badam lou lang ani lang sa lang Maanna twei thang nge.
Atun twei thang ongnu bakaan kasem bi karo lang make atiyeda sung pi soke. Ati ngaak peida twei thangnu gana bachu thang damnu bing ga bataang la ririak senu om dai bazaangnu kraa kraaye.
Atibriakpina son ongnu kut ting khatle son ongnu kekhok ka pi nat thang ngo.
Ket thoknu ga karing makka pi sa thang lang nani ket lang bazenu lampui bachawo.
Mi bingza le dai bazaangga ong lang khatle bathiangnu kum bi lung lang karammo. Balangbe bathiangnu sui makka pakhatchanale Pukraangba ding mulaye.

Tudannuna Rikrwang om phaangkriang bina se swak mak lang cheksinno. Pakhatchanale bakhou kakhaanu kamong thouluga mi nun ding pi katopnu mi to mak ting ngo. Atiga hei bing om langna mi taswang khak ting to braannu zaye.
Tudannu lungkoi lungmaanga khatle ririak se makka Esau na butheng khatcha lang baom patsonuna phang dingnu rakhum ga zwansa damnu dan mak lang cheksinno.
Balangbe nanina theiye, dinuba bataang la maan rithoi ga lou nwam lat ngaak peida bating za thang lan rwe. Balangbe maan mikthi taga zong ngaak peida sung le lat zanu lampui am dam lan rwe.
Balangbe to maan zanu mei chok ongnu rammwan bi, kabumnu bi, zingnu bi, thirwei natnu bi,
trumpet baraam bi khatle chongkaang om baraam bi nani hungnu make. Baraam ga ngaisu damnu bani khou chong rin thang lat mak lang hwei ngaake.
Balangbe “Khouring tangga rammwan ga to maanne dabe lungna satthat tingnuwe mak tabe thanna kaaptingnuwe” diga zathang pi thangnu banina khaang ngam mak ngaake.
Atiga mu ongnu ga taswang khak kachi zanu thot briakpina Moses na rin ngaake, “Ei kachi ga kathok rwe.”
Atiyeda Zion rammwan bi khatle ringnu Rikrwang om nampui tambaan Jerusalem bi basing sem ngam maknu tambaan chonglang nun khou,
tambaan la meng hiak thangnu pon kamanu om rupkathan bi khatle mi khang kadoi riak pi pum brum om Chongsempuba Rikrwang khou pi khopsa thangnu ririak senu mi nun om katha bing khou,
Chonghen Kathan om Tabat tothangnupa Jisu khou khatle Abel om pot ma sa inkunu chong rinnu kazin thangnu thi bi nani hung rwe.

Kabia ongnu Bating ga nanina ngai kaatnu to mak lang cheksinno. Balangbe talei bi ongnu bani khou rin thang ongnu Bachong ding ngai kaatnu bingna dwak make dabe, tambaan la rin ongnu Bakhouna pen swake dabe tatoga ani dwak ngamne gabo!
Haba kaan bi ga Baom baraamna talei ram ding pi kanuk ngaake. Atiyeda atunba chongren toga Maanna rinne, “Eina talei ram za ding makka tambaan ding le kanuk han latne.”
Atiga “Kanuk han latne” diga rinnu heiyana kaling lat maknu pot bing ding am ong sia lang dam thangnu pot, kaling zanu pot bing ding lou satnu ga pi muwe.
Atibriakpina ani kaling lat za maknu krwang talei lousu briakpina Rikrwang ding swankazo. Atiga anina takung tazeinu khatle Rikrwang ding kachinu le suiga Rikrwang khou lou thang zanu toga kalumzo.
Balangbe ani Rikrwang nga rou mut sat ngamnu mei zung nge.
Unao kriangga chat makka am ding ngo.
Bazin mi nun ding rangaaga loukhut thang ngo. Balangbe atiga tonu gana tudannuna thei thang makka tambaan chonglang nun ding chwanlaang to thangnu le am drwe.
Qwan in bi ongnu nun ding nani bani le diga qwan in bi ong bachamnu danga baningsuwo. Nani le pum bi ong briakpina siaga to thangnu bani ding baningsu thang ngo.
Tazwan bahwannu ding mi bing lak pi takhwang to ding ngo khatle ria ga to imphom mak ting ngo. Balangbe lungmaannu ding khatle rwan mei rwan basan laannu ding Rikrwang na chong kasemlune.
Nani kum ga raaamnu to mak ting ngo. Nani om ka amnu bi ga pemnu tuwo. Balangbe Rikrwang na rinne, “Ei nating khatchale bathan thanglaye” khatle “Khatchale asat thanglaye.”
Atibriakpina anina sung raangga rinne, “Pukraangba heiya ating paangthangnupa ye, Ei kachilaye. Misana akhou pa-aam to ngamlu ding gabo?”
Nani ding kai thang ngaaknu nun ding khatle nani khou Rikrwang chong bachu thang ngaaknu nun ding baningsuwo. Bani kum om kraa ga kakhanga bani om balumsanu ga sui bazeiyo.
Jisu Christa heiya inzaan le, aniya le khwa seiga bachamme.

Bachaat tei teinu khatle teithak thaknu zekrinna nani ding kai impei mako. Balangbe thaisaakna makka, phaangkriang gana nani sung pi nat thangnu ga sanuwe. Thaisaak pi sung khutnu bi ga bani lang tongnu maake.
Pwan in bi chwanlaang to ongnu nunna sa lang ngam maaknu ani om rikhaang riak khat amme.
Balangbe takoluna khouring om thi ga noh om khaangnu pot toga Bathiangnu riak pi phunkhut ngaake khatle banina khouring pum ga mi nun om inthi nun paan la mei thaang sate.
Atibriakpina Jisu na le Bapum bahak om Bathi paanna mi bing ding to bathiang lang kapan inkhaanmun paan la riangre khaang thang rwe.
Atibriakpina anina Baom kazaknu dam louluga inthi nun paan la Bakim la sezo.
Balangbe abeiya ani lang kaling lat maknu namlian maake. Atiyeda hung dingnu namlian ding anina rakanga zong nge.
Atibriakpina ani Bapaanna anina swankanu om rikhaang pot ka Rikrwang khou kat thang ting tingzo. Hagazo, Bameng bi swankanu, ani mun bina swaknu kraa ga katcho.
Kasanu chwan tonu khatle mi nun ding paang thangnu bi thou to maknu to mako. Balangbe heipai rikhaang pot heiyana Rikrwang ding pi pemme.

Nani ding kai thangnu nun chong ga zeiyo. Bani thwei bi ong ngo. Banina nani om katha ding phaang thang ongme. Balangbe banina bani om chwanlaang om singchak Rikrwang khou pi lune. Banina chunto riangre makka karoga to ding ngo. Banina chunto riangrega towe dabe nani lang kana bilaye.
Ani lang le hweini thang ngo. Balangbe balang bingza bi taluga lung nwamga kasanu kakoi baze theinu lungning amme dinuwa anina balumsaye.
Atiyeda Ei nani khou barapka hung lat lang heiya to thangnu Eina nani ding inkuga kachui thang nge.
Atun khwa sei chonghen thi paanna zao rwan om Kaliannu Zaosiannupa, ani Pukraangba Jisu ding thinu bina phunka thangnu dai bazaangnu Rikrwang na,
Jisu Christa paanna Bamikphaang bi pemnu ga ani sung bi to thangga, Baom baningnu to lang kasanu bing bi nani ding pi bapung pha thang ding ngo. Bakhou khwa sei lwat liannu to dingro. Amen.
Unao rwan, eina nani ding hweiye, kachui thangnu chong ga ngai chui thang ngo, balangbe eina nani khou chongkaang toiga hiak tamnuwe.
Ani unao Timothy ding qwan in bina bathan thang lat rwe dinu nanina thei thang ngo. Maan barapka hung nge dabe, ei maan le diga nani ding kadoune.
Nani ding kai thangnu nun ding khatle bathiangnu mi nun ding kalum thang ngo. Italy taram la mi nunna le nani ding kalumme.
Phaangkriang nani mi bing le ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa om swak James eina lung imphaang thou damnu phum somga kani ding kalumme. Tamnu le Bathemnu
Au anao rwan ga, nani nun tamnu inza bi ta thang ngaaklena haga aih sanuwe diga chak thangluga karoga lou thang ngo.
Nani balumsat ting tamnu gana nani khaang thei lang nge dinu nanina theiye.
Atiyeda khaang theinu gana nani bachang sanu chwan to ding ngo khatle bachang sanu gana nani khatchale baat maknu to lang nge.
Nani lak pi tudannu pakhatna ningting baate dabe, mi bing za lang to kazak thang makka pi thang theinu Rikrwang khou hweini ding ngo; atiye dabe Maanna balaang pi thanglune.
Atiyeda maanna hweininu kaan bi balumsianu to makka, balumsaga ni ding ngo; balangbe balumsianu maan gabe thiraangna raang kanuk ongnu tuipui kabaapnu ga dannuwe.
Balangbe hadanga hweininu mi gabe Pukraangba khouna pa-aam aam lousulune diga baning mak ting ngo.
Sung khoranu maan gabe maanna tonu chwan lang bing bi han tipnu maake.
Kasonnu unao ding ga pi basaangka thangbi,
atiluga lungsanu bating pi bangiam ta thang bi, maanna swanka ding ngo; balangbe lungsanu maan ga lou paan danga braan damlune.
Balangbe lumik swakluga nisat nat kanu kaan bi lounana baowei taye, bapaan le chuntaye; atiluga basat kale braan damme. Hadanga lungsanu maan ga le bachwan le diga braan damlune.
Tamnu ding khaangnu maan ga aih sanuwe, balangbe bating tamnu ding ga maanna khaang ngamnu kaan bi Rikrwang na bating kriangnu mi bing lang pi lang karen thangnu luthop ka lousulune.
Mi khat ting bathemnu kaan bi “Rikrwang na ating bathemme” diga rin mak ting ngo, balangbe sa maknu gana Rikrwang ding bathemnu ngam make; atiluga Maanna le mi khat cha ding hakna bathem make.
Atiyeda bapumna bathainu gana kaiseluga namthangnu kaan bi mi bing ding bathemnu bi pi taye.
Pumna bathainu gana pum ritluga noh pon thang rwe khatle noh gana bakalan tangnu kaan bi thinu pi swake.
Kriangnu unao rwan ga, nani ding lampui pi kaimaan mako.
Kasanu khatle bachang sanu leithwan bing ga basaang la naye khatle ha bing ga tambaan la ongnu kabaannu Pa khou naye, Bakhou bakatha danga kalenu maake.
Ani ding Maanna baningnu khatle Baom bazenu chongkaang paan bina dam thangnu bing om kamanu kraa to lang pon thang rwe.
Atibriakpina kriangnu unao rwan ga mi bing zana ngaisunu bi barapo, kabia swaknu khatle balung pwannu bi bazaang ngo.
Balangbe misa om balung pwannuna Rikrwang om ririak senu bi pi hung tang make.
Atibriakpina imphom tanaatnu khatle kasianu khei bing ga asatluga nakatha ding kan thang ngamnu Bachong nakhou ling thang damnu ga takhwang le bachamga loukhut thang ngo.
Atiyeda chong ga ngaisu zanu to makka, chwan tonu towo khatle naraantoza ding minam mako.
Balangbe tudannu pakhatna chong ga ngaisuluga chwan to make dabe, maan ga katha an bi baman phaangnu ga le bachamme.
Balangbe maanna baman phaangluga se swak pi, maan tatonu mibo dinu ga banim nong nge.

Atiyeda tudannu mi khatna rang tonu khopsanu chongtan ding ga phaangnu khatle habei ga chat makka zeinu maan gana theinu ga banim nong make khatle bachwan towe. Haba manpa ga bachwan don bing bi aih sanu tolune.
Nani lak pi tudannu pakhatna baraanto bating ririak senuwe diluga bamun, babalei ding balak maknu maan ga baraanto bating minamnuwe, baom ririak ka bathaang maaknuwe.

Pa Rikrwang meithaan bi bathiangnu khatle tanaatnu maaknu ririak ka heiyaye, taraisiasa rwan khatle tameinu rwan ding bani om riangre kanang bing bi phaang thangnu khatle maan bazan bahak le talei ram om imphom tanaatnu riak pina impaanga ongnu heiyaye.
Unao rwan ga, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa lwat liannu Pukraangba ding kathing aih to makka balumsawo.
Balangbe nani hung karungnu kaan bi lungsanu kachaak kutthop runnu, pon naat kasanu sin basoinu pakhat atiluga lungsianu tanaatnu pon naat sin basoinu pakhat hung nge dabe,

nanina takhwang toga pon naat kasanu sin basoinu bating, “Nang abeiya kasanu kaong riak pi ong ngo” atiluga lungsianu batingna, “Nang abeiya han ong ngo” ati mak tabe, “Nang aket kim bi ongtaro” diga rinne dabe,
nani lak pi kathing aih toga kasianu sungna chong tonu makpo?

Kriangnu unao rwan ga, ngai thang ngo, talei ram bi lungsianu nun ding bani balumsat pi lungsa dam lang khatle bating kriangnu mi nun lang karen thangnu krwang talei rakhum lwak langna Rikrwang na nani ding ka thang thangnu makpo?
Atiyeda nanina lungsianu rwan ding balaaye, lungsanu rwanna nani ding gotnu khatle nani ding chongsempuba rwan meithaan bi kai thangnu makpo?
Nani ding kou thangnu kaliannu meng ding rin basiatnu ga bani nun makpo?
Bathiangnu Chongdip nung suiga, “Nangna nainnai lounai ding nazan ding danga kriang ding gaye” dinu krwang chongtan ga nanina pi hung tang nge dabe nani to chui rwe.
Atiyeda nani lak pi kathing aih tonu towe dabe nani noh to rwe, atiga chongtanna nani ding koi maan amnu mi pi to rwe.
Balangbe tudannu pakhatna chongtan bing zeiluga, khat pi ket basuiye dabe maan chongtan bing zei maknu to rwe.
Balangbe atiga rinne, “Lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to mako” diga rinnu maan gana “Mi athat mako” diga le rinne. Nangna lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to mak peida mi athate dabe nang chongtan zei maknu miye.
Atibriakpina rang tonu chongtan gana chong kasem dingnu mi nun danga nani kabiawo khatle chwan le towo.
Balangbe phaangkriang thei maknu bating ga, phaangkriang maakka chong kasemlune, phaangkriangna chongsem ding ngamme.
Unao rwan ga, tudannu pakhatna bakhou balumsat amme diga rinluga chwan to make dabe, haga pa-aam bathaang ambo? Babalumsat kana bating kannu ngambo?
Naunao pakhat mak tabe, nawa nanao pakhatna sin basoi maakka khatle ni khat munsaak maakka ongnu kaan bi
nani lak pi pakhatna bani khou, “Nang dai bazaangga sero, lum le lum dingro khatle bon le imba dingro” diga rinluga bani pum lang kanaanu to thang make dabe hagana pa-aam tongnu ambo?
Hadanga balumsat ka le chwan sui make dabe baraantoza thinuwe.
Kakhanno, mi khatna le rinlune, “Nakhou balumsat amme, akhou chwan amme, naom chwan sui maknu balumsat ka akhou pi muwo atiga eina le abalumsat ka achwanna nakhou pi mu thangne.”
Rikrwang khatcha amme dinu nangna balumsaye, haga baze rwe; ri kasia nunna le balumsaye atiga bani kachi kathoke.
Atiyeda he kapangnu mi, chwan sui maknu balumsat ka thinuwe dinu nang thei nwambo?
Ani pa Abraham na basa kapaisa Isaac ting rikhaang riak pi pi swaknu kaan bi bachwan gana bating pi baze thangnu makpo?
Babalumsat ka chwan le diga se bacham ngaake khatle chwan gana babalumsat ting pi bachang thang nge dinu nanina muwe.
Bathiangnu Chongdip ka hung tang lang naye, “Balangbe Abraham na Rikrwang ding balumsa rwe, hagana bating bazenu diga chak thang rwe” khatle bating, “Rikrwang baan” diga kou rwe.
Atibriakpina mi khat ting balumsat chana makka bachwan paan bina pi baze thang nge dinu anina muwe.
Hadanga rangwangnu Rahab na le chonglang rwan ding lou thangluga bani ding lampui katei la kai thang rwe; atiga bating pi baze thangnu makpo?
Balangbe katha maaknu pumna thinu ga danga chwan sui maknu balumsat kale thinuwe.
Aunao rwan ga, ani lu chung bi cheksinnu chongsem ta thanglune dinu theiga, nani mi taswang khakna bachu thangnu nun to mako.

Balangbe ani pum brum bariak bing bi ket basuiye. Tudannu khatna chongbiak laabiak pi ket basuiye, tudannu khatna chongbiak laabiak pi ket basui make dabe, maan bachang sanu miye; maan bapum ding raak ngamnu miye.
Phaang ngo, anina raqwan ding ga chong zei langna bani mun bi thin mun khap thang nge, hagana bani ding anina kai bariknu ngamme.
Li bing ding ga le phaang ngo, haga lian take; kanatnu thiraang raang hung beida lipui ding ga kasinnu li hwan thing gana bapuba maanna se nwamnu pek la pi seye.
Hadanga balei heiya le misa pum om kasinnu naat khate, heiyana lian toga chong tamga kabiaye; phaang ngo, kasinnu meirikna kamaang ding rou sate.
Baleiya meiye, sa maknuna sipnu talei ramme, heiyana pum naat nun lak pi khat toga pum tamun ding to tanaate atiga ani kum lampui ding rou sate khatle hei ding meina rou sate.
Balangbe khouring bachaat bing, basa, barun khatle tuipui bi khu chaat bing ding misana pi tehnu ngamme.
Atiyeda balei ding pakhatchanale laaknu ngam make; heiya laaknu ngam maknu, sa maknu khatle mi thi zanu huna sipe.
Anina ani Pa Rikrwang ding baleina swanne atiluga Rikrwang na Baman kapwaga dam thangnu mi nun ding le anina seng nge.
Mun khatcha bina swankanu khatle chongseng swake, unao rwan ga, ha bing ga ati mak ting gaye.
Tuipwak in khatcha bina kathumnu le kakhaanu tui lwang swak kabo?
Unao rwan ga, tacham kung bina talwan kraa mak tabe, drakha zem bina tacham kraa kraagabo? Hadanga tuipwak in khatcha bina bachi tui le bathiangnu tui lwang swak make.
Nani lak pi ningtingnu khatle bakaba theinu tubo? Maanna kasanu lamchat khatle ningting bina swaknu bangiamnu thotna chwan toga lung inmu ding ngo.
Atiyeda nani sung bi kakhaanu, antiamnu khatle balaangza baloinu gana lian to mako khatle bazenu maitwang bi chong karwak mako.
Haba ningting ga basaang lana tanu make atiyeda haga talei ram, zan pum khatle ri kasia khou naye.
Balangbe antiamnu khatle kae kanaanu amnu riak pi ga kahung kaba thei maknu kasianu bing amme.
Atiyeda basaang lana tanu ningting gabe kama bi bathiangnu, dai bazaangnu, sung bazaangnu, talu theinu, phaangkriangna sipnu, kasanu kraa, kathing aih to maknu khatle sathot to maknu hei bing nge.
Dai bazaang lang chwan tonu nunna dai bazaangnu tachi bwan thangnu paan bina ririak senu kraa ga lwak rwe.
Nani lak pi kraan saraan khatle kabit kamainu inlamna hungnubo? Haga nani pum om naat bingna lozaannu za ding bathai briakpina swaknu makpo?
Nani ra-aamme, lousu make, nanina mi athate, antiamme; atiyeda lousu make. Nani kabit kamaiye, kraan katwake atiyeda nani lang maake; balangbe nanina hweini make.
Nanina ni beida lou thang make, balangbe nanina nani om karo rangaa bi to braan langna baze makka niye.
Nani rwan mei rwan basan laannu mi nun ga, talei ram ding baan tonu ga Rikrwang ding munanuwe dinu nani thei makpo? Atiga tudannu talei ram ding baan tonu maan ga Rikrwang ding munanu mi towe.
Atibriakpina Bathiangnu Chongdipna rin thangnu ga bahaa bi zung nge diga nani baningbo? Atiga rinne, “Ani khou lung ongnu Katha gana ani ding antiamga ongme” dinu nani thei makpo?
Atiyeda maanna ani lang phaangkriang inkuga pi thang nge. Atibriakpina maanna rinne, “Rikrwang na phun liannu ding za make, Atiyeda sung bangiam theinu nun lang be Maanna phaangkriang pi thang nge.”
Atibriakpina nani Rikrwang thwei bi ong ngo, Diabol ding kakhang ngo; atiye dabe maan nani khouna pak tamlune.
Rikrwang khou banai hung ngo atiye dabe Maanna le nani khou banai hunglune. Noh mi nun ga, nani kut kasin bathiang ngo, sung khoranu naniga, nani sung to bathiang ngo,
kakouwo, chunto lo siawo khatle chapo, nani banuiga chunto lo sianu khatle nani karoga chuntonu bi pi gonno.
Pukraangba mikphaang bi nani bangiamtawo atiye dabe nani ding pi basaangka thanglune.

Unao rwan ga, nani khatna khat ting khanrai kale mako. Tudannu khatna bau banao ding khanrainu khatle chong kasemnu nun ga chongtan ding khanrainuwe khatle chongtan ding chong kasemnu miye. Atiga chongtan ding chong kasemme dabe nang ha ding ga zeinu make atiyeda nang chong kasemnu miye.
Atiga chongtan ga pi thangnu, kan thang ngamnu khatle to braan ngamnu Pakhatcha zung nge atiyeda mi khat ting chong kasemnu nang tubo?
Aniya mak tabe “Inswan anina ula mak tabe hala nampui laga seluga habei ga sangwan khat ongluga ani langgonne khatle siantong baloine” diga rinnu naniga phaang ngo,
inswan pa-aam swaklu dingbo dinu nani thei make. Nani kum ga pa-aambo? Nani kum ga batak khatcha phaangmuluga braan lat tamnu bakhut ka dannuwe.
Haba hut lang nanina atiga rin ding gaye, “Pukraangba na baningnuwe dabe ani ringga ongne, heiya mak tabe haga tone.”
Atiyeda atun nanina lian toga karo ongme atiga lian tonu bing ga sa maknuwe.
Atibriakpina tudannu pakhatna kasanu to lang theinu atiyeda to maknu maan ga noh to rwe.”
Ngaiyo, lungsanu rwan ga, nani lu chung bi hungnanu riangre lo siat langna nani chapo, chap brung hingga chapo.
Nani lan ga tanaat rwe, nani pon naat bing ga sum sa rwe.
Nani om kachaak tangka bing le taso sat rwe, taso gana nani maitwang bi sake tolu rwe khatle hagana nani ding meina rounu danga nani zan ding sakhutlune. Nanina kakhamnu ni lang lan khom thang rwe.

Phaang ngo, nanina nani lou bi chwantok mi nun om lo man ga rou siaga khaak thang rwe, hagana nani lu chung bi pao swak rwe. Atiga lou aat mi nunna chapnu khwan ga Kangamnu Rikrwang kana bi ngaisu hung rwe.
Nani nun talei ram bi lozaan ga, lung impham phaaga nani ding athatnu ni lang danga, nani sung ding bakot lianga lung ongme.
Nanina koi maaknu ding pi koi thang rwe khatle Bating athat sat rwe atiyeda Maanna nani ding kakhang make.
Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, Pukraangba na hung mak basaan nani khaang theiyo. Phaang ngo, lou mi gana baman kungnu talei ram tapaan langna karangnu khatle ngiannu khwasun ding ngaak ongme.
Hadanga nanina le khaang theiyo khatle nani lungning pi tipo. Balangbe Pukraangba na hung dingnu bakaan ga nai rwe.
Unao rwan ga, nani ding chong to mak lang nani khatna khat ting tu tu tam tam kale mako. Phaang ngo, Chongsempu ga inkhaanmun bi han ong rwe.
Unao rwan ga, Pukraangba meng bi chong kabia ngaaknu thiamting rwan ding baningsuwo, banina riangre khaangnu khatle khaang theinu ding ga bazeiyo.

Phaang ngo, batak takka, khaang theinu rwan ding anina aih sanu diga kouwe. Job na khaang theinu lang bi nanina ngaisu rwe khatle Pukraangba na bataang la balaang pi thang damnu lang bi le nanina ngaisu rwe; dinuba, Pukraangba heiya phaangkriangna sipnu khatle kriang theinuwe.
Unao rwan ga, hei bing chung bi nanina tambaan talei khatle katei katei ding kaisingga karen mako. Atiga chongsem bi ta thang mak lang nanina, “O” di dabe “O” diyo, “Make” di dabe “Make” diyo.
Nani lak pi tudannu riangre khaang ongnu ambo? Maan hweini ding ngo, tudannu karo ongnu ambo? Maanna swankanu laa to ding ngo.
Nani lak pi tudannu naanu suibo? Maanna rupkathan om chwan phunnu rwan ding kouluga Pukraangba meng bi bakhou thao kanun thangluga banina balaang kalum thang ding ngo.
Balumsaga hweininuna naanu ding ga pi sa thanglune khatle Pukraangba na bating pi nat thanglune khatle maanna noh inza to ngaaklena bating kok thanglune.
Nani ding naanu pi sa thang lang khat khat om koi maan indao kaleluga khatna khat lang kalum thang kaleyo. Ririak senu manpa om rakannu kalumga ngam lianne.
Elijah ani chaang le bachamnu mi ngaake khatle maanna khwa sun mak lang sung khutka hweininu kaan bi talei chung bi sangwan inthum tha karuk khwa tui ta mak ngaake.
Atiga maanna kalum lat rwe. Haba kaan bi tambaanna khwa pi suntaluga taleina bakraa pi kraa lat rwe.
Unao rwan ga, nani lak pi tudannu pakhatna bazenu bina lampui semaannu bating mi khatna pi han hung late dabe,
noh mi khat ting lampui semaannu bina pi han hung latnu maan gana, thinu bina katha khat ting kan thang rwe; atiga noh bing ding thinlem thang rwe dinu maanna thei ding ngo.
Jisu Christa om chonglang mi Peter eina Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia khatle Bithynia taram bing bi lung impaan ga man mi toga lung ongnu nun,

Pa Rikrwang na kamaga thei chaak thangnu nung suiga Katha om to bathiang thangnu bi, chong zeinu to dam lang khatle Jisu Christa om thina kazin thang lang ka thang thangnu nani khou phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu sipsaga pi thangnu to ding ngo.

Jisu Christa na thinu nun lak pina ring thou lat tamnu paan bina Baom tasiatnu phaangkriang nung suiga ani ding ringnu bachun bi pi pon kathan thang latnu Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Pa Rikrwang ding swan ding ngo.
Rikrwang na tambaan la nani lang thang ongnu braan lat lanu, to basiat latlanu khatle baraanta latlanu rakhum ga nani lang khaak thang rwe.
Haga Maanna kakhamnu bakaan bi indao thang lang daan thang ongnu ringriak ka lousu lang balumsanu paanna Rikrwang om ngamna ani ding rakhi thang rwe.
Atun bakaan kasemza lang bathaang amnu nung suiga riangre kanangnu bachaat inzana nani ding sung pi riangre ngaak peida habei ga nani karoga ongme.

Haba riangre kanangnu ga naom balumsat ting tamphaang ongnuwe. Jisu Christa ding indao thangnu lumik pi naom balumsat ka meina tamphaang ngaak peida braan zanu kachaak ma kung inkunu swanka thangnu, takung tazeinu khatle lwat liannu toga dou lang nge.
Nanina Bating mu mak ngaak peida Bating kriang nge. Nanina Bating mu mak ngaak peida Bating balumsaye. Atibriakpina nani rin ngam maknu karo karowe khatle lwat liannuna sipe.
Balangbe nani Bakhou balumsanu kraa, nani ringriak ka lousuga nani karowe.
Heiba ringriak lang bi, nani khou hung dingnu phaangkriang lang bi kamaga rin basaam thang ngaaknu thiamting rwanna zong minga zong ngaake.

Bani khou amnu Christa om Katha gana Christa na riangre kanangnu khaang dingnu bing khatle haba nung bi lousu dingnu lwat liannu bing rin basaam thangnu ga tubo mak tabe intonu kaan bi lu dingbo dinu lang bi banina zong ngaake.

Tambaan lana langtanu Katha Bathiangnu paanna sacham kasam se ongnu nunna nani khou rin thangnu chamna bani rin basaam thangnu ga bani langza make dinu Rikrwang na bani khou indao thang ngaake. Tambaan chonglang nunna le haba chwan bing om lang bi inkuga zong nwam ngaake.
Atibriakpina nani sung ga chwan to lang daan ong ngo. Naraan to za napum ding karak theiyo. Jisu Christa ding indao thangnu kaan bi phun hung dingnu phaangkriang lang bi nani sung thang ngo.
Nani chong zeinu sa rwan danga thou damnu kaan bi nani pumna bathainu bi thei makka to thang damnu bi ga nani bazei lat lanro.
Atiyeda nani ding kou thangnu Maan ga bathiangnu danga nani lamchat bing bi bathiangnu towo.
Balangbe atiga hiak thang nge, “Nani bathiangnu to ding gaye balangbe Ei bathiangnuwe.”
Kathing aih to makka mi bing ding bani chwan nung suiga chong kasem thang ongnu Bating nanina Apa diga kouwe dabe nani man mi toga lung ong basaan nani lamchat bing bi Bating kachiga lung ngo.
Nani pu pa rwan khouna lousunu bathaang maaknu lamchat pina nani ding ran swak thangnuwa braan zanu pot, tangka mak tabe kachaak tannuna make,
atiyeda koi maaknu mak tabe bahiak maaknu zao saza dannu Christa om baman kungnu thi gana ran swak thangnuwe dinu theiga Bating kachiga lung ngo.
Talei ram dam mak baleina Christa ding kamaga thei thang ngaak rwe. Atiyeda nani lang tong langna kakhamnu dat pi indao thangnuwe.
Bating thinu bina pi ring thou thangga Balwat pi lian thangnu Rikrwang khou nani Christa paanna balumsa rwe. Hagana nani om balumsanu khatle baningnu ga Rikrwang khou amme.
Katha paan bina bazenu ding ga nanina zeinu bi nau nanao rwan ding bataknu kriang lang to bathiang thang briakpina khatna khat ting nani sung kalan lana kriang thukka kriang ngo.
Balangbe braan zanu makka baraan lat lanu mu, ringnu khatle khwa seiga am ongnu Rikrwang om chong paanna nani ding pi pon kathan thang rwe.
Balangbe “Mi bing nga thingna dannu zung nge. Bani om lwat bing ga le thingna louna paan dannuwe. Thingna le baowei taye, reipaan le paanchwei late.
Atiyeda Pukraangba chong gabe khwa seiga amme.” Heiya nani khou kasam thangnu sacham gaye.
Atibriakpina kasianu bing, rou sianu bing, sathot tonu, antiamnu khatle rwan ding nung ma khanrainu bing ga asatluga,
naosen angaa rwan danga, bathiangnu chong om bathiangnu sen kanu tui ga bathaiyo atiga hagana nani ding pi lian thou thang lang nge.
Balangbe nanina batak takka Pukraangba be phaangkriang theiye dinu batem drwe.
Mi nunna asat swak thangnu atiyeda Rikrwang na ka thang thangnu khatle kungnu ringnu lung Bakhou nanina hungluga,
nani le ringnu lung danga Jisu Christa paanna Rikrwang khou lou thang zanu katha om rikhaang pot toga kat lang bathiangnu thiamting rwan to lang nani ding katha in toga bacha ka rwe.
Balangbe Bathiangnu chongdip pi heiya amme, “Phaang ngo, Eina Zion bi kathang swak thangnu baman kungnu intaki lung pui khat som thang rwe, Khatle Bakhou balumsanu mi ga kazaknu doula rwe.”
Atibriakpina heiba lung ding balumsanu maan ga baman kungnuwe; atiyeda balumsa maknu nun lang “In tonu nunna asat swak thangnu lung gana Kungnu intaki lung imbei rwe,”

khatle “Heiya mi nun ding ket pi basui zanu lung khatle mi nun ding pi balum zanu lung puiye.” Chong ding bani zei mak briakpina bani ket basui rwe. Atiga habei ga ket basui lang Rikrwang na bani ding ka thang thang rwe.

Atiyeda nani ding zingnu bina Baom tasiatnu baan bi kou swak thangnu Rikrwang om lwat ka kasam se lang kathang swak thangnu nun, krwang om thiamting rwan, bathiangnu chaat khatle Rikrwang om bakung tonu mi nunne.
Kama meithaan nani Rikrwang mi nun mak ngaake. Atiyeda atun nani Rikrwang mi nun zung rwe. Meithaan nani phaangkriang lousu mak ngaake. Atiyeda atunbe phaangkriang ga lousu rwe.
Kriangnu nun ga, Katha om maitwang bi katwak ongnu zanti pum om bathainu bina impaan swak lang mi katei khatle bazin mi danga lung ongnu nani khou eina kachui thangnuwe.

Nani kasianu chwan tonu nun danga nani lu chung bi Gentile rwanna rin basiat ongnu bi ga nani nun om sanu chwan bing langna ha ding phaangluga Baom chongtok ni Rikrwang lwat pi lian lang nani om lamchat ka bani lak pi saga ong ngo.
Atibriakpina Pukraangba lang chungna mi nunna bachanu chongtan thwei bi ong ngo. Ngam amnu krwang thwei bi le ong ngo.
Kasianu chwan tonu nun ding laak thang lang khatle kasanu chwan tonu mi nun ding swanka thang lang lang hung thangnu taleipuba rwan thwei bi le ong ngo.
Balangbe kapangnu nunna thei maknu ding sanu tonuna nanina pi ong thiap thiap thangnuwa Rikrwang na baningnuwe.
Nani rang tonu mi nun danga lung ngo. Atiyeda nani om rang tonu ga kasianu chwan ding thinlem lang sizin mako. Atiyeda Rikrwang swak rwan danga lung ngo.
Mi bing ding takhwang towo. Unao rwan ding kriang ngo. Rikrwang ding kachiyo. Krwang ding takhwang towo.
Swak rwan, nani bapuba rwan thwei bi kachiga ong ngo. Kasanu khatle sung bazaangnu rwan thwei biza makka kasianu mi nun thwei bi le ong ngo.
Balangbe tudannu pakhatna Rikrwang meng lang chungna bazek makka riangre khaangga sung riangreye dabe haga swanka lang khopnuwe.

Balangbe nani noh to briakpina nani ding bweinu kaan bi nani khaang theiga khaang nge dabe hagana pa-aam tongnu bi basing sem thang lang amgabo? Atiyeda nanina kasanu ga to briakpina riangrenu kaan bi nani khaang theiga khaang nge dabe haga Rikrwang meithaan bi swanka lang khopnuwe.
Balangbe habei ga nani ding kou thangnuwe. Balangbe Baket kaam nung sui lang bazei zanu lampui bacha thangga Christa na le ani lang riangre kanang khaang thang rwe.
“Maan noh to make. Bamun bina chong karwaknu chong kabia dam make.”

Balu chung bi kasianu chong kabia thang beida Maan kasianu chong kabia katak thang make. Maan riangre kanang khaang damnu kaan bi Maan bani ding basi dam make. Atiyeda bazenu chongsempuba kut pi Bating bachoi thang damme.
Ani noh pek la thiluga ririak senu pek la ring dam lang cross pi Maan bahak, Bapum bahak pi ani noh phun thang rwe. Baom tazam bing paan bina nani ding pi sa thang rwe.
Balangbe nani lampui semaan damnu zao rwan dan ngaak rwe. Atiyeda atunbe nani Zaosiannupa khatle nani katha ding Sianthangnupa pam bi hung lat rwe.
Haga danga mei rwan ga, nani basan rwan bahak thwei bi ong ngo. Hagana tudannu Rikrwang chong zei maknu basan rwan bahak ting, chong kabia mak ngaak peida bani mei om lamchat paanna,
banina nani om takhwang amnu lamchat khatle bathiangnu gana bani ding kai hung thang lang nge.
Nani om tapon tonu ga langkaang om phaangsanu sam phannu, kachaak mak tabe pon naat sin basoinu za gana to mak ting ngo.
Atiyeda Rikrwang mikphaang bi baman kungnu, braan lat lanu lan, sung bazaangnu khatle thiap thiapnu katha gana nani om basungnu mi ding ga tapon towo.
Balangbe kama meithaan Rikrwang ding balumsanu bathiangnu kamaisa nunna le bani basan bahak thwei bi ongnuna tapon to damme.
Sarah na Abraham thwei bi ong ga bating Pukraangba diga kou ngaake. Nanina le sanu towe dabe khatle katei rwanna kachinu ding kachi make dabe nani le basa rwan to rwe.

Haga danga basan rwan, nani mei rwan ding bani sonnuwe khatle ringnu om phaangkriang lou bachamnu rwanne dinu thei thangga lung ngo. Mei rwan ding takhwang toga lung bachammo. Hagana nani om hweininu ding ga pi kham nam mak lang nge.
Kakhamnu bi, nani sung khatcha towo, khat khat ting kriang kaleyo. Unao rwan dan kriang ngo, kriang thang theiga khatle bangiam taga lung ngo.

Kasianu lang kasianu thun lat mako, kasianu chong kabianu lang kasianu chong kabia katak mako atiyeda haba hut lang rithoi pi thangbiyo. Balangbe Rikrwang na habei ga nani ding kou thang rwe. Hagana nani rithoi lousu lang nge.
Balangbe “Tudannu ringnu kum ding bathainu Khatle kasanu lumik ting mu nwamnu maan ga kasianu chong kabianu bina bablei karak thei ding ngo, Khatle chong karwaknu bina bamun khwam ding ngo.
Maan kasianu bina kanei hung latluga kasanu to lat ting ngo, Maan dai bazaangnu ding zong ga, dai bazaang lang karam ding gaye.
Balangbe Pukraangba na ririak senu mi nun ding phaang ongme, Khatle bani hweinik ding ga katak thang ongme, Atiyeda kasianu tonu mi nun ding Pukraangba na phaang batanne.”
Nanina kasanu lang chungna sung khutka ong nge dabe nani ding kasianu to ngam dingnu tu ambo?
Atiyeda nanina ririak senu lang chungna riangre kanangnu khaang ngaak peida nani aih sanu nunne. “Bani om basinu ding kachi mako khatle sung katop mako.”

Atiyeda Pukraangba ding Rikrwang nge diga nani sung bi tipka balumsawo. Nani sung bi amnu bachun om lang bi ngainu mi bing khou sung bazaangga khatle takhwang amga katak lang bakaan bathinza bi daan ong ngo.
Atiga nani ding kasianu tonu mi nun danga pi kazaknu kaan bi khatle nani sung bathiangga kataknu kaan bi Christa khou nani om kasanu lamchat ting rin basiatnu nun ga kazaknu dou lang nge.
Balangbe Rikrwang na baningnuwe dabe kasianu chwan tonu lang chungna riangre khaang damnu ma kasanu tonu bi riangre khaangnuna sa inku dingnuwe.

Balangbe Christa Bazenupa le baze maknu ani ding zanti pum bi pi thi thangga khatle Katha bi pi ring thangga Rikrwang khou Maanna phun hung thang lang noh bing lang chungna riangre khaang thang oweiza khaang thang rwe,
haba Katha paan bina Maanna qwan in bi amnu katha bing khou seluga bani khou rin indao thang rwe.

Haba katha bing ga Noah dat pi Rikrwang na khaang seiga ngaak ongnu kaan bi chong zei mak tamnu katha rwan gaye. Haba kaan bi Noah na lipui ga bacha ong ngaake. Haba li bi ga mi titcha ding dinuba, mi pat kariat cha ding tui bina kan thang ngaake.

Haga danga baptize to thangnuna nani ding kan thang rwe. Mi pum bina tanaatnu kasin bathiangnu dannu make atiyeda Jisu Christa ring thounu paan bina Rikrwang pek la sung bathiangga katak thangnu naye.
Jisu Christa tambaan lamang kaluga Rikrwang om kut inchang la ong ongme. Tambaan chonglang bing khatle ngam choinu bing khatle ngam amnu bing ding Ba thwei bi thang rwe.

Balangbe Christa na bapum bi riangrenu ani lang khaang thang dam briakpina nani le hadannu sung gana kraan pon naat tanga sin basoiyo. Balangbe pum bi riangre khaang damnu maan ga noh chwan tolan rwe.
Hagazo maan ga zati pum bi ring ong basaan misana zanti pum om bathainu lang lung lat makka Rikrwang na baningnu bi lung nge.

Balangbe bakaan khat pi Gentile rwan om bathainu anina toga ong ngaaknu ga khop rwe. Dinuba imbet boulaanu, pumna bathainu, zu kalonu, lung rangwangnu, zu in karungluga chongswak laswaknu khatle batannu ri katha kalumnu bi se ong ngaake.
Hei lang bi nanina bani nung lung braan basiatnu lung lung lat mak briakpina bani lang teithak thaknuwe diga baning rwe khatle nani ding rin basiat rwe.
Atiyeda ringnu khatle thinu ding chong kasem dingnu bani Bakhou singchak pi ding gaye.

Hei langna mi nunna sacham ga atun thiga ongnu nun khou le kasam thang nge. Haga mi pum bi misa om chaang nung suiga bani ding chong kasem lang nge atiyeda katha bi Rikrwang na baningnu nung suiga ring lang nge.
Pot bing om loi dingnu kaan ga nai hung rwe. Atibriakpina hweininu bi barak theiga, pum karak theiga ong ngo.
Hei bing lu chung bi nani khat khat ting inkuga kriang kaleyo. Balangbe “kriangnuna noh inza ding thinlem thang nge.”
Khatna khat ting rinrai kale makka pi sa pi in thang theiyo.
Nani mi bingna balaang balaang leithwan lousu damnu nung suiga Rikrwang om tei teinu phaangkriang om kasanu chonglang mi khat toga mi bing lang chwanlaang tonu bi sizinno.

Tudannuna chong kabiaye dabe maan Rikrwang om chong kabianu toga kabia dam ding ngo. Tudannuna chwanlaang towe dabe maan Rikrwang na pi thangnu nat paanna to dam ding ngo. Heiya lwat lianu khatle ngam khwa seiga Baom tonu Jisu Christa paan bina balang bing bi Rikrwang lwat pi lian lang nge. Amen.
Kriangnu nun, nani ding tamphaang lang nani lu chung bi mei danga tamphaangnu hungnu kaan bi haga nani khou teithak thaknu khat hungnuwe diga baning mako.
Atiyeda Christa ding lwat liannu bi indao swaknu lumik pi nani karo rangaanuna sip lang Baom riangrenu dam suilou briakpina nani karowo.

Christa meng lang chungna mi nunna nani ding pi kazak thang nge dabe nani aih sanuwe. Balangbe lwat liannu khatle Rikrwang katha ga nani khou ong thang rwe. Banina bating rin basiate; atiyeda nanina Christa lwat pi lian rwe.
Nani mi athatnu mak tabe baru sanu mak tabe kasianu chwan tonu mak tabe mi nun om lang bi mi nun ding to katopnu mi nun to briakpina riangrenu khaang mako.
Atiyeda Christian khat toga tudannu pakhatna riangre khaang nge dabe maan kazak mak ting gaye atiyeda heiba lang biya Rikrwang lwat pi lian ding ngo.
Balangbe Rikrwang om inkhun bi chong kasem thou dingnu bakaan ga hung rwe. Ani khouna kamaga chong to thouwe dabe Rikrwang sacham ding zei maknu nun om kakhamnu ga intolu dingbo?
Atiga hiak thang nge, “Ririak senu mi ding tangga kung takka kan thang nge dabe, Rikrwang ding kachi maknu khatle noh mi ga intolu dingbo?”
Atibriakpina Rikrwang baning nung suiga riangre khaang ongnu nun gana balumsa zanu Damthangnupa khou bani katha bing ding kasanu chwan toga bachoi thang dam ding ngo.
Nani lak pi chwan phunnu rwan ding, Christa na riangre khaangnu bing om sake khatle indao thang dingnu balwat liannu bi badam suilou dingnu ei le, chwan phunnu khat toga kachui thang nge.
Nani lak pi amnu Rikrwang om zao nun ding phaangsin thang ngo, to maknu za maknu danga tonu makka to nwamga towo; haga baze maknu sian bathainu lang makka sung khutka sian thang ngo.
Nani khou bachoi thang damnu nun lu chung bi nam danga tonu bapuba dan makka atiyeda zao nunna sui bazei zanu towo.
Atiga Zao siannu Balu tonu ding ga indao thangnu kaan bi braan lat lanu lwat liannu luthop ka nani lousulune.

Hadanga babwa rwan, nani le patso rwan thwei bi ong ngo. Nani talununa pon naat tanga sin basoiluga khat le khat thwei bi ong kaleyo. Balangbe “Phun liannu nun ding Rikrwang na za make, Atiyeda talu tanu mi nun khou phaangkriang pi thang nge.”
Atibriakpina nani ding bakaan chabi Maanna kai basaang ka thang lang Rikrwang om ngam amnu kut thwei bi,
nani om sung tamnu ga Bakhou bazwan thangga talu tawo. Balangbe Maan nani lang banang thang ongme.
Nani pum ding karak theiga khatle barak theiga ong ngo. Balangbe nani om munanu Diabol gana baraam ongnu takhu krwang danga tupai khat ting sa sat lang zong koi ongme.
Bathemnu ding kakhangga khatle talei ram bi amnu nani unao rwan le hei dannu riangre bing nga khaang ongme dinu theiga balumsanu bi tipka hanno.

Atiyeda Christa Jisu paan bina Baom khwa seinu lwat liannu bi nani ding kou thangnu phaangkriang bing om Rikrwang na nani bakaan titcha riangre khaangnu nung nani ding pi khopsa thanglune, pi tip thanglune, pi nat thanglune khatle bachaka thanglune.
Lwat liannu khatle ngam khwa seiga Balaang to ding ngo. Amen.

Nani ket kahan to ongnu Rikrwang om phaangkriang nga bataknuwe diga kachui thangga khatle sake pi ga eina balumsa lang khopnu unao khate diga baning ongnu Silvanus om sui paang thangnu paan bina nani khou toiga eina hiaknuwe.
Nani le diga kathang swak bacham thangnu Babylon bi ongnu kamaisa le asa kapaisa Mark na le nani ding kalumme.
Nani cham kriangnu om kaput thangnu le bachamga khat le khat kalum kaleyo. Jisu Christa khou ongnu nani mi bing khou Rikrwang na dai bazaangnu pi thang ding ngo. Amen.
Jisu Christa om swak khatle chonglang Simon Peter eina ani Rikrwang khatle Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa om ririak senu paan bina baman kungnu balumsat bachamnu lousu damnu nani khou hiaknuwe.
Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu ding theinu bi phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou pi inku kanu to ding ngo.

Lwat liannu khatle Basat pi ani ding kou thang damnu Bating theinu paan bina ringnu bi khatle ririak senu kum bi lung dingnu lang ani khou bathaang amnu bing ga Baom tambaan om ngam paanna pi thang rwe.

Heiba om paanna Maanna ani khou tasiatnu khatle kungnu chongren ga pi thang rwe, heiba chongren bing paan bina pum om bathainu bina swaknu talei ram bi amnu braannu bina dwak swakluga Rikrwang om chaang bi badam suilou bachamlune.
Hei langna nani karam rakanga balumsanu bi khei sanu, khei sanu bi ga theinu,
theinu bi ga pum ding karaknu, pum ding karaknu bi ga khaang theinu khatle khaang theinu bi ga ri baning chuinu,
ri baning chuinu bi ga unao kriang khatle unao kriang bi ga kriangnu pi inku kawo.
Balangbe hei bing nga nani khou amme dabe khatle nani khou inku thouwe dabe, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding theinu bi bathaang maaknu khatle baat lat maknu kraa kraa maknu tolaye.
Balangbe hei bing maaknu mi ga mik chonu miye. Maan mu namla ngam make khatle thou damnu kaan bi om banoh bi ga Rikrwang na to bathiang thang drwe dinu maan banim rwe.

Atibriakpina unao rwan, nani ding kou thangnu khatle ka thang thangnu ga bataknuwe dinu thei lang rakanga karammo. Balangbe nanina hei bing nga towe dabe nani impha ni beida ket basui lat tingnu om lan rwe.
Balangbe ani Pukraangba khatle Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa om khwa seinu krwang talei bi khut tingnu lampui ga sipsaga pi thanglune.

Atibriakpina hei bing nga nanina theiga khatle nani khou pi thang damnu bazenu bi ga nani tipka han ong ngaak peida, eina nani khou bakaan bathinza bi hei bing lang bi pi baningsu lang thou to maknu tolaye.
Heiba pwan in bi ei ring ong basaan, hei bing nga nani khou pi thei thangnuwa bazenuwe diga baning nge.
Balangbe ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa na pi mu thangnu danga aom pwan in ding bathan sat thang dingnu bakaan ga nai rwe dinu theiye.
Atiga akum loi damnu nung nanina hei bing nga bakaan bathin baningsu ong lang ei rakanga karamne.

Balangbe anina nani khou ngam khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa na hung dingnu lang bi pi thei thangnu kaan bi anina mun theiga pwaknu meiri nung suiga rin dam make atiyeda ani Balwat liannu ding mikna munu nunne.

Balangbe basaang kataknu Lwat liannu khouna “Heiya Eina kriangnu Sa Kapaisa ye. Eina Balu chung bi pem thang rwe” diga rinnu khwan khatna hungnu kaan bi Maan Pa Rikrwang khouna takung tazeinu khatle Lwat liannu lousu ngaake.
Ani bathiangnu rammwan bi Maan le diga ongnu kaan bi tambaan lana paota damnu haba khwan bahak ka ani ngaisu rwe.
Heiya nani sung bi louthwan thouga louthwan insi than swak mak basaan zingnu riak pi baan ongnu baan ga danga nanina zei chuiga ongnu thiamting rwan om chong ga ani khou pi tip thang rwe.
Kama katak pi heiya theiyo, dinuba Bathiangnu chongdip pi rin basaam thangnu ga tudannu pakhatna baningnu nung suiga hungnu make.
Balangbe thiamting rwam om rin basaam thangnu chong ga misa om baning bina swaknu make. Atiyeda Rikrwang om bathiangnu mi nun khouna Katha Bathiangnu paan bina pi rin basaam thangnuwe.

Atiyeda kakoinu thiamting rwan mi nun lak pi am ngaake, haga danga to basiat tingnu bachu thangnu katap tonu rwan inkamga phun hung dingnu, bani ding kalei thangnu Pukraangba ding tangga za makka barapka bani raantoza lu chung bi to basiatnu phun hung dingnu kakoinu bachu thangnu mi nun nani lak pi le amlune.
Mi inzana bani om imbet boulaanu lampui ga sui bazei damlune. Bani lang chungna bazenu Lampui ding rin basiatlune.
Bani om ra-aamnu bi banina minamnu chong kabiaga nani ding sizinlune. Bani ding chong kasem lang meithaanna daan thang damnu ga bathaam braanlaye khatle bani om braan dingnu ga in onglaye.
Balangbe Rikrwang na noh chwan to damnu tambaan chonglang nun ding chongsem bina khaak thang makka tartarus pi bazwan thangga zingnu khun bi bang thangga chongsem lang thang damme dabe,

talei ram lui ding chongtok pina khaak thang makluga, ririak senu om chong kasam ongnu Noah le katei pat siari ding ga, Maanna Rikrwang ding kachi maknu talei ram lu chung bi tui lian hungnu kaan bi kan thang nge dabe,
Maanna nung la Rikrwang ding kachi makka lung dingnu nun khou badannu pi to thangga Sodom le Gomorrah namlian ding to braan sat lang chong to thangga tambut pi imbei thang nge dabe
khatle chongtan thouto maknu nun om imbet boulaanu lamchatna sung pi riangre ongnu ririak senu Lot ting Rikrwang na kan thang damme dabe,
(balangbe haba ririak senu manpa ga bani lak pi lung ga bani om chongtan thou to maknu chwan ding ga muluga kani khat khat pi baom ririak senu katha ding rai ong ngaake)
Pukraangba na ririak senu nun ding bathemnu bina into kan thang dingbo khatle ririak se maknu nun ding chongsem lumik om laak thangnu bi tatoga thang dingbo dinu Pukraangba na theiye;

bakung toga zanti pumna bathainu nung suiga se ongnu bathiang maknu kum bi lung ongnu khatle ngam choinu nun ding rin basiat ongnu nun ding nge. Bani sung raangga banina baningnu towe khatle lwat liannu nun maitwang bi kasianu chong kabia lang kachi make.
Atiyeda bani ma nat khatle ngam bi inkunu tambaan chonglang nun hakna Pukraangba meithaan bi bani maitwang bi kasianu chong ga kabia dam make.
Atiyeda bani nun ga namluga athat lang pon thangnu kakoi baze kakhan thei maknu khouring nun danga bani thei maknu lang bi siaga kabiaye. Atiga bani raan toza om kasianu bi mutka braanlune.

Bani om ririak se maknu om lo man ga barapka lousulu rwe. Banina thamlai kaan bi sa inluga gonlaang ongnu ga nungainuwe diga chak thang nge. Bani nani le diga sa in karungnu kaan bi bani om minamnu bi ga gonlaang nge, bani chu thangnu khatle hiak amnu nunne.

Bani mik ka lungkoi lungmaan nuna sipe khatle noh chwan tolan make. Ket kahan tip maknu nun ding banina bathem balumme. Bani sung ga ra-aamnu chwan bi talen rwe khatle bani ga taseng pi thangnu sa rwanne.
Bani bazenu lampui ding bathan thangsialuga lampui katei la thou drwe. Ririak se maknu om lo man ding bathainu Beor sa kapaisa Balaam om lampui la se thou drwe.
Atiyeda Balaam ding baom koi maan langna twei ngaake. Atiga gadana misa khwan bi chong kabiaga thiamting om ri basiatnu ding thing damme.
Haba mi nun ga tui maaknu tuipwak in dannuwe. Atiga thirweina phunse ongnu tambu dannuwe. Rikrwang na bani lang kazingnu om zingnu ga khwa sei lang khaak thang ongme.
Balangbe bathaang maaknu kana maknu chong lian kabialuga kakoinu bi se ongnu nun khouna dwak swaknu nun ding pum om bathainu khatle imbet boulaanuna bathemme.
Banina rang tonu karen thang nge atiyeda bani bahak braan dam dingnu om swak to ongme, balangbe misa pakhat ting ngam damnu gana bating swak pi to thang nge.

Balangbe Pukraangba khatle Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa ding theinu paan bina talei ram om tanaatnu bing bina bani dwak swaknu nung han latka ha bing bi ga man latluga khatle ha bing gana ngam late dabe, kakhamnuna kamanu ma bani lang sia inkuwe.
Balangbe banina ririak senu lampui ga theiluga bani lang pi thangnu bathiangnu zathang bina sehan latnu ma ha ding ga thei maknu gana bani lang sa inku dingnuwe.
“Ui be maanna kalei thangnu ga sa late” khatle “Bok ting tui kasin thangbada talei imphannu bi neng late” diga bazenu chongchakna rin thangnu ga bani khou hung tang rwe.
