Kriangnu nun, heiya eina nani khou kaninu chamthwan toga hiaknuwe. Heiba chamthwan kani bi eina nani ding pi baningsuga nani bathiangnu lungning ding pi barak thou thangnuwe.
Hagazo, bathiangnu thiamting rwanna meithaan rin basaam thang damnu chong bing khatle chonglang nunna rin thangnu Pukraangba khatle Kanthangnupa om zathangga baningsuwo.
Kama kataknu bi heiya theiyo dinuba kakhamnu dat pi bani zanti pumna bathainu bi senu choi banuinu nun hunglune.
Banina rinlune, “Maan hung dingnu om chongren ga inlampai ambo?” Balangbe ani pu pa rwan thi damnu bi gana thouga, talei ram dam thou bi am ngaaknu ga danga pot bing ga atiga am hungnu zung rwe.
Balangbe Rikrwang chong paan bina tambaan na kamaa naa na am hung ngaak rwe khatle talei ram ma tui bina khatle tui bi am hungnu rwe dinu banina theiga theiga banim rwe.
Heiba tuina haba kaan bi am ngaaknu talei ram ding tui pi lian hungluga pi braan drwe.

Atiyeda atun am ongnu tambaan le talei ram ma meina to braan sat lang Rikrwang om chong nung suiga thang ongnuwe. Rikrwang ding kachi maknu mi nun ding chongsem dingnu lumik ni to braan sat lang thang ongnuwe.
Kriangnu nun heiba chong nga banim mako dinuba, Pukraangba lang kani khat heiya sangwan raching khat tannuwe. Atiga sangwan raching khat heiya kani khat tannuwe.

Pukraangba Maanna to thang damnu bing Bachongren pi hung tang lang bazaang rwe diga mi kasemna baningnu danga Maan bazaang make. Atiyeda pakhatcha hakna braannu ding bathai mak briakpina mi bingza sung le hungnu ding bathaiga ani langna khaang sei thang ongnuwe.

Atiyeda Pukraangba lumik ka in baruk mina zingpha hungnu danga hunglune. Habanizo tambaan na baraam basaang nule bachamga to braan sat tamlune. Tambaan bi am ongnu bing ga saanuna pi batui damlune. Atiga talei ram le habei am ongnu chwan bing ga meina rou braan satlune.
Pot bing ga atiga braan dam ding briakpina nani bathiangnu lamchat khatle ririak senu bi,

Rikrwang om lumik hung dingnu ding ga phaangga khatle pi barapka ongnu nun toga, nani tatonu mi nun to dingbo dinu kakhanno. Balangbe haba lumik pi tambaan ga meina bati braan sat tamlune khatle haba sung bi amnu pot bing ga saanuna pi batui damlune.
Atiyeda Bachongren nung suiga aniba ririak senu nunna lung ongnu tambaan kathan khatle talei ram kathan ding ong ngaak ongme.
Atibriakpina kriangnu nun, nanina hei bing swak tingnu ding nga ngaakka ong briakpina dai bazaangnu bi hiak maakka khatle koi maakka Maanna kadou lang karammo.
Ani Pukraangba na khwa sei khaang thang damnu ga ringriak lang nge dinu baning ngo. Kriangnu ani unao Paul na le Rikrwang na bakhou pi thangnu ningting nung suiga nani khou hiak tamnuwe.

Baom chamthwan bing bi le hei lang bi maanna rin thang nge. Haba chamthwan bing bi bakaba thei lang kungnu kasem amme. Atiga thei maknu khatle ket kahan tip maknu nunna, Bathiangnu Chongdip katei riak pi danga pu kabatnu danga bani raantoza lang braannu bi pu kabat ongme.
Atibriakpina kriangnu nun, nani hei bing nga kamaga thei briakpina chongtan thou to maknu mi nun om kakoinu gana kaimaanluga nani ket kahan tipnu bi gana pi balum mak lang nani cheksinno.
Atiyeda ani Pukraangba khatle Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa ding theinu bi khatle phaangkriang bi sing thou ong ngo. Lwat liannu heiya atun khatle khwa seiga Balaang to ding ngo. Amen.
Thoutan bina am ngaaknu, anina ngaisu damnu, ani mikna mu damnu, ani mikna phaang damnu khatle ani kutna banaan su damnu ringnu Chongkaang lang bi
khatle ringnu ga indao thang rwe khatle anina muluga sake pi rwe khatle Bapa le diga am bacham ngaaknu ani khou indao thang damnu khwa sei ringnu ga anina nani khou rin indao thangnuwe.

Anina mu damnu khatle ngaisu damnu ga nani ani le badam lou bacham langna anina nani khou rin indao thangnuwe. Batak takka ani badam lou bachamnu heiya Pa le Basa Kapaisa Jisu Christa le badam lou bachamnuwe.
Nani om karonu ga khopsanu to langna anina hei bing nga nani khou hiaknu rwe.
Bakhouna ngaisu damnu cham nani khou rin indao thangnuwe, dinuba Rikrwang nga baannuwe khatle Bakhou zingnu khatchale maake.
Anina Maan le diga badam lou bachamme diluga zingnu bi se ong nge dabe, ani chong karwaknuwe khatle bazenu ga to make.
Atiyeda Maan baannu bi ongnu ga danga anina le baannu bi ga se ong nge dabe, ani khat le khat badam lou bacham rwe. Basa Kapaisa Jisu Christa om thi gana ani noh bing ding to bathiang thang rwe.
Anina ani khou noh maake diga rinne dabe, ani raanto ani ding minamnuwe khatle ani khou bazenu ga maake.
Anina ani noh rin swake dabe, Maan ani noh kok thang lang khatle ani om ririak se maknu bing bina ani ding to bathiang thang lang Maan balumsa lang khopnu khatle bazenuwe.
Anina ani noh to make diga rinne dabe, Pukraangba ding chong karwaknu pi to rwe khatle Bachong ga ani khou maake.
Kasinnu asa rwan ga, nani nun noh to mak lang heiya eina nani khou hiaknuwe. Tudannu pakhatna noh towe dabe, Pa khou ani lang Hanthangnupa ririak senu Jisu Christa amme.
Atiga Maanna ani noh bing lang pi pemnu rikhaang pote, haga ani noh langza make. Atiyeda talei ram mi bing om noh lang leye.
Anina zathang bing ga zeiye dabe, hagana ani Bating theinuwe dinu anina theiye.
Tudannu pakhatna “Ei Bating theiye” diluga zathang bing ga zei make dabe maan chong karwaknuwe khatle bakhou bazenu ga maake.
Atiyeda tudannu Bachong zeinu, batak takka Rikrwang ding kriangnu bakhou ga khopsanu amme. Heiyana ani Bakhou ongme dinu theiye.
Tudannu pakhatna maan Bakhou chat makka ongme diga rinnu gana, Maanna se ong ngaaknu danga maanna le se ding gaye.
Aunao rwan ga, eina nani lang zathang kathan hiaknu make atiyeda nanina kama bina lousu damnu zathang lui gaye. Heiba zathang luiya nanina kama bina ngaisu damnu cham gaye.
Atiyeda eina nani khou zathang kathan hiak late, balangbe haga Bakhou le nani khou le bazenuwe. Balangbe zingnu ga thou drwe khatle bataknu babaan ga baan ong rwe.
Mi khatna maan baannu bi ongme diluga, bau banao ding batanne dabe atun tangga maan zingnu bi ong maang nge.
Bau banao ding kriangnu maan ga baannu bi ongnuwe. Atibriakpina ket basui dingnu lang khatchale bakhou maake.
Atiyeda bau banao ding batannu maan ga zingnu bi ong maang nge khatle zingnu bi se ongnuwe. Atiga maan inlam mang se ongnubo dinu thei make. Balangbe zingnu gana bamik pi cho rwe.
Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, eina nani khou hiaknuwe, Balangbe Bameng lang chungna nani noh bing ga kok thang rwe.

Pa rwan ga, eina nani khou hiaknuwe, Balangbe thoutan bina am ngaaknu Bating nanina thei rwe. Babwa rwan, nani khou eina hiaknuwe, Balangbe nanina sa maknu bating ngam rwe. Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, eina nani khou hiaknuwe, Balangbe nanina nani Pa ding thei rwe.

Pa rwan ga, eina nani khou hiak trwe, Balangbe thoutan bina nanina Bating thei rwe. Babwa rwan ga, eina nani khou hiak trwe, Balangbe naniba nate, Rikrwang chong ga nani khou amme, Khatle sa maknu bating nanina ngam rwe.
Talei ram ding khatle habei ga amnu pot bing ding kriang mako. Tudannuna talei ram ding kriang nge dabe bakhou Pa om kriang ga maake.
Balangbe talei ram bi amnu pot bing pumna bathainu, mikna bathainu khatle ringnu kum om phun liannu ha bing ga Pa khouna make atiyeda ha bing ga talei ram omme.
Talei ram khatle ha ding bathainu bing ga braan damlune atiyeda tudannu Rikrwang na baningnu to ongnu maan ga khwa sei ringlune.

Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, heiya kakhamnu chakrin rwe. Christa ding munanu maan ga hungna rwe dinu nanina thei rwe. Atun le Christa ding munanu taswang khak hung ong rwe, hagana kakhamnu chakrin rwe dinu nanina theiye.

Bani ga ani khouna se swak trwe atiyeda bani ga ani om mak ngaake. Balangbe bani ga ani om ngaake dabe bani ani le diga karung ngaak tingnuwe. Atiyeda bani pakhatchale ani om make dinu indao langna bani ani khouna se swak trwe.
Atiyeda nani dingba Bathiangnu Maanna thao kanun thang rwe khatle nanina pot bing ding theiye.
Nanina bazenu ding ga thei make diga eina heiya nani khou hiaknu make atiyeda nanina thei rwe khatle bazenu bi ga chong karwaknu maake diga hiaknuwe.
Jisu ding Christa ye diga za maknu maan ga makka chong karwaknu tu ambo? Pa khatle Sa Kapaisa ding za maknu maan ga Christa ding munanuwe.
Tudannu ngaakle Sa Kapaisa ding za maknu maan ga Pa ding le lou thang make. Atiyeda Sa Kapaisa ding zanu maan gana Pa ding le lousunuwe.
Atibriakpina nanina kama bina lousu damnu ga nani khou chat makka am ong ding ngo. Atiga kama bina nanina ngaisu damnu ga nani khou amme dabe, nani le Sa Kapaisa khatle Pa khou chat makka onglune.
Heiya Maanna ani khou karen thang ngaaknu khwa sei ringnu ga rwe.
Nani ding minam lang karam ongnu nun lang bi eina hei bing nga nani khou hiaknuwe.

Atiyeda nanina Bakhouna lousu damnu thao kanun thangnu ga nani khou chat makka amme. Atiga mi khatna nani ding bachu thang lat lang bathaang maak rwe. Atiyeda thao kanun thangnu lousu damnu bahak kana nani ding balang bing bi bachu thang rwe khatle heiya bazenuwe, chong karwak maknuwe khatle haga nani ding bachu thangnu danga nanina Bakhou ong lang nge.
Atun kasinnu naosen rwan ga, Bating indao thangnu kaan bi anina balumsanu am lang khatle Maan hungnu kaan bi Bameithaan bi kazak mak lang Bakhou chat makka ong ngo.
Maan ga ririak senuwe dinu nanina theiye dabe, bazenu chwan to ongnu maan ga Bakhouna ponnuwe dinu nani theiye.
Phaang ngo, ani ding Rikrwang sa rwan diga kou thangnu heiya Pa na ani ding intia lang kriang thangnubo. Atibriakpina talei ramna ani ding thei make, balangbe banina Bating thei mak ngaake.

Kriangnu rwan ga, atun ani Rikrwang sa rwan to rwe. Atun ani pa-aam to dingbo dinu indao swak mak aang nge. Atiyeda anina theiye dinuba Bating indao thangnu kaan bi ani Maan danlune. Balangbe Bating Bahak anina phaangmulune.
Bakhou heiba bachun amnu bingna Maanna bathiangnu danga baraantoza to bathiang nge.
Tudannu ngaakle noh tonu maan ga chongtan thouto maknuwe. Noh dinuwa chongtan thou to maknu ding nge.
Ani noh lou sat thang langna Bating indao thang damnuwe dinu nanina theiye. Bakhou noh dinu maake.
Tudannu Bakhou ongnu maan ga noh to make. Tudannu noh tonu maan gabe Bating mu mak aang nge, thei le thei mak aang nge.
Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, pakhatchanale nani ding minam mak ting ngo. Maan bazenu danga, ririak senu chwan tonu maan ga bazenuwe.
Noh tonu maan ga Diabol khou naye, balangbe Diabol ga thoutan bina noh to rwe. Ha langna Diabol chwan bing ding Maanna to braan lang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding indao thang rwe.
Tudannu Rikrwang khouna ponnu maan ga noh to make. Balangbe bakhou Baom bamuga amme. Atiga maan Rikrwang khouna pon briakpina noh tonu ngam make.
Heiyana bani Rikrwang sa rwan khatle Diabol sa rwanne dinu indaowe. Dinuba tudannu ririak senu chwan to maknu, baunao rwan ding kriang maknu maan ga Rikrwang khouna make.
Balangbe thoutan bina nanina ngaisu damnu sacham ga heiye, hagazo nani khat le khat kriang kale ding gaye dinu heiya rwe.
Sa maknu pa om toga banao ding athat tamnu Cain danla ding gaye. Pa-aam langna banao ding athat tamnubo? Balangbe bachwan bing ga sa mak ngaake khatle banao om chwan bingbe ririak senu chwan ngaake.
Aunao rwan ga, talei ramna nani ding batanne dabe nani loh lo mako.
Aniba thinu bina ringnu bi takan swak rwe dinu anina theiye. Balangbe anina ani unao rwan ding kriang nge. Tudannu baunao ding kriang maknu maan ga thinu bi ong maang nge.
Tudannu baunao ding kriang maknu maan ga mi athatnuwe khatle tudannu mi athatnu bakhou ga khwa sei ringnu maake dinu nanina theiye.
Heiyana kriangnu dinuwa anina bapu theiye dinuba Maanna ani lang Bakum pi swak thang rwe, atiga anina le ani unao rwan langna ani kum pi swak tingnu rwe.
Atiyeda tudannuna talei ram om tonu pot amluga, baunao lang bathaang amnu ding muluga bakhou kriangnu lungning maake dabe, bakhou Rikrwang om kriang ga tatoga am dingbo?
Kasinnu asa rwan ga, ani chongkaang mak tabe baleina kriangnu to makcho atiyeda chwan le bazenu gana kriangzo.
Heiba paanbina ani nun bazenu khou naye khatle hagana Bameithaan bi ani sung pi tip thanglune dinuwa anina theiye.
Balangbe ani sungna ani ding pi koi ngaake dabe, Rikrwang ba ani ma lian inkunuwe khatle Maanna pum brumza theiloiye.
Kriangnu nun ga, ani sungna ani ding pi koi mak tabe, Rikrwang meithaan bi ani balumsanu amme.
Anina ninu bing ga Bakhouna lousu rwe, balangbe anina Baom zathang bing ga zeiye khatle anina Bamikphaang bi pi pemnu chwan bing ga towe.
Heiya Baom zathang gaye dinuba anina Basa Kapaisa Jisu Christa meng bi balumsa ding gaye khatle Maanna ani khou zathang pi thangnu danga ani khat le khat kriang kale ding gaye.
Tudannu zathang zeinu maan ga Bakhou ongnuwe khatle Maanna le bakhou ongnuwe. Heiyana Maan ani khou ong ongme dinu anina theiye. Haga Maanna ani lang pi thangnu Katha paan bi naye.
Kriangnu nun ga, katha bing ding balumsa mako. Atiyeda katha bing ga Rikrwang khounamo dinu tamphaang ngo. Balangbe kakoinu thiamting tamga talei ram bi se swak trwe.
Heiyana nanina Rikrwang om Katha ding theiye dinuba, Jisu Christa misa pum toga hung rwe dinu ding rin indaonu katha bing ga Rikrwang khou naye.
Christa ga misa pum toga hung rwe dinu ding rin indao maknu katha bing ga Rikrwang khouna make. Haga Christa ding munanu gaye. Haga hunglune diga nanina ngaisu damnu ga atun talei ram bi hung rwe.
Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, naniba Rikrwang khou naye khatle nanina bani ding ngam rwe. Balangbe nani khou am ongnu Maan gana talei ram bi am ongnu bama lian inkuwe.
Bani ga talei ram omme atibriakpina banina talei ram om chong kabiaye khatle talei ramna bani chong ngaiye.
Aniba Rikrwang om zung nge, Rikrwang ding theinu maan gana ani chong ding ngaiye. Rikrwang om maknu gana ani chong ngai thang make. Heiyana anina bazenu katha khatle kakoinu katha ding bapu theiye.
Kriangnu nun ga, ani khat le khat kriang kalezo, balangbe kriangnuwa Rikrwang khou naye. Kriang theinu maan ga Rikrwang khouna ponnuwe khatle maanna Rikrwang ding theiye.
Tudannu kriang thei maknu maan gana Rikrwang ding thei make, balangbe Rikrwang Maan ga kriangnuwe.
Heiyana Rikrwang om kriang ga ani khou indao thang rwe dinuba, Bapaan bina ani ring dam lang Rikrwang na Khat tak Khatchanu Basa Kapaisa ding talei ram bi lang hung thang rwe.

Kriangnu dinuwa abeiya amme, anina Rikrwang ding kriang rwe dinu make. Atiyeda Maanna ani ding kriang briakpina, Basa Kapaisa ding ani noh bing langna pi pemnu rikhaang pot to lang lang hung thang rwe dinuwe.
Kriangnu nun ga, Rikrwang na ani ding atiga kriang thang nge dabe, ani le khatna khat ting kriang kale dingnu rwe.
Pakhatchanale Rikrwang ding impha ni beida mu mak aang nge. Atiyeda anina khat le khat kriang kaleye dabe, Rikrwang na ani khou ong thang nge khatle Bakriang ga ani khou khopsanu to rwe.
Heiyana ani Bakhou ong ongme, Maanna le ani khou ong ongme dinu anina theiye. Balangbe Maanna ani khou Bakatha pi thang rwe.
Pa na Sa Kapaisa ding talei ram ding Kanthangnupa toga lang hungnu ding anina mu rwe khatle sake pi rwe.
Tudannuna Jisu wa Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye diga rin swaknu bakhou ga Rikrwang na ong thang nge khatle maan le Rikrwang khou ongnuwe.
Rikrwang na ani ding kriang thangnu ga anina thei rwe khatle balumsa rwe. Rikrwang nga kriangnu gaye, kriangnu bi ongnu maan ga Rikrwang khou ongnuwe khatle Rikrwang na le bakhou ong ongme.
Atiga chongsem ni ga ani nun dai bazaangnu am lang Bakriang ga ani khou khopsaga pi thang rwe. Balangbe Maan bahak am ongnu danga ani nun le talei ram bi am ongme.
Kriangnu bi kachinu maake. Atiyeda khopsanu kriang gana kachinu ding bathou sate. Balangbe kachinu bi ga rainu amme. Atiga kachinu maan ga kriangnu bi khopsa make.
Anina Bating kriang nge balangbe Maanna ani ding kriang kama ngaak rwe.

Mi khatna, “Ei Rikrwang ding kriang nge” diga rinluga, bau banao ding batannu maan ga chong karwaknu miye. Balangbe maanna mikna munu bau banao ding kriang make dabe, tatoga mu maknu Rikrwang ding kriangnu ngam dingbo?
Bakhouna lousunu zathang ga heiye, hagazo tu ngaakle Rikrwang ding kriangnu maan gana bau banao ding le kriang ding gaye.
Tudannu Jisu wa Christa ye diga balumsanu maan ga Rikrwang khouna ponnuwe. Tudannu Bapa ding kriangnu maan gana Maanna pon thangnu Bating le kriang nge.
Anina Rikrwang ding kriang ga Baom zathang bing zeiga ongnu heiyana anina Rikrwang sa rwan ding kriang nge dinu theiye.
Balangbe anina Baom zathang bing zeinuwa Rikrwang ding kriangnuwe. Baom zathang bing ga potrit make.
Balangbe Rikrwang khouna ponnu bing gana talei ram ding kraan ngam rwe. Talei ram ding kraan ngamnu kraan ngam ga heiye, hagazo ani om balumsat heiye.
Jisu ding Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye diga balumsanu maan ga makka talei ram ding kraan ngamnu maan ga tubo?
Tui le thi paan bina hung ngaaknu Maan ga Jisu Christa ye. Maan tui paan zana makka, tui le thi paan bina hung rwe. Haga Katha na sake to rwe. Balangbe Katha ga bazenuwe.
Balangbe tambaan la sake tonu pat thum amme hagazo Pa, Chongkaang khatle Katha Bathiangnu gaye. Hei inthumma khatcha zwe.
Talei ram bi le sake pinu pat thum amme, hagazo Katha, tui khatle thiye, bani pat thum khatcha toga zakaleye.
Anina mi nun om sake lousuwe dabe Rikrwang om sake gana lian inkuwe. Balangbe Rikrwang om sake ga heiye dinuba, Maanna Basa Kapaisa om lang bi sake pi rwe.

Tudannu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding balumsanu bakhou ga sake amme. Tudannu Bating balumsa maknu maan gana Bating chong karwaknu pi to rwe. Balangbe Basa Kapaisa lang bi Rikrwang na sake pinu ding ga maanna balumsa make.
Atiga sake ga heiye, Rikrwang na ani lang ringzoknu kum pi thang rwe khatle ringnu ga Basa Kapaisa khou amme.
Basa Kapaisa ding lousunu maan ga ringnu lousu rwe. Atiga tudannu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding lousu maknu bakhou ga ringnu ga maake.
Nani khou khwa sei ringnu ga am rwe dinu thei lang khatle Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa meng bi balumsanu bi nani ong dam lang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa meng bi balumsanu nani khou eina hei bing nga hiaknuwe.
Bakhou anina balumsanu gazo heiya rwe, dinuba Maanna baningnu nung suiga anina pa-aam ngaakle niye dabe Maanna ani lang katak thang nge.
Anina ninu bing ga Maanna katak thang nge diga anina theiye dabe, anina Bakhou ninu bing ga lousu rwe dinu anina theiye.

Tudannuna banao khatna thi lang khop maknu noh tonu muwe dabe, maanna hweini thang ding gaye. Atiga thi lang khop maknu noh tonu mi nun lang Maanna ringnu ga pi thanglune. Pi thinu noh amme, hei lang bi maan hweini thang ding gaye diga eina rinnnu make.
Ririak se maknu chwan bing ga nohwe khatle thi lang khop maknu noh amme.
Tudannu Rikrwang khouna ponnu bing gana noh to make dinu anina theiye. Atiyeda Rikrwang khouna ponnu maan gana bazan ding raak theiye. Atiga kasianu gana bating banaan make.
Aniba Rikrwang khou naye khatle talei ram bing nga sa maknupa thwei bi ong rwe dinu anina theiye.

Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ga hung rwe dinu anina theiye atiga Bazenu Bating anina thei lang ani khou bakaba theinu pi thang rwe. Basa Kapaisa Jisu Christa Bazenu Bakhou ani ong rwe. Heiya bazenu Rikrwang khatle khwa sei ringnu kum ga rwe.
Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, nani ri katha khouna impaan ga ong ngo. Amen.
Chwan phunnu eina, kathang swaknu kamaisa khatle basa rwan, bazenu bi eina kriangnu, ei zana makka bazenu ding thei damnu bingna le kriang ongnu nani khou,
ani khou am ongnu khatle khwa seiga ani le ong bacham dingnu bazenu om langna,
Pa Rikrwang khatle Pa om Sa Kapaisa Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna bazenu khatle kriangnu bi phaangkriang, kriang thang theinu khatle dai bazaangnu ga nani le diga ong bacham thang ding ngo.
Anina Pa khouna zathang lousunu ga danga, nasa rwanna le bazenu bi se ongme dinu theiluga ei karo take.
Atun eina kamaisa, nakhou hweinuwe, zathang kathan eina nakhou hiaknu dannu make. Atiyeda anina kama bina lousu damnu ga danga, ani khat le khat kriang kale dingnuwe dinu heiya rwe.
Anina Baom zathang nung suiga senuwa kriangnu gaye. Nanina kama bina ngaisu damnu ga danga, haba nung suiga nani se dingnu rwe dinu zathang ga heiya rwe.
Balangbe Jisu Christa pum toga talei ram bi hung rwe dinu ding za maknu, minamnu mi taswang khak talei ram bi se swak trwe. Heiya minamnu khatle Christa ding munanu ga rwe.
Anina to damnu ga nanina to braannu to makka atiyeda sipsanu taswan ga lou langna nani nani raantoza barak theiga ong ngo.
Tudannu Christa om zekrin se maknu, koi maannu maan gana Rikrwang ding lou thang make. Tudannu Christa om zekrin bi ongnu maan gana Pa khatle Sa Kapaisa ding lousu rwe.
Tudannu pakhatna nakim bi hungluga heiba zekrin heiya phun hung make dabe, bating nain bi loukhut mako khatle bating takung tazei to thang mako.
Balangbe tudannu bating takungga to thangnu maan ga baom sa maknu chwan bing om badam lou bachamnuwe.
Nani khou hiak lang taswang khak am beida ei che le mukna hiakla rwe. Atiyeda ani karoga khopsanu to langna, ei hungluga ani mai le mai kadouluga chong kabia lang ei baning rwe.
Kathang swaknu nasannu sa rwanna nating kalumme. Amen.
Chwan phunnu eina bazenu bi kriangnu Gaius nakhou heiba chamthwanna hiaknuwe.
Eina kriangnu, nakatha na lian thounu ga danga, chwan lang bing bi nang lian thounu khatle napum sanu to lang eina kalumme.
Balangbe nangna bazenu bi se ongnu danga unao rwanna hungluga naom bazenu lang bi sake pi briakpina ei karo take.
Asa rwanna bazenu bi se ongme dinu eina ngaisunu kaan bi akhou ha ma karo liannu katei maake.
Eina kriangnu, nangna unao rwan khatle man nun lang banang thangnu bing bi balumsa lang khopnu chwan to rwe.
Banina rupkathan meithaan bi, naom kriangnu chwan lang bi sake pi rwe. Nangna Rikrwang lang khopsanu lung bi bani bazin lamsek pi katha swak thang nge dabe nang to chui rwe.
Balangbe banina Bameng lang chungna Gentile rwan khouna khatchale lou makka se swak tamnu rwe.
Atibriakpina anina bazenu chwan ga to bacham langna hei rwan ding nga loukhut thang dingnu rwe.
Eina rupkathan khou chong kasem hiake. Atiyeda nani lak pi balu to nwamnu Diotrephes na ani ding lou thang make.

Maanna ani lu chung bi sa maknu chong bing kabiaga to damnu bachwan bing ga ei baningsune. Ha zana pem makka, maan bahakna unao rwan ding lou thang make, hung nwamnu nun ding le khaamme. Bani ding rupkathan bina lou sate.
Eina kriangnu, kasianu ding ga bazei mako. Atiyeda kasanu ding bazeiyo. Kasanu tonu maan ga Rikrwang omme. Atiyeda kasianu tonu maan ga Rikrwang ding mu mak aang nge.
Mi bing zana Demetrius om kasanu lang bi sake pi rwe khatle bazenu gana baom sake to rwe khatle anina le sake pi rwe. Atiga ani om sake ga bazenuwe dinu nanina thei rwe.
Ei hiak lang am sip amme atiyeda eina kolom khatle mukna hiak nwam lan rwe.

Atiyeda eina nating karangga kadou lang bachun ongme. Atiga ani mai le mai pon kadou kaleluga meiri rai lang baning nge. Nakhou dai bazaangnu am ding ngo. Ani baan rwanna le nating kalumme. Baan rwan bing ding meng panga kalum thang ngo.
Jisu Christa om swak, James nao kapaisa Jude eina, kou swak thangnu nun, Pa Rikrwang na to bathiang thangnu khatle Jisu Christa khou ngaak thang ongnu nani nun khou,
phaangkriang, dai bazaangnu khatle Bakriang ga inku thounu to ding ngo.

Kriangnu nun ga, anina pum brumza phangsu damnu ringriak lang bi hiak lang karam ong bi, bathiangnu mi nun khou bakaan bing lang toga pi thang damnu balumsat langna sung khutka katwak lang nani ding kachui thang lang eina hiaknuwa twansa maknu ngaake.

Balangbe mi kasem inkamga hung tang rwe, heiba chongtok langna bani ding kamana thouga kathang swak thangnu am ngaak rwe. Ha rwan ga Rikrwang ding kachi maknu, ani Rikrwang om phaangkriang ding imbet boulaanu bi pi gon swaknu khatle khat tak khatchanu ani om Pukraangba Rikrwang khatle ani om Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding za maknu mi nunne.

Atiyeda nanina heiya thei thang owei ngaak peida eina nani ding pi baning su thang nwamme, hagazo, Pukraangba na mi nun ding Egypt talei bina kan thangluga balumsa maknu mi nun ding bataang la to braan sat tamme.
Atiga bani ong dingnu riak ting bathan sat thangnu tambaan chonglang rwan ding Maanna tasiatnu chongsem ni lang zingnu bi khwa seinu parei ruina bang thang rwe.

Hadanga Sodom le Gomorrah khatle am koinu namlian bi mi nunna le lungkoi lungmaan ongnu mi nun khatle kapaisa cham, kamaisa cham kazaknu chwan tonu nun ga khwa seinu meina chong tonu ding khaangga badan lang pi am thang rwe.
Hadanga mang mannu bing gana bani pum ding to tanaat rwe, banina ngam amnu nun khatle lwat liannu bing ding rin basiate.

Atiyeda tambaan chonglang kaliannu Michael na Diabol le diga kana kalega Moses pum lang bi kaenu kaan bi Michael na balu chung bi rin basiatnu chongtok chong rin swak raang mak ngaake atiyeda “Pukraangba na nating twei ding ngo” diga maanna rin ngaake.
Atiyeda heiba mi nunna thei maknu om lang bi rin basiate atiga bachaang toga banina theinu bi ga kakhan thei maknu khouring danga hei bing bi ya bani raanto bani ding to braan rwe.
Bani lang aih sianuweda, balangbe bani Cain lampui la thou drwe, bani nun ra-aamga sian tong baloi langna Balaam om kakoinu bi pak khut rwe khatle Korah om maitwangnu chongbiak pi ga bani braan drwe.

Heiba mi nunna nani om kriangnu thaisaak sa karungnu kaan bi kachinu maakka nani le diga sa karung ongnu kaan bi bani langza kakhannu khanpan lang amnu nunne. Bani ga thiraangna phunse ongnu tui maaknu tambu dannu bakraa kraa maknu takaan phaa thingkung, thi leng ninu, bakamong phok zok swaknu thingkung dannuwe.
Bathot sianu tuipui kabaapnu danga bani raan toza om kazaknu ga tuiphon danga phunka ongme khatle khwa sei kazingnu om zingnu ga bani lang khaak thang ongnu zwang koi ongnu insi ga dannuwe.
Adam khouna mikin siari tangnu Enoch na heiba mikin om lang bi atiga rin bachak thang nge, “Phaang ngo, Pukraangba na Baom bathiangnu rwan raching raching ding kalwangluga hung nge.

Mi bing lu chung bi chong to lang khatle Rikrwang ding kachi maknu nun om Rikrwang ding kachi maknu chwan bing, Rikrwang ding kachi maknu lung bi to thang damnu ga khatle Bamaitwang bi Rikrwang ding kachi maknu noh mi nunna kasianu chong kabia damnu bing ga indao lang hung rwe.”
Ha rwan ga tu tu tam tamnu nun, koi zongnu, bani ga bani pum om bathainu nung suiga senu mi nunne. Bani ga bani lang tong langza mi nun ding rinswanga chong lian kabiaye.
Atiyeda kriangnu nun ga, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om chonglang rwanna kama rin thangnu chong bing ga nani baningsuwo.
Dinuba, “Kakhamnu kaan bi Rikrwang ding kachi makka bani zanna bathainu nung suiga senu choi banuinu nun amlune” diga banina nani khou rin thang ngaake.
Ha rwan ga khak lang swaknu nun, talei lungning phunnu nun khatle Rikrwang Katha maaknu mi nunne.
Atiyeda kriangnu nun ga, nani om bathiang kataknu balumsat pi nani raantoza bacha thouga, Katha Bathiangnu bi hweiniga,
ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang khwa sei ringnu kum ding taraan ga ong ngaakka Rikrwang kriang sung bi ong ngo.
Atiga balumsia ongnu mi nun lu chung bi kriang thangbiyo.
Atiyeda mi kasem ding kachinu le suiga mei bina kai swakluga kan thang ngo khatle zan pumna to tanaatnu bani om sin basoi ding ga batanno.
Nani ding ket basui dingnu bina rakhi thang ngamnu khatle koi maan maakka tasiatnu karo le bachamga Baom lwat liannu meithaan bi pi han thang ngamnu Bakhou
khatle khat tak khatchanu ani ding Kanthangnupa, Baraantoza ningtingnu Rikrwang khou lwat liannu khatle takungnu, nat, ngam atunna thouga khwa seinu to ding ngo. Amen.

Barapnu sung bi swak tingnu om lang bing ga Christa na baswak rwan khou pi mu thang lang Rikrwang na bakhou pi thang damnu Jisu Christa om indao thangnu ga heiye. Maanna Baswak John khou baom tambaan chonglang ding lang thangluga haga pi thei thang rwe.
John na Rikrwang chong khatle Jisu Christa om sake lang bi khatle maanna mu damnu bing om lang bi sake pi rwe.
Heiba chong rin swaknu chong bing ding panu, ngaisunu khatle heiba riak pi hiak thang ongnu bing ding zeinu bani ga aih sanuwe. Balangbe bakaan ga nai rwe.
John na Asia bi amnu rupkathan siari khou, am ongnu, am ngaaknu khatle hung dingnu Bakhouna khatle Baom Krwang takung riak meithaan bi amnu Katha siari khouna

khatle balumsa zanu sake, thinu nun lak pina pon kamanu khatle talei ram krwang nun lu chung bi bapuba to ongnu Jisu Christa khouna nani khou phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo. Ani ding kriang thangnu khatle ani noh bing ding Bathi bahakna to bathiang thangnu Bakhou,
Baom Rikrwang khatle Pa khou ani ding krwang rwan khatle tako rwan pi to thangnu Bakhou lwat liannu khatle ngam khwa seiga am ding ngo. Amen.
Phaang ngo, Maan tambu le bachamga hungna rwe, mik bingna Bating mulune khatle Bating sungna chou damnu nunna tangga Bating mulune. Baom lang bina talei bi mi chaat bingna nu hweilune. O. Amen.
“Eiya Alpha khatle Omega, Thoutannu khatle Loinuwe, am ongnu, am ngaaknu khatle hung dingnu Ngam Bachangnu gaye” diga Pukraangba na rinne.

Nani unao, nani le diga riangre kanang bi, krwang talei la khatle Jisu Christa om khaang theinu bi, badam lou bacham ongnu John eiya, Rikrwang chong khatle Jisu Christa om sake langna Patmos tiga kounu tuikoi ram bi ong ngaake.
Pukraangba lumik pi ei Katha bi ong ngaake khatle anung pek la trumpet baraam dannu baraam basaangnu khat thei rwe.

Atiga rinne, “Ei Alpha khatle Omega, Kamanu khatle Kakhamnuwe” khatle “Nangna phaangmunu ga chongdip pi hiak thang ngo khatle haga Asia bi amnu rupkathan siari khou dinuba, Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamos, Thyatira, Sardis Philadelphia khatle Laodicea la bathanno.”
Akhou kabia ongnu baraam ding phaang lang eina kanei swak ngaake. Atiga eina kanei swaknu kaan bi kachaak thaomei ket siari ding mu rwe.
Thaomei ket siari lak pi ketmik tangga pon baswannu sin basoinu khatle kachaang bi kachaak khap khaaknu, Misa Sa Kapaisa dannu khat mu rwe.
Balu khatle Basam ga ngounu khouring mun danga khatle kabun danga ngou ngaake. Atiga Bamik ka mei balei dan ngaake.
Baket ka mei bi baropnu kasanu thinzin dan ngaake khatle Babaraamna tuipui baraam dan ngaake.
Bakut inchang pek la insi siari am ngaake; Bamun bina balem kani amnu kangainu kachaak chem khat swak ngaake. Bamai kum ga nat brannu lumik baan danne.
Eina Bating phaangmunu kaan bi thinu mi danga ei Baket pi in balumta rwe. Maanna Bakut inchangna alu chung bi kaising thangluga akhou rinne, “Kachi mako, Eiya Kamanu khatle Kakhamnuwe.
Eiya ring ongnu gaye. Ei thi ngaak rwe khatle phaang ngo, Ei khwa seiga ring ongme. Amen. Akhou kathi ram khatle thinu om taapthing bing amme.
“Nangna mu damnu lang bing, atun swak ongnu khatle haba nung bi swak tingnu lang bing ga hiakro.

Akut inchang pek la nangna mu damnu insi siari khatle kachaak thaomei ket siari om inthim chong ga heiye, insi siari ga rupkathan siari om tambaan chonglang gaye khatle nangna mu damnu thaomei ket siari gana rupkathan siari gaye.
“Ephesus pi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Kut inchang pek la insi siari choi ongnu, kachaak thaomei ket siari lak pi se ongnu Maanna heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe,

“Nachwan, nangna riangre lak thangnu khatle naom khaang theinu atiluga nangna sa maknu mi nun ding khaang thangnu ngamlan rwe dinu Ei theiye. Bani zan bahakna chonglang rwanne diga rinnu atiyeda chonglang rwan maknu, bani ding nangna tamphaang rwe. Bani chong karwaknu miye dinu nanina thei rwe.
Nangna phun thang rwe, khaang thang rwe khatle Ameng lang chungna chwan to rwe khatle riangre make.
Atiyeda Eina nalu chung bi rin dingnu chong kasem amme, hagazo nangna naom kamanu kriangnu ga bathan sat rwe.

Atibriakpina nang ingai paina balumta damnubo dinu baningsuwo. Nasung leluga nangna to ngaaknu kamanu chwan bing ga towo ati make dabe Ei nakhou barapka hungne. Nang sung le make dabe Eina naom thaomei ket ka bariak pi gana lou satne.
Atiyeda nakhou heiya amme, Eina le batannu Nicolaitan rwan om chwan ding ga nangna le batanne.
“Katha gana rupkathan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo; kangamnu bakhou ga Rikrwang om Paradise om bazai bi amnu ringnu thingkung bina sa lang Eina pine.”
“Smyrna bi amnu rupkthan om cham phunnu mi khou heiya hiako, ‘Thiluga ring latnu, Kamanu khatle Kakhamnu Maanna chong bing nga rinnuwe,
“Eina nachwan bing, riangre kanang khatle nalung siatka theiye atiyeda nangba lungsaye. Jihudi rwanne dinu atiyeda Jihudi rwan maknu, Seitaan om synagogue na sa maknu chong kabianu Ei theiye.

Nangna riangre dingnu om lang bi kachi mako. Phaang ngo, nani ding tamphaang langna Diabol na nani mi kasem ding qwan in bi sat thanglune khatle nanina ni som riangre khaanglune. Thinu tangga balumsa zanu towo. Eina nakhou ringnu luthop pine.
“Katha na rupkathan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo. Kangamnu bating thi leng ninu gana pi liamlaye.” ’
“Pergamos pi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Balem kani amnu kangainu kachaak chem choinu Maanna heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe,

“Naom chwan bing khatle nakaong riak Eina theiye. Habei ga Seitaan om krwang takung riak amme. Nangna Ameng ding tipka choiye khatle Seitaan na ongnu riak pi, nani lak pi Aom balumsa zanu sake Antipas ting athat tamnu kaan bi tangga abalumsat ting za maknu to make.

Atiyeda Israel sa rwan meithaan bi ket pi basui lang Balaam na Balak ting ri katha lang kat thangnu pot ting sa lang khatle lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to lang bachu thangnu zekrin ding choitipnu bani nun nakhou am briakpina, Eina namaitwang bi rin dingnu chong kasem amme.
Hadanga Eina batannu Nicolaitan rwan om zekrin ding choitipnu nun nakhou amme.
Sung lero ati make dabe Ei nakhou barapka hunglune khatle Eina Amun om kachaak chemna bani maitwang bi katwaklune.

“Katha na rupkathan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo. Ngam hungnu bakhou sa lang inkam thang ongnu manna kasem Eina pine. Balu chung bi meng kathan hiak thangnu lung ngou khat bakhou pine. Atiga meng ga lousunu maan ga makka pakhatchanale haga thei make.”
“Thyatira bi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Mei balei dannu mik phunnu khatle baket mei bi baropnu kasanu thinzin dannu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisana heiya rinnuwe,
“Eina nachwan, naom kriang, chwanlaang, balumsat khatle khaang theinu ga theiye. Naom kakhamnu chwan gana kamanu chwan ma inkuwe.

Atiyeda baraanto bating thiamting nge dinu Jezebel ding nangna za briakpina Eina namaitwang bi rin dingnu chong kasem amme. Maanna Aswak rwan ding lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to lang khatle ri katha lang katnu pot ting sa lang bachu thangga bani ding lampui kaimaan rwe.
Eina bating lungkoi lungmaannu chwan bina sung le lang bakaan pi ngaake atiyeda maan sung le dam make.

Phaang ngo, Eina bating kasa kanaa riak pi bazwan thangne atiga banina bani chwan bina sung le make dabe maan le diga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonu bani ding tasiatnu riangre kanangnu bi bazwan thangne.
Eina basa rwan ding athat satlune. Lungning khatle sung kalan ding zong swaknu Maan gabe Eiye dinu rupkathan bingna theilune. Nani om chwan nung suiga Eina nani pakhat khat lang pi thanglune.

“Eina nani khou khatle Thyatira bi ongnu katei bing dinuba heiba zekrin maknu khatle banina rinnu danga Seitaan om kathuknu chong bing ding thei maknu, nani khou Eina rinnuwe. Ei nani lu chung bi potrit katei bason thangla rwe.
Atiyeda Ei hung lat mak basaan nani khou amnu ga choitipka choiyo.
Ngam hungnu bakhou khatle kakhamnu tangga Achong bing ding zeinu balaang chaat nun lu chung bi Eina ngam pi thangne:
‘Maanna thin sungrwan choiluga bani lu chung bi paanlune; Ben bachanu mi om ben bing ding to basiatnu danga bani ding bakatup taga to basiatlune,’ heiya Eina Apa khouna ngam lousunu dannuwe.
Eina bakhou louthwan insi pi thangne.
“Katha na rupkathan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo.”

“Sardis pi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Rikrwang om Katha siari khatle insi siari amnu maanna heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe, “Eina nachwan ga theiye, nang ring ongme dinu meng amme dinu Ei theiye atiyeda nangbe thinuwe.
Khaang rakanno, thi ding ga ongnu nun ding ga pi nat thouwo; balangbe Rikrwang meithaan bi nachwan bing ga bapungpha mak aang nge dinu Ei thei rwe.

Atibriakpina nangna tatoga lousu damnubo khatle thei damnubo dinu baningsuwo. Choitipo khatle sung leyo. Atiga nangna barak thei make dabe Ei nakhou inbrunu danga hunglune khatle Ei impei chakrin bi hunglu dingbo dinu nangna theilaye.
Sardis pi bani pon tanaat mak aangnu naom mi kasem amme. Bani ga khopsanu to briakpina bani pon kangounu sin basoiluga Ei le diga se bachamlune.

Ngam hungnu bakhou ga Eina pon kangounu sin basoi thangne. Eina bameng ga ringnu chongdip pina lou satla rwe atiyeda Eina bameng ga Apa meithaan bi khatle Baom tambaan chonglang rwan meithaan bi indao thanglune.
“Katha na rupkthan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo.”

“Philadelphia bi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Bathiangnu khatle bazenu, David om taapthing amnu Maanna inkhaan lat swak tamme dabe pakhatchanale khaan maknu, inkhaan khaan damme dabe pakhatchanale lat maknu Maanna heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe,

“Eina nachwan ga theiye; phaang ngo, Eina nameithaan bi lat swaknu inkhaan khat thang rwe, haga pakhatchanale khaannu ngam make; balangbe nanat titcha amme, Achong zeiye khatle Ameng ding za maknu to make.

Phaang ngo, Seitaan om synagogue mi nun, Jihudi rwanne diluga Jihudi rwan maknu atiyeda chong karwaknu bani ding Eina naket pi pi hung kalumne. Atiga phaang ngo, Eina nating kriang nge dinu bani khou pi thei thangne.
Nangna Aom khaang theinu chong ding zei briakpina, talei ram bi amnu mi nun lu chung bi tamphaang lang talei pumlian bi hung dingnu tamphaangnu chakrin bi gana Eina nating kan thangne.
Phang ngo, Ei barapka hunglune, naom luthop ka pakhatchanale lou mak lang naom amnu ga choitipo.

Ngam hungnu bating Eina Arikrwang om bathiangnu in inteng khat pi to thangne khatle maan khatchale se swak latla rwe, Eina balu chung bi Arikrwang om meng khatle Arikrwang om namlian meng dinuba, Arikrwang khouna tambaan lana tanu Jerusalem kathan meng hiak thangne. Eina Ameng kathan balu chung bi hiak thangne.
“Katha na rupkthan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo.” ‘
“Laodicea bi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Amen diga kounu, Balumsa zanu khatle bazenu Sake, Rikrwang na damnu bing om Hou thounu gana heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe,
“Eina nachwan ga theiye, nang dai le dai make, sa le sa make, nang dainu mak tabe sanu Ei bathaiye.
Atibriakpina nang lumbop bopnu, dai le dai mak sa le sa mak briakpina nating Eina Abao bina balwak satlune.

Balangbe nangna rinne, ‘Ei lungsaye khatle lan amme khatle alaang baatnu khatchale maake.’ Nang bachan sianu, kriang thang dingnu, lungsianu, mik chonu, pwan sin basoi lang maaknuwe dinu nang thei make.

Eina nakhou bachu thang nge, dinuba nang lungsa lang mei bi barop bathiang thangnu kachak khatle nang sin basoi lang khatle pwan basoi maknu om kazak dou mak lang pwan kangounu khatle namik mu lang namik pi tei lang mik lou Akhouna kaleiyo.
Eina kriangnu mi bing ding Eina twei thang nge khatle laak thang nge. Atibriakpina sung khuto khatle sung leyo.

Phaang ngo, Ei inkhaanmun bi han ongme khatle inkhaan bachu ongme; tudannuna Akhwan ngaisuluga inkhaan lat thang nge dabe Ei bakhou khutlune khatle maan le sa bachamlune khatle maan Ei le sa bachamlune.
Ngam hungnu maan ga Ei le diga Aom takung riak pi ong bacham lang za thanglune. Heiya Eina le ngamluga Apa le diga Batakung riak pi badung bacham damnu ga dannuwe.
“Katha gana rupkathan bing khou rinnu chong ga kana phunnu bingna ngai ding ngo.” ’ ”

Heiba nung bi eina mu rwe, atiga phaang ngo, tambaan la inkhaan khat lat thang ong ngaake khatle trumpet baraam danga akhou chong kabianu eina ngaisu kama damnu baraam gana rinne, “Abeiya ka wo khatle heiba nung bi swak tingnu ga Eina nakhou pi mu thangne.”
Haba kahan bi ei Katha bi am ngaake khatle phaang ngo, tambaan la takung riak khat am ngaake. Pakhat haba takung riak pi ga badung ong ngaake.
Badung ongnu Bating atiga phaangnu kaan bi jasper khatle sardius lung dan ngaake. Takung riak om amqwatnu bing bi emerald lung dannu tamsaipwak am ngaake.

Takung riak om amqwatnu bing bi takung riak katei somniga bali am ngaake. Takung riak bing chung bi patso somniga bali kangounu pwan sinluga badung ongnu eina mu rwe. Bani lu bi kachaak luthop thop phike.
Haba takung riak pi gana khwa bathaaknu, khwa barinu khatle khwan bing swak rwe khatle takung riak meithaan bi thaomei siari taan thang ong ngaake. Ha rwan ga Rikrwang om Katha siariye.
Takung riak meithaan bi bathing ring ringnu bathiangnu tuipui khat am ngaake. Takung riak om bazai bi khatle amqwatnu bing bi nung ma mik karwak amnu, ringnu katha amnu bali han ongme.

Kamanu katha amnu ga takhu krwang danne, kaninu ringnu katha amnu gana sen swan danne, inthumnu ringnu katha amnu gana misa mai kum danne khatle balinu ringnu katha amnu gana zwang ongnu eagle basaa danne.

Ringnu katha amnu bali ga khat khat khou batha karuk karuk amme. Bani basung bapaan mik karwak amme; banina zingpha thamlai basak makka rinne, “Bathiangnu, bathiangnu, bathiangnu, am ngaaknu, am ongnu khatle hung dingnu Ngam Bachangnu Rikrwang Pukraangba gaye.”
Takung riak pi badung ongnu khwa sei ring ongnu Bakhou ringnu katha amnu rwan gana Balwat liannu ding takung tazeiga khatle swankanu kaan bi
patso somniga balina takung riak pi badung ongnu Bameithaan bi in bakhupta rwe. Banina khwa sei ring ongnu Bating swanka rwe. Banina takung riak meithaan bi bani luthop ka bazwan taluga rinne,
“He Pukraangba, lwat liannu, takung tazeinu khatle ngam lousunu Nang khopsanuwe, Balangbe Nangna pum brum ding dam thang rwe, Nabaning bina pum brumza amnuwe Khatle pum brum ding dam thang rwe.”
Takung riak pi badung ongnu kut inchang la basung bapaan hiak thangnu seal siari nam thangnu chongdip khat eina mu rwe.
Kanatnu tambaan chonglang khatna baraam basaangga pao swaknu eina mu rwe. “Chongdip ka lat swaknu khatle seal nam thangnu ga lat swak lang khopsanu tu ambo?”
Tambaan, talei khatle talei thwei la amnu pakhatchanale Chongdip ka lat swaknu mak tabe phaangnu ngam make.
Chongdip ka lat swaknu, panu khatle ha ding ga phaangnu ngamnu khopsanu pakhatchale maak briakpina ei chap rakan takka chap ngaak rwe.
Patso rwan lak pi pakhatna akhou rinne, “Chap mako, phaang ngo, Judah inphum om Takhu krwang, David om Kamong gana Chongdip ka lat swaknu khatle seal siari ding lat swaknu ngam rwe.”

Eina mu rwe khatle phaang ngo, takung riak zai bi ringnu katha amnu bali khatle patso rwan lak pi bataki siari khatle bamik siari amnu athat tamnu dannu Zao swan khat han ongnu eina mu rwe. Ha rwan ga Rikrwang na talei ram bing bi bathan thang damnu Rikrwang om katha siari gaye.
Zao saza gana hungluga takung riak pi badung ongnu bakut inchang lana Chongdip ka lou rwe.

Maanna Chongdip ka lou damnu kaan bi ringnu katha amnu bali khatle patso rwan somniga bali Zao saza meithaan bi in bakhupta rwe. Bani pakhat khatna tara khatle bathiangnu mi nun kalumnu om parongna sipnu kachaak kam choi ngaake.

Banina laa kathan toga rinne, “Nang Chongdip ka lounu khatle haba om seal ding lat swak lang khopnuwe. Balangbe Nating banina athat trwe, Khatle Nangna ani ding phum, chong, mi sing Khatle chaat bing bina Nathina Rikrwang lang ran swak thang rwe.
Ani ding Rikrwang khou krwang nun khatle thiamting rwan pi to thang rwe. Anina talei ram bi paanlune.”

Atiga eina mu rwe, takung riak, ringnu katha amnu bing khatle patso rwan om amqwatnu bing bi am ongnu tambaan chonglang rwan baraam eina ngaisu rwe. Bani mi sing ga basing sem lat ngam maknu raching raching ngaake.
Baraam gana baraam basaangga rinne, “Athat tamnu Zao saza ga ngam, lungsanu, ningting, nat, takung tazeinu, lwat liannu khatle swan lang khopnuwe.”

Tambaan la, talei ram bi, talei ram thwei la, tuipui bi khatle tuipui sung la amnu dam thang damnu katha amnu pum brumna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe. Banina rinne, “Takung riak pi badung ongnu Bakhou Khatle Zao saza khou swankanu, takung tazeinu, lwat liannu khatle khwa sei ngam liannu to ding ngo.”
Ringnu katha amnu bali gana rinne, “Amen.” Patso somniga balina in bakhuptaluga khwa sei ringnu Bating kalum rwe.
Zao saza gana seal lak pina khat lat swaknu eina mu rwe. Ringnu katha amnu bali lak pi khatna khwa barinu baraam danga “Hung ngo khatle phaang ngo” diga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe.
Eina mu rwe khatle phaang ngo, eina kangounu raqwan khat mu rwe, raqwan twang ongnu ba khou than khat amme khatle bakhou luthop khat pi ngaake. Maanna kraan ngam ga khatle ngam langna se swak tamme.
Zao saza gana kaninu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi kaninu ringnu katha amnu gana “Hung ngo khatle phaang ngo” diga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe.

Kasennu raqwan katei khat swak tamme. Habei ga twangnu bakhou talei ram bina dai bazaangnu lou sat lang khatle bani khat le khat athat kale lang ngam pi thang ngaake. Bakhou kaliannu kachaak chem khat pi ngaake.

Zao saza gana inthumnu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi inthumnu ringnu katha amnu gana “Hung ngo khatle phaang ngo” diga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe. Atiga eina mu rwe khatle phaang ngo, kabumnu raqwan khat eina mu rwe, habei twangnu khou ga bakut pi serphala khat am ngaake.
Ringnu katha amnu bali lak pina khwan khatna rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Denari khat lang gehu badat khat, denari khat lang barley badat inthum khatle nangna thao le drakha tui ga to maan mako.”
Zao saza gana balinu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi ringnu katha amnu balinu gana “Hung ngo khatle phaang ngo” diga rinnu khwan eina ngaisu rwe.

Eina mu rwe khatle phaang ngo, inda dian diannu raqwan khat eina mu rwe. Haba chung bi twangnu meng ga Thinu diga kouwe khatle Kathi ramna banung sui seye. Talei ram badang bali om khat lu chung bi kachaak chemna, bu taangnuna, thinuna khatle talei ram khouring nunna to that lang bani khou ngam pi thang drwe.
Zao saza gana impaang nu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi Rikrwang om chong langna khatle banina pi ngaaknu sake langna athat tamnu katha bing ding rikhaang riak thwei bi eina mu rwe.
Banina baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “He Bathiangnu khatle Bazenu Pukraangba talei ram bi amnu bani ding Nangna ani thi man lang takhum baan ga chong kasem lang inchan baat maangbo?”

Bani pakhat khat khou kangounu baswannu pon pi rwe khatle bani khou rinne, “Bani ding athat tamnu ga danga bani le diga swak to bachamnu khatle bau banao rwan ding basing bachangga athat satloi mak basaan, bani bakaan kasem basak lang nge.
Zao saza gana karuknu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi eina mu rwe, atiga phaang ngo, kanatnu talei kaling kaling rwe, lumikna sam om bora pwan danga bum drwe khatle thana thi danga sen drwe.
Kanatnu thiraangna tacham kraa kung ding kanuknu kaan bi tacham kraana chuntanu danga, tambaan lana insi bing talei bi bazwanta drwe.
Atiga saangbaan na le chongdip kazwannu danga kazwanluga phun thou drwe, rammwan pui khatle tuikoi ram bing ding bakaong riak pina phun swak trwe.
Talei ram om krwang bing, kaliannu rwan, lungsanu rwan, kraan milu nun, ngam phunnu mi nun, swak tonu bing khatle rang tonu bingna chenlat khatle rammwan bing om lung lat pi inkam drwe.
Rammwan bing khou khatle lung bing khou rin ngaake, “Ani lu chung bi badan taro khatle takung riak pi badung ongnu Bamai kum bina khatle Zao saza balung pwan bina ani ding inkam thang ngo.
Balangbe Baom balung pwan liannu lumik ka hung tang rwe. Atiga tuna hannu ngam dingbo?”

Ha bing nung bi talei taki bali la tambaan chonglang bali han ongnu eina mu rwe. Talei ram bi mak tabe tuipui bi mak tabe thingkung khatcha bi hakna thiraang raang hung mak lang banina talei ram om thiraang lampui thing drwe.

Tambaan chonglang katei khatna ring ongnu Rikrwang om seal choiluga lumik swak lana kanaanu eina mu rwe khatle talei ram khatle tuipui ding to braan lang Rikrwang na ngam pi thang damnu tambaan chonglang bali khou maanna baraam basaangga paoga rinne,
“Anina Rikrwang om swak rwan ding bani bachan bi seal nam thang mak basaan, talei ram, tuipui mak tabe thingkung bing ding ga to braan mako.”
Seal nam thang damnu mi sing ga eina ngaisu rwe. Israel sa rwan phum bing bina seal nam ngaaknu mi sing ga raching raza ga sombaliga baliye.
Judah in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Reuben in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Gad in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe.
Asher in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Naphtali in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Manasseh in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe.
Simeon in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Levi in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Issachar in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe.
Zebulun in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Joseph in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Benjamin in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe.

Ha bing nung bi eina phaangnu kaan bi ngaiyo, chaat bing, phum bing, mi nun khatle chong chaat bing bina pakhatchanale basing sem ngam maknu mi khang puina, kangounu baswannu pon sin basoinu khatle bani kut pi ruidan kachang choiluga takung riak khatle Zao saza meithaan bi hung han ngaake.
Atiga baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Ringriak ka takung riak pi badung ongnu ani Rikrwang khatle Zao saza omme.”
Tambaan chonglang rwanna, takung riak, patso rwan khatle ringnu katha amnu bali om amqwatnu bi han ong ngaake. Takung riak meithaan bi mai kum talei la kuntaluga Rikrwang ding kalum damme.
Atiga rinne, “Amen. Swannu, lwat liannu, ningting, swankanu, takung tazeinu ngam khatle nat raangnu khwa seiga ani Rikrwang khou amnu to ding ngo. Amen.”
Patso rwan lak pina pakhatna akhou rinne, “Kangounu baswannu pon sin basoinu mi nunna impei mibo? Bani inlamna hungnubo?”
Eina bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, nangna theiye.” Maanna akhou rinne, “Bani nun ga tasiatnu riangre kanang bina hungnu nunne khatle bani om baswannu pon ga Zao saza thi bi kasin ngou rwe.
Atibriakpina banina Rikrwang takung riak meithaan bi ongluga zingpha thamlai Baom bathiangnu in bi Bating ngaakka chwanlaang to ongme. Atiga takung riak pi badung ongnu Maan ga bani lak pi onglune.
Bani chaam lat la rwe khatle taraan lat la rwe; lumikna bani ding sok lat la rwe khatle saanuna le sok lat la rwe.

Balangbe takung riak zai bi amnu Zao saza gana bani ding sian thanglune. Atiga bani ding ringnu pi thangnu tuipwak in tangga kai thanglune khatle Rikrwang na bani mik pina mikthi bing kanun sat thanglune.”
Zao saza gana siarinu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi tambaan la chakrin baang khak thiap thiap ong ngaake.
Rikrwang meithaan bi han ongnu tambaan chonglang siari ding eina mu rwe khatle bani khou trumpet siari pi damme.

Kachaak om parong kam choinu tambaan chonglang katei khat hungluga rikhaang riak pi hung han rwe khatle bakhou parong tamga pi thang rwe. Balangbe maanna takung riak meithaan bi amnu kachaak om rikhaang riak chung bi haga bathiangnu mi bing om kalumnu le bachamga kat ting gaye.
Tambaan chonglang kut pina parong meikhut ka bathiangnu mi nun om kalum le bachamga Rikrwang meithaan bi ka rwe.

Tambaan chonglang gana parong kam ga lou rwe khatle rikhaang riak pina meithin kasennu louluga haga thangsipluga, talei ram bi bazwan ta rwe. Habei ga kasao kabaonu, khwa bathaaknu, bachek tanu khatle talei kalingnu swak trwe.
Trumpet siari choinu tambaan chonglang siari gana sem lang bani daan ong rwe.

Kamanu tambaan chonglang gana trumpet ka sem rwe khatle thi suinu thakraa khatle mei ta rwe khatle ha bing ga talei ram bi bazwanta rwe. Atiga thingkung bing badam inthum om khat ting rou sat trwe. Ba annu louna bing meina rou sat trwe.
Kaninu tambaan chonglangna trumpet ka sem rwe khatle mei chok ongnu rammwan pui khat tannu khat ting tuipui bi bazwan thang rwe; atiga tuipui badam inthum om khat thi gon drwe.
Tuipui bi amnu khouring bing badam inthum om khat thi loi drwe khatle lipui om badam inthum om khatle braan drwe.

Inthumnu tambaan chonglangna trumpet ka sem rwe khatle meilaa danga choknu kaliannu insi khat tambaan lana bazwanta rwe. Hagana tuiqwa bing om badam inthum om khat pi atiluga tuipwak in bing bi ta rwe.
Insi meng ga Kakhaanu diga kouwe; tui om badam inthum om khat khaa drwe. Tui ga pi khaa briakpina mi tamga thi drwe.

Balinu tambaan chonglangna trumpet ka sem rwe khatle lumik om badam inthum om khat, tha om badam inthum om khat khatle insi om badam inthum om khat ting bwei ta rwe. Ha bing om badam inthum om khat zing drwe. Atiga thamlai om badam inthum om khat atiluga zingpha om badam inthum om khat baanlan drwe.

Eina phaang rwe khatle tambaan chonglang khatna tambaan zai bi zwang ga baraam basaangga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe. “Tambaan chonglang inthumna sem dingnu trumpet katei inthum om baraam langna talei ram bi amnu mi nun aih sianuwe da, aih sianuwe da khatle aih sianuwe da.”
Impaangnu tambaan chonglangna trumpet ka sem rwe khatle insi khat tambaan lana talei bi bazwantanu eina mu rwe. Tambaan chonglang gana bakalan maaknu khun om taapthing bakhou pi ngaake.
Maanna khun ga lat swak rwe haba kaan bi mei pui om meikhut tannu bakalan maaknu khun bi gana ka rwe; khun bina kanu meikhut kana lumik khatle saangbaan ding pi zing drwe.
Atiga meikhut pina takhao nun swakluga talei ram bi hung rwe. Talei ram bi amnu ri aih om ngam dannu bani khou ngam pi damme.
Talei ram bi thou ongnu louna bing, ba annu thingkung bing khatle thingkung khatcha ding le sok mak lang atiyeda bani bachan bi Rikrwang om seal maaknu minun za ding sok lang zathang pi thang drwe.
Banina mi nun ding athat mak lang atiyeda bani ding tha impaang rai lang bani khou chongtan pi thang drwe. Bani riangre kanang ga mi khat ting ri aihna einu nat tan rwe.
Haba kaan bi mi nunna thi lang karamlune atiyeda ngamlaye; bani thi nwamlune atiyeda thinu ga bani khouna pak tamlune.
Takhao nun thot ka kraan lang daan ongnu raqwan nun danne; bani lu bi kachaak tannu luthop thope khatle bani mai kum ga misa danne.
Bani samna kamaisa rwan sam danne. Bani ngaa ga takhu krwang ngaa danne.
Bani thin kachaang thop tannu kachaang thop amme khatle bani batha baraam ga kraan riak pi pak khut tamnu raqwan taswang khakna kainu raqwan gari nun om baraam danne.
Bani ri aih danga kamei amme. Bani kamei bi bakasat amme, bani ngam ga mi nun ding tha impaang pi naa lang nge.
Bakalan maaknu khun om tambaan chonglang gana bani lu chung bi krwang to ngaake. Bamengna Hebrew chong la Abaddon diga kouwe. Atiyeda Greek chong la bameng Apollyon diga kouwe.
Aih sianu khat pi loi drwe, phaang ngo, heiba nung bi riangrenu kani hung naye.
Karuknu tambaan chonglang gana trumpet sem rwe. Rikrwang meithaan bi amnu kachaak om rikhaang riak bataki bali lana khwan khat eina ngaisu rwe.
Khwan gana trumpet choi ongnu karuknu tambaan chonglang khou rinne, “Kaliannu Euphrate tuiqwa bi bang thang ongnu tambaan chonglang bali ding ga bathan thangro.”
Rin ongnu chakrin, lumik, tha khatle sangwan lang daan thang ongnu tambaan chonglang bali ding mi nun om badam inthum om khat ting athat sat lang bathan thang rwe.
Raqwan kraanmi sing ga lakh raching ni ngaake, haba sing ga eina ngaisu rwe.

Pi mu thangnu khat pi raqwan nun khatle habei ga twang ongnu nun ding eina mu rwe. Banina mei danga sennu hyacinth lung danga dumnu khatle kanduk tannu bazinnu kachaang thop amme; raqwan nun lu ga takhu krwang lu danne khatle bani bao bina mei, meikhut khatle chok ongnu kanduk swake.
Bani bao bina swaknu inthum dinuba mei, meikhut khatle chok ongnu kanduk kana mi nun badam inthum om khat ting athat sat trwe.
Balangbe bani ngam ga bani bao bi khatle bani kamei bi amme. Balangbe bani kamei ga barun danne khatle balu amme atiga ha bing gana banina mi nun ding pi soke.

Ripian heiyana to that maknu am ongnu mi nunna bani chwan bina bani sung le mak ngaake. Banina ri kasia nun khatle kachaak om, tangka om, thinzin om, lung om khatle thing om ri katha ding kalumga ong ngaake. Rin ongnu ri katha bing nga munu le ngam make, ngaisunu le ngam make khatle senu le ngam make.
Banina mi athatnu bina, dwei choinu bina khatle lungkoi lungmaannu bina mak tabe baru sanu bina bani sung le mak ngaake.
Tambu na pwan danga sinnu kanatnu tambaan chonglang katei khat tambaan lana tanu eina mu rwe; balu bi tamsaipwak amme, bamai kum ga lumik tanne khatle baketna mei inteng danne.
Bakut pi lat swak thangnu kasinnu chongdip khat amme khatle baket inchangna tuipui bi khatle imbei gana talei chung bi kadimme.
Takhu krwangna baraamnu danga basaangnu baraam baraamme. Maanna baraamnu kaan bi khwa barinu siarina khwan swak ka chong kabia rwe.

Khwa barinu siari gana khwan swakka kabianu kaan bi eina hiak lang to ngaake. Atiyeda tambaan lana khwan khatna akhou atiga rinnu ngaisu rwe, “Khwa barinu siarina rin damnu ga seal nam thang ngo khatle hiak thang mako.”
Eina mu damnu tuipui khatle talei chung bi han ongnu tambaan chonglang gana tambaan la bakut kai thou ngaake.

Tambaan chonglang khatle habei ga amnu pot bing talei ram khatle basung bi amnu pot bing, tuipui khatle basung bi amnu bing ding dam thangnu, khwa sei ring ongnu Pukraangba khou maanna chong karen rwe. Hagazo, “Khwa sei la rwe.”
Atiyeda siarinu tambaan chonglang gana baom trumpet sem dingnu lumik pi ga maanna Baswak thiamting rwan khou rin damnu danga, Rikrwang om inthim chong ga pi loi thanglune.
Tambaan la eina ngaisu damnu khwan gana akhou rin late, “Tuipui bi khatle talei ram bi han ongnu tambaan chonglang khou seluga bakut pina kasinnu Chongdip ka louwo.”

Eina tambaan chonglang khou seluga rin rwe, “Kasinnu Chongdip ka akhou piyo.” Maanna akhou rinne, “Haga louwo khatle haga sawo khatle hagana nabon ding pi khaalune atiyeda namun biba khwei tui danga thumlune.”
Eina kasinnu Chongdip ka tambaan chonglang kut pina louluga sa rwe, haga amun bi khwei tui danga thumme khatle eina sanu kaan bi abon la pi khaaye.
Habei ga tambaan chonglang gana akhou rinne, “Nangna mi nun om, chaat bing om, chong chaat bing om khatle krwang bing om lang bi chong rinseyo.”
Akhou badat thing dannu thingrwa khat pi rwe khatle tambaan chonglang gana hanluga rinne, “Lon thouwo khatle Rikrwang in atiluga rikhaang riak ka badatro khatle habei ga kalum ongnu mi sing ga semmo.
Atiyeda bathiangnu in paan la inkhu gabe badat mako. Balangbe haga Gentile nun lang pi drwe. Banina bathiangnu namlian ding ga tha sombaliga kani bani ketna kadim kataalu rwe.
Eina Aom sake pat ni khou ngam pi thangne. Banina bora pwan sinluga lumik raching khat raza ni somruk ri chong rin swaklune.”
Bani ga talei ram om Rikrwang meithaan bi han ongnu talwan kraa kung kani khatle thaomei ket kani gaye.
Tudannuna barwei ding sok lang towe dabe barwei bao bina mei swakluga munanu nun ding ga rou sate; tudannuna barwei ding pi sok lang towe dabe bating hadanga athat lang nge.

Barweina chong rin swak ong bi khwa sun mak lang tambaan ding khaam lang barwei khou ngam amme. Thi gon lang tui chung bi khatle barweina bathainu kaan bing bi talei ram ding ripianna rai lang barwei khou ngam amme.
Barweina barwei om sake pi loinu kaan bi bakalan maaknu khun bina swaknu khouring gana barwei maitwang bi kraan katwaklune; atiga barwei ding ngamlune khatle athat satlune.
Barwei om kathi pum ga namlian om lampui pui bi ta thang onglune, namlian om Katha om meng ga Sodom le Egypt namlian diga kouwe. Haba riak pi ga ani Pukraangba ding cross pi athat ngaake.

Mi nun lak pina, phum rwan bina chong chaat rwan bina, chaat rwan bina hungnu mi nun gana barwei om kathi pum ding ga ni thum babaang mulune. Barwei om kathi pum ding ga thaan bi ri lang za thanglaye.

Talei ram bi amnu mi nunna haba om langbi karo lozaang salune. Atiluga banina khat le khat leithwan pi kale lune; karonu indao lune balangbe ri chong rin swaknu pat nina talei ram bi amnu mi nun ding pi riangre damme.
Ni thum babaang nung bi Rikrwang khouna ringnu kaphuk kana barwei khou khut rwe khatle barwei han thou rwe. Barwei ding munu mi nun ga kachi tak rwe.
Tambaan lana basaangnu khwan khat na, “Abeiya kawo,” diga rinnu khwan khat barweina ngaisu rwe. Barwei tambu bina tambaan tangga ka rwe khatle barwei ding munanu nun gana barwei ding mu rwe.

Haba kahan bi ga talei kaling rakan takka kaling damme khatle namlian om in som om badam khat kanuk raita rwe, atiga talei kalingnu bi ga mi raching siari thi rwe. Ring ongnu mi nun gana kachi takka tambaan Rikrwang lwat pi lian damme.
Aih sianu kani ga loi drwe. Phaang ngo inthumnu aih sianu ga barapka hunglu rwe.”

Siarinu tambaan chonglang gana baom trumpet ka sem rwe khatle tambaan lana basaangnu khwan bingna rinne, “Talei ram krwang talei bing nga ani Pukraangba khatle Baom Christa om Krwang talei to rwe khatle Maan khwa seiga Krwang toga paanlu rwe.”
Rikrwang meithaan bi bani takung riak pi badung ongnu patso somniga bali gana kuntaluga Rikrwang ding kalumluga rinne,
“He Ngam Bachangnu Pukraangba, Rikrwang anina Nating swanne, Nang atun am ongnu, am ngaaknu khatle am hung dingnu gaye. Balangbe Nangna Naom tasiatnu ngam bing louluga paan ong rwe.

Chaat nunna balung pwan rwe Khatle Naom sung sounu ga hung tang rwe, Thi damnu nun ding Nangna chong kasem dingnu, Naswak, ri chong rin swaknu nun, bathiangnu mi nun, kasinnu khatle kaliannu rwan lang nangna taswan pi lang Khatle talei ram ding to braannu nun ding Nangna to braan dingnu dat ka hung tang rwe.”

Tambaan la Rikrwang om bathiangnu in lat swak rwe khatle Baom chongren tambung ga Baom bathiangnu in bi mu rwe, habei ga khwa bathaak rwe, khwa bari rwe, bachek ta rwe, talei kaling rwe khatle kaliannu thakraa ta rwe.
Tambaan la kaliannu badan khat mu rwe. Mannu pakhatna lumik ting pwan toga basoi rwe, thana baket thwei bi amme khatle balu bi insi somga kani thangnu luthop am ngaake.
Maan pum ritnuwe, maan nao lung lang naaga pao ong ngaake.
Tambaan la badannu katei khat mu rwe; phaang ngo, kaliannu mei danga sennu dragon khat balu siari, bataki som khatle balu siari bi krwang luthop siari thope.

Bakameina tambaan la insi om badam inthum om khat ting khom hung rwe khatle insi bing ga talei la bazwan ta damme. Mannu gana nao am thang khap tinu le naosen ding ga sa sat lang dragonna nao am dingnu mannu meithaan bi han ong ngaake.
Chaat bing ding thin sungrwan choiluga sian dingnu sa kapaisa khat mannu gana pon thang rwe. Basa ding Rikrwang khatle Batakung riak la lou thou drwe.
Rikrwang na daan thangnu ramhaang la mannu ga pak thou drwe. Balangbe habei ga mi nunna bating lumik raching khat raza ni somruk pi sa pi in thanglune.
Tambaan la kraan katwak ngaake. Michael khatle baom tambaan chonglang rwanna dragon maitwang bi kraan katwak rwe. Dragon khatle baom chonglang rwanna le kraan katwak rwe.
Atiyeda dragon om mi nunna ngamlan rwe. Atibriakpina tambaan la bani lang kaong riak phang lan rwe.

Kaliannu dragon, kama meithaan barun, Diabol khatle Seitaan diga kounu, talei ram bing ding minamnu ding ga talei ram la bazwanta drwe. Atiluga maan le bachamga baom tambaan chonglang rwan ding ga bazwanta drwe.

Haba kaan bi tambaan la basaangnu khwan khatna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Atun ringriak, nat, ani Rikrwang om krwang talei khatle Baom Christa om ngam ga hung tang rwe; Balangbe ani unao rwan ding ani Rikrwang meithaan bi zingpha thamlai koi impu thangnu bating bazwanta drwe.
“Banina bating Zao saza om thi paan bina khatle bani om sake om chong paan bina ngam ngaake. Bani thinu tangga bani kum ding batai make.

Atibriakpina tambaan khatle habei amnu nani bing karowo. Talei khatle tuipui bi amnu nani nun aih sianuweda! Balangbe baom bakaan toiye dinu Diabol na theiluga maan balung pwan takka nani khou ta drwe.”
Dragon na bating talei ram bi bazwanta rwe dinu muluga sa kapaisa am thang ngaaknu mannu ding rai damme.

Mannu gana ramhaang la bakaong riak la zwang se za lang kanatnu eagle basaa batha dannu kani Rikrwang na pi thang damme. Haba riak pi ga bating barun meithaan bina sangwan inthum babaang pi sa pi in thang damme.
Mannu ding ga tui lian gana daan thou dam lang barunna babao bina kaliannu tuiqwa khat mannu nung bi balwak swak rwe.
Atiyeda talei ramna mannu ding ga paang thang ngaake khatle talei ramna babao aang thouluga dragon na balwak swaknu tuiqwa ding kadwan dam ngaake.

Atibriakpina dragon na mannu ding balung pwan tak tamme khatle maanna mannu om am thangsianu bakik taat rwan, Rikrwang om zathang zeinu rwan khatle Jisu Christa om sake choinu rwan ding kraan katwak lang thou damme.

Ei tuipui paan lung tasi daam chung bi han ong ngaake. Tuipui bina khouring khat kanu eina mu rwe. Haba khouring ga balu siari khatle bataki som amme khatle bataki bing bi luthop som khatle balu bing bi Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiatnu meng am ngaake.
Eina mu ngaaknu khouring ga takhu danne, baketna kabom ket tanne, bamunna takhu krwang mun danne. Dragonna haba khouring khou baom nat, baom takung riak khatle kaliannu ngam pi thang rwe.
Balu khat ka thi dingnu danga liamnu ga eina mu rwe; atiyeda thi dingnu danga liamnu ga sa drwe. Talei ram mi bingna loh lo rwe khatle haba khouring nung sui damme.
Khouring lang ngam pi thang damnu dragon ding banina kalum damme khatle banina khouring ding ga kalumga rinne, “Khouring dannu tu ambo? Tuna maan le diga kraan katwaknu ngamgabo?”
Bakhou chong lian kabia lang khatle Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat lang mun pi thang rwe khatle tha sombaliga kani atiga to ong lang bakhou ngam pi damme.
Khouring gana babao aang thouluga Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat rwe khatle Bameng, Baom pwan in khatle tambaan la ongnu bani lu chung bi rin basiat rwe.
Bathiangnu mi nun le kraan katwak lang khatle bani ding ngam lang heiba khouring ding za thang rwe. Bakhou phum, chong chaat khatle chaat bing lu chung bi ngam pi thang rwe.
Talei ram bi amnu mi nunna haba khouring ding ga kalumlune. Bani ga Rikrwang na talei ram ding dam thang bina athat tamnu Zao saza om ringnu chongdip pi meng hiak thang maknu nunne.
Kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo.
Kraan minam toga se dingnu maan ga kraan minam toga selune; kachaak chemna athat tingnu bating ga kachaak chemna athatlune. Habei ga bathiangnu mi nun om khaang theinu khatle balumsanu amme.
Khouring katei khat talei lana kanu eina mu rwe; zao swan danga bataki kani amme khatle dragon danga kabiaye.

Maanna kamanu khouring om ngam bing ga haba khouring meithaan bi sizin ngaake. Atiluga talei ram khatle habei ga amnu mi nun ding kamanu khouring dinuba, thi dingnu danga liamnu, sa lat tamnu khouring ding ga pi kalum damme.
Maanna tasiatnu badan bing toga mi nun meithaan bi tambaan lana talei ram bi mei pi ta ngaake.

Maanna khouring meithaan bi to lang bakhou pi thang damnu badannu bing paan bina talei ram bi ongnu nun ding minam damme khatle talei ram bi ongnu mi nun khou rinne, “Kachaak chemna thi lang pi liam damnu ring ongnu khouring katha khat bachawo.”
Khouring katha bi ga ringnu kaphuk sem thang lang bakhou ngam amme. Balangbe khouring katha gana chong kabia lang khatle ha ding ga kalum maknu bing ding athat sat lang naye.
Maanna kaliannu khatle kasinnu, lungsanu khatle lungsianu, rang tonu khatle swak bing khou bani kut inchang pek la mak tabe bani bachan bi badannu khat pi thang damme.
Khouring om badan mak tabe bameng mak tabe bameng om basing lousunu maan ga makka pakhatchanale kaleinu khatle zwannu za make.
Abeiya ningting amme. Bakaba thei ngamnu maan gana heiba khouring om basing nga chak ting ngo; balangbe haga misa om basing nge khatle basing ga raza karuk somrukka karuke.
Phaang ngo, Zion rammwan bi Zao saza khat han ongnu eina mu rwe. Maan le diga bachan bi Bapa meng hiak thangnu mi lakh khat raching sombaliga bali am ngaake.
Tambaan lana tuipui baraam dannu khatle kanatnu khwa barinu baraam dannu khwan khat eina ngaisu damme khatle taraa kainu nunna bani om taraa kainu eina ngaisu damme.

Banina krwang takung riak meithaan bi, ringnu katha amnu bali meithaan bi khatle patso rwan meithaan bi laa kathan to damme. Talei ram bina kai takan thang damnu mi lakh khat raching sombaliga bali gana makka laa ga pakhatchanale bachunu ngam mak ngaake.

Haba mi nun ga kamaisa rwanna to tanaat mak aangnu nunne, balangbe bani ga bathiangnu nunne. Ha rwan ga Zao saza na senu riak pi banung suinu nunne. Ha rwan ga Rikrwang om khatle Zao saza om kamanu kraa toga mi nun khouna takan swaknu nunne.
Bani mun thei make, balangbe Rikrwang takung riak meithaan bi bani koi maaknu nunne.

Tambaan chonglang katei khatna tambaan zai bi zwang koi ongnu eina mu damme. Talei ram bi ongnu nun khou, chaat bing khou, phum bing khou, chong chaat bing khou khatle mi nun khou kasam lang khwa sei ringnu sacham bakhou amme.

Maanna baraam nat ka rinne, “Rikrwang ding kachiyo khatle Bakhou lwat liannu piyo; balangbe Maanna chong kasem dingnu chakrin ga hung tang rwe. Tambaan, talei ram, tuipui khatle tuipwak in bing ding dam thangnu Bating kalummo.”
Tambaan chonglang katei khatna banung suiga paoga rinne, “Baom lungkoi lungmaannu om taraannu zu ga maanna chaat bing ding pi in briakpina kaliannu namlian Babylon ga balum drwe, balum drwe.”
Haba nung inthumnu tambaan chonglangna bani nung suiga baraam basaangga rinne, “Tudannuna khouring ding ga khatle bakatha ding kalumme dabe khatle babachan bi mak tabe bakut pi badannu lousuwe dabe,

maanna le baom sung sounu ngai bi gana thang katwak mak aangnu Rikrwang om sung sounu zu ga inlune; atiga Rikrwang na bating bathiangnu tambaan chonglang rwan om khatle Zao saza meithaan bi mei khatle chok ongnu kanduk mei bi railune.
Bani om riangrenu meikhut ka khwa seiga amme. Khouring ding khatle bakatha ding kalumnu khatle bameng om badannu lousunu mi bing ga zingpha thamlai basaknu dou make.”
Abeiya bathiangnu mi nun om khaang theinu amme Rikrwang om zathang khatle Jisu om balumsanu ding zeinu bani ga amme.

Tambaan lana akhou khwan khatna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Hiak thangro, ‘Atunna thouga Pukraangba khou thi damnu nun ga aih saye.’ ” Katha gana rinne, “O, bani nun bani chwan bina basak lang khatle bani chwanna bani nung sui lang nge.”
Phaang ngo, kangounu tambu khat khatle haba chung bi Misa Sa Kapaisa dannu khat badung ongnu eina mu rwe. Balu bi kachaak luthop khatle Bakut pi kangainu sangkhwei khat choi ngaake.

Tambaan chonglang katei khatna bathiangnu in bina swak rwe. Maanna tambu chung bi badung ongnu Bakhou baraam basaangga pao rwe, “Naom sangkhwei ga choi thouro khatle aatro, balangbe nangna tapaan lwak lang bakaan hung rwe. Balangbe talei ram tapaan ga min rwe.”
Tambu chung bi badung ongnu Maanna talei ram bi Baom sangkhwei ga choi thou rwe khatle talei ram tapaan ga lwak rwe.
Tambaan chonglang katei khat tambaan om bathiangnu in bina swak rwe, baom le kangainu sangkhwei khat am ngaake.

Tambaan chonglang katei khatna rikhaang riak pina swak rwe. Mei chung bi bangam am ngaake. Maanna kangainu sangkhwei choinu bakhou baraam basaangga kouga rinne, “Naom kangainu sangkhwei ga choi thouro khatle talei ram drakha bom bing ga khom thouro; balangbe drakha bing ga min baran rwe.”

Atibriakpina Tambaan chonglang gana talei ram bi sangkhwei choi thouluga talei ram om drakha kraa bing khom thou rwe khatle maanna drakha kraa bing ga Rikrwang om balung pwan liannu drakha tui sumnu riak pi bazwan thang rwe.

Banina drakha bing ga namlian paan la drakha tui sumnu riak pi kadim rwe. Atiga drakha tui sumnu riak pina lwang swaknu thi ga raqwan mun khap tangga khatle mile razaga somkariat namlaaga lwang swak rwe.
Tambaan la kaliannu khatle tasiatnu badan katei khat eina mu rwe. Tambaan chonglang siari khou kakhamnu riangrenu siari amme. Riangrenu siari bi ga Rikrwang om balung pwan ga loi rwe.

Mei le thang katwaknu bathing ring ringnu tuipui dannu khatle khouring ding, bakatha ding, baom badannu ding khatle bameng sing ding ga ngamnu banina bathing ring ringnu tuipui chung bi Rikrwang om tara choiluga han ongnu eina mu rwe.

Banina Rikrwang swak Moses le Zao saza om laa toga rinne, “Ngam bachangnu Rikrwang, Pukraangba, Nachwan bingbe lianne khatle tasiate. He bathiangnu rwan om Krwang, Nalampui ga ririak senuwe khatle bazeye.

He Pukraangba, tuna Nating kachi mak tingbo? Nameng ding tuna lwat pi lian mak tingbo? Balangbe bathiangnu ga Pukraangba za zung nge; Chaat bingna hungluga Nameithaan bi kalum lang nge; Balangbe Naom ririak senu chwan ga indao swak rwe.”
Ha bing nung bi eina mu rwe phaang ngo, tambaan la sake om pwan in om bathiangnu in ga lat swak rwe.

Bathiangnu in bi gana riangrenu siari amnu tambaan chonglang siari ga swak rwe. Tambaan chonglang rwan ga bathiangnu khatle kaphingnu linen pwan sin ngaake khatle bani kachaang bi kachaak khap khaake.
Ringnu katha amnu bali lak pi pakhatna tambaan chonglang siari khou, khwa sei ring ongnu Rikrwang om balung pwanna sipnu kachaak kam siari ga pi ngaak rwe.

Haba bathiangnu in ga Rikrwang om lwat liannu khatle Baom ngam om meikhutna sip rwe. Tambaan chonglang siari om riangrenu siari ga loi dam mak basaan pakhatchanale haba bathiangnu in bi ga khutnu ngam mak ngaake.
Basaangnu khwan khatna haba bathiangnu in bi gana tambaan chonglang rwan siari khou atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Sero khatle Rikrwang balung pwan kam ga talei ram bi buntawo.”

Atibriakpina kamanu tambaan chonglangna seluga baom kam ga talei ram bi bunta rwe khatle khouring om badan amnu khatle bakatha ding kalumnu mi nun lu chung bi kasianu khatle bathak bakhweinu hung drwe.
Kaninu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga tuipui chung bi bunta rwe khatle tuipui tui ga kathinu mi om thi dan thou drwe; tuipui bi amnu ringnu khouring bing thi loi drwe.
Inthumnu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga tuiqwa bing bi khatle tuipwak bing bi bunta rwe khatle ha bing ga thi gon drwe.

Tui om tambaan chonglangna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “He Pukraangba, Nang ririak senuwe. Nangbe atun am ongnu, am ngaaknu khatle hung dingnu gaye. Balangbe Nangna hei bing nga atiga chong kasem rwe.
Balangbe banina bathiangnu mi nun khatle thiamting rwan ding thi pi ta damme. Nangna bani khou in lang thi pi rwe. Balangbe bani haga in lang khopnuwe.”
Rikhaang riak pina khwan katei khatna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “O, Ngam Bachangnu Rikrwang Pukraangba, Nachong sem gabe bazenuwe khatle ririak senuwe.”
Balinu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga lumik chung bi bunta rwe. Mi nun ding mei kaphukna pi rou lang lumik khou ngam pi thang rwe.
Kanatnu mei kaphuk kana mi nun ding rou drwe. Riangre nangnu chung bi ngam amnu Rikrwang meng ding rin basiat rwe. Balwat pi lian lang banina sung le mak ngaake.
Impaangnu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga khouring om takung riak chung bi bunta rwe. Baom krwang talei ga zing ta drwe. Mi nun ga naalai briakpina bani balei ei pat rwe.
Bani om kasa kanaa khatle bathak bakhweinu gana banina tambaan Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat rwe. Atiyeda banina bani chwan bina sung le mak ngaake.
Karuknu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga kaliannu Euphrates tuiqwa bi bunta rwe khatle tuiqwa bi tui kang drwe. Heiya lumik swak lana hungnu krwang nun lang lampui daan langna kangnuwe.
Kau thot tannu bathiang maknu katha inthum dragon bao bina khouring bao bina khatle kakoinu thiamting bao bina swaknu eina mu rwe.

Balangbe ha rwan ga tasiatnu badan to damnu ri kasia nun om katha ye. Banina talei ram krwang nun ding khatle talei ram mi bing ding kangamnu Rikrwang om kaliannu lumik om kraan lang khom thou langna bani khou se swaknuwe.
“Phaang ngo, Ei barusanu mi danga hung nge. Barak theiga baom pon naat baswannu sin basoi ongnu maan ga aih sanuwe. Ati make dabe pum tangang selune khatle mi nunna baom kazaknu ga doulune.”
Banina bani ding Hebrew chong la Armageddon diga kounu riak la khom hung kadoi rwe.
Siarinu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga thiraang bi bunta rwe khatle tambaan om bathiangnu in bina khatle krwang takung riak pina basaangnu khwan khatna swakluga rinne, “Heiya loi rwe.”

Habei ga kasao kabao rwe, khwa bari rwe khatle khwa bathaak rwe khatle kanatnu talei kaling kaling rwe. Talei ram bi misana lung thou bina heitia liannu khatle natnu talei kaling kaling dam mak aang nge.
Namlian ga badang inthum swak rwe khatle chaat bing om namlian bing kanuk raita rwe. Rikrwang om tasiatnu balung pwan om zu ngai ga Babylon khou pi lang Rikrwang na bating baningsu rwe.
Tuikoi ram bing le pak thou drwe khatle pakhatchanale rammwan ding zongsulan rwe.

Tambaan lana kaliannu thakraa mi nun lu chung bi ta rwe. Thakraa khatna kilo somthumga impaang khak rit ngaake. Kaliannu thakraa ta briakpina mi nunna Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat rwe. Balangbe bani riangrek ka tasiatnu ngaake.

Kam siari amnu tambaan chonglang siari lak pi pakhatna akim bi hungluga ei le kabialuga rinne, “Abeiya hung ngo, tui chung bi badung ongnu boulaa taknu mannu lu chung bi ta dingnu chongtok ka eina nakhou pi mu thangne.
Talei ram krwang nunna maan le diga lungmaan rwe. Baom lungmaannu zu gana talei ram mi nun ding to kalo rwe.”

Atibriakpina maanna ating katha paan bina ramhaang la phun swak rwe khatle rin basiatnu mengna sipka amnu balu siari khatle bataki som amnu kasennu khouring khat chung bi badung ongnu mannu khat ting eina mu rwe.

Haba mannu ga sathum bachu khatle sen dumnu bachu pon sin basoiye, kachaak, baman kungnu lung khatle muktana tapon towe. Bakut pi batannu khatle lungkoi lungmaannu om tanaatnuna sipnu kachaak ngai khat am ngaake.
Atiga, “KALIANNU BABYLON, BOULAANU KHATLE TALEI RAM OM BATANNU NU” dinu meng babachan bi hiak thang nge.
Bathiangnu mi nun thi khatle Jisu om lang bina bakum pi swak thang damnu mi nun thi inluga kalonu mannu ding eina mu rwe; eina bating phaangmu bi rin lang thei makka loh lo ong ngaake.

Atiyeda tambaan chonglang gana akhou rin damme, “Nangna pa-aam lang loh lo ongnubo? Eina haba mannu om lang bi khatle bating phunse ongnu balu siari khatle bataki som amnu khouring om lang bi inthim chong ga nakhou rin thangne.

Nangna phaangmu damnu khouring ga am ngaake atiyeda atunba maak rwe. Maan bakalan maaknu khun bina kalune khatle maan braannu bi selune. Talei ram dam thou mak baleina bani meng ga ringnu chongdip pi hiak thang mak aangnu, talei ram bi amnu mi nunna khouring ga tatoga amnu, am ngaaknu khatle am dingnu dinu lang bi bani loh lo lune.
Abeiya ningting amnu lungning amme. Balu siari ga mannu gana badung ongnu rammwan siari gaye.
Krwang siari amme, impaang ga balum drwe, khat atun amme. Katei khat ka atun hung mak aang nge; maan hungnu kaan bi maan bakaan kasem onglune.
Am ngaaknu khatle maak tamnu khouring ga kariatnu gaye. Maan siari lak pina hungnuwe khatle braannu bi se ongme.
Nangna mu ngaaknu bataki som ga atun tangga krwang talei lousu mak aangnu krwang som gaye. Atiyeda banina krwang nun danga khouring le diga chakrin khat lang ngam lousulune.
Krwang bing ga sung chamme khatle banina bani nat khatle bani ngam khouring khou ga pilune.

“Banina Zao saza le kraan katwaklune khatle Zao sazana bani ding ngamlune. Balangbe maan pukraangba bing Pukraangba khatle krwang bing Krwang nge. Maan le bachamnu mi nun ga kou swak thangnu, kathang swaknu khatle balumsa zanu mi nunne.”
Maanna akhou rinne, “Nangna mu damnu boulaanu mannu gana badung ongnu tui ga mi nun, mi khang, chaat bing khatle chong chaat bing nge.
Khouring khou ga nangna mu damnu taki som gana boulaanu mannu ding ga batanlune khatle to braan satlune, pwan pi basoilaye, bazanti ding salune khatle bating mei rou satlune.

Balangbe Rikrwang na rin thang ngaaknu chong bing ga hung tang mak basaan sung khatcha to lang khatle bani krwang talei bing ga khouring khou ga pi lang Rikrwang na bani sung bi bathainu sung ga pi hung tang lang daan thang rwe.
Nangna mu ngaaknu mannu ga talei ram krwang nun lu chung bi paan ongnu kaliannu namlian gaye.”
Ha bing nung bi tambaan chonglang katei khat tambaan lana tanu eina mu rwe. Bakhou ngam liannu amme khatle talei ram ga balwat kana pi baan rwe.

Maanna baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Balum drwe, kaliannu Babylon balum drwe. Heiya ri kasia nun kaong riak, bathiang maknu katha bing om qwan in khatle bathiang maknu le batannu basa bing om kaong riak imbei rwe.

“Balangbe chaat bingna baom balung pwan taknu lungkoi lungmaannu om taraannu zu ga in kalo rwe. Talei ram krwang nunna maan le lungkoi lungmaan rwe. Talei ram bi langgonnu rwanna baom impham imphanu paan bina bani lungsa rwe.”
Habei gana tambaan lana khwan katei khatna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Ami nun ga, nani nunna maan le noh om badam khatle baom riangrek ka badam lou bacham mak lang bakhouna swak tro.
“Balangbe banoh ga tambaan tang rwe. Rikrwang na baom ririak se maknu chwan ga baningsu rwe.
“Maanna nani khou pi thang damnu danga bakhou le piyo khatle bachwan nung suiga bakhou badam kani pi thang ngo. Maanna nani lang thang katwak tamnu ngai bi ga balaang zana badam kani thang katwako.

“Maanna bazan ding lwat pi lian damnu khatle karo rangaa bi ong ngaaknu chaang bakhou riangre kanang bason thang ngo. Balangbe maanna balungning bi atiga kakhan ngaake, ‘Ei ramanu danga amme, tameinu make, riangrenu khatchale mulaye.’
