“Atibriakpina kani khat sung bi baom riangrek bing ga: Thinu, nu hweinu khatle bu taangnu hunglune khatle bating meina roumut sat thanglune; balangbe bating chong kasemnu Rikrwang Pukraangba ga kanatnuwe.
“Bating rounu meikhut kanu banina munu kaan bi maan le lungkoi lungmaan ngaaknu khatle karo rangaa bacham ngaaknu talei ram krwang bingna balaang chungna chaplune khatle nu hweilune.

“Bariangrek ka muluga kachi briakpina banina namlaa la hanluga rinne, ‘Aih sianuweda! aih sianuweda! kaliannu namlian, kanatnu namlian Babylon; Balangbe chakrin khat sung bi naom chongsem ga hung rwe.’
“Talei ram bi langgonnu nunna balaang chungna chaplune khatle nu hweilune; balangbe pakhatchanale bani om langgon pot ka kalei thang lat lan rwe.

Bani om langgon pot ka kachaak, tangka, baman kungnu lung, mukta, kasanu linen pwan, sathum bachu pwan, muga laa, kasennu pwan khatle citron thing, rampwang ngaa ngai, baman kungnu thing ngai, thinzin, thin khatle marble lungna bachanu ngai,
tangong, prong, banamsanu thao, kunduk, zu, thao, sukdi gehu, sen, zao, raqwan, raqwan gari, swak rwan khatle mi nun om katha ha bing nge.
“Nangna bathai taknu thakraa bing ga nakhouna thou drwe khatle sasa insanu pot bing khatle baannu bathiangnu pot bing nakhouna thou drwe. Nangna ha bingba lousu latla rwe.
Napaan bina lungsa ngaaknu pot zwannu rwan gana nariangrek ka muluga kachiga namlaa la hanluga chaplune khatle nu hweilune,
atiga rinne, ‘Aih sianuweda, aih sianuweda, kasanu linen, sathum bachu, kasennu bachu pwan sinnu khatle kachaak, baman kungnu lung bing khatle muktana tapon tonu kaliannu namlian ga!

Balangbe chakrin khat sung bi heitia lang tam damnu lan bing ga khatchale bila rwe. Lipuba rwan bing, li hwanluga se ongnu nun bing, li hwannu nun khatle tuipui bi langgonnu rwanna namlaa la han ong ngaake.’
Bating meina rou ongnu meikhut ka munu kaan bi banina paoga rinne, ‘Kaliannu namlian heiya le bachamnu namlian ambo?’

Banina bani lu bi tambut bwan kaluga pao rwe, chap rwe khatle nu hweiga rinne, ‘Aih sianuweda! aih sianuweda! tuipui bi li hwannu bingna baom lan paan bina lungsa damnu kaliannu namlian ga! Balangbe nang chakrin khat sung bi braan drwe.’
He tambaan, bathiangnu mi rwan, chonglang rwan khatle thiamting rwan, nani balang bina karowo; Balangbe Rikrwang na nani langna balu chung bi takhum baan thang rwe.”

“Ngam liannu tambaan chonglang khatna barwannu saang tak lung dannu lung khat lou thouluga haga tuipui bi bazwan thangluga rinne, ‘Hei danga kaliannu namlian Babylon ding rakanga bazwantalune khatle haga am lat pila rwe.

Pakhatchanale nakhouna tara baraam, laa to theinu khwan, tamrwang semnu khwan khatle trumpet semnu khwan ngaisu lat pila rwe; kutthiam chwan nakhou am lat pila rwe; Pakhatchanale nakhouna saang taknu khwan ngaisu lat pila rwe.

Nakhouna thaomei baan baan lat pila rwe; pakhatchanale nakhouna tazwanpa tazwannu khwan ngaisu lat pila rwe. Balangbe nang le langgonnu rwan ga talei ram om kaliannu mi nunne khatle naom dweina chaat bing ding minam rwe.
“Bakhouna thiamting rwan om, bathiangnu mi rwan om khatle talei ram bi athat tamnu mi bing om thi dou rwe.” ’
Heiba nung bi tambaan la mi khang pui khat om basaangnu khwan khatna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Halleluiya, ringriak, lwat liannu, takung tazeinu khatle ngam bing ga ani Rikrwang Pukraangba omme.

Balangbe Baom chongsem ga bazenuwe khatle ririak senuwe; Balangbe Maanna kaliannu boulaa taknu mannu ding, baom lungkoi lungmaannuna talei ram ding to tanaat tamnu langna bating chong kasem rwe, Khatle maanna pi ta damnu Baswak rwan om thi man ga Pukraangba na balu chung bi takhum baan thang rwe.”
Banina rin late, “Halleluiya, Baom meikhut ka khwa seiga kaye.”
Patso somniga bali khatle ringnu katha amnu bali gana in bakhup taluga krwang takung riak pi badung ongnu Rikrwang ding kalumga rinne, “Amen, Halleluiya.”
Takung riak pina swaknu khwan gana rinne, “Baswak rwan nani bingna khatle Bating kachinu kasei kalian khatle kason kaong nani khangsung ani Rikrwang ding swanno.”
Mi khang pui khwan dannu tuipui baraam dannu khatle rakannu khwa barinu baraam dannuna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Halleluiya, balangbe kangamnu ani Rikrwang Pukraangba na paan rwe.
“Ani karozo, lozaang sazo khatle Bating swanzo; Balangbe Zao saza om tazwan bahwannu ga hung tang rwe. Baom tazwannu gana daanga ong rwe.”
Bathiangnu khatle kaphingnu linen pwan balaang sin basoi thang lang pi thang rwe; Balangbe kasanu linen pwan ga bathiangnu mi rwan om ririak senu chwan bing gaye.”
Haba nung maanna akhou rinne, “Hiak thang ngo, ‘Zao saza om tazwan bahwan bi talot tamnu rwan ga aih saye.’ ” Maanna akhou rinne, “Rin ongnu bing heiya Rikrwang om bazenu chong nge”

Eina baket pi bating kalum lang in bakhup ta rwe. Atiyeda maanna akhou rinne, “Nang haga to mako, eile nang khatle Jisu lang bi sake pi ongnu naunao rwan le diga swak to bachamnuwe. Rikrwang ding kalummo, balangbe thiamting om bathainu ga Jisu om lang bi sake pinu gaye.”

Tambaan lat swaknu eina mu rwe. Atiga phaang ngo, kangounu raqwan khat amme; haba raqwan chung bi twangnu Bameng ga Balumsa zanu khatle Bazenu diga kou ngaake. Maanna ririak senu bi chong kasemme khatle kraan katwake.
Bamik ka mei balei danne khatle balu bi krwang luthop taswang khak am ngaake khatle Maan makka pakhatchanale thei maknu hiak thangnu meng Bakhou am ngaake.
Maan thi bi lupnu pwan sin ngaake khatle Bamengna Rikrwang Chongkaang diga kouwe.
Tambaan kraanmi nunna kangounu khatle bathiangnu banemnu linen pwan sinluga kangounu raqwan twangluga Banung suiseye.

Babao bina chaat nun ding kapak that lang kangainu kachaak chem swake khatle “Maanna bani ding thin sungrwanna sianlune;” Maanna Ngam Bachangnu Rikrwang om tasiatnu kaliannu balung pwanna drakha tui sumnu riak ting kadimme.
Bapwan bi khatle ketling bi, “KRWANG BING KRWANG, PUKRAANGBA BING PUKRAANGBA” diga hiak thangnu meng amme.

Tambaan chonglang khatna lumik pi han ongnu eina mu rwe, maanna tambaan zai bi zwang koi ongnu basaa nun khou baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Hungro khatle basaang kataknu Rikrwang om balou bi ga hung kadoiro.

Nanina krwang nun zan, kraan milu nun zan khatle kanatnu mi nun zan, raqwan nun zan khatle haba chung bi twangnu nun zan, rang tonu khatle swak nun, kasin kalian dinuba, ha bing om zan sa lang nani hung ngo.”
Haba nung bi khouring khatle talei ram krwang nun, bani om kraanmi rwanna raqwan chung bi badung ongnu Baom kraanmi rwan le kraan katwak lang hung kadoinu eina mu rwe.

Khouring khatle bameithaan bi badannu pi mu damnu kakoinu thiamting ding nam rwe. Badannu paanna khouring badan amnu khatle bakatha ding kalumnu nun ding minam damme. Barwei pat ni ding kanduk mei bati ongnu riak pi baring bazwan thang rwe.
Raqwan chung bi badung ongnu Bamun bina swaknu kachaak chemna katei rwan bing ding athat rwe khatle basa nunna bani zan saluga bani bon imba rwe.
Tambaan lana tambaan chonglang khat tanu eina mu rwe. Bakhou bakalan maaknu khun om taapthing khatle bakut pi kaliannu parei rui khat am ngaake.
Maanna Diabol le Seitaan dinuba kama meithaan om barun, dragon, ding nam rwe khatle bating sangwan raching khat karakluga thang damme.

Maanna bating bakalan maaknu khun bi bazwanta rwe khatle sangwan raching khat loi mak basaan maanna chaat nun ding minam lat mak lang bating balakluga balu chung bi seal nam thang ngaake. Atiyeda heiba nung bi bating bakaan kasem za lang bathan swaklune.

Eina takung riak bing ga mu rwe khatle takung riak pi badung ongnu nun khou chong kasem lang ngam pi thang rwe. Jisu lang bi sake pinu langna khatle Rikrwang om chongkaang langna ring tan damnu nun om katha bing, khouring ding khatle bakatha ding kalum maknu nun khatle bani bachan bi khatle kut pi baom badan maaknu nun ding eina mu rwe. Banina ring thouluga Christa le diga sangwan raching khat paan bacham rwe.
Atiyeda thi damnu mi katei bing ga sangwan raching khat loi mak basaan ring thoulaye. Heiya ring thounu kamanu gaye.

Kamanu ring thounu bi suinu maan ga aih sanuwe khatle bathiangnuwe; thi leng ninuna heiba mi nun lu chung bi ngam am bila rwe. Atiyeda bani Rikrwang om khatle Christa om tako rwan tolune. Banina Maan le diga sangwan raching khat paan bachamlune.
Sangwan raching khat loinu kaan bi Seitaan ding baom qwan in bina bathan swaklune

khatle maanna talei taki bali la amnu chaat bing ding dinuba, Gog le Magog ting minam lang se swaklune, maanna bani ding kraan katwak lang khom karunglune; bani mi sing ga tuipui paan lungtasi za lune.

Banina talei ram bing bina swakluga bathiangnu mi nun kaong riak khatle Rikrwang na kriangnu namlian ding ga han qwat tamme khatle tambaan la Rikrwang khouna mei bathan taluga bani ding rou sat tamme.
Khouring khatle kakoinu thiamtingna ongnu riak kanduk khatle mei paat pi bani ding minamnu Diabol ding bazwan thang rwe. Habei ga bani zingpha thamlai nai makka khwa sei riangre khaanglune.
Kaliannu kangounu takung riak khat atiluga haba chung bi badung ongnu Bating eina mu rwe. Bameithaan bina tambaan le talei ram pak thou damme khatle bani lang kaong riak dou mak ngaake.

Thi damnu nun, kasinnu khatle kaliannu nunna Rikrwang meithaan bi han ongnu eina mu rwe khatle chongdip bing lat swak ngaake khatle chongdip katei dinuba, ringnu Chongdip ka lat swak ngaake. Maanna thinu nun ding chongdip pi hiak thang damnu bani chwan nung suiga chong kasem ngaake.

Tuipuina basung bi amnu thi damnu nun ding pi swak tamme khatle Thinu le Kathi ramna basung bi amnu thi damnu nun ding pi swak tamme khatle bani pakhat khat ting le bachwan nung suiga chong kasem rwe.
Thinu khatle Kathi ram ding mei paat pi bazwan thang rwe. Heiya thi leng ninu gaye.
Ringnu Chongdip pi meng hiak thang maknu bating mei paat sung bi bazwan thang rwe.
Tambaan kathan khatle talei kathan ding eina mu rwe; balangbe kamanu tambaan khatle kamanu talei ram maak rwe khatle tuipui le maak rwe.
Babasan lang chamdaan thangnu tazwannu dannu bathiangnu namlian Jerusalem kathan Rikrwang khouna tambaan lana tanu ding John eina mu rwe.

Tambaan lana baraam basaangga atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Phaang ngo, Rikrwang kaong riak ka mi nun lak pi amme. Maan bani le ong bachamlune khatle bani Bami nun tolune, Khatle Rikrwang Maan bahak bani le ong bachamlune, Khatle bani om Rikrwang tolune.
Rikrwang na bani mik pina mikthi bing kanun sat thanglune, Thinu, riangrenu, chapnu khatle naanu am latla rwe. Balangbe kamanu pot bing ga thou drwe.”
Takung riak pi badung ongnu Maanna rin ngaake, “Phaang ngo, eina pot bing ding kathan toga bachaye.” Maanna akhou rinne, “Hiak thangro, balangbe heiba chong bing nga bazenu khatle balumsa zanuwe.”
Maanna akhou rinne, “Pum brumza loi rwe. Ei Alpha khatle Omega, Thoutannu khatle Loinu gaye. Taraannu balaang Eina ringnu tuipwak in tui ga bathaam pi thangne.
Ngam hungnu maanna pot bingza lousulune khatle Eina baom Rikrwang tolune khatle maanna Asa kapaisa tolune.

Atiyeda kachi natnu nun, balumsa maknu nun, batannu chwan tonu nun, mi athatnu nun, lungkoi lungmaannu nun, dwei choinu nun, ri katha kalumnu nun khatle chong karwaknu nun mei le kanduk bati ongnu paat pi ga bani kaong riak to lang nge, heiya thi leng ninu gaye.”

Kakhamnu om riangrenuna sipnu kam siari choinu tambaan chonglang siari lak pi khatna hungluga ei le meiri raiga rinne, “Abeiya hung ngo, Zao saza mei to dingnu tazwannu ding eina nakhou pi mu thangne.”
Tambaan chonglangna ating katha bi basaangnu kaliannu rammwan khat om lu chung la kalwang se ngaake. Kaliannu namlian bathiangnu Jerusalem Rikrwang khouna tambaan lana tanu akhou pi mu thang rwe.
Habei ga Rikrwang om lwat liannu amme, haba om babaan ga baman kungnu lung, bathing ring ringnu bathiangnu zasper lung dannuwe.

Namlian om liannu, basaangnu, kapan khatle inkhaan pui somga kani khatle inkhaan pui bing bi tambaan chonglang pat somga kani am ngaake. Inkhaan pui bing bi Israel sa rwan phum somga kani meng hiak thang ngaake.
Namlian om lumik swak la inkhaan inthum, kasak la inkhaan inthum, kathwei la inkhaan inthum khatle lumik taak la inkhaan inthum amme.
Namlian om kapan inmun somga kani amme. Haba inmun bing bi Zao saza om chonglang somga kani meng am ngaake.
Akhou chong kabia ngaaknu bakut pi namlian ding, inkhaan bing ding khatle kapan ding badat lang kachaak thingrwa khat am ngaake.
Namlian ga bataki bali amme, basei balian bachamme. Maanna haba namlian ga badatnu kaan bi kilometer raching ni raza ni ngaake, baom basei balian basaangnu bachamme.
Maanna kapan ga badatnu kaan bi mi khatna dinuba, tambaan chonglangna badatnu nung suiga kutki raza sombaliga bali ngaake.
Namlian om kapan ga zasper lungna bachanuwe khatle namlian ga bathiangnu likli dannu bathiangnu kachaakna bachanuwe.

Namlian om kapan inmun bing ga bachaat inza om baman kungnu lungna tapon to thang nge. Kamanu inmun ga zasper lung naye, kaninuna sapphire lung naye, inthumnuna chalcedony lung naye, balinuna emerald lung naye.

Impaangnu gana sardonyx lung naye, karuknu gana sardius lung naye, siarinu gana chrysolite lung naye, kariatnu gana beryl lung naye, kaqwanu gana topaz lung naye, somnu gana chrysoprase lung naye, somga khatnu gana jacinth lung naye khatle somga kaninu gana amethyst lung naye.
Inkhaan pui somga kani ga mukta somga kani ngaake; inkhaan pui bing ga mukta khat khat ngaake. Namlian om lampui ga mu kabaan zanu likli dannu bathiangnu kachaakna ngaake.
Namlian sung bi bathiangnu in khatchale mu make, balangbe Ngam Bachangnu Rikrwang Pukraangba khatle Zao saza gana namlian om bathiangnu in gaye.
Namlian bi ga lumik, thana baan lang bathaang maake; balangbe Rikrwang om lwat lianna habei ga baan ongme khatle Zao saza gana haba om babaan gaye.
Rikrwang na kan thang damnu chaat nunna baannu bi ga se koilune. Talei ram krwang nunna bani lwat lian khatle takung tazei tonu bing habei ga phun hunglune.
Thamlai inkhaan bing ga impha ni beida khaanlaye, balangbe habei ga zingpha dinu amla rwe.
Banina chaat nun om lwat liannu khatle takung tazei tonu habei ga phun hunglune.

Atiyeda bapum ding to tanaatnu, batannu chwan tonu nun mak tabe chong karwaknu rwan habei ga khatchale khutpilaye atiyeda Zao saza om ringnu chongdip pi meng hiak thang damnu gana haba sung bi khutlune.
Rikrwang khatle Zao saza takung riak pina lwang swaknu bathing ring ringnu ringnu bathiangnu tuiqwa khat akhou pi mu thang rwe.

Habei lampui zai bi khatle tuiqwa paan kani bi ringnu thingkung thouwe, haba thingkung bi ga bachaat tei teinu thakraa bachaat somga kani, tha bathin kraa ngaake; thingkung naa bing ga chaat nun ding pi sa thang lang ngaake.
Habei ga taseng dinu amla rwe atiyeda Rikrwang om khatle Zao saza om takung riak ka habei ga amlune atiga Baswak rwanna Bating chwanlaang tolune.
Banina Baman mulune khatle Bameng bani bachan bi amlune.
Habei ga zingpha amla rwe, bani lang thaomei mak tabe lumik baan bathaang amla rwe; balangbe Rikrwang Pukraangba na bani khou baannu ga pi thang nge khatle bani khwa seiga krwang paan onglune.

Maanna akhou rin ngaake, “Heiba chong bing nga balumsa lang khopnuwe khatle bazenuwe. Barapka hung dingnu bing om lang bi Baswak rwan khou pi mu thang lang bathiangnu thiamting rwan om Pukraangba Rikrwang na Baom tambaan chonglang ding lang thang rwe.
“Phaang ngo, Ei barapka hung rwe. Chongdip pi rin chaak thangnu chong bing zeinu maan ga aih sanuwe.”
John eina ha bing ga mu rwe khatle ngaisu rwe. Eina haga munu khatle ngaisunu kaan bi ha bing akhou pi mu thang ngaaknu tambaan chonglang ket pi kalum lang kunta ngaake.
Habei ga maanna akhou rinne, “Haga ati mako, balangbe ei nang le nau nanao thiamting rwan khatle chongdipna rin thangnu ding zeinu bani le diga swak to bachamnuwe. Rikrwang ding kalummo.”
Maanna akhou rinne, “Heiba chongdipna rin chaak thangnu chong bing nga seal nam mako, balangbe bakaan ga nai hung rwe.
Baze maknu maan ga baze makka am dam dingro, tanaatnu maan ga tanaat ka am dam dingro, ririak senu maan ga ririak sega am dam dingro. Bathiangnu maan ga bathiangga am dam dingro.
Phaang ngo Ei barapka hung rwe. Mi bing lang maan maanna tonu chwan nung suiga pi thang lang Aom taswan Eina phun hung nge.
“Ei Alpha khatle Omega, Thoutannu khatle Loinu, Kamanu khatle Kakhamnu gaye.”
Baom zathang bing zeinu maan ga aih sanuwe. Bani khou ringnu thingkung bina sa lang khatle namlian om inkhaan pui bi ga khut lang bani khou ngam amlune.
Langkaang la ui nun, dwei choinu nun, lungkoi lungmaannu nun, mi athatnu nun, ri katha kalumnu nun, chong karwaknu nun amme.
“Rupkathan bing bi hei lang bi sake to lang Jisu Eina Aom tambaan chonglang rwan ding nani khou lang hung rwe. Ei David Kamong khatle bakik taate, Ei Baan chuinu khatle Louthwan Insi Thanne.”
Katha na khatle tazwannuna rinne, “Hung thang ngo.” Ngai ongnu maanna rin ding ngo, “Hung thang ngo.” Taraannu maan ga hung ding ngo. Bathainu maan gana ringnu tui ga bathaam in ding ngo.

Heiba chongdip om rin swaknu ding ga ngai ongnu bing khou eina sake pinuwe, tudannuna hei bing chung bi thanghape dabe, hei chongdip pi rin chaak thangnu riangrenu bing ga Rikrwang na bakhou hap thanglune.

Heiba chongdip pi rin chaak thangnu chong bina tudannuna lou sate dabe, Rikrwang na baom badam ga ringnu chongdip pina, bathiangnu namlian bina khatle chongdip pi hiak thang damnu bing bina lou satlune.
Hei bing lang bi sake pinu Maanna rinne, “Batak takka Ei barapka hung rwe. Amen. O, Pukraangba Jisu, hung thangro.”
Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriangna nani nun bing le ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
